# hardcore_pop -  FRISCH AUS DER TRAP_beat_dr_Mixall
[DESCRIPTION]
The track launches with deep 808s and tight UK drill hi-hats, joined by a distorted rolling bassline; eerie cyborg synths swell in, layered with pitch-shifted robotic autotune vocals. Explosive drops push heavy low-end punches. Folk-inspired, Balkan-style chants surface, sampled and looped with hypnotic tech-house beats. The fusion creates an urban, mythic texture: relentless, harsh, yet melodically haunting. Aggressive percussion powers the forward drive, while ancestral samples and futuristic synths weave through the urban landscape, offering a gripping balance of raw grit and melodic introspection.


---

# hardcore_pop -  FRISCH AUS DER TRAP_beat_dr_Mixall
[DESCRIPTION]
The track launches with deep 808s and tight UK drill hi-hats, joined by a distorted rolling bassline; eerie cyborg synths swell in, layered with pitch-shifted robotic autotune vocals. Explosive drops push heavy low-end punches. Folk-inspired, Balkan-style chants surface, sampled and looped with hypnotic tech-house beats. The fusion creates an urban, mythic texture: relentless, harsh, yet melodically haunting. Aggressive percussion powers the forward drive, while ancestral samples and futuristic synths weave through the urban landscape, offering a gripping balance of raw grit and melodic introspection.


---

# hardcore_pop -  FRISCH AUS DER TRAP_beat_dr_Mixall (1.19x)
[DESCRIPTION]
A raw gangsta/street rap track rides a dark, minimal trap beat with booming 808s, rapid hi-hats, and brooding synths. Aggressive flows from multiple vocalists alternate, weaving in crew call-and-response, hard punch-ins, and ad-libs. Layers build for a tense, relentless energy, balancing gritty street roots with slick, modern production.


---

# hardcore_pop -  GINAILLUZ_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
[Track Instructions]
([Track] - [bouncy underground slap club tech Turkish oriental pop, non-stop dance groove, slap bass, oriental leads, club-ready mix])
([FX Motif] - [tasteful car honks and tire screech FX used rhythmically and as transitions, never too loud])
([Voice] - [silk-smooth clear male vocal, natural tone, no autotune, tight rhythm, lightly compressed])
([Female BV] - [soft airy oriental-flavored backing vocals and ad-libs, smooth and sensual, non-explicit])
([Space] - [short club reverb, clean stereo delays in tempo, no robotic effects, modern hi-fi sound])

[LYRICS]
[Verse 1]

([Bass drop FX] - [warm sub + slap bass slide-in, 1-bar swell into groove])
tajm black,gole njene grudi
([Female BV, breathy] - [aaah, silky oriental run, low in mix, reverb tail])
Gori štek purim ona nek’ me ljubi
([Hi-hat + darbuka roll] - [tktktk, tight in tempo, lifts energy])
ona ta zna da nešto mutim
([Vocal chop, pitched] - ["mutim, mutim" smooth chop on off-beats])
A predoziran sam da ne poludim
([Reverb throw] - ["loooodim" clean echo, decays under next bar])
Mi smo ti bro ,svi lagani
([Ad-lib] - ["lagani, lagani" soft, panned L/R, short delay])
a vozi te flow  ko pagani
([Engine FX] - [vrrrroom, stylized sports car rev in tempo, filtered])
Adrenalin kada smo vani
([Riser FX] - [whoooosh noise + synth, quick build to next line])
A ja zapalim to k’o u španiji
([Crowd murmur] - [mmmrum, distant club cheer, 1-bar loop])


---

[Verse 2]

([Filtered beat] - [low-pass groove pumping 1 bar, then opens up])
Tog Topa zapalio pa
([Lighter flick] - [chk on upbeat, crisp, tiny echo])
Pameti adio ja
([Delay] - ["adio… io… io" clean stereo taps in tempo])
Nikad nisam krio
da tvoj sam bio
([Chopped echo] - ["bio, bio" two short repeats, glued to kick])
nikad nisam krio da
Ova mala sija sva
([Shimmer FX] - [soft chime tinkle, stereo, short tail])
ona k’o mafiosa
([Female BV] - [mmm, low sultry hum, oriental color])
ra-rabiosa
([Stutter FX] - ["ra-ra-rabiosa" synced stutter, light club delay])
a alkohol je kida sad
([Bottle clink] - [clink on snare, tiny sparkle echo])
ona gola i ja sam
rabiosa,ra-rabiosa
([Stereo delay] - ["biosa… osa…" smooth L/R echo, fading])


---

[Chorus]

([Pre-drop sweep] - [whooom, rising noise + car brake hiss, drops into full groove])
oo-oh aa-ah
([Female BV, layered] - [aaah-aaaah, wide harmony pad, oriental touch])
svašta bih radio sad
([Ad-lib] - ["sve, sve" playful, tucked behind lead])
oo
([Tape echo] - ["oo-oh… oh" clean dub-style delay in tempo])
a ja bih zbog nje zapalio grad
([Fire FX] - [fshhhh, stylized flame whoosh, spreads stereo])
oo-oh
a ja bih svašta radio sa njom
([Vocal chop] - ["sa njooom" stretched, pitched slightly, lush reverb])
jer nje mi nikad dovoljno
([Sub hit] - [short deep boom with slap bass accent on downbeat])
oo-oh
([Breathy BV] - [mmm-aaaah, soft exhale, fills space between phrases])
svašta bih radio sad
oo-oh
a ja bih zbog nje zapalio grad
([Riser + snare roll] - [trrrrrr, club build into last lines])
oo-oh
a ja bih svašta radio sa njom
jer nje mi nikad dovoljno
([Chopped BV] - ["nikad, nikad…" rhythmic chop, fades into next])


---

[Verse 3]

([Beat switch – darker] - [oriental lead + deeper slap bass, same tempo, cluby vibe])
Evo kako trošim dane
bebo tu su bele lajne
([FX] - [short stylized sniff + vinyl crackle, low in mix])
Na po tacne nacrtane
Moje rave sve su napucane
([Crowd chant, distant] - ["ey, ey" group chant, far back])
za mene bi zapucale
na vreme bi cupi dale
za krevet me upitale
videle se za budale
pantole skidale male
([Zip / cloth FX] - [shrrrp, cloth/zip sound in tempo, subtle])
vatale su zalet
kupim roli lupim nju
kidam pa šaljem dalje
([Delay] - ["dalje, dalje" two repeats, filtered down])
Lolu soli celofane
Voli roli columbiane
alkoholik hronik rane
Jin i tonik molly sranje
([Filter sweep down] - [fwooom, low-pass sweep on instruments 1 bar, then open])


---

[Verse 4]

([Drums half-time, big room] - [boom… tchk… with club reverb, bass still bouncy])
Pita me za granje neko
Robu tu sam tri put seko
([Slice FX] - [chk-chk, rhythmic chop like muted hat, tight])
loptu tu ko edin džeko
ja nabijem baš daleko
([Kick glide] - [booom-whoo, bass slide + kick accent, club-friendly])
sakrijem to sve sa štekom
naginje da platim čeko
rakije pijem k’o mleko
([Glass clink] - [clink + mini chorus of glasses, 1-bar tail])
bijem k’o emelienko nekog
Tamo savatamo
pa robu izotimamo
pa mu damo samo Zavoj
kad mu glavu polupamo
([Impact FX] - [DOOM, low club thud–not gory, just heavy impact, short])
naravno idemo tamom stalno
kasno rano ne pitamo
na rane im stavi slano
nikad se ne ofiramo
([Stereo echo] - ["ne ofiramo… ramo…" clean dub echo fading])


---

[Chorus – finale]

([Full-energy drop] - [all drums, slap bass, oriental lead, sidechain pumping])
oo-oh aa-ah
([Female BV, airy] - [aaah-uh, wide stereo, gluing chorus])
svašta bih radio sad
oo
a ja bih zbog nje zapalio grad
([Sirens, distant] - [wiiiu-wiiiu, very low, rhythmic, adds drama])
oo
a ja bih svašta radio sa njom
jer nje mi nikad dovoljno
([Vocal chop, formant down] - ["nikad… dovoljno…" smooth chopped phrase])
oo-oh
svašta bih radio sad
oo
a ja bih zbog nje zapalio grad
oo
a ja bih svašta radio sa njom
jer nje mi nikad dovoljno
([Outro FX – low-pass closing] - [fmmm… whole mix slowly filtered down, last honk far away])

---

# hardcore_pop -  Shantelijah x Ljubav Ohola- Hardcore_Pop_3
[DESCRIPTION]
at 127 bpm bouncy reggaetón  club tech Turkish zurna , cathederal organ, echo,  80s midi synthesizer,oriental pop, car honks, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Intro]
(Sve, sve ove godine sa tobom ja)
[room_verb – wide, distant, filtered, low in mix]
(Ja sam u svađi sam sa sobom sve)
[tape_delay – 1/4 note throw on “sobom sve”]
(Ove godine sa tobom ali danas je sa nama gotovo)
[doubled_low – whispered layer underneath “gotovo”]

[Verse 1]
Laž, laži sam mogao da podnesem ti
[slap_delay – short 1/8 echo on “podnesem ti”]
Proleće pretvaraš u jesen i sve
[pads_bg – warm minor pad swelling under “proleće / jesen”]
Sve sam mogao da izdržim ali prevare meni se ne vare
[bg_chant – low octave hum on “mene se ne vare”, sidechained to kick]

[Chorus]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[stereo_doubles – soft gang-style on word “pismo”]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[delay_throw – long 1/2 note echo on “zaboravi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[bg_choir – ooh/aaah sustained behind “ljubavi”]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[octave_up – thin high harmony on “druga boravi”]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[call_resp – chopped “ne šalji, ne šalji” tucked behind main]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[pingpong_delay – subtle stereo bounces on “zaboravi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[swell – reverse reverb into downbeat “U ljubavi”]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[adlib_bg – distant “hej, hej” between phrases]

[Verse 2]
Sve obično stane sve u reči dve
[mono_lp – first bar slightly filtered like telefonski glas]
Što ću ti reći znam da boleće
[backing_voices – quiet unison under “znam da boleće”]
Bilo bi najbolje da shvatiš da od danas je sa nama završeno
[chopped – rhythm chop “završeno, završeno” prije sledeće linije]
Laž, u laži svoje si se uplela
[fx_riser – short noise riser pre “uplela”]
I nisi znala, nisi umela
[stereo_adlibs – šapat “nisi znala, nisi umela” wide L/R]
Bilo bi najbolje da shvatiš da bez tebe ću živeti savršeno ja
[octave_stack – low + high harmony on “savršeno ja”]
E pa da
[dry_drop – muzički break, samo vokal, bez reverba]

[Chorus]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[doubles – lagani drugi glas za puniji hook]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[delay_throw – 1/4 + 1/2 kombinacija na “zaboravi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[choir_stack – troglasni “u ljubavi” u pozadini]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[answer_chop – kratko “druga, druga” chop pred “boravi”]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[clap_lift – dodatni claps i crowd FX na prvi takt refrena]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[reverb_tail – duži hall tail na kraju linije]
U ljubavi nismo
[pad_lift – akordi jači, sidechain uz kick]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[adlib – tihi “ajde, zaboravi” u pozadini]

[Bridge]
Nema, nema, nema ljubavi
[call_resp – pozadinski šapat “nema, nema” u stereo slici]
Srce hoće da zaboravi
[heartbeat_fx – low thump synced to tempo]
Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio
[reverse_verb – lead povučen unazad u sledeći takt]
Svoj sreći sam presudio
[octave_harmony – visoki glas prati “presudio”]
Nema, nema, nema ljubavi
[chopped – „nema ljubavi, ljubavi“ isječeno kao ritmički loop]
Srce hoće da zaboravi
[tremolo_fx – blagi tremolo na pratećem vokalu]
Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio
[stereo_widen – širi panorama samo na ovoj frazi]
Svoj sreći sam presudio
[tape_stop – kratki usporeni efekt na “presudio” pred refren]

[Chorus]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[full_stack – glavni glas + 2 harmonije za final hook]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[big_hall – veći reverb, refren kao “arena”]
U ljubavi nismo
[choir_aaah – dugi “aaah” akord kroz liniju]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[answer_vox – pozadinski “druga… druga…” u ehu]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[doubles + whisper_layer – šapat “ne šalji” ispod lead-a]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[delay_throw – snažan 1/2 note na poslednji “-vi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[sidechain_pad – diše uz kick, otvara se na “nismo”]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[outro_fill – kratki vokalni riff pre odlaska u outro]

[Outro]
(Nema, nema, nema ljubavi)
[filtered_echo – low-pass echo koji se gasi kroz 2 takta]
(Srce hoće da zaboravi)
[choir_low – muški duboko “hoće da zaboravi”]
(Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio)
[reverse_chop – isečene slogove “lju-bi-o” u ritmu]
(Svoj sreći sam presudio)
[reverb_swim – dugačak tail, fade u sledeću liniju]
(Nema, nema, nema ljubavi)
[distant_bg – kao da dolazi iz druge sobe]
(Srce hoće da zaboravi)
[pingpong_delay – lagani stereo bounce]
(Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio)
[adlib – tihi “hej…” pre “ljubio”]
(Svoj sreći sam presudio)
[fader_fade – postepeno spuštanje lead-a, ostaje samo delay i pad]

[Mix / Master –expertly done ]

---

# hardcore_pop -  Shantelijah x Ljubav Ohola- Hardcore_Pop_3
[DESCRIPTION]
An 135 bpm uk organ bassline charva underground slap tech house track , zurna, organ,80s synth, cowbell, car siren, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Intstrumental - go crazy]
([dark pad swell] - whoooom)
([distant snare roll] - tchk-tchk-tchk)

[Female]
da samo sam znala ne bih ti sve dala
([BV soft] - „aaah… ne bih…“)
nisam znala da si takav gad,
([BV distant] - „takav gad…“)
ti doveo si me do prosjačkog štapa.
([echo] - „do prosjačkog… štapa…“)
sad ostade mi samo da tugujem i sa čašom drugujem.
([glass clink] - clink) ([BV hum] - mmm-mmm)
Koštala me, koštala ljubav tvoja o-ho-laaa.
([reverb trails] - „o-ho-laaa…“)
sve si mi uzeo i snove razbio si mi.
([vocal stab] - „snove…“)
nema ničega više sada tu.
([delay] - „sada tu… tu…“)
ostala sam saama tu, u ovom lu-di-luuuu.
([cry adlib] - „uuuu…“)

[Male]
Ja te voleo i srce svoje ti dao, i ne samo to.
([BV female pad] - „oooh…“)
uzela si sve što jesam i nisam i-ma-o.
([stutter FX] - „ima-o, ima-o…“)
zbog tebe mi ostali samo dugovi.
([sub drop] - boom)
više me ne vole čak ni druuuugovi.
([gang BV] - „drugovi…“)
Koštala me, koštala ljubav tvoja o-ho-laaa.
([female „aaah“ layered] - aaah-aaah)
sve si mi uzela i snove razbila  si miiiiii.
([long echo] - „miii… miii…“)
nema ničega više sada tu.
([BV whisper] - „nema… ničega…“)
ostao sam saam ovde, u ovom ludiluuuu.
([echo wide] - „ludiluuu…“)

[Female]
Više nisam ni pola od onog što bila sam.
([BV airy] - „ni pola…“)
samo bih nešto jako popila saaaad,
([FX] - sip / ice clink)
da ublažim tugu i bol od gluposti svoje.
([low BV] - „tugu… bol…“)
da zaboravim da bili smo dvoooooje.
([delay] - „dvoje… dvoje…“)
Koštala me, koštala ljubav tvoja o-ho-laaa.
([stacked „o-ho-laaa“ harmonies] - aaah-aaaah)
sve si mi uzeo i snove razbio si miiiii.
([reverse tail] - whooosh)
nema ničega više sada tu.
([whisper pan] - „sada tu…“)
ostala sam saama tu, u ovom ludiluuuuu.
([sigh] - haaah)

[Male]
Nekako ću da se oporavim znaaaaam.
([BV female] - „znaaam…“)
ali da lako zavolim nikad više neću to znam.
([echo] - „neću to znam…“)
dosta je bilo jednom patnja i bankrot ovaj.
([adlib] - „dosta… dosta…“)
ne treba meni nikako život ovakav.
([BV low] - „nikako… ovakav…“)

[Female- Outro - Beat Switch]
([beat switch FX] - tape-stop / whooom)
Koštala me, koštala ljubav tvoja o-ho-laaa.
([wide choir] - „o-ho-laaa…“)
sve si mi uzeo i snove razbio si mi.
([chopped] - „snove… snove…“)
nema ničega više sada tuuuuuu.
([reverb] - „tu… tu…“)
ostali smo sami ovde, u ovom ludiluuuuuu.
([BG adlib] - „sami… sami…“)

[Both - Together -Outro - Fade Out]
Baš nas je koštala ljubav ova blesava. idemo jer to nam ne treba!
([crowd FX] - „hej! hej!“)
ne trebaaa, o neee neee
([call & response] - „ne treba…“ / „o neee…“)
([fade out delays] - neee… neee… neee…)

---

# hardcore_pop -  Shantelijah x Ljubav Ohola- Hardcore_Pop_3
[DESCRIPTION]
An 135 bpm uk organ bassline charva underground slap tech house track , zurna, organ,80s synth, cowbell, car siren, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Intstrumental - go crazy]
([dark pad swell] - whoooom)
([distant snare roll] - tchk-tchk-tchk)

[Female]
da samo sam znala ne bih ti sve dala
([BV soft] - „aaah… ne bih…“)
nisam znala da si takav gad,
([BV distant] - „takav gad…“)
ti doveo si me do prosjačkog štapa.
([echo] - „do prosjačkog… štapa…“)
sad ostade mi samo da tugujem i sa čašom drugujem.

samo bih nešto jako popila saaaad,
([FX] - sip / ice clink)
da ublažim tugu i bol od gluposti svoje.
([low BV] - „tugu… bol…“)
da zaboravim da bili smo dvoooooje.
([delay] - „dvoje… dvoje…“)
Koštala me, koštala ljubav tvoja o-ho-laaa.
([stacked „o-ho-laaa“ harmonies] - aaah-aaaah)
sve si mi uzeo i snove razbio si miiiii.
([reverse tail] - whooosh)
nema ničega više sada tu.
([whisper pan] - „sada tu…“)
ostala sam saama tu, u ovom ludiluuuuu.
([sigh] - haaah)

[Male]
Nekako ću da se oporavim znaaaaam.
([BV female] - „znaaam…“)
ali da lako zavolim nikad više neću to znam.
([echo] - „neću to znam…“)
dosta je bilo jednom patnja i bankrot ovaj.
([adlib] - „dosta… dosta…“)
ne treba meni nikako život ovakav.
([BV low] - „nikako… ovakav…“)

[Female- Outro - Beat Switch]
([beat switch FX] - tape-stop / whooom)
Koštala me, koštala ljubav tvoja o-ho-laaa.
([wide choir] - „o-ho-laaa…“)
sve si mi uzeo i snove razbio si mi.
([chopped] - „snove… snove…“)
nema ničega više sada tuuuuuu.
([reverb] - „tu… tu…“)
ostali smo sami ovde, u ovom ludiluuuuuu.
([BG adlib] - „sami… sami…“)

[Both - Together -Outro - Fade Out]
Baš nas je koštala ljubav ova blesava. idemo jer to nam ne treba!
([crowd FX] - „hej! hej!“)
ne trebaaa, o neee neee
([call & response] - „ne treba…“ / „o neee…“)
([fade out delays] - neee… neee… neee…)

# hardcore_pop -  Shantelijah x Ljubav Ohola- Hardcore_Pop_3
[DESCRIPTION]
at 127 bpm bouncy reggaetón  club tech Turkish zurna , cathederal organ, echo,  80s midi synthesizer,oriental pop, car honks, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Intro]
(Sve, sve ove godine sa tobom ja)
[room_verb – wide, distant, filtered, low in mix]
(Ja sam u svađi sam sa sobom sve)
[tape_delay – 1/4 note throw on “sobom sve”]
(Ove godine sa tobom ali danas je sa nama gotovo)
[doubled_low – whispered layer underneath “gotovo”]

[Verse 1]
Laž, laži sam mogao da podnesem ti
[slap_delay – short 1/8 echo on “podnesem ti”]
Proleće pretvaraš u jesen i sve
[pads_bg – warm minor pad swelling under “proleće / jesen”]
Sve sam mogao da izdržim ali prevare meni se ne vare
[bg_chant – low octave hum on “mene se ne vare”, sidechained to kick]

[Chorus]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[stereo_doubles – soft gang-style on word “pismo”]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[delay_throw – long 1/2 note echo on “zaboravi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[bg_choir – ooh/aaah sustained behind “ljubavi”]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[octave_up – thin high harmony on “druga boravi”]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[call_resp – chopped “ne šalji, ne šalji” tucked behind main]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[pingpong_delay – subtle stereo bounces on “zaboravi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[swell – reverse reverb into downbeat “U ljubavi”]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[adlib_bg – distant “hej, hej” between phrases]

[Verse 2]
Sve obično stane sve u reči dve
[mono_lp – first bar slightly filtered like telefonski glas]
Što ću ti reći znam da boleće
[backing_voices – quiet unison under “znam da boleće”]
Bilo bi najbolje da shvatiš da od danas je sa nama završeno
[chopped – rhythm chop “završeno, završeno” prije sledeće linije]
Laž, u laži svoje si se uplela
[fx_riser – short noise riser pre “uplela”]
I nisi znala, nisi umela
[stereo_adlibs – šapat “nisi znala, nisi umela” wide L/R]
Bilo bi najbolje da shvatiš da bez tebe ću živeti savršeno ja
[octave_stack – low + high harmony on “savršeno ja”]
E pa da
[dry_drop – muzički break, samo vokal, bez reverba]

[Chorus]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[doubles – lagani drugi glas za puniji hook]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[delay_throw – 1/4 + 1/2 kombinacija na “zaboravi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[choir_stack – troglasni “u ljubavi” u pozadini]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[answer_chop – kratko “druga, druga” chop pred “boravi”]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[clap_lift – dodatni claps i crowd FX na prvi takt refrena]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[reverb_tail – duži hall tail na kraju linije]
U ljubavi nismo
[pad_lift – akordi jači, sidechain uz kick]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[adlib – tihi “ajde, zaboravi” u pozadini]

[Bridge]
Nema, nema, nema ljubavi
[call_resp – pozadinski šapat “nema, nema” u stereo slici]
Srce hoće da zaboravi
[heartbeat_fx – low thump synced to tempo]
Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio
[reverse_verb – lead povučen unazad u sledeći takt]
Svoj sreći sam presudio
[octave_harmony – visoki glas prati “presudio”]
Nema, nema, nema ljubavi
[chopped – „nema ljubavi, ljubavi“ isječeno kao ritmički loop]
Srce hoće da zaboravi
[tremolo_fx – blagi tremolo na pratećem vokalu]
Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio
[stereo_widen – širi panorama samo na ovoj frazi]
Svoj sreći sam presudio
[tape_stop – kratki usporeni efekt na “presudio” pred refren]

[Chorus]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[full_stack – glavni glas + 2 harmonije za final hook]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[big_hall – veći reverb, refren kao “arena”]
U ljubavi nismo
[choir_aaah – dugi “aaah” akord kroz liniju]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[answer_vox – pozadinski “druga… druga…” u ehu]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[doubles + whisper_layer – šapat “ne šalji” ispod lead-a]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[delay_throw – snažan 1/2 note na poslednji “-vi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[sidechain_pad – diše uz kick, otvara se na “nismo”]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[outro_fill – kratki vokalni riff pre odlaska u outro]

[Outro]
(Nema, nema, nema ljubavi)
[filtered_echo – low-pass echo koji se gasi kroz 2 takta]
(Srce hoće da zaboravi)
[choir_low – muški duboko “hoće da zaboravi”]
(Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio)
[reverse_chop – isečene slogove “lju-bi-o” u ritmu]
(Svoj sreći sam presudio)
[reverb_swim – dugačak tail, fade u sledeću liniju]
(Nema, nema, nema ljubavi)
[distant_bg – kao da dolazi iz druge sobe]
(Srce hoće da zaboravi)
[pingpong_delay – lagani stereo bounce]
(Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio)
[adlib – tihi “hej…” pre “ljubio”]
(Svoj sreći sam presudio)
[fader_fade – postepeno spuštanje lead-a, ostaje samo delay i pad]

[Mix / Master –expertly done ]

---

# hardcore_pop -  Sintikkakzerica_Hardcore_Pop_5
[DESCRIPTION]
[Track Instructions]
([Track] - [bouncy underground slap club tech Turkish oriental pop, non-stop dance groove, slap bass, oriental leads, club-ready mix])
([FX Motif] - [tasteful car honks and tire screech FX used rhythmically and as transitions, never too loud])
([Voice] - [silk-smooth clear male vocal, natural tone, no autotune, tight rhythm, lightly compressed])
([Female BV] - [soft airy oriental-flavored backing vocals and ad-libs, smooth and sensual, non-explicit])
([Space] - [short club reverb, clean stereo delays in tempo, no robotic effects, modern hi-fi sound])

[LYRICS]
[Male 1]
Otvori se sezame
([Heavy vault rumble] - DOOM)
Napuni nam džepove
([Coin spill] - cling-cling)
Svega više dosta je
([Exhale] - haaah)
Neću da vučem repove
([Chain drag] - shrrrk)
Da naduvan šetam se
([Slow sneaker step] - tap…tap)
Sa torbicom po gradu ej
([Zipper slide] - vrrt)
Da rizikujem prodajem
([Cash slap] - flap)
Da bih platio dugove
([Pen on paper] - skrit-skrit)
Poznajem ove, poznajem i one
([Crowd murmur] - mmmrum)
Neki me vole a neki me se klone
([Step back] - skrr)
K'o mali skontao fazone
([Lightbulb ping] - ting)

([Register] - kching)
.moraš da se cimaš kad ulica te zove
([Distant siren] - weee-ooo)

([Sub-bass pulse] - thumm-thumm)

([Engine rev] - vrrroom)
da ne volimo tu moć - ne voli ni ona nas
([Low growl] - rrrr)

([Ziplock flick] - fffp)
ako plavi će tu doć - neće naći nikog pas
([Radio squawk] - krrt)

([Heartbeat rise] - thumpthump)
Meni nekako meko bejb
([Breath] - haaah)
Da sve štekove čekove nekome preko bre
([Paper shuffle] - fffsh)
preprodam za letove
([Plane whoosh] - fffshhhh)

([Clock tick] - tik-tik)

([Bag drop] - thud)

# hardcore_pop -  Soja Djiki DESETKOM I DAMOM _dr_Khans
[DESCRIPTION]
A high-energy Serbian drill banger at 135 BPM with aggressive, sliding 808s and relentless, stuttering hi-hats anchoring the rhythm. Clipped, distorted bass and hard-edged, punchy percussion drive the track. Sparse, fragmented hooks accent sharp melodies, while intensely processed, rapid crew vocals trade off for a menacing, brutal texture.

[LYRICS]
[Verse 1]
Nama chopper je u studiju,
([adlib] - „chop-chop“)
pa malo jači flex
([delay] - „flex… flex…“)
Njene gole noge uviju,
([BV low] - „mmm…“)
pa malo jači sex
([reverb] - „jači sex…“)
Voli crnu metalurgiju
([FX grime] - „clang-clang“)
kad pati kalim bes
([growl] - „grrr…“)
U Audiju burgiju balavila ko pez
([engine rev] - vrrrroom)
Bezvez kez, dental sticks,
([chopped] - „kez-kez“)
bezveze, tims and tricks
([adlib] - „tricks… tricks…“)
Ko Vaskez, muscle build,
([BV gang] - „muscle, muscle“)
njima ide spomenik,
([echo] - „spomenik…“)
Pa polis (fucking flece)
([siren distant] - wiiiu-wiiiu)
Flight to Swiss, money moves
([cash FX] - „shhhh“)
Give me please, dobar niz, u biznisu Dibidus
([tapestop] - „di-bi-dus…“)

[Chorus]
Rani sati jutarnji,
([pad rise] - whoooom)
dižemo se skupa,
([gang BV] - „skupa, skupa“)
Ekipa prava, srcem jaka grupa
([chant] - „u-u-uuu“)
kad je dobro i kad nije
([echo] - „kad nije…“)
Držimo se zajedno,
([BV] - „zajedno…“)
uzori ulice, nadahnuti pravdom
([street FX] - distant traffic)
Sunce se rađa, ceo grad još spava
([soft BV] - „spava…“)
Mi na nogama, uveliko bistra glava
([head nod FX] - tkk)
Da bi biznis bio strava, mora da se radi
([chant] - „radi, radi…“)
Nema zastoja, zlato se iz blata vadi
([FX shovel] - shkrr)
Ko ti je u životu nek razume ko i shvati
([spoken BV] - „razumi, shvati…“)
Da bi danas znao ovo prvo mora da se pati
([delay] - „mora da se pati…“)
Onda presek stanja, činjenica se prihvati
([BV] - „prihvati…“)
Pa kud koji mili moj ' koliko ko sebi zahvati
([crowd murmur] - „ey, ey…“)

[Verse 2]
To je petak, kriva slika,
([FX camera] - click)
vama smešna svaka spika,
([chopped] - „spika-spika“)
Moj je Šoja, bratska dika,
([gang chant] - „Šo-ja!“)
metak primam za tog lika
([gun cock FX, low] - chk)
Ide hajp, u gađanju prvi
([adlib] - „hajp, hajp…“)
to je taktika
([echo] - „taktika…“)

[Instrumental Chops]
([scratch] - krk-krk)
([glitch vox] - „hey! hey!“)
([bass stab] - boom)

[Verse 3]
Moje srce lupa, lupa, ono tera 200 pumpa
([heartbeat FX] - thump-thump-thump)
Dobra nestane, koliko grama na metama smo mupa
([sirena daleko] - wiiiu)
Ova upala mi usta, njena usta cela buksna
([adlib] - „buksna…“)
A telo ti kao fuksa i belo  iz Beneluksa
([FX] - „beneluks… lux…“)

Putem do uspeha svi kažu nije lako
([spoken BV] - „nije lako…“)
Prave se pametni, al niko ne zna kako
([crowd] - „kako, kako…“)
Ovako il onako znam da boriću se jako
([chant] - „jako! jako!“)
Ustajanje rano, vožnja samo desnom stranom
([engine low] - vrrr)
Ubijanje sebe, tako dan za danom
([clock FX] - tik-tak)
Kao na zadatku tajnom dok ne pronađeš taj šablon
([whisper] - „tajno… šablon…“)
Odavno shvatio da nije sve sjajno i bajno
([BV] - „nije bajno…“)
Borim se za mesto koje će mi biti trajno
([echo] - „trajno… trajno…“)

[Chorus]
I nude mi dobar talon, započinjem tablom
([card FX] - shuffle)
Vi tri na karte - duplo, karo desetkom i damom
([chip FX] - clack)
Ko sotona pred Bogom šetam se tamo i vamo
([adlib] - „tamo-vamo…“)
Ne polarizujem sijam, obavijam ih sve tamom
([FX dark pad] - whooom)

[Verse 4]
Šole čakija golema, pada belo sad za pola
([knife FX] - shing)
Čuda mafija problema kada gejam punim borac
([phone buzz] - bzzz)
Krijem se, izmičem,
([echo] - „izmičem… izmičem…“)
dok pokušavam da shvatim igru
([BV low] - „igru…“)
Sklanjam se od svakog zla da bi spavao na miru
([sigh] - haaah)
Jedno bez drugog ne ide,
kao dirke na klaviru,
([piano FX] - pling-pling)
kao lav (borim se)
([growl] - rrrr)
da se ne udavim u viru.
([water FX] - shhhhlosh)

# hardcore_pop -  Soja Djiki DESETKOM I DAMOM _dr_Khans
[DESCRIPTION]
A high-energy Serbian drill banger at 135 BPM with aggressive, sliding 808s and relentless, stuttering hi-hats anchoring the rhythm. Clipped, distorted bass and hard-edged, punchy percussion drive the track. Sparse, fragmented hooks accent sharp melodies, while intensely processed, rapid crew vocals trade off for a menacing, brutal texture.

[LYRICS]
[Verse 1]
Nama chopper je u studiju,
([adlib] - „chop-chop“)
pa malo jači flex
([delay] - „flex… flex…“)
Njene gole noge uviju,
([BV low] - „mmm…“)
pa malo jači sex
([reverb] - „jači sex…“)
Voli crnu metalurgiju
([FX grime] - „clang-clang“)
kad pati kalim bes
([growl] - „grrr…“)
U Audiju burgiju balavila ko pez
([engine rev] - vrrrroom)

([chopped] - „kez-kez“)
bezveze, tims and tricks

([BV gang] - „muscle, muscle“)
njima ide spomenik,
([echo] - „spomenik…“)

([tapestop] - „di-bi-dus…“)

([pad rise] - whoooom)
dižemo se skupa,

([crowd murmur] - „ey, ey…“)

([FX camera] - click)
vama smešna svaka spika,

([heartbeat FX] - thump-thump-thump)

([sirena daleko] - wiiiu)
Ova upala mi usta, njena usta cela buksna
([adlib] - „buksna…“)
A telo ti kao fuksa i belo  iz Beneluksa
([FX] - „beneluks… lux…“)

([spoken BV] - „nije lako…“)

([crowd] - „kako, kako…“)

([chant] - „jako! jako!“)
Ustajanje rano, vožnja samo desnom stranom
([engine low] - vrrr)

([clock FX] - tik-tak)

([whisper] - „tajno… šablon…“)

([echo] - „trajno… trajno…“)

([FX dark pad] - whooom)

# hardcore_pop - 10 outta 10_Hardcore_Pop_2
[DESCRIPTION]
An 135 bpm underground slap tech house track , zurle, organ,80s midi synths, car siren, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Verse]
Who's that body [ZUR-le motif stab — ZUR-le-kaah (short 1/16 stab, pan L20, send reverb 15%)]
[Kick-rumble — thoomthoom (low filtered)] [vinyl pop — pft (micro transient)] [cowbell tick — ting-ting (offbeat)]

Lookin' like a ten out of ten [Vinyl pop — pft (downbeat)] [micro clap — tak (layered)] [back inhale — hhh (pre-phrase)]
[Hi-hat ghost — ts-ts-ts (rising 3 bars)]

Heaven sent [Breath exhale — haaah (close, 0.9s tail)] [organ shimmer — wuuuum (mild chorus)]

You can bet [Organ stab — org-booom (downbeat)] [zurle slice — zur-tsaa (reply)] [click-tick — clk (pedal accent)]

That body count [Sidechained sub — rrrrrr (rolling 1/8)] [tiny rim echo — tok-tok-tchk (fill)]

It got no end [Traffic hum bed — mmmmmmrum (wide stereo)] [high-glass ping — cling (micro accent)]

God [Whispered echo — ssst (ping-pong delay)] [reverse tail — tsss-sss (subtle)]

How'd you get a body like that? [Tire screech short fill — skreeeech (pitch drop)] [metal scrape — shrk (underlayer)]

With the body like that [Finger snap — snap (double-layer)] [snap-whip — snap-whip (flam second)]

It's a wrap [Car siren micro-stab — neenaw (fast L→R)] [crash tick — tsssh (low fade)]

Make the world go round and back [Kick groove + zurle reply — boom + ZUR-le (1/4 call-response)] [cowbell roll — ting-ting-ting (closing)]

'Round and back [Reverse sweep — whooom (swell)] [sub bump — bwoom (underline)]

[Verse]
We ain't gotta rush [Breath inhale — haaah (gated 300ms)] [perc-tick — chk-chk (subtle)]

There's no need to play pretend [Vinyl crackle bed — pftcrackle (continuous)] [high-shaker — sshk-shhk (shimmer)]

You ain't gotta be scared [Whispered backing — ooo (stereo)] [ghost breath — hhhh (ambient)]

Just go and tell your friends [Crowd murmur — mmmrum (short)] [snap-tap — snap-tap (accent)]

Ain't nobody else like me [Sub wobble — wub-wub (2.4Hz LFO)] [tiny cowbell echo — tink-tink (ghost)]

No [Snap center — snap (tight)] [kick-tick — thok (under transient)]

I can do it better than before [Zurle flourish — zur-flourish (4-note run)] [air whoosh — whoooosh (stereo rise)]

Can't nobody do it like me [Vocal chop echo — koo-koo (1/16 rhythmic)] [tap delay tail — plip-plop (wet)]

No [Breath laugh — heh (close)] [tongue click — tok (tiny)]

I can do it better than before [Organ stab + kick — org-stab + boom (glued bus)] [cymb tail — shhhh (fade)]

[Verse]
What you doin' with a body like that? [Whisper echo — ssst (soft ping)] [reverse hiss — fffwhh (swell)]

When the beat go boom [Kick slam — boom (layered sine + click)] [sub punch — brrm (low)]

You react [Snare tick — tchk (rimshot)] [air puff — phhh (short tail)]

Got a room full of doom [Crowd swell low — mmmrum (ominous)] [synth moan — yrrrm (modulating)]

But you stay with the pack [Footstep groove — tap-tap (humanized)] [heel-hit — dunk (alternate)]

Stay with the pack [Finger snap double — snap-snap (tight)] [snare ghost — tut-tut (offset)]

It's a wrap [Car siren brief — teenoonee (short)] [bass whomp — bwooo (under)]

[Verse]
And your body so bad [Glass clink soft — clink (sparkle)] [low hiss — shhh (tail)]

Can't help it when I act [Breath exhale close — haaah (intimate)] [lip smack — ppp (transient)]

Body count [Sidechained sub nudge — rrrrrr (groove sync)] [hi crack — tk-tk (1/8 echo)]

Runnin' up the stat [Coin drop accent — cling (bright)] [gling-gling — gling-gling (bounce)]

Got you caught in a trance [Vocal reverb swell — whooom (2.6s plate)] [back whisper — ahhh (stereo ghost)]

In a trance [Zurle long tail — ZUR-le-oo (2.8s release, wide)] [wind fade — wooooff (soft)] [cowbell fade — ting... (closing softly)]

[Outro]
[Traffic bed — mmmrum (lowpassed to 400Hz)] [snap echo — snap-choo (final bounce)] [vinyl spin-down — whrrr-rrrp (end)]

# hardcore_pop - 152.1s Recording (Dec 5 @ 8:22 PM)_dr_Khans_1
[DESCRIPTION]
The track is a high-energy hip-hop piece with a driving beat and a prominent synth melody. The tempo is fast, creating an urgent and exciting atmosphere. The instrumentation includes a powerful drum machine providing a consistent, punchy rhythm, a deep bassline that underpins the harmonic structure, and a lead synthesizer playing a catchy, repetitive melody. The vocals are delivered by a male rapper with a clear, confident tone, utilizing a rhythmic flow that complements the instrumental track. The production is clean and modern, with a strong emphasis on the beat and synth hooks. The song structure follows a typical verse-chorus format, with the chorus featuring a more anthemic feel due to the layered synth elements. The overall mix is bright and dynamic, with the vocals sitting prominently in the foreground.

[LYRICS]
[Intro/Verse 1 – Minimal beat, tense synth atmosphere]

[Beat–Filtered drum-machine pulse only, low-volume hat ticks, occasional ghost kick. Sub-bass barely audible under root notes. Lead synth hook very low, tucked behind. Sparse ambient street FX. Atmosphere: restrained but purposeful.]
[Vocal–Close-miked, clean, compressed (4:1–6:1), subtle tape warmth. Plate 5–7% for space, no delay, natural pitch.]

Kad bih imao krila goluba
Daleko da odletim
Da nađem neko mesto
Gde bih mogo da se odmorim
Oči da zatvorim
U senku da se sklonim

[Pre-build – Light drum presence, synth hook emerging]

[Beat–Introduce soft kick every 2 bars, faint clap ghost, delicate shaker. Bass opens slightly in harmonics. Lead synth begins answering vocal phrases. Add reversed sweeps and filtered FX to build anticipation.]
[Vocal–Add +2 dB presence 3–5 kHz. Very light slapback (60–70 ms) on last words. Delivery steady, emotional but rhythmic.]

Pokaži mi put, dragi Bože
Tebi da se poklonim
Jer istina si ti
Sve ostalo je lažno
Jer sve to što oni vrednuju
Meni nije važno – novac i moć
To je sada prestiž
A ja dižem ruke prema tebi
I molim da me se setiš...

[Hook Entry – Full drop, high-energy hip-hop]

[Beat–Full drum-machine groove. Kick punchy with short decay; snare bright, mid-forward; hats at 1/8 with occasional 1/16 bursts. Sub-bass thick, glued to kick, slight saturation. Synth hook wide, melodic, dominant, carrying the section. Percussive FX stabs on off-beats. Mix bright and open.]
[Vocal–Lead centered with subtle L/R doubles. Plate 10–12%, clean 1/4 delay on line ends. +1.5 dB louder than verses, strong rhythmic delivery.]
Molim te, seti me se
Kada dođe vreme moje
Molim te, seti me se
Seti se desnice svoje

[Verse 2 – Full groove, slightly reduced intensity]

[Beat–Same full kit at ~85–90% energy. Hats add occasional rolls. Bassline more melodic, adding subtle glides. Piano stabs lightly reinforcing chords; synth pads warmer and lower in mix.]
[Vocal–Tube-style saturation 5–7%, consistent compression, crisp consonants. Slight widening on sustained words. Reverb shorter than hook.]

Uzmi onaj kamen
Napravi me ponovo
Sve tvoje rane bole
Teške srcu kao olovo
I osećam da jedu me
Od kad si me okovo
Reči nisam pustio
Ni kad najteže sam bolovo

[Verse 2 Build – Tension rise into next hook]

[Beat–Add rim-click patterns, shaker ghosts, tiny tom fills. Lead synth slowly widens + adds octave layer subtly. Reverse FX before key words. Bass grows slightly brighter. Momentum increasing.]
[Vocal–Short doubles on last syllables, +1 dB lift in final bars. Longer reverb tail on emotionally heavy words.]

Jer zaveta se držim
Ne idem putevima lakšim i bržim
Bolje i gladan po gradu da kružim
Čekam te, sedim u mraku i tužim
Daj mi snage da izdržim
Da ispuni se sve
Da ispuni se sve
Sve što za mene pisano je

[Hook 2 – Maximum intensity, anthem peak]

[Beat–Brightest/strongest moment. Hats more open, extra high-perc layer, sub-bass reinforced with parallel saturation. Synth hook thickened with detuned double. Noise riser before first bar. Drum bus receives parallel compression for punch.]
[Vocal–4–6 layers, doubles wide, subtly supporting main takes. High-shelf 8–10 kHz, careful de-ess. Same delay as Hook 1 but 10% wetter.]

Uzmi onaj kamen
Napravi me ponovo
Sve tvoje rane bole
Teške srcu kao olovo
I osećam da jedu me
Od kad si me okovo
Reči nisam pustio
Ni kad najteže sam bolovo
Jer zaveta se držim
Ne idem putevima lakšim i bržim
Bolje i gladan po gradu da kružim
Čekam te, sedim u mraku i tužim
Daj mi snage da izdržim
Da ispuni se sve
Da ispuni se sve
Sve što za mene pisano je

[Bridge – Energy drop but with emotional lift]

[Beat–Hats removed, kick reduced to sparse pattern, rim accents. Bass simplified to root notes. Lead synth filtered down. Pads expand with cinematic character, adding height. Global reverb send +10–15%.]
[Vocal–Breathier, more intimate. Reverb 15–18% with soft tail. Dotted 1/8 delay on line ends. Slight stereo widening.]

Kažu da ovde je kraj
Ne želim da im verujem
Tako se ubija zvezda sjaj
Ne znam, možda preterujem
Kad pomislim da sreća tu je
Ona uvek mi izmice
I šta je danas sigurno
Osim odakle potičeš

[Bridge Repeat – Rebuild toward final resolution]

[Beat–Hats reintroduced very softly. Strings lift, pads stronger, bass slightly opened. Add slow risers and reversed transitions before final lines. Master gain +0.5 dB last 2 bars.]
[Vocal–More intensity, slight extra saturation. Doubles stronger on impactful words. Reverb darker for smoother blend.]

Kažu da ovde je kraj
Ne želim da im verujem
Tako se ubija zvezda sjaj
Ne znam, možda preterujem
Kad pomislim da sreća tu je
Ona uvek mi izmice
I šta je danas sigurno
Osim odakle potičeš

[Outro – Controlled fade-out]

[Beat–Gradual removal: hats → snare → kick → bass. Final synth hook filtered and fading. One subtle FX stab in last measure. End on sustained pad+piano chord, 6–8 sec tail, LPF closing entire mix like lights dimming.]

# hardcore_pop - 152.1s Recording (Dec 5 @ 8:22 PM)_dr_Khans_1
[DESCRIPTION]
The track is a high-energy hip-hop piece with a driving beat and a prominent synth melody. The tempo is fast, creating an urgent and exciting atmosphere. The instrumentation includes a powerful drum machine providing a consistent, punchy rhythm, a deep bassline that underpins the harmonic structure, and a lead synthesizer playing a catchy, repetitive melody. The vocals are delivered by a male rapper with a clear, confident tone, utilizing a rhythmic flow that complements the instrumental track. The production is clean and modern, with a strong emphasis on the beat and synth hooks. The song structure follows a typical verse-chorus format, with the chorus featuring a more anthemic feel due to the layered synth elements. The overall mix is bright and dynamic, with the vocals sitting prominently in the foreground.

[LYRICS]
[Intro/Verse 1 – Minimal beat, tense synth atmosphere]

[Beat–Filtered drum-machine pulse only, low-volume hat ticks, occasional ghost kick. Sub-bass barely audible under root notes. Lead synth hook very low, tucked behind. Sparse ambient street FX. Atmosphere: restrained but purposeful.]
[Vocal–Close-miked, clean, compressed (4:1–6:1), subtle tape warmth. Plate 5–7% for space, no delay, natural pitch.]

Kad bih imao krila goluba
Daleko da odletim
Da nađem neko mesto
Gde bih mogo da se odmorim
Oči da zatvorim
U senku da se sklonim

[Pre-build – Light drum presence, synth hook emerging]

[Beat–Introduce soft kick every 2 bars, faint clap ghost, delicate shaker. Bass opens slightly in harmonics. Lead synth begins answering vocal phrases. Add reversed sweeps and filtered FX to build anticipation.]
[Vocal–Add +2 dB presence 3–5 kHz. Very light slapback (60–70 ms) on last words. Delivery steady, emotional but rhythmic.]

Pokaži mi put, dragi Bože
Tebi da se poklonim
Jer istina si ti
Sve ostalo je lažno
Jer sve to što oni vrednuju
Meni nije važno – novac i moć
To je sada prestiž
A ja dižem ruke prema tebi
I molim da me se setiš...

[Hook Entry – Full drop, high-energy hip-hop]

[Beat–Full drum-machine groove. Kick punchy with short decay; snare bright, mid-forward; hats at 1/8 with occasional 1/16 bursts. Sub-bass thick, glued to kick, slight saturation. Synth hook wide, melodic, dominant, carrying the section. Percussive FX stabs on off-beats. Mix bright and open.]
[Vocal–Lead centered with subtle L/R doubles. Plate 10–12%, clean 1/4 delay on line ends. +1.5 dB louder than verses, strong rhythmic delivery.]
Molim te, seti me se
Kada dođe vreme moje
Molim te, seti me se
Seti se desnice svoje

[Verse 2 – Full groove, slightly reduced intensity]

[Beat–Same full kit at ~85–90% energy. Hats add occasional rolls. Bassline more melodic, adding subtle glides. Piano stabs lightly reinforcing chords; synth pads warmer and lower in mix.]
[Vocal–Tube-style saturation 5–7%, consistent compression, crisp consonants. Slight widening on sustained words. Reverb shorter than hook.]

Uzmi onaj kamen
Napravi me ponovo
Sve tvoje rane bole
Teške srcu kao olovo
I osećam da jedu me
Od kad si me okovo
Reči nisam pustio
Ni kad najteže sam bolovo

[Verse 2 Build – Tension rise into next hook]

[Beat–Add rim-click patterns, shaker ghosts, tiny tom fills. Lead synth slowly widens + adds octave layer subtly. Reverse FX before key words. Bass grows slightly brighter. Momentum increasing.]
[Vocal–Short doubles on last syllables, +1 dB lift in final bars. Longer reverb tail on emotionally heavy words.]

Jer zaveta se držim
Ne idem putevima lakšim i bržim
Bolje i gladan po gradu da kružim
Čekam te, sedim u mraku i tužim
Daj mi snage da izdržim
Da ispuni se sve
Da ispuni se sve
Sve što za mene pisano je

# hardcore_pop - 2X_2Svetla_Dr_Mixåll
[DESCRIPTION]
Hard motivational rap instrumental at 96–98 BPM in a minor key, 16-bar sections: atmospheric pad intro; sparse verse with kick, saturated 808 bass and crisp hi-hats; powerful chorus with full orchestral layers, driving strings, choir stabs, and a memorable minor-pentatonic electric guitar lead; percussive bridge with filtered 808 rolls; fading pad outro. Drums: punchy saturated 808s with fast attack and glides, hard distorted snare/clap on 2 & 4, rapid velocity-sensitive 1/16th hi-hats. Core hook is a simple haunting electric-guitar ostinato layered with wide strings and powerful brass for cinematic impact. Use aggressive sidechain from kick to bass/pads; stereo-widen leads and reverb tails; plate snare; finish with multiband compression for a loud yet dynamic commercial mix that blends modern trap with epic orchestration. Keep it gritty and painful in vocal tone. Strong sidechain, wide electric guitar, plate snares, multiband glue. Prioritize raw guitar bends and pentatonic phrasing.

[LYRICS]
[Intro — atmospheric pad, low sub hum; LPF slowly opens over 16 bars; vinyl crackle faint; keep overall -6 dB headroom]
Dva sveta, dva puta, dva izbora
[lead vocal intimate, dry; compress lightly 3:1; slight tube saturation]
Jedan vodi od, drugi ka izvoru
[L→R subtle slap delay 1/8 on last word]
Lakši put — blistav, kratak, skoro kao dah
[whispered tail on “dah”; hi-cut 6k]
Ali ispod svetla, sija prah
[let phrase breathe, short reverb]
Teži put duži, izaziva strah
[raise intensity; automation +2 dB]
Koji biraš, brat? Kojim ideš da ostaviš trag
[hold final word; small pitch drop 10–20 cents]
(low male chant “trag…trag…”)

[Verse 1 — sparse arrangement: kick + 808 sub + 1/16 hats; pads pulled back; leave space for rap]
Gledam gore — vidim svetla zovu me
[vocal slightly raspy; parallel saturation send 10%]
[But distant, restrained pad bed; add airy female breath under last syllable]
Ali put je strm, pun rana, i plaši me
[short plate on snare hits; keep vocal forward]
Dole vidim blato, il’ bar izgleda lakše je
[staccato low guitar stab under last phrase]
Al tamo nema sunca, ni poštede
[compress 4:1 on phrase tails; remove high end 8k]
Zato biram gore — trnje me čeka
[let 808 glide into “trnje”; slight pitch bend]
Al na kraju reka, što umorne pere
[add wet choir pad under “reke”; pre-delay 30 ms]
Obećana zemlja, nevidljiva sreća
[subtle stereo widen on “sreća”]
Što raste u tišini, svakim danom sve veća
(female whisper “veća…veća…” — airy, delay dotted 1/4; -20 LUFS)

[Chorus — full orchestral hit, wide strings, brass accents, electric guitar ostinato center; strong sidechain to pads]
Jer i kad padneš, ne gubiš sve
[vocal more anthemic; double main on 2nd pass, slight detune]
U pepelu gori ono što te diže
[brass stab on “gori”; transient enhancer]
Samo pogledaj gore, ne beži od sne
[choral swell under “gore”; low-mid cut 300–500 Hz to clear vocals]
Svetlost čeka gde senka diše
(dual call “gore!” “diše!” — male/female ping-pong 25%)
[chorus bus compress 2:1; add harmonic saturation; aim -3 to -6 dB GR on peaks]

[Verse 2 — bring in low aggressive strings, more 808 movement; maintain vocal grit]
Lakšom cestom idu oni koji propadnu
[vocal spit delivery; midrange presence 2.5–4 kHz]
Smeju se glasno, ali kratko ostanu
[reverse cymbal into last word]
Lažno sunce sija dok ne otpadnu
[automate HPF on pad to open slowly]
U blatu tonu — dok prah ne postanu
(group chant “prah! prah!” — 1 bar echo tail; center dry then spread)

[Bridge — percussive filtered 808 rolls; tom hits; stutter edits; create claustrophobic texture]
Od početka pa do kraja, poraz ili pobeda
[stutter slice on “poraz”; bitcrusher on parallel 5%]
Taj životinjski nagon, čovekova potreba
[low synth growl under “nagon”]
Svedočanstvo svima, ne treba mi posveta
[short gated reverb on end word]
Svako od nas bira — milost ili osveta
(chant “osveta… milost…” — dual-pan LR 20°, low mid emphasis)
[filter sweep up into next chorus; transient shaping on percs]

[Final Chorus — biggest; add extra choir layer, aggressive brass; guitar lead prominent]
I to dal mrziš me il voliš — ne smeta
[vocal full of pain; push +2 dB automation in last repeat]
Nije poenta koliko jako udariš sveta
[brass hits on accents; plate reverb tails]
Već koliko možeš da izdržiš, koliko podneseš
(parallel compressed vocal doubled; blend 20%)
I dalje stojiš, dišeš, ne predaš se
(female ethereal “budi jak…” — delay 1/4 dotted; filtered 1.2 kHz shelf)
[master bus: leave headroom; multiband glue light; limiter ceiling -0.1 dB]

[Outro — strip elements gradually; pad + distant choir + electric guitar motif; fade to low sub drone]
Gledaj gore, budi jak, kad noć ti uđe u san
[vocal intimate again; automate reverb wetness up]
Jer pravi put nikad nije lak
[let last words ring; gentle low-pass to 4k over 8 bars]
Pre svega razmisli — kojim putem kreneš
[Narrow stereo field; mono low end]
Nek zvezda tvoja vodi, da ne skreneš
[soft delay repeats, lower mix]
Drži se težeg puta, jer taj je pravi
[final choir swell; shimmer tail slow fade]
Pokaži im srcem — kako se to radi
(full choir “radi…radi…” — slow fade; shimmer tail)
[final bar: sub sine drop out to silence; render with 24-bit export, keep -6 dB safety margin]

# hardcore_pop - 2X_2Svetla_Dr_Mixåll
[DESCRIPTION]
A hard motivational rap instrumental at 96–98 BPM in A minor kicks off with an atmospheric pad intro, then a sparse verse of saturated 808s, rapid 1/16th hats, and gritty, punchy kit. The hook erupts with minor-pentatonic electric guitar ostinato, wide strings, brass stabs, choir, and cinematic drive. Bridge strips down to filtered 808 rolls, percussive FX, and punchy plate snare. Pads and leads are wide and wet with reverb tails, sidechained tightly to the kick. Multiband compression glues the mix for maximal impact. Guitar bends and pain-soaked phrasing lead every transition.

I dalje stojiš, dišeš, ne predaš se
Gledaj gore, budi jak, kad noć ti uđe u san
Jer pravi put nikad nije lak
([BACK:female ethereal “budi jak…” delay 1/4 dotted;filtered 1.2kHz shelf])



Pre svega razmisli — kojim putem kreneš
Nek zvezda tvoja vodi, da ne skreneš
Drži se težeg puta, jer taj je pravi
Pokaži im srcem — kako se to radi
([BACK:full choir male/female “radi…radi…” slow fade;shimmer tail])

# hardcore_pop - 2X_2Svetla_Dr_Mixåll_3
[DESCRIPTION]
Build a neon-trap beat at 120 BPM with a punchy kick: fuse three layers—sub (A-tuned sine/808, mono below 120Hz, LPF @180Hz), mid for punch (+2–4dB @80–120Hz, filter 200–400Hz), and transient click (HPF @1kHz). Phase-align, transient shape +40% attack, EQ for sub snap & top clarity, then soft clip (20%), compress (4:1, atk 2ms, rel 100ms), parallel 8:1 comp blend, and clip hard for peak control. Snap glue with a 5–30ms pitch-envelope on the click, sidechain 808 to the punch with volume shaper synced to eighth notes. Leave headroom (−6dBFS), mono lows, phase-check layers, trim 808 glides. Peaks hit −6 to −3dBFS pre-bus, sub focused at A1. Ultra-tight, modern transient energy.

[LYRICS]
[Intro—]
Dva sveta, dva puta, dva izbora
Jedan vodi od, drugi ka izvoru
Lakši put — blistav, kratak, skoro kao dah
Ali ispod svetla, sija prah
Teži put duži, izaziva strah
Koji biraš, brat? Kojim ideš da ostaviš trag
([BACK:low chant male “trag…trag…” at -18LUFS L→R drift])


Gledam gore — vidim svetla zovu me
Ali put je strm, pun rana, i plaši me
Dole vidim blato, il’ bar izgleda lakše je
Al tamo nema sunca, ni poštede
Zato biram gore — trnje me čeka
Al na kraju reka, što umorne pere
Obećana zemlja, nevidljiva sreća
Što raste u tišini, svakim danom sve veća
([BACK:female whisper “veća…veća…” delay 1/4 dotted;soft airy])


Jer i kad padneš, ne gubiš sve
U pepelu gori ono što te diže
Samo pogledaj gore, ne beži od sne
Svetlost čeka gde senka diše
([BACK:male/female call “gore!” “diše!” stereo pingpong 25%])


Lakšom cestom idu oni koji propadnu
Smeju se glasno, ali kratko ostanu
Lažno sunce sija dok ne otpadnu
U blatu tonu — dok prah ne postanu
([BACK:group chant male “prah! prah!” 1 bar echo tail])



Od početka pa do kraja, poraz ili pobeda
Taj životinjski nagon, čovekova potreba
Svedočanstvo svima, ne treba mi posveta
Svako od nas bira — milost ili osveta
([BACK:chant “osveta… milost…” dual-pan LR 20°])


I to dal mrziš me il voliš — ne smeta
Nije poenta koliko jako udariš sveta
Već koliko možeš da izdržiš, koliko podneseš
I dalje stojiš, dišeš, ne predaš se
Gledaj gore, budi jak, kad noć ti uđe u san
Jer pravi put nikad nije lak

Drži se težeg puta, jer taj je pravi
Pokaži im srcem — kako se to radi

# hardcore_pop - 2X_2Svetla_Dr_Mixåll_rmx_Hardcore_Pop
[DESCRIPTION]
A 155 BPM slap house track powered by thick, dirty sub-bass and crisp syncopated percussion. Harsh acid synths deliver gritty, looping hooks while haunting zurna lines weave monastic chants in the distance. Autotuned deep vocals drift atop biting hi-hats, tension-lifting risers, and relentless club momentum.

# hardcore_pop - 2X_2Svetla_Dr_Mixåll_rmx_Hardcore_Pop_2
[DESCRIPTION]
This EDM banger erupts at 150 BPM,igniting the floor with a relentless fusion of Balkan soul and modern fury. It opens with the iconic,wailing cry of a traditional accordion sample,immediately hijacked by a pounding,4/4 kick drum that feels like a heartbeat on steroids. The original melancholic melody is twisted into a weaponized synth lead,soaring over a seismic,sidechained bassline that never relents. Fiery Balkan brass stabs,processed through distortion and delay,punch through the mix like gunshots,while the original vocal—pitched and glitched—becomes a defiant,robotic mantra commanding you to move. There are no breakdowns,only momentary breathers where the kick filters back in with more punishing force. This is a non-stop,percussive assault designed for pure,unadulterated chaos; a track that doesn't build to a drop,but rather IS the drop from start to finish. It's a timeless melody supercharged into a futuristic,unrelenting beast that grabs you by the soul and refuses to let go u

# hardcore_pop - 2X_2Svetla_Dr_Mixåll_rmx_Hardcore_Pop_3
[DESCRIPTION]
Relentless EDM at 150 BPM surges with a wailing Balkan accordion intro hijacked by a pounding 4/4 kick. The melancholic motif is transformed into a weaponized synth lead, riding sidechained seismic bass. Distorted, delayed Balkan brass fire in staccato bursts as a glitched, robotic vocal commands movement. No breakdowns—just filtered, punishingly reintroduced kicks and fierce percussive drive from start to finish, fusing tradition with futuristic intensity.

# hardcore_pop - AUD-20250925-WA00t00 (Cover)
[DESCRIPTION]
Intro (100 BPM): Deep 808 kick with filtered Balkan strings; hyper-processed autotune on "padam boj nespokoj" through analog delay, Build-up (100 → 110 BPM): Sultry male vocal "sa njom je off road trip" layered with ethnic percussion; penetrating bassline rises with brass stabs, Drop 1 (115 BPM): Dark sub-bass anchors dynamic rhythms; sidechained Balkan melody with gated arps; vocal interplay: "Ona kush mi sushi, nema bolja šema" processed and doubled, Breakdown (105 BPM): Bass narrows through vintage filtering; shadowy female vocals "Ko da tamom me umije" with reverb tails and sparse trap snares, Build 2 (105 → 120 BPM): Sensual vocal runs build tension; filtered strings sweep upward with polyrhythmic hi-hats and brass accents, Drop 2 (120 BPM): Full arrangement with FM-processed vocals, mirrored basslines, call-response harmonies and tape saturation; harmonic exciter pushes sub frequencies, Outro (120 → 100 BPM): Rhythms thin to hypnotic pulse, final vocal "uzmi evo me" dissolves thr

[LYRICS]
[Male - Intro - Ethereal backvocals]
Deep kick, rolling bassline; sultry vocal "padam boj nespokoj" through analog delay and reverb

[Male - Build-up - Layered whispers]
Percussion layers with shakers and rim shots; filtered stab progression rises

[Male - Drop 1 - Harmonized backvocals]
Four-on-floor groove with syncopated hi-hats; groovy bassline and warm pad chords; breathy vocal: "Ona kush mi sushi, nema bolja šema" with compression and chorus

[Male - Breakdown - Distant echoes]
Bass filtered down, atmospheric pads swell; whispered vocal fragments and vinyl crackle

[Male - Build 2 - Rhythmic chants]
Bass filter opens, snare rolls and cymbal crashes; chord stabs build tension with sidechain pumping

[Male - Drop 2 - Seductive harmonies]
Fuller arrangement with percussion fills, deeper bass and lush strings; seductive vocal harmonies: "Ko da tamom me umije" layered with pitch shifts

[Male - Outro - Fading whispers]
Elements fade gradually, bass becomes sub-heavy drone, final whispered vocal through tape echo and lowpass filter

[Male - Verse 1 - Ethereal backvocals]
Ulična zima, kiša pada, noć je duga
Svetla blede, on nije tu
Da me zavede, sprovede
Vožnja bez cilja, ne vidi, sve se gubi, ja sam
Beli dim, sve je isto, ja sam
Ali uvek samo dim, beli dim, dim, dim, dim, dim, dim, dim

[Male - Chorus - Harmonized backvocals]
(E-hej) Tvoj mozak vozi, vozi me, zovi me
Vozi, zovi, zovi me
Beznadežnu, uvek istu, još jedna iluzija da

[Male - Verse 2 - Layered whispers]
Zaboravila ko je bila, sad se gubi, luta satima
A ti tu
(Da, da, da, aha)

Misli joj skaču ko beat high-speed

Duša tone u dim, dim, dim, dim
Nema mira, samo dim, beli dim, dim, dim

# hardcore_pop - BAJKERI 2 1510
[DESCRIPTION]
A dark German dancehall riddim with a cold, urban feel, The tempo is mid–fast, the groove built around a heavy, syncopated dembow pattern with hard-hitting kick, sharp snare and crisp offbeat hats, The clean guitar becomes a more aggressive, slightly overdriven pluck riff, playing short, catchy minor-key phrases with a metallic, neon shimmer, doubled by a thin synth lead for that club feel, The bass turns into a thick, sub-heavy 808 / synth bass, following a mean root–fifth–octave pattern with occasional slides, pushing the rhythm forward and giving it that “street” pressure, Drums are tight and punchy, side-chained to the bass for bounce, with extra percussion (rims, claps, small fills) to emphasize the offbeats, No vocals – only occasional chopped German crowd shouts and siren FX, drenched in short delays and gated reverbs, Overall mix is modern and loud, with focused low-end, bright transients, and subtle reverb on melodic elements, creating a dark neon alley vibe

[LYRICS]
[Intro]
(Na dva točka jašem staze široke i duge)
(Zaboravljam brige, prolaze me i tuge)
(Sve što mi treba ispod mene sad je važno)
(Ovo je moj svet, tu se osećam snažno)
(Na dva točka jašem staze široke i duge)
(Zaboravljam brige, prolaze me i tuge)
(Sve što mi treba ispod mene sad je važno)
(Ovo je moj svet)

[Verse 1]
Novo jutro sviće, zora pali grad
A ja palim motor, da mašina spremna je za rad
Miris benzina volim, razbuđuje san
Adrenalin snažan, tako započinjem dan
Volan težak, vreo, gume grebu beton
Sloboda me zove, Bože, obožavam leto
Kao sivi soko,dok sprema se za let
Velika brzina izoštrava svest
Kaciga na glavi, ko da sužava mi svet
Ko da nisam prisutan, al' ipak vidim sve
Fiksiram putanju, od problema čistim glavu
Prva, druga, treća, u crveno guram skalu
Iz dubokog mraka prelazim u legalu
Pritisak normala, a ja tražim optimalu

[Chorus]
Na dva točka jašem staze široke i duge
Zaboravljam brige, prolaze me i tuge
Sve što mi treba ispod mene sad je važno
Ovo je moj svet, tu se osećam snažno
Na dva točka jašem staze široke i duge
Zaboravljam brige, prolaze me i tuge
Sve što mi treba ispod mene sad je važno
Ovo je moj svet

[Verse 2]
Vreli asfalt gori pod točkovima moć
Brzina je droga koja gura me kroz noć
Vetar u kosi, duša leti visoko
Nebo je granica, more plavo i široko
Nekad duga noć, nekad kratak dan
Uvek ista strast, nikad nisam sam
Brat i ja na drumu, ista krv nas veže
Zastava mog kluba me oko grudi steže
Vetar stvara otpor, sunce obasjava lice
Motor bruji, peva, ništa drugo me se ne tiče
Miris benzina, nova avantura
Stavovi čvrsti ko u beton armatura

[Chorus]
Na dva točka jašem staze široke i duge
Zaboravljam brige, prolaze me i tuge
Sve što mi treba ispod mene sad je važno
Ovo je moj svet, tu se osećam snažno
Na dva točka jašem staze široke i duge
Zaboravljam brige, prolaze me i tuge
Sve što mi treba ispod mene sad je važno
Ovo je moj svet

[Outro]
(Pa pa pa pa pa)
(Pa pa pa pa pa)
(Pa pa pa pa pa)
(Pa pa pa pa pa)
(Pa pa pa pa pa)
(Pa pa pa pa pa)
(Pa pa pa pa pa)
(Pa pa pa pa pa)
(Pa pa pa pa pa)
(Pa pa pa pa pa)
(Pa pa pa pa pa)
(Pa pa pa

# hardcore_pop - Bajkkeri_2_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
Professionally mastered Serbian hip hop track at 100 BPM featuring a heavy dembow groove with expertly balanced percussion. The mix showcases punchy kicks with perfect attack, crisp snares with optimal decay, and precisely layered hats and rimshots. The side-chained 808 bass sits perfectly in the mix, delivering powerful sub-bass without masking other elements. Aggressive minor-key guitar plucks are expertly doubled with neon synths, creating a distinctive hook with both warmth and cutting top-end. Spatial effects on crowd chants and sirens utilize advanced delay and reverb techniques for seamless transitions. The mastering achieves industry-standard loudness with optimized dynamic range, enhanced stereo imaging, and frequency-balanced EQ for maximum impact across all playback systems.

[LYRICS]
[Intro]
(Na dva točka jašem staze široke i duge)
([engine idle] - vrrrroom)
(Zaboravljam brige, prolaze me i tuge)
([wind rush] - fffshhh)
(Sve što mi treba ispod mene sad je važno)
([sub-bass pulse] - thumm-thumm)
(Ovo je moj svet, tu se osećam snažno)
([distant crowd] - heyyy)
(Na dva točka jašem staze široke i duge)
([gear click] - klak)
(Zaboravljam brige, prolaze me i tuge)
([tire hiss] - skrrrt)
(Sve što mi treba ispod mene sad je važno)
([reverb] - „moj svet…“)
(Ovo je moj svet)
([delay female] - „svet, svet…“)

[Verse 1]
Novo jutro sviće, zora pali grad
([dawn ambience] - cvrkut)
A ja palim motor, da mašina spremna je za rad
([engine start] - vrrrr- BRRM)
Miris benzina volim, razbuđuje san
([sniff adlib] - mmm)
Adrenalin snažan, tako započinjem dan
([heartbeat] - thump-thump-thump)
Volan težak, vreo, gume grebu beton
([tire grip] - skrrrr)
Sloboda me zove, Bože, obožavam leto
([female echo] - „obožavam leto…“)
Kao sivi soko,dok sprema se za let
([whoosh] - ffff)
Velika brzina izoštrava svest
([flanger vox] - „brzi-na…“)
Kaciga na glavi, ko da sužava mi svet
([room FX] - whooom)
Ko da nisam prisutan, al' ipak vidim sve
([stereo whisper] - „vidim sve…“)
Fiksiram putanju, od problema čistim glavu
([hi-hat roll] - tss-tss-tss)
Prva, druga, treća, u crveno guram skalu
([gear shift] - klak-klak)
Iz dubokog mraka prelazim u legalu
([filter sweep] - shhaaa)
Pritisak normala, a ja tražim optimalu
([riser] - wooooom)

[Chorus]

([wide echo] - „dva točka…“)

([backvox soft] - „brige, tuge…“)
Sve što mi treba ispod mene sad je važno
([sub hit] - BOOM)
Ovo je moj svet, tu se osećam snažno
([female adlib] - aaah-yeah)
Na dva točka jašem staze široke i duge
([engine rev long] - vrrrrRRROOM)
Zaboravljam brige, prolaze me i tuge
([delay] - „prolaze, prolaze…“)
Sve što mi treba ispod mene sad je važno
([low choir pad] - ooooh)

Nebo je granica, more plavo i široko
([pad] - aaaaah)
Nekad duga noć, nekad kratak dan
([clock tick] - tik-tak)
Uvek ista strast, nikad nisam sam
([gang BV] - „nikad sam…“)
Brat i ja na drumu, ista krv nas veže
([unison chant] - ey-yo)
Zastava mog kluba me oko grudi steže
([fabric flap] - fffflap)
Vetar stvara otpor, sunce obasjava lice
([sun flare FX] - shing)
Motor bruji, peva, ništa drugo me se ne tiče
([engine song] - brrrm-brrrm)
Miris benzina, nova avantura
([breath] - haaah)
Stavovi čvrsti ko u beton armatura

# hardcore_pop - Bajkkeri_2_Hardcore_Pop_2
[DESCRIPTION]
A dark Serbian dancehall riddim with a cold, urban feel, The tempo is mid–fast, the groove built around a heavy, syncopated dembow pattern with hard-hitting kick, sharp snare and crisp offbeat hats, The clean guitar becomes a more aggressive, slightly overdriven pluck riff, playing short, catchy minor-key phrases with a metallic, neon shimmer, doubled by a thin synth lead for that club feel, The bass turns into a thick, sub-heavy 808 / synth bass, following a mean root–fifth–octave pattern with occasional slides, pushing the rhythm forward and giving it that “street” pressure, Drums are tight and punchy, side-chained to the bass for bounce, with extra percussion (rims, claps, small fills) to emphasize the offbeats, No vocals – only occasional chopped crowd shouts and siren FX, drenched in short delays and gated reverbs, Overall mix is modern and loud, with focused low-end, bright transients, and subtle reverb on melodic elements, creating a dark neon alley vibe – half Berlin street.

[LYRICS]
[Intro]
(Na dva točka jašem staze široke i duge)
([engine idle] - vrrrroom)

# hardcore_pop - Bajkkeri_2_Hardcore_Pop_2
[DESCRIPTION]
A dark Serbian dancehall riddim with a cold, urban feel, The tempo is mid–fast, the groove built around a heavy, syncopated dembow pattern with hard-hitting kick, sharp snare and crisp offbeat hats, The clean guitar becomes a more aggressive, slightly overdriven pluck riff, playing short, catchy minor-key phrases with a metallic, neon shimmer, doubled by a thin synth lead for that club feel, The bass turns into a thick, sub-heavy 808 / synth bass, following a mean root–fifth–octave pattern with occasional slides, pushing the rhythm forward and giving it that “street” pressure, Drums are tight and punchy, side-chained to the bass for bounce, with extra percussion (rims, claps, small fills) to emphasize the offbeats, No vocals – only occasional chopped crowd shouts and siren FX, drenched in short delays and gated reverbs, Overall mix is modern and loud, with focused low-end, bright transients, and subtle reverb on melodic elements, creating a dark neon alley vibe – half Berlin street.

([breath] - haaah)
Stavovi čvrsti ko u beton armatura
([impact] - KLANG)

[Chorus]
Na dva točka jašem staze široke i duge
([stereo echo] - „dva točka…“)
Zaboravljam brige, prolaze me i tuge
([female BV texture] - mm-mm-yeah)
Sve što mi treba ispod mene sad je važno
([sub drop] - BOOOOM)
Ovo je moj svet, tu se osećam snažno
([reverb] - „snažno… snažno…“)
Na dva točka jašem staze široke i duge
([engine doppler] - vroom—shhh)
Zaboravljam brige, prolaze me i tuge
([delay vox] - „brige, tuge…“)
Sve što mi treba ispod mene sad je važno
([pad swell] - ooooh)
Ovo je moj svet
([whisper] - „moj svet…“)

[Outro]
(Pa pa pa pa pa)
([crowd chant] - „hey-hey-hey“)
(Pa pa pa pa pa)
([clap loop] - clap-clap)
(Pa pa pa pa pa)
([scratch FX] - rrk-rrk)
(Pa pa pa pa pa)
([engine fade] - vrrroomm)
(Pa pa pa pa pa)
([delay] - „pa-pa-pa…“)
(Pa pa pa pa pa)
([reverb tail] - whooosh)
(Pa pa pa pa pa)
([stereo vox] - „na dva točka…“)
(Pa pa pa pa pa)
([fade out ambience] - night-city hum)

# hardcore_pop - Bajkkeri_Khansovacc_2
[DESCRIPTION]
Serbian Drill Banger (130-140 BPM)
Fast-paced variant emphasizing drill elements, Features aggressive 808 slides, rapid-fire hi-hats, and distorted bass,  melodies are fragmented and used sparingly as hooks, Vocals are heavily processed with aggressive flows and crew chants creating high energy

[LYRICS]
## **[Intro]**

(Na dva točka jašem staze široke i duge)
([soft-muffled kick ambience] - *thoom-thoom*)
(Zaboravljam brige, prolaze me i tuge)
([distant shaker + low air] - *shfff*)
(Sve što mi treba ispod mene sad je važno)
([long sub drone] - *mmmm—bass*)
(Ovo je moj svet, tu se osećam snažno)
([wide airy delay] - *haaay-ah*)
(Na dva točka jašem staze široke i duge)
([ghost kick + gear click] - *thup-klak*)
(Zaboravljam brige, prolaze me i tuge)
([light off-beat hat] - *tss—tss*)
(Sve što mi treba ispod mene sad je važno)
([sidechain swell] - *wooom-wooom*)
(Ovo je moj svet)
([female airy delay] - *svet… svet…*)

---

## **[Verse 1]**

Novo jutro sviće, zora pali grad
([soft dawn pad + faint hats] - *fff-tsss*)
A ja palim motor, da mašina spremna je za rad
([sub-layered engine start] - *vrrrr—BRRM*)
Miris benzina volim, razbuđuje san
([tight inhale SFX] - *hmm*)
Adrenalin snažan, tako započinjem dan
([pulsing sub heartbeat] - *tho-tho-tho*)
Volan težak, vreo, gume grebu beton
([off-beat tire drag] - *skrr-tss*)
Sloboda me zove, Bože, obožavam leto
([stereo bounce delay] - *le-to… le-to…*)
Kao sivi soko, dok sprema se za let
([whip-air rise] - *ffff-whuu*)
Velika brzina izoštrava svest
([flanger pulse] - *vree-na…*)
Kaciga na glavi, ko da sužava mi svet
([room-filtered whoom] - *wooom*)
Ko da nisam prisutan, al' ipak vidim sve
([stereo whisper ping-pong] - *sve… sve…*)
Fiksiram putanju, od problema čistim glavu
([hi-hat roll faint] - *tss-tss-tss*)
Prva, druga, treća, u crveno guram skalu
([clicky euro-pop shift] - *klak-klak*)
Iz dubokog mraka prelazim u legalu
([filter release] - *shaaaa*)
Pritisak normala, a ja tražim optimalu
([sub riser + ghost kick] - *thoom-wooom*)

---

## **[Chorus]**

Na dva točka jašem staze široke i duge
([wide stereo echo] - *dva točka… ohh…*)
Zaboravljam brige, prolaze me i tuge
([soft female textures] - *brige… tuge…*)
Sve što mi treba ispod mene sad je važno
([deep sub hit, sidechain] - *BOOM-woom*)
Ovo je moj svet, tu se osećam snažno
([melodic airy adlib] - *aaah-yeaah*)
Na dva točka jašem staze široke i duge
([rev + euro-reggae off-beat] - *vrrr — tss — vrrr — tss*)
Zaboravljam brige, prolaze me i tuge
([delay bounce] - *prolaze… prolaze…*)
Sve što mi treba ispod mene sad je važno
([soft choir pad] - *oooooh*)
Ovo je moj svet
([gentle echo] - *moj svet… moj svet…*)

---

## **[Verse 2]**

Vreli asfalt gori pod točkovima moć
([asphalt hiss + muted hat shuffle] - *shhh-tss*)
Brzina je droga koja gura me kroz noć
([deep sub sweep] - *wooom*)
Vetar u kosi, duša leti visoko
([stereo wind with bounce delay] - *fffsh-tah*)
Nebo je granica, more plavo i široko
([soft airy pad] - *aaahh*)
Nekad duga noć, nekad kratak dan
([clock tick + off-beat tap] - *tik-tah*)
Uvek ista strast, nikad nisam sam
([BGV whisper unison] - *nikad sam…*)
Brat i ja na drumu, ista krv nas veže
([chant bounce] - *ey-yo*)
Zastava mog kluba me oko grudi steže
([fabric flap] - *flap-tss*)
Vetar stvara otpor, sunce obasjava lice
([soft bright shimmer] - *shing*)
Motor bruji, peva, ništa drugo me se ne tiče
([rhythmic engine loop] - *brrrm-brrrm*)
Miris benzina, nova avantura
([breath + soft reverb] - *haaah*)
Stavovi čvrsti ko u beton armatura
([metallic impact] - *KLANK*)

---

## **[Chorus]**

Na dva točka jašem staze široke i duge
([stereo echo long] - *dva točka… dva točka…*)
Zaboravljam brige, prolaze me i tuge
([female airy BVs] - *mm-mm-yeah*)
Sve što mi treba ispod mene sad je važno
([sub drop, sidechain] - *BOOOOM-woom*)
Ovo je moj svet, tu se osećam snažno
([reverb tail] - *snažno… snažno…*)
Na dva točka jašem staze široke i duge
([engine doppler + off-beat hat] - *vroom—tss—shhh*)
Zaboravljam brige, prolaze me i tuge
([delay lift] - *brige… tuge…*)
Sve što mi treba ispod mene sad je važno
([pad swell] - *ooooh*)
Ovo je moj svet
([soft whisper] - *moj svet…*)

---

## **[Outro]**

(Pa pa pa pa pa)
([light airy hats] - *tss-tss-tss*)
(Pa pa pa pa pa)
([soft clap-clean] - *clap-clap*)
(Pa pa pa pa pa)
([vinyl scratch lite] - *rrk-rrk*)
(Pa pa pa pa pa)
([engine fading into reverb] - *vrrroomm—shhhh*)
(Pa pa pa pa pa)
([delay bounce] - *pa-pa-pa…*)
(Pa pa pa pa pa)
([air pad tail] - *whoooosh*)
(Pa pa pa pa pa)
([soft stereo vox] - *na dva točka…*)
(Pa pa pa pa pa)
([night ambience fade] - *hummmmm*)

# hardcore_pop - BezTeban_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
A dark, emotional Serbian EDM / tech-house club track at 124–128 BPM, built around a punchy four-on-the-floor kick, a groovy sidechained slap-bass, and hypnotic Balkan-influenced plucks and pads. The production blends warm atmospheric textures with tight, modern club elements: bright percussive hats, subtle cowbells, airy risers, vocal-chops, and evolving synth stabs. The vocal sits clean and intimate in the verses—silky, expressive, completely natural—before widening into stereo layers and subtle harmonies in the chorus. Drops explode with rhythmic saw-bass patterns, open hats, and driving percussion, creating pure dance-floor tension and release. The repeating "Ne želim te / Trebam te" hook becomes an irresistible club motif, turning emotional conflict into an anthemic, high-energy moment. Atmospheric breakdowns reconnect the story before each fresh rise.

[LYRICS]
(Designed for 124–128 BPM dark EDM / Balkan tech-house with emotional female vocal)

[GlobalMix–Dark Balkan EDM/Tech-House ~124–128 BPM.Kick:deep punchy club kick(55–80 Hz),short tail,strong transient.Slap-bass:FM+saw hybrid,sidechain 6–8 dB,groovy syncopation.Sub mono<120 Hz.Snares/claps bright(5–7 kHz),layered with short room.Hats:1/8 pulse + 1/16 flicker;HPF>400 Hz.Perc:subtle Balkan shakers,cowbell accents,air swells,reverse sweeps.Synths:dark plucks,minor arps,detuned saw leads on choruses.Pads:wide atmospheric female-choir textures.Vocals:silk-smooth Serbian female,clear diction,no autotune,slight saturation,presence lift 4–6 kHz,light plate reverb(0.8–1.2s),tight slap delays on select words.Doubles only on emotional peaks.FX:risers,sub-drops,reverse vocals,stutter fills.Master:-6.5/-6 LUFS,peak -0.9 dB,club loud.]

[Structure–Intro(8 bars filtered pluck+kick)->Verse1(minimal groove)->Verse2(build,snare lifts)->Chorus(drop:slap bass+arp lead)->Strofa(variation groove)->Refren(drop2)->Strofa2->Refren2->Strofa3(optional breakdown)->FinalRefren(max energy)->Outro(lowpass fade).]

[Verse 1]

Ustajem
([VoxClose]-dry,close-mic whisper)
Jer ne mogu da spavam
([PadSoft]-low warm pad)
Nije da nisam pokušavala
([PluckDark]-minor pluck riff enters)
Bez tebe lako ne ide
([BassGhost]-soft muted sub pulse)
(nisam se ni zavaravala)
([FXReverse]-reverse breath swell)
Više se nikoga ne bojim
([VoxDoubleLight]-wide whisper)
ma šta da se desi ....
([HatsTiny]-1/16 flicker)
(ja bih dane s tobom da brojim)
([FXRiser]-small snare riser into next verse)

[Verse 2]

Sama bih sebe noćas rado prevarila
([PluckArp]-arp increases energy)
I svako osećanje iz glave izbacila
([FXDrop]-tiny sub drop under “izbacila”)
Ali nešto uvek me zaustavi
([PadWide]-choral airy pad)
Pita zašto vatrom na vatru da ne uzvrati
([VoxDoubleSoft]-light stereo)
Zar te laži teške ne pogađaju?“
([Delay1/4]-echo on “pogađaju”)

[Chorus – DROP]

I šta je to u meni
([LeadSynth]-saw lead enters,sidechained)
Što se uvek zaljubi u one koji ne smeju
([HatsOpen]-open hats + groove lift)
Da zavole? Pa se na kraju
([FXStutter]-1/8 vocal chop)
što sam verovala opet sama kajem
([DROP]-slap bass hits + full drums)

[Strofa – Groove Variation]

Zar da uvek trčim tebi
([VoxWider]-stereo widen)
Kad me zoveš
([DelayDotted]-echo)
A ja bežim
([BassPulse]-sync bass hits)
Kad si ovde
([PadLift]-harmonic lift)
Sve je mirno
([FXAir]-air sweep)
Sve što je tvoje nije mi bitno
([VoxDry]-tight center)
Zar da uvek trčim tebi
([PercBuild]-percs rising)
Kad me zoveš
([PluckBright]-hi pluck)
A ja bežim
([FXReverse]-suck-in)
Kad si ovde
([KickStrong]-full kick returns)
Sve je mirno
([PadWide]-spread pad)
Sve što je tvoje nije mi bitno
([SubDropLight]-low drop)

[Refren – Hook Drop]

Ne želim te
([VoxStack]-triple layer,wide)
Ne
([FXHit]-short impact)
Ne
([DelayShort]-slap delay)
Trebam te
([LeadRise]-saw lead upshift)
Ne
([KickSolo]-kick-only bar)
Ne
([SubBoom]-sub shot)
Osećam te
([HarmonyHigh]-ghost harmony)
Ne
([FXChop]-vocal chop)
Ne
Trebam te
([DROP2]-big bass + hats open)
Ne
Ne

[Strofa 2 – Atmospheric Build]

I kad ne bi bio ovde
([FilterHP]-filtered vocal)
Gde da odeš
([FXWind]-soft sweep)
Ja sam ta
([PadWarm]-romantic pad tone)
Koja bi te zvala
([DelayWide]-stereo throw)
Koja bi te zvala
([PluckReEntry]-pluck returns)
I kad ne bi bio ovde
([KickLow]-kick lowered energy)
Gde da odeš
([FXReverse]-riser)
Ja sam ta
([VoxClean]-center)
Koja bi te zvala
([HarmonyAir]-upper airy harmony)
Koja bi te zvala
([SnareLift]-snare roll into drop)

[Refren – Drop 2]

Ne želim te
([VoxWide]-anthemic)
Ne
([FXHit])
Ne
Trebam te
([LeadFull]-big saw lead)
Ne
Ne
Osećam te
([SubWave]-sub modulation)
Ne
Ne
Trebam te
([DROP3]-max energy)
Ne
Ne

[Strofa 3 – Reprise]

Zar da uvek trčim tebi
([PluckMinimal]-soft reprise)
Kad me zoveš
([HatsSoft])
A ja bežim
([PadDark])
Kad si ovde
([KickHalf]-groove reduced)
Sve je mirno
([VoxClose])
Sve što je tvoje nije mi bitno
([FXReverse])
Zar da uvek trčim tebi
([BuildLow]-low snare roll)
Kad me zoveš
([PadLift])
A ja bežim
([FXRise])
Kad si ovde
([KickFull])
Sve je mirno
([LeadHint]-lead motif)
Sve što je tvoje nije mi bitno
([SubDropFinal])

[Refren – Final Drop]

Ne želim te
([VoxAnthem]-largest stack)
Ne
Ne
Trebam te
([LeadMax]-highest-intensity synth)
Ne
Ne
Osećam te
([FXGlow])
Ne
Ne
Trebam te
([MEGADROP]-peak club moment)
Ne
Ne

[Outro]

([FilterLP]-slow lowpass)
([PluckFade])
([PadTail])
([ReverbLong]-long atmospheric tail)

# hardcore_pop - BezTeban_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
A dark, emotional Serbian EDM / tech-house club track at 124–128 BPM, built around a punchy four-on-the-floor kick, a groovy sidechained slap-bass, and hypnotic Balkan-influenced plucks and pads. The production blends warm atmospheric textures with tight, modern club elements: bright percussive hats, subtle cowbells, airy risers, vocal-chops, and evolving synth stabs. The vocal sits clean and intimate in the verses—silky, expressive, completely natural—before widening into stereo layers and subtle harmonies in the chorus. Drops explode with rhythmic saw-bass patterns, open hats, and driving percussion, creating pure dance-floor tension and release. The repeating "Ne želim te / Trebam te" hook becomes an irresistible club motif, turning emotional conflict into an anthemic, high-energy moment. [LYRICS]
(Designed for 124–128 BPM dark EDM / Balkan tech-house with emotional female vocal)

[GlobalMix–Dark Balkan EDM/Tech-House ~124–128 BPM.Kick:deep punchy club kick(55–80 Hz),short tail,strong transient.Slap-bass:FM+saw hybrid,sidechain 6–8 dB,groovy syncopation.Sub mono<120 Hz.Snares/claps bright(5–7 kHz),layered with short room.Hats:1/8 pulse + 1/16 flicker;HPF>400 Hz.Perc:subtle Balkan shakers,cowbell accents,air swells,reverse sweeps.Synths:dark plucks,minor arps,detuned saw leads on choruses.Pads:wide atmospheric female-choir textures.Vocals:silk-smooth Serbian female,clear diction,no autotune,slight saturation,presence lift 4–6 kHz,light plate reverb(0.8–1.2s),tight slap delays on select words.Doubles only on emotional peaks.FX:risers,sub-drops,reverse vocals,stutter fills.Master:-6.5/-6 LUFS,peak -0.9 dB,club loud.]

(ja bih dane s tobom da brojim)
([FXRiser]-small snare riser into next verse)

([FXStutter]-1/8 vocal chop)

([DROP]-slap bass hits + full drums)

[Strofa – Groove Variation]

Zar da uvek trčim tebi
([VoxWider]-stereo widen)
Kad me zoveš
([DelayDotted]-echo)
A ja bežim
([BassPulse]-sync bass hits)
Kad si ovde
([PadLift]-harmonic lift)
Sve je mirno
([FXAir]-air sweep)
Sve što je tvoje nije mi bitno
([VoxDry]-tight center)

([PercBuild]-percs rising)
Kad me zoveš

# hardcore_pop - BezTeban_Hardcore_Pop_2
[DESCRIPTION]
A high-octane Balkan turbo-club remix at 126–132 BPM, blending modern slap-house power with Balkan melodic elements, zurle riffs, tapan hits, darbuka rolls, and aggressive EDM supersaws. The kick is punchy and forward, the bass is sharp and syncopated, and transitions explode with car-siren uplifters, tire-screech FX, snare rolls, and festival-style risers. Vocals remain clean, emotional, and intimate—zero autotune—contrasting the explosive drops built around the “Ne želim te / Trebam te” hook. The chorus unleashes full slap-bass energy with zurle doubling the melody for instant turbo-folk club appeal. Verses breathe with filtered pads and soft plucks before rising into massive, euphoric drops. This remix is engineered for peak-night club moments: loud, chaotic, addictive, and unmistakably Balkan.

[LYRICS]
[GlobalMix–Balkan Turbo-Club EDM/Slap-House ~126–132 BPM.Ultra-punchy kick(55–85 Hz),short tail,hard transient.Slap-bass:FM+saw hybrid,distorted slightly,sidechain 8–10 dB,aggressive syncopation.Sub mono<120 Hz.Snares/claps bright(snappy 5–7 kHz)with Balkan offbeat swing.Hats:1/8 open-house pulse + 1/16 turbo flickers.Perc:tapan hits,darbuka rolls,cowbells,zurle riffs doubling melody.FX:car-siren uplifters,tire-screech risers,laser risers,noise sweeps,sub drops.Synths:wide supersaws,EDM stabs,Eurodance plucks,octave-lead hook.Vocals:clear Serbian female,zero autotune,silky tone,delicate saturation,bright presence,slap delays on key words,stereo widening in choruses.Reverb:short plate for verses,1.2–1.8s throws for transitions.Master:-6.0 to -6.5 LUFS,brickwall -0.9 dB,club-ready.]

[Structure–TurboIntro(16 bars stuttered chops)->TurboDrop1(16 bars instrumental)->Verse1(8 bars)->Verse2(8 bars)->Build1(8 bars)->DropChorus1(32 bars)->Strofa1(16 bars)->Refren1(16 bars)->Strofa2(16 bars)->Refren2(16 bars)->Strofa3(variation 16 bars)->MegaDropFinal(16–32 bars)->Outro(16 bars filtered).]

⭐ TURBO INTRO (DJ build)

([VoxChop]-“Ne… Ne… Trebam te…” stuttered)
([ZurleStab]-short chopped zurle hits)
([KickFiltered]-lowpassed 4/4 pulse)
([NoiseRise]-16-bar build)
(your lyrics begin after intro)

⭐ [Verse 1]

([VoxClose]-dry intimate female vocal)
Jer ne mogu da spavam
([PadSoft]-warm pad under vocal)
Nije da nisam pokušavala
([PluckEuro]-Eurodance pluck enters)
Bez tebe lako ne ide
([BassGhost]-low pre-bass rumble)
(nisam se ni zavaravala)
([FXReverse]-reverse breath swell)
Više se nikoga ne bojim

ma šta da se desi ....
