# hardcore_pop - Ffav_Dish_Hardcore_Pop_3
[DESCRIPTION]
An 133 bpm dynamic raw slap tech house track , zurle, organ,car siren, tire screeching,dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals, human sounding, cowbell

[LYRICS]
[Verse]
You see me out
([Footstep soft groove — tapptap L/R, stereo stagger, 1/16 feel])
And I'm actin' a fool
([Breath laugh/exhale — haaah, tight low-cut before 250 Hz, send to short plate reverb])
And you ask me
([Crowd murmur short — mmmrum, very low level bed, bandpass to 800–2k])
"Hey
([Zurle motif micro-stab — zur-le (bandpassed, sidechained to kick)])
([Vinyl pop] - pft)
Girl
([Whispered echo — ssst, slapback 1/8 ≈ 222 ms])
What's wrong with you?"
([Snap punctuation — snap, place on 1/16 off-grid for groove])
And you say I'm crazy
([Vocal chop — koo-koo, subtle pitch-divide, centered])
It's the way you make me
([Sidechained sub nudge — rrrrrr, ducked to kick])
Boy
([Finger snap — snap, slight reverb send])
And you know I like it
([Glass clink soft — clink, short sustain])
You know I do
([Breath exhale close — haaah, dry, compress lightly])

[Verse]
Said
([Beat click — tchk, use as percussive hi-hat composite])
"Why you got your hands all on my hips?"
([Hip sway thump — thump, low transient, sits just above kick])
And you say
([Low vocal hum — mmm, widen slightly for backing])
"It's 'cause you're my favorite dish"
([Coin drop bright — cling, high-end sparkle])
And you know I like it
([Vocal harmony — ooo, wide, low level])
I ain't even lyin'
([Vinyl crackle — pftcrackle, subtle warmth bed])
Boy
([Crowd cheer tiny — ayyyo, gated and low])
And you know I like it
([Breath giggle — heh, front and intimate])
You know I do
([Echo tail — whooom, long tail only on last repetition])

[Verse]
You see me out
([Footstep soft groove — tapptap L/R, percussive feel])

([Crowd cheer tiny — ayyyo])
And you know I like it
([Breath giggle — heh])
You know I do
([Echo tail — whooom])

[Verse]
You see me out
([Footstep soft groove — tapptap, widen on second repetition])
And I'm actin' a fool
([Breath laugh/exhale — haaah])

([Crowd murmur short — mmmrum])
"Hey
([Zurle motif call — ZUR-le, filtered])

# hardcore_pop - Ffav_Dish_Hardcore_Pop_4
[DESCRIPTION]
An 129 bpm dynamic raw high-octane, slap tech house track , zurle, organ,car siren, tire screeching,dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals, human sounding, cowbell

[LYRICS]
[Verse]
You see me out
([Footstep soft groove — tapptap L/R, stereo stagger, 1/16 feel])
And I'm actin' a fool
([Breath laugh/exhale — haaah, tight low-cut before 250 Hz, send to short plate reverb])
And you ask me
([Crowd murmur short — mmmrum, very low level bed, bandpass to 800–2k])
"Hey
([Zurle motif micro-stab — zur-le (bandpassed, sidechained to kick)])
([Vinyl pop] - pft)

([Whispered echo — ssst, slapback 1/8 ≈ 222 ms])
What's wrong with you?"
([Snap punctuation — snap, place on 1/16 off-grid for groove])
And you say I'm crazy
([Vocal chop — koo-koo, subtle pitch-divide, centered])
It's the way you make me
([Sidechained sub nudge — rrrrrr, ducked to kick])
Boy
([Finger snap — snap, slight reverb send])
And you know I like it
([Glass clink soft — clink, short sustain])
You know I do
([Breath exhale close — haaah, dry, compress lightly])

[Verse]

([Hip sway thump — thump, low transient, sits just above kick])

I ain't even lyin'
([Vinyl crackle — pftcrackle, subtle warmth bed])
Boy
([Crowd cheer tiny — ayyyo, gated and low])
And you know I like it
([Breath giggle — heh, front and intimate])
You know I do
([Echo tail — whooom, long tail only on last repetition])

# hardcore_pop - Ffav_Dish_Hardcore_Pop_4
[DESCRIPTION]
An 129 bpm dynamic raw high-octane, slap tech house track , zurle, organ,car siren, tire screeching,dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals, human sounding, cowbell

[LYRICS]
[Verse]
You see me out
([Footstep soft groove — tapptap L/R, stereo stagger, 1/16 feel])
And I'm actin' a fool
([Breath laugh/exhale — haaah, tight low-cut before 250 Hz, send to short plate reverb])
And you ask me
([Crowd murmur short — mmmrum, very low level bed, bandpass to 800–2k])
"Hey
([Zurle motif micro-stab — zur-le (bandpassed, sidechained to kick)])
([Vinyl pop] - pft)
Girl
([Whispered echo — ssst, slapback 1/8 ≈ 222 ms])
What's wrong with you?"
([Snap punctuation — snap, place on 1/16 off-grid for groove])
And you say I'm crazy
([Vocal chop — koo-koo, subtle pitch-divide, centered])
It's the way you make me
([Sidechained sub nudge — rrrrrr, ducked to kick])
Boy
([Finger snap — snap, slight reverb send])
And you know I like it
([Glass clink soft — clink, short sustain])
You know I do
([Breath exhale close — haaah, dry, compress lightly])

[Verse]
Said
([Beat click — tchk, use as percussive hi-hat composite])

([Hip sway thump — thump, low transient, sits just above kick])
And you say
([Low vocal hum — mmm, widen slightly for backing])

([Coin drop bright — cling, high-end sparkle])

([Vocal harmony — ooo, wide, low level])
I ain't even lyin'
([Vinyl crackle — pftcrackle, subtle warmth bed])
Boy
([Crowd cheer tiny — ayyyo, gated and low])
And you know I like it
([Breath giggle — heh, front and intimate])
You know I do
([Echo tail — whooom, long tail only on last repetition])

([Crowd murmur soft] - mmmrum)

(It's just a phase)
([Vinyl crackle] - pftcrackle)
I'm feelin' your vibe
([Sub pulse] - thumm)

([Hi-hat tick] - tss-tss)
To be waitin' in the queue
([Foot shuffle] - shff)

([Turnstile click] - klak)
I ain't gonna hesitate
([Snap] - snap) ([Riser short] - shhp)

([Whispered FX] - ssst)

([Kick + clap] - boom-clap)

([Reverse sweep] - whooom)

# hardcore_pop - frische matra 73 (Cover)
[DESCRIPTION]
A dark German dancehall riddim with a cold, urban feel. The tempo is mid–fast, the groove built around a heavy, syncopated dembow pattern with hard-hitting kick, sharp snare and crisp offbeat hats. The clean guitar becomes a more aggressive, slightly overdriven pluck riff, playing short, catchy minor-key phrases with a metallic, neon shimmer, doubled by a thin synth lead for that club feel.

The bass turns into a thick, sub-heavy 808 / synth bass, following a mean root–fifth–octave pattern with occasional slides, pushing the rhythm forward and giving it that “street” pressure. Drums are tight and punchy, side-chained to the bass for bounce, with extra percussion (rims, claps, small fills) to emphasize the offbeats.

No vocals – only occasional chopped German crowd shouts and siren FX, drenched in short delays and gated reverbs. Overall mix is modern and loud, with focused low-end, bright transients, and subtle reverb on melodic elements, creating a dark neon alley vibe – half Berlin st

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental]

---

# hardcore_pop - Gazzzzz- Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
[Track Instructions]
([Track] - [modern Balkan club trap, bouncy low-end, punchy drums, dark but playful, non-stop groove])
([Voice] - [clear male vocal, natural tone, no autotune, tight rhythm, lightly compressed])
([FX Style] - [club/urban SFX (sniff, cars, glitches, scratches) used musically and in tempo, not overpowering])
([Space] - [short club reverb and clean delays, FX tails gently overlap into next lines to avoid gaps])

[LYRICS]
[Intro]
([Sub-bass swell] - [vwoooom, 1-bar rise into first kick])
([Vinyl crackle] - [pftcrackle, low, constant under intro])
([Distant club crowd] - [mmmrumm, filtered, loop quietly])
([Reverse sweep into beat] - [whoooosh, stops on first verse downbeat])


---

[Verse 1]
Daj bejbe daj, da te provozam kroz kraj
([Ad-lib, chopped] - ["daj, daj, daj" in tempo, low behind lead])
Pa to zgas, dok smo high
([Hi-hat roll] - [tktktk in triplets]) ([808 hit] - [boooom, short sub tail into next line])
Malo sniff, malo blajv, bejbe
([Sniff FX] - [snff, very short, tucked in rhythm]) ([Air sweep] - [fshhhh, soft noise sweep])
Daj spusti gard, digni suknju, skini klajn
([Vocal chop] - ["spusti, digni, skini" synced to off-beats])
Hajde klekni da ti dam, danas je tvoj srećan dan
([Kick+snare] - [boom-tchk accent on "dam"]) ([Female FX, soft] - [mmm, breathy, short reverb tail])


---

[Chorus]
Da da daj bejbe todaj gas
([Chant layer] - ["daj, daj, daj" stereo, low, repeats through bar])
Digni suknju, skini klajn
([Tape stop] - [skrrr, brief half-speed dip then beat snaps back])
Daj mi parče guze da na njemu gram nacrtam
([Scratch FX] - [chk-chk-chk, DJ scratch in tempo])
Da budem lud i nasnifa po celu noć i ceo dan
([Delay vox] - ["ceo dan… noć i dan…" clean stereo delay, fading])
Ne dam pare sve na ler
([Engine rev] - [vrrrroom, filtered car rev in tempo]) ([808 glide] - [woooob, bass slide accent])


---

[Verse 2]
Upecela novi ge, pa na dozi me vozi mala
([Bounce ad-lib] - ["ey, ey" rhythmic, panned])
Ometala logike da nestaju iz tog signala
([Phone glitch FX] - [bzzzt, short digital glitch, in tempo])
Al' ta mala štetna kada getom šeta
([Steps on gravel] - [tptptp, quick step loop, low])
Pada svima meta, delikventna joj
([Gun cock FX, distant] - [chk, very low, one-shot, no tail])
Ona je smerala da nestanem ja iz tog stana
([Reverb throw] - ["nestanem, nestanem" long echo under next line])
Sve vreme me gledala, vrebala ko iguana
([Snake hiss] - [ssshhh, filtered, short])
Sebe je spremala, a vrebala bi igru grama
([Vocal chop] - ["igram, gram, gram" synced to groove])
Sve je po šemama, tu nema tebi, samo nama
([Choir pad wide] - [aaaaah, wide stereo pad for 1 bar])


---

[Instrumental]
([808 & kick pattern solo] - [boom… boom-boom… boom, dry and punchy])
([Acid lead riff] - [nyooo-nyooo, resonant synth line, in key, up-front])
([Hi-hat triplets] - [tktktk-tktktk, fast rolls building energy])
([Risers & impacts] - [whooosh / DOOM, timed to 4-bar phrases])


---

[Vocal chops]
([Chopped vox] - ["daj… bejbe… gas… gas…" sliced and sequenced to beat])
([Stutter FX] - ["noć… noć… noć svaku…" rhythmic stutter, in tempo])
([Formant-shifted vox] - ["ler… ler… ler" deeper tone, panned])
([Delay ping-pong] - ["mala, mala, mala" echoes L/R, decaying])


---

[Chorus]
Noć svaku dodaje gas,
šije, pije, bez kočnice
([Tire screech] - [skreeee, quick, sidechained to kick])
Glumi da gubi glas,
Dok skidam joj šljokice
([Glitter shake FX] - [shhhh, like sequins/rattle, stereo])
Noć svaku dodaje gas,
šije, pij, bez kočnice
([Engine rev layered] - [vrrr-vrrr-vrrr, rhythmic revs, filtered])
Glumi da gubi glas,
Dok skidam joj šljokice
([Breath FX, close] - [haaah, intimate exhale]) ([Vocal chop] - ["gas, gas" in tempo])


---

[Outro]
([Low-pass filter sweep on beat] - [fwooom, whole mix slowly muffled])
([Crowd fade-out] - [mmmrumm… gradually quieter])
([Vinyl stop] - [skrrrt, record stop, short])
([Last 808 tail] - [boooooom, long sub tail ending track])

---

# hardcore_pop - Gazzzzz- Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
[Track Instructions]
([Track] - [modern Balkan club trap, bouncy low-end, punchy drums, dark but playful, non-stop groove])
([Voice] - [clear male vocal, natural tone, no autotune, tight rhythm, lightly compressed])
([FX Style] - [club/urban SFX (sniff, cars, glitches, scratches) used musically and in tempo, not overpowering])
([Space] - [short club reverb and clean delays, FX tails gently overlap into next lines to avoid gaps])

[LYRICS]
[Intro]
[Intro]

[Intro] C'est Hardcore Pop
([Crowd FX] - [low-passed club murmur, humid underground tension])
([Car Honk FX] - [syncopated beeps, wide stereo, street chaos outside])
([Female Ad-lib] - [silky oriental „mmm-aaa“ glide, teasing into prvu liniju])
([Sub-bass swell] - [vwoooom, 1-bar rise into first kick])
([Vinyl crackle] - [pftcrackle, low, constant under intro])
([Distant club crowd] - [mmmrumm, filtered, loop quietly])
([Reverse sweep into beat] - [whoooosh, stops on first verse downbeat])


---

[Verse 1]
Daj bejbe daj, da te provozam kroz kraj
([Ad-lib, chopped] - ["daj, daj, daj" in tempo, low behind lead])
Pa to zgas, dok smo high
([Hi-hat roll] - [tktktk in triplets]) ([808 hit] - [boooom, short sub tail into next line])
Malo sniff, malo blajv, bejbe
([Sniff FX] - [snff, very short, tucked in rhythm]) ([Air sweep] - [fshhhh, soft noise sweep])
Daj spusti gard, digni suknju, skini klajn
([Vocal chop] - ["spusti, digni, skini" synced to off-beats])
Hajde klekni da ti dam, danas je tvoj srećan dan
([Kick+snare] - [boom-tchk accent on "dam"]) ([Female FX, soft] - [mmm, breathy, short reverb tail])


---

[Chorus]
Da da daj bejbe todaj gas
([Chant layer] - ["daj, daj, daj" stereo, low, repeats through bar])
Digni suknju, skini klajn
([Tape stop] - [skrrr, brief half-speed dip then beat snaps back])
Daj mi parče guze da na njemu gram nacrtam
([Scratch FX] - [chk-chk-chk, DJ scratch in tempo])
Da budem lud i nasnifa po celu noć i ceo dan
([Delay vox] - ["ceo dan… noć i dan…" clean stereo delay, fading])
Ne dam pare sve na ler
([Engine rev] - [vrrrroom, filtered car rev in tempo]) ([808 glide] - [woooob, bass slide accent])


---

[Verse 2]
Upecela novi ge, pa na dozi me vozi mala
([Bounce ad-lib] - ["ey, ey" rhythmic, panned])
Ometala logike da nestaju iz tog signala
([Phone glitch FX] - [bzzzt, short digital glitch, in tempo])
Al' ta mala štetna kada getom šeta
([Steps on gravel] - [tptptp, quick step loop, low])
Pada svima meta, delikventna joj
([Gun cock FX, distant] - [chk, very low, one-shot, no tail])
Ona je smerala da nestanem ja iz tog stana
([Reverb throw] - ["nestanem, nestanem" long echo under next line])
Sve vreme me gledala, vrebala ko iguana
([Snake hiss] - [ssshhh, filtered, short])
Sebe je spremala, a vrebala bi igru grama
([Vocal chop] - ["igram, gram, gram" synced to groove])
Sve je po šemama, tu nema tebi, samo nama
([Choir pad wide] - [aaaaah, wide stereo pad for 1 bar])


---

[Instrumental]
([808 & kick pattern solo] - [boom… boom-boom… boom, dry and punchy])
([Acid lead riff] - [nyooo-nyooo, resonant synth line, in key, up-front])
([Hi-hat triplets] - [tktktk-tktktk, fast rolls building energy])
([Risers & impacts] - [whooosh / DOOM, timed to 4-bar phrases])


---

[Vocal chops]
([Chopped vox] - ["daj… bejbe… gas… gas…" sliced and sequenced to beat])
([Stutter FX] - ["noć… noć… noć svaku…" rhythmic stutter, in tempo])
([Formant-shifted vox] - ["ler… ler… ler" deeper tone, panned])
([Delay ping-pong] - ["mala, mala, mala" echoes L/R, decaying])


---

[Chorus]
Noć svaku dodaje gas,
šije, pije, bez kočnice
([Tire screech] - [skreeee, quick, sidechained to kick])
Glumi da gubi glas,
Dok skidam joj šljokice
([Glitter shake FX] - [shhhh, like sequins/rattle, stereo])
Noć svaku dodaje gas,
šije, pij, bez kočnice
([Engine rev layered] - [vrrr-vrrr-vrrr, rhythmic revs, filtered])
Glumi da gubi glas,
Dok skidam joj šljokice

# hardcore_pop - Gazzzzz-- Hardcore_Pop_3
[DESCRIPTION]
bouny undeground slap club tech Turkish oriental pop ,  car honks, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Intro]
[Intro]

[Intro] C'est Hardcore Pop
([Crowd FX] - [low-passed club murmur, humid underground tension])
([Car Honk FX] - [syncopated beeps, wide stereo, street chaos outside])
([Female Ad-lib] - [silky oriental „mmm-aaa“ glide, teasing into prvu liniju])
([Sub-bass swell] - [vwoooom, 1-bar rise into first kick])
([Vinyl crackle] - [pftcrackle, low, constant under intro])
([Distant club crowd] - [mmmrumm, filtered, loop quietly])
([Reverse sweep into beat] - [whoooosh, stops on first verse downbeat])


---

([Vocal chop] - ["spusti, digni, skini" synced to off-beats])
Hajde klekni da ti dam, danas je tvoj srećan dan
([Kick+snare] - [boom-tchk accent on "dam"]) ([Female FX, soft] - [mmm, breathy, short reverb tail])

([Chant layer] - ["daj, daj, daj" stereo, low, repeats through bar])
Digni suknju, skini klajn
([Tape stop] - [skrrr, brief half-speed dip then beat snaps back])

([Scratch FX] - [chk-chk-chk, DJ scratch in tempo])

Ne dam pare sve na ler
([Engine rev] - [vrrrroom, filtered car rev in tempo]) ([808 glide] - [woooob, bass slide accent])

([Bounce ad-lib] - ["ey, ey" rhythmic, panned])
Ometala logike da nestaju iz tog signala
([Phone glitch FX] - [bzzzt, short digital glitch, in tempo])
Al' ta mala štetna kada getom šeta
([Steps on gravel] - [tptptp, quick step loop, low])
Pada svima meta, delikventna joj
([Gun cock FX, distant] - [chk, very low, one-shot, no tail])
Ona je smerala da nestanem ja iz tog stana
([Reverb throw] - ["nestanem, nestanem" long echo under next line])
Sve vreme me gledala, vrebala ko iguana
([Snake hiss] - [ssshhh, filtered, short])
Sebe je spremala, a vrebala bi igru grama

([Choir pad wide] - [aaaaah, wide stereo pad for 1 bar])

šije, pije, bez kočnice
([Tire screech] - [skreeee, quick, sidechained to kick])

šije, pij, bez kočnice

# hardcore_pop - Gazzzzz-- Hardcore_Pop_4
[DESCRIPTION]
Energetic Turkish oriental pop fused with bouncy underground slap club tech. Hypnotic percussion blends darbuka with modern club kicks; punchy bass locks in a relentless dance groove. Layer in car honks, tire screeches as drops. Smooth, clear vocals float above, organic and dynamic, driving nonstop floor energy.

[LYRICS]
[Intro]
[Intro]

[Intro] C'est Hardcore Pop
([Crowd FX] - [low-passed club murmur, humid underground tension])
([Car Honk FX] - [syncopated beeps, wide stereo, street chaos outside])
([Female Ad-lib] - [silky oriental „mmm-aaa“ glide, teasing into prvu liniju])
([Sub-bass swell] - [vwoooom, 1-bar rise into first kick])
([Vinyl crackle] - [pftcrackle, low, constant under intro])
([Distant club crowd] - [mmmrumm, filtered, loop quietly])
([Reverse sweep into beat] - [whoooosh, stops on first verse downbeat])


---

[Verse 1]
Daj bejbe daj, da te provozam kroz kraj
([Ad-lib, chopped] - ["daj, daj, daj" in tempo, low behind lead])
Pa to zgas, dok smo high
([Hi-hat roll] - [tktktk in triplets]) ([808 hit] - [boooom, short sub tail into next line])
Malo sniff, malo blajv, bejbe
([Sniff FX] - [snff, very short, tucked in rhythm]) ([Air sweep] - [fshhhh, soft noise sweep])
Daj spusti gard, digni suknju, skini klajn
([Vocal chop] - ["spusti, digni, skini" synced to off-beats])
Hajde klekni da ti dam, danas je tvoj srećan dan
([Kick+snare] - [boom-tchk accent on "dam"]) ([Female FX, soft] - [mmm, breathy, short reverb tail])


---

[Chorus]
Da da daj bejbe todaj gas
([Chant layer] - ["daj, daj, daj" stereo, low, repeats through bar])
Digni suknju, skini klajn
([Tape stop] - [skrrr, brief half-speed dip then beat snaps back])
Daj mi parče guze da na njemu gram nacrtam
([Scratch FX] - [chk-chk-chk, DJ scratch in tempo])
Da budem lud i nasnifa po celu noć i ceo dan
([Delay vox] - ["ceo dan… noć i dan…" clean stereo delay, fading])
Ne dam pare sve na ler
([Engine rev] - [vrrrroom, filtered car rev in tempo]) ([808 glide] - [woooob, bass slide accent])


---

[Verse 2]
Upecela novi ge, pa na dozi me vozi mala
([Bounce ad-lib] - ["ey, ey" rhythmic, panned])
Ometala logike da nestaju iz tog signala
([Phone glitch FX] - [bzzzt, short digital glitch, in tempo])
Al' ta mala štetna kada getom šeta
([Steps on gravel] - [tptptp, quick step loop, low])
Pada svima meta, delikventna joj
([Gun cock FX, distant] - [chk, very low, one-shot, no tail])
Ona je smerala da nestanem ja iz tog stana
([Reverb throw] - ["nestanem, nestanem" long echo under next line])
Sve vreme me gledala, vrebala ko iguana
([Snake hiss] - [ssshhh, filtered, short])
Sebe je spremala, a vrebala bi igru grama
([Vocal chop] - ["igram, gram, gram" synced to groove])
Sve je po šemama, tu nema tebi, samo nama
([Choir pad wide] - [aaaaah, wide stereo pad for 1 bar])


---

[Instrumental]
([808 & kick pattern solo] - [boom… boom-boom… boom, dry and punchy])
([Acid lead riff] - [nyooo-nyooo, resonant synth line, in key, up-front])
([Hi-hat triplets] - [tktktk-tktktk, fast rolls building energy])
([Risers & impacts] - [whooosh / DOOM, timed to 4-bar phrases])


---

[Vocal chops]
([Chopped vox] - ["daj… bejbe… gas… gas…" sliced and sequenced to beat])
([Stutter FX] - ["noć… noć… noć svaku…" rhythmic stutter, in tempo])
([Formant-shifted vox] - ["ler… ler… ler" deeper tone, panned])
([Delay ping-pong] - ["mala, mala, mala" echoes L/R, decaying])


---

[Chorus]
Noć svaku dodaje gas,
šije, pije, bez kočnice
([Tire screech] - [skreeee, quick, sidechained to kick])
Glumi da gubi glas,
Dok skidam joj šljokice
([Glitter shake FX] - [shhhh, like sequins/rattle, stereo])
Noć svaku dodaje gas,
šije, pij, bez kočnice
([Engine rev layered] - [vrrr-vrrr-vrrr, rhythmic revs, filtered])
Glumi da gubi glas,
Dok skidam joj šljokice
([Breath FX, close] - [haaah, intimate exhale]) ([Vocal chop] - ["gas, gas" in tempo])


---

[Outro]
([Low-pass filter sweep on beat] - [fwooom, whole mix slowly muffled])
([Crowd fade-out] - [mmmrumm… gradually quieter])
([Vinyl stop] - [skrrrt, record stop, short])
([Last 808 tail] - [boooooom, long sub tail ending track])

---

# hardcore_pop - Gazzzzz-- Hardcore_Pop_4
[DESCRIPTION]
bouny undeground slap club tech Turkish oriental pop ,  car honks, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Intro – Filtered bouncy slap-club groove, ~122 BPM. Kick+slap bass low-passed, just a pulse. Wide pads/organ swells, ultra-quiet oriental lead. Car honks already as distant stabs, crowd murmur+vinyl crackle = underground Balkan club. No lead yet, only FX/ad-libs.]
[Intro]
[Intro]

[Intro] C'est Hardcore Pop
([Crowd FX] - [low-passed club murmur, humid underground])
([Car Honk FX] - [syncopated beeps, wide, in tempo])
([Female Ad-lib] - [silky oriental „mmm-aaa“ glide, leads into prvu liniju])
([Sub-bass swell] - [vwoooom, 1-bar rise into first kick])
([Vinyl crackle] - [pftcrackle, low, constant])
([Distant club crowd] - [mmmrumm, filtered loop])
([Reverse sweep] - [whoooosh, cuts on verse downbeat])


---

[Verse 1 – Full slap-club beat drops: tight kick, short slap bass, snappy clap/snare, 1/8 hats with small rolls. Oriental pluck/zurna doubles accents. Honks+noise sweeps as ear candy. Vocal upfront, natural (no autotune), light comp, EQ, short plate. Constant dance bounce.]
[Verse 1]
Daj bejbe daj, da te provozam kroz kraj
([Ad-lib, chopped] - ["daj, daj, daj" u tempu, nisko])
Pa to zgas, dok smo high
([Hi-hat roll] - [tktktk triplets]) ([808 hit] - [boooom, kratki sub])
Malo sniff, malo blajv, bejbe
([Sniff FX] - [snff, kratko]) ([Air sweep] - [fshhhh, mekani sweep])
Daj spusti gard, digni suknju, skini klajn
([Vocal chop] - ["spusti, digni, skini" na off-beat])
Hajde klekni da ti dam, danas je tvoj srećan dan
([Kick+snare] - [boom-tchk naglasak]) ([Female FX] - [mmm, dah, kratki reverb])


---

[Chorus 1 – Hook diže energiju: bubanj/bass glasniji, organski stabovi na downbeat, oriental lead odgovara frazama. Honks+tire sweep naglašavaju “gas”. Stereo širi, vokal centar, čist.]
[Chorus]
Da da daj bejbe todaj gas
([Chant layer] - ["daj, daj, daj" stereo, tiho loop])
Digni suknju, skini klajn
([Tape stop] - [skrrr, half-speed dip pa povrat])
Daj mi parče guze da na njemu gram nacrtam
([Scratch FX] - [chk-chk-chk, u tempu])
Da budem lud i nasnifa po celu noć i ceo dan
([Delay vox] - ["ceo dan… noć i dan…" stereo delay])
Ne dam pare sve na ler
([Engine rev] - [vrrrroom, filtriran]) ([808 glide] - [woooob, slide akcenat])


---

[Verse 2 – Groove ostaje, varijacije u hatovima/fillovima. Bass pleše oko vokala. Oriental synth/pads drže atmosferu. Više glitch/phone FX oko “signal”, ali street-club mood zadržan.]
[Verse 2]
Upecela novi ge, pa na dozi me vozi mala
([Bounce ad-lib] - ["ey, ey" ritmički, panoramisano])
Ometala logike da nestaju iz tog signala
([Phone glitch FX] - [bzzzt, kratak])
Al' ta mala štetna kada getom šeta
([Steps on gravel] - [tptptp, tihi loop])
Pada svima meta, delikventna joj
([Gun cock FX] - [chk, veoma tiho])
Ona je smerala da nestanem ja iz tog stana
([Reverb throw] - ["nestanem, nestanem" dugo u pozadini])
Sve vreme me gledala, vrebala ko iguana
([Snake hiss] - [ssshhh, filtrirano])
Sebe je spremala, a vrebala bi igru grama
([Vocal chop] - ["igram, gram, gram" u groove-u])
Sve je po šemama, tu nema tebi, samo nama
([Choir pad] - [aaaaah, širok stereo 1 bar])


---

[Instrumental break – Pista u fokusu: bubanj+808+slap bass napred, acid/oriental hibrid lead vodi. Honks+tire screech kao ritmički udarci i riseri. Tenziја raste svaka 4 bara, bez praznina.]
[Instrumental]
([808 & kick solo] - [boom… boom-boom… boom, suvo, punchy])
([Acid lead riff] - [nyooo-nyooo, rezonanтно, u tonu])
([Hi-hat triplets] - [tktktk-tktktk, brzi rollovi])
([Risers & impacts] - [whooosh/DOOM, na 4-barski ciklus])


---

[Vocal chops – Hook edit deo: isječen lead kao perkusija. Puno stereo igre i delay-a, sve zaključano na slap groove.]
[Vocal chops]
([Chopped vox] - ["daj… bejbe… gas… gas…" isečeno, sekvencirano])
([Stutter FX] - ["noć… noć… noć svaku…" ritmički stutter])
([Formant-shifted vox] - ["ler… ler… ler" dublji ton, panoramisano])
([Delay ping-pong] - ["mala, mala, mala" L/R odjeci])


---

[Chorus 2 – Najveći hook: bubnjevi najjači, bass najdeblji, oriental lead melodičniji, honks+tire screech naglašavaju svaki “gas”. Dodatni backvoks za sing-along. Master mrvicu jači, mix i dalje čist.]
[Chorus]
Noć svaku dodaje gas,
šije, pije, bez kočnice
([Tire screech] - [skreeee, kratko, sidechain na kick])
Glumi da gubi glas,
Dok skidam joj šljokice
([Glitter shake FX] - [shhhh, kao štras/rattle, stereo])
Noć svaku dodaje gas,
šije, pij, bez kočnice
([Engine rev layered] - [vrrr-vrrr-vrrr, ritmički revs])
Glumi da gubi glas,
Dok skidam joj šljokice
([Breath FX, close] - [haaah, intiman dah]) ([Vocal chop] - ["gas, gas" u tempu])


---

[Outro – Groove se gasi ali puls drži do kraja. Polagan low-pass preko celog miksa; bubanj/bass blede, ostaju padovi+crackle. Zadnji car honk ili vinyl stop, finalni 808 tail u subu.]
[Outro]
([Low-pass sweep] - [fwooom, mix sve mutniji])
([Crowd fade-out] - [mmmrumm… sve tiše])
([Vinyl stop] - [skrrrt, kratko])
([Last 808 tail] - [boooooom, dugačak sub kraj])

---

[Verse 1]
Daj bejbe daj, da te provozam kroz kraj
([Ad-lib, chopped] - ["daj, daj, daj" u tempu, nisko])
Pa to zgas, dok smo high
([Hi-hat roll] - [tktktk triplets]) ([808 hit] - [boooom, kratki sub])
Malo sniff, malo blajv, bejbe
([Sniff FX] - [snff, kratko]) ([Air sweep] - [fshhhh, mekani sweep])
Daj spusti gard, digni suknju, skini klajn
([Vocal chop] - ["spusti, digni, skini" na off-beat])
Hajde klekni da ti dam, danas je tvoj srećan dan
([Kick+snare] - [boom-tchk naglasak]) ([Female FX] - [mmm, dah, kratki reverb])


---

[Chorus 1 – Hook diže energiju: bubanj/bass glasniji, organski stabovi na downbeat, oriental lead odgovara frazama. Honks+tire sweep naglašavaju “gas”. Stereo širi, vokal centar, čist.]
[Chorus]
Da da daj bejbe todaj gas
([Chant layer] - ["daj, daj, daj" stereo, tiho loop])
Digni suknju, skini klajn
([Tape stop] - [skrrr, half-speed dip pa povrat])
Daj mi parče guze da na njemu gram nacrtam
([Scratch FX] - [chk-chk-chk, u tempu])
Da budem lud i nasnifa po celu noć i ceo dan
([Delay vox] - ["ceo dan… noć i dan…" stereo delay])
Ne dam pare sve na ler
([Engine rev] - [vrrrroom, filtriran]) ([808 glide] - [woooob, slide akcenat])


---

[Verse 2 – Groove ostaje, varijacije u hatovima/fillovima. Bass pleše oko vokala. Oriental synth/pads drže atmosferu. Više glitch/phone FX oko “signal”, ali street-club mood zadržan.]
[Verse 2]
Upecela novi ge, pa na dozi me vozi mala
([Bounce ad-lib] - ["ey, ey" ritmički, panoramisano])
Ometala logike da nestaju iz tog signala
([Phone glitch FX] - [bzzzt, kratak])
Al' ta mala štetna kada getom šeta
([Steps on gravel] - [tptptp, tihi loop])
Pada svima meta, delikventna joj
([Gun cock FX] - [chk, veoma tiho])
Ona je smerala da nestanem ja iz tog stana
([Reverb throw] - ["nestanem, nestanem" dugo u pozadini])
Sve vreme me gledala, vrebala ko iguana
([Snake hiss] - [ssshhh, filtrirano])
Sebe je spremala, a vrebala bi igru grama
([Vocal chop] - ["igram, gram, gram" u groove-u])
Sve je po šemama, tu nema tebi, samo nama
([Choir pad] - [aaaaah, širok stereo 1 bar])


---

[Instrumental break – Pista u fokusu: bubanj+808+slap bass napred, acid/oriental hibrid lead vodi. Honks+tire screech kao ritmički udarci i riseri. Tenziја raste svaka 4 bara, bez praznina.]
[Instrumental]
([808 & kick solo] - [boom… boom-boom… boom, suvo, punchy])
([Acid lead riff] - [nyooo-nyooo, rezonanтно, u tonu])
([Hi-hat triplets] - [tktktk-tktktk, brzi rollovi])
([Risers & impacts] - [whooosh/DOOM, na 4-barski ciklus])


---

[Vocal chops – Hook edit deo: isječen lead kao perkusija. Puno stereo igre i delay-a, sve zaključano na slap groove.]
[Vocal chops]
([Chopped vox] - ["daj… bejbe… gas… gas…" isečeno, sekvencirano])
([Stutter FX] - ["noć… noć… noć svaku…" ritmički stutter])
([Formant-shifted vox] - ["ler… ler… ler" dublji ton, panoramisano])
([Delay ping-pong] - ["mala, mala, mala" L/R odjeci])


---

[Chorus 2 – Najveći hook: bubnjevi najjači, bass najdeblji, oriental lead melodičniji, honks+tire screech naglašavaju svaki “gas”. Dodatni backvoks za sing-along. Master mrvicu jači, mix i dalje čist.]
[Chorus]
Noć svaku dodaje gas,
šije, pije, bez kočnice
([Tire screech] - [skreeee, kratko, sidechain na kick])
Glumi da gubi glas,
Dok skidam joj šljokice
([Glitter shake FX] - [shhhh, kao štras/rattle, stereo])
Noć svaku dodaje gas,
šije, pij, bez kočnice
([Engine rev layered] - [vrrr-vrrr-vrrr, ritmički revs])
Glumi da gubi glas,
Dok skidam joj šljokice
([Breath FX, close] - [haaah, intiman dah]) ([Vocal chop] - ["gas, gas" u tempu])


---

[Outro – Groove se gasi ali puls drži do kraja. Polagan low-pass preko celog miksa; bubanj/bass blede, ostaju padovi+crackle. Zadnji car honk ili vinyl stop, finalni 808 tail u subu.]
[Outro]
([Low-pass sweep] - [fwooom, mix sve mutniji])
([Crowd fade-out] - [mmmrumm… sve tiše])
([Vinyl stop] - [skrrrt, kratko])
([Last 808 tail] - [boooooom, dugačak sub kraj])

---

# hardcore_pop - Gazzzzz-- Hardcore_Pop_4
[DESCRIPTION]
bouny undeground slap club tech Turkish oriental pop ,  car honks, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Intro – Filtered bouncy slap-club groove, ~122 BPM. Kick+slap bass low-passed, just a pulse. Wide pads/organ swells, ultra-quiet oriental lead. Car honks already as distant stabs, crowd murmur+vinyl crackle = underground Balkan club. No lead yet, only FX/ad-libs.]
[Intro]
[Intro]

[Intro] C'est Hardcore Pop
([Crowd FX] - [low-passed club murmur, humid underground])
([Car Honk FX] - [syncopated beeps, wide, in tempo])
([Female Ad-lib] - [silky oriental „mmm-aaa“ glide, leads into prvu liniju])
([Sub-bass swell] - [vwoooom, 1-bar rise into first kick])
([Vinyl crackle] - [pftcrackle, low, constant])
([Distant club crowd] - [mmmrumm, filtered loop])
([Reverse sweep] - [whoooosh, cuts on verse downbeat])


---

[Verse 1 – Full slap-club beat drops: tight kick, short slap bass, snappy clap/snare, 1/8 hats with small rolls. Oriental pluck/zurna doubles accents. Honks+noise sweeps as ear candy. Vocal upfront, natural (no autotune), light comp, EQ, short plate. Constant dance bounce.]
[Verse 1]
Daj bejbe daj, da te provozam kroz kraj
([Ad-lib, chopped] - ["daj, daj, daj" u tempu, nisko])
Pa to zgas, dok smo high
([Hi-hat roll] - [tktktk triplets]) ([808 hit] - [boooom, kratki sub])
Malo sniff, malo blajv, bejbe
([Sniff FX] - [snff, kratko]) ([Air sweep] - [fshhhh, mekani sweep])
Daj spusti gard, digni suknju, skini klajn
([Vocal chop] - ["spusti, digni, skini" na off-beat])
Hajde klekni da ti dam, danas je tvoj srećan dan
([Kick+snare] - [boom-tchk naglasak]) ([Female FX] - [mmm, dah, kratki reverb])


---

[Chorus 1 – Hook diže energiju: bubanj/bass glasniji, organski stabovi na downbeat, oriental lead odgovara frazama. Honks+tire sweep naglašavaju “gas”. Stereo širi, vokal centar, čist.]
[Chorus]
Da da daj bejbe todaj gas
([Chant layer] - ["daj, daj, daj" stereo, tiho loop])
Digni suknju, skini klajn
([Tape stop] - [skrrr, half-speed dip pa povrat])
Daj mi parče guze da na njemu gram nacrtam
([Scratch FX] - [chk-chk-chk, u tempu])
Da budem lud i nasnifa po celu noć i ceo dan
([Delay vox] - ["ceo dan… noć i dan…" stereo delay])
Ne dam pare sve na ler
([Engine rev] - [vrrrroom, filtriran]) ([808 glide] - [woooob, slide akcenat])


---

[Verse 2 – Groove ostaje, varijacije u hatovima/fillovima. Bass pleše oko vokala. Oriental synth/pads drže atmosferu. Više glitch/phone FX oko “signal”, ali street-club mood zadržan.]
[Verse 2]
Upecela novi ge, pa na dozi me vozi mala
([Bounce ad-lib] - ["ey, ey" ritmički, panoramisano])
Ometala logike da nestaju iz tog signala
([Phone glitch FX] - [bzzzt, kratak])
Al' ta mala štetna kada getom šeta
([Steps on gravel] - [tptptp, tihi loop])
Pada svima meta, delikventna joj
([Gun cock FX] - [chk, veoma tiho])
Ona je smerala da nestanem ja iz tog stana
([Reverb throw] - ["nestanem, nestanem" dugo u pozadini])
Sve vreme me gledala, vrebala ko iguana
([Snake hiss] - [ssshhh, filtrirano])
Sebe je spremala, a vrebala bi igru grama
([Vocal chop] - ["igram, gram, gram" u groove-u])
Sve je po šemama, tu nema tebi, samo nama
([Choir pad] - [aaaaah, širok stereo 1 bar])


---

[Instrumental break – Pista u fokusu: bubanj+808+slap bass napred, acid/oriental hibrid lead vodi. Honks+tire screech kao ritmički udarci i riseri. Tenziја raste svaka 4 bara, bez praznina.]
[Instrumental]
([808 & kick solo] - [boom… boom-boom… boom, suvo, punchy])
([Acid lead riff] - [nyooo-nyooo, rezonanтно, u tonu])
([Hi-hat triplets] - [tktktk-tktktk, brzi rollovi])
([Risers & impacts] - [whooosh/DOOM, na 4-barski ciklus])


---

[Vocal chops – Hook edit deo: isječen lead kao perkusija. Puno stereo igre i delay-a, sve zaključano na slap groove.]
[Vocal chops]
([Chopped vox] - ["daj… bejbe… gas… gas…" isečeno, sekvencirano])
([Stutter FX] - ["noć… noć… noć svaku…" ritmički stutter])
([Formant-shifted vox] - ["ler… ler… ler" dublji ton, panoramisano])
([Delay ping-pong] - ["mala, mala, mala" L/R odjeci])


---

[Chorus 2 – Najveći hook: bubnjevi najjači, bass najdeblji, oriental lead melodičniji, honks+tire screech naglašavaju svaki “gas”. Dodatni backvoks za sing-along. Master mrvicu jači, mix i dalje čist.]
[Chorus]
Noć svaku dodaje gas,
šije, pije, bez kočnice
([Tire screech] - [skreeee, kratko, sidechain na kick])
Glumi da gubi glas,
Dok skidam joj šljokice
([Glitter shake FX] - [shhhh, kao štras/rattle, stereo])
Noć svaku dodaje gas,
šije, pij, bez kočnice
([Engine rev layered] - [vrrr-vrrr-vrrr, ritmički revs])
Glumi da gubi glas,
Dok skidam joj šljokice
([Breath FX, close] - [haaah, intiman dah]) ([Vocal chop] - ["gas, gas" u tempu])


---

[Outro – Groove se gasi ali puls drži do kraja. Polagan low-pass preko celog miksa; bubanj/bass blede, ostaju padovi+crackle. Zadnji car honk ili vinyl stop, finalni 808 tail u subu.]
[Outro]
([Low-pass sweep] - [fwooom, mix sve mutniji])
([Crowd fade-out] - [mmmrumm… sve tiše])
([Vinyl stop] - [skrrrt, kratko])
([Last 808 tail] - [boooooom, dugačak sub kraj])

---

([Crowd fade-out] - [mmmrumm… sve tiše])
([Vinyl stop] - [skrrrt, kratko])
([Last 808 tail] - [boooooom, dugačak sub kraj])

---

# hardcore_pop - Gazzzzz-- Hardcore_Pop_4
[DESCRIPTION]
bouny undeground slap club tech Turkish oriental pop ,  car honks, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Intro – Filtered bouncy slap-club groove, ~122 BPM. Kick+slap bass low-passed, just a pulse. Wide pads/organ swells, ultra-quiet oriental lead. Car honks already as distant stabs, crowd murmur+vinyl crackle = underground Balkan club. No lead yet, only FX/ad-libs.]
[Intro]
[Intro]

[Intro] C'est Hardcore Pop
([Crowd FX] - [low-passed club murmur, humid underground])
([Car Honk FX] - [syncopated beeps, wide, in tempo])
([Female Ad-lib] - [silky oriental „mmm-aaa“ glide, leads into prvu liniju])
([Sub-bass swell] - [vwoooom, 1-bar rise into first kick])
([Vinyl crackle] - [pftcrackle, low, constant])
([Distant club crowd] - [mmmrumm, filtered loop])
([Reverse sweep] - [whoooosh, cuts on verse downbeat])


---

[Verse 1 – Full slap-club beat drops: tight kick, short slap bass, snappy clap/snare, 1/8 hats with small rolls. Oriental pluck/zurna doubles accents. Honks+noise sweeps as ear candy. Vocal upfront, natural (no autotune), light comp, EQ, short plate. Constant dance bounce.]
[Verse 1]
Daj bejbe daj, da te provozam kroz kraj
([Ad-lib, chopped] - ["daj, daj, daj" u tempu, nisko])
Pa to zgas, dok smo high
([Hi-hat roll] - [tktktk triplets]) ([808 hit] - [boooom, kratki sub])
Malo sniff, malo blajv, bejbe
([Sniff FX] - [snff, kratko]) ([Air sweep] - [fshhhh, mekani sweep])
Daj spusti gard, digni suknju, skini klajn
([Vocal chop] - ["spusti, digni, skini" na off-beat])
Hajde klekni da ti dam, danas je tvoj srećan dan
([Kick+snare] - [boom-tchk naglasak]) ([Female FX] - [mmm, dah, kratki reverb])


---

[Chorus 1 – Hook diže energiju: bubanj/bass glasniji, organski stabovi na downbeat, oriental lead odgovara frazama. Honks+tire sweep naglašavaju “gas”. Stereo širi, vokal centar, čist.]
[Chorus]
Da da daj bejbe todaj gas
([Chant layer] - ["daj, daj, daj" stereo, tiho loop])
Digni suknju, skini klajn
([Tape stop] - [skrrr, half-speed dip pa povrat])
Daj mi parče guze da na njemu gram nacrtam
([Scratch FX] - [chk-chk-chk, u tempu])
Da budem lud i nasnifa po celu noć i ceo dan
([Delay vox] - ["ceo dan… noć i dan…" stereo delay])
Ne dam pare sve na ler
([Engine rev] - [vrrrroom, filtriran]) ([808 glide] - [woooob, slide akcenat])


---

[Verse 2 – Groove ostaje, varijacije u hatovima/fillovima. Bass pleše oko vokala. Oriental synth/pads drže atmosferu. Više glitch/phone FX oko “signal”, ali street-club mood zadržan.]
[Verse 2]
Upecela novi ge, pa na dozi me vozi mala
([Bounce ad-lib] - ["ey, ey" ritmički, panoramisano])
Ometala logike da nestaju iz tog signala
([Phone glitch FX] - [bzzzt, kratak])
Al' ta mala štetna kada getom šeta
([Steps on gravel] - [tptptp, tihi loop])
Pada svima meta, delikventna joj
([Gun cock FX] - [chk, veoma tiho])
Ona je smerala da nestanem ja iz tog stana
([Reverb throw] - ["nestanem, nestanem" dugo u pozadini])
Sve vreme me gledala, vrebala ko iguana
([Snake hiss] - [ssshhh, filtrirano])
Sebe je spremala, a vrebala bi igru grama
([Vocal chop] - ["igram, gram, gram" u groove-u])
Sve je po šemama, tu nema tebi, samo nama
([Choir pad] - [aaaaah, širok stereo 1 bar])


---

[Instrumental break – Pista u fokusu: bubanj+808+slap bass napred, acid/oriental hibrid lead vodi. Honks+tire screech kao ritmički udarci i riseri. Tenziја raste svaka 4 bara, bez praznina.]
[Instrumental]
([808 & kick solo] - [boom… boom-boom… boom, suvo, punchy])
([Acid lead riff] - [nyooo-nyooo, rezonanтно, u tonu])
([Hi-hat triplets] - [tktktk-tktktk, brzi rollovi])
([Risers & impacts] - [whooosh/DOOM, na 4-barski ciklus])


---

[Vocal chops – Hook edit deo: isječen lead kao perkusija. Puno stereo igre i delay-a, sve zaključano na slap groove.]
[Vocal chops]
([Chopped vox] - ["daj… bejbe… gas… gas…" isečeno, sekvencirano])
([Stutter FX] - ["noć… noć… noć svaku…" ritmički stutter])
([Formant-shifted vox] - ["ler… ler… ler" dublji ton, panoramisano])
([Delay ping-pong] - ["mala, mala, mala" L/R odjeci])


---

[Chorus 2 – Najveći hook: bubnjevi najjači, bass najdeblji, oriental lead melodičniji, honks+tire screech naglašavaju svaki “gas”. Dodatni backvoks za sing-along. Master mrvicu jači, mix i dalje čist.]
[Chorus]
Noć svaku dodaje gas,
šije, pije, bez kočnice
([Tire screech] - [skreeee, kratko, sidechain na kick])
Glumi da gubi glas,
Dok skidam joj šljokice
([Glitter shake FX] - [shhhh, kao štras/rattle, stereo])
Noć svaku dodaje gas,
šije, pij, bez kočnice
([Engine rev layered] - [vrrr-vrrr-vrrr, ritmički revs])
Glumi da gubi glas,
Dok skidam joj šljokice
([Breath FX, close] - [haaah, intiman dah]) ([Vocal chop] - ["gas, gas" u tempu])


---

[Outro – Groove se gasi ali puls drži do kraja. Polagan low-pass preko celog miksa; bubanj/bass blede, ostaju padovi+crackle. Zadnji car honk ili vinyl stop, finalni 808 tail u subu.]
[Outro]
([Low-pass sweep] - [fwooom, mix sve mutniji])
([Crowd fade-out] - [mmmrumm… sve tiše])
([Vinyl stop] - [skrrrt, kratko])
([Last 808 tail] - [boooooom, dugačak sub kraj])

# hardcore_pop - Gimme your Number_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
An 160 bpm uk organ bassline charva hypnotic underground house track , zurna, organ,80s synth, cowbells, ancient harp, car siren, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals, powerful beat

[Verse]

([Phone keypad] - beep-beep)

([Notification pop] - ping)

([Finger snap] - snap)

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_10
[DESCRIPTION]
140-160 bpm tech with bit of goa sultry mysterious

[LYRICS]
[Male - Verse 1]
padam boj nespokoj
To kao zadnji je fight
nesto boy neko tvoj
mi je omašio sprat

[Male - Verse 2]
sa njom je off road trip 
A ja pod dozom tip
često osetim
prošlosti mi srozali
tu si non stop ti 
kad su potopi
Pa me tada bleda gleda 
sneg sav bi da otopi

[Male - Bridge]
A tvoje telo bella celo sa telenovela
vrela polugola si mi u sred dana bela
sad me htela al prije to nije smela (nee)
zavela srela u tom lobiju hotela 

[Female - Hook]
Ko da tamom me umije ,umije on sve 
Zar da tako me ubije,sruši svetove
Zna da tako me ugrije, ruke njegove 
zadnju nadu mi ulije,uzmi evo me

[Male - Verse 3]
Pitam gde si nestala a ti otišla po cugu
Ti si tako nestvarna ali opet biram drugu
Vidim boje - vidim dugu 
palim petu redom pljugu 
bruku pertli u mom krugu 
ja podletim svakom drugu

[Male - Verse 4]
A ne treba ti mozak da sklopiš taj mozaik
sva si pogubna ko doza a ja ko pravi laik
Mene ne zanima poza ,ma samo mi to daji
bio sam vani od konza U tvorzi ko u odaji

A ja njoj ne verujem da na belom preterujem 
Pun klub flertuje a voli me to verujem
Guz nju neguje dupe ko da tu robuje
radim ja ko roba je,Sa mnom ko da na dopu je

[Male - Bridge]
A tvoje telo bella celo sa telenovela
vrelo polugola si mi u sred dana bela
sad me htela al prije to nije smela (nee)
zavela srela u tom lobiju hotela 

[Female - Hook]
Ko da tamom me umije ,umije on sve 
Zar da tako me ubije,sruši svetove
Zna da tako me ugrije, ruke njegove 
zadnju nadu mi ulije,uzmi evo me

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_10
[DESCRIPTION]
An energetic tech groove at 145 bpm, anchored by a punchy kick, rolling bass, and hypnotic offbeat hats. Goa influences enter via undulating acid synths and spiraling arps. Sultry, breathy vocal textures weave through deep pads and stuttering FX, creating a mysterious late-night atmosphere.

[LYRICS]
[Male - Verse 1]
padam boj nespokoj

zadnju nadu mi ulije,uzmi evo me

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_10
[DESCRIPTION]
A 155 BPM slap house track throbs with filthy, saturated sub-bass and punchy syncopated drums. Dark acid synths drive gritty melodies, while violin lines interlace with Arabic modal flourishes. Hypnotic, autotuned deep vocals glide over razor-sharp hats, risers, and an irresistible club groove.

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_10
[DESCRIPTION]
A 155 BPM slap house track throbs with filthy, saturated sub-bass and punchy syncopated drums. Dark acid synths drive gritty melodies, while violin lines interlace with Arabic modal flourishes. Hypnotic, autotuned deep vocals glide over razor-sharp hats, risers, and an irresistible club groove.

[LYRICS]
[Male - Verse 1]
padam boj nespokoj
To kao zadnji je fight
nesto boy neko tvoj
mi je omašio sprat

[Male - Verse 2]
sa njom je off road trip 
A ja pod dozom tip
često osetim
prošlosti mi srozali
tu si non stop ti 
kad su potopi
Pa me tada bleda gleda 
sneg sav bi da otopi

[Male - Bridge]
A tvoje telo bella celo sa telenovela
vrela polugola si mi u sred dana bela
sad me htela al prije to nije smela (nee)
zavela srela u tom lobiju hotela

[Female - Hook]
Ko da tamom me umije ,umije on sve 
Zar da tako me ubije,sruši svetove
Zna da tako me ugrije, ruke njegove 
zadnju nadu mi ulije,uzmi evo me

[Male - Verse 3]
Pitam gde si nestala,
 kaže pićem krije tugu
Ti si tako nestvarna,
 ali opet biram drugu
Vidim boje - vidim dugu 
palim petu redom pljuguu

[Male - Verse 4]
A ne treba ti mozak da sklopiš taj mozaik
sva si pogubna ko doza a ja ko pravi laik
Mene ne zanima poza ,ma samo mi to daji
bio sam vani od konza U tvorzi ko u odaji
A ja njoj ne verujem da na belom preterujem 
Pun klub flertuje a voli me to verujem
Guz nju neguje dupe ko da tu robuje
radim ja ko roba je,Sa mnom ko da na dopu je

[Male - Bridge]
A tvoje telo bella celo sa telenovela
vrelo polugola si mi u sred dana bela
sad me htela al prije to nije smela (nee)
zavela srela u tom lobiju hotela

[Female - Hook]
Ko da tamom me umije ,umije on sve 
Zar da tako me ubije,sruši svetove
Zar da tako me ubije,sruši svetove
Zna da tako me ugrije, ruke njegove 
zadnju nadu mi ulije,uzmi evo me

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_11
[DESCRIPTION]
A 155 BPM slap house track throbs with filthy, saturated sub-bass and punchy syncopated drums, Dark acid synths drive gritty melodies, while violin lines interlace with Arabic modal flourishes, Hypnotic, autotuned deep vocals glide over razor-sharp hats, risers, and an irresistible club groove,

[LYRICS]
[Male - Verse 1]
Rollie pepsi ima dipsi klizi viski belog pol
voli blesi da po sisi igra malo gola go
Oli mota white u rizli mila cima dima soke
a lepota moja ti si a ja kraljina of coke

[Male - Verse 2]
Mat Benz pun konja pesto turiram
a vez full tozla, mesto studiram
keš tu lova,često zumiram
presto kuliram , da poludi aludiram

[Male - Chorus]
Ona kush mi sushi,nema bolja šema
Puls mi ruši ,hiljadu problema
uši buši ,dijamanta šema 
lamele favela cela

[Male - Verse 3]
Menja sve dresove,a ja sam high
Mala smanjuje besove da ja sam taj
Dala sve svoje stresove ,mala sve daj
pala sve moje testove garant je kraj aj aj

[Male - Bridge]
Gle sata gle kola gle skanka što rolam
De manjka kontrola tu sanka se gola
gle brata mentola pa start ga patrola
i want samo lova sve ganc samo novacke

[Male - Chorus]
Sav sam fresh ,svež
ona skida donji veš
Mala smeš sve smeš
Ona kida bacam keš

[Male - Verse 4]
Pa pa panika kad se slika 
i bez trika skida to 
Ka kalinka ruska pička 
pada šminka istu noć
E moj prika još se šika 
Nikad crto likovno
al znam da crtam bro
i to baš predobro

[Male - Bridge]
ja sam željan tvog tela
sva ti goriš kao vatra
A tvoja je želja
Da ti radim to polako
kad je naša bleja
banuću sa ortakom
da nam stražu čuvaš
dok mi dimimo se skankom

[Male - Verse 5]
one vole belo to
a ja volim kurve te
svega baci na stoo
pa dovodim ih dve
lud sam sto posto
Na umu mi samo keš

[Male - Chorus]
Sve je sada prelako
moja banda Marakesh
Prošlo peto ljeto
ti si tu sa deckom
Ja sad krug
s korvetom
Dok tu sam 
s tetkom
i sa beretom

[Male - Verse 6]
naš ceo geto 
vas izrežeto sad
pistolero gun
brutto netto daj
torbe natrpaj
sveto mesto raj
pada češto gard

[Male - Bridge]
Šetnja kerova
Bruka lerova
Sto je smerova
gde bih ne znam ja
Obuo sam  patike
pa izuo te taktike 
Isti sve šablon klasike
A Cure vam od plastike
Dupe bez gimnastike
Lepše su mi kasirke

[Male - Verse 7]
U treši mi šuška 
belo pa đuskam 
ona je uska
u gepeku puška 
u pretincu njuška 
rakija kruška
Petica vutra 
pare ne sutra 
već sve sada 
i luda i mlada 
upoznala gada 
dama iz grada
i šmele iz kraja
a ja geto favele
mi linije bele 
biljke mi zrele 
pa berba je blizu
Peta u nizu 
Da ne treba vizu
pa ne trebam rizlu
i  ne  trebam kintu
ja ne trebam pičku
pa ne lažem priču
da polomim kičmu 
tom tvom banditu
dam ruku vaspitnu

---

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_11
[DESCRIPTION]
A 155 BPM slap house track powered by thick, dirty sub-bass and crisp syncopated percussion. Harsh acid synths deliver gritty, looping hooks while haunting violin lines weave Arabic modal runs. Autotuned deep vocals drift atop biting hi-hats, tension-lifting risers, and relentless club momentum.

[LYRICS]
[Male - Verse 1]
Rollie pepsi ima dipsi klizi viski belog pol
voli blesi da po sisi igra malo gola go

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_11 (Remastered)
[DESCRIPTION]
The slap house track hits at 155 BPM, anchored by a crunchy, saturated sub-bass and driving kick. Razor-sharp hi-hats and sudden risers punctuate the drops, while heavily autotuned deep vocals glide atop the groove, delivering a dark, electrifying and sultry club energy.

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_12
[DESCRIPTION]
Serbian Drill Banger (130-140 BPM)
Fast-paced variant emphasizing drill elements, Features aggressive 808 slides, rapid-fire hi-hats, and distorted bass,  melodies are fragmented and used sparingly as hooks, Vocals are heavily processed with aggressive flows and crew chants creating high energy

[LYRICS]
[Verse 1]
Open pivo zubom lav
ovo dzungla ja sam kalj
Mala high je ko zmaj
na sto stavi brda lajni
Sa postotkom punim kiblu
sto posto sa stokom sinus
votkom šotom po to vinu
Šinu bankinu krivinu

da su banuli žandari
zvali bi mi Natali (zvali bi mi natali)

vidi nije ovo šala

[DESCRIPTION]
A 155 BPM slap house track throbs with filthy, saturated sub-bass and punchy syncopated drums. Dark acid synths drive gritty melodies, while violin lines interlace with Arabic modal flourishes. Hypnotic, autotuned deep vocals glide over razor-sharp hats, risers, and an irresistible club groove.

Launching with pulsing bass and syncopated, slap-driven synth stabs, the 155 BPM slap house beat locks in underground energy. Razor-sharp hi-hats cut through with precision, paired with dark FX and percussive risers. The drops are explosive, cementing the track as an electrifying club weapon.

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_13
[DESCRIPTION]
A high-energy rap-slap house fusion driven by pulsating, rubbery basslines and infectious 4/4 beats. Hyper-processed vocals mix streetwise rap with sultry autotuned hooks over hypnotic synth layers and bouncy grooves. Deep bass drops, sharp electronic percussion, and shadowy club textures create a captivating, underground dancefloor anthem built for late-night party sessions.

[LYRICS]
Kuc kuc ko je
zove me šole
ove tvoje dole
Dole mole dijabole

a tu pun poen
ovo je boem
za lovu krojen
mala pijemo za troje

preko bluza njena guza ide sine gore dole
geto mandam ko jakuza kada zvone motorole
belo drama to infuza dama davala do zore
banda favela terore mala navela na fore

Ona blista čista
Mi ko dizel fidel kastro 
terorista ista
mi smo nato bliski istok
Ona poslala pismo
Da drugari više nismo

Da bi da me bari 
isto
i da bi da vari 
čisto
mala bi da skida stvari
hitro

nitro

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_16
[DESCRIPTION]
This slap house track pulses at 155 BPM with filthy, saturated sub-bass, punchy syncopated drums, and relentless, infectious grooves. Dark acid synths weave gritty melodies, punctuated by hypnotic, autotuned deep vocals layered over sharp hats and risers for an erotic, high-intensity club feel.

[LYRICS]
Male Vocals:

Verse:
Body heat, neon lights
Take what's mine tonight
No words, just skin
Let the chaos begin

Hook:
Harder, faster, lose your mind
Leave your conscience behind
Sweat and sin on the floor
Give me what I came here for

Female Vocals:

Verse:
Dirty bass, dirty games
Set my body up in flames
Don't stop, don't think
Push me to the brink

Hook:
Deeper, rougher, make me scream
Nothing's ever what it seems
Raw desire, pure control
Come and take my fucking soul

Bridge (Both):
No mercy, no escape
This is how we dominate
When the beat drops, we collide
Nothing left but sweat and pride

Outro:
Bass cuts deep, hearts race fast
Make this dirty moment last

Extended Verses:

Male Vocals:

Verse 2:
Cut the lights, feel the heat
Move your body to this beat
No games, just raw desire
Set this fucking floor on fire

Pre-Chorus:
Bass line crawling up your spine
Tonight you're fucking mine

Female Vocals:

Verse 2:
Hands up, lose yourself
Put your shame back on the shelf
Hard beats, harder touch
Give me everything you've got

Pre-Chorus:
Acid burns through every thought
Take the high that can't be bought

Call and Response:

Male: "Tell me what you want"
Female: "Everything and more"
Male: "Show me how you move"
Female: "Like a dirty whore"

Breakdown:
Both (whispered/autotuned):
Deeper... deeper... lose control
Harder... harder... sell your soul
Faster... faster... feel the rush
Nothing left but flesh and lust

Final Hook (Both):
When the sun comes up we're gone
But tonight we're fucking strong
Bass and sweat and skin collide
This is how we come alive

[Verse]
Body heat neon lights
Take what's mine tonight
No words just skin
Let the chaos begin

[Chorus]
Harder faster lose your mind
Leave your conscience behind
Sweat and sin on the floor
Begging screaming wanting more

[Verse 2]
Shadows dance on my spine
Heartbeats out of time
Eyes like fire they burn
No escape no return

[Prechorus]
Every breath a spark ignites
Darker edges sharper bites

[Chorus]
Harder faster lose your mind
Leave your conscience behind
Sweat and sin on the floor
Begging screaming wanting more

[Bridge]
Pulse like thunder crashing wild
Rules are broken exiled
The night swallows us whole
We surrender lose control

Continue, but make sure they brag about superficial thinga in a joking way

Got it — you want the continuation in the same **dark, lusty slap house / bass-heavy club vibe**, but now weaving in some **bragging about superficial things in a tongue-in-cheek, almost playful way** (so it doesn’t break the energy, but adds edge + humor). Here’s a draft continuation:
  
### Verse 3 (Male)
 
Gold chains swinging in the strobe, Fake designer, yeah, that’s my robe. VIP but I snuck inside, Bottle service just for the vibe.
 
### Verse 3 (Female)
 
Lip gloss shining under the lights, High heels killing, but it feels right. Bought this dress on a clearance rack, But tonight I’m serving million-dollar smack.
 
### Pre-Chorus (Both)
 
Flash the cash we don’t own, Plastic flex but we’re full-blown. Glitter lies and borrowed fame, Still we’re legends in this game.
 
### Chorus (Both)
 
Harder, faster, lose your mind, Leave your conscience far behind. Sweat and sin across the floor, Fake it rich, then beg for more.
 
### Bridge (Male/Female call-and-response)
 
*Male:* “Check my shades, they’re knock-off Dior.” *Female:* “My purse is fake, but I flaunt it more.” *Male:* “Rented car parked out the back.” *Female:* “But in this club we own the track!”
 
### Breakdown (Both, autotuned / whispered)
 
Cheap champagne, still it burns, Plastic jewels, but watch them turn. Status flex on credit debt, But this night ain’t over yet

Tonight you're fucking mine

**Female Vocals:**

*Verse 2:*
Hands up, lose yourself
Put your shame back on the shelf
Hard beats, harder touch
Give me everything you've got

*Pre-Chorus:*
Acid burns through every thought
Take the high that can't be bought

**Call and Response:**

*Male:* "Tell me what you want"
*Female:* "Everything and more"
*Male:* "Show me how you move"
*Female:* "Like a dirty whore"

**Breakdown:**
*Both (whispered/autotuned):*
Deeper... deeper... lose control
Harder... harder... sell your soul
Faster... faster... feel the rush
Nothing left but flesh and lust

**Final Hook (Both):**
When the sun comes up we're gone
But tonight we're fucking strong
Bass and sweat and skin collide
This is how we come alive

---

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_16
[DESCRIPTION]
This slap house track pulses at 155 BPM with filthy, saturated sub-bass, punchy syncopated drums, and relentless, infectious grooves. Dark acid synths weave gritty melodies, punctuated by hypnotic, autotuned deep vocals layered over sharp hats and risers for an erotic, high-intensity club feel.

[LYRICS]
**Male Vocals:**

*Verse:*
Body heat, neon lights
Take what's mine tonight
No words, just skin
Let the chaos begin

*Hook:*
Harder, faster, lose your mind
Leave your conscience behind
Sweat and sin on the floor
Give me what I came here for

**Female Vocals:**

*Verse:*
Dirty bass, dirty games
Set my body up in flames
Don't stop, don't think
Push me to the brink

*Hook:*
Deeper, rougher, make me scream
Nothing's ever what it seems
Raw desire, pure control
Come and take my fucking soul

**Bridge (Both):**
No mercy, no escape
This is how we dominate
When the beat drops, we collide
Nothing left but sweat and pride

**Outro:**
Bass cuts deep, hearts race fast
Make this dirty moment last


**Extended Verses:**

**Male Vocals:**

*Verse 2:*
Cut the lights, feel the heat
Move your body to this beat
No games, just raw desire
Set this fucking floor on fire

*Pre-Chorus:*
Bass line crawling up your spine
Tonight you're fucking mine

**Female Vocals:**

*Verse 2:*
Hands up, lose yourself
Put your shame back on the shelf
Hard beats, harder touch
Give me everything you've got

*Pre-Chorus:*
Acid burns through every thought
Take the high that can't be bought

**Call and Response:**

*Male:* "Tell me what you want"
*Female:* "Everything and more"
*Male:* "Show me how you move"
*Female:* "Like a dirty whore"

**Breakdown:**
*Both (whispered/autotuned):*
Deeper... deeper... lose control
Harder... harder... sell your soul
Faster... faster... feel the rush
Nothing left but flesh and lust

**Final Hook (Both):**
When the sun comes up we're gone
But tonight we're fucking strong
Bass and sweat and skin collide
This is how we come alive

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_17
[DESCRIPTION]
**Track Structure wi*Intro (140 BPM):**
Filtered sub-bass builds with minimal kick pattern
Dark acid synth stabs enter at 8 bars
Autotuned vocal teases: "Feel the heat..."

**Build-up (140→150 BPM):**
BPM ramps over 16 bars
Syncopated drums layer in
Sharp hats accelerate
Rising synth sweeps

**Drop 1 (155 BPM):**
Full saturated sub-bass hits
Punchy syncopated drum pattern locks
Gritty acid melody drives main hook
Deep autotuned vocals: "Lose control, take what's mine"

**Breakdown (145 BPM):**
Bass filters down
Minimal drum elements remain
Vocal chops scattered over atmosphere
Acid synth plays stripped melody

**Build 2 (145→155 BPM):**
Tension builds with risers
Percussion fills intensify
Vocal: "Harder, faster, feel the rush"
White noise sweeps

**Drop 2 (155 BPM):**
Heavier bass saturation
Additional percussion layers
Call-response vocal elements
Acid synth variations

**Outro (155→140 BPM):**
Elements strip away progressively
Bass filters to sub frequencies
Final voice burns out

[LYRICS]
---

Male — Verse (Serbian, Latin)
Telo gori, a tebi svaka čast
Uzmi šta je moje večeras
Nema reči, samo igramo u transu,
Nek' započne lom, napraviću haos

Male — Hook (Spanish)
Más fuerte, más rápido, pierde la razón
Deja la conciencia atrás
Sudor y pecado en la pista
Dame lo que vine a buscar

Female — Verse (French)
Basse sale, jeux malsains
Enflamme mon corps sans frein
N'arrête pas, ne réfléchis pas
Pousse-moi jusqu'au bord

Female — Hook (Italian)
Più profondo, più crudo, fammi urlare
Niente è ciò che sembra
Desiderio puro, controllo assoluto
Vieni a prenderti la mia anima

Bridge (Both) — German
Keine Gnade, kein Entkommen
So dominieren wir den Raum
Wenn der Beat fällt, kollidieren wir
Nur Schweiß und Stolz verbleiben

Outro — Portuguese (pt-BR)
O grave corta fundo, corações aceleram
Faça este momento sujo durar

Male — Verse 2 (Russian)
Выключи свет, почувствуй жар
Подвигай телом в такт этому биту
Никаких игр, только сырое желание
Поджечь этот грёбаный пол

Male — Pre-Chorus (Turkish)
Bas hattı omurgana tırmanıyor
Bu gece sen tamamen benim olacaksın

Female — Verse 2 (Arabic)
يَدّيك فوق، اتركي نفسك
ضعي خجلك على الرف
إيقاعات قوية ولمسات أقسى
أعطني كل ما عندك

Female — Pre-Chorus (Dutch)
Zuur brandt door elke gedachte
Pak die roes die niet te koop is

Call & Response — Japanese (romaji)
Male: “Anata wa nani ga hoshii? Itte.”
Female: “Subete to motto.”
Male: “Dō ugoku ka misete.”
Female: “Yogoreta onna no yō ni.”

Breakdown (Both — whispered/autotuned) — Swedish
Djupare... djupare... tappa kontrollen
Hårdare... hårdare... sälj din själ
Snabbare... snabbare... känn rusets dunk
Inget kvar än kött och lust

Final Hook (Both) — Romanian
Când răsare soarele plecăm
Dar azi-noapte suntem puternici din greu
Basul, transpirația și pielea se ciocnesc
Așa ne trezim la viață

Male — Serbian (Latin, Verse 3)  
Znoj mi kaplje niz vrat
Srce lupa, top, puca kao rat
Ove noći svako mi je brat,
Skačemo zajedno Kinez Rumun pa i Bugar čak,
Vozi taj Moli, Audija prstenje
Rad nogama kao pod da je vruće kestenje,



Ova noć je naš proklet put  
  
  
---  
  
Male — Spanish (Hook 2)  
Rómpelo, súbelo, no mires atrás  
El pecado nos va a salvar  
Entre luces y sudor  
No hay nada más que dolor y amor  
  
  
---  
  
Female — French (Verse 3)  
Des ombres glissent sur ma peau  
Chaque battement est trop chaud  
Tes yeux brûlent comme du feu  
Pas de retour, pas d’adieu  
  
  
---  
  
Female — Italian (Hook 2)  
Stringimi forte, fammi male  
Dentro questo ritmo animale  
Paura e piacere si confondono  
Nel buio insieme ci nascondono  
  
  
---  
  
Bridge (Both) — German  
Schlag auf Schlag, die Nacht zerbricht  
Wir sind das Feuer, das alles vernicht’  
Kein Morgen, keine Pflicht  
Nur Begierde im Gesicht  
  
  
---  
  
Outro — Portuguese (pt-BR)  
No caos a gente se encontra  
Na batida tudo desmonta  
Desejo cru, suor no ar  
Essa loucura vai queimar  
  
  
---  
  
Male — Russian (Verse 3)  
Тени танцуют на моём лице  
Сердце рвётся в этом кольце  
Ночь без правил, ночь без сна  
Здесь решает только темнота  
  
  
---  
  
Male — Turkish (Pre-Chorus 2)  
Ritmin ateşi içimi sarar  
Bu gece sınır yok, karar yok  
Her adımda zincirler kırılır  
Karanlıkta özgür kalır  
  
  
---  
  
Female — Arabic (Verse 3)  
صوتك نار، يذوبني  
كل نبضة تجرحني  
في العتمة نختفي  
والشهوة تحرقني  
  
  
---  
  
Female — Dutch (Pre-Chorus 2)  
Donker bloed in elke slag  
Verlies jezelf in deze dag  
Rook en lichten, niets is echt  
Laat de nacht je stelen weg  
  
  
---  
  
Call & Response — Japanese (romaji)  
Male: “Ore wa kimi no yume kanaeru.”  
Female: “Watashi wa uso de mo kamaenai.”  
Male: “Yoru wa eien ni tsuzuku.”  
Female: “Kono karada wa kimi no mono.”  
  
  
---  
  
Breakdown — Swedish (whispered/autotuned)  
Andas in… andas ut… allt försvinner  
Huden brinner… begäret vinner  
Basen slår… blodet rusar  
Allt som finns… är vi som krossar  
  
  
---  
  
Final Hook — Romanian  
Sub lumina lunii dansăm  
Fără reguli, doar ardem acum  
Trup și suflet, un ritual  
În noaptea asta ești mortal  
  
  
--

Telo gori, a tebi svaka čast
Uzmi šta je moje večeras
Nema reči, samo igramo u transu,
Nek' započne lom, napraviću haos

Male — Hook (Spanish)
Más fuerte, más rápido, pierde la razón
Deja la conciencia atrás
Sudor y pecado en la pista
Dame lo que vine a buscar

Female — Verse (French)
Basse sale, jeux malsains
Enflamme mon corps sans frein
N'arrête pas, ne réfléchis pas
Pousse-moi jusqu'au bord

Female — Hook (Italian)
Più profondo, più crudo, fammi urlare
Niente è ciò che sembra
Desiderio puro, controllo assoluto
Vieni a prenderti la mia anima

Bridge (Both) — German
Keine Gnade, kein Entkommen
So dominieren wir den Raum
Wenn der Beat fällt, kollidieren wir
Nur Schweiß und Stolz verbleiben

Outro — Portuguese (pt-BR)
O grave corta fundo, corações aceleram
Faça este momento sujo durar

Male — Verse 2 (Russian)
Выключи свет, почувствуй жар
Подвигай телом в такт этому биту
Никаких игр, только сырое желание
Поджечь этот грёбаный пол

Male — Pre-Chorus (Turkish)
Bas hattı omurgana tırmanıyor
Bu gece sen tamamen benim olacaksın

Female — Verse 2 (Arabic)
يَدّيك فوق، اتركي نفسك
ضعي خجلك على الرف
إيقاعات قوية ولمسات أقسى
أعطني كل ما عندك

Female — Pre-Chorus (Dutch)
Zuur brandt door elke gedachte
Pak die roes die niet te koop is

Call & Response — Japanese (romaji)
Male: “Anata wa nani ga hoshii? Itte.”
Female: “Subete to motto.”
Male: “Dō ugoku ka misete.”
Female: “Yogoreta onna no yō ni.”

Breakdown (Both — whispered/autotuned) — Swedish
Djupare... djupare... tappa kontrollen
Hårdare... hårdare... sälj din själ
Snabbare... snabbare... känn rusets dunk
Inget kvar än kött och lust

Final Hook (Both) — Romanian
Când răsare soarele plecăm
Dar azi-noapte suntem puternici din greu
Basul, transpirația și pielea se ciocnesc
Așa ne trezim la viață

Male — Serbian (Latin, Verse 3)  
Znoj mi kaplje niz vrat
Srce lupa, top, puca kao rat
Ove noći svako mi je brat,
Skačemo zajedno Kinez Rumun pa i Bugar čak,
Vozi taj Moli, Audija prstenje
Rad nogama kao pod da je vruće kestenje,



Ova noć je naš proklet put  
  
  
---  
  
Male — Spanish (Hook 2)  
Rómpelo, súbelo, no mires atrás  
El pecado nos va a salvar  
Entre luces y sudor  
No hay nada más que dolor y amor  
  
  
---  
  
Female — French (Verse 3)  
Des ombres glissent sur ma peau  
Chaque battement est trop chaud  
Tes yeux brûlent comme du feu  
Pas de retour, pas d’adieu  
  
  
---  
  
Female — Italian (Hook 2)  
Stringimi forte, fammi male  
Dentro questo ritmo animale  
Paura e piacere si confondono  
Nel buio insieme ci nascondono  
  
  
---  
  
Bridge (Both) — German  
Schlag auf Schlag, die Nacht zerbricht  
Wir sind das Feuer, das alles vernicht’  
Kein Morgen, keine Pflicht  
Nur Begierde im Gesicht  
  
  
---  
  
Outro — Portuguese (pt-BR)  
No caos a gente se encontra  
Na batida tudo desmonta  
Desejo cru, suor no ar  
Essa loucura vai queimar  
  
  
---  
  
Male — Russian (Verse 3)  
Тени танцуют на моём лице  
Сердце рвётся в этом кольце  
Ночь без правил, ночь без сна  
Здесь решает только темнота  
  
  
---  
  
Male — Turkish (Pre-Chorus 2)  
Ritmin ateşi içimi sarar  
Bu gece sınır yok, karar yok  
Her adımda zincirler kırılır  
Karanlıkta özgür kalır  
  
  
---  
  
Female — Arabic (Verse 3)  
صوتك نار، يذوبني  
كل نبضة تجرحني  
في العتمة نختفي  
والشهوة تحرقني  
  
  
---  
  
Female — Dutch (Pre-Chorus 2)  
Donker bloed in elke slag  
Verlies jezelf in deze dag  
Rook en lichten, niets is echt  
Laat de nacht je stelen weg  
  
  
---  
  
Call & Response — Japanese (romaji)  
Male: “Ore wa kimi no yume kanaeru.”  
Female: “Watashi wa uso de mo kamaenai.”  
Male: “Yoru wa eien ni tsuzuku.”  
Female: “Kono karada wa kimi no mono.”  
  
  
---  
  
Breakdown — Swedish (whispered/autotuned)  
Andas in… andas ut… allt försvinner  
Huden brinner… begäret vinner  
Basen slår… blodet rusar  
Allt som finns… är vi som krossar  
  
  
---  
  
Final Hook — Romanian  
Sub lumina lunii dansăm  
Fără reguli, doar ardem acum  
Trup și suflet, un ritual  
În noaptea asta ești mortal  
  
  
--

---

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_17
[DESCRIPTION]
*Intro (140 BPM):**
Filtered sub-bass builds with minimal kick pattern
Dark acid synth stabs enter at 8 bars
Autotuned vocal teases: "Feel the heat..."

**Build-up (140→150 BPM):**
BPM ramps over 16 bars
Syncopated drums layer in
Sharp hats accelerate
Rising synth sweeps

**Drop 1 (155 BPM):**
Full saturated sub-bass hits
Punchy syncopated drum pattern locks
Gritty acid melody drives main hook
Deep autotuned vocals: "Lose control, take what's mine"

**Breakdown (145 BPM):**
Bass filters down
Minimal drum elements remain
Vocal chops scattered over atmosphere
Acid synth plays stripped melody

**Build 2 (145→155 BPM):**
Tension builds with risers
Percussion fills intensify
Vocal: "Harder, faster, feel the rush"
White noise sweeps

**Drop 2 (155 BPM):**
Heavier bass saturation
Additional percussion layers
Call-response vocal elements
Acid synth variations

**Outro (155→140 BPM):**
Elements strip away progressively
Bass filters to sub frequencies
Final vocal this is how we come alive", fade

[LYRICS]
---

Male — Verse (Serbian, Latin)
Telo gori, a tebi svaka čast
Uzmi šta je moje večeras
Nema reči, samo igramo u transu,
Nek' započne lom, napraviću haos

Male — Hook (Spanish)
Más fuerte, más rápido, pierde la razón
Deja la conciencia atrás
Sudor y pecado en la pista
Dame lo que vine a buscar

Female — Verse (French)
Basse sale, jeux malsains
Enflamme mon corps sans frein
N'arrête pas, ne réfléchis pas
Pousse-moi jusqu'au bord

Female — Hook (Italian)
Più profondo, più crudo, fammi urlare
Niente è ciò che sembra
Desiderio puro, controllo assoluto
Vieni a prenderti la mia anima

Bridge (Both) — German
Keine Gnade, kein Entkommen
So dominieren wir den Raum
Wenn der Beat fällt, kollidieren wir
Nur Schweiß und Stolz verbleiben

Outro — Portuguese (pt-BR)
O grave corta fundo, corações aceleram
Faça este momento sujo durar

Male — Verse 2 (Russian)
Выключи свет, почувствуй жар
Подвигай телом в такт этому биту
Никаких игр, только сырое желание
Поджечь этот грёбаный пол

ضعي خجلك على الرف
إيقاعات قوية ولمسات أقسى
أعطني كل ما عندك

Female — Pre-Chorus (Dutch)
Zuur brandt door elke gedachte
Pak die roes die niet te koop is

Call & Response — Japanese (romaji)
Male: “Anata wa nani ga hoshii? Itte.”
Female: “Subete to motto.”
Male: “Dō ugoku ka misete.”
Female: “Yogoreta onna no yō ni.”

Breakdown (Both — whispered/autotuned) — Swedish
Djupare... djupare... tappa kontrollen
Hårdare... hårdare... sälj din själ
Snabbare... snabbare... känn rusets dunk
Inget kvar än kött och lust

Final Hook (Both) — Romanian

Dar azi-noapte suntem puternici din greu
Basul, transpirația și pielea se ciocnesc
Așa ne trezim la viață

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_18
[DESCRIPTION]
Intro (140 BPM):
Filtered sub-bass and minimal kick set a dark tone.
Autotuned vocal teases: "Feel the heat..."

Build-up (140 → 150 BPM):
BPM increases over 16 bars.
Syncopated drums and sharp hats layer in.
Rising acid synth sweeps add tension.

Drop 1 (155 BPM):
Saturated sub-bass and punchy drums lock in.
Gritty acid melody drives the main hook.
Deep autotuned vocals: "Lose control, take what's mine."

Breakdown (145 BPM):
Bass filters down.
Minimal drums and vocal chops create atmosphere.
Stripped acid synth plays haunting melody.

Build 2 (145 → 155 BPM):
Tension builds with risers and white noise sweeps.
Percussion fills intensify.
Vocal: "Harder, faster, feel the rush."

Drop 2 (155 BPM):
Heavier bass saturation and additional percussion.
Call-response vocal elements.
Acid synth variations.

Outro (155 → 140 BPM):
Elements strip away progressively.
Bass filters to sub frequencies.
Final vocal: "This is how we come alive," fading out.

This structure emphasizes groove, tension

[LYRICS]
---

Male — Verse (Serbian, Latin)
Telo gori, a tebi svaka čast
Uzmi šta je moje večeras
Nema reči, samo igramo u transu,
Nek' započne lom, napraviću haos

Male — Hook (Spanish)
Más fuerte, más rápido, pierde la razón
Deja la conciencia atrás
Sudor y pecado en la pista
Dame lo que vine a buscar

Female — Verse (French)
Basse sale, jeux malsains
Enflamme mon corps sans frein
N'arrête pas, ne réfléchis pas
Pousse-moi jusqu'au bord

Female — Hook (Italian)
Più profondo, più crudo, fammi urlare
Niente è ciò che sembra
Desiderio puro, controllo assoluto
Vieni a prenderti la mia anima

Bridge (Both) — German
Keine Gnade, kein Entkommen
So dominieren wir den Raum
Wenn der Beat fällt, kollidieren wir
Nur Schweiß und Stolz verbleiben
Versus I
Corpus sub luminibus neon sudat,
pulsus altus per venas resonat.
Manus tangunt, oculi ignes fovent,
nox nos regit, ardor leges superat.

Versus II
Veni, stringe me, fac ut cedeam,
vis acer per artus currit.
Subsonus infra terram tremit,
ignis in pectore continenter crescit.

Outro — Portuguese (pt-BR)
O grave corta fundo, corações aceleram
Faça este momento sujo durar

Male — Verse 2 (Russian)
Выключи свет, почувствуй жар
Подвигай телом в такт этому биту
Никаких игр, только сырое желание
Поджечь этот грёбаный пол

Male — Pre-Chorus (Turkish)
Bas hattı omurgana tırmanıyor
Bu gece sen tamamen benim olacaksın

Female — Verse 2 (Arabic)
يَدّيك فوق، اتركي نفسك
ضعي خجلك على الرف
إيقاعات قوية ولمسات أقسى
أعطني كل ما عندك

Concursus
Profundius, saevior, clama,
veritas lateat, somnia fallunt.
Desiderium ferox animas devorat,
tenebrae et lux in uno coeunt.

Exitus
Nulla misericordia, nulla fuga,
sub ictu pulsus nos collidit.
Pulsus noctis supremus remanet,
hoc momentum sacrum et damnatum est.

Female — Pre-Chorus (Dutch)
Zuur brandt door elke gedachte
Pak die roes die niet te koop is

Call & Response — Japanese (romaji)
Male: “Anata wa nani ga hoshii? Itte.”
Female: “Subete to motto.”
Male: “Dō ugoku ka misete.”
Female: “Yogoreta onna no yō ni.”

Breakdown (Both — whispered/autotuned) — Swedish
Djupare... djupare... tappa kontrollen
Hårdare... hårdare... sälj din själ
Snabbare... snabbare... känn rusets dunk
Inget kvar än kött och lust

Final Hook (Both) — Romanian
Când răsare soarele plecăm
Dar azi-noapte suntem puternici din greu
Basul, transpirația și pielea se ciocnesc
Așa ne trezim la viață

Male — Serbian (Latin, Verse 3)  
Znoj mi kaplje niz vrat
Srce lupa, top, puca kao rat
Ove noći svako mi je brat,
Skačemo zajedno Kinez Rumun pa i Bugar čak,
Vozi taj Moli, Audija prstenje
Rad nogama kao pod da je vruće kestenje,

Female — Italian (Hook 2)  
Stringimi forte, fammi male  
Dentro questo ritmo animale  
Paura e piacere si confondono  
Nel buio insieme ci nascondono  
  
  
---  
  
Bridge (Both) — German  
Schlag auf Schlag, die Nacht zerbricht  
Wir sind das Feuer, das alles vernicht’  
Kein Morgen, keine Pflicht  
Nur Begierde im Gesicht  
  
  
---  
  
Outro — Portuguese (pt-BR)  
No caos a gente se encontra  
Na batida tudo desmonta  
Desejo cru, suor no ar  
Essa loucura vai queimar  
  
  
---  
  
Male — Russian (Verse 3)  
Тени танцуют на моём лице  
Сердце рвётся в этом кольце  
Ночь без правил, ночь без сна  
Здесь решает только темнота  
  
  
---  
  
Male — Turkish (Pre-Chorus 2)  
Ritmin ateşi içimi sarar  
Bu gece sınır yok, karar yok  
Her adımda zincirler kırılır  
Karanlıkta özgür kalır  
  
  
---  
  
Female — Arabic (Verse 3)  
صوتك نار، يذوبني  
كل نبضة تجرحني  
في العتمة نختفي  
والشهوة تحرقني  
  
  
---  
  
Female — Dutch (Pre-Chorus 2)  
Donker bloed in elke slag  
Verlies jezelf in deze dag  
Rook en lichten, niets is echt  
Laat de nacht je stelen weg  
  
  
---  
  
Call & Response — Japanese (romaji)  
Male: “Ore wa kimi no yume kanaeru.”  
Female: “Watashi wa uso de mo kamaenai.”  
Male: “Yoru wa eien ni tsuzuku.”  
Female: “Kono karada wa kimi no mono.”  
  
  
---  
  
Breakdown — Swedish (whispered/autotuned)  
Andas in… andas ut… allt försvinner  
Huden brinner… begäret vinner  
Basen slår… blodet rusar  
Allt som finns… är vi som krossar  
  
  
---  
  
Final Hook — Romanian  
Sub lumina lunii dansăm  
Fără reguli, doar ardem acum  
Trup și suflet, un ritual  
În noaptea asta ești mortal  
  
  
--

---

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_18
[DESCRIPTION]
*Intro (140 BPM):**
Filtered sub-bass builds with minimal kick pattern
Dark acid synth stabs enter at 8 bars
Autotuned vocal teases: "Feel the heat..."

**Build-up (140→150 BPM):**
BPM ramps over 16 bars
Syncopated drums layer in
Sharp hats accelerate
Rising synth sweeps

**Drop 1 (155 BPM):**
Full saturated sub-bass hits
Punchy syncopated drum pattern locks
Gritty acid melody drives main hook
Deep autotuned vocals: "Lose control, take what's mine"

**Breakdown (145 BPM):**
Bass filters down
Minimal drum elements remain
Vocal chops scattered over atmosphere
Acid synth plays stripped melody

**Build 2 (145→155 BPM):**
Tension builds with risers
Percussion fills intensify
Vocal: "Harder, faster, feel the rush"
White noise sweeps

**Drop 2 (155 BPM):**
Heavier bass saturation
Additional percussion layers
Call-response vocal elements
Acid synth variations

**Outro (155→140 BPM):**
Elements strip away progressively
Bass filters to sub frequencies
Final vocal this is how we come alive", fade

[LYRICS]
---

Male — Verse (Serbian, Latin)
Telo gori, a tebi svaka čast
Uzmi šta je moje večeras
Nema reči, samo igramo u transu,
Nek' započne lom, napraviću haos

Male — Hook (Spanish)
Más fuerte, más rápido, pierde la razón
Deja la conciencia atrás
Sudor y pecado en la pista
Dame lo que vine a buscar

Female — Verse (French)
Basse sale, jeux malsains
Enflamme mon corps sans frein
N'arrête pas, ne réfléchis pas
Pousse-moi jusqu'au bord

Female — Hook (Italian)
Più profondo, più crudo, fammi urlare
Niente è ciò che sembra
Desiderio puro, controllo assoluto
Vieni a prenderti la mia anima

Bridge (Both) — German
Keine Gnade, kein Entkommen
So dominieren wir den Raum
Wenn der Beat fällt, kollidieren wir
Nur Schweiß und Stolz verbleiben
Versus I
Corpus sub luminibus neon sudat,
pulsus altus per venas resonat.
Manus tangunt, oculi ignes fovent,
nox nos regit, ardor leges superat.

Versus II
Veni, stringe me, fac ut cedeam,
vis acer per artus currit.
Subsonus infra terram tremit,
ignis in pectore continenter crescit.

Outro — Portuguese (pt-BR)
O grave corta fundo, corações aceleram
Faça este momento sujo durar

Male — Verse 2 (Russian)
Выключи свет, почувствуй жар
Подвигай телом в такт этому биту
Никаких игр, только сырое желание
Поджечь этот грёбаный пол

Male — Pre-Chorus (Turkish)
Bas hattı omurgana tırmanıyor
Bu gece sen tamamen benim olacaksın

Female — Verse 2 (Arabic)
يَدّيك فوق، اتركي نفسك
ضعي خجلك على الرف
إيقاعات قوية ولمسات أقسى
أعطني كل ما عندك

Concursus
Profundius, saevior, clama,
veritas lateat, somnia fallunt.
Desiderium ferox animas devorat,
tenebrae et lux in uno coeunt.

Exitus
Nulla misericordia, nulla fuga,
sub ictu pulsus nos collidit.
Pulsus noctis supremus remanet,
hoc momentum sacrum et damnatum est.

Female — Pre-Chorus (Dutch)
Zuur brandt door elke gedachte
Pak die roes die niet te koop is

Call & Response — Japanese (romaji)
Male: “Anata wa nani ga hoshii? Itte.”
Female: “Subete to motto.”
Male: “Dō ugoku ka misete.”
Female: “Yogoreta onna no yō ni.”

Breakdown (Both — whispered/autotuned) — Swedish
Djupare... djupare... tappa kontrollen
Hårdare... hårdare... sälj din själ
Snabbare... snabbare... känn rusets dunk
Inget kvar än kött och lust

Final Hook (Both) — Romanian
Când răsare soarele plecăm
Dar azi-noapte suntem puternici din greu
Basul, transpirația și pielea se ciocnesc
Așa ne trezim la viață

Male — Serbian (Latin, Verse 3)  
Znoj mi kaplje niz vrat
Srce lupa, top, puca kao rat
Ove noći svako mi je brat,
Skačemo zajedno Kinez Rumun pa i Bugar čak,
Vozi taj Moli, Audija prstenje
Rad nogama kao pod da je vruće kestenje,



Ova noć je naš proklet put  
  
  
---  
  
Male — Spanish (Hook 2)  
Rómpelo, súbelo, no mires atrás  
El pecado nos va a salvar  
Entre luces y sudor  
No hay nada más que dolor y amor  
  
  
---  
  
Female — French (Verse 3)  
Des ombres glissent sur ma peau  
Chaque battement est trop chaud  
Tes yeux brûlent comme du feu  
Pas de retour, pas d’adieu

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_18
[DESCRIPTION]
Intro (140 BPM):
Filtered sub-bass and minimal kick set a dark tone.
Autotuned vocal teases: "Feel the heat..."

Build-up (140 → 150 BPM):
BPM increases over 16 bars.
Syncopated drums and sharp hats layer in.
Rising acid synth sweeps add tension.

Drop 1 (155 BPM):
Saturated sub-bass and punchy drums lock in.
Gritty acid melody drives the main hook.
Deep autotuned vocals: "Lose control, take what's mine."

Breakdown (145 BPM):
Bass filters down.
Minimal drums and vocal chops create atmosphere.
Stripped acid synth plays haunting melody.

Build 2 (145 → 155 BPM):
Tension builds with risers and white noise sweeps.
Percussion fills intensify.
Vocal: "Harder, faster, feel the rush."

Drop 2 (155 BPM):
Heavier bass saturation and additional percussion.
Call-response vocal elements.
Acid synth variations.

Outro (155 → 140 BPM):
Elements strip away progressively.
Bass filters to sub frequencies.
Final vocal: "This is how we come alive," fading out.

This structure emphasizes groove, tension

[LYRICS]
---

Male — Verse (Serbian, Latin)
Telo gori, a tebi svaka čast
Uzmi šta je moje večeras
Nema reči, samo igramo u transu,

Vieni a prenderti la mia anima

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_18
[DESCRIPTION]
