Filtered sub-bass builds with minimal kick pattern
Dark acid synth stabs enter at 8 bars
Autotuned vocal teases: "Feel the heat..."

**Build-up (140→150 BPM):**
BPM ramps over 16 bars
Syncopated drums layer in
Sharp hats accelerate
Rising synth sweeps

**Drop 1 (155 BPM):**
Full saturated sub-bass hits
Punchy syncopated drum pattern locks
Gritty acid melody drives main hook
Deep autotuned vocals: "Lose control, take what's mine"

**Breakdown (145 BPM):**
Bass filters down
Minimal drum elements remain
Vocal chops scattered over atmosphere
Acid synth plays stripped melody

**Build 2 (145→155 BPM):**
Tension builds with risers
Percussion fills intensify
Vocal: "Harder, faster, feel the rush"
White noise sweeps

**Drop 2 (155 BPM):**
Heavier bass saturation
Additional percussion layers
Call-response vocal elements
Acid synth variations

**Outro (155→140 BPM):**
Elements strip away progressively
Bass filters to sub frequencies
Final vocal this is how we come alive", fade

[LYRICS]
---

Male — Verse (Serbian, Latin)
Telo gori, a tebi svaka čast
Uzmi šta je moje večeras
Nema reči, samo igramo u transu,
Nek' započne lom, napraviću haos

Male — Hook (Spanish)
Más fuerte, más rápido, pierde la razón
Deja la conciencia atrás
Sudor y pecado en la pista
Dame lo que vine a buscar

Female — Verse (French)
Basse sale, jeux malsains
Enflamme mon corps sans frein
N'arrête pas, ne réfléchis pas
Pousse-moi jusqu'au bord

Female — Hook (Italian)
Più profondo, più crudo, fammi urlare
Niente è ciò che sembra
Desiderio puro, controllo assoluto
Vieni a prenderti la mia anima

Bridge (Both) — German
Keine Gnade, kein Entkommen
So dominieren wir den Raum
Wenn der Beat fällt, kollidieren wir
Nur Schweiß und Stolz verbleiben
Versus I
Corpus sub luminibus neon sudat,
pulsus altus per venas resonat.
Manus tangunt, oculi ignes fovent,
nox nos regit, ardor leges superat.

Versus II
Veni, stringe me, fac ut cedeam,
vis acer per artus currit.
Subsonus infra terram tremit,
ignis in pectore continenter crescit.

Outro — Portuguese (pt-BR)
O grave corta fundo, corações aceleram
Faça este momento sujo durar

Male — Verse 2 (Russian)
Выключи свет, почувствуй жар
Подвигай телом в такт этому биту
Никаких игр, только сырое желание
Поджечь этот грёбаный пол

Male — Pre-Chorus (Turkish)
Bas hattı omurgana tırmanıyor
Bu gece sen tamamen benim olacaksın

Female — Verse 2 (Arabic)
يَدّيك فوق، اتركي نفسك
ضعي خجلك على الرف
إيقاعات قوية ولمسات أقسى
أعطني كل ما عندك

Concursus
Profundius, saevior, clama,
veritas lateat, somnia fallunt.
Desiderium ferox animas devorat,
tenebrae et lux in uno coeunt.

Exitus
Nulla misericordia, nulla fuga,
sub ictu pulsus nos collidit.
Pulsus noctis supremus remanet,
hoc momentum sacrum et damnatum est.

Female — Pre-Chorus (Dutch)
Zuur brandt door elke gedachte
Pak die roes die niet te koop is

Call & Response — Japanese (romaji)
Male: “Anata wa nani ga hoshii? Itte.”
Female: “Subete to motto.”
Male: “Dō ugoku ka misete.”
Female: “Yogoreta onna no yō ni.”

Breakdown (Both — whispered/autotuned) — Swedish
Djupare... djupare... tappa kontrollen
Hårdare... hårdare... sälj din själ
Snabbare... snabbare... känn rusets dunk
Inget kvar än kött och lust

Final Hook (Both) — Romanian
Când răsare soarele plecăm
Dar azi-noapte suntem puternici din greu
Basul, transpirația și pielea se ciocnesc
Așa ne trezim la viață

Male — Serbian (Latin, Verse 3)  
Znoj mi kaplje niz vrat
Srce lupa, top, puca kao rat
Ove noći svako mi je brat,
Skačemo zajedno Kinez Rumun pa i Bugar čak,
Vozi taj Moli, Audija prstenje
Rad nogama kao pod da je vruće kestenje,



Ova noć je naš proklet put  
  
  
---  
  
Male — Spanish (Hook 2)  
Rómpelo, súbelo, no mires atrás  
El pecado nos va a salvar  
Entre luces y sudor  
No hay nada más que dolor y amor  
  
  
---  
  
Female — French (Verse 3)  
Des ombres glissent sur ma peau  
Chaque battement est trop chaud  
Tes yeux brûlent comme du feu  
Pas de retour, pas d’adieu  
  
  
---  
  
Female — Italian (Hook 2)  
Stringimi forte, fammi male  
Dentro questo ritmo animale  
Paura e piacere si confondono  
Nel buio insieme ci nascondono  
  
  
---  
  
Bridge (Both) — German  
Schlag auf Schlag, die Nacht zerbricht  
Wir sind das Feuer, das alles vernicht’  
Kein Morgen, keine Pflicht  
Nur Begierde im Gesicht  
  
  
---  
  
Outro — Portuguese (pt-BR)  
No caos a gente se encontra  
Na batida tudo desmonta  
Desejo cru, suor no ar  
Essa loucura vai queimar  
  
  
---  
  
Male — Russian (Verse 3)  
Тени танцуют на моём лице  
Сердце рвётся в этом кольце  
Ночь без правил, ночь без сна  
Здесь решает только темнота  
  
  
---  
  
Male — Turkish (Pre-Chorus 2)  
Ritmin ateşi içimi sarar  
Bu gece sınır yok, karar yok  
Her adımda zincirler kırılır  
Karanlıkta özgür kalır  
  
  
---  
  
Female — Arabic (Verse 3)  
صوتك نار، يذوبني  
كل نبضة تجرحني  
في العتمة نختفي  
والشهوة تحرقني  
  
  
---  
  
Female — Dutch (Pre-Chorus 2)  
Donker bloed in elke slag  
Verlies jezelf in deze dag  
Rook en lichten, niets is echt  
Laat de nacht je stelen weg  
  
  
---  
  
Call & Response — Japanese (romaji)  
Male: “Ore wa kimi no yume kanaeru.”  
Female: “Watashi wa uso de mo kamaenai.”  
Male: “Yoru wa eien ni tsuzuku.”  
Female: “Kono karada wa kimi no mono.”  
  
  
---  
  
Breakdown — Swedish (whispered/autotuned)  
Andas in… andas ut… allt försvinner  
Huden brinner… begäret vinner  
Basen slår… blodet rusar  
Allt som finns… är vi som krossar  
  
  
---  
  
Final Hook — Romanian  
Sub lumina lunii dansăm  
Fără reguli, doar ardem acum  
Trup și suflet, un ritual  
În noaptea asta ești mortal  
  
  
--

---

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_19
[DESCRIPTION]
Intro (140 BPM):
Filtered sub-bass and minimal kick set a dark tone.
Autotuned vocal teases: "Feel the heat..."

Build-up (140 → 150 BPM):
BPM increases over 16 bars.
Syncopated drums and sharp hats layer in.
Rising acid synth sweeps add tension.

Drop 1 (155 BPM):
Saturated sub-bass and punchy drums lock in.
Gritty acid melody drives the main hook.
Deep autotuned vocals: "Lose control, take what's mine."

Breakdown (145 BPM):
Bass filters down.
Minimal drums and vocal chops create atmosphere.
Stripped acid synth plays a haunting melody.

Build 2 (145 → 155 BPM):
Tension builds with risers and white noise sweeps.
Percussion fills intensify.
Vocal: "Harder, faster, feel the rush."

Drop 2 (155 BPM):
Heavier bass saturation and additional percussion.
Call-response vocal elements.
Acid synth variations.

Outro (155 → 140 BPM):
Elements strip away progressively.
Bass filters to sub frequencies.
Final vocal: "This is how we come alive," fading out.

[LYRICS]
[Serbian Male – Verse 3]
Znoj mi kaplje niz vrat
Srce lupa, top, puca kao rat
Ove noći svako mi je brat,
Skačemo zajedno Kinez Rumun pa i Bugar čak,
Vozi taj Moli, Audija prstenje
Rad nogama kao pod da je vruće kestenje,

[Spanish Male – Hook 2]
Rómpelo, súbelo, no mires atrás
El pecado nos va a salvar
Entre luces y sudor
No hay nada más que dolor y amor

[French Female – Verse 3]
Des ombres glissent sur ma peau
Chaque battement est trop chaud
Tes yeux brûlent comme du feu
Pas de retour, pas d’adieu

[Italian Female – Hook 2]
Stringimi forte, fammi male
Dentro questo ritmo animale
Paura e piacere si confondono
Nel buio insieme ci nascondono

[German Bridge (Both)]
Schlag auf Schlag, die Nacht zerbricht
Wir sind das Feuer, das alles vernicht’
Kein Morgen, keine Pflicht
Nur Begierde im Gesicht

[Portuguese Outro (pt-BR)]
No caos a gente se encontra
Na batida tudo desmonta
Desejo cru, suor no ar
Essa loucura vai queimar

[Russian Male – Verse 3]
Тени танцуют на моём лице
Сердце рвётся в этом кольце
Ночь без правил, ночь без сна
Здесь решает только темнота

[Turkish Male – Pre-Chorus 2]
Ritmin ateşi içimi sarar
Bu gece sınır yok, karar yok
Her adımda zincirler kırılır
Karanlıkta özgür kalır

[Arabic Female – Verse 3]
صوتك نار، يذوبني
كل نبضة تجرحني
في العتمة نختفي
والشهوة تحرقني

[Dutch Female – Pre-Chorus 2]

Verlies jezelf in deze dag
Rook en lichten, niets is echt
Laat de nacht je stelen weg

[Japanese Call & Response (romaji)]
Male: “Ore wa kimi no yume kanaeru.”
Female: “Watashi wa uso de mo kamaenai.”
Male: “Yoru wa eien ni tsuzuku.”
Female: “Kono karada wa kimi no mono.”

[Swedish Breakdown (Both – whispered/autotuned)]
Andas in… andas ut… allt försvinner
Huden brinner… begäret vinner
Basen slår… blodet rusar
Allt som finns… är vi som krossar

[Romanian Final Hook (Both)]
Sub lumina lunii dansăm
Fără reguli, doar ardem acum
Trup și suflet, un ritual
În noaptea asta ești mortal

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_2
[DESCRIPTION]
The track fuses tech-house and UK drill, driven by deep 808s and rapid, stuttering hi-hats atop rumbling, distorted rolling basslines. Eerie cyborg synths float throughout, underlining verses with pitch-shifted robotic autotune vocals. Explosive drops unleash waves of low-end bass punch, maintaining relentless club intensity.

[LYRICS]
Nisam poznatiji ko priest 
Al’ me nemoj zvati pop
u Banji  morfijumov list
sam sadio za dop

Pa Poneo sam paks
popeo na bajs
došao u studio 
A tamo aqua house 

Sjebao sam sebe 
onim što sam video 
stvari pokvašene
i to sve sa frižderom

Pa ulazim u plovilo
tako mogu prići 
al nas je poplavilo
pluta popići 

al kad sam ugledao preludog Volovskog 
bilo mi je drago, sami Bog mi ga je poslo
govorim mu brate,Rešavaj nam ove cevi
jer nam plivaju po studiju ajkule, leševi

Brate nemoj ništa da me pitaš,tužno odgovori Coaš
Jer sam ih ja i sjebo jebem,li ti kolač
malo sam precenio svojeg posla znanje
cev je pukla poplavio Šoji sam imanje

Šreća mi je bila što je došo i Koluči 
ispade sto dinara mu pa da zaroni odluči

---

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_2
[DESCRIPTION]
The track fuses tech-house and UK drill, driven by deep 808s and rapid, stuttering hi-hats atop rumbling, distorted rolling basslines. Eerie cyborg synths float throughout, underlining verses with pitch-shifted robotic autotune vocals. Explosive drops unleash waves of low-end bass punch, maintaining relentless club intensity.

[LYRICS]
Nisam poznatiji ko priest 
Al’ me nemoj zvati pop
u Banji  morfijumov list
sam sadio za dop

Pa Poneo sam paks
popeo na bajs
došao u studio 
A tamo aqua house 

Sjebao sam sebe 
onim što sam video 
stvari pokvašene
i to sve sa frižderom

Pa ulazim u plovilo
tako mogu prići 
al nas je poplavilo
pluta popići 

al kad sam ugledao preludog Volovskog 
bilo mi je drago, sami Bog mi ga je poslo
govorim mu brate,Rešavaj nam ove cevi
jer nam plivaju po studiju ajkule, leševi

Brate nemoj ništa da me pitaš,tužno odgovori Coaš
Jer sam ih ja i sjebo jebem,li ti kolač
malo sam precenio svojeg posla znanje
cev je pukla poplavio Šoji sam imanje

Šreća mi je bila što je došo i Koluči 
ispade sto dinara mu pa da zaroni odluči

---

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_20
[DESCRIPTION]
Intro (140 BPM):
Filtered sub-bass pulses beneath a minimal kick, setting a dark tone. Autotuned vocal teases: "Feel the heat..."

Build-up (140 → 150 BPM):
BPM ramps over 16 bars. Syncopated drums and sharp hats layer in. Rising acid synth sweeps add tension.

Drop 1 (155 BPM):
Full saturated sub-bass hits. Punchy syncopated drum pattern locks. Gritty acid melody drives main hook. Deep autotuned vocals: "Lose control, take what's mine."

Breakdown (145 BPM):
Bass filters down. Minimal drum elements remain. Vocal chops scattered over atmosphere. Acid synth plays stripped melody.

Build 2 (145 → 155 BPM):
Tension builds with risers. Percussion fills intensify. Vocal: "Harder, faster, feel the rush." White noise sweeps.

Drop 2 (155 BPM):
Heavier bass saturation. Additional percussion layers. Call-response vocal elements. Acid synth variations.

Outro (155 → 140 BPM):
Elements strip away progressively. Bass filters to sub frequencies. Final vocal: "This is how we come alive," fading out.

[LYRICS]
---

Male — Verse (Serbian, Latin)
Telo gori, a tebi svaka čast
Uzmi šta je moje večeras
Nema reči, samo igramo u transu,
Nek' započne lom, napraviću haos

Male — Hook (Spanish)

Deja la conciencia atrás
Sudor y pecado en la pista
Dame lo que vine a buscar

Female — Verse (French)

Enflamme mon corps sans frein
N'arrête pas, ne réfléchis pas
Pousse-moi jusqu'au bord

Female — Hook (Italian)

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_20
[DESCRIPTION]

Filtered sub-bass pulses beneath a minimal kick, setting a dark tone. Autotuned vocal teases: "Feel the heat..."

Build-up (140 → 150 BPM):
BPM ramps over 16 bars. Syncopated drums and sharp hats layer in. Rising acid synth sweeps add tension.

Drop 1 (155 BPM):
Full saturated sub-bass hits. Punchy syncopated drum pattern locks. Gritty acid melody drives main hook. Deep autotuned vocals: "Lose control, take what's mine."

Breakdown (145 BPM):
Bass filters down. Minimal drum elements remain. Vocal chops scattered over atmosphere. Acid synth plays stripped melody.

Build 2 (145 → 155 BPM):
Tension builds with risers. Percussion fills intensify. Vocal: "Harder, faster, feel the rush." White noise sweeps.

Drop 2 (155 BPM):
Heavier bass saturation. Additional percussion layers. Call-response vocal elements. Acid synth variations.

Outro (155 → 140 BPM):
Elements strip away progressively. Bass filters to sub frequencies. Final vocal: "This is how we come alive," fading out.

[LYRICS]
---

Male — Verse (Serbian, Latin)
Telo gori, a tebi svaka čast
Uzmi šta je moje večeras
Nema reči, samo igramo u transu,
Nek' započne lom, napraviću haos

Male — Hook (Spanish)
Más fuerte, más rápido, pierde la razón
Deja la conciencia atrás
Sudor y pecado en la pista
Dame lo que vine a buscar

Female — Verse (French)
Basse sale, jeux malsains
Enflamme mon corps sans frein
N'arrête pas, ne réfléchis pas
Pousse-moi jusqu'au bord

Female — Hook (Italian)
Più profondo, più crudo, fammi urlare
Niente è ciò che sembra
Desiderio puro, controllo assoluto
Vieni a prenderti la mia anima

Bridge (Both) — German
Keine Gnade, kein Entkommen
So dominieren wir den Raum
Wenn der Beat fällt, kollidieren wir
Nur Schweiß und Stolz verbleiben
Versus I
Corpus sub luminibus neon sudat,
pulsus altus per venas resonat.
Manus tangunt, oculi ignes fovent,
nox nos regit, ardor leges superat.

Versus II
Veni, stringe me, fac ut cedeam,
vis acer per artus currit.
Subsonus infra terram tremit,
ignis in pectore continenter crescit.

Outro — Portuguese (pt-BR)
O grave corta fundo, corações aceleram
Faça este momento sujo durar

Male — Verse 2 (Russian)
Выключи свет, почувствуй жар
Подвигай телом в такт этому биту
Никаких игр, только сырое желание
Поджечь этот грёбаный пол

Male — Pre-Chorus (Turkish)
Bas hattı omurgana tırmanıyor
Bu gece sen tamamen benim olacaksın

Female — Verse 2 (Arabic)
يَدّيك فوق، اتركي نفسك
ضعي خجلك على الرف
إيقاعات قوية ولمسات أقسى
أعطني كل ما عندك

Concursus
Profundius, saevior, clama,
veritas lateat, somnia fallunt.
Desiderium ferox animas devorat,
tenebrae et lux in uno coeunt.

Exitus
Nulla misericordia, nulla fuga,
sub ictu pulsus nos collidit.
Pulsus noctis supremus remanet,
hoc momentum sacrum et damnatum est.

Female — Pre-Chorus (Dutch)
Zuur brandt door elke gedachte
Pak die roes die niet te koop is

Call & Response — Japanese (romaji)
Male: “Anata wa nani ga hoshii? Itte.”
Female: “Subete to motto.”
Male: “Dō ugoku ka misete.”
Female: “Yogoreta onna no yō ni.”

Breakdown (Both — whispered/autotuned) — Swedish
Djupare... djupare... tappa kontrollen
Hårdare... hårdare... sälj din själ
Snabbare... snabbare... känn rusets dunk
Inget kvar än kött och lust

Final Hook (Both) — Romanian
Când răsare soarele plecăm
Dar azi-noapte suntem puternici din greu
Basul, transpirația și pielea se ciocnesc
Așa ne trezim la viață

Male — Serbian (Latin, Verse 3)  
Znoj mi kaplje niz vrat
Srce lupa, top, puca kao rat
Ove noći svako mi je brat,
Skačemo zajedno Kinez Rumun pa i Bugar čak,
Vozi taj Moli, Audija prstenje
Rad nogama kao pod da je vruće kestenje,
  
---  
  
Male — Spanish (Hook 2)  
Rómpelo, súbelo, no mires atrás  
El pecado nos va a salvar  
Entre luces y sudor  
No hay nada más que dolor y amor  
  
  
---  
  
Female — French (Verse 3)  
Des ombres glissent sur ma peau  
Chaque battement est trop chaud  
Tes yeux brûlent comme du feu  
Pas de retour, pas d’adieu  
  
  
---  
  
Female — Italian (Hook 2)  
Stringimi forte, fammi male  
Dentro questo ritmo animale  
Paura e piacere si confondono  
Nel buio insieme ci nascondono  
  
  
---  
  
Bridge (Both) — German  
Schlag auf Schlag, die Nacht zerbricht  
Wir sind das Feuer, das alles vernicht’  
Kein Morgen, keine Pflicht  
Nur Begierde im Gesicht  
  
  
---  
  
Outro — Portuguese (pt-BR)  
No caos a gente se encontra  
Na batida tudo desmonta  
Desejo cru, suor no ar  
Essa loucura vai queimar  
  
  
---  
  
Male — Russian (Verse 3)  
Тени танцуют на моём лице  
Сердце рвётся в этом кольце  
Ночь без правил, ночь без сна  
Здесь решает только темнота  
  
  
---  
  
Male — Turkish (Pre-Chorus 2)  
Ritmin ateşi içimi sarar  
Bu gece sınır yok, karar yok  
Her adımda zincirler kırılır  
Karanlıkta özgür kalır  
  
  
---  
  
Female — Arabic (Verse 3)  
صوتك نار، يذوبني  
كل نبضة تجرحني  
في العتمة نختفي  
والشهوة تحرقني  
  
  
---  
  
Female — Dutch (Pre-Chorus 2)  
Donker bloed in elke slag  
Verlies jezelf in deze dag  
Rook en lichten, niets is echt  
Laat de nacht je stelen weg  
  
  
---  
  
Call & Response — Japanese (romaji)  
Male: “Ore wa kimi no yume kanaeru.”  
Female: “Watashi wa uso de mo kamaenai.”  
Male: “Yoru wa eien ni tsuzuku.”  
Female: “Kono karada wa kimi no mono.”  
  
  
---  
  
Breakdown — Swedish (whispered/autotuned)  
Andas in… andas ut… allt försvinner  
Huden brinner… begäret vinner  
Basen slår… blodet rusar  
Allt som finns… är vi som krossar  
  
  
---  
  
Final Hook — Romanian  
Sub lumina lunii dansăm  
Fără reguli, doar ardem acum  
Trup și suflet, un ritual  
În noaptea asta ești mortal  
  
  
--

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_20
[DESCRIPTION]
This slap house track pulses at 155 BPM with filthy, saturated sub-bass, punchy syncopated drums, and relentless, infectious grooves. Dark acid synths weave gritty melodies, punctuated by hypnotic, autotuned deep vocals layered over sharp hats and risers for an erotic, high-intensity club feel.

[LYRICS]
[Serbian Male – Verse 3]
Znoj mi kaplje niz vrat
Srce lupa, top, puca kao rat
Ove noći svako mi je brat,
Skačemo zajedno Kinez Rumun pa i Bugar čak,
Vozi taj Moli, Audija prstenje
Rad nogama kao pod da je vruće kestenje,

[Spanish Male – Hook 2]
Rómpelo, súbelo, no mires atrás
El pecado nos va a salvar
Entre luces y sudor
No hay nada más que dolor y amor

[French Female – Verse 3]
Des ombres glissent sur ma peau
Chaque battement est trop chaud
Tes yeux brûlent comme du feu
Pas de retour, pas d’adieu

[Italian Female – Hook 2]
Stringimi forte, fammi male
Dentro questo ritmo animale
Paura e piacere si confondono
Nel buio insieme ci nascondono

[German Bridge (Both)]
Schlag auf Schlag, die Nacht zerbricht
Wir sind das Feuer, das alles vernicht’
Kein Morgen, keine Pflicht
Nur Begierde im Gesicht

[Portuguese Outro (pt-BR)]
No caos a gente se encontra
Na batida tudo desmonta
Desejo cru, suor no ar
Essa loucura vai queimar

[Russian Male – Verse 3]
Тени танцуют на моём лице
Сердце рвётся в этом кольце
Ночь без правил, ночь без сна
Здесь решает только темнота

[Turkish Male – Pre-Chorus 2]
Ritmin ateşi içimi sarar
Bu gece sınır yok, karar yok
Her adımda zincirler kırılır
Karanlıkta özgür kalır

[Arabic Female – Verse 3]

كل نبضة تجرحني
في العتمة نختفي
والشهوة تحرقني

[Dutch Female – Pre-Chorus 2]

Verlies jezelf in deze dag
Rook en lichten, niets is echt

pulsus altus per venas resonat.

nox nos regit, ardor leges superat.

Versus II
Veni, stringe me, fac ut cedeam,
vis acer per artus currit.
Subsonus infra terram tremit,
ignis in pectore continenter crescit.

Outro — Portuguese (pt-BR)
O grave corta fundo, corações aceleram
Faça este momento sujo durar

Male — Verse 2 (Russian)
Выключи свет, почувствуй жар
Подвигай телом в такт этому биту
Никаких игр, только сырое желание
Поджечь этот грёбаный пол

Male — Pre-Chorus (Turkish)
Bas hattı omurgana tırmanıyor
Bu gece sen tamamen benim olacaksın

Female — Verse 2 (Arabic)
يَدّيك فوق، اتركي نفسك
ضعي خجلك على الرف
إيقاعات قوية ولمسات أقسى
أعطني كل ما عندك

Concursus
Profundius, saevior, clama,
veritas lateat, somnia fallunt.
Desiderium ferox animas devorat,
tenebrae et lux in uno coeunt.

Exitus
Nulla misericordia, nulla fuga,
sub ictu pulsus nos collidit.
Pulsus noctis supremus remanet,
hoc momentum sacrum et damnatum est.

Female — Pre-Chorus (Dutch)
Zuur brandt door elke gedachte
Pak die roes die niet te koop is

Call & Response — Japanese (romaji)
Male: “Anata wa nani ga hoshii? Itte.”
Female: “Subete to motto.”
Male: “Dō ugoku ka misete.”
Female: “Yogoreta onna no yō ni.”

Breakdown (Both — whispered/autotuned) — Swedish
Djupare... djupare... tappa kontrollen
Hårdare... hårdare... sälj din själ
Snabbare... snabbare... känn rusets dunk
Inget kvar än kött och lust

Final Hook (Both) — Romanian
Când răsare soarele plecăm
Dar azi-noapte suntem puternici din greu
Basul, transpirația și pielea se ciocnesc
Așa ne trezim la viață

Male — Serbian (Latin, Verse 3)  
Znoj mi kaplje niz vrat
Srce lupa, top, puca kao rat
Ove noći svako mi je brat,
Skačemo zajedno Kinez Rumun pa i Bugar čak,
Vozi taj Moli, Audija prstenje
Rad nogama kao pod da je vruće kestenje,
  
---  
  
Male — Spanish (Hook 2)  
Rómpelo, súbelo, no mires atrás  
El pecado nos va a salvar  
Entre luces y sudor  
No hay nada más que dolor y amor  
  
  
---  
  
Female — French (Verse 3)  
Des ombres glissent sur ma peau  
Chaque battement est trop chaud  
Tes yeux brûlent comme du feu  
Pas de retour, pas d’adieu  
  
  
---  
  
Female — Italian (Hook 2)  
Stringimi forte, fammi male  
Dentro questo ritmo animale  
Paura e piacere si confondono  
Nel buio insieme ci nascondono  
  
  
---  
  
Bridge (Both) — German  
Schlag auf Schlag, die Nacht zerbricht  
Wir sind das Feuer, das alles vernicht’  
Kein Morgen, keine Pflicht  
Nur Begierde im Gesicht  
  
  
---  
  
Outro — Portuguese (pt-BR)  
No caos a gente se encontra  
Na batida tudo desmonta  
Desejo cru, suor no ar  
Essa loucura vai queimar  
  
  
---  
  
Male — Russian (Verse 3)  
Тени танцуют на моём лице  
Сердце рвётся в этом кольце  
Ночь без правил, ночь без сна  
Здесь решает только темнота  
  
  
---  
  
Male — Turkish (Pre-Chorus 2)  
Ritmin ateşi içimi sarar  
Bu gece sınır yok, karar yok  
Her adımda zincirler kırılır  
Karanlıkta özgür kalır  
  
  
---  
  
Female — Arabic (Verse 3)  
صوتك نار، يذوبني  
كل نبضة تجرحني  
في العتمة نختفي  
والشهوة تحرقني  
  
  
---  
  
Female — Dutch (Pre-Chorus 2)  
Donker bloed in elke slag  
Verlies jezelf in deze dag  
Rook en lichten, niets is echt  
Laat de nacht je stelen weg  
  
  
---  
  
Call & Response — Japanese (romaji)  
Male: “Ore wa kimi no yume kanaeru.”  
Female: “Watashi wa uso de mo kamaenai.”  
Male: “Yoru wa eien ni tsuzuku.”  
Female: “Kono karada wa kimi no mono.”  
  
  
---  
  
Breakdown — Swedish (whispered/autotuned)  
Andas in… andas ut… allt försvinner  
Huden brinner… begäret vinner  
Basen slår… blodet rusar  
Allt som finns… är vi som krossar  
  
  
---  
  
Final Hook — Romanian  
Sub lumina lunii dansăm  
Fără reguli, doar ardem acum  
Trup și suflet, un ritual  
În noaptea asta ești mortal  
  
  
--

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_23
[DESCRIPTION]
This slap house track pulses at 155 BPM with filthy, saturated sub-bass, punchy syncopated drums, and relentless, infectious grooves. Dark acid synths weave gritty melodies, punctuated by hypnotic, autotuned deep vocals layered over sharp hats and risers for an erotic, high-intensity club feel.

[LYRICS]
---

Male — Verse (Serbian, Latin)
Telo gori, a tebi svaka čast
Uzmi šta je moje večeras
Nema reči, samo igramo u transu,
Nek' započne lom, napraviću haos

Male — Hook (Spanish)
Más fuerte, más rápido, pierde la razón
Deja la conciencia atrás
Sudor y pecado en la pista
Dame lo que vine a buscar

Female — Verse (French)
Basse sale, jeux malsains
Enflamme mon corps sans frein
N'arrête pas, ne réfléchis pas
Pousse-moi jusqu'au bord

Female — Hook (Italian)
Più profondo, più crudo, fammi urlare
Niente è ciò che sembra
Desiderio puro, controllo assoluto
Vieni a prenderti la mia anima

Bridge (Both) — German
Keine Gnade, kein Entkommen
So dominieren wir den Raum
Wenn der Beat fällt, kollidieren wir
Nur Schweiß und Stolz verbleiben
Versus I
Corpus sub luminibus neon sudat,
pulsus altus per venas resonat.
Manus tangunt, oculi ignes fovent,
nox nos regit, ardor leges superat.

Versus II
Veni, stringe me, fac ut cedeam,
vis acer per artus currit.
Subsonus infra terram tremit,
ignis in pectore continenter crescit.

Outro — Portuguese (pt-BR)

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_24
[DESCRIPTION]
A 155 BPM slap house track throbs with filthy, saturated sub-bass and punchy syncopated drums. Dark acid synths drive gritty melodies, while violin lines interlace with Arabic modal flourishes. Hypnotic, autotuned deep vocals glide over razor-sharp hats, risers, and an irresistible club groove.

[LYRICS]
[Male - Verse - Spanish]
El cuerpo arde, y para ti todo el honor
Toma lo que es mío esta noche
No hay palabras, solo jugamos en trance,
Que comience la ruptura, haré caos

[Female - Verse - Italian]
Bassi sporchi, giochi malvagi
Accendi il mio corpo senza freni
Non fermarti, non pensare
Spingimi fino all'orlo

[Male - Hook - Spanish]
Más fuerte, más rápido, pierde la razón
Deja la conciencia atrás
Sudor y pecado en la pista
Dame lo que vine a buscar

[Female - Hook - Italian]
Più profondo, più crudo, fammi urlare
Niente è ciò che sembra
Desiderio puro, controllo assoluto
Vieni a prenderti la mia anima

[Male - Verse - German]
Schalte das Licht aus, spür die Hitze
Bewege deinen Körper im Takt dieses Beats
Keine Spiele, nur rohe Begierde
Diese verdammte Tanzfläche in Brand setzen

[Female - Pre-Chorus - Swedish]
Baslinjen klättrar upp längs din ryggrad
I kväll kommer du helt att bli min

[Male - Verse - Japanese]
San ga kangei no subete o yakitsukusu
Ureru kono yoidore o tsukande

[Female - Hook - Italian]
Stringimi forte, fammi male
Dentro questo ritmo animale
Paura e piacere si confondono
Nel buio insieme ci nascondono

[Bridge - Both - German]
Schlag auf Schlag, die Nacht zerbricht
Wir sind das Feuer, das alles vernicht'
Kein Morgen, keine Pflicht
Nur Begierde im Gesicht

[Male - Verse - Swedish]
Din röst är eld, den smälter mig
Varje puls sårar mig
I mörkret försvinner vi
Och lusten bränner mig

[Female - Pre-Chorus - German]
Im Mondlicht tanzen wir
Ohne Regeln, nur jetzt brennen wir
Körper und Seele, ein Ritual
In dieser Nacht bist du tödlich

[Call & Response - Japanese]
Male: "Anata wa nani ga hoshii? Itte."
Female: "Subete to motto."
Male: "Dō ugoku ka misete."
Female: "Yogoreta onna no yō ni."

[Breakdown - Both - Swedish]
Djupare... djupare... tappa kontrollen
Hårdare... hårdare... sälj din själ
Snabbare... snabbare... känn rusets dunk
Inget kvar än kött och lust

[Final Hook - Both - German]
Wenn die Sonne aufgeht, gehen wir
Aber heute Nacht sind wir aus dem Nichts stark
Der Bass, der Schweiß und die Haut kollidieren
So erwachen wir zum Leben

[Outro - Italian]
Il basso taglia in profondità, i cuori accelerano
Fai durare questo momento sporco

---

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_25
[DESCRIPTION]
Intro (140 BPM):
Filtered sub-bass and minimal kick set a dark tone, Autotuned vocal teases: "Feel the heat, "

Build-up (140 → 150 BPM):
BPM increases over 16 bars, Syncopated drums and sharp hats layer in, Rising acid synth sweeps add tension, Drop 1 (155 BPM):
Saturated sub-bass and punchy drums lock in, Gritty acid melody drives the main hook, Deep autotuned vocals: "Lose control, take what's mine, "

Breakdown (145 BPM):
Bass filters down, Minimal drums and vocal chops create atmosphere, Stripped acid synth plays a haunting melody, Build 2 (145 → 155 BPM):
Tension builds with risers and white noise sweeps, Percussion fills intensify, Vocal: "Harder, faster, feel the rush, "

Drop 2 (155 BPM):
Heavier bass saturation and additional percussion, Call-response vocal elements, Acid synth variations, Outro (155 → 140 BPM):
Elements strip away progressively, Bass filters to sub frequencies, Final vocal: "This is how we come alive, "

[LYRICS]
[Male - Verse - Spanish]
El cuerpo arde, y para ti todo el honor
Toma lo que es mío esta noche
No hay palabras, solo jugamos en trance,
Que comience la ruptura, haré caos

[Female - Verse - Italian]
Bassi sporchi, giochi malvagi
Accendi il mio corpo senza freni
Non fermarti, non pensare
Spingimi fino all'orlo

[Male - Hook - Spanish]

Deja la conciencia atrás
Sudor y pecado en la pista
Dame lo que vine a buscar

[Female - Hook - Italian]

Niente è ciò che sembra

Vieni a prenderti la mia anima

Wir sind das Feuer, das alles vernicht'
Kein Morgen, keine Pflicht
Nur Begierde im Gesicht

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_25 (Extend)
[DESCRIPTION]
Intro (140 BPM):
Filtered sub-bass and minimal kick set a dark tone, Autotuned vocal teases: "Feel the heat, "

Build-up (140 → 150 BPM):
BPM increases over 16 bars, Syncopated drums and sharp hats layer in, Rising acid synth sweeps add tension, Drop 1 (155 BPM):
Saturated sub-bass and punchy drums lock in, Gritty acid melody drives the main hook, Deep autotuned vocals: "Lose control, take what's mine, "

Breakdown (145 BPM):
Bass filters down, Minimal drums and vocal chops create atmosphere, Stripped acid synth plays haunting melody, Build 2 (145 → 155 BPM):
Tension builds with risers and white noise sweeps, Percussion fills intensify, Vocal: "Harder, faster, feel the rush, "

Drop 2 (155 BPM):
Heavier bass saturation and additional percussion, Call-response vocal elements, Acid synth variations, Outro (155 → 140 BPM):
Elements strip away progressively, Bass filters to sub frequencies, Final vocal: "This is how we come alive, " fading out, This structure emphasizes groove, tensio

[LYRICS]
[Male - Verse - Spanish]
El cuerpo arde, y para ti todo el honor
Toma lo que es mío esta noche
No hay palabras, solo jugamos en trance,
Que comience la ruptura, haré caos

Snabbare... snabbare... känn rusets dunk

[Outro - Italian]
Il basso taglia in profondità, i cuori accelerano
Fai durare questo momento sporco

[Male - Verse - Spanish]
La noche nos consume, sin dirección
Tu piel contra la mía, tentación
El ritmo nos controla, sin escapar
En este infierno, quiero quedar

[Female - Pre-Chorus - German]
Die Flamme brennt, wir verlieren uns
Keine Grenzen, nur Euphorie und Fluss
Jeder Berührung, ein neuer Rausch
Bis zum Morgen, nur dein Laut

[Male - Hook - Italian]
Più alto, più folle, fino all'alba
Niente domani, solo ora ci accende
Ombre e corpi che si confondono
In questa danza che non finisce

[Female - Verse - Swedish]
Mörkret omsluter oss, vi andas som ett
Hjärtan slår i takt, inget mer finns kvar
Varje rörelse ett löfte om extas
I detta ögonblick, vi är evigheten

[Male - Pre-Chorus - Japanese]
Yoru ga akete mo, watashi wa zutto ni
Kimi no te no naka de, kono yume o tsuzukeru
Kokoro no oku no, honō no yō ni
Mou modorenai, kono netsu o

[Female - Hook - Spanish]
Más oscuro, más intenso, sin control
Cada latido una nueva explosión
No hay mañana, solo este instante
Dame todo, no quedes nada

[Bridge - Both - Italian]
Battito dopo battito, il mondo scompare
Solo noi due, nell'aria elettrica
Niente regole, niente vergogna
Solo questo desiderio che ci brucia

[Outro - German]
Der Beat wird langsamer, aber die Hitze bleibt
Unsere Schatten verschmelzen in der Nacht
Keine Worte nötig, wir verstehen uns
Bis zum nächsten Mal, wenn der Bass uns ruft

---

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_25 (Extend) (Remastered)
[DESCRIPTION]
Intro (140 BPM):
Filtered sub-bass and minimal kick set a dark tone, Autotuned vocal teases: "Feel the heat, "

Build-up (140 → 150 BPM):
BPM increases over 16 bars, Syncopated drums and sharp hats layer in, Rising acid synth sweeps add tension, Drop 1 (155 BPM):
Saturated sub-bass and punchy drums lock in, Gritty acid melody drives the main hook, Deep autotuned vocals: "Lose control, take what's mine, "

Breakdown (145 BPM):
Bass filters down, Minimal drums and vocal chops create atmosphere, Stripped acid synth plays haunting melody, Build 2 (145 → 155 BPM):
Tension builds with risers and white noise sweeps, Percussion fills intensify, Vocal: "Harder, faster, feel the rush, "

Drop 2 (155 BPM):
Heavier bass saturation and additional percussion, Call-response vocal elements, Acid synth variations, Outro (155 → 140 BPM):
Elements strip away progressively, Bass filters to sub frequencies, Final vocal: "This is how we come alive, " fading out, This structure emphasizes groove, tensio

[LYRICS]
[Male - Verse - Spanish]
El cuerpo arde, y para ti todo el honor
Toma lo que es mío esta noche
No hay palabras, solo jugamos en trance,
Que comience la ruptura, haré caos

[Female - Verse - Italian]
Bassi sporchi, giochi malvagi
Accendi il mio corpo senza freni
Non fermarti, non pensare
Spingimi fino all'orlo

[Male - Hook - Spanish]
Más fuerte, más rápido, pierde la razón
Deja la conciencia atrás
Sudor y pecado en la pista
Dame lo que vine a buscar

[Female - Hook - Italian]
Più profondo, più crudo, fammi urlare
Niente è ciò che sembra
Desiderio puro, controllo assoluto
Vieni a prenderti la mia anima

[Male - Verse - German]
Schalte das Licht aus, spür die Hitze
Bewege deinen Körper im Takt dieses Beats
Keine Spiele, nur rohe Begierde
Diese verdammte Tanzfläche in Brand setzen

[Female - Pre-Chorus - Swedish]
Baslinjen klättrar upp längs din ryggrad
I kväll kommer du helt att bli min

[Male - Verse - Japanese]
San ga kangei no subete o yakitsukusu
Ureru kono yoidore o tsukande

[Female - Hook - Italian]
Stringimi forte, fammi male
Dentro questo ritmo animale
Paura e piacere si confondono
Nel buio insieme ci nascondono

[Bridge - Both - German]
Schlag auf Schlag, die Nacht zerbricht
Wir sind das Feuer, das alles vernicht'
Kein Morgen, keine Pflicht
Nur Begierde im Gesicht

[Male - Verse - Swedish]
Din röst är eld, den smälter mig
Varje puls sårar mig
I mörkret försvinner vi
Och lusten bränner mig

[Female - Pre-Chorus - German]
Im Mondlicht tanzen wir
Ohne Regeln, nur jetzt brennen wir
Körper und Seele, ein Ritual
In dieser Nacht bist du tödlich

[Call & Response - Japanese]
Male: "Anata wa nani ga hoshii? Itte."
Female: "Subete to motto."
Male: "Dō ugoku ka misete."
Female: "Yogoreta onna no yō ni."

[Breakdown - Both - Swedish]
Djupare... djupare... tappa kontrollen
Hårdare... hårdare... sälj din själ
Snabbare... snabbare... känn rusets dunk
Inget kvar än kött och lust

[Final Hook - Both - German]
Wenn die Sonne aufgeht, gehen wir
Aber heute Nacht sind wir aus dem Nichts stark
Der Bass, der Schweiß und die Haut kollidieren
So erwachen wir zum Leben

[Outro - Italian]
Il basso taglia in profondità, i cuori accelerano
Fai durare questo momento sporco

[Male - Verse - Spanish]
La noche nos consume, sin dirección
Tu piel contra la mía, tentación
El ritmo nos controla, sin escapar
En este infierno, quiero quedar

[Female - Pre-Chorus - German]
Die Flamme brennt, wir verlieren uns
Keine Grenzen, nur Euphorie und Fluss
Jeder Berührung, ein neuer Rausch
Bis zum Morgen, nur dein Laut

[Male - Hook - Italian]
Più alto, più folle, fino all'alba
Niente domani, solo ora ci accende
Ombre e corpi che si confondono
In questa danza che non finisce

[Female - Verse - Swedish]
Mörkret omsluter oss, vi andas som ett
Hjärtan slår i takt, inget mer finns kvar
Varje rörelse ett löfte om extas
I detta ögonblick, vi är evigheten

[Male - Pre-Chorus - Japanese]
Yoru ga akete mo, watashi wa zutto ni
Kimi no te no naka de, kono yume o tsuzukeru
Kokoro no oku no, honō no yō ni
Mou modorenai, kono netsu o

[Female - Hook - Spanish]
Más oscuro, más intenso, sin control
Cada latido una nueva explosión
No hay mañana, solo este instante
Dame todo, no quedes nada

[Bridge - Both - Italian]
Battito dopo battito, il mondo scompare
Solo noi due, nell'aria elettrica
Niente regole, niente vergogna
Solo questo desiderio che ci brucia

[Outro - German]
Der Beat wird langsamer, aber die Hitze bleibt
Unsere Schatten verschmelzen in der Nacht
Keine Worte nötig, wir verstehen uns
Bis zum nächsten Mal, wenn der Bass uns ruft

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_25 (Extend) (Remastered)
[DESCRIPTION]
Intro (140 BPM):
Filtered sub-bass and minimal kick set a dark tone, Autotuned vocal teases: "Feel the heat, "

Build-up (140 → 150 BPM):
BPM increases over 16 bars, Syncopated drums and sharp hats layer in, Rising acid synth sweeps add tension, Drop 1 (155 BPM):
Saturated sub-bass and punchy drums lock in, Gritty acid melody drives the main hook, Deep autotuned vocals: "Lose control, take what's mine, "

Breakdown (145 BPM):
Bass filters down, Minimal drums and vocal chops create atmosphere, Stripped acid synth plays haunting melody, Build 2 (145 → 155 BPM):
Tension builds with risers and white noise sweeps, Percussion fills intensify, Vocal: "Harder, faster, feel the rush, "

Drop 2 (155 BPM):
Heavier bass saturation and additional percussion, Call-response vocal elements, Acid synth variations, Outro (155 → 140 BPM):
Elements strip away progressively, Bass filters to sub frequencies, Final vocal: "This is how we come alive, " fading out, This structure emphasizes groove, tensio

[LYRICS]
[Male - Verse - Spanish]
El cuerpo arde, y para ti todo el honor
Toma lo que es mío esta noche
No hay palabras, solo jugamos en trance,
Que comience la ruptura, haré caos

[Female - Verse - Italian]
Bassi sporchi, giochi malvagi
Accendi il mio corpo senza freni

Spingimi fino all'orlo

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_3
[DESCRIPTION]
At 155 BPM, this underground tech house track pulses with gritty, distorted basslines tightly locked to syncopated kick-snare grooves. Nasty 808s and acid synths slice through a dense low end, accented by crisp percussion, bold risers, and hypnotic, heavily autotuned vocals.

[LYRICS]
a ti bila meni blizu si 
pa ti trnu sinusi
po meni svome sinu si 
ime dala cirkusi
i dalje samo biznisi
pa nikada minusi 
noge šire ko virusi
grkinje i girosi
bitni su doprinsi 
sad ulica te časti 
a krimosi ko krimosi
samo znamo krasti

Imam fon blek beri
sef baš po meri 
gas revolveri spas
lajn atletika
Full genetika 
skup estetika 
put do Pekinga
vuko beli gram

u ektazi je ekstaza 
ekstazi je tu sa nama
Ovo nije samo faza 
pijem linije pa grama 
ali sise njene vise 
više podoji me mama
tiše krišom fukse prišle 
kite gutala ko viršle

a tu uvek se popije
 vučem kose vučem skije 
bebi lako se pobijem 
kada rade me linije
meni niko se ne smije 
svakako niko ne smije
jer bi najebao lako 
zaklo bih bez čakije

Sve nam je offer fame
to je kao over game
Ali mi smo over hejt
Poen dam pa over paid

---

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_3
[DESCRIPTION]
This 155 BPM slap house banger drives with dirty, growling basslines and crisp, syncopated kick-snare patterns. Pulsing acid synths weave through the mix, while hypnotic, deeply autotuned vocals create a seductive effect. Sharp percussion and clever risers sustain high energy and relentless groove.

[LYRICS]

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_31
[DESCRIPTION]
Intro (140 BPM): Thin kick and filtered sub; autotuned tease "Feel the heat" through tape delay. Build-up (140 → 150 BPM): 16-bar rise with polyrhythmic percussion and tight hats; arpeggiated acid subline climbs. Drop 1 (155 BPM): Saturated sub-bass and punchy drums anchor; acid melody sidechained to a gated arp; vocal stack: "Lose control, take what's mine" doubled and detuned. Breakdown (145 BPM): Bass narrows with notch filtering; reversed piano hits, sparse clap motifs and distant choir chops. Build 2 (145 → 155 BPM): Filter cutoff on arps, layered risers and pitched percussion fills; brass stabs accent key hits; rhythmic gating on pads and hi-hat triplets. Drop 2 (155 BPM): Denser arrangement with FM percussion, mirrored acid variations, call-response vocal harmonies and tape saturation on the lead; harmonic exciter on sub. Outro (155 → 140 BPM): Percussion thins, acid morphs to sub-oscillation, final vocal: "This is how we come alive" run through granular delay and lowpass fade.

[LYRICS]
[Male - Verse 1]
padam boj nespokoj
To kao zadnji je fight
nesto boy neko tvoj
mi je omašio sprat

[Male - Verse 2]
sa njom je off road trip 
A ja pod dozom tip
često osetim
prošlosti mi srozali
tu si non stop ti 
kad su potopi
Pa me tada bleda gleda 
sneg sav bi da otopi

[Male - Bridge]
A tvoje telo bella celo sa telenovela
vrela polugala si mi u sred dana bela
sad me htela al prije to nije smela (nee)
zavela srela u tom lobiju hotela 

[Female - Hook]
Ko da tamom me umije ,umije on sve 
Zar da tako me ubije,sruši svetove
Zna da tako me ugrije, ruke njegove 
zadnju nadu mi ulije,uzmi evo me

[Male - Verse 3]
Pitam gde si nestala a ti otišla po ccugu
Ti si tako nestvarna ali opet biram drugu
Vidim boje - vidim dugu 
palim petu redom pljugu 
bruku pertli u mom krugu 
ja podletim svakom drugu

[Male - Verse 4]
A ne treba ti mozak da sklopiš taj mozaik
sva si pogubna ko doza a ja ko pravi laik
Mene ne zanima poza ,ma samo mi to daji
bio sam vani od konza U tvorzi ko u odaji

A ja njoj ne verujem da na belom preterujem 
Pun klub flertuje a voli me to verujem
Guz nju neguje dupe ko da tu robuje
radim ja ko roba je,Sa mnom ko da na dopu je

[Male - Bridge]
A tvoje telo bella celo sa telenovela
vrela polugala si mi u sred dana bela
sad me htela al prije to nije smela (nee)
zavela srela u tom lobiju hotela 

[Female - Hook]
Ko da tamom me umije ,umije on sve 
Zar da tako me ubije,sruši svetove
Zna da tako me ugrije, ruke njegove 
zadnju nadu mi ulije,uzmi evo me

[Instrumental - go crazy]

voli blesi da po sisi igra malo gola go

belo drama to infuza dama davala do zore
banda favela terore mala navela na fore

Mi ko dizel fidel kastro
terorista ista
mi smo nato bliski istok
Ona poslala pismo

pada jooj

sam pao sam se ubio
ganjo sam se van sa murijom
ona zna da sam se lupio
sam se lupio A kazne kupio

[Outro]
Shvatam da posebna si
suza ti lice kvasi
A to što uzela si
pazi to trebala si

Gle sata gle kola gle skanka što rolam

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_31
[DESCRIPTION]
Intro (140 BPM): Thin kick and filtered sub; autotuned tease "Feel the heat" through tape delay. Build-up (140 → 150 BPM): 16-bar rise with polyrhythmic percussion and tight hats; arpeggiated acid subline climbs. Drop 1 (155 BPM): Saturated sub-bass and punchy drums anchor; acid melody sidechained to a gated arp; vocal stack: "Lose control, take what's mine" doubled and detuned. Breakdown (145 BPM): Bass narrows with notch filtering; reversed piano hits, sparse clap motifs and distant choir chops. Build 2 (145 → 155 BPM): Filter cutoff on arps, layered risers and pitched percussion fills; brass stabs accent key hits; rhythmic gating on pads and hi-hat triplets. Drop 2 (155 BPM): Denser arrangement with FM percussion, mirrored acid variations, call-response vocal harmonies and tape saturation on the lead; harmonic exciter on sub. Outro (155 → 140 BPM): Percussion thins, acid morphs to sub-oscillation, final vocal: "This is how we come alive" run through granular delay and lowpass fade.

palim petu redom pljuguu

Guz nju neguje dupe ko da tu robuje
radim ja ko roba je,Sa mnom ko da na dopu je

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_31
[DESCRIPTION]
Intro (140 BPM): Thin kick and filtered sub; autotuned tease "Feel the heat" through tape delay. Build-up (140 → 150 BPM): 16-bar rise with polyrhythmic percussion and tight hats; arpeggiated acid subline climbs. Drop 1 (155 BPM): Saturated sub-bass and punchy drums anchor; acid melody sidechained to a gated arp; vocal stack: "Lose control, take what's mine" doubled and detuned. Breakdown (145 BPM): Bass narrows with notch filtering; reversed piano hits, sparse clap motifs and distant choir chops. Build 2 (145 → 155 BPM): Filter cutoff on arps, layered risers and pitched percussion fills; brass stabs accent key hits; rhythmic gating on pads and hi-hat triplets. Drop 2 (155 BPM): Denser arrangement with FM percussion, mirrored acid variations, call-response vocal harmonies and tape saturation on the lead; harmonic exciter on sub. Outro (155 → 140 BPM): Percussion thins, acid morphs to sub-oscillation, final vocal: "This is how we come alive" run through granular delay and lowpass fade.

[LYRICS]
[Intrumental]

[Male - Intro]
padam boj nespokoj
To kao zadnji je fight
nesto boy neko tvoj
mi je omašio sprat

[Male - Verse 2]
sa njom je off road trip 
A ja pod dozom tip
često osetim
prošlosti mi srozali
tu si non stop ti 
kad su potopi
Pa me tada bleda gleda 
sneg sav bi da otopi
[

[Female - Hook]
Ko da tamom me umije ,umije on sve 
Zar da tako me ubije,sruši svetove
Zna da tako me ugrije, ruke njegove 
zadnju nadu mi ulije,uzmi evo me
Verse 1]
Gledam gde je nestao,
kažu pićem krije tugu
Ti si stvarno nestvaran,
ali opet biram drugog
Vidim boje - vidim dugu
palim petu redom pljugu,
znam da hoćeš mene,
a ne nijednu drugu.

[Male - Verse 4]
A ne treba ti mozak da sklopiš taj mozaik
sva si pogubna ko doza a ja ko pravi laik
Mene ne zanima poza ,ma samo mi to daji
bio sam vani od konza U tvorzi ko u odaji
A ja njoj ne verujem da na belom preterujem 
Pun klub flertuje a voli me to verujem
Guz nju neguje dupe ko da tu robuje
radim ja ko roba je,Sa mnom ko da na dopu je

[Male - Bridge]
A tvoje telo bella celo sa telenovela
vrela polugala si mi u sred dana bela
sad me htela al prije to nije smela (nee)
zavela srela u tom lobiju hotela

[Female - Hook]
Ko da tamom me umije ,umije on sve 
Zar da tako me ubije,sruši svetove
Zna da tako me ugrije, ruke njegove 
zadnju nadu mi ulije,uzmi evo me

pala sve moje testove garant je kraj aj aj

[Verse 2]

[DESCRIPTION]
Intro (140 BPM): Thin kick and filtered sub; autotuned tease "Feel the heat" through tape delay. Build-up (140 → 150 BPM): 16-bar rise with polyrhythmic percussion and tight hats; arpeggiated acid subline climbs. Drop 1 (155 BPM): Saturated sub-bass and punchy drums anchor; acid melody sidechained to a gated arp; vocal stack: "Lose control, take what's mine" doubled and detuned. Breakdown (145 BPM): Bass narrows with notch filtering; reversed piano hits, sparse clap motifs and distant choir chops. Build 2 (145 → 155 BPM): Filter cutoff on arps, layered risers and pitched percussion fills; brass stabs accent key hits; rhythmic gating on pads and hi-hat triplets. Drop 2 (155 BPM): Denser arrangement with FM percussion, mirrored acid variations, call-response vocal harmonies and tape saturation on the lead; harmonic exciter on sub. Outro (155 → 140 BPM): Percussion thins, acid morphs to sub-oscillation, final vocal: "This is how we come alive" run through granular delay and lowpass fade.

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_31
[DESCRIPTION]
Intro (140 BPM): Thin kick and filtered sub; autotuned tease "Feel the heat" through tape delay. Build-up (140 → 150 BPM): 16-bar rise with polyrhythmic percussion and tight hats; arpeggiated acid subline climbs. Drop 1 (155 BPM): Saturated sub-bass and punchy drums anchor; acid melody sidechained to a gated arp; vocal stack: "Lose control, take what's mine" doubled and detuned. Breakdown (145 BPM): Bass narrows with notch filtering; reversed piano hits, sparse clap motifs and distant choir chops. Build 2 (145 → 155 BPM): Filter cutoff on arps, layered risers and pitched percussion fills; brass stabs accent key hits; rhythmic gating on pads and hi-hat triplets. Drop 2 (155 BPM): Denser arrangement with FM percussion, mirrored acid variations, call-response vocal harmonies and tape saturation on the lead; harmonic exciter on sub. Outro (155 → 140 BPM): Percussion thins, acid morphs to sub-oscillation, final vocal: "This is how we come alive" run through granular delay and lowpass fade.

[LYRICS]
[Intrumental]

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_31 (Edit) (Remastered)
[DESCRIPTION]
Intro (140 BPM): Thin kick and filtered sub; autotuned tease "Feel the heat" through tape delay. Build-up (140 → 150 BPM): 16-bar rise with polyrhythmic percussion and tight hats; arpeggiated acid subline climbs. Drop 1 (155 BPM): Saturated sub-bass and punchy drums anchor; acid melody sidechained to a gated arp; vocal stack: "Lose control, take what's mine" doubled and detuned. Breakdown (145 BPM): Bass narrows with notch filtering; reversed piano hits, sparse clap motifs and distant choir chops. Build 2 (145 → 155 BPM): Filter cutoff on arps, layered risers and pitched percussion fills; brass stabs accent key hits; rhythmic gating on pads and hi-hat triplets. Drop 2 (155 BPM): Denser arrangement with FM percussion, mirrored acid variations, call-response vocal harmonies and tape saturation on the lead; harmonic exciter on sub. Outro (155 → 140 BPM): Percussion thins, acid morphs to sub-oscillation, final vocal: "This is how we come alive" run through granular delay and lowpass fade.

presto kuliram , da poludi aludiram

[Chorus]
Ona kush mi sushi,nema bolja šema
Puls mi ruši ,hiljadu problema
uši buši ,dijamanta šema
lamele favela cela
Menja sve dresove,a ja sam high
Mala smanjuje besove da ja sam taj
Dala sve svoje stresove ,mala sve daj
Mat Benz pun konja pesto turiram
a vez full tozla, mesto studiram
keš tu lova,često zumiram
presto kuliram , da poludi aludiram pepsi ima dipsi klizi viski belog pol
voli blesi da po sisi igra malo gola go
Oli mota white u rizli mila cima dima soke
a lepota moja ti si a ja kraljina of coke

[Male - Verse 2]
Mat Benz pun konja pesto turiram
a vez full tozla, mesto studiram
keš tu lova,često zumiram
presto kuliram , da poludi aludiram

[Chorus]
Ona kush mi sushi,nema bolja šema
Puls mi ruši,hiljadu problema

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_31 (Edit) (Remastered)
[DESCRIPTION]
Intro (140 BPM): Thin kick and filtered sub; autotuned tease "Feel the heat" through tape delay. Build-up (140 → 150 BPM): 16-bar rise with polyrhythmic percussion and tight hats; arpeggiated acid subline climbs. Drop 1 (155 BPM): Saturated sub-bass and punchy drums anchor; acid melody sidechained to a gated arp; vocal stack: "Lose control, take what's mine" doubled and detuned. Breakdown (145 BPM): Bass narrows with notch filtering; reversed piano hits, sparse clap motifs and distant choir chops. Build 2 (145 → 155 BPM): Filter cutoff on arps, layered risers and pitched percussion fills; brass stabs accent key hits; rhythmic gating on pads and hi-hat triplets. Drop 2 (155 BPM): Denser arrangement with FM percussion, mirrored acid variations, call-response vocal harmonies and tape saturation on the lead; harmonic exciter on sub. Outro (155 → 140 BPM): Percussion thins, acid morphs to sub-oscillation, final vocal: "This is how we come alive" run through granular delay and lowpass fade.

[LYRICS]
[Intrumental]

[Male - Intro]
padam boj nespokoj
To kao zadnji je fight
nesto boy neko tvoj
mi je omašio sprat

[Male - Verse 2]
sa njom je off road trip 
A ja pod dozom tip
često osetim
prošlosti mi srozali
tu si non stop ti 
kad su potopi
Pa me tada bleda gleda 
sneg sav bi da otopi
[

[Female - Hook]
Ko da tamom me umije ,umije on sve 
Zar da tako me ubije,sruši svetove
Zna da tako me ugrije, ruke njegove 
zadnju nadu mi ulije,uzmi evo me
Verse 1]
Gledam gde je nestao,
kažu pićem krije tugu
Ti si stvarno nestvaran,
ali opet biram drugog
Vidim boje - vidim dugu
palim petu redom pljugu,
znam da hoćeš mene,
a ne nijednu drugu.

[Male - Verse 4]
A ne treba ti mozak da sklopiš taj mozaik
sva si pogubna ko doza a ja ko pravi laik
Mene ne zanima poza ,ma samo mi to daji
bio sam vani od konza U tvorzi ko u odaji
A ja njoj ne verujem da na belom preterujem 
Pun klub flertuje a voli me to verujem
Guz nju neguje dupe ko da tu robuje
radim ja ko roba je,Sa mnom ko da na dopu je

[Male - Bridge]
A tvoje telo bella celo sa telenovela
vrela polugala si mi u sred dana bela
sad me htela al prije to nije smela (nee)
zavela srela u tom lobiju hotela
[

[Female - Hook]
Ko da tamom me umije ,umije on sve 
Zar da tako me ubije,sruši svetove
Zna da tako me ugrije, ruke njegove 
uši buši,dijamanta šema
lamele favela cela
Menja sve dresove,a ja sam high
Mala smanjuje besove da ja sam taj
Dala sve svoje stresove,mala sve daj
pala sve moje testove garant je kraj aj aj

[Verse 2]
Gle sata gle kola gle skanka što rolam

[Verse 1]
Rollie pepsi ima dipsi klizi viski belog pol
voli blesi da po sisi igra malo gola go
Oli mota white u rizli mila cima dima smoke
a lepota moja ti si a ja kraljina of coke

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_31 (Edit)_Cover_1
[DESCRIPTION]
Intro (140 BPM): Thin kick and filtered sub; autotuned tease "Feel the heat" through tape delay. Build-up (140 → 150 BPM): 16-bar rise with polyrhythmic percussion and tight hats; arpeggiated acid subline climbs. Drop 1 (155 BPM): Saturated sub-bass and punchy drums anchor; acid melody sidechained to a gated arp; vocal stack: "Lose control, take what's mine" doubled and detuned. Breakdown (145 BPM): Bass narrows with notch filtering; reversed piano hits, sparse clap motifs and distant choir chops. Build 2 (145 → 155 BPM): Filter cutoff on arps, layered risers and pitched percussion fills; brass stabs accent key hits; rhythmic gating on pads and hi-hat triplets. Drop 2 (155 BPM): Denser arrangement with FM percussion, mirrored acid variations, call-response vocal harmonies and tape saturation on the lead; harmonic exciter on sub. Outro (155 → 140 BPM): Percussion thins, acid morphs to sub-oscillation, final vocal: "This is how we come alive" run through granular delay and lowpass fade.

[LYRICS]
[Intrumental]

[Male - Verse 1]

nesto boy neko tvoj
mi je omašio sprat

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_31 (Remastered x2) (Edit) (Cover)
[DESCRIPTION]
This 155 BPM slap house track pulses with forceful, saturated sub-bass and syncopated, punchy drums. Gritty acid synths lead the hook, cut by sharp violins weaving Arabic modal riffs. Autotuned deep vocals, crisp hi-hats, and sweeping risers amplify the relentless, pounding club energy.

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - Intro (140 BPM) -Filtered sub-bass pulse, skeletal kick pattern.*]

[Male Vocal - Autotuned Tease]
padam boj, nespokoj [back vocal]

[Instrumental - Build-up (140 → 155 BPM)]

[Male - Verse 1]
To kao zadnji je fight
nesto boy neko tvoj
mi je omašio sprat

[Male - Verse 2]
sa njom je off road trip
A ja pod dozom tip
često osetim to,
u prošlosti mi rolali,
bajs vozali, (aaaa...)
tu si non stop ti
kad su potopi
Pa me tada bleda gleda
sneg sav bi da otopi

[Instrumental - Drop 1 (155 BPM)]

[Chorus - Drop 1]
Ona kush mi sushi, nema bolja šema
Puls mi ruši, hiljadu problema
uši buši, dijamanta šema
lamele favela cela
Menja sve dresove, a ja sam high (ooooooo)
Mala smanjuje besove da ja sam taj (aaaaaa)
Dala sve svoje stresove, mala sve daj (ooo ooo)
pala sve moje testove garant je kraj aj aj (aaa aaa)

[Monastic Chants: OOO AAA emerge beneath mix.]

[Instrumental - Breakdown (145 BPM)-brief respite—notch-filtered bass, reversed piano stabs.*]

[Female - Verse 1]
Gledam gde je nestalo,
kažu pićem krije tugu
Ti si stvarno nestvaran,
ali opet biram drugog
Vidim boje - vidim dugu
palim petu redom pljugu,
znam da hoćeš mene,
a ne nijednu drugu.

[Vocal Chop]
 "ne treba"
aaaaa ne, ne ( ne trebaaa aaa)
ne ne nnnnnn ne treba
aaaaa ne, ne (ne trebaaa aaa)
ne ne nnnnnn ne treba

[Instrumental - Build 2 (145 → 160 BPM)- unrelenting climb—filter sweeps widen, risers scream, brass stabs punctuate, hi-hat triplets blur.*]

[Male - Verse 3]
A ne treba ti mozak da sklopiš taj mozaik
sva si pogubna ko doza a ja ko pravi laik
Mene ne zanima poza, ma samo mi to daji
bio sam vani od konza U tvorzi ko u odaji
A ja njoj ne verujem da volim preterujem
Pun klub flertuje,
a voli me, to verujem
Guz njen, negujem,
u dupe to verujem
radi me jako, kao roba je, (eee)

[Female - Bridge]
A tvoje telo bella celo sa telenovela
vrela polugola sam sad u sred dana bela
sad te htela al prije to nisam smela (nee)
zavela srela u tom lobiju hotela

[Female - Hook - Build Intensity]
"Ko da tamom me umije"
Ko da tamom me umije, umije on sve
Zar da tako me ubije, sruši svetove
Zna da tako me ugrije, ruke njegove
zadnju nadu mi ulije, uzmi evo me

[Instrumental - Drop 2 (160 BPM) -Maximum density—FM percussion assault, mirrored acid variations, tape saturation crushes; monastic chants intensify, doubled in power, rumbling beneath.*]

[Chorus - Drop 2]
Ona kush mi sushi, nema bolja šema
Puls mi ruši, hiljadu problema
uši buši, dijamanta šema
lamele favela cela
Menja sve dresove, a ja sam high (OOO)
Mala smanjuje besove da ja sam taj (AAA)
Dala sve svoje stresove, mala sve daj ( OOO OOO)
pala sve moje testove garant je kraj aj aj (AAA AAA)

[Call & Response Vocals]
Rollie pepsi ima dipsi klizi viski (belog pol)
voli blesa da pošizi igra malo gola go
Oli motat white u rizli (mili cimaj dima smoke)
a lepota moja ti si (a ja kraljica of coke)
Mat Benz pun konja pesto (turiraš)
a vez full tozla, (mesto studiram)
keš tu lova, ( često zumiram)
presto (kuliram), da poludi (aludiram)
(: aaaaaaaa)
(aaaaaaaa)

[Instrumental - Outro (160 → 140 BPM)]
*Gradual disintegration—percussion stripped away, acid dissolves to sub-oscillation.*

[Male - Outro]
Gle sata gle kola gle skanka što rolam (back vocal: granulated)

[Instrumental - Fade to Silence]
*lowpass sweeps to silence.*

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_31 (Remastered x2) (Edit) (Cover)
[DESCRIPTION]
This 155 BPM slap house track pulses with forceful, saturated sub-bass and syncopated, punchy drums. Gritty acid synths lead the hook, cut by sharp violins weaving Arabic modal riffs. Autotuned deep vocals, crisp hi-hats, and sweeping risers amplify the relentless, pounding club energy.

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - Intro]

[Male - Verse 1]
padam boj, nespokoj,
To kao zadnji je fight
nesto boy neko tvoj
mi je omašio sprat

[Male - Verse 2]
sa njom je off road trip 
A ja pod dozom tip
često osetim to,
u prošlosti mi rolali,
bajs vozali, aaaa...,
tu si non stop ti 
kad su potopi 
Pa me tada bleda gleda 
sneg sav bi da otopi

kažu pićem krije tugu

ali opet biram drugog
Vidim boje - vidim dugu
palim petu redom pljugu,
znam da hoćeš mene,
a ne nijednu drugu.

[Breakdown - Vocal Chop]
aaaaa ne, ne (ne trebaaa aaa)
ne ne nnnnnn ne treba
aaaaa ne, ne (ne trebaaa aaa)
ne ne nnnnnn ne treba

[Male - Verse 3]
A ne treba ti mozak da sklopiš taj mozaik
sva si pogubna ko doza a ja ko pravi laik
Mene ne zanima poza, ma samo mi to daji
bio sam vani od konza U tvorzi ko u odaji
A ja njoj ne verujem da volim preterujem
Pun klub flertuje,
a voli me, to verujem
Guz njen, negujem,
u dupe to verujem
radi me jako, kao roba je, eee

[Female - Bridge]
A tvoje telo bella celo sa telenovela
vrela polugola sam sad u sred dana bela
sad te htela al prije to nisam smela (nee)
zavela srela u tom lobiju hotela

[Female - Hook - Build Intensity]
Ko da tamom me umije, umije on sve 
Zar da tako me ubije, sruši svetove
Zna da tako me ugrije, ruke njegove 
zadnju nadu mi ulije, uzmi evo me

[Instrumental - Drop Preparation]

[Chorus - Drop 1 - Monastic Chants Enter]
Ona kush mi sushi, nema bolja šema
Puls mi ruši, hiljadu problema
uši buši, dijamanta šema
lamele favela cela
Menja sve dresove, a ja sam high (ooooooo)
Mala smanjuje besove da ja sam taj (aaaaaa)
Dala sve svoje stresove, mala sve daj (ooo ooo)
pala sve moje testove garant je kraj aj aj (aaa aaa)

[Male - Verse 4]
Gle sata gle kola gle skanka što rolam

[Male Vocal - Female Answer - Call & Response]
Rollie pepsi ima dipsi klizi viski (belog pol)
voli blesa da pošizi igra malo gola go

a lepota moja ti si (a ja kraljica of coke)
Mat Benz pun konja pesto (turiraš)
a vez full tozla, (mesto studiram)
keš tu lova, (često zumiram)
presto (kuliram), da poludi (aludiram)
aaaaaaaa
aaaaaaaa

[Female - Hook - Intensified]
Ko da tamom me umije, umije on sve 
Zar da tako me ubije, sruši svetove
Zna da tako me ugrije, ruke njegove 
zadnju nadu mi ulije, uzmi evo me

[Instrumental - Build-up - Tempo Push]

[Chorus - Drop 2 - Monastic Chants Doubled Power]
Ona kush mi sushi, nema bolja šema
Puls mi ruši, hiljadu problema
uši buši, dijamanta šema
lamele favela cela
Menja sve dresove, a ja sam high (OOO)
Mala smanjuje besove da ja sam taj (AAA)
Dala sve svoje stresove, mala sve daj (OOO OOO)
pala sve moje testove garant je kraj aj aj (AAA AAA)

[Male Vocal - Female Answer - Intensified]
Rollie pepsi ima dipsi klizi viski (belog pol)
voli blesa da pošizi igra malo gola go
Oli motat white u rizli (mili cimaj dima smoke)
a lepota moja ti si (a ja kraljica of coke)
Mat Benz pun konja pesto (turiraš)
a vez full tozla, (mesto studiram)
keš tu lova, (često zumiram)
presto (kuliram), da poludi (aludiram)

[Chorus - Final Drop - Maximum Monastic Power]
Ona kush mi sushi, nema bolja šema
Puls mi ruši, hiljadu problema
uši buši, dijamanta šema
lamele favela cela
Menja sve dresove, a ja sam high (OOO aaa OOO)
Mala smanjuje besove da ja sam taj (AAA ooo AAA)
Dala sve svoje stresove, mala sve daj (AAA AAA AAA)
pala sve moje testove garant je kraj aj aj (OOO OOO OOO)

[Male - Outro]
Gle sata gle kola gle skanka što rolam

[Instrumental - Outro - Granular Decay]

voli blesa da pošizi igra malo gola go
Oli motat white u rizli (mili cimaj dima smoke)
a lepota moja ti si (a ja kraljica of coke)
Mat Benz pun konja pesto (turiraš)
a vez full tozla, (mesto studiram)
keš tu lova, (često zumiram)
presto (kuliram), da poludi (aludiram)
aaaaaaaa
aaaaaaaa

[Female - Hook - Intensified]
Ko da tamom me umije, umije on sve 
Zar da tako me ubije, sruši svetove
Zna da tako me ugrije, ruke njegove 
zadnju nadu mi ulije, uzmi evo me

[Instrumental - Build-up - Tempo Push]

[Chorus - Drop 2 - Monastic Chants Doubled Power]
Ona kush mi sushi, nema bolja šema
Puls mi ruši, hiljadu problema
uši buši, dijamanta šema
lamele favela cela
Menja sve dresove, a ja sam high (OOO)
Mala smanjuje besove da ja sam taj (AAA)
Dala sve svoje stresove, mala sve daj (OOO OOO)
pala sve moje testove garant je kraj aj aj (AAA AAA)

[Male Vocal - Female Answer - Intensified]
Rollie pepsi ima dipsi klizi viski (belog pol)
voli blesa da pošizi igra malo gola go
Oli motat white u rizli (mili cimaj dima smoke)
a lepota moja ti si (a ja kraljica of coke)

a vez full tozla, (mesto studiram)
keš tu lova, (često zumiram)
presto (kuliram), da poludi (aludiram)

[Chorus - Final Drop - Maximum Monastic Power]
Ona kush mi sushi, nema bolja šema
Puls mi ruši, hiljadu problema
uši buši, dijamanta šema
lamele favela cela
Menja sve dresove, a ja sam high (OOO aaa OOO)
Mala smanjuje besove da ja sam taj (AAA ooo AAA)
Dala sve svoje stresove, mala sve daj (AAA AAA AAA)
pala sve moje testove garant je kraj aj aj (OOO OOO OOO)

[Male - Outro]
Gle sata gle kola gle skanka što rolam

[Instrumental - Outro - Granular Decay]

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_31 (Remastered)
[DESCRIPTION]
Intro (140 BPM): Thin kick and filtered sub; autotuned tease "Feel the heat" through tape delay. Build-up (140 → 150 BPM): 16-bar rise with polyrhythmic percussion and tight hats; arpeggiated acid subline climbs. Drop 1 (155 BPM): Saturated sub-bass and punchy drums anchor; acid melody sidechained to a gated arp; vocal stack: "Lose control, take what's mine" doubled and detuned. Breakdown (145 BPM): Bass narrows with notch filtering; reversed piano hits, sparse clap motifs and distant choir chops. Build 2 (145 → 155 BPM): Filter cutoff on arps, layered risers and pitched percussion fills; brass stabs accent key hits; rhythmic gating on pads and hi-hat triplets. Drop 2 (155 BPM): Denser arrangement with FM percussion, mirrored acid variations, call-response vocal harmonies and tape saturation on the lead; harmonic exciter on sub. Outro (155 → 140 BPM): Percussion thins, acid morphs to sub-oscillation, final vocal: "This is how we come alive" run through granular delay and lowpass fade.

[LYRICS]
[Intrumental]

[Male - Intro]
padam boj nespokoj
To kao zadnji je fight
nesto boy neko tvoj
mi je omašio sprat

[Male - Verse 2]
sa njom je off road trip 
A ja pod dozom tip
često osetim
prošlosti mi srozali
tu si non stop ti 
kad su potopi
Pa me tada bleda gleda 
sneg sav bi da otopi
[

[Female - Hook]
Ko da tamom me umije ,umije on sve 
Zar da tako me ubije,sruši svetove
Zna da tako me ugrije, ruke njegove 
zadnju nadu mi ulije,uzmi evo me
Verse 1]
Gledam gde je nestao,
kažu pićem krije tugu
Ti si stvarno nestvaran,
ali opet biram drugog
Vidim boje - vidim dugu
palim petu redom pljugu,
znam da hoćeš mene,
a ne nijednu drugu.

[Male - Verse 4]
A ne treba ti mozak da sklopiš taj mozaik
sva si pogubna ko doza a ja ko pravi laik
Mene ne zanima poza ,ma samo mi to daji
bio sam vani od konza U tvorzi ko u odaji
A ja njoj ne verujem da na belom preterujem 
Pun klub flertuje a voli me to verujem
Guz nju neguje dupe ko da tu robuje
radim ja ko roba je,Sa mnom ko da na dopu je

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_33
[DESCRIPTION]
Intro (128BPM/16bars): Soft 808+filtered atabaques@55Hz. Vocal  pitch-bent+analog delay 1/8tri. Cuíca samples+reversed agogô. Stereo field 80% width.
Build1 (128→134BPM/8bars): Slap snare polyrhythm+ghost notes. Pluck bass sawtooth chromatic+saturation+HPF180Hz. Whistle "Ôh ôh"+vocoder formant shift.
Drop1 (134BPM/16bars): Sub808 A#1+parallel compression 6:1/15ms. Slap layers+sidechain pump 8:1. Pluck saw+cutoff automation+tremolo 1/4sync.lyrics stacked+detuned±12cent.
Break (130BPM/8bars): Notch sweep 100-250Hz+width reduction 50%. Reverse piano Bm7+plate 4s decay. Tamborim fills scattered. Vocal chops granular+pitch stretch.
Build2 (130→134BPM/8bars): Lowpass ramp 600Hz→6kHz+resonance 3.2. White noise risers+pitched percussion fills. Brass hits Bm+maj7 accents off-beat. Pluck gate 1/16+auto-filter.
Drop2 (134BPM/16bars): 20 layers+frequency separation. Slap perc layered samples+alternating pan. Bass pluck octave doubling+filter tracking. Call-response
Outro (134→128BPM/16bars):

[LYRICS]
[Male - Verse 1]

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_33
[DESCRIPTION]
Intro(140BPM/32bars):Thin kick+filtered sub@40Hz. Vocal "Feel heat" autotune+tape delay 1/8dot. Vinyl crackle+reverse cymbal. Wide stereo positioning.
Build1 (140→150BPM/16bars):Polyrhythm+triplet hats 16% swing. Acid TB-303 chromatic rise+tube sat+res sweep 20-90%. BG vocal "Rising up" +12st pitch+chorus.
Drop1 (155BPM/32bars): 808 sub E1+harmonic excite. Kick layers+sidechain 4:1/30ms attack. Acid saw+env filter+LFO 1/16sync. "Lose control" harmony±8cent+optical 3:1comp.
Break (145BPM/16bars): Notch filter 80-200Hz+stereo narrow 40%. Reverse piano maj7+cathedral 8s decay. Sparse claps+room verb. Choir chops granular 4-voice.
Build2 (145→155BPM/16bars):LP sweep 800Hz→8kHz+Q2.5. Riser layers white noise+sine.Brass stabs power+9th syncopated.Gate pads 1/8 pattern+autopan 1/4rate.
Drop2 (155BPM/32bars): 24 layers full spectrum. FM perc 2:1+3.5:1 ratios alternating L/R. Acid mirror+octave displacement.Call-response vocals spatial movement.Tape A800+harmonic excite.
Outro(155→140BPM/32bars

[LYRICS]

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_33
[DESCRIPTION]
Intro(140BPM/32bars):Thin kick+filtered sub@40Hz. Vocal "Feel heat" autotune+tape delay 1/8dot. Vinyl crackle+reverse cymbal. Wide stereo positioning.
Build1 (140→150BPM/16bars):Polyrhythm+triplet hats 16% swing. Acid TB-303 chromatic rise+tube sat+res sweep 20-90%. BG vocal "Rising up" +12st pitch+chorus.
Drop1 (155BPM/32bars): 808 sub E1+harmonic excite. Kick layers+sidechain 4:1/30ms attack. Acid saw+env filter+LFO 1/16sync. "Lose control" harmony±8cent+optical 3:1comp.
Break (145BPM/16bars): Notch filter 80-200Hz+stereo narrow 40%. Reverse piano maj7+cathedral 8s decay. Sparse claps+room verb. Choir chops granular 4-voice.
Build2 (145→155BPM/16bars):LP sweep 800Hz→8kHz+Q2.5. Riser layers white noise+sine.Brass stabs power+9th syncopated.Gate pads 1/8 pattern+autopan 1/4rate.
Drop2 (155BPM/32bars): 24 layers full spectrum. FM perc 2:1+3.5:1 ratios alternating L/R. Acid mirror+octave displacement.Call-response vocals spatial movement.Tape A800+harmonic excite.
Outro(155→140BPM/32bars

[LYRICS]
[Male - Verse 1]

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_34
[DESCRIPTION]
Intro (140 BPM):Thin kick and filtered sub; autotuned tease "padam boj nespokoj,To kao zadnji je fight"through tape delay, Build-up (140 → 150 BPM): 16-bar rise with polyrhythmic percussion and tight hats; arpeggiated acid subline climbs, Drop 1(155 BPM): Saturated sub-bass and punchy drums anchor; acid melody sidechained to a gated arp;vocal stack: "Ona kush mi sushi, nema bolja šema" doubled and detuned, Breakdown (145 BPM):Bass narrows with notch filtering; reversed piano hits, sparse clap motifs and distant choir chops, Build 2 (145 → 155 BPM):Filter cutoff on arps,layered risers and pitched percussion fills; brass stabs accent key hits; rhythmic gating on pads and hi-hat triplets,Drop 2(155 BPM):Denser arrangement with FM percussion, mirrored acid variations, call-response vocal harmonies and tape saturation on the lead; harmonic exciter on sub,Outro (155 → 140 BPM): Percussion thins,acid morphs to sub-oscillation,final vocal: "Ko da tamom me umije, umije on sve" run through delay

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_35
[DESCRIPTION]
Intro (140 BPM): Thin kick and filtered sub; autotuned tease "Feel the heat" through tape delay. Build-up (140 → 150 BPM): 16-bar rise with polyrhythmic percussion and tight hats; arpeggiated acid subline climbs. Drop 1 (155 BPM): Saturated sub-bass and punchy drums anchor; acid melody sidechained to a gated arp; vocal stack: "Lose control, take what's mine" doubled and detuned. Breakdown (145 BPM): Bass narrows with notch filtering; reversed piano hits, sparse clap motifs and distant choir chops. Build 2 (145 → 155 BPM): Filter cutoff on arps, layered risers and pitched percussion fills; brass stabs accent key hits; rhythmic gating on pads and hi-hat triplets. Drop 2 (155 BPM): Denser arrangement with FM percussion, mirrored acid variations, call-response vocal harmonies and tape saturation on the lead; harmonic exciter on sub. Outro (155 → 140 BPM): Percussion thins, acid morphs to sub-oscillation, final vocal: "This is how we come alive" run through granular delay and lowpass fade.

[LYRICS]

nesto boy neko tvoj

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_36
[DESCRIPTION]
Intro (140BPM) opens with a thin kick, filtered sub, autotuned vocal with tape delay, and cajke synth stab. The tempo climbs (140→150BPM) with a 16-bar riser, polyrhythmic percussion, trap hi-hat rolls, acid sub arpeggio ascent, and white noise. Drop 1 (155BPM) explodes with saturated 808s, punchy kick, gated acid arp melody, and a stacked, pitch-shifted vocal hook. Break (145BPM) sweeps the bass, features reverb-soaked piano hits, sparse trap snares, and distant choirs. Build 2 (145→155BPM) intensifies via arpeggiator filter ramp, energetic risers, pitched perc, off-beat brass, gated synth chops, and hi-hat triplets. Drop 2 (155BPM) hits densely: layered 808s, FM percussion, acid lines, call-response panned vocals with tape saturation, harmonic exciter on the subs. Outro (155→140BPM) strips back to acid line morphing to sine sub, final vocal on granular delay and lowpass fadeout.

[LYRICS]
[Male - Verse 1]
padam boj nespokoj
To kao zadnji je fight
nesto boy neko tvoj
mi je omašio sprat

[Male - Verse 2]

često osetim
prošlosti mi srozali
tu si non stop ti 
kad su potopi
Pa me tada bleda gleda 
sneg sav bi da otopi

Mala smanjuje besove( da ja sam taj)
Dala sve svoje stresove (,mala sve daj)
pala sve moje testove( garant je kraj )aj aj
Gle sata gle kola gle skanka što rolam
De manjka kontrola tu sanka se gola
gle brata mentola pa start ga patrola
i want samo lova sve ganc samo novacke


[Male - Verse 2]
Mat Benz pun konja pesto turiram
a vez full tozla, mesto studiram
keš tu lova,često zumiram
presto kuliram , da poludi aludiram

[Male - Drop]
Gle sata gle kola gle skanka što rolam


[Instrumental - go crazy]

[Chorus]
Ona kush mi sushi,nema bolja šema
Puls mi ruši,hiljadu problema
uši buši,dijamanta šema
lamele favela cela
Menja sve dresove,a ja sam high
Mala smanjuje besove da ja sam taj

pala sve moje testove garant je kraj aj aj

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_38
[DESCRIPTION]
Slap house(155BPM):Saturated 808 sub@45Hz+harm excite.Syncopated kick layers+sidechain 4:1/20ms attack.TB-303 acid saw+res sweep 30-85%+LFO 1/16sync.Hypnotic vox"padam boj nespokoj"autotune+tape delay 1/8dot.Triplet hats 16%swing+relentless groove.White noise risers+rev cymbals.Build(150→155BPM/16b):Acid chromatic rise+tube sat.Percussion fills+offbeat claps.BG vox"ona kush mi sushi"±12st+chorus.Drop(155BPM/32b):24-layer spectrum.FM perc 2:1+3.5:1 alt L/R.Acid mirror+octave displacement.Call-response"gle sata gle kola"spatial movement.Tape A800 saturation+opto comp 3:1.Break(145BPM/16b):Notch 80-200Hz+stereo narrow 40%.Rev piano maj7+cathedral verb.Sparse claps.Choir chops granular.Outro(155→140BPM/32b):Sequential dropout.Acid→sine sub mono<80Hz.Final vox"pala sve moje testove"granular 150ms+LP fade 2k→200Hz exp.

[LYRICS]
[Male - Verse 1]
padam boj nespokoj
To kao zadnji je fight
nesto boy neko tvoj
mi je omašio sprat

[Male - Verse 2]
sa njom je off road trip 
A ja pod dozom tip
često osetim
prošlosti mi srozali
tu si non stop ti 
kad su potopi
Pa me tada bleda gleda 
sneg sav bi da otopi

[Male - Bridge]
A tvoje telo bella celo sa telenovela
vrela polugala si mi u sred dana bela
sad me htela al prije to nije smela (nee)
zavela srela u tom lobiju hotela

[Female - Hook]
Ko da tamom me umije ,umije on sve 
Zar da tako me ubije,sruši svetove
Zna da tako me ugrije, ruke njegove 
zadnju nadu mi ulije,uzmi evo me

me

[Male - Verse 3]
Pitam gde si nestala a ti otišla po ccugu
Ti si tako nestvarna ali opet biram drugu
Vidim boje - vidim dugu 
palim petu redom pljugu 
bruku pertli u mom krugu 
ja podletim svakom drugu

[Male - Verse 4]
A ne treba ti mozak da sklopiš taj mozaik
sva si pogubna ko doza a ja ko pravi laik
Mene ne zanima poza ,ma samo mi to daji
bio sam vani od konza U tvorzi ko u odaji
A ja njoj ne verujem da na belom preterujem 
Pun klub flertuje a voli me to verujem
Guz nju neguje dupe ko da tu robuje
radim ja ko roba je,Sa mnom ko da na dopu je

[Male - Bridge]

vrela polugola si mi u sred dana bela
sad me htela al prije to nije smela (nee)

zadnju nadu mi ulije,uzmi evo me

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_38
[DESCRIPTION]
Intro(140BPM/32b):Thin kick+filtered sub@40Hz.Vocal"padam boj nespokoj"autotune+tape delay.Vinyl crackle+rev cymbal.Wide stereo.
Build1(140→150BPM/16b):Polyrhythm+triplet hats 16%swing.Acid TB-303 chromatic rise+tube sat+res sweep 20-90%.BG vocal"sa njom je off road trip"+12st pitch+chorus.
Drop1(155BPM/32b):808 sub E1+harm excite.Kick layers+sidechain 4:1/30ms attack.Acid saw+env filter+LFO 1/16sync.Vocal"ona kush mi sushi"harmony ±8cent+optical 3:1comp.
Break(145BPM/16b):Notch 80-200Hz+stereo narrow 40%.Rev piano maj7+cathedral verb.Sparse claps.Choir chops granular.Vocal"pitam..."+delay.
Build2(145→155BPM/16b):LP sweep 800Hz→8kHz+Q2.5.Risers white noise+sine.Brass stabs power+9th.Gate pads 1/8+autopan.Vocal"a tvoje..."+flanger.
Drop2(155BPM/32b):24 layers.FM perc 2:1+3.5:1 alt L/R.Acid mirror+oct disp.Call-response vox"gle sata..."spatial.Tape A800+harm excite.
Outro(155→140BPM/32b):Dropout every 4bars.Acid saw→sine sub mono<80Hz.Vocal"pala sve..."granular+LP fade.

[LYRICS]
[Male - Verse 1]
padam boj nespokoj
To kao zadnji je fight
nesto boy neko tvoj
mi je omašio sprat

[Male - Verse 2]
sa njom je off road trip 
A ja pod dozom tip
često osetim
prošlosti mi srozali
tu si non stop ti 
kad su potopi
Pa me tada bleda gleda 
sneg sav bi da otopi

[Male - Verse 3]
Pitam gde si nestala,
kaže pićem krije tugu
Ti si tako nestvarna,
ali opet biram drugu
Vidim boje - vidim dugu
palim petu redom pljuguu

[Male - Verse 4]
A ne treba ti mozak da sklopiš taj mozaik
sva si pogubna ko doza a ja ko pravi laik
Mene ne zanima poza ,ma samo mi to daji
bio sam vani od konza U tvorzi ko u odaji
A ja njoj ne verujem da na belom preterujem
Pun klub flertuje,
a voli me to verujem
Guz njen neguje,
u dupe to verujem
radi me jako kao roba je, eee,
a njoj Sa mnom ko na dopu je


[Male - Bridge]

vrela polugola si mi u sred dana bela

Zna da tako me ugrije, ruke njegove

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_38 (Cover)
[DESCRIPTION]
Slap house(155BPM):Saturated 808 sub@45Hz+harm excite.Syncopated kick layers+sidechain 4:1/20ms attack.TB-303 acid saw+res sweep 30-85%+LFO 1/16sync.Hypnotic vox"padam boj nespokoj"autotune+tape delay 1/8dot.Triplet hats 16%swing+relentless groove.White noise risers+rev cymbals.Build(150→155BPM/16b):Acid chromatic rise+tube sat.Percussion fills+offbeat claps.BG vox"ona kush mi sushi"±12st+chorus.Drop(155BPM/32b):24-layer spectrum.FM perc 2:1+3.5:1 alt L/R.Acid mirror+octave displacement.Call-response"gle sata gle kola"spatial movement.Tape A800 saturation+opto comp 3:1.Break(145BPM/16b):Notch 80-200Hz+stereo narrow 40%.Rev piano maj7+cathedral verb.Sparse claps.Choir chops granular.Outro(155→140BPM/32b):Sequential dropout.Acid→sine sub mono<80Hz.Final vox"pala sve moje testove"granular 150ms+LP fade 2k→200Hz exp.

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental]

[Female Vocal - Autotuned Tease]
padam boj, nespokoj (back vocal: glitched, robotic echo)

[Instrumental - Main Groove]


[Female - Verse 1]

nesto boy neko tvoj
mi je omašio sprat (sprat-sprat-sprat)

[Female - Verse 2]
sa njom je off road trip
A ja pod dozom tip
često osetim to,
u prošlosti mi rolali,
bajs vozali, (aaaa...)
tu si non stop ti
kad su potopi
Pa me tada bleda gleda
sneg sav bi da otopi

[Instrumental - Breather 1]


[Chorus - Drop 1]
Ona kush mi sushi, nema bolja šema
Puls mi ruši, hiljadu problema
uši buši, dijamanta šema
lamele favela cela
Menja sve dresove, a ja sam high (ooooooo)
Mala smanjuje besove da ja sam taj (aaaaaa)
Dala sve svoje stresove, mala sve daj (ooo ooo)
pala sve moje testove garant je kraj aj aj (aaa aaa)

[Instrumental - Breathe2]


[Female - Verse 3]
Gledam gde je nestalo,
kažu pićem krije tugu
Ti si stvarno nestvaran,
ali opet biram drugog
Vidim boje - vidim dugu
palim petu redom pljugu,
znam da hoćeš mene,
a ne nijednu drugu.

aaaaa ne, ne (ne trebaaa aaa) [back vocal: heavily distorted, chopped]
ne ne nnnnnn ne treba

ne ne nnnnnn ne treba

Zar da tako me ubije, sruši svetove

zadnju nadu mi ulije, uzmi evo me

[Instrumental - Drop 2]


[Chorus - Drop 2]
Ona kush mi sushi, nema bolja šema
Puls mi ruši, hiljadu problema
uši buši, dijamanta šema
lamele favela cela
Menja sve dresove, a ja sam high (OOO)
Mala smanjuje besove da ja sam taj (AAA)
Dala sve svoje stresove, mala sve daj (OOO OOO)
pala sve moje testove garant je kraj aj aj (AAA AAA)

[Call & Response Vocals]
Rollie pepsi ima dipsi klizi viski (belog pol)
voli blesa da pošizi igra malo gola go

a lepota moja ti si (a ja kraljica of coke)

Zna da tako me ugrije, ruke njegove
zadnju nadu mi ulije, uzmi evo me

[Instrumental - Drop 2]


[Chorus - Drop 2]
Ona kush mi sushi, nema bolja šema
Puls mi ruši, hiljadu problema
uši buši, dijamanta šema
lamele favela cela
Menja sve dresove, a ja sam high (OOO)
Mala smanjuje besove da ja sam taj (AAA)
Dala sve svoje stresove, mala sve daj (OOO OOO)
pala sve moje testove garant je kraj aj aj (AAA AAA)

[Call & Response Vocals]
Rollie pepsi ima dipsi klizi viski (belog pol)
voli blesa da pošizi igra malo gola go
Oli motat white u rizli (mili cimaj dima smoke)
a lepota moja ti si (a ja kraljica of coke)
Mat Benz pun konja pesto (turiraš)
a vez full tozla, (mesto studiram)
keš tu lova, (često zumiram)
presto (kuliram), da poludi (aludiram)
(: aaaaaaaa)
(aaaaaaaa)

[Instrumental - Outro]

[Female - Outro]
Gle sata gle kola gle skanka što rolam (back vocal: cut off mid-word)

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_38_3
[DESCRIPTION]
A hypnotic tech house groove pulses with tight bass and crisp, driving percussion, while moody, underground club ambiences set the scene. Siren-style risers and chopped rave samples slice in atop bass that morphs subtly throughout. 80s-inspired midi synths layer melodic hooks, and sampled crowd cheers and chant vocals explode with raw, communal energy at each drop.

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental]

[Female Vocal - Autotuned Tease]
padam boj, nespokoj (back vocal: glitched, robotic echo)

[Instrumental - Main Groove]


[Female - Verse 1]

nesto boy neko tvoj
mi je omašio sprat (sprat-sprat-sprat)
