sa njom je off road trip
A ja pod dozom tip
često osetim to,
u prošlosti mi rolali,
bajs vozali, (aaaa...)
tu si non stop ti
kad su potopi
Pa me tada bleda gleda
sneg sav bi da otopi

uši buši, dijamanta šema

pala sve moje testove garant je kraj aj aj (aaa aaa)

[Instrumental ]


[Female - Verse 3]

kažu pićem krije tugu
Ti si stvarno nestvaran,
ali opet biram drugog
Vidim boje - vidim dugu
palim petu redom pljugu,
znam da hoćeš mene,
a ne nijednu drugu.

[Vocal Chop]
aaaaa ne, ne (ne trebaaa aaa) [back vocal: heavily distorted, chopped]
ne ne nnnnnn ne treba
aaaaa ne, ne (ne trebaaa aaa) [back vocal: heavily distorted, chopped]
ne ne nnnnnn ne treba

zadnju nadu mi ulije, uzmi evo me

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_39
[DESCRIPTION]
Intro (120 BPM): Deep kick, rolling bassline; sultry vocal "padam boj nespokoj" through analog delay and reverb, Build-up (120 → 124 BPM): Percussion layers with shakers and rim shots; filtered stab progression rises, Drop 1 (124 BPM): Four-on-floor groove with syncopated hi-hats; groovy bassline and warm pad chords; breathy vocal: "Ona kush mi sushi, nema bolja šema" with compression and chorus, Breakdown (122 BPM): Bass filtered down, atmospheric pads swell; whispered vocal fragments and vinyl crackle, Build 2 (122 → 124 BPM): Bass filter opens, snare rolls and cymbal crashes; chord stabs build tension with sidechain pumping, Drop 2 (124 BPM): Fuller arrangement with percussion fills, deeper bass and lush strings; seductive vocal harmonies: "Ko da tamom me umije" layered with pitch shifts, Outro (124 → 120 BPM): Elements fade gradually, bass becomes sub-heavy drone, final whispered vocal through tape echo and lowpass filter

[LYRICS]
[Intrumental]

[Male - Verse 1]
padam boj nespokoj
To kao zadnji je fight
nesto boy neko tvoj
mi je omašio sprat

[Male - Verse 2]
sa njom je off road trip 
A ja pod dozom tip
često osetim
prošlosti mi srozali
tu si non stop ti 
kad su potopi
Pa me tada bleda gleda 
sneg sav bi da otopi

[Male - Verse 3]
Pitam gde si nestala,
kaže pićem krije tugu
Ti si tako nestvarna,
ali opet biram drugu
Vidim boje - vidim dugu
palim petu redom pljuguu

[Male - Verse 4]
A ne treba ti mozak da sklopiš taj mozaik
sva si pogubna ko doza a ja ko pravi laik
Mene ne zanima poza ,ma samo mi to daji
bio sam vani od konza U tvorzi ko u odaji
A ja njoj ne verujem da na belom preterujem
Pun klub flertuje,
a voli me to verujem
Guz njen neguje,
u dupe to verujem
radi me jako kao roba je, eee,
a njoj Sa mnom ko na dopu je


[Male - Bridge]
A tvoje telo bella celo sa telenovela
vrela polugola si mi u sred dana bela
sad me htela al prije to nije smela (nee)
zavela srela u tom lobiju hotela

[Female - Hook]
Ko da tamom me umije ,umije on sve 
Zar da tako me ubije,sruši svetove
Zna da tako me ugrije, ruke njegove 
zadnju nadu mi ulije,uzmi evo me

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_4
[DESCRIPTION]
A relentless, underground bass tech house track with gritty basslines, frenetic grooves, and haunting rhythms. Dark, atmospheric tones and rapid, piercing beats create a raw, hypnotic energy.

[LYRICS]
[Male - Verse 1]
Rollie pepsi ima dipsi klizi viski belog pol
voli blesi da po sisi igra malo gola go
Oli mota white u rizli mila cima dima soke
a lepota moja ti si a ja kraljina of coke

a vez full tozla, mesto studiram
keš tu lova,često zumiram
presto kuliram , da poludi aludiram

Puls mi ruši ,hiljadu problema
uši buši ,dijamanta šema 
lamele favela cela

Menja sve dresove,a ja sam high
Mala smanjuje besove da ja sam taj

pala sve moje testove garant je kraj aj aj

[Male - Bridge]

gle brata mentola pa start ga patrola
i want samo lova sve ganc samo novacke

[Male - Chorus]

ona skida donji veš
Mala smeš sve smeš
Ona kida bacam keš

[Male - Verse 4]
Pa pa panika kad se slika 
i bez trika skida to 
Ka kalinka ruska pička 
pada šminka istu noć
E moj prika još se šika 
Nikad crto likovno
al znam da crtam bro
i to baš predobro

[Male - Bridge]
ja sam željan tvog tela
sva ti goriš kao vatra
A tvoja je želja
Da ti radim to polako
kad je naša bleja
banuću sa ortakom
da nam stražu čuvaš
dok mi dimimo se skankom

[Male - Verse 5]
one vole belo to
a ja volim kurve te
svega baci na stoo
pa dovodim ih dve
lud sam sto posto
Na umu mi samo keš

[Male - Chorus]
Sve je sada prelako
moja banda Marakesh
Prošlo peto ljeto
ti si tu sa deckom
Ja sad krug
s korvetom
Dok tu sam 
s tetkom
i sa beretom

[Male - Verse 6]
naš ceo geto 
vas izrežeto sad
pistolero gun
brutto netto daj
torbe natrpaj
sveto mesto raj
pada češto gard

[Male - Bridge]
Šetnja kerova
Bruka lerova
Sto je smerova
gde bih ne znam ja
Obuo sam  patike
pa izuo te taktike 
Isti sve šablon klasike
A Cure vam od plastike
Dupe bez gimnastike
Lepše su mi kasirke

[Male - Verse 7]
U treši mi šuška 
belo pa đuskam 
ona je uska
u gepeku puška 
u pretincu njuška 
rakija kruška
Petica vutra 
pare ne sutra 
već sve sada 
i luda i mlada 
upoznala gada 
dama iz grada
i šmele iz kraja
a ja geto favele
mi linije bele 
biljke mi zrele 
pa berba je blizu
Peta u nizu 
Da ne treba vizu
pa ne trebam rizlu
i  ne  trebam kintu
ja ne trebam pičku
pa ne lažem priču
da polomim kičmu 
tom tvom banditu
dam ruku vaspitnu

---

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_4
[DESCRIPTION]
An ultra-high BPM, hyperactive track driven by relentless syncopated percussion and pounding, pulsating 808s. Traditional instruments appear as frenetic, staccato samples, chopped for rhythmic hooks. Rapid-fire robotic autotuned vocals overlap with crew ad-libs for chaotic, layered energy.

[LYRICS]
Rollie pepsi ima dipsi klizi viski belog pol
voli blesi da po sisi igra malo gola go
Oli mota white u rizli mila cima dima soke
a lepota moja ti si a ja kraljina  of coke

Mat Benz pun konja pesto turiram
a vez full tozla, mesto studiram
keš tu lova,često zumiram
presto kuliram , da poludi aludiram

Ona kush mi sushi,nema bolja šema
Puls mi ruši ,hiljadu problema
uši buši ,dijamanta šema 
lamele favela cela

Menja sve dresove,a ja sam high
Mala smanjuje besove da ja sam taj
Dala sve svoje stresove ,mala sve daj
pala sve moje testove garant je kraj aj aj

Gle sata gle kola gle skanka što rolam
De manjka kontrola tu sanka se gola
gle brata mentola pa start ga patrola
i want samo lova sve ganc samo novacke

Sav sam fresh ,svež
ona skida donji veš
Mala smeš sve smeš
Ona kida bacam keš

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_4
[DESCRIPTION]
A raw gangsta/street rap track rides a dark, minimal trap beat with booming 808s, rapid hi-hats, and brooding synths. Aggressive flows from multiple vocalists alternate, weaving in crew call-and-response, hard punch-ins, and ad-libs. Layers build for a tense, relentless energy, balancing gritty street roots with slick, modern production.

[LYRICS]
Rollie pepsi ima dipsi klizi viski belog pol

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_4 (Remix)
[DESCRIPTION]
This slap house track pulses at 155 BPM with filthy, saturated sub-bass, punchy syncopated drums, and relentless, infectious grooves. Dark acid synths weave gritty melodies, punctuated by hypnotic, autotuned deep vocals layered over sharp hats and risers for an erotic, high-intensity club feel.

[LYRICS]
[Verse 1]
Rollie pepsi ima dipsi klizi viski belog pol
voli blesi da po sisi igra malo gola go
Oli mota white u rizli mila cima dima soke
a lepota moja ti si a ja kraljina of coke
Mat Benz pun konja pesto turiram
a vez full tozla, mesto studiram
keš tu lova,često zumiram
presto kuliram , da poludi aludiram

[Chorus]
Ona kush mi sushi,nema bolja šema
Puls mi ruši ,hiljadu problema
uši buši ,dijamanta šema
lamele favela cela
Menja sve dresove,a ja sam high
Mala smanjuje besove da ja sam taj
Dala sve svoje stresove ,mala sve daj
pala sve moje testove garant je kraj aj aj

[Verse 2]
Gle sata gle kola gle skanka što rolam

Menja sve dresove,a ja sam high
Mala smanjuje besove da ja sam taj
Dala sve svoje stresove ,mala sve daj
pala sve moje testove garant je kraj aj aj

[Verse 2]
Gle sata gle kola gle skanka što rolam

[Verse 2]
Gle sata 

[Verse 1]
Rollie pepsi ima dipsi klizi viski belog pol
voli blesi da po sisi igra malo gola go
Oli mota white u rizli mila cima dima soke
a lepota moja ti si a ja kraljina of coke
Mat Benz pun konja pesto turiram
a vez full tozla, mesto studiram
keš tu lova,često zumiram
presto kuliram , da poludi aludiram

[Chorus]

Puls mi ruši ,hiljadu problema
uši buši ,dijamanta šema
lamele favela cela
Menja sve dresove,a ja sam high
Mala smanjuje besove da ja sam taj
Dala sve svoje stresove ,mala sve daj
pala sve moje testove garant je kraj aj aj

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_4 (Remix) (Remastered)
[DESCRIPTION]
This slap house track pulses at 155 BPM with filthy, saturated sub-bass, punchy syncopated drums, and relentless, infectious grooves. Dark acid synths weave gritty melodies, punctuated by hypnotic, autotuned deep vocals layered over sharp hats and risers for an erotic, high-intensity club feel.

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_40
[DESCRIPTION]
Intro (130 BPM): Oud arpeggios with filtered 808s; autotuned whisper "padam boj nespokoj" through Egyptian reverb, Build-up (130 → 145 BPM): Balkan brass stabs layer with drill hi-hats; penetrating sub-bass climbs with Middle Eastern scales, Drop 1 (150 BPM): Crushing Serbian drill kicks anchor fusion rhythms; oud melody sidechained to trap snares; vocal stack "Ona kush mi sushi, nema bolja šema" pitch-shifted through desert delays, Breakdown (140 BPM): Bass narrows with qanun plucks, reversed brass hits and sparse tabla fills, Build 2 (140 → 150 BPM): Filter sweeps on Eastern synths, layered risers with Balkan percussion; dramatic brass accents on downbeats, Drop 2 (150 BPM): Dense arrangement with drill snares, mirrored oud variations, call-response vocals drenched in lust-fueled autotune and tape saturation; harmonic exciter pushes sub frequencies, Outro (150 → 130 BPM): Percussion fades to ancient scales, final vocal "Ko da tamom me umije" dissolves through granular sphinx echoes

[LYRICS]
[Intrumental]

[Male - Verse 1]
padam boj nespokoj
To kao zadnji je fight
nesto boy neko tvoj
mi je omašio sprat

[Male - Verse 2]
sa njom je off road trip 
A ja pod dozom tip
često osetim
prošlosti mi srozali
tu si non stop ti 
kad su potopi
Pa me tada bleda gleda 
sneg sav bi da otopi

[Male - Verse 3]
Pitam gde si nestala,
kaže pićem krije tugu
Ti si tako nestvarna,
ali opet biram drugu
Vidim boje - vidim dugu
palim petu redom pljuguu

[Male - Verse 4]
A ne treba ti mozak da sklopiš taj mozaik
sva si pogubna ko doza a ja ko pravi laik
Mene ne zanima poza ,ma samo mi to daji
bio sam vani od konza U tvorzi ko u odaji
A ja njoj ne verujem da na belom preterujem
Pun klub flertuje,
a voli me to verujem
Guz njen neguje,
u dupe to verujem
radi me jako kao roba je, eee,
a njoj Sa mnom ko na dopu je


[Male - Bridge]
A tvoje telo bella celo sa telenovela
vrela polugola si mi u sred dana bela
sad me htela al prije to nije smela (nee)
zavela srela u tom lobiju hotela

[Female - Hook]
Ko da tamom me umije ,umije on sve 
Zar da tako me ubije,sruši svetove
Zna da tako me ugrije, ruke njegove 
zadnju nadu mi ulije,uzmi evo me


[Male - Bridge]

vrela polugala si mi u sred dana bela
sad me htela al prije to nije smela (nee)

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_42
[DESCRIPTION]
Intro (85 BPM): Deep 808 rumble with filtered Balkan strings; hyper-autotuned "padam boj nespokoj" whispers through analog delay, Build-up (85 → 95 BPM): Traditional zurna samples chopped and pitched; sultry female vocals "Ko da tamom me umije" layered with male harmonies, Drop 1 (100 BPM): Penetrating sub-bass anchors shadowy groove; distorted kick pattern with syncopated snares; vocal stack "Ona kush mi sushi" processed through formant shifting, Breakdown (90 BPM): Bass filters to mono; ethnic flute samples reversed with sparse 808 hits and atmospheric pads, Build 2 (90 → 100 BPM): Rising tension with layered vocal chops; brass stabs accent offbeats; filtered white noise sweeps, Drop 2 (100 BPM): Full arrangement with crushing sub, mirrored bassline variations; call-response between male/female vocals through tape saturation, Outro (100 → 85 BPM): Elements fade to filtered sub-oscillation; final vocal "zadnju nadu mi ulije" dissolves through granular processing and lowpass decay

[LYRICS]
[Intrumental]

[Male - Verse 1]

nesto boy neko tvoj

[DESCRIPTION]
Maximum-energy hybrid with seismic basslines and glitchy autotune effects. Sultry vocals fragment over breakneck rhythms and trap-influenced percussion. Shadowy sensuality collides with frenetic drops, creating a hypnotic, high-BPM dancefloor destroyer with futuristic textures.

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_6
[DESCRIPTION]
An infectious UK club bounce track kicks off with bouncy house piano stabs, thick side-chained bass, and sharp syncopated drums. Crisp hi-hats drive the rhythm, with chopped vocal samples slicing between drops. Breakdowns add filtered sweeps before explosive, energetic drops return.

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_6
[DESCRIPTION]
"Extasy" merges raw gangsta/street rap aesthetics with bounce-inspired elements, creating a distinctive sonic hybrid. The track combines dark trap beats and aggressive flows with an unconventional foundation built around the iconic "Who Let the Dogs Out?" sample. Deep 808 sub-bass frequencies provide the pulsating low-end that encourages the rhythmic knee-bending motion central to bounce dance technique. The production incorporates call-and-response elements in its hook structure, while the fast tempo and driving four-on-the-floor kick pattern create an irresistible groove that bridges New Orleans bounce influences with German street rap. This fusion maintains the genre's crew-based dynamics and unfiltered authenticity while optimizing the instrumental for maximum physical response, exemplifying how bounce's dance-oriented principles can elevate gangsta rap's underground credibility to achieve mainstream appeal through its body-moving production.

[LYRICS]
[Male - Verse 1]
padam boj nespokoj

nesto boy neko tvoj
mi je omašio sprat

sneg sav bi da otopi

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_6
[DESCRIPTION]
High-energy rap-slap house fusion characterized by pulsating basslines and infectious 4/4 rhythms. Hyper-processed vocal delivery blends streetwise rap flows with sultry autotuned hooks, creating a shadowy yet sensual vibe. The track penetrates with deep, rubbery bass drops and electronic percussion, while maintaining an underground club authenticity. Captivating dancefloor anthem with bouncy grooves and hypnotic synth layers, perfect for late-night sessions and party-ready vibes.

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_8
[DESCRIPTION]
Pulsating 155 BPM slap house built on filthy, deep basslines and punchy four-on-the-floor kicks, layered with edgy syncopated percussion and explosive claps. Dark acid synth lines twist around infectious, evolving grooves, while hypnotic, heavily autotuned deep vocals weave through, amplifying the erotic, high-energy charge. Intermittent breakdowns highlight squelchy acid textures before surging back into body-moving drops.

[LYRICS]
Rollie pepsi ima dipsi klizi viski belog pol
voli blesi da po sisi igra malo gola go
Oli mota white u rizli mila cima dima soke
a lepota moja ti si a ja kraljina  of coke

Mat Benz pun konja pesto turiram
a vez full tozla, mesto studiram
keš tu lova,često zumiram
presto kuliram , da poludi aludiram

Ona kush mi sushi,nema bolja šema
Puls mi ruši ,hiljadu problema
uši buši ,dijamanta šema 
lamele favela cela

Menja sve dresove,a ja sam high
Mala smanjuje besove da ja sam taj
Dala sve svoje stresove ,mala sve daj
pala sve moje testove garant je kraj aj aj

Gle sata gle kola gle skanka što rolam
De manjka kontrola tu sanka se gola
gle brata mentola pa start ga patrola
i want samo lova sve ganc samo novacke

Sav sam fresh ,svež
ona skida donji veš
Mala smeš sve smeš
Ona kida bacam keš

Pa pa panika kad se slika 
i bez trika skida to 
Ka kalinka ruska pička 
pada šminka istu noć
E moj prika još se šika 
Nikad crto likovno
al znam da crtam bro
i to baš predobro

ja sam željan tvog tela
sva ti goriš kao vatra
A tvoja je želja
Da ti radim to polako
kad je naša bleja
banuću sa ortakom
da nam stražu čuvaš
dok mi dimimo se skankom

one vole belo to
a ja volim kurve te
svega baci na stoo
pa dovodim ih dve
lud sam sto posto
Na umu mi samo keš
Sve je sada prelako
moja banda Marakesh

Prošlo peto ljeto
ti si tu sa deckom
Ja sad krug
 s korvetom
Dok tu sam 
s tetkom
i sa beretom
naš ceo geto 
vas izrežeto sad
pistolero gun
brutto netto daj
torbe natrpaj
sveto mesto raj
pada češto gard
Šetnja kerova
Bruka lerova
Sto je smerova
gde bih ne znam ja

Obuo sam  patike
pa izuo te taktike 
Isti sve šablon klasike
A Cure vam od plastike
Dupe bez gimnastike
Lepše su mi kasirke

U treši mi šuška 
belo pa đuskam 
ona je uska
u gepeku puška 
u pretincu njuška 
rakija kruška
Petica vutra 
pare ne sutra 
već sve sada 
i luda i mlada 
upoznala gada 
dama iz grada
i šmele iz kraja

a ja geto favele
mi linije bele 
biljke mi zrele 
pa berba je blizu

Peta u nizu 
Da ne treba vizu
pa ne trebam rizlu
i  ne  trebam kintu
ja ne trebam pičku
pa ne lažem priču
da polomim kičmu 
tom tvom banditu
dam ruku vaspitnu

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_8
[DESCRIPTION]
Slap house foundation at 155 BPM, built on filthy, sub-driven basslines and sharp, percussive hits, Layers of acid synths weave dark, erotic hooks, Balkan trap and Serbian drill elements bring chromatic melodies, syncopated brass, and shifting rhythmic patterns, Egyptian scales color the topline, Intense, dynamic drops interplay with dense hi-hats, while hypnotic, deep-pitched, heavily autotuned vocals surge over each section, blending high-energy grooves with cinematic transitions and moody, nocturnal atmospheres

bruku pertli u mom krugu 
ja podletim svakom drugu

Verse
A ne treba ti mozak da sklopiš taj mozzaik
sva si pogubna ko doza a ja ko pravi laik
Mene ne zanima poza ,ma samo mi to daji
bio sam vani od konza U tvorzi ko u odaji


A ja njoj ne verujem da na belom preterujem 
Pun klub flertuje a voli me to verujem
Guz nju neguje dupe ko da tu robuje
radim ja ko roba je,Sa mnom ko da na dopu je


bridge:
A tvoje telo bella celo sa telenovela
vrelao polugala si mi u sred dana bela
sad me htela al prije to nije smela (nee)
zavela srela u tom lobiju hotela 

hook:
Ko da tamoom me umije ,umije on sve 
Zar da tako me ubije,sruši svetove
Zna da tako me ugrije, ruke njegove 
pabzadnju nadu mi ulije,uzmi evo me

---

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_8
[DESCRIPTION]
Slap house foundation at 155 BPM, built on filthy, sub-driven basslines and sharp, percussive hits, Layers of acid synths weave dark, erotic hooks, Balkan trap and Serbian drill elements bring chromatic melodies, syncopated brass, and shifting rhythmic patterns, Egyptian scales color the topline, Intense, dynamic drops interplay with dense hi-hats, while hypnotic, deep-pitched, heavily autotuned vocals surge over each section, blending high-energy grooves with cinematic transitions and moody, nocturnal atmospheres

[LYRICS]
verse 1
padam boj nespokoj
To kao zadnji je fight
nesto boy neko tvoj
mi je omašio sprat

često osetim

kad su potopi

sneg sav bi da otopi

pabzadnju nadu mi ulije,uzmi evo me

palim petu redom pljugu 
bruku pertli u mom krugu 
ja podletim svakom drugu

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_9
[DESCRIPTION]
A 155 BPM slap house track kicks off with relentless, punchy kicks and sharp, syncopated claps, quickly introducing menacing, deep basslines and dark, spiraling acid synths that surge in intensity. Hypnotic, intensely autotuned deep vocals weave throughout, layered over infectious grooves and clipped percussion, while filtered noise sweeps and subtle FX heighten the erotic high-energy pulse.

[LYRICS]
a ti bila meni blizu si 
pa ti trnu sinusi
po meni svome sinu si 
ime dala cirkusi
i dalje samo biznisi
pa nikada minusi 
noge šire ko virusi
grkinje i girosi
bitni su doprinsi 
sad ulica te časti 
a krimosi ko krimosi
samo znamo krasti

Imam fon blek beri
sef baš po meri 
gas revolveri spas
lajn atletika
Full genetika 
skup estetika 
put do Pekinga
vuko beli gram

u ektazi je ekstaza 
ekstazi je tu sa nama
Ovo nije samo faza 
pijem linije pa grama 
ali sise njene vise 
više podoji me mama
tiše krišom fukse prišle 
kite gutala ko viršle

a tu uvek se popije
 vučem kose vučem skije 
bebi lako se pobijem 
kada rade me linije
meni niko se ne smije 
svakako niko ne smije
jer bi najebao lako 
zaklo bih bez čakije

Sve nam je offer fame
to je kao over game
Ali mi smo over hejt
Poen dam pa over paid

---

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_CVI
[DESCRIPTION]
This EDM banger erupts at 150 BPM,igniting the floor with a relentless fusion of Balkan soul and modern fury. It opens with the iconic,wailing cry of a traditional accordion sample,immediately hijacked by a pounding,4/4 kick drum that feels like a heartbeat on steroids. The original melancholic melody is twisted into a weaponized synth lead,soaring over a seismic,sidechained bassline that never relents. Fiery Balkan brass stabs,processed through distortion and delay,punch through the mix like gunshots,while the original vocal—pitched and glitched—becomes a defiant,robotic mantra commanding you to move. There are no breakdowns,only momentary breathers where the kick filters back in with more punishing force. This is a non-stop,percussive assault designed for pure,unadulterated chaos; a track that doesn't build to a drop,but rather IS the drop from start to finish. It's a timeless melody supercharged into a futuristic,unrelenting beast that grabs you by the soul and refuses to let go u

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - Intro (150 BPM)]
*An iconic,soulful accordion melody is immediately hijacked by a pounding,4/4 kick drum and a seismic,sidechained bassline that never relents.*

[Female Vocal - Autotuned Tease]
padam boj, nespokoj (back vocal: glitched, robotic echo)

[Instrumental - Main Groove (150 BPM)]
*The accordion melody is twisted into a weaponized synth lead,soaring over the relentless rhythm. Fiery Balkan brass stabs punch through the mix.*

[Female - Verse 1]
To kao zadnji je fight
nesto boy neko tvoj
mi je omašio sprat (sprat-sprat-sprat)

[Female - Verse 2]
sa njom je off road trip
A ja pod dozom tip
često osetim to,
u prošlosti mi rolali,
bajs vozali, (aaaa...)
tu si non stop ti
kad su potopi
Pa me tada bleda gleda
sneg sav bi da otopi

[Instrumental - Breather 1 (150 BPM)]
*The kick filters out for a single beat,leaving a distorted brass riser that slams back into the groove with more force.*

[Chorus - Drop 1]
Ona kush mi sushi, nema bolja šema
Puls mi ruši, hiljadu problema
uši buši, dijamanta šema
lamele favela cela
Menja sve dresove, a ja sam high (ooooooo)
Mala smanjuje besove da ja sam taj (aaaaaa)
Dala sve svoje stresove, mala sve daj (ooo ooo)
pala sve moje testove garant je kraj aj aj (aaa aaa)

[Instrumental - Breather 2 (150 BPM)]
*The beat drops out for two bars,leaving only the pulsing bassline and a haunting,fragmented accordion melody. A vocal chop "mi je omašio sprat" echoes before a massive riser leads back into the chaos.*

[Female - Verse 3]
Gledam gde je nestalo,
kažu pićem krije tugu
Ti si stvarno nestvaran,
ali opet biram drugog
Vidim boje - vidim dugu
palim petu redom pljugu,
znam da hoćeš mene,
a ne nijednu drugu.

[Vocal Chop]
aaaaa ne, ne (ne trebaaa aaa) [back vocal: heavily distorted, chopped]
ne ne nnnnnn ne treba
aaaaa ne, ne (ne trebaaa aaa) [back vocal: heavily distorted, chopped]
ne ne nnnnnn ne treba

[Instrumental - Build 3 (150 BPM)]
*Frantic Balkan percussion accelerates,brass stabs become a machine-gun fire,and the accordion synth spirals into a fever pitch.*

[Female - Hook - Build Intensity]
Ko da tamom me umije, umije on sve
Zar da tako me ubije, sruši svetove
Zna da tako me ugrije, ruke njegove
zadnju nadu mi ulije, uzmi evo me

[Instrumental - Drop 2 (150 BPM)]
*Maximum energy—all elements at full power: weaponized accordion synth,seismic bassline,pounding kick,and distorted brass create a wall of sound.*

[Chorus - Drop 2]
Ona kush mi sushi, nema bolja šema
Puls mi ruši, hiljadu problema
uši buši, dijamanta šema
lamele favela cela
Menja sve dresove, a ja sam high (OOO)
Mala smanjuje besove da ja sam taj (AAA)
Dala sve svoje stresove, mala sve daj (OOO OOO)
pala sve moje testove garant je kraj aj aj (AAA AAA)

[Call & Response Vocals]
Rollie pepsi ima dipsi klizi viski (belog pol)
voli blesa da pošizi igra malo gola go
Oli motat white u rizli (mili cimaj dima smoke)
a lepota moja ti si (a ja kraljica of coke)
Mat Benz pun konja pesto (turiraš)
a vez full tozla, (mesto studiram)
keš tu lova, (često zumiram)
presto (kuliram), da poludi (aludiram)
(: aaaaaaaa)
(aaaaaaaa)

[Instrumental - Outro]
*The main synth and kick cut out abruptly,leaving only a single,echoing brass stab that is then cut to silence.*

[Female - Outro]
Gle sata gle kola gle skanka što rolam (back vocal: cut off mid-word)

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_CXII
[DESCRIPTION]
A hypnotic tech house groove pulses with tight bass and crisp, driving percussion, while moody, underground club ambiences set the scene. Siren-style risers and chopped rave samples slice in atop bass that morphs subtly throughout. 80s-inspired midi synths layer melodic hooks, and sampled crowd cheers and chant vocals explode with raw, communal energy at each drop.

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - Intro (140 BPM)-moody tech-house ambience, tight sub-bass pulse, crisp rim percussion, subtle 80s synth pads, vinyl crackle, reverb haze; MIX: HP @ 30Hz, kick focus 60Hz +2dB, low-mid dip 200–400Hz -1.5dB, BUS: mild tape sat, glue comp 1.8:1 fast.*]

[Male Vocal - Autotuned Tease - dry-present lead with airy tail, formant shift on ad-libs, light plate reverb; PROC: pitch auto ~15-25%, de-esser 6–8k, EQ low cut 80Hz, parallel saturation +2dB.*]
padam boj, nespokoj [back vocal]

[Instrumental - Build-up (140 → 155 BPM)-tempo ramp, tightening snare rolls, siren risers, chopped rave vox, increasing HP filter automation; MIX: snare bus transient +1.5, riser parallel clip, sidechain on pads to kick -4dB duck.*]

[Male - Verse 1 - intimate close vocal, slight pitch-correction, short plate; ARR: kick+hat locked, sub drone at -6dB; MIX: vocal comp 3:1, 6ms attack, 60ms release, bus eq add presence +2dB @3.5k.*]
To kao zadnji je fight
nesto boy neko tvoj
mi je omašio sprat

[Male - Verse 2 - widen doubles on pre-chorus, tape saturation on consonants; ARR: melodic pluck synth enters, hi-hat groove tightens; MIX: transient shaper on bass, low shelving on bass +1.5dB @85Hz.*]
sa njom je off road trip
A ja pod dozom tip
često osetim to,
u prošlosti mi rolali,
bajs vozali, (aaaa...)
tu si non stop ti
kad su potopi
Pa me tada bleda gleda
sneg sav bi da otopi

[Instrumental - Drop 1 (155 BPM)-bass detonates, FM stabs, sidechain compression pumping, crowd-shout FX, full stereo expansion; MIX: pump sidechain 1:3 ratio, kick transient transient shaper +2, sub-limit -0.5dB.*]

[Chorus - Drop 1 - vocal stacks, wide reverb plate, syncopated club stabs, acid swell under chorus; ARR: lead doubled L/R, small-delay slap; MIX: chorus bus comp 2:1, de-esser, stereo widen 10–30% on >3k.*]
Ona kush mi sushi, nema bolja šema
Puls mi ruši, hiljadu problema
uši buši, dijamanta šema
lamele favela cela
Menja sve dresove, a ja sam high (ooooooo)
Mala smanjuje besove da ja sam taj (aaaaaa)
Dala sve svoje stresove, mala sve daj (ooo ooo)
pala sve moje testove garant je kraj aj aj (aaa aaa)

[Monastic Chants - low chant layers, spectral widening, subtle harmonic EQ; MIX: M/S widen on 400–2k, low-pass tail under 200Hz, reverb pre-delay 40ms.*]

[Instrumental - Breakdown (145 BPM)-brief respite, notch-filtered bass to remove build resonance, reversed piano stabs with long decay, airy reverb expansion; MIX: cut 150–260Hz -2dB, widen piano L/R, automate LPF down to 1.2k then open.*]

[Female - Verse 1 - warm analog-tone, breathy doubles, subtle slap delay; PROC: comp 4:1, slow attack 10ms, release 120ms, harmonic excite around 2k; MIX: lowcut 80Hz, presence +1.5dB @5k.*]

znam da hoćeš mene,
a ne nijednu drugu.

"ne treba"
aaaaa ne, ne ( ne trebaaa aaa)
ne ne nnnnnn ne treba
aaaaa ne, ne (ne trebaaa aaa)
ne ne nnnnnn ne treba

[Instrumental - Build 2 (145 → 160 BPM)-relentless climb, stacked risers, wide filter sweeps, dense snare blur; MIX: layered risers saturated, glue comp on drums 2:1, HP roll on pads to prevent mud.*]

[Male - Verse 3 - aggressive tuned lead, compressed for upfront punch, percussive gating on consonants; ARR: syncopated percussive stabs follow vocal rhythm; MIX: sidechain bass to vocal transient, excite 4–6k +1dB.*]
A ne treba ti mozak da sklopiš taj mozaik
sva si pogubna ko doza a ja ko pravi laik
Mene ne zanima poza, ma samo mi to daji
bio sam vani od konza U tvorzi ko u odaji

a voli me, to verujem
Guz njen, negujem,
u dupe to verujem
radi me jako, kao roba je, (eee)

[Female - Bridge - dream-pop reverb bloom, melodic arps mirror vocal, breathy tone swell; MIX: reverb send heavy on bridge (60% wet), stereo arp pan L/R 40%, subtle slap delay 1/8 dotted.*]
A tvoje telo bella celo sa telenovela
vrela polugola sam sad u sred dana bela
sad te htela al prije to nisam smela (nee)
zavela srela u tom lobiju hotela

"Ko da tamom me umije"
Ko da tamom me umije, umije on sve
Zar da tako me ubije, sruši svetove
Zna da tako me ugrije, ruke njegove
zadnju nadu mi ulije, uzmi evo me

[Chorus - Drop 2 - anthem energy, chants layered, kick hits massive]

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_CXIII
[DESCRIPTION]
Subterranean tech-house opener for late-evening club warm-ups. It locks a hypnotic 140→160 BPM groove with a focused sub-bass, FM acid motifs and 80s-inspired pads. Verses remain intimate and dry; drops expand into FM stabs, layered vocal stacks and monastic chant textures that deliver ritualistic energy. Arrangements emphasize low-end clarity, vocal presence, automated HP/LP filter automation and tempo-synced risers. Transition: outro strips highs while preserving a rolling sub-oscillation and vinyl crackle; a 12–16 bar tempo-synced riser + white-noise sweep and resonant clap create the blend point into Track 2. Mix tips: keep monosub <120 Hz, gently cut 200–400 Hz in the outro, leave riser/crackle/chants stems at –6 dB for DJ layering. Master: –8 to –6 LUFS integrated; True Peak –0.3 dB; reference modern melodic techno productions for punch and air. Include harmonic key, coherent low-end, stem labels, a DJ instrumental with isolated sub-loop (recommend 6–10 s blend), tempo ±2 BPM.*

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - Intro (140 BPM)-tech-house sub, rim percussion, 80s pads, vinyl crackle.*]

[Male Vocal - Autotuned Tease - dry lead, airy tail.*]
padam boj, nespokoj [back vocal]

[Instrumental - Build-up (140 → 155 BPM)-siren riser, snare roll, chopped vox.*]

[Male - Verse 1]
To kao zadnji je fight
nesto boy neko tvoj
mi je omašio sprat

[Male - Verse 2]
sa njom je off road trip
A ja pod dozom tip
često osetim to,
u prošlosti mi rolali,
bajs vozali, (aaaa...)
tu si non stop ti
kad su potopi
Pa me tada bleda gleda
sneg sav bi da otopi

[Instrumental - Drop 1 (155 BPM)-pumping sidechain, FM stabs, crowd FX.*]

[Chorus - Drop 1]
Ona kush mi sushi, nema bolja šema
Puls mi ruši, hiljadu problema
uši buši, dijamanta šema
lamele favela cela
Menja sve dresove, a ja sam high (ooooooo)

pala sve moje testove garant je kraj aj aj (aaa aaa)

[Monastic Chants - low layered chants under bass.*]

[Instrumental - Breakdown (145 BPM)-notch bass, reversed piano, airy reverb.*]

[Female - Verse 1]
Gledam gde je nestalo,
kažu pićem krije tugu
Ti si stvarno nestvaran,
ali opet biram drugog
Vidim boje - vidim dugu
palim petu redom pljugu,
znam da hoćeš mene,
a ne nijednu drugu.

[Vocal Chop - pitch-glitch chops, tempo-sync delay.*]
"ne treba"
aaaaa ne, ne ( ne trebaaa aaa)
ne ne nnnnnn ne treba
aaaaa ne, ne (ne trebaaa aaa)
ne ne nnnnnn ne treba

[Instrumental - Build 2 (145 → 160 BPM)-stacked risers, HP sweep.*]

[Male - Verse 3]
A ne treba ti mozak da sklopiš taj mozaik
sva si pogubna ko doza a ja ko pravi laik
Mene ne zanima poza, ma samo mi to daji
bio sam vani od konza U tvorzi ko u odaji
A ja njoj ne verujem da volim preterujem
Pun klub flertuje,
a voli me, to verujem
Guz njen, negujem,
u dupe to verujem
radi me jako, kao roba je, (eee)

[Female - Bridge - reverb bloom, melodic arp mirror.*]
A tvoje telo bella celo sa telenovela
vrela polugola sam sad u sred dana bela
sad te htela al prije to nisam smela (nee)
zavela srela u tom lobiju hotela

[Female - Hook - cinematic build, layered harmonies.*]
"Ko da tamom me umije"
Ko da tamom me umije, umije on sve
Zar da tako me ubije, sruši svetove
Zna da tako me ugrije, ruke njegove
zadnju nadu mi ulije, uzmi evo me

[Instrumental - Drop 2 (160 BPM)-max density, acid swarm, doubled chants.*]

[Chorus - Drop 2]
Ona kush mi sushi, nema bolja šema
Puls mi ruši, hiljadu problema
uši buši, dijamanta šema
lamele favela cela
Menja sve dresove, a ja sam high (OOO)
Mala smanjuje besove da ja sam taj (AAA)
Dala sve svoje stresove, mala sve daj ( OOO OOO)
pala sve moje testove garant je kraj aj aj (AAA AAA)

[Call & Response Vocals - stereo interplay, punchy comp.*]
Rollie pepsi ima dipsi klizi viski (belog pol)
voli blesa da pošizi igra malo gola go
Oli motat white u rizli (mili cimaj dima smoke)
a lepota moja ti si (a ja kraljica of coke)
Mat Benz pun konja pesto (turiraš)
a vez full tozla, (mesto studiram)
keš tu lova, ( često zumiram)
presto (kuliram), da poludi (aludiram)
(: aaaaaaaa)
(aaaaaaaa)

[Instrumental - Outro (160 → 140 BPM)-gradual disintegration, kick fades, acid → sub-oscillation, crackle remains.*]

[Male - Outro - dry close vocal, lo-fi delay tail.*]
Gle sata gle kola gle skanka što rolam (back vocal: granulated)

[Instrumental - Fade to Silence - lowpass collapse, reverb tail.*]

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_CXIII_2
[DESCRIPTION]
Intensified continuation that propels the set forward — designed to launch the peak section while remaining DJ-friendly for extended mixing. It picks up the rolling sub and vinyl crackle from Track 1’s outro and opens with a resonant clap and white-noise sweep, accelerating energy and enriching the stereo top with mirrored acid arps, FM percussion and sharper transient hats. Tempo stabilizes at 155–160 BPM with automated micro-shifts to land drops cleanly. Vocals re-enter stacked and more aggressive; bridge and hook are reverb-bloomed and side-chained for club punch. Mix plan: open top-end, widen 3–12 kHz, tighten 60–120 Hz with multi-band compression, mono low < 120 Hz. DJ-ready: leave riser/crackle/chants stems, export 24 s intro tail and an 8-bar loop for blending. Master: –7 LUFS integrated; True Peak –0.3 dB; reference modern melodic techno productions for clarity and impact. Key: A.*

[LYRICS]
Instrumental - Intro (140 BPM)-tech-house sub, rim percussion, 80s pads, vinyl crackle.*]

[Male Vocal - Autotuned Tease - dry lead, airy tail.*]
padam boj, nespokoj [back vocal]

[Instrumental - Build-up (140 → 155 BPM)-siren riser, snare roll, chopped vox.*]

[Male - Verse 1]
To kao zadnji je fight
nesto boy neko tvoj
mi je omašio sprat

[Male - Verse 2]
sa njom je off road trip
A ja pod dozom tip
često osetim to,
u prošlosti mi rolali,
bajs vozali, (aaaa...)
tu si non stop ti
kad su potopi
Pa me tada bleda gleda
sneg sav bi da otopi

[Instrumental - Drop 1 (155 BPM)-pumping sidechain, FM stabs, crowd FX.*]

[Chorus - Drop 1]

uši buši, dijamanta šema
lamele favela cela

Mala smanjuje besove da ja sam taj (aaaaaa)
Dala sve svoje stresove, mala sve daj (ooo ooo)
pala sve moje testove garant je kraj aj aj (aaa aaa)

[Monastic Chants - low layered chants under bass.*]

[Instrumental - Breakdown (145 BPM)-notch bass, reversed piano, airy reverb.*]

[Female - Verse 1]
Gledam gde je nestalo,
kažu pićem krije tugu

ali opet biram drugog
Vidim boje - vidim dugu
palim petu redom pljugu,
znam da hoćeš mene,
a ne nijednu drugu.

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_CXIV
[DESCRIPTION]
High-energy rap-slap house fusion characterized by pulsating basslines and infectious 4/4 rhythms. Hyper-processed vocal delivery blends streetwise rap flows with sultry autotuned hooks, creating a shadowy yet sensual vibe. The track penetrates with deep, rubbery bass drops and electronic percussion, while maintaining an underground club authenticity. Captivating dancefloor anthem with bouncy grooves and hypnotic synth layers, perfect for late-night sessions and party-ready vibes.Mastering Chain & Reference - target -8 LUFS integrated (club), True Peak -0.3dB; CHAIN: corrective EQ (dip 250–500Hz -1.5–2.5dB) → multiband comp (tighten 60–200Hz / glue mids) → subtle tape sat +1.2–2dB → stereo imager (mono <200Hz) → final limiter ceiling -0.3dB → dither 24→16 bit. NOTES: send master -2 to -3dB headroom pre-limit; verify on club PA and earbuds.*]

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - Intro (128 BPM) - slap house foundation: 4/4 kick 60–100Hz +3dB, rubbery bass mono <200Hz, sidechain to kick; BUS: drum bus glue 2.5:1 medium, tape sat +1.5dB; ARR: 8-bar DJ-friendly intro, filtered bassline build over bars 5-8.*]
(padam boj nespokoj)

[Male - Verse 1 - dry lead; PROC: de-ess 6–8k, comp 3.5:1 atk 5ms rel 80ms, low-cut 100Hz, +2.5dB @3–4k; FX: short room 15ms, doubles 3–5ms; MIX: leave -5dB lead headroom, sidechain bass to kick.*]
padam boj nespokoj
To kao zadnji je fight
nesto boy neko tvoj
mi je omašio sprat

[Male - Verse 2 - processed lead; PROC: comp 4:1 atk 3ms rel 70ms, +1.5dB 2–5k, micro-shift doubles -8 cents 15% wet; MIX: pull bass -2dB under vocal breaks.*]
sa njom je off road trip 
A ja pod dozom tip
često osetim to,
u prošlosti mi rolali,
bajs vozali,aaaa...,
tu si non stop ti 
kad su potopi
Pa me tada bleda gleda 
sneg sav bi da otopi

[Female - Verse 1 - sultry autotuned; PROC: aggressive autotune retune speed fast, comp 3:1 atk 8ms rel 90ms, +2dB @5–7k, +1dB @200–300Hz; FX: plate reverb 20% wet, delay 1/8; MIX: keep vocals centered, -4dB headroom.*]
Gledam gde je nestao,
kažu pićem krije tugu
Ti si stvarno nestvaran,
ali opet biram drugog
Vidim boje - vidim dugu
palim petu redom pljugu,
znam da hoćeš mene,
a ne nijednu drugu.

ne ne nnnnnn ne treba

ne ne nnnnnn ne treba

A ne treba ti mozak da sklopiš taj mozaik
sva si pogubna ko doza a ja ko pravi laik
Mene ne zanima poza ,ma samo mi to daji
bio sam vani od konza U tvorzi ko u odaji

u dupe to verujem
radi me jako, kao roba je, eee,

A tvoje telo bella celo sa telenovela
vrela polugola sam sad u sred dana bela
sad te htela al prije to nisam smela (nee)
zavela srela u tom lobiju hotela

Ko da tamom me umije ,umije on sve 
Zar da tako me ubije,sruši svetove
Zna da tako me ugrije, ruke njegove 
zadnju nadu mi ulije,uzmi evo me

Gle sata gle kola gle skanka što rolam

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_CXIV
[DESCRIPTION]
High-energy rap-slap house fusion characterized by pulsating basslines and infectious 4/4 rhythms. Hyper-processed vocal delivery blends streetwise rap flows with sultry autotuned hooks, creating a shadowy yet sensual vibe. The track penetrates with deep, rubbery bass drops and electronic percussion, while maintaining an underground club authenticity. Captivating dancefloor anthem with bouncy grooves and hypnotic synth layers, perfect for late-night sessions and party-ready vibes.Mastering Chain & Reference - target -8 LUFS integrated (club), True Peak -0.3dB; CHAIN: corrective EQ (dip 250–500Hz -1.5–2.5dB) → multiband comp (tighten 60–200Hz / glue mids) → subtle tape sat +1.2–2dB → stereo imager (mono <200Hz) → final limiter ceiling -0.3dB → dither 24→16 bit. NOTES: send master -2 to -3dB headroom pre-limit; verify on club PA and earbuds.*]

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_CXV
[DESCRIPTION]
This EDM banger erupts at 150 BPM,igniting the floor with a relentless fusion of Balkan soul and modern fury. It opens with the iconic,wailing cry of a traditional accordion sample,immediately hijacked by a pounding,4/4 kick drum that feels like a heartbeat on steroids. The original melancholic melody is twisted into a weaponized synth lead,soaring over a seismic,sidechained bassline that never relents. Fiery Balkan brass stabs,processed through distortion and delay,punch through the mix like gunshots,while the original vocal—pitched and glitched—becomes a defiant,robotic mantra commanding you to move. There are no breakdowns,only momentary breathers where the kick filters back in with more punishing force. This is a non-stop,percussive assault designed for pure,unadulterated chaos; a track that doesn't build to a drop,but rather IS the drop from start to finish. It's a timeless melody supercharged into a futuristic,unrelenting beast that grabs you by the soul and refuses to let go u

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - Intro (150 BPM) — tech-house sub, rim percussion, 80s pads, vinyl crackle; ARR: single iconic zurle cry replaces accordion, 2-bar motif looped then layered with weaponized synth lead; PROC: zurle → transient enhancer + gentle saturation, HPF 120Hz to leave room for sub; pads: airy ethereal, slow LFO on filter 0.1Hz; MIX: kick muted first 4 bars, rim/perc wide 25% stereo, vinyl crackle -6dB send; BUS: FX bus (reverb+delay) 40% wet for atmosphere; SIDECHAIN: global 3:1 pump to pad.]
(padam boj, nespokoj)

[Instrumental - Build-up (150 → 155 BPM) — siren riser, snare roll, chopped vox; PROC: riser layered (analog + FM) stereo unison 4, automate pitch +1→+5 semitones into drop; chopped vox granular repeat 1/8→1/16; MIX: increase lowmid cut 200–400Hz +1.5dB to force energy; BUS: build bus compress 2:1 glue; TRANSITION: reverse zurle breath into first kick.]

[Male - Verse 1]
To kao zadnji je fight
nesto boy neko tvoj
mi je omašio sprat
[Lead vocal chain: Auto-Tune hard-tuned – retune speed 0–8ms for stylistic robotic; formant +0.5; EQ: HPF 80Hz, gentle shelf +3dB 3–6k for presence; De-esser 6–8k -3dB threshold; Comp: 4:1 atk 5ms rel 80ms; Plate reverb send 18% short predelay 8ms; Saturation: parallel tape 20% for grit; Stereo width: keep lead mono, subtle doubler at -10 cents send 12%].(ooooo — chopped echo)

[Male - Verse 2]
sa njom je off road trip
A ja pod dozom tip
često osetim to,
u prošlosti mi rolali,
bajs vozali, (aaaa...)
tu si non stop ti
kad su potopi
Pa me tada bleda gleda
sneg sav bi da otopi
[Verse treatment: intimate first half — remove heavy reverb, lowpass 10k; second half aggressive — add distortion send +8dB, parallel compression 50% blend, 808 lowpass @120Hz lowered -6dB under voice; ARR: keep phrasing tight, add subtle zurle counterline panned L30 R-30; FX: Balkan brass stabs replaced by distorted zurle/brass stabs processed with delay 1/8 ping-pong]
(aaaa... Kush)

[Instrumental - Drop 1 (155 BPM) — pumping 4/4 kick, seismic sidechained bass; PROC: kick => transient shaper attack 7ms, sub sine layer tuned to root, EQ boost +4dB @60Hz narrow; Bass: heavy 808 tuned melodic, glide 30–70ms, lowpass 12dB @3k; FM stabs + metallic zurle hits compressed 6:1; MIX: mono sub <120Hz; BUS: drums parallel comp 4:1 30% blend; SIDECHAIN: compressor key on kick - ratio 6:1 atk 10ms rel 100ms]
(crowd FX — pump)

[Chorus - Drop 1]
Ona kush mi sushi, nema bolja šema
Puls mi ruši, hiljadu problema
uši buši, dijamanta šema
lamele favela cela
Menja sve dresove, a ja sam high (ooooooo)
Mala smanjuje besove da ja sam taj (aaaaaa)
Dala sve svoje stresove, mala sve daj (ooo ooo)
pala sve moje testove garant je kraj aj aj (aaa aaa)
[Chant stack: double main vox + hard-tune doubles (-15 & +12 cents), harmonizer -3 voices, formant preserved; Zurle/Brass stabs accent downbeats processed with bitcrush 8-bit + small plate reverb; Pads: ethereal emotional pad under chants — LP sweep 200→6k across 8 bars; MIX: chorus open 8–12k +2dB, glue bus 1.5:1]
(Monastic low chants under bass)

[Monastic Chants - low layered chants under bass; PROC: multi-tracked 10+ layers octave down sampled to create sub-chant texture, saturate lightly, send to reverb 60% cathedral emulation; MIX: duck under kick via sidechain -4dB]

[Instrumental - Breakdown (145 BPM) — notch bass, reversed piano, airy reverb; PROC: momentary tempo dip for ear rest, filter sweep to 3k LP, reversed zurle breath leading back to drive; FX: grain delay on vocal chops; MIX: remove kick transient for 2 bars then slam back.]

[Female - Verse 1]
Gledam gde je nestao,
kažu pićem krije tugu
Ti si stvarno nestvaran,
ali opet biram drugog
Vidim boje - vidim dugu
palim petu redom pljugu,
znam da hoćeš mene,
a ne nijednu drugu.
[Female vocal chain: softer autotune retune 15–30ms for emotion, gentle chorus on doubles, reverb tail 28% long plate, EQ cut 250–400Hz -1.5dB to clear mask; Automate width on hook for lift]
(oooo — layered harmony)

[--- MID-PRODUCTION EXPORT GUIDELINES (FIRST HALF)
• Bounce stems for sections: Intro→Drop1 (separate: Zurle, Kick, Sub, Bass/808, Pads, Lead Male, Lead Female, Backing Chants, Perc/Hats, FX).
• Mid-master target: -8 LUFS integrated for reference previews; True Peak -0.5dB.
• Include a DJ 8-bar loop (Zurle + mono sub) exported dry for club testing.
• Notes: keep zurle mono-center during preview bounces to check phase; preserve mono sub <120Hz.]

---

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_CXV
[DESCRIPTION]
This EDM banger erupts at 150 BPM,igniting the floor with a relentless fusion of Balkan soul and modern fury. It opens with the iconic,wailing cry of a traditional accordion sample,immediately hijacked by a pounding,4/4 kick drum that feels like a heartbeat on steroids. The original melancholic melody is twisted into a weaponized synth lead,soaring over a seismic,sidechained bassline that never relents. Fiery Balkan brass stabs,processed through distortion and delay,punch through the mix like gunshots,while the original vocal—pitched and glitched—becomes a defiant,robotic mantra commanding you to move. There are no breakdowns,only momentary breathers where the kick filters back in with more punishing force. This is a non-stop,percussive assault designed for pure,unadulterated chaos; a track that doesn't build to a drop,but rather IS the drop from start to finish. It's a timeless melody supercharged into a futuristic,unrelenting beast that grabs you by the soul and refuses to let go u

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - Intro (150 BPM) — tech-house sub, rim percussion, 80s pads, vinyl crackle; ARR: single iconic zurle cry replaces accordion, 2-bar motif looped then layered with weaponized synth lead; PROC: zurle → transient enhancer + gentle saturation, HPF 120Hz to leave room for sub; pads: airy ethereal, slow LFO on filter 0.1Hz; MIX: kick muted first 4 bars, rim/perc wide 25% stereo, vinyl crackle -6dB send; BUS: FX bus (reverb+delay) 40% wet for atmosphere; SIDECHAIN: global 3:1 pump to pad.]
(padam boj, nespokoj)

[Instrumental - Build-up (150 → 155 BPM) — siren riser, snare roll, chopped vox; PROC: riser layered (analog + FM) stereo unison 4, automate pitch +1→+5 semitones into drop; chopped vox granular repeat 1/8→1/16; MIX: increase lowmid cut 200–400Hz +1.5dB to force energy; BUS: build bus compress 2:1 glue; TRANSITION: reverse zurle breath into first kick.]

[Male - Verse 1]
To kao zadnji je fight
nesto boy neko tvoj
mi je omašio sprat
([Lead vocal chain: Auto-Tune hard-tuned – retune speed 0–8ms for stylistic robotic; formant +0.5; EQ: HPF 80Hz, gentle shelf +3dB 3–6k for presence; De-esser 6–8k -3dB threshold; Comp: 4:1 atk 5ms rel 80ms; Plate reverb send 18% short predelay 8ms; Saturation: parallel tape 20% for grit; Stereo width: keep lead mono, subtle doubler at -10 cents send 12%].)
(ooooo — chopped echo)

[Male - Verse 2]
sa njom je off road trip
A ja pod dozom tip
često osetim to,
u prošlosti mi rolali,
bajs vozali, (aaaa...)
tu si non stop ti
kad su potopi
Pa me tada bleda gleda
sneg sav bi da otopi
([Verse treatment: intimate first half — remove heavy reverb, lowpass 10k; second half aggressive — add distortion send +8dB, parallel compression 50% blend, 808 lowpass @120Hz lowered -6dB under voice; ARR: keep phrasing tight, add subtle zurle counterline panned L30 R-30; FX: Balkan brass stabs replaced by distorted zurle/brass stabs processed with delay 1/8 ping-pong].)
(aaaa... Kush)

[Instrumental - Drop 1 (155 BPM) — pumping 4/4 kick, seismic sidechained bass; PROC: kick => transient shaper attack 7ms, sub sine layer tuned to root, EQ boost +4dB @60Hz narrow; Bass: heavy 808 tuned melodic, glide 30–70ms, lowpass 12dB @3k; FM stabs + metallic zurle hits compressed 6:1; MIX: mono sub <120Hz; BUS: drums parallel comp 4:1 30% blend; SIDECHAIN: compressor key on kick - ratio 6:1 atk 10ms rel 100ms].
(crowd FX — pump)

[Chorus - Drop 1]
Ona kush mi sushi, nema bolja šema
Puls mi ruši, hiljadu problema
uši buši, dijamanta šema
lamele favela cela
Menja sve dresove, a ja sam high (ooooooo)
Mala smanjuje besove da ja sam taj (aaaaaa)
Dala sve svoje stresove, mala sve daj (ooo ooo)
pala sve moje testove garant je kraj aj aj (aaa aaa)
([Chant stack: double main vox + hard-tune doubles (-15 & +12 cents), harmonizer -3 voices, formant preserved; Zurle/Brass stabs accent downbeats processed with bitcrush 8-bit + small plate reverb; Pads: ethereal emotional pad under chants — LP sweep 200→6k across 8 bars; MIX: chorus open 8–12k +2dB, glue bus 1.5:1].)
(Monastic low chants under bass)

[Monastic Chants - low layered chants under bass; PROC: multi-tracked 10+ layers octave down sampled to create sub-chant texture, saturate lightly, send to reverb 60% cathedral emulation; MIX: duck under kick via sidechain -4dB).

[Instrumental - Breakdown (145 BPM) — notch bass, reversed piano, airy reverb; PROC: momentary tempo dip for ear rest, filter sweep to 3k LP, reversed zurle breath leading back to drive; FX: grain delay on vocal chops; MIX: remove kick transient for 2 bars then slam back.]

[Female - Verse 1]
Gledam gde je nestao,
kažu pićem krije tugu
Ti si stvarno nestvaran,
ali opet biram drugog
Vidim boje - vidim dugu
palim petu redom pljugu,
znam da hoćeš mene,
a ne nijednu drugu.
([Female vocal chain: softer autotune retune 15–30ms for emotion, gentle chorus on doubles, reverb tail 28% long plate, EQ cut 250–400Hz -1.5dB to clear mask; Automate width on hook for lift].)
(oooo — layered harmony)

--- MID-PRODUCTION EXPORT GUIDELINES (FIRST HALF)
• Bounce stems for sections: Intro→Drop1 (separate: Zurle, Kick, Sub, Bass/808, Pads, Lead Male, Lead Female, Backing Chants, Perc/Hats, FX).
• Mid-master target: -8 LUFS integrated for reference previews; True Peak -0.5dB.
• Include a DJ 8-bar loop (Zurle + mono sub) exported dry for club testing.
• Notes: keep zurle mono-center during preview bounces to check phase; preserve mono sub <120Hz.

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_CXV
[DESCRIPTION]
This 150 BPM EDM banger launches with a piercing Balkan accordion sample over a relentless 4/4 kick, instantly charging the atmosphere. Weaponized synths transform the traditional melody atop a seismic, sidechained bass. Distorted, delayed Balkan brass stab and punch with chaotic energy, while a glitched, pitched vocal mantra rides the rhythmic assault. There’s no breakdown—just brief, filtered kick moments before re-entering at full throttle. Percussion is fierce; the track is an all-out, modern Balkan-electronic barrage, designed for non-stop dancefloor frenzy.

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - Intro- absolutely banging, adrenaline]
.*

[Male - Verse]
a ti bila meni blizu si
pa ti trnu sinusi
po meni svome sinu si
ime dala cirkusi (cir-ku-si)
i dalje samo biznisi
pa nikada minusi
noge šire ko virusi
grkinje i girosi

[Instrumental - Build-up]
*Dark acid synth squelches add tension; filthy, saturated bassline enters.*

[Drop - impactful]
u stalaži je ekstaza (ek-sta-za)
ekstazi je tu sa nama

[Male - Verse]
Ovo nije samo faza
pijem linije, pa grama
ali sise njene vise baš
više podoji me mama (ma-ma-ma)
tiše krišom fukse prišle
kite gutala ko viršle

[Bridge]
Imam fon blek beri
sef baš po meri
gas revolveri spas
lajn atletika
Full genetika (ge-ne-ti-ka)
skup estetika
put do Pekinga
vuko beli gram

[Instrumental - Build-up]
*Frantic acid lines, accelerating hats, and sweeping risers build to a peak.*

[Chorus]
a tu uvek se popije (po-pi-je-je-je)
vučem kose vučem skije
bebi lako se pobijem
kada rade me linije
meni niko se ne smije (smi-je-je-je)
svakako niko ne smije
jer bi najebao lako
zaklo bih bez čakije

[Instrumental - Breakdown]
*Stripped back to a pulsing sub-bass, hypnotic acid line, and delayed vocal chops.*

[Instrumental - Build-up]
*Bass filters back in with punchy drums; sharp riser cuts through.*

[Chorus]
a tu uvek se popije (po-pi-je-je-je)
vučem kose vučem skije
bebi lako se pobijem
kada rade me linije
meni niko se ne smije (smi-je-je-je)
svakako niko ne smije
jer bi najebao lako
zaklo bih bez čakije

[Outro]
Sve nam je offer fame (faaaame)
to je kao over game (o-ver ge- ejm)
Ali mi smo over hejt
Poen dam pa over paid (o-ver pe-jd)

[Instrumental - Go crazy]
*Groove deconstructs: acid synth goes wild, bassline distorts, then filters to silence.*

---

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_CXVI
[DESCRIPTION]
A fierce 150 BPM EDM banger explodes with a wailing accordion sample, immediately fused to a relentless 4/4 kick and pulsing, sidechained bass. Fiery, distorted Balkan brass stabs cut through the mix, while a glitched, pitched vocal becomes a robotic, urgent hook. No breakdowns—only filtered, intensified kick moments reinject even more raw power. The melody is unleashed as a weaponized synth lead, driving a nonstop, chaotic energy—a fusion of Balkan soul and modern electronic aggression that’s all drop, no restraint.

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - Intro (150 BPM) — tech-house sub, rim percussion, 80s pads, vinyl crackle; ARR: single iconic zurle cry replaces accordion, 2-bar motif looped then layered with weaponized synth lead; PROC: zurle → transient enhancer + gentle saturation, HPF 120Hz to leave room for sub; pads: airy ethereal, slow LFO on filter 0.1Hz; MIX: kick muted first 4 bars, rim/perc wide 25% stereo, vinyl crackle -6dB send; BUS: FX bus (reverb+delay) 40% wet for atmosphere; SIDECHAIN: global 3:1 pump to pad.]
(padam boj, nespokoj)

[Instrumental - Build-up (150 → 155 BPM) — siren riser, snare roll, chopped vox; PROC: riser layered (analog + FM) stereo unison 4, automate pitch +1→+5 semitones into drop; chopped vox granular repeat 1/8→1/16; MIX: increase lowmid cut 200–400Hz +1.5dB to force energy; BUS: build bus compress 2:1 glue; TRANSITION: reverse zurle breath into first kick.]

[Male - Verse 1]
To kao zadnji je fight
nesto boy neko tvoj
mi je omašio sprat
[Lead vocal chain: Auto-Tune hard-tuned – retune speed 0–8ms for stylistic robotic; formant +0.5; EQ: HPF 80Hz, gentle shelf +3dB 3–6k for presence; De-esser 6–8k -3dB threshold; Comp: 4:1 atk 5ms rel 80ms; Plate reverb send 18% short predelay 8ms; Saturation: parallel tape 20% for grit; Stereo width: keep lead mono, subtle doubler at -10 cents send 12%].(ooooo — chopped echo)

[Male - Verse 2]

često osetim to,

bajs vozali, (aaaa...)
tu si non stop ti
kad su potopi
Pa me tada bleda gleda
sneg sav bi da otopi
[Verse treatment: intimate first half — remove heavy reverb, lowpass 10k; second half aggressive — add distortion send +8dB, parallel compression 50% blend, 808 lowpass @120Hz lowered -6dB under voice; ARR: keep phrasing tight, add subtle zurle counterline panned L30 R-30; FX: Balkan brass stabs replaced by distorted zurle/brass stabs processed with delay 1/8 ping-pong]
(aaaa... Kush)

[Instrumental - Drop 1 (155 BPM) — pumping 4/4 kick, seismic sidechained bass; PROC: kick => transient shaper attack 7ms, sub sine layer tuned to root, EQ boost +4dB @60Hz narrow; Bass: heavy 808 tuned melodic, glide 30–70ms, lowpass 12dB @3k; FM stabs + metallic zurle hits compressed 6:1; MIX: mono sub <120Hz; BUS: drums parallel comp 4:1 30% blend; SIDECHAIN: compressor key on kick - ratio 6:1 atk 10ms rel 100ms]
(crowd FX — pump)

[Chorus - Drop 1]
Ona kush mi sushi, nema bolja šema
Puls mi ruši, hiljadu problema
uši buši, dijamanta šema
lamele favela cela
Menja sve dresove, a ja sam high (ooooooo)

pala sve moje testove garant je kraj aj aj (aaa aaa)
[Chant stack: double main vox + hard-tune doubles (-15 & +12 cents), harmonizer -3 voices, formant preserved; Zurle/Brass stabs accent downbeats processed with bitcrush 8-bit + small plate reverb; Pads: ethereal emotional pad under chants — LP sweep 200→6k across 8 bars; MIX: chorus open 8–12k +2dB, glue bus 1.5:1]
(Monastic low chants under bass)

Vidim boje - vidim dugu
palim petu redom pljugu,
znam da hoćeš mene,
a ne nijednu drugu.
[Female vocal chain: softer autotune retune 15–30ms for emotion, gentle chorus on doubles, reverb tail 28% long plate, EQ cut 250–400Hz -1.5dB to clear mask; Automate width on hook for lift]
(oooo — layered harmony)

[--- MID-PRODUCTION EXPORT GUIDELINES (FIRST HALF)
• Bounce stems for sections: Intro→Drop1 (separate: Zurle, Kick, Sub, Bass/808, Pads, Lead Male, Lead Female, Backing Chants, Perc/Hats, FX).
• Mid-master target: -8 LUFS integrated for reference previews; True Peak -0.5dB.
• Include a DJ 8-bar loop (Zurle + mono sub) exported dry for club testing.
• Notes: keep zurle mono-center during preview bounces to check phase; preserve mono sub <120Hz.]

---

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_CXVII_1
[DESCRIPTION]
The tech house track at 128 bpm launches with a morphing deep bassline and sharp, syncopated percussion layered over atmospheric club noise. Siren risers and rave samples punctuate the buildup as 80s-inspired midi synths introduce infectious hooks. Drops explode with crowd roars, punchy chopped chant vocals, and intensified rhythmic interplay, sustaining a propulsive, communal club energy.

[LYRICS]
[Intro — 0:00:32 — tight low-end intro, mood set]
[ARR: start with a minimal loop — tight kick (short tail), rim/shaker pattern, dry room clap every 2nd bar; layered 80s MIDI pad filtered down to 600Hz; sampled distant crowd ambience low-passed 1.2k to sit under; zurle-style lead NOT used here — keep organic synth timbre; PROC: kick transient sharpened (transient shaper +6%), HPF pads @120Hz, bus compression 2:1 glue 10ms atk; MIX: -6dB sub reference, stereo width narrow until drop; FX: lo-fi vinyl crackle subtle -12dB send.]
(pulsing crowd hum)

[Intro Movement — 0:32–1:12 — tension building]
[ARR: introduce tight, driving bassline — sine+triangle blend with subtle drive; Bass morphing: automate filter envelope and a wavetable morph LFO 0.03Hz to evolve timbre across 8 bars; PROC: bass multi-octave layers, EQ dip 300–400Hz -1.5dB to remove boxiness, mono below 120Hz; HATS: tight 16th pattern with sample layering (closed hat + rim transient) compressed with fast release; TRANS: riser(analog-siren) fade-in, chopped rave vocal chops gated 1/16 to taste; MIX: kick/bass sidechain ratio 4:1 key to kick, keep sidechain envelope smooth for groove.]
(whispered chant — filtered)

[Build — 1:12–1:44 — micro-risers and groove lock]
[ARR: add snare-roll on 1/16 → 1/32 automation, introduce 80s pluck arpeggio (short decay) panned L/R; PROC: arps unison 3, slight chorus at 0.8 depth, HPF sweep 250→1.5k; FX: crowd cheer hit layered with gated noise to accent first drop bar; MIX: open 5–10k +1.5dB to add air, duck pads slightly with sidechain to drums.]
(chant response — short)

[Drop / Groove — 1:44–2:32 — the club drop IS groove]
[ARR: full kick + tight rolling bass, bass morph opens (filter Q subtly raised), 80s synth hook doubled with detuned saw for width; Perc: metallic rim hits, tom accents, claps stacked x3; PROC: bass glide 20–45ms for groove; FX: chopped rave samples — stuttered, formant-shifted, tempo-sync delay 1/8 dotted L/R; MIX: mono sub <100–120Hz, transient shaper on kick, saturation bus +2dB pre-master; BUS: drum bus parallel comp 3:1 20% blend; SIDECHAIN: on pads low depth to keep body.]
(crowd erupt — short punch)

[Mid-Section — 2:32–3:20 — hypnotic variation]
[ARR: remove top hat layer for 8 bars, bring in darker chord stab every 3rd bar, automate bass harmonic content (add FM peak at 700Hz then remove); PROC: notch problem frequencies found in context, add transient emphasis to snare/clap for club cut-through; VOCALS: bring in chant vocal hook — heavily gated, hard-tuned, repeated 4 bars with stereo delay 1/4 feedback 10%; MIX: compress vocal bus 2.5:1, short plate reverb 16% send to simulate club room.]
(chant hook — "uh uh" — looped)

[Breakdown — 3:20–3:52 — breath with tension]
[ARR: filter sweep down to 1k on master with LFO, reduce kick swing, introduce hypnotic pad melody (80s style) with stereo width increase, reverse swell riser into re-click synth; PROC: add subtle automation to transient shaper to soften then slam back; FX: crowd sample chopped into percussive hit patterns for texture.]
(distant chant — echo)

[Return to Groove / Peak Loop — 3:52–4:40 — relentless club energy]
[ARR: restore full percussion, add second synth hook octave above main for energy, increase unison voices from 3→6 on hook; PROC: master stereo enhancer +1.2dB pre-limiter, add tape-style saturation low amount; MIX: bump 8–12k +1.5dB for sheen, ensure kick + bass sit with 2–3dB headroom to master; BUS: master glue 1.5:1 subtle for cohesion.]
(crowd chant — call & response)

[Outro / DJ Tools — 4:40–5:20 — loopable tails]
[ARR: strip elements down into DJ-friendly stems: 8-bar loop with kick+perc, separate dry bass loop, two chant loop variants (dry / reverbed); PROC: provide 8-bar loop with clear transient on kick, label BPM 128 and key; EXPORT: Stems — 01_KICK 02_SUB 03_BASS 04_HATS 05_PERC 06_SYNTHS 07_CHANTS 08_FX 09_PAD; MASTER: render -6 LUFS preview and -8 LUFS dry stem for DJs.]
(leave with low crowd hum)

MASTERING NOTES (apply to full track)
[MASTER: corrective EQ — gentle cut 200–400Hz -1.5dB; multi-band compression to tighten 50–120Hz; subtle tape sat +1.5dB; stereo imager: mono <120Hz; limiter ceiling -0.3dB; target -6 LUFS integrated club. CHECK: club PA 98–105 dB, cans, and mono small speaker; provide 2 master bounces: club (-6 LUFS) and promo (-8 LUFS).]
(approved club bounce)


--

---

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_CXVII_1
[DESCRIPTION]
The tech house track at 128 bpm launches with a morphing deep bassline and sharp, syncopated percussion layered over atmospheric club noise. [ARR: start with a minimal loop — tight kick (short tail), rim/shaker pattern, dry room clap every 2nd bar; layered 80s MIDI pad filtered down to 600Hz; sampled distant crowd ambience low-passed 1.2k to sit under; zurle-style lead NOT used here — keep organic synth timbre; PROC: kick transient sharpened (transient shaper +6%), HPF pads @120Hz, bus compression 2:1 glue 10ms atk; MIX: -6dB sub reference, stereo width narrow until drop; FX: lo-fi vinyl crackle subtle -12dB send.]

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_CXVII_2
[DESCRIPTION]
The tech house track at 128 bpm launches with a morphing deep bassline and sharp, syncopated percussion layered over atmospheric club noise. Siren risers and rave samples punctuate the buildup as 80s-inspired midi synths introduce infectious hooks. Drops explode with crowd roars, punchy chopped chant vocals, and intensified rhythmic interplay, sustaining a propulsive, communal club energy.

[LYRICS]
[Intro — 0:00–0:28 — bright, immediate groove]
[ARR: open on punchy kick + sidechained subbed bass pluck; 80s MIDI chord stab (bright) center, sampled crowd chants looped rhythmic 2-bar phrase; PROC: kick transient +8% with slight pitch-envelope drop first 2 bars; HATS: open hat on off-beat with gated reverb 12% send; MIX: widen synths slightly, keep sub mono; FX: short crowd hits processed with transient designer for punch.]
(crowd chant — rhythmic)

[Pre-Build — 0:28–1:04 — tension with melodic hooks]
[ARR: introduce siren-style riser (vintage saw) layered with pitch-modulated 80s lead; chop rave sample into staccato rhythmic FX; PROC: arpeggio 4-voice unison, slight chorus, HPF sweep 200→1.8k; VOCALS: bring in short vocal mantra — hard-tuned, short decay, repeated 4 bars; MIX: add stereo delay 1/8 to vocal, automating feedback into drop.]
(chant mantra — tight)

[Main Groove — 1:04–1:56 — chant explosion]
[ARR: full percussion stack, bassline morphs subtly via LFO-controlled wavetable to grow brighter over 16 bars; PROC: bass a mix of hollow sub + mid growl, mid growl layered with distortion and filtered to taste; HATS: rolling 1/16 with triplet shuffle, claps on 2&4 doubled; FX: crowd cheer sample hits on every 8 bars, bring in 80s synth hook full volume after 8 bars; SIDECHAIN: strong ducking on pads and stabs keyed to kick (ratio 6:1).]
(crowd cheer — explode)

[Mid Groove / Vocal Hook — 1:56–2:40 — anthem moment]
[ARR: vocal chant hook center-stage — processed with vocoder mild + formant shift for club character; PROC: parallel distortion 30% on chant, compressor 3:1 to glue, small hall reverb 22% send; SYNTH: add bright octave lead for harmonic lift; MIX: raise 2–6k by +2dB for vocal intelligibility in club; BUS: glue 1.4:1.]
(anthem chant — sing)

[Dynamic Shift — 2:40–3:16 — textural play]
[ARR: drop elements to create space — remove bass mid-growl for 4 bars, keep kick low filtered, chopped rave vox used as percussive element; PROC: automate lowpass on master 1200→300Hz for 4 bars; FX: reverse crowd swell into re-entry; MIX: transition with tempo-synced delay tails.]
(whisper chant — filtered)

[Peak Repeat — 3:16–4:00 — club peak loop]
[ARR: bring all elements back — heavier synth unison (6→12 voices), doubled chant with octave detune, layered clap stacks, snare roll into loop; PROC: bus saturation +2dB pre-master, stereo enhancer on 80s hooks, transient shaping on kick to keep punch; MIX: ensure sub <100Hz mono, widen 4–8k band slightly for sparkle.]
(crowd — sing back)

[Bridge + DJ Tools — 4:00–4:40 — playable stems]
[ARR: create DJ-friendly deliverables: 8-bar chant loop dry, 8-bar instrumental loop with bright hook, 16-bar intro beat only; PROC: render chant loops dry and with club reverb; EXPORT: Stems labeled and tempo/key info embedded in file metadata; MASTER: -6 LUFS club master and -9 LUFS radio/promos.]
(leave with chant echo)

MASTERING NOTES (apply to full track)
[MASTER: corrective EQ -1.5dB 220–380Hz; multi-band comp tighten bass; mild stereo tape sat +1.8dB; transient enhancer on kick +1.2dB; imager mono <120Hz; limiter -0.3dB; TARGET -6 LUFS integrated; CHECK: club PA at 100–110 dB, headphones, phone speaker for low-end check.]
(ready for clubs)

PRODUCTION & MIXING TIPS COMMON TO BOTH VERSIONS
[LAYOUT: keep arrangement loops predictable for DJ mixing — 32/16 bar phrases, clear intro/outro sections; AUTOMATION: automate unison voices, filter sweeps, and saturation for evolving interest; SAMPLE CHOICES: use high-res crowd samples and pitch-match to key; SUB MANAGEMENT: always mono below 100–120Hz; QC: phase-check, stem-check, and reference against two commercial tracks in same BPM/key; EXPORT: include tempo-map, suggested harmonic key, and stems named logically.]
(final club-ready pack)

---

(leave with chant echo)

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_CXVIII_2
[DESCRIPTION]
The tech house track at 128 bpm launches with a morphing deep bassline and sharp, syncopated percussion layered over atmospheric club noise. Siren risers and rave samples punctuate the buildup as 80s-inspired midi synths introduce infectious hooks. Drops explode with crowd roars, punchy chopped chant vocals, and intensified rhythmic interplay, sustaining a propulsive, communal club energy.

[LYRICS]
[Intro 128 BPM — tight 16-bar groove: filtered kick, rim/percs, vinyl crackle; zurle motif sampled, pitched, gentle ring-mod; pads lowpassed; sidechain bus keyed to kick 4:1; ambiance send 30%]
(padam boj, nespokoj)

[Build — siren riser, chopped rave hits, crowd chop reverse into downbeat; automate HPF 200→2k; glue comp 2:1]

[Male Verse 1]
To kao zadnji je fight
nesto boy neko tvoj
mi je omašio sprat
([Lead chain: Auto-Tune 6–12ms, HPF 100Hz, presence +3dB 2.5–6k; comp 3–4:1; short plate 12% send; subtle tape sat 15%].)

sa njom je off road trip
A ja pod dozom tip
često osetim to,
u prošlosti mi rolali,
bajs vozali, (aaaa...)
tu si non stop ti
kad su potopi
Pa me tada bleda gleda
sneg sav bi da otopi
([Verse FX: zurle stabs L/R 25%, tape-delay slap 60ms, carve 300–500Hz -1.5dB; vocal bus parallel comp 3:1 20%].)
(aaaa... uši)

(crowd FX — swell)

[Chorus — one pass]
Ona kush mi sushi... garant je kraj aj aj (aaa aaa)
([Chant stack: 3-part doubles, -10/+8 cents; zurle & 80s synth accents; boost 3–5k +1.5dB; glue 1.4:1; short gated reverb on final line].)
(Monastic low chants under bass)

[Micro-break — filtered notch, reversed vox, airy reverb; remove kick for 2 bars then slam back]

[Female Verse / Hook]
Gledam gde je nestalo...
"Ko da tamom me umije" ... uzmi evo me
([Female chain: Auto-Tune 10–18ms, stereo doubler 18%, plate 25% tail; hook: 4-part stacked harmony, OTT 6%].)
(oooo — layered harmony) (ooo — choir lift)

[Peak Groove — acid stabs, zurle lead, trap-shuffled hats, sidechain 6–8:1; master sat +1.2dB pre-limiter]
(ALL — pump)

[Call & Response — compact fill: call dry center, response doubled ±40%; slap delay 20/40ms]
(: aaaaaaaa) (aaaaaaaa)

[Outro — LP sweep 1k→300Hz over 16 bars, DJ 8-bar loop: mono sub + dry chant; finale narrow to mono sub]
(Gle — granulated)
Gle sata gle kola gle skanka što rolam (back vocal: granulated)
([Export stems: Kick, Sub, Bass, Zurle, 80s Pad, Lead Male, Lead Female, Chants, Hats, FX. Master target -6 to -7 LUFS, TP -0.3dB].)

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
At 139 bpm, a relentless underground tech foundation pulses with driving kick and hi-hats. Zurle and organ layer heady motifs over crisp 80s MIDI synths, jungle ambience, sirens, reggaeton groove, and tire screeching FX. Grooves stay dynamic and non-stop, with silk-smooth, intimately close vocal takes—transparent mix: surgical subtractive EQ, gentle compression, precise de-essing, subtle warmth, and short ambiences for depth. Wide panning and doubled lines add space, while minimal editing preserves every micro-dynamic, quirk, and breath for a raw, pulsing dance experience.

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental]

[Male - Verse 1]
padam boj nespokoj
To kao zadnji je fight
nesto boy neko tvoj
mi je omašio sprat

[Male - Verse 2]
sa njom je off road trip 
A ja pod dozom tip
često osetim to,
u prošlosti mi rolali,
bajs vozali,aaaa...,
tu si non stop ti 
kad su potopi
Pa me tada bleda gleda 
sneg sav bi da otopi

[Female - Verse 1]
Gledam gde je nestao,
kažu pićem krije tugu
Ti si stvarno nestvaran,
ali opet biram drugog
Vidim boje - vidim dugu
palim petu redom pljugu,
znam da hoćeš mene,
a ne nijednu drugu.



Aaaaa aaa ne ne ne treba aaa...
Aaaaa aaa ne ne ne treba aaa...

[Male - Verse 4]
A ne treba ti mozak da sklopiš taj mozaik
sva si pogubna ko doza a ja ko pravi laik
Mene ne zanima poza ,ma samo mi to daji
bio sam vani od konza U tvorzi ko u odaji
A ja njoj ne verujem da volimpreterujem
Pun klub flertuje,
a voli me, to verujem
Guz njen, negujem,
u dupe to verujem
radi me jako, kao roba je, eee,
a njoj Sa mnom ko na vodi je

[Male - Bridge]
A tvoje telo bella celo sa telenovela
vrela polugola si mi u sred dana bela (ela la)
sad me htela al prije to nije smela (nee)
zavela srela u tom lobiju hotela

[Female - Hook]
Ko da tamom me umije ,umije on sve 
Zar da tako me ubije,sruši svetove
Zna da tako me ugrije, ruke njegove 
zadnju nadu mi ulije,uzmi evo me

[Male - Bridge]
A tvoje telo bella celo sa telenovela
vrela polugola si mi u sred dana bela
sad me htela al prije to nije smela (nee)
zavela srela u tom lobiju hotela

Zar da tako me ubije,sruši svetove
Zna da tako me ugrije, ruke njegove 
zadnju nadu mi ulije,uzmi evo me

[Instrumental - go crazy]

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_L
[DESCRIPTION]
Intro (140 BPM): Thin kick and filtered sub; autotuned tease "Feel the heat" through tape delay. Build-up (140 → 150 BPM): 16-bar rise with polyrhythmic percussion and tight hats; arpeggiated acid subline climbs. Drop 1 (155 BPM): Saturated sub-bass and punchy drums anchor; acid melody sidechained to a gated arp; vocal stack: "Lose control, take what's mine" doubled and detuned. Breakdown (145 BPM): Bass narrows with notch filtering; reversed piano hits, sparse clap motifs and distant choir chops. Build 2 (145 → 155 BPM): Filter cutoff on arps, layered risers and pitched percussion fills; brass stabs accent key hits; rhythmic gating on pads and hi-hat triplets. Drop 2 (155 BPM): Denser arrangement with FM percussion, mirrored acid variations, call-response vocal harmonies and tape saturation on the lead; harmonic exciter on sub. Outro (155 → 140 BPM): Percussion thins, acid morphs to sub-oscillation, final vocal: "This is how we come alive" run through granular delay and lowpass fade.

[LYRICS]
[Intrumental]

[Male - Verse 1]
padam boj nespokoj
To kao zadnji je fight
nesto boy neko tvoj
mi je omašio sprat

[Male - Verse 2]
sa njom je off road trip 
A ja pod dozom tip
često osetim
prošlosti mi srozali
tu si non stop ti 
kad su potopi
Pa me tada bleda gleda 
sneg sav bi da otopi

[Female - Verse 1]
Gledam gde je nestao,
kažu pićem krije tugu
Ti si stvarno nestvaran,
ali opet biram drugog
Vidim boje - vidim dugu
palim petu redom pljugu,
znam da hoćeš mene,
a ne nijednu drugu.

 a
[Male - Verse 4]
Aaaaa aaa ne ne ne treba aaa...
A ne treba ti mozak da sklopiš taj mozaik
sva si pogubna ko doza a ja ko pravi laik
Mene ne zanima poza ,ma samo mi to daji
bio sam vani od konza U tvorzi ko u odaji
A ja njoj ne verujem da volimpreterujem
Pun klub flertuje,
a voli me, to verujem
Guz njen, negujem,
u dupe to verujem
radi me jako, kao roba je, eee,
a njoj Sa mnom ko na vodi je

zavela srela u tom lobiju hotela

Zar da tako me ubije,sruši svetove
Zna da tako me ugrije, ruke njegove 
zadnju nadu mi ulije,uzmi evo me

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_L
[DESCRIPTION]
Intro (140 BPM): Thin kick and filtered sub; autotuned tease "Feel the heat" through tape delay. Build-up (140 → 150 BPM): 16-bar rise with polyrhythmic percussion and tight hats; arpeggiated acid subline climbs. Drop 1 (155 BPM): Saturated sub-bass and punchy drums anchor; acid melody sidechained to a gated arp; vocal stack: "Lose control, take what's mine" doubled and detuned. Breakdown (145 BPM): Bass narrows with notch filtering; reversed piano hits, sparse clap motifs and distant choir chops. Build 2 (145 → 155 BPM): Filter cutoff on arps, layered risers and pitched percussion fills; brass stabs accent key hits; rhythmic gating on pads and hi-hat triplets. Drop 2 (155 BPM): Denser arrangement with FM percussion, mirrored acid variations, call-response vocal harmonies and tape saturation on the lead; harmonic exciter on sub. Outro (155 → 140 BPM): Percussion thins, acid morphs to sub-oscillation, final vocal: "This is how we come alive" run through granular delay and lowpass fade.

[LYRICS]
[Intrumental]

[Male - Verse 1]
padam boj nespokoj
To kao zadnji je fight
nesto boy neko tvoj
mi je omašio sprat

[Male - Verse 2]
sa njom je off road trip 
A ja pod dozom tip
često osetim
prošlosti mi srozali
tu si non stop ti 
kad su potopi
Pa me tada bleda gleda 
sneg sav bi da otopi

[Female - Verse 1]
Gledam gde je nestao,
kažu pićem krije tugu
Ti si stvarno nestvaran,
ali opet biram drugog
Vidim boje - vidim dugu
palim petu redom pljugu,
znam da hoćeš mene,
a ne nijednu drugu.
a

u dupe to verujem
radi me jako, kao roba je, eee,

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_L (Extend)
[DESCRIPTION]
Intro (140 BPM): Thin kick and filtered sub; autotuned tease "Feel the heat" through tape delay. Build-up (140 → 150 BPM): 16-bar rise with polyrhythmic percussion and tight hats; arpeggiated acid subline climbs. Drop 1 (155 BPM): Saturated sub-bass and punchy drums anchor; acid melody sidechained to a gated arp; vocal stack: "Lose control, take what's mine" doubled and detuned. Breakdown (145 BPM): Bass narrows with notch filtering; reversed piano hits, sparse clap motifs and distant choir chops. Build 2 (145 → 155 BPM): Filter cutoff on arps, layered risers and pitched percussion fills; brass stabs accent key hits; rhythmic gating on pads and hi-hat triplets. Drop 2 (155 BPM): Denser arrangement with FM percussion, mirrored acid variations, call-response vocal harmonies and tape saturation on the lead; harmonic exciter on sub. Outro (155 → 140 BPM): Percussion thins, acid morphs to sub-oscillation, final vocal: "This is how we come alive" run through granular delay and lowpass fade.

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_L (Remastered)
[DESCRIPTION]
Intro (140 BPM): Thin kick and filtered sub; autotuned tease "Feel the heat" through tape delay. Build-up (140 → 150 BPM): 16-bar rise with polyrhythmic percussion and tight hats; arpeggiated acid subline climbs. Drop 1 (155 BPM): Saturated sub-bass and punchy drums anchor; acid melody sidechained to a gated arp; vocal stack: "Lose control, take what's mine" doubled and detuned. Breakdown (145 BPM): Bass narrows with notch filtering; reversed piano hits, sparse clap motifs and distant choir chops. Build 2 (145 → 155 BPM): Filter cutoff on arps, layered risers and pitched percussion fills; brass stabs accent key hits; rhythmic gating on pads and hi-hat triplets. Drop 2 (155 BPM): Denser arrangement with FM percussion, mirrored acid variations, call-response vocal harmonies and tape saturation on the lead; harmonic exciter on sub. Outro (155 → 140 BPM): Percussion thins, acid morphs to sub-oscillation, final vocal: "This is how we come alive" run through granular delay and lowpass fade.

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_LVII
[DESCRIPTION]
Slap house(155BPM):Saturated 808 sub@45Hz+harm excite.Syncopated kick layers+sidechain 4:1/20ms attack.TB-303 acid saw+res sweep 30-85%+LFO 1/16sync.Hypnotic vox"padam boj nespokoj"autotune+tape delay 1/8dot.Triplet hats 16%swing+relentless groove.White noise risers+rev cymbals.Build(150→155BPM/16b):Acid chromatic rise+tube sat.Percussion fills+offbeat claps.BG vox"ona kush mi sushi"±12st+chorus.Drop(155BPM/32b):24-layer spectrum.FM perc 2:1+3.5:1 alt L/R.Acid mirror+octave displacement.Call-response"gle sata gle kola"spatial movement.Tape A800 saturation+opto comp 3:1.Break(145BPM/16b):Notch 80-200Hz+stereo narrow 40%.Rev piano maj7+cathedral verb.Sparse claps.Choir chops granular.Outro(155→140BPM/32b):Sequential dropout.Acid→sine sub mono<80Hz.Final vox"pala sve moje testove"granular 150ms+LP fade 2k→200Hz exp.

[LYRICS]
[Intrumental]

[Male - Verse 1]
padam boj nespokoj
To kao zadnji je fight
nesto boy neko tvoj
mi je omašio sprat

[Male - Verse 2]

često osetim

kad su potopi

keš tu lova,(često zumiram)
presto (kuliram ), da poludi (aludiram)

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_LXI
[DESCRIPTION]
Intro (140 BPM): Thin kick and filtered sub; autotuned tease "Feel the heat" through tape delay. Build-up (140 → 150 BPM): 16-bar rise with polyrhythmic percussion and tight hats; arpeggiated acid subline climbs. Drop 1 (155 BPM): Saturated sub-bass and punchy drums anchor; acid melody sidechained to a gated arp; vocal stack: "Lose control, take what's mine" doubled and detuned. Breakdown (145 BPM): Bass narrows with notch filtering; reversed piano hits, sparse clap motifs and distant choir chops. Build 2 (145 → 155 BPM): Filter cutoff on arps, layered risers and pitched percussion fills; brass stabs accent key hits; rhythmic gating on pads and hi-hat triplets. Drop 2 (155 BPM): Denser arrangement with FM percussion, mirrored acid variations, call-response vocal harmonies and tape saturation on the lead; harmonic exciter on sub. Outro (155 → 140 BPM): Percussion thins, acid morphs to sub-oscillation, final vocal: "This is how we come alive" run through granular delay and lowpass fade.

[LYRICS]
[Intrumental]

[Male - Verse 1]
padam boj nespokoj
To kao zadnji je fight
nesto boy neko tvoj
mi je omašio sprat

[Male - Verse 2]
sa njom je off road trip

često osetim
prošlosti mi srozali

kad su potopi

sneg sav bi da otopi
