# hardcore_pop - Ginni_LXI
[DESCRIPTION]
Intro (140 BPM): Thin kick and filtered sub; autotuned tease "Feel the heat" through tape delay. Build-up (140 → 150 BPM): 16-bar rise with polyrhythmic percussion and tight hats; arpeggiated acid subline climbs. Drop 1 (155 BPM): Saturated sub-bass and punchy drums anchor; acid melody sidechained to a gated arp; vocal stack: "Lose control, take what's mine" doubled and detuned. Breakdown (145 BPM): Bass narrows with notch filtering; reversed piano hits, sparse clap motifs and distant choir chops. Build 2 (145 → 155 BPM): Filter cutoff on arps, layered risers and pitched percussion fills; brass stabs accent key hits; rhythmic gating on pads and hi-hat triplets. Drop 2 (155 BPM): Denser arrangement with FM percussion, mirrored acid variations, call-response vocal harmonies and tape saturation on the lead; harmonic exciter on sub. Outro (155 → 140 BPM): Percussion thins, acid morphs to sub-oscillation, final vocal: "This is how we come alive" run through granular delay and lowpass fade.

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_LXIV
[DESCRIPTION]
Mastering (155 BPM): Multi-band compression targeting 2-4kHz vocal presence, parallel saturation on drum bus with tape emulation; stereo widening on arps via Haas effect, mid-side EQ boosting sub-bass mono content below 80Hz; dynamic range compression maintaining 8-12dB peak-to-RMS ratio, harmonic enhancement on "Ona kush mi sushi" hook using tube saturation; limiter with 3ms attack, 100ms release targeting -8 LUFS integrated; stereo imaging: kick/bass center, vocal doubles panned L30/R30, acid arps spread L70/R70; high-frequency air boost at 12kHz shelf, low-cut filter at 25Hz removing subsonic content; reference monitoring against commercial Balkan trap releases; final bounce: 24-bit/48kHz with 0.1dB headroom, dithering applied for streaming distribution; quality control verification across multiple playback systems ensuring translation consistency from club systems to mobile devices, maintaining punchy transients while achieving competitive loudness standards.

[LYRICS]
[Intrumental]

nesto boy neko tvoj

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_LXXI
[DESCRIPTION]
The track stomps in at a sultry 120+ BPM with cavernous 808s and rolling basslines, a raw, floor-rattling foundation. Crisp, hard-hitting drill hi-hats ratchet like machine-gun percussion, propelling the groove, while hypnotic Tech-House synths pulse and bloom across the stereo field. Moody autotuned vocals glide then fracture into reverb-drenched echoes, setting a late-night, seductive mood before detonating into sections where distorted, thunderous low-end slams through the mix, unleashing controlled chaos. The mix keeps a dangerous balance—sub-bass is immense but tamed with tight compression and dynamic sidechain, mids are warm and present, and highs are airy without bite. Spatial FX push synths wide while vocals stay intimate and centered. Mastering delivers club-ready loudness without killing transients: transparent limiting, subtle harmonic enrichment on the low end, and measured stereo widening to maximize immersive, sultry dancefloor intensity. Pulsing tom fills accentuate drop

[LYRICS]
[Intro — cavernous 808s + rolling bass]
[Instrumental]

[Male V1 — intimate, autotune + reverb send]
[Male - Verse 1]
padam boj nespokoj
To kao zadnji je fight
nesto boy neko tvoj
mi je omašio sprat

[Build — tech-house synth sweep, hat rolls]
[Male - Verse 2]
sa njom je off road trip
A ja pod dozom tip
često osetim to,
u prošlosti mi rolali,
bajs vozali,aaaa...,
tu si non stop ti
kad su potopi
Pa me tada bleda gleda
sneg sav bi da otopi

[Female V1 — airy lead vocal, warm delay]
[Female - Verse 1]
Gledam gde je nestao,
kažu pićem krije tugu
Ti si stvarno nestvaran,
ali opet biram drugog
Vidim boje - vidim dugu
palim petu redom pljugu,
znam da hoćeš mene,
a ne nijednu drugu.

[Build — hi-hat rolls + synth riser]
[Instrumental - go crazy]

[Drop Build — filter open, sub growl]
[Chorus]
Ona kush mi sushi,nema bolja šema
Puls mi ruši,hiljadu problema
uši buši,dijamanta šema
lamele favela cela
Menja sve dresove,a ja sam high
Mala smanjuje besove da ja sam taj
Dala sve svoje stresove,mala sve daj
pala sve moje testove garant je kraj aj aj

[Post-Drop — aggressive, edgy vocal take]
[Male - Verse 4]

Aaaaa aaa ne ne ne treba aaa...

sva si pogubna ko doza a ja ko pravi laik

u dupe to verujem

[Hook — vocal lead, wet doubles]
[Female - Hook]

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_LXXIV
[DESCRIPTION]
The track is a Balkan-underground tech-house fusion that hits hard: filthy, deep bass slaps carve the low end while punchy mid-range basslines lock an infectious, head-nodding groove. Sultry, ultra-autotuned vocals glide like a siren over warped reverb, then snap into terse, rhythmic phrases that double as percussion. Acid-tinged synth stabs and squelches inject electrifying drops, braided with rolling toms and razor hi-hat rolls for a darker, frenetic energy. The arrangement balances club violence with hypnotic restraint—moments of tight, minimal pocket give way to explosions of analog grit and delay-soaked atmospherics that feel both ritualistic and unhinged.

Mix & master keep sub-fundamentals mono and huge, sidechain bass to kicks for clarity, tame the midrange with dynamic shelving to preserve vocal grit, and use parallel saturation on low bands for weight. Limit transparently for club loudness, add subtle stereo widening on highs and mid FX, and preserve transient impact with sof

[LYRICS]
[Intro — cavernous 808s, acid riser]
[Instrumental]

[Male V1 — intimate autotune, wide reverb send]
[Male - Verse 1]
padam boj nespokoj
To kao zadnji je fight
nesto boy neko tvoj
mi je omašio sprat

[Build — tech-house synth sweep, hi-hat rolls]
[Male - Verse 2]
sa njom je off road trip
A ja pod dozom tip
često osetim to,
u prošlosti mi rolali,
bajs vozali,aaaa...,
tu si non stop ti
kad su potopi
Pa me tada bleda gleda
sneg sav bi da otopi

[Female V1 — sultry lead, warm delay, narrow pan]
[Female - Verse 1]
Gledam gde je nestao,
kažu pićem krije tugu
Ti si stvarno nestvaran,
ali opet biram drugog
Vidim boje - vidim dugu
palim petu redom pljugu,
znam da hoćeš mene,
a ne nijednu drugu.

[Perc break — acid stab loop, sub growl]
[Instrumental - go crazy]

[Drop — filthy bass slaps, punchy low-end hits]
[Chorus]

Puls mi ruši,hiljadu problema
uši buši,dijamanta šema
lamele favela cela
Menja sve dresove,a ja sam high
Mala smanjuje besove da ja sam taj

pala sve moje testove garant je kraj aj aj

[Post-Drop — aggressive vocal, distortion send]

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_LXXX
[DESCRIPTION]
Intro (140 BPM): Thin kick and filtered sub; autotuned tease lyrics through tape delay. Build-up (140 → 150 BPM): 16-bar rise with polyrhythmic percussion and tight hats; arpeggiated acid subline climbs. Drop 1 (155 BPM): Saturated sub-bass and punchy drums anchor; acid melody sidechained to a gated arp; vocal stack: lyrics doubled and detuned. Breakdown (145 BPM): Bass narrows with notch filtering; reversed piano hits, sparse clap motifs and distant choir chops. Build 2 (145 → 155 BPM): Filter cutoff on arps, layered risers and pitched percussion fills; brass stabs accent key hits; rhythmic gating on pads and hi-hat triplets. Drop 2 (155 BPM): Denser arrangement with FM percussion, mirrored acid variations, call-response vocal harmonies and tape saturation on the lead; harmonic exciter on sub. Outro (155 → 140 BPM): Percussion thins, acid morphs to sub-oscillation, final vocal: lyric run through granular delay and lowpass fade.

[LYRICS]
[Intrumental]

[Male - Verse 1]
padam boj nespokoj
To kao zadnji je fight
nesto boy neko tvoj
mi je omašio sprat

[Male - Verse 2]

često osetim

kad su potopi

sneg sav bi da otopi

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_LXXX
[DESCRIPTION]
Intro (140 BPM): Thin kick and filtered sub; autotuned tease lyrics through tape delay. Build-up (140 → 150 BPM): 16-bar rise with polyrhythmic percussion and tight hats; arpeggiated acid subline climbs. Drop 1 (155 BPM): Saturated sub-bass and punchy drums anchor; acid melody sidechained to a gated arp; vocal stack: lyrics doubled and detuned. Breakdown (145 BPM): Bass narrows with notch filtering; reversed piano hits, sparse clap motifs and distant choir chops. Build 2 (145 → 155 BPM): Filter cutoff on arps, layered risers and pitched percussion fills; brass stabs accent key hits; rhythmic gating on pads and hi-hat triplets. Drop 2 (155 BPM): Denser arrangement with FM percussion, mirrored acid variations, call-response vocal harmonies and tape saturation on the lead; harmonic exciter on sub. Outro (155 → 140 BPM): Percussion thins, acid morphs to sub-oscillation, final vocal: lyric run through granular delay and lowpass fade.

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_LXXX (Remastered)
[DESCRIPTION]
Intro (140 BPM): Thin kick and filtered sub; autotuned tease lyrics through tape delay. Build-up (140 → 150 BPM): 16-bar rise with polyrhythmic percussion and tight hats; arpeggiated acid subline climbs. Drop 1 (155 BPM): Saturated sub-bass and punchy drums anchor; acid melody sidechained to a gated arp; vocal stack: lyrics doubled and detuned. Breakdown (145 BPM): Bass narrows with notch filtering; reversed piano hits, sparse clap motifs and distant choir chops. Build 2 (145 → 155 BPM): Filter cutoff on arps, layered risers and pitched percussion fills; brass stabs accent key hits; rhythmic gating on pads and hi-hat triplets. Drop 2 (155 BPM): Denser arrangement with FM percussion, mirrored acid variations, call-response vocal harmonies and tape saturation on the lead; harmonic exciter on sub. Outro (155 → 140 BPM): Percussion thins, acid morphs to sub-oscillation, final vocal: lyric run through granular delay and lowpass fade.

De manjka kontrola tu sanka se gola
gle brata mentola pa start ga patrola
i want samo lova sve ganc samo novac

a vez full tozla, mesto studiram
keš tu lova,često zumiram
presto kuliram , da poludi aludiram

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_LXXX (Remastered)
[DESCRIPTION]
Intro (140 BPM): Thin kick and filtered sub; autotuned tease lyrics through tape delay. Build-up (140 → 150 BPM): 16-bar rise with polyrhythmic percussion and tight hats; arpeggiated acid subline climbs. Drop 1 (155 BPM): Saturated sub-bass and punchy drums anchor; acid melody sidechained to a gated arp; vocal stack: lyrics doubled and detuned. Breakdown (145 BPM): Bass narrows with notch filtering; reversed piano hits, sparse clap motifs and distant choir chops. Build 2 (145 → 155 BPM): Filter cutoff on arps, layered risers and pitched percussion fills; brass stabs accent key hits; rhythmic gating on pads and hi-hat triplets. Drop 2 (155 BPM): Denser arrangement with FM percussion, mirrored acid variations, call-response vocal harmonies and tape saturation on the lead; harmonic exciter on sub. Outro (155 → 140 BPM): Percussion thins, acid morphs to sub-oscillation, final vocal: lyric run through granular delay and lowpass fade.

[LYRICS]
[Intrumental]

[Male - Verse 1]
padam boj nespokoj
To kao zadnji je fight
nesto boy neko tvoj
mi je omašio sprat

[Male - Verse 2]

često osetim

kad su potopi

sneg sav bi da otopi

# hardcore_pop - Ginni_XCI
[DESCRIPTION]
A 155 BPM slap house track throbs with filthy, saturated sub-bass and punchy syncopated drums. Dark acid synths drive gritty melodies, while violin lines interlace with Arabic modal flourishes. Hypnotic, autotuned deep vocals glide over razor-sharp hats, risers, and an irresistible club groove.

[LYRICS]

# hardcore_pop - Give It to Me_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
A dynamic 135 bpm  underground house track , car siren, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals,

[LYRICS]
[Verse]
I go loco
([Sub sweep] - rrrrrr)
So atomic
([Riser] - shhaaa)
The way you work that tectonic
([Ground rumble] - grrrr)
I feel like it's in my nature
([Breath inhale close] - haaah)
You love a player? Let me play ya
([Finger snap] - snap)

[Prechorus]
Would you put your body on me?
([Bass pulse] - thumm)
(Ooh, ah)
([Breath exhale] - oooh) ([Soft gasp] - ahh)
Can I freak you?
([Vocal chop] - yeah-eh)
Would you put your body on me?
([Hand glide on fabric] - fffsh)
(Ooh, ah)
([Whispered FX] - ssst) ([Lip click] - pop)
Can I freak you?
([Kick + clap] - boom-clap)

# hardcore_pop - Grga_Dens_ Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
bouncy undeground slap club tech Turkish oriental pop ,  car honks, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental]
([Club murmur] - mmmrum)
([Slot ambience] - ding-ding / whrrr)

[Female]
Kiša je padala, a ti si lupao taj slot...
([Rain on asphalt] - shhhh) ([Slot hit] - ding-ding-ding)

[Male]
Hej Faraone, hoće pasti taj džekpot?!
([Shout from crowd] - heeej) ([Jackpot fanfare] - trrr-ding)
...
([Reverb tail] - whooom)

[Male]
Noć je pala , vodim te u grad ( opet na aparat?)
([Night hum] - mmmmmm) ([Car door] - thud)
Mala, dođi, znam da tebe loži taj rad,
([Finger snap] - snap) ([Bass bump] - thumm)
I zato, uzmi spremi se, lajnu - sredi se
([Šmrk FX] - sssnk) ([Mirror tap] - tik)
Sedi u taksi, dodji, k meni dovezi se
([Taxi brake] - skiiid) ([Vrata] - klik)
Na staro mesto, gde uvek pleše se,
([Footsteps to club] - tap-tap-tap) ([Door open club] - whooom)
Grga dens u kući, svi problemi će reše se
([Crowd “ey!”] - ayyyo) ([Kick + clap] - boom-clap)
A jaaaaaaaaa
([Vocal stretch FX] - yaaaah)
Hoću da trošim pare, da lupam po aparatima
([Cash slap] - flap-flap) ([Slot mash] - tak-tak-tak / ding)

[Female - breakdown]
manja ili veća - tebe jedino to zanima...
([Roulette spin] - rrrrrr) ([Chip drop] - clink-clink)

[Male]
Igram već danima, znam šta radim,
([Card shuffle] - fffsh)
Pustim ga da mi uzme, a posle sve duplo vratim
([Coin stream] - chrrr)
I sve što zaradim u slamaricu stavljam (hah)
([Zip fabric] - vrrt) ([Kratki smeh] - hah)
Šalim se, neću, idem do Grge da nadjem svoju sreću
([Step rush] - tap-tap-tap) ([Door hit] - boom)

[Female-Verse]
Ti uzimaš na ler, bez plana da vratiš,
([Engine idle] - vrrr)
Razbijen si stalno, slabo šta ti pamtiš
([Bottle clink] - clink-clink)
Zoveš me na piće, a uvek sama sve platim
([Kasa] - kching)
puno rivaš, s aparata nikad ne skidaš,
([Button mash] - tak-tak-tak)
umesto kuće ti piramide zidaš
([Golden coins pile] - cling-cling)

[Chorus – Female and Male Together]: \(Female\):

Jer to je Grga (Grga Dance, oooooo),
([Crowd sing-along] - oooooh)
Igraj mala sa mnom (taj ples).
([Clap loop] - clap-clap-clap)

(Male):
Večeras se čupam (yes, yes),
([Bottle pop] - pssht)
Kamata mi sutra (o neee).
([Alarm ping] - ding-ding)
Znojim se, srce lupa, o yeah!
([Sweat drop] - plip) ([Heartbeat deep] - THUMP-thump)

Hej mala jesi li za ples
([Call out] - heeej)

([Kick drop] - BOOM) ([Whistle] - fiiiuw)

# hardcore_pop - Grga_Dens_ Hardcore_Pop_3
[DESCRIPTION]
bouny undeground slap club tech Turkish oriental pop ,  car honks, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Verse 1 – Male]:
([Intro groove] - [syncopated bass riff, sparse beat, filtered brass stabs on off-beats])
Hoću da trošim pare kod Grge na aparaaaatima (Book of Ra)
([Vocal layer] - [robotic autotune lead, subtle vocoder harmony on "Book of Ra"])

Noću sanjam zelenaši mi na vratima (o ne!)
([Brass stabs] - [short staccato horn hits on "zelenaši"]) ([Delay] - ["o ne!" metallic echo])

Od zlatnog prstenja i zlatnog naaaaakita
([Bass accent] - [sub slide under "naaaaakita"]) ([Vocal FX] - [formant-shifted double on tail])

Ćale kaže: "Čekaj samo da se vratim ja."
([Perc loop] - [polyrhythmic toms + claps, widening groove])

(Samo da se vraaaaatim)
([FX] - [robotic repeat "vraaaaatim" with rising pitch, tempo ramp into bridge])

[Bridge – Male]:
([Build] - [tempo slightly increases, more hats, layered percussion])
Ajoj mama najebo sam ga (ufff)
([Vocal chop] - ["Ajoj mama" chopped and tucked under main line])

Sutra je trinaesti nova kaaaaamata (mata)
([Brass swell] - [rising stabs into "kaaaaamata"]) ([Auto-delay] - ["mata" robotic repeats])

Lutam po raznim gajbama
([Perc FX] - [shuffled conga / darbuka pattern, adds polyrhythm])

Razmazan, namazan, poooomalo bezobrazan. (Samo malo)
([Vocal FX] - [stutter on "poooomalo"], ([Robotic BV] - ["Samo malo" vocoder layer wide]))

[Verse 2 – Female]:
([Beat switch] - [slightly sparser drums, brighter brass, bass stays gritty])
Ti si kockar, budan dana tri,
([Vocal FX] - [female lead with strong autotune, airy harmony above])

Tražiš zlatni prsten, nešto za zaaaaavaljati.
([Brass stabs] - [syncopated hits under "zaaaaavaljati"])

Ako pitaju – nisi bio ti, majke ti (taman posla)
([Vocal chop] - ["nisi bio ti" robotic chops in background])

Večeras ide gas, hvala maćehi. (Thanks)
([Pre-drop] - [snare roll + riser building into chorus])

[Chorus – Female]:
([Bass drop] - [huge sub drop, full drums and brass hit on first word])
Sve mi je to, nekako bezveze (veze bez)
([Hook FX] - ["veze bez" robotic echo ping-pong])

Hoće li ova roba da me pooooveeeze
([Brass lead] - [melodic staccato brass phrase doubling vocal rhythm])

U glavi rešenja razna, mnoge hipoteze,
([Perc layer] - [extra shakers + rim shots creating polyrhythm])

Sve će meni biti jasno posle Albaneeeeeze.
([Tempo shift] - [brief half-time feel on "Albaneeeeeze", then snap back full tempo])
([Vocal FX] - [formant-shifted choir-like stack on last syllable])

[Verse 3 – Male]:
([Groove] - [bass riff variations, subtle synth arps weaving through beat])
Uzimam na ler, bez plana da vratim,
([Vocal FX] - [robotic glitch on word "ler"])

Razbijen sam vazda, slabo šta ja paaaaamtim.
([Delay] - ["paAAAmtim" stretched and echoed, metallic tail])

Noć, ja sišo sam u grad (nanananana),
([Perc FX] - [extra hi-hat pattern + claps, slight tempo push])

Šetam se lagano, svuda miriše skank.
([Brass stab] - [short horn hit on "skank"])

Mala mi kaže da loži je taj rad,
Ja joj kažem: "Mala, pooooođi sa mnoooom sad." (Right now)
([Build] - [riser + layered snares under "pooooođi…"])
([Vocal FX] - ["Right now" heavily robotic, side-panned])

[Bridge – Male and Female Together]:
([Beat switch] - [half-time feel, heavier bass, more room reverb])

(Male):
Hej mala, jesi li za ples (jesi li za ples)
([Call FX] - ["jesi li za ples" vocoder call-and-response])

Večeras igraj sa mnom – taj GRGA DANCE.
([Brass hook] - [catchy staccato horn riff, becomes motif])

(Female):
Iako gubiš sve, na faci ti kez (hehe)
([Vocal FX] - [robotic harmony on "kez", slight pitch slide])

Idemo do tebe peške, ostao si novca bez! (Biće!)
([Pre-drop] - [snare build + rising noise, tempo ramp into next verse])

[Verse 4 – Male]:
([Groove] - [full drums back, syncopated bass extra aggressive])
Dagadam, ja sam faca, baraba,
([Vocal chop] - ["Dagadam" chopped rhythmically under bar])

Davala mi lovu mala, momka lagala.
([Brass stab] - [short burst on "lagala"])

Otišao po ler, uz'o tri koma četiri,
([Bass FX] - [quick sub slide accents "tri koma četiri"])

Pa napravio 10, laka lova ove večeri.
([FX] - [cash register + short riser, hits on "ove večeri"])

[Chorus – Female and Male Together]:
([Final drop] - [biggest bass drop, full brass, extra percussion, max energy])

(Female):
Jer to je Grga (Grga Dance),
([Hook FX] - ["Grga Dance" robotic gang chant, wide])

Igraj mala sa mnom (taj ples).
([Brass riff] - [repeating staccato phrase, doubles "taj ples"])

(Male):
Večeras se čupam (yes, yes),
([Vocal FX] - ["yes, yes" vocoder stabs on off-beats])

Kamata mi sutra (o neee).
([Tempo shift] - [brief half-time bar on "o neee", then slam back])

Znojim se, srce lupa, o yeah!
([Outro energy] - [layered synth arp + tom fills, crowd noise rising to end])

# hardcore_pop - Grga_Dens_L
[DESCRIPTION]
This Balkan trap/Serbian drill track pulses with menacing 808s and gritty bass, set against syncopated, rolling percussion. Haunting Arabic melodies in phrygian and harmonic minor modes shimmer from saz and kanun layers atop dark, cinematic synths, while heavily autotuned vocals deliver a robotic, nocturnal vibe.

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental]

[Female]
Kiša je padala, a ti si lupao taj slot...
[Male]
Hej Faraone, hoće pasti taj džekpot?!
...

[Male]
Noć je pala , vodim te u grad ( opet na aparat?)
Mala, dođi, znam da tebe loži taj rad,
I zato, uzmi spremi se, lajnu - sredi se
Sedi u taksi, dodji, k meni dovezi se
Na staro mesto, gde uvek pleše se,
Grga dens u kući, svi problemi će reše se
A jaaaaaaaaa
Hoću da trošim pare, da lupam po aparatima

[Female - breakdown]
 manja ili veća - tebe jedino to zanima...

[Male]
Igram već danima, znam šta radim,
Pustim ga da mi uzme, a posle sve duplo vratim
I sve što zaradim u slamaricu stavljam (hah)
Šalim se, neću, idem do Grge da nadjem svoju sreću 

[Female-Verse]
Ti uzimaš na ler, bez plana da vratiš,
Razbijen si stalno, slabo šta ti pamtiš
Zoveš me na piće, a uvek sama sve platim
puno rivaš, s aparata nikad ne skidaš,
umesto kuće ti piramide zidaš

(Male):Večeras se čupam (yes, yes),
Kamata mi sutra (o neee).Znojim se, srce lupa, o yeah!

Hej mala jesi li za ples Večeras igraj sa mnom taj Grga ples

[Instrumental-Outro-Go baliistic]

# hardcore_pop - Grga_Dens_L
[DESCRIPTION]
This 155 BPM slap house track pulses with forceful, saturated sub-bass and syncopated, punchy drums. Gritty acid synths lead the hook, cut by sharp violins weaving Arabic modal riffs. Autotuned deep vocals, crisp hi-hats, and sweeping risers amplify the relentless, pounding club energy.

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental]

[Female]

# hardcore_pop - Grga_Dens_LI
[DESCRIPTION]
This Balkan-inspired track pulses at 120-140bpm, driven by syncopated brass stabs and deep electronic bass. Sultry, autotuned male and female vocals alternate and weave together atop hypnotic synths, metallic accents, and subtle folk strings, building layered tension and vibrant momentum.

[LYRICS]
[Verse 1 – Male]:
Hoću da trošim pare kod Grge na aparaaaatima (Book of Ra)
Noću sanjam zelenaši mi na vratima (o ne!)
Od zlatnog prstenja i zlatnog naaaaakita
Ćale kaže: "Čekaj samo da se vratim ja."
(Samo da se vraaaaatim)


---

[Bridge – Male]:
Ajoj mama najebo sam ga (ufff)
Sutra je trinaesti nova kaaaaamata (mata)
Lutam po raznim gajbama
Razmazan, namazan, poooomalo bezobrazan. (Samo malo)


---

[Verse 2 – Female]:
Ti si kockar, budan dana tri,
Tražiš zlatni prsten, nešto za zaaaaa-valjati.
Ako pitaju – nisi bio ti, majke ti (taman posla)
Večeras ide gas, hvala maćehi. (Thanks)


---

[Chorus – Female]:

Hoće li ova roba da me pooooveeeze
U glavi rešenja razna, mnoge hipoteze,
Sve će meni biti jasno posle Albaneeeeeze.


---

[Verse 3 – Male]:
Uzimam na ler, bez plana da vratim,
Razbijen sam vazda, slabo šta ja paaaaamtim.
Noć, ja sišo sam u grad (nanananana),
Šetam se lagano, svuda miriše skank.
Mala mi kaže da loži je taj rad,
Ja joj kažem: "Mala, pooooođi sa mnoooom sad." (Right now)


---

[Bridge – Male and Female Together]:
(Male):
Hej mala, jesi li za ples (jesi li za ples)
Večeras igraj sa mnom – taj GRGA DANCE.
(Female):
Iako gubiš sve, na faci ti kez (hehe)
Idemo do tebe peške, ostao si novca bez! (Biće!)


---

[Verse 4 – Male]:
Dagadam, ja sam faca, baraba,
Davala mi lovu mala, momka lagala.
Otišao po ler, uz'o tri koma četiri,
Pa napravio 10, laka lova ove večeri.

Šetam se lagano, svuda miriše skank.
Mala mi kaže da loži je taj rad,
Ja joj kažem: "Mala, pooooođi sa mnoooom sad." (Right now)

# hardcore_pop - Grga_Dens_LX
[DESCRIPTION]
This EDM banger erupts at 150 BPM,igniting the floor with a relentless fusion of Balkan soul and modern fury. It opens with the iconic,wailing cry of a traditional accordion sample,immediately hijacked by a pounding,4/4 kick drum that feels like a heartbeat on steroids. The original melancholic melody is twisted into a weaponized synth lead,soaring over a seismic,sidechained bassline that never relents. Fiery Balkan brass stabs,processed through distortion and delay,punch through the mix like gunshots,while the original vocal—pitched and glitched—becomes a defiant,robotic mantra commanding you to move. There are no breakdowns,only momentary breathers where the kick filters back in with more punishing force. This is a non-stop,percussive assault designed for pure,unadulterated chaos; a track that doesn't build to a drop,but rather IS the drop from start to finish. It's a timeless melody supercharged into a futuristic,unrelenting beast that grabs you by the soul and refuses to let go u

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental]

[Female]
Kiša je padala, a ti si lupao taj slot...
[Male]
Hej Faraone, hoće pasti taj džekpot?!
...

[Male]
Noć je pala , vodim te u grad ( opet na aparat?)
Mala, dođi, znam da tebe loži taj rad,
I zato, uzmi spremi se, lajnu - sredi se
Sedi u taksi, dodji, k meni dovezi se
Na staro mesto, gde uvek pleše se,
Grga dens u kući, svi problemi će reše se
A jaaaaaaaaa
Hoću da trošim pare, da lupam po aparatima

[Female - breakdown]
 manja ili veća - tebe jedino to zanima...

[Male]
Igram već danima, znam šta radim,
Pustim ga da mi uzme, a posle sve duplo vratim
I sve što zaradim u slamaricu stavljam (hah)
Šalim se, neću, idem do Grge da nadjem svoju sreću 

[Female-Verse]

Razbijen si stalno, slabo šta ti pamtiš
Zoveš me na piće, a uvek sama sve platim
puno rivaš, s aparata nikad ne skidaš,
umesto kuće ti piramide zidaš

[DESCRIPTION]
This Balkan-tech fusion opens with a gritty, syncopated bassline and staccato brass stabs, merging live percussion with crisp electronic beats. Robotic autotuned vocals cut through polyrhythmic layers. Dynamic tempo shifts build up to relentless bass drops, unleashing ecstatic dancefloor energy.

[DESCRIPTION]
A Balkan trap/Serbian drill track built on haunting Arabic melodies and modal scales, anchored by punchy 808s, gritty bass, and syncopated percussion. Layers of saz and kanun float over dark synths, while heavily autotuned vocals add a robotic, nocturnal energy throughout.

# hardcore_pop - Hardcore _Pop x Sxemsah_1
[DESCRIPTION]
A vintage Balkan folk-pop love ballad built on a slow, gently swaying rhythm with warm analog tones and a tender, romantic mood. The arrangement centers on a soft, rounded kick and light snare, with a smooth electric-bass line following simple, uplifting patterns. A bright, reverb-kissed accordion carries the main harmony, weaving sweet, melodic phrases over soft synth pads and occasional string layers that add warmth rather than drama. Subtle ornamental lines and backing vocals lift the choruses, emphasizing the theme of mutual love and lifelong devotion. The lead vocal is clear, affectionate, and forward in the mix with a touch of tape-saturation glow, supported at times by gentle harmonies that echo the “we love each other” refrain. The overall atmosphere is intimate, hopeful, and heartwarming, with the instrumental serving as a cozy, nostalgic bed for a simple, sincere celebration of love.

[LYRICS]
Tell me, tell me darling,
how much do you love me?
“I love you more than anything,
from here up to the heavens.
I love you more than anything,
from here up to the heavens.”

We are in love, we are in love,
sweetest thing the world has ever seen.
We are in love, we are in love,
nothing’s sweeter than the love between us two,
nothing’s ever sweeter.

I love you, my darling,
I just can’t hide it.
Show me all your love now,
take my hand and hold it.
Show me all your love now,
take my hand and hold it.

We are in love, we are in love,
sweetest thing the world has ever seen.
We are in love, we are in love,
nothing’s sweeter than the love between us two,
nothing’s ever sweeter.

You will always, darling,
live inside my heart.
I’ll belong forever to you,
you’re my only love.
I’ll belong forever to you,
you’re my only love.

We are in love, we are in love,
sweetest thing the world has ever seen.
We are in love, we are in love,
nothing’s sweeter than the love between us two,
nothing’s ever sweeter.

# hardcore_pop - Hardcore_Pop_2
[DESCRIPTION]
A hypnotic tech house groove pulses with tight bass and crisp, driving percussion, while moody, underground club ambiences set the scene. Siren-style risers and chopped rave samples slice in atop bass that morphs subtly throughout. 80s-inspired midi synths layer melodic hooks, and sampled crowd cheers and chant vocals explode with raw, communal energy at each drop.

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - Intro (125 BPM)-deep tech-house foundation: tight sub-bass mono <120Hz, kick punch center 55–70Hz +2dB, subtle vinyl crackle -12dB, HP @30Hz; BUS: mild tape sat ~+1.5dB, glue comp 1.6:1 fast.*]

[Male - Verse 1 - dry-present lead, gentle autotune, short plate reverb (pre-delay 20ms), 2ms slap delay on doubles; PROC: de-esser 6–8k, comp 3:1 atk 6ms rel 90ms, EQ low-cut 80Hz, presence +1.5dB @3.8k; ARR: leave -6dB lead headroom for chorus lift.*]
Noćima već sanjam, (kako me doziva aaa aaa)
Dok šapuće mi ime sa tim sjajem u očima
I ne znam dal je ona stvarna (aaaa)
Il živi mi u snovima, ne znam al dobro znam da...

[Instrumental - Pre-Chorus Build (125 → 135 BPM)-automated HPF sweep (cut to 800Hz -> open), layered siren riser (long tail), snare rolls gated 1/16, riser parallel distortion +2dB; MIX: send riser to bus, increase stereo width 10% above 3k.*]

[Female - Chorus - warm lead, airy detune; PROC: comp 4:1 atk 8ms rel 120ms, parallel compression blend 30%, plate reverb 40% wet (pre-delay 30ms), stereo delay 1/8 on ad-libs, harmonic excite +2dB @6k; MIX: chorus bus -1dB low-mid dip 250–400Hz.*]
Svaki put kad on tu je, zvezde padaju (paadajuuu)
U tebi tad se vojske bude, da svetom vladaju
I kad mi pruža svoje ruke (Ruuuke)
Misli se nadaju, da ostaće mi tu zauvek gde se srca raduju

[Male - Verse 2 - subbed slap bass groove, subtle transient shaping on kick, tape saturation on vocal consonants for warmth; PROC: vocal comp 3.5:1, atk 5ms rel 70ms, low cut 80Hz, add soft stereo chorus on doubles 10% wet; ARR: low percussion fills every 8 bars to propel rhythm.*]
A ona samo zna da igra (uuuu aaaa)
Ništa ne govori (Šššš)
Dok pleše oko mene čekam kad ću
Da izgorim (plamen)

[Instrumental - Breakdown (130 BPM)-reverse piano stabs, LPF 400→1.8k automation, airy reverb tail length 2.2s (ducked), sub-modulation motif on 4-bar loop; MIX: cut 150–260Hz -1.5dB to clear mud, widen piano L/R 30%.*]

[Female - Chorus - layered harmonies, sidechain depth increased 5% for groove breathing, gentle white-noise swell pre-drop, stereo spread on >5k to taste; PROC: add stereo micro-shift on one harmony (-8 cents) to thicken.*]
Da spojimo se ko dva dima među zvezdama
Da zagrli me čvrsto i nikad ne pušta...

[Male - Bridge - intimate double, long plate reverb 60% wet, lo-fi harmonic distortion for tension +1.2dB, delay 3/16 lowpassed 3.5k; MIX: pull bass -3dB under bridge to create lift for build.*]
(Srce kuca... kuca... kuca samo za nju)
(Oči gledam... gledam... gledam samo nju)

[Instrumental - Build-up (135 → 145 BPM)-stacked risers (octave-up), gated synth arps, pitch-up FX (2 semitones), snare crescendo automating +6dB over 16 bars; MIX: pre-fade riser send -8dB for DJ use, glue comp on drum bus 2:1.*]

[Female - Chorus - full-spectrum re-entry, leads detuned +12–15 cents on 2nd layer for width; PROC: aggressive parallel compression on vocal bus (60% wet), excite +2.5dB @10k, saturate tails with tape emulation; MIX: keep monosub <120Hz, open top 6–12k by +1.5dB for air.*]
Svaki put kad on tu je, zvezde padaju (paadajuuu)
U tebi tad se vojske bude, da svetom vladaju
I kad mi pruža svoje ruke (Ruuuke)
Misli se nadaju, da ostaće mi tu zauvek gde se srca raduju

[Male - Outro - vocal intimate, delay feedback automates down, plate reverb 70% wet, final vocal ride -3dB for smooth DJ handoff; PROC: apply subtle low-pass on tail 6dB/oct starting 6s before end to ease transition.*]
Da spojimo se ko dva dima među zvezdama (među zvezdamaaa)
Da zagrlim je čvrsto i nikad ne puštam (nikad ne puštam)

[Instrumental - Outro (145 → 125 BPM)-gradual disintegration: remove hats and top percussion over 12 bars, acid pad dissolves to airy sub-oscillation, keep crackle loop -12dB, provide loopable 8-bar DJ tail with isolated sub & riser; MIX: LPF to 1.2k across last 16 bars, ensure phase coherent mono <120Hz, leave riser stem -6dB.*]

[Mastering Chain & Reference - final LUFS target -8 to -6 LUFS (club), True Peak -0.3dB; CHAIN: corrective stereo EQ (dip 200–400Hz -1.0–2.0dB) → multi-band compression (tighten 60–120Hz / glue mids / tame highs) → subtle tape saturation +1.5dB trim → stereo imager (mono below 120Hz, gentle widen 3–12k) → final limiter (ceiling -0.3dB, fast release) → dither 24→16 bit; REF tonal balance: deep sub, present mids, airy highs—translate on club PA.*]

---

# hardcore_pop - Hardcore_Pop_2
[DESCRIPTION]

Misli se nadaju, da ostaće mi tu zauvek gde se srca raduju

# hardcore_pop - Hardcore_Pop_3
[DESCRIPTION]
This Balkan-tech track pulses at 120–130 BPM with warped synths and deep, saturated bass. Eastern European strings and woodwinds twist psychedelically over syncopated digital percussion, creating a hypnotic rhythm. Sultry female vocals glide atop, heavily autotuned and layered with airy harmonies, while male vocals are dry, intimate, and subtly processed. Breakdown sections clear space with reversed stabs, airy pads, and filtered risers. Sidechain compression, tape saturation, and stereo widening are applied throughout for a spacious, opulent sound. Risers, vocal doubles, and multiband processing ensure club-ready energy, while fadeouts and DJ-friendly loops enable seamless mixing with future tracks in the set.

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - Intro (120 BPM)-warped pulsing synths, deep saturated sub bass, subtle stereo width modulation; analog warmth applied; HP sweep to open mix; master EQ gently boosts 100–300Hz for fullness, soft tape saturation for harmonics, limiting set for -1dBFS headroom, stereo width checked for mono compatibility.*]

[Male - Verse 1 - dry lead with subtle autotune, low compression on voice, slight stereo spread, airy tail; parallel compression on 2nd bus for clarity; master bus multiband compression tuned to vocal presence; subtle stereo enhancer applied; harmonic exciter lightly boosts clarity.*]
Noćima već sanjam, (kako me doziva aaa aaa)
Dok šapuće mi ime sa tim sjajem u očima
I ne znam dal je ona stvarna ( aaaa)
Il živi mi u snovima, ne znam al dobro znam da...

[Instrumental - Verse Bed (120 BPM)-layered digital percussion with syncopation, soft woodwind stabs with psychedelic pan automation, deep filtered bass; sidechain compression to kick; bus saturation for glue; master stereo imaging optimized; transient shaper to retain punch; multiband limiting preserves dynamics while ensuring loudness.*]

[Female - Chorus - lead heavily autotuned, wide stereo, subtle harmonic doubling; airy reverb; multiband compression; light stereo chorus; master bus maximizes clarity, gentle limiting, low-end contouring for punch; high-end shelf for shimmer without harshness.*]
Svaki put kad on tu je, zvezde padaju (paadajuuu)
U tebi tad se vojske bude, da svetom vladaju
I kad mi pruža svoje ruke (Ruuuke)
Misli se nadaju, da ostaće mi tu zauvek gde se srca raduju

[Male - Verse 2 - soft low-mid EQ, parallel compression, delay tails synced to BPM, subtle harmonic excitation; master bus maintains headroom; sidechain to sub-bass to preserve groove; subtle stereo enhancement on upper harmonics for air.*]
A ona samo zna da igra (uuuu aaaa)
Ništa ne govori (Šššš)
Dok pleše oko mene čekam kad ću
Da izgorim (plamen)

[Instrumental - Breakdown (115 BPM)-space cleared for vocal, airy pads, reversed string stabs, high-pass filtered risers; mono sub for depth, stereo widening on FX; master compression soft, limiting preserves transient impact; EQ cuts muddy frequencies; slight tape saturation for warmth.*]

[Female - Chorus - layered harmonies added, stereo width maximized, sidechain subtle, airy reverb on top layers; master multiband limiter keeps chorus upfront; harmonic exciter for high-end clarity; low-end gently compressed for club impact.*]
Da spojimo se ko dva dima među zvezdama
Da zagrli me čvrsto i nikad ne pušta...

[Male - Bridge - parallel compression, tape saturation, stereo spread increased, soft auto-pan for movement; master bus multiband gentle compression; high-pass sweep to avoid low-end mud; stereo field balanced for mono compatibility.*]
(Srce kuca... kuca... kuca samo za nju)
(Oči gledam... gledam... gledam samo nju)

[Instrumental - Buildup (120 → 130 BPM)-rising filtered synths, white noise risers, percussive snare rolls, stacked vocal FX layers; master EQ ensures no frequency masking; stereo enhancement applied for width; limiting keeps peaks controlled; harmonic excitation subtly brightens highs.*]

[Female - Chorus - full dynamic range, layered harmonics, subtle saturation for warmth, stereo chorus on vocal doubles, airy delay; master bus multiband compression ensures loudness and clarity; low-end contouring maintains club punch; high-end shelving enhances sparkle.*]
Svaki put kad on tu je, zvezde padaju (paadajuuu)
U tebi tad se vojske bude, da svetom vladaju
I kad mi pruža svoje ruke (Ruuuke)
Misli se nadaju, da ostaće mi tu zauvek gde se srca raduju

[Male - Outro - soft parallel compression, low-level saturation, stereo width gently narrowed, airy reverb tail; master bus limiting to -1dBFS, final EQ balance, lowpass sweep for fade; DJ-friendly loopable section for mixing.*]
Da spojimo se ko dva dima među zvezdama (među zvezdamaaa)
Da zagrlim je čvrsto i nikad ne puštam (nikad ne puštam)

[Instrumental - Fade Out (130 → 110 BPM)-synth layers gradually removed, sub oscillation reduced, stereo reverbs slowly collapse, kick muted gradually, lowpass sweep; master stereo width and balance finalized; final limiting ensures smooth streaming and club-ready playback.*]

# hardcore_pop - Hardcore_Pop_3
[DESCRIPTION]
This Balkan-tech track pulses at 120–130 BPM with warped synths and deep, saturated bass. Eastern European strings and woodwinds twist psychedelically over syncopated digital percussion, creating a hypnotic rhythm. Sultry female vocals glide atop, heavily autotuned and layered with airy harmonies, while male vocals are dry, intimate, and subtly processed. Breakdown sections clear space with reversed stabs, airy pads, and filtered risers. Sidechain compression, tape saturation, and stereo widening are applied throughout for a spacious, opulent sound. Risers, vocal doubles, and multiband processing ensure club-ready energy, while fadeouts and DJ-friendly loops enable seamless mixing with future tracks in the set.

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - Intro (120 BPM)-warped pulsing synths, deep saturated sub bass, subtle stereo width modulation; analog warmth applied; HP sweep to open mix; master EQ gently boosts 100–300Hz for fullness, soft tape saturation for harmonics, limiting set for -1dBFS headroom, stereo width checked for mono compatibility.*]

[Male - Verse 1 - dry lead with subtle autotune, low compression on voice, slight stereo spread, airy tail; parallel compression on 2nd bus for clarity; master bus multiband compression tuned to vocal presence; subtle stereo enhancer applied; harmonic exciter lightly boosts clarity.*]
Noćima već sanjam, (kako me doziva aaa aaa)
Dok šapuće mi ime sa tim sjajem u očima
I ne znam dal je ona stvarna ( aaaa)
Il živi mi u snovima, ne znam al dobro znam da...

[Female - Chorus - lead heavily autotuned, wide stereo, subtle harmonic doubling; airy reverb; multiband compression; light stereo chorus; master bus maximizes clarity, gentle limiting, low-end contouring for punch; high-end shelf for shimmer without harshness.*]

# hardcore_pop - Hardcore_Pop_3_Vuzhni_Yettar
[DESCRIPTION]
This EDM banger erupts at 150 BPM,igniting the floor with a relentless fusion of Balkan soul and modern fury. It opens with the iconic,wailing cry of a traditional accordion sample,immediately hijacked by a pounding,4/4 kick drum that feels like a heartbeat on steroids. The original melancholic melody is twisted into a weaponized synth lead,soaring over a seismic,sidechained bassline that never relents. Fiery Balkan brass stabs,processed through distortion and delay,punch through the mix like gunshots,while the original vocal—pitched and glitched—becomes a defiant,robotic mantra commanding you to move. There are no breakdowns,only momentary breathers where the kick filters back in with more punishing force. This is a non-stop,percussive assault designed for pure,unadulterated chaos; a track that doesn't build to a drop,but rather IS the drop from start to finish. It's a timeless melody supercharged into a futuristic,unrelenting beast that grabs you by the soul and refuses to let go u

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - Intro (120 BPM)-warped pulsing synths, deep saturated sub bass, subtle stereo width modulation; analog warmth applied; HP sweep to open mix; master EQ gently boosts 100–300Hz for fullness, soft tape saturation for harmonics, limiting set for -1dBFS headroom, stereo width checked for mono compatibility.*]

[Male - Verse 1 - dry lead with subtle autotune, low compression on voice, slight stereo spread, airy tail; parallel compression on 2nd bus for clarity; master bus multiband compression tuned to vocal presence; subtle stereo enhancer applied; harmonic exciter lightly boosts clarity.*]
Noćima već sanjam, (kako me doziva aaa aaa)
Dok šapuće mi ime sa tim sjajem u očima
I ne znam dal je ona stvarna ( aaaa)
Il živi mi u snovima, ne znam al dobro znam da...

[Instrumental - Verse Bed (120 BPM)-layered digital percussion with syncopation, soft woodwind stabs with psychedelic pan automation, deep filtered bass; sidechain compression to kick; bus saturation for glue; master stereo imaging optimized; transient shaper to retain punch; multiband limiting preserves dynamics while ensuring loudness.*]

[Female - Chorus - lead heavily autotuned, wide stereo, subtle harmonic doubling; airy reverb; multiband compression; light stereo chorus; master bus maximizes clarity, gentle limiting, low-end contouring for punch; high-end shelf for shimmer without harshness.*]
Svaki put kad on tu je, zvezde padaju (paadajuuu)
U tebi tad se vojske bude, da svetom vladaju
I kad mi pruža svoje ruke (Ruuuke)
Misli se nadaju, da ostaće mi tu zauvek gde se srca raduju

[Male - Verse 2 - soft low-mid EQ, parallel compression, delay tails synced to BPM, subtle harmonic excitation; master bus maintains headroom; sidechain to sub-bass to preserve groove; subtle stereo enhancement on upper harmonics for air.*]

[Female - Chorus - layered harmonies added, stereo width maximized, sidechain subtle, airy reverb on top layers; master multiband limiter keeps chorus upfront; harmonic exciter for high-end clarity; low-end gently compressed for club impact.*]
Da spojimo se ko dva dima među zvezdama

[Male - Bridge - parallel compression, tape saturation, stereo spread increased, soft auto-pan for movement; master bus multiband gentle compression; high-pass sweep to avoid low-end mud; stereo field balanced for mono compatibility.*]
(Srce kuca... kuca... kuca samo za nju)
(Oči gledam... gledam... gledam samo nju)

[Instrumental - Buildup (120 → 130 BPM)-rising filtered synths, white noise risers, percussive snare rolls, stacked vocal FX layers; master EQ ensures no frequency masking; stereo enhancement applied for width; limiting keeps peaks controlled; harmonic excitation subtly brightens highs.*]

# hardcore_pop - Hardcore_Pop_4_Vuzhni_Yettar
[DESCRIPTION]
This EDM banger erupts at 150 BPM,igniting the floor with a relentless fusion of Balkan soul and modern fury. It opens with the iconic,wailing cry of a traditional accordion sample,immediately hijacked by a pounding,4/4 kick drum that feels like a heartbeat on steroids. Fiery Balkan brass stabs,processed through distortion and delay,punch through the mix like gunshots,while the original vocal—pitched and glitched—becomes a defiant,robotic mantra commanding you to move. There are no breakdowns,only momentary breathers where the kick filters back in with more punishing force. This is a non-stop,percussive assault designed for pure,unadulterated chaos; a track that doesn't build to a drop,but rather IS the drop from start to finish. It's a timeless melody supercharged into a futuristic,unrelenting beast that grabs you by the soul and refuses to let go u

I kad mi pruža svoje ruke (Ruuuke)
Misli se nadaju, da ostaće mi tu zauvek gde se srca raduju

[Male - Verse 2 - soft low-mid EQ, parallel compression, delay tails synced to BPM, subtle harmonic excitation; master bus maintains headroom; sidechain to sub-bass to preserve groove; subtle stereo enhancement on upper harmonics for air.*]
A ona samo zna da igra (uuuu aaaa)
Ništa ne govori (Šššš)
Dok pleše oko mene čekam kad ću
Da izgorim (plamen)

[Instrumental - Breakdown (115 BPM)-space cleared for vocal, airy pads, reversed string stabs, high-pass filtered risers; mono sub for depth, stereo widening on FX; master compression soft, limiting preserves transient impact; EQ cuts muddy frequencies; slight tape saturation for warmth.*]

[Female - Chorus - layered harmonies added, stereo width maximized, sidechain subtle, airy reverb on top layers; master multiband limiter keeps chorus upfront; harmonic exciter for high-end clarity; low-end gently compressed for club impact.*]
Da spojimo se ko dva dima među zvezdama
Da zagrli me čvrsto i nikad ne pušta...

[Male - Bridge - parallel compression, tape saturation, stereo spread increased, soft auto-pan for movement; master bus multiband gentle compression; high-pass sweep to avoid low-end mud; stereo field balanced for mono compatibility.*]
(Srce kuca... kuca... kuca samo za nju)
(Oči gledam... gledam... gledam samo nju)

[Instrumental - Buildup (120 → 130 BPM)-rising filtered synths, white noise risers, percussive snare rolls, stacked vocal FX layers; master EQ ensures no frequency masking; stereo enhancement applied for width; limiting keeps peaks controlled; harmonic excitation subtly brightens highs.*]

[Female - Chorus - full dynamic range, layered harmonics, subtle saturation for warmth, stereo chorus on vocal doubles, airy delay; master bus multiband compression ensures loudness and clarity; low-end contouring maintains club punch; high-end shelving enhances sparkle.*]
Svaki put kad on tu je, zvezde padaju (paadajuuu)
U tebi tad se vojske bude, da svetom vladaju
I kad mi pruža svoje ruke (Ruuuke)
Misli se nadaju, da ostaće mi tu zauvek gde se srca raduju

[Male - Outro - soft parallel compression, low-level saturation, stereo width gently narrowed, airy reverb tail; master bus limiting to -1dBFS, final EQ balance, lowpass sweep for fade; DJ-friendly loopable section for mixing.*]
Da spojimo se ko dva dima među zvezdama (među zvezdamaaa)
Da zagrlim je čvrsto i nikad ne puštam (nikad ne puštam)

[Instrumental - Fade Out (130 → 110 BPM)-synth layers gradually removed, sub oscillation reduced, stereo reverbs slowly collapse, kick muted gradually, lowpass sweep; master stereo width and balance finalized; final limiting ensures smooth streaming and club-ready playback.*]

---

# hardcore_pop - Hasanaginicca_1
[DESCRIPTION]
Serbian Drill Banger (130-140 BPM)
Fast-paced variant emphasizing drill elements, Features aggressive 808 slides, rapid-fire hi-hats, and distorted bass, Arabic melodies are fragmented and used sparingly as hooks, Vocals are heavily processed with aggressive flows and crew chants creating high energy

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - Intro]
(Sound: A slow, menacing 808 glide opens the track, with sparse, icy hi-hats and a deep, sub-bass drone creating immediate tension.)

[Vocal Chop Hook]
(Sound: A cold, robotic vocal chop repeats, sounding like a legal decree.)

Kadijina... knjiga... oprošćenja...

[Verse 1 - Aggressive Flow]
(Sound: Vocals are delivered in a cold, monotone, aggressive flow.)

Bježe muci, ništa ne govori,
već joj šalje imotskom kadiji.
Još kaduna bratu se moljaše:
„Aj tako te ne željela, braco,
nemоj meni davat ni za koga,
da ne puca jadno srce moje“.
Ali bježe ništa ne hajaše,
već je nju daje imotskom kadiji.

[Crew Chant]
(Sound: The beat slams in with full force as a crew chant shouts over it.)

DAJU JE! DAJU JE! IMOTSKOM KADIJI!
KNJIGU BJELU! KNJIGU BJELU!
DA JE ŠALJE! DA JE ŠALJE!

[Verse 2 - Aggressive Flow]
(Sound: The flow becomes more desperate and angry.)

„Dug pokrivač nosi na djevojku,
kada bude agi mimo dvora,
da ne vidi sirotiće svoje“.
A dva sina pred nju ishodjahu,
tere svojoj majci govorahu:
„Svrati nam se, mila majko naša“.

[Bridge - Fragmented Melody]
(Sound: A sample of a woman's voice is stretched and distorted, forming a bleak, melodic hook.)

...Bogom brate... svata starješina...

[Outro]
(Sound: The beat cuts to silence, followed by a single, final, distorted bass hit and the sound of a thud, like a body hitting the ground.)

Bjelim licem u zemlju ud'rija.

---

# hardcore_pop - Hasanaginicca_2
[DESCRIPTION]
This EDM banger erupts at 150 BPM,igniting the floor with a relentless fusion of Balkan passion and modern fury. It opens with the iconic,soulful wail of a Sccordion sample,immediately hijacked by a pounding,4/4 kick drum that feels like a heartbeat on steroids. The original melancholic melody is twisted into a weaponized synth lead,soaring over a seismic,sidechained bassline that never relents. Fiery Balkan brass stabs,processed through distortion and delay,punch through the mix like gunshots,while the original vocal—pitched and glitched—becomes a defiant,robotic mantra commanding you to move. There are no breakdowns,only momentary breathers where the kick filters back in with more punishing force. This is a non-stop,percussive assault designed for pure,unadulterated chaos; a track that doesn't build to a drop,but rather IS the drop from start to finish. It's a nostalgic roar supercharged into a futuristic,unrelenting beast that grabs you by the soul and refuses to let go

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - Intro/Groove]
(Sound: Dark warehouse vibe, deep rumbling sub-bass, tight kick pattern. Stripped accordion motif loops, heavily filtered. Minimal percussion - kick, rimshot, shaker creating a hypnotic groove.)

[Vocal Chop Hook]
(Sound: Processed vocal snippet repeats - robotic, detuned, buried in reverb.)

Срамоте... Ве-велике срамоте... Гдје ме шаље...

[Vocal Layer 1]
(Sound: Distorted brass stabs appear sporadically - surgical, precise. Sidechain pumps relentlessly.)

I vrati se Hasanaginica, ter se vješa bratu oko vrata: „Da, moj brate, velike sramote...“
Béže muči, ništa ne govori, već se maša u džepove svione.

[Vocal Layer 2]
(Sound: Glitchy hi-hat patterns and stuttering effects are introduced. Vocal chops become more fractured.)
...vadi joj knjigu oprošćenja, da gre s njime majci unatrage.
Kad kaduna knjigu proučila, dva je sina u čelo ljubila.

[Mid-Section Vocal]
(Sound: Original melody appears briefly - warped beyond recognition through a bitcrusher.)

A s malahnim u bešici sinkom, odjelit se nikako ne mogla; već je bratac pod ruke uzeo.

[Final Vocal Section]
(Sound: Track strips to core elements - kick, bass, accordion ghost. Vocal chops are time-stretched, reversed.)
...синком... раставио... на коњица... на коњица...

[Final Hit]
(Sound: Abrupt ending - no fade, just stops.)

---

# hardcore_pop - How_it_ends_up_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
An 132 bpm  house track , zurna, organ,80s synth, cowbells, ancient harp, car siren, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals.minor keys (Cm/Gm). Male A2–C4 baritone; Female G3–A5 alto/mezzo. Tight, rhythmic delivery; subtle tuning. Comp 3–6 dB GR; cut 200–350 Hz; add 3–5 kHz presence, 10–12 kHz air. Short plate, tempo-synced delays; natural, deep, clubby vibe.

[LYRICS]

# hardcore_pop - How_it_ends_up_Hardcore_Pop_2
[DESCRIPTION]
An 132 bpm  house track , zurna, organ,80s synth, cowbells, ancient harp, car siren, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals. minor/Dorian. Male: smooth, deep, rhythmic, sits in the groove; Female: airy, whispery, dreamy, rides the top. Both laid-back with syncopated phrasing; subtle plate & ping-pong delays; presence lift 3–5 kHz, air 10–12 kHz; never overpower the beat.

# hardcore_pop - Hymn to Osiris
[DESCRIPTION]
Ancient Egyptian flutes, lyres, and hand percussion form a meditative soundscape. Slow, undulating drone notes from double reed instruments evoke planetary orbits, interwoven with cyclical harp arpeggios. Evolving modal harmonies and subtle shifts in percussion mimic graceful celestial motion.

[LYRICS]
[Verse]
Homage to thee Osiris
Lord of eternity
King of the gods whose names are manifold
Whose forms are holy
Thou being of hidden form in the temples
Whose Ka is holy
Thou art the governor of Tattu
And also the mighty one in Sekhem
Thou art the lord to whom praises are ascribed in the nome of Athi
Thou art the chief of the divine food in Annu
Thou art the lord who is commemorated in Maati
The hidden soul
The Lord of Qerret

[Prechorus]
The holy one in the city of Nart
The soul of Ra
His own body
Thou Ba whose forms are manifold
Thou creator of the beings of Qereret
And the company of the gods is with thee

[Chorus]
Thou art the governor of Amentet
The lord of Abydos
Thy seat extendeth into the land of holiness
Thy name is firmly established in the mouth of mankind
Thou art the substance of two lands
Thou art Tem
The man of the two lands
Thou art the beneficent spirit in the mountain of Maati
The great one in the mountain of Hesert

[Verse 2]
Thou art the lord of the great house in Khemennu
The mighty one of victories in Shas-hetep
The lord of eternity
The governor of Aabu
The beneficent one
The beloved one of the gods
The mighty one of hand in Annu
The beneficent one in Amentet
The lord of the territory of the two lands
The mighty one in Sekhem
The lord of the shrine which is in Maa
The mighty one in Shas-hetep
The beneficent one of hearts in Restau
The lord of the form of the company of the gods
The beautiful one in the house of Ka

[Chorus]
Thou art the governor of Amentet
The lord of Abydos
Thy seat extendeth into the land of holiness
Thy name is firmly established in the mouth of mankind
Thou art the substance of two lands
Thou art Tem
The man of the two lands
Thou art the beneficent spirit in the mountain of Maati
The great one in the mountain of Hesert

---

# hardcore_pop - Hymn to Osiris
[DESCRIPTION]
A meditative ancient soundscape unfolds with Egyptian flutes, lyres, double reed drones, cyclical harp arpeggios, and hand percussion in subtly shifting modal harmonies. Ambient layers include fire crackles, quiet laughter, and distant conversations, blending realism with ethereal textures.

[LYRICS]
[Verse]
Homage to thee Osiris
Lord of eternity
King of the gods whose names are manifold
Whose forms are holy
Thou being of hidden form in the temples
Whose Ka is holy
Thou art the governor of Tattu

# hardcore_pop - Hymn to Osiris- Hardcore_Pop_2
[DESCRIPTION]
An 130-140 bpm  house track , zurna, organ ,80s synth, cowbells, ancient harp, car siren, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals., minor keys (F# m, Gm, Am). Male A2–G4, percussive, slight backbeat; Female G3–A5, breathy verses, brighter hooks. Tuning fast; comp 3–6 dB. HPF 80–120 Hz; cut 200–350 Hz; add 3–5 kHz, 10–12 kHz; de-ess 6–8 kHz. Short plate, ping-pong delays; doubles & call-response.

[LYRICS]
[Verse]
Homage to thee Osiris
Lord of eternity
King of the gods whose names are manifold
Whose forms are holy
Thou being of hidden form in the temples
Whose Ka is holy
Thou art the governor of Tattu
And also the mighty one in Sekhem
Thou art the lord to whom praises are ascribed in the nome of Athi
Thou art the chief of the divine food in Annu
Thou art the lord who is commemorated in Maati
The hidden soul
The Lord of Qerret

Thy name is firmly established in the mouth of mankind
Thou art the substance of two lands
Thou art Tem
The man of the two lands

The great one in the mountain of Hesert

[Verse 2]

# hardcore_pop - I Can Tell_Hardcore_Pop_2
[DESCRIPTION]
At 139 bpm relentless underground tech track , zurle, organ,80s midi synths, jungle sounds,car siren, regeaton vibea,tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices — intimate, unmistakably human performances captured close with quality mics and gentle preamp gain; minimal, transparent processing to preserve life: subtractive EQ to remove mud and boxiness, gentle optical/vari-mu compression to tame peaks while keeping micro-dynamics, careful de-essing, light parallel saturation for warmth and presence, subtle short plate reverb and slap delays for depth without wash, strategic doubling/panning for width, and only surgical manual comping or tiny pitch fixes when absolutely needed (no autotune) so breaths, tiny timing variations and tonal quirks remain to sell the human feel.

# hardcore_pop - I Can Tell_Hardcore_Pop_4
[DESCRIPTION]
The slap house track opens at 155BPM with a saturated 808 sub (45Hz) and layered, syncopated kicks, sidechained hard. TB-303 acid saws swell via LFO and resonance. Autotuned vocals glide through 1/8 dotted tape delay, underscored by swinging triplet hi-hats, white noise risers, and reverse cymbals. The build dips to 150BPM, then slams back up with chromatic acid rises, tube saturation, energetic fills, dynamic offbeat claps, ±12st shifted background vocals with chorus, and feverish percussion. The 155BPM drop is dense—24-layered soundscape, FM percussion alternates across stereo, mirrored/displaced acid, spatial call-response vox, and classic A800 saturation plus opto comp. The break slides to 145BPM, everything mid-notched and stereo-narrowed, reverb-soaked maj7 piano, sparse claps, and granular choir. Outro decelerates to 140BPM, elements mute sequentially, acid slims to mono sub, and it finishes on a 150ms granular vocal faded to silence with a sweeping lowpass.

[LYRICS]
[Male -Verse 1]
Your mouth says no 
but your eyes say yes
([Breath inhale close] - haaah)
And I know what the body wants
([Footstep soft] - tapptap)
You think too much 
but you talk too less
([Vinyl crackle / static] - pftcrackle)
Let's be wild
([Sub-bass rumble] - rrrrrr)
Come on
([Kick hit] - boom)

[Female -Pre-Chorus]
I can read your mind
([Whispered FX] - ssst)
So

# hardcore_pop - I Can Tell_Hardcore_Pop_Ginni_1
[DESCRIPTION]
At 128 bpm pulsating club tech track , zurle, organ,80s midi synths, car siren,hypnotic, sultry dancehall reggaeton vibes, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Female - Bridge]
A šta bi bilo milo moje
([Breath soft] - haaah)
da se nisu ruke tvoje
([Hand slide on skin] - fffsh)
zapetljale  tuu uuu
([Sub swell] - rrrrr)
oko moga vrata?
([Neck brush] - shhff)
malene što ispred stoje
([Heels soft] - tak-tak)
rekla bi’ im gotovo je
([Whispered FX] - ssst)
pa ti gola izlazim,
([Door click + step] - klik-tap)
sijam-sto karata zlata
([Shimmer] - tinkleee)

[Male - chorus]
Ma ja sam za tebe - to si bebo takla
([Finger snap] - snap)
A u tim noćima ti vrednost nije-nije
([Night hum] - mmmmmm)
pa struja kroz mene ide kad me takva
([Electric crackle] - bzzzt)
poput pakla bije-sva me grije grije..
([Sub hit] - BOOM) ([Heat wave] - whooom)


[Female - Bridge]
A šta bi bilo milo moje
([Breath close] - haaah)
da se nisu ruke tvoje
([Hand wrap] - shff)
zapetljale večno tuu
([Sub rise] - wub)
oko moga vrata?
([Neck touch] - fffsh)
malene što ispred stoje
([Heels echo] - tak-tak)
rekla bi’ im gotovo je
([Whisper chorus] - gotovo je…)
pa ti gola izlazim,
([Door open club] - kreeeak)
sijam-sto karata zlata
([Long shimmer] - tinkleeeee)

[Male - Verse]
Uska haljina do koljena miriše mi na šanel
([Perfume spray] - pssht)
Da je voljena da je odana ja bio bih uvek njen
([Heartbeat] - thumpthump)
Baci pogledee - vidjela bih da sam sam
([Gaze hit] - ding)
ko te odvedee - nisam spreman to da znam
([Echo distant] - znam…znam)

[Female - Bridge]
A šta bi bilo milo moje
([Breath close] - haaah)
da se nisu ruke tvoje
([Hand wrap] - shff)
zapetljale večno tuu
([Sub rise] - wub)
oko moga vrata?
([Neck touch] - fffsh)
malene što ispred stoje
([Heels echo] - tak-tak)
rekla bi’ im gotovo je

[Male - chorus ]
Ma ja sam za tebe - to si bebo takla
([Snap + clap] - snap-clap)
A u tim noćima ti vrednost nije-nije
([Night drone] - mmmmmm)
pa struja kroz mene ide kad me takva
([Electric surge] - bzzzz)
poput pakla bije-sva me grije grije..
([Sub drop] - BOOM) ([Heat whoosh] - whooosh)
Da ja sam bad boy a ti nisi cura laka
([Low chuckle] - heh)
Ma u struku tanka, mala tako slatka
([Bass bump] - thumm)
Pali put do pakla a na putu magla
([Fog sweep] - fffsh)
Na tu rutu stakla, si me ti  spotakla
([Glass clink] - klink) ([Stumble] - skrr)

zapetljale večno tuu
([Sub rise] - wub)
oko moga vrata?
([Neck touch] - fffsh)
malene što ispred stoje
([Heels echo] - tak-tak)
rekla bi’ im gotovo je
([Whisper chorus] - gotovo je…)
pa ti gola izlazim,
([Door open club] - kreeeak)
sijam-sto karata zlata
([Long shimmer] - tinkleeeee)

[Male - Verse]
Uska haljina do koljena miriše mi na šanel
([Perfume spray] - pssht)
Da je voljena da je odana ja bio bih uvek njen
([Heartbeat] - thumpthump)
Baci pogledee - vidjela bih da sam sam
([Gaze hit] - ding)
ko te odvedee - nisam spreman to da znam
([Echo distant] - znam…znam)

[Female - Bridge]
A šta bi bilo milo moje
([Breath close] - haaah)
da se nisu ruke tvoje
([Hand wrap] - shff)
zapetljale večno tuu
([Sub rise] - wub)
oko moga vrata?
([Neck touch] - fffsh)
malene što ispred stoje
([Heels echo] - tak-tak)
rekla bi’ im gotovo je

[Male - chorus ]
Ma ja sam za tebe - to si bebo takla
([Snap + clap] - snap-clap)
A u tim noćima ti vrednost nije-nije
([Night drone] - mmmmmm)
pa struja kroz mene ide kad me takva
([Electric surge] - bzzzz)
poput pakla bije-sva me grije grije..
([Sub drop] - BOOM) ([Heat whoosh] - whooosh)
Da ja sam bad boy a ti nisi cura laka
([Low chuckle] - heh)
Ma u struku tanka, mala tako slatka
([Bass bump] - thumm)
Pali put do pakla a na putu magla
([Fog sweep] - fffsh)
Na tu rutu stakla, si me ti  spotakla
([Glass clink] - klink) ([Stumble] - skrr)

# hardcore_pop - I Can Tell_Hardcore_Pop_Ginni_3
[DESCRIPTION]
At 128 bpm pulsating club tech track , zurle, organ,80s midi synths, car siren,hypnotic, sultry reggaeton vibes, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

# hardcore_pop - Inspired by Gente_Nueva
[DESCRIPTION]
At 155 BPM, the club track surges with a punishing low end, precisely carved kick and snare, and maximal harmonic saturation for system-crushing impact. Jagged acid synths cut through, unleashing resonant energy beside high-intensity Arabic violin lines with ornate microtonal slides. Vocals are sculpted with pronounced pitch effects, doubled layers, and atmospheric delays that swell with each riser and fill, maintaining relentless momentum and tension throughout.

[LYRICS]
Kuc kuc ko je
zove me šole
ove tvoje dole
Dole mole dijabole

a tu pun poen
ovo je boem
za lovu krojen
mala pijemo za troje

preko bluza njena guza ide sine gore dole
geto mandam ko jakuza kada zvone motorole
belo drama to infuza dama davala do zore
banda favela terore mala navela na fore

Ona blista čista
Mi ko dizel fidel kastro 
terorista ista
mi smo nato bliski istok
Ona poslala pismo
Da drugari više nismo

Da bi da me bari 
isto
i da bi da vari 
čisto
mala bi da skida stvari
hitro
mala mrda ko da pali
nitro
A ja mrdam ko da radi 
mi to
sa parama sam papi 
vitto
ta baraba da ferari i to

Portofino, sada fino madam uz vino casino
pada jooj
arivo mama sada na to vesto padam

sam pao sam se ubio
ganjo sam se van sa murijom
ona zna da sam se lupio
sam se lupio A kazne kupio


Shvatam da posebna si 
suza ti lice kvasi
A to što uzela si
pazi to trebala si

---

# hardcore_pop - Inspired by Gente_Nueva (Cover)
[DESCRIPTION]
At 155 BPM, the club track surges with a punishing low end, precisely carved kick and snare, and maximal harmonic saturation for system-crushing impact. Jagged tech synths cut through, unleashing resonant energy beside high-intensity Arabic violin lines with ornate microtonal slides. Vocals are sculpted with pronounced pitch effects, doubled layers, and atmospheric delays that swell with each riser and fill, maintaining relentless momentum and tension throughout.

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - go crazy]

[Chorus]
Ona kush mi sushi,nema bolja šema
Puls mi ruši,hiljadu problema
uši buši,dijamanta šema
lamele favela cela
Menja sve dresove,a ja sam high
Mala smanjuje besove da ja sam taj
Dala sve svoje stresove,mala sve daj
pala sve moje testove garant je kraj aj aj

[Verse 2]
Gle sata gle kola gle skanka što rolam

[Verse 1]
Rollie pepsi ima dipsi klizi viski belog pol
voli blesi da po sisi igra malo gola go
Oli mota white u rizli mila cima dima soke
a lepota moja ti si a ja kraljina of coke
Mat Benz pun konja pesto turiram
a vez full tozla,mesto studiram
keš tu lova,često zumiram
presto kuliram, da poludi aludiram

# hardcore_pop - Inspired by Gente_Nueva_1
[DESCRIPTION]
This slap house track pulses at 155 BPM with filthy, saturated sub-bass, punchy syncopated drums, and relentless, infectious grooves. Dark acid synths weave gritty melodies, punctuated by hypnotic, autotuned deep vocals layered over sharp hats and risers for an erotic, high-intensity club feel.

# hardcore_pop - Inspired by Gente_Nueva_2
[DESCRIPTION]
Dynamic sultry raw slap house track at 155 BPM; filthy, saturated sub-bass surges under punchy syncopated drums, while relentless dark acid synths carve gritty melodic hooks. UK drill hi-hats drive sharp top-end, joined by distorted, rolling tech-house basslines. Eerie cyborg synth textures and pitch-shifted, robotic autotune vocals layer over hypnotic grooves. Explosive drops heighten intensity, punctuated by risers and low-end bass punch for an erotic, high-energy club experience.

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - go crazy]

[Chorus]
Ona kush mi sushi,nema bolja šema
Puls mi ruši,hiljadu problema
uši buši,dijamanta šema
lamele favela cela
Menja sve dresove,a ja sam high
Mala smanjuje besove da ja sam taj
Dala sve svoje stresove,mala sve daj
pala sve moje testove garant je kraj aj aj

[Verse 2]
Gle sata gle kola gle skanka što rolam

[Verse 1]
Rollie pepsi ima dipsi klizi viski belog pol
voli blesi da po sisi igra malo gola go
Oli mota white u rizli mila cima dima soke
a lepota moja ti si a ja kraljina of coke
Mat Benz pun konja pesto turiram
a vez full tozla,mesto studiram
keš tu lova,često zumiram
presto kuliram, da poludi aludiram

---

[Intro]
Kuc kuc ko je
zove me šole
ove tvoje dole
Dole mole dijabole

[Pre-Chorus]
a tu pun poen
ovo je boem
za lovu krojen
mala pijemo za troje

[Verse]
preko bluza njena guza ide sine gore dole
geto mandam ko jakuza kada zvone motorole
belo drama to infuza dama davala do zore
banda favela terore mala navela na fore

Ona blista čista
Mi ko dizel fidel kastro
terorista ista
mi smo nato bliski istok
Ona poslala pismo
Da drugari više nismo

[Chorus]
Da bi da me bari
isto
i da bi da vari
čisto
mala bi da skida stvari
hitro
mala mrda ko da pali
nitro
A ja mrdam ko da radi
mi to
sa parama sam papi
vitto
ta baraba da ferari i to

[Bridge]
Portofino,sada fino madam uz vino casino
pada jooj
arivo mama sada na to vesto padam

sam pao sam se ubio
ganjo sam se van sa murijom
ona zna da sam se lupio
sam se lupio A kazne kupio

[Outro]
Shvatam da posebna si
suza ti lice kvasi
A to što uzela si
pazi to trebala si

# hardcore_pop - Inspired by Gente_Nueva_2
[DESCRIPTION]
This slap house track pulses at 155 BPM with filthy, saturated sub-bass, punchy syncopated drums, and relentless, infectious grooves. Dark acid synths weave gritty melodies, punctuated by hypnotic, autotuned deep vocals layered over sharp hats and risers for an erotic, high-intensity club feel.

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - go crazy]

[Chorus]
Ona kush mi sushi,nema bolja šema
Puls mi ruši,hiljadu problema
uši buši,dijamanta šema
lamele favela cela
Menja sve dresove,a ja sam high
Mala smanjuje besove da ja sam taj
Dala sve svoje stresove,mala sve daj
pala sve moje testove garant je kraj aj aj

[Verse 2]
Gle sata gle kola gle skanka što rolam

[Verse 1]
Rollie pepsi ima dipsi klizi viski belog pol
voli blesi da po sisi igra malo gola go
Oli mota white u rizli mila cima dima soke
a lepota moja ti si a ja kraljina of coke
Mat Benz pun konja pesto turiram
a vez full tozla,mesto studiram
keš tu lova,često zumiram
presto kuliram, da poludi aludiram

# hardcore_pop - Inspired by Gente_Nueva_2
[DESCRIPTION]
Dynamic sultry raw slap house track at 155 BPM; filthy, saturated sub-bass surges under punchy syncopated drums, while relentless dark acid synths carve gritty melodic hooks. UK drill hi-hats drive sharp top-end, joined by distorted, rolling tech-house basslines. Eerie cyborg synth textures and pitch-shifted, robotic autotune vocals layer over hypnotic grooves. Explosive drops heighten intensity, punctuated by risers and low-end bass punch for an erotic, high-energy club experience.

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - go crazy]

[Chorus]
Ona kush mi sushi,nema bolja šema
Puls mi ruši,hiljadu problema
uši buši,dijamanta šema
lamele favela cela
Menja sve dresove,a ja sam high
Mala smanjuje besove da ja sam taj
Dala sve svoje stresove,mala sve daj
pala sve moje testove garant je kraj aj aj

[Verse 2]

# hardcore_pop - Inspired by Gente_Nueva_3
[DESCRIPTION]
This 155 BPM slab leans into shadow: filthy, saturated sub-bass anchors a stripped, relentless groove while punchy, syncopated drums snap with surgical tightness. Rolling, distorted tech-house basslines move in a narrow, hypnotic range; dark synth stabs are low-passed and intentionally spare so the pocket breathes. UK-style hi-hats add crisp top-end punctuation without clutter. Vocals are chopped, pitch-played hooks—treated as percussive ornaments—gliding through tight delays and subtle formant shifts. Drops are ruthless and compact: sub hits and clipped drums collide to slam the dancefloor, leaving space for bass pressure to dominate.

[LYRICS]
[Intro]
Kuc kuc ko je
zove me šole
ove tvoje dole
Dole mole dijabole

[Pre-Chorus]
a tu pun poen
ovo je boem
za lovu krojen
mala pijemo za troje

[Male - Verse 1]
padam boj nespokoj
To kao zadnji je fight
nesto boy neko tvoj
mi je omašio sprat

[Male - Verse 2]
sa njom je off road trip
A ja pod dozom tip
često osetim
prošlosti mi srozali
tu si non stop ti
kad su potopi
Pa me tada bleda gleda
sneg sav bi da otopi

[Male - Bridge]
A tvoje telo bella celo sa telenovela
vrela polugola si mi u sred dana bela
sad me htela al prije to nije smela(nee)
zavela srela u tom lobiju hotela

[Female - Hook]
Ko da tamom me umije,umije on sve
Zar da tako me ubije,sruši svetove
Zna da tako me ugrije,ruke njegove
zadnju nadu mi ulije,uzmi evo me

[Male - Verse 3]
Pitam gde si nestala,
kaže pićem krije tugu
Ti si tako nestvarna,
ali opet biram drugu
Vidim boje- vidim dugu
palim petu redom pljuguu

[Male - Verse 4]
A ne treba ti mozak da sklopiš taj mozaik
sva si pogubna ko doza a ja ko pravi laik
Mene ne zanima poza,ma samo mi to daji
bio sam vani od konza U tvorzi ko u odaji
A ja njoj ne verujem da na belom preterujem
Pun klub flertuje,
a voli me to verujem
Guz njen neguje,
u dupe to verujem
radi me jako kao roba je,eee,
a njoj Sa mnom ko na dopu je

[Male - Bridge]
A tvoje telo bella celo sa telenovela
vrelo polugola si mi u sred dana bela
sad me htela al prije to nije smela(nee)
zavela srela u tom lobiju hotela

[Female - Hook]
Ko da tamom me umije,umije on sve
Zar da tako me ubije,sruši svetove
Zar da tako me ubije,sruši svetove
Zna da tako me ugrije,ruke njegove
zadnju nadu mi ulije,uzmi evo me

# hardcore_pop - Inspired by Gente_Nueva_3
[DESCRIPTION]
This 155 BPM slap-house track delivers sultry, bass-driven intensity with filthy, saturated sub-bass surging beneath punchy, syncopated drums. Rolling, distorted tech-house basslines lock into a hypnotic pocket while dark synth stabs and filtered chord hits replace harsh industrial edges, giving the groove a deeper, more fluid weight. UK-influenced hi-hats snap with sharp precision but swing into a tech-house cadence, supported by shuffling ghost hats and crisp percussive accents that drive the top end. Vocals are processed with rhythmic autotune chops and filtered manipulations, layered as both hook and percussion to heighten tension. Explosive drops strip back to sub weight and punch, letting the low end dominate while risers and sweeps add just enough lift to prime the floor. The result is an erotic, high-energy club experience that emphasizes groove, bass pressure, and hypnotic interplay, less about harsh textures and more about body-shaking rhythm built for late-night movement.

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - go crazy]

[Chorus]
Ona kush mi sushi,nema bolja šema
Puls mi ruši,hiljadu problema
uši buši,dijamanta šema
lamele favela cela
Menja sve dresove,a ja sam high
Mala smanjuje besove da ja sam taj
Dala sve svoje stresove,mala sve daj
pala sve moje testove garant je kraj aj aj

[Verse 2]
Gle sata gle kola gle skanka što rolam

[Verse 1]
Rollie pepsi ima dipsi klizi viski belog pol
voli blesi da po sisi igra malo gola go
Oli mota white u rizli mila cima dima soke
a lepota moja ti si a ja kraljina of coke
Mat Benz pun konja pesto turiram
a vez full tozla,mesto studiram
keš tu lova,često zumiram
presto kuliram, da poludi aludiram

# hardcore_pop - Inspired by Gente_Nueva_3
[DESCRIPTION]
At 155 BPM this version smolders: thick, saturated sub-bass envelops the listener while warm, rolling basslines groove with a seductive swing. Drums are punchy yet lubricious, syncopation pulling hips into motion. Filtered chord stabs and shaded pads soften harshness; hi-hats tick with a sensuous shuffle. Vocals are breathy, autotuned hooks and rhythmic chops—wet delays and velvet reverb render them intimate and immediate. Drops favor low-end weight over spectacle, with risers used sparingly to amplify release, crafting an erotic club experience focused on heat and momentum.

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - go crazy]

[Chorus]

lamele favela cela

Dala sve svoje stresove,mala sve daj
pala sve moje testove garant je kraj aj aj

[Verse]
preko bluza njena guza ide sine gore dole
geto mandam ko jakuza kada zvone motorole
belo drama to infuza dama davala do zore
banda favela terore mala navela na fore

Ona blista čista
Mi ko dizel fidel kastro
terorista ista
mi smo nato bliski istok
Ona poslala pismo
Da drugari više nismo

[Chorus]
Da bi da me bari
isto
i da bi da vari
čisto
mala bi da skida stvari
hitro
mala mrda ko da pali
nitro
A ja mrdam ko da radi
mi to
sa parama sam papi
vitto
ta baraba da ferari i to

[Bridge]
Portofino,sada fino madam uz vino casino
pada jooj
arivo mama sada na to vesto padam

sam pao sam se ubio
ganjo sam se van sa murijom
ona zna da sam se lupio
sam se lupio A kazne kupio

[Outro]
Shvatam da posebna si
suza ti lice kvasi
A to što uzela si
pazi to trebala si

---

# hardcore_pop - Karaccter_Hardcore_Pop
[DESCRIPTION]
A hypnotic tech house track at 134 BPM, anchored by a deep, dubbed-out bassline and minimal percussion—rimshots, tambourine, scattered cowbell—offset by warm analog pads for an immersive yet danceable mood. Organic hand drums, wooden blocks, bell trees, and beach party field recordings layer human and atmospheric texture. Detuned FM arpeggios propel fluid melodic motion. The breakdown showcases isolated bass and airy vocal loops, then builds with additional percussion. The drop unveils a punchy 909 kick and tight hi-hats, while occasional saturated, reverby chord stabs add character. Space, subtlety, and groove guide the arrangement for seamless DJ mixing.

[LYRICS]
[Male - Verse]
Nisi svesna
Kako bih te mazio
Pitam se
Da li bih se pazio
Misliš da si cool
Znaj dečko sam odvažan
S tobom sam zbog tela
A karakter je dodatan

[Female- Chorus]
Oseti kako te greje ovaj plamen
Mogla bih da se ne skinem s tebe satima
Misliš da si kul
Al' karakter ti je odvratan
Sa mnom bi zbog telaaaa -
Sve ostalo bonus dodatan

[Male -Verse]
Nisi svesna kako bih te mazio ,
Nisi svesna koliko bih te pazio
Misliš da si cool
Ali dečko ti je odvratan
S tobom sam zbog tela
A karakter je dodatan

[Pre-Chorus]
Tvoja koža se sija
Na suncu ceo dan prava zmija
Zovi me "Daddy"
Ili zovi me "Baby"
Ponekad sam oboje
Al ću kol te mejbi
S tobom bih se smirio,
ti i ja skupa teritoriju da širimo
A vetar piri, duva,
Stiže novo vreme,
Dajem ti sve
(A ti mi daj seOseti kako te greje ovaj plamen
Mogla bih da se ne ski-da-aaam s tebe satima
Misliš da si kul
Al' karakter ti je po-ta-naaak
Sa mnom bi zbog tela -
Sve ostalo bonus dodatan

[Male - Verse]
Nisi svesna kako bih te mazio
Nisi svesna koliko bih te pazio
Misliš da si cool
(Znam, ti si dečko o-dva-žan)
S tobom bih zbog tela
(A karakter je dodatan)

# hardcore_pop - Karaccter_Hardcore_Pop (Remastered)
[DESCRIPTION]
A hypnotic tech house track at 134 BPM, anchored by a deep, dubbed-out bassline and minimal percussion—rimshots, tambourine, scattered cowbell—offset by warm analog pads for an immersive yet danceable mood. Organic hand drums, wooden blocks, bell trees, and beach party field recordings layer human and atmospheric texture. Detuned FM arpeggios propel fluid melodic motion. The breakdown showcases isolated bass and airy vocal loops, then builds with additional percussion. The drop unveils a punchy 909 kick and tight hi-hats, while occasional saturated, reverby chord stabs add character. Space, subtlety, and groove guide the arrangement for seamless DJ mixing.

# hardcore_pop - Kharat_Zlatah_Hardcore_Pop_4
[DESCRIPTION]
At 150 bpm turkish house hard melodic club banger kicks off with driving bass and crisp hi-hats. Verses shift atmospheres—first minimal with deep kicks, second lush with syncopated synths. Melodic choruses soar with layered harmonies and vibrant backing vocals. Accents highlight the duplex feel, adding rhythmic complexity and energy to the drops.

[LYRICS]
[Female - Bridge]
A šta bi bilo milo moje
([Breath soft] - haaah)
da se nisu ruke tvoje
([Hand slide on skin] - fffsh)
zapetljale večno tuu
([Sub swell] - rrrrr)
oko moga vrata?
([Neck brush] - shhff)
malene što ispred stoje
([Heels soft] - tak-tak)
rekla bi’ im gotovo je
([Whispered FX] - ssst)
pa ti gola izlazim,
([Door click + step] - klik-tap)
sijam-sto karata zlata
([Shimmer] - tinkleee)

[Male - chorus]
Ma ja sam za tebe - to si bebo takla
([Finger snap] - snap)
A u tim noćima ti vrednost nije-nije
([Night hum] - mmmmmm)
pa struja kroz mene ide kad me takva
([Electric crackle] - bzzzt)
poput pakla bije-sva me grije grije..
([Sub hit] - BOOM) ([Heat wave] - whooom)

[Male - Verse]
Uska haljina do koljena miriše mi na šanel
([Perfume spray] - pssht)
Da je voljena da je odana ja bio bih uvek njen
([Heartbeat] - thumpthump)
Baci pogledee - vidjela bih da sam sam
([Gaze hit] - ding)
ko te odvedee - nisam spreman to da znam
([Echo distant] - znam…znam)

[Male - Verse 2]
Da ja sam bad boy a ti nisi cura laka
([Low chuckle] - heh)
Ma u struku tanka, mala tako slatka
([Bass bump] - thumm)
Pali put do pakla a na putu magla
([Fog sweep] - fffsh)
Na tu rutu stakla, si me ti  spotakla
([Glass clink] - klink) ([Stumble] - skrr)

[Female - Bridge]
A šta bi bilo milo moje
([Breath close] - haaah)
da se nisu ruke tvoje
([Hand wrap] - shff)
zapetljale večno tuu
([Sub rise] - wub)
oko moga vrata?
([Neck touch] - fffsh)
malene što ispred stoje
([Heels echo] - tak-tak)
rekla bi’ im gotovo je
([Whisper chorus] - gotovo je…)
pa ti gola izlazim,
([Door open club] - kreeeak)
sijam-sto karata zlata
([Long shimmer] - tinkleeeee)

[Male - chorus ]
Ma ja sam za tebe - to si bebo takla
([Snap + clap] - snap-clap)
A u tim noćima ti vrednost nije-nije
([Night drone] - mmmmmm)
pa struja kroz mene ide kad me takva
([Electric surge] - bzzzz)
poput pakla bije-sva me grije grije..
([Sub drop] - BOOM) ([Heat whoosh] - whooosh)
