# hardcore_pop - KK beatachi_Khansovacc_1
[DESCRIPTION]
The track opens at 95-105 bpm with deep, muffled kicks, a distant snare/clap, and sparse closed hats, creating space and a brooding mood. Long, sustained sub notes anchor the darkness. Gradually, soft shakers and quicker hats appear, percussive synth stabs on off-beats inject a 90s Euro-reggae pop bounce. Sidechain pulses and ghost kicks add groove, tightening the rhythm until the energy peaks with open hats, off-beat accents, and subtle drum fills. In the outro, layers drop out, letting airy hats and a cleaner clap bring a lighter, more hopeful vibe.

[LYRICS]
[Intro]
(Sve, sve ove godine sa tobom ja)
[room_verb – wide, distant, filtered, low in mix]
(Ja sam u svađi sam sa sobom sve)
[tape_delay – 1/4 note throw on “sobom sve”]
(Ove godine sa tobom ali danas je sa nama gotovo)
[doubled_low – whispered layer underneath “gotovo”]

[Verse 1]
Laž, laži sam mogao da podnesem ti
[slap_delay – short 1/8 echo on “podnesem ti”]
Proleće pretvaraš u jesen i sve
[pads_bg – warm minor pad swelling under “proleće / jesen”]
Sve sam mogao da izdržim ali prevare meni se ne vare
[bg_chant – low octave hum on “mene se ne vare”, sidechained to kick]

[Chorus]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[stereo_doubles – soft gang-style on word “pismo”]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[delay_throw – long 1/2 note echo on “zaboravi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[bg_choir – ooh/aaah sustained behind “ljubavi”]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[octave_up – thin high harmony on “druga boravi”]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[call_resp – chopped “ne šalji, ne šalji” tucked behind main]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[pingpong_delay – subtle stereo bounces on “zaboravi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[swell – reverse reverb into downbeat “U ljubavi”]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[adlib_bg – distant “hej, hej” between phrases]

[Verse 2]
Sve obično stane sve u reči dve
[mono_lp – first bar slightly filtered like telefonski glas]
Što ću ti reći znam da boleće
[backing_voices – quiet unison under “znam da boleće”]
Bilo bi najbolje da shvatiš da od danas je sa nama završeno
[chopped – rhythm chop “završeno, završeno” prije sledeće linije]
Laž, u laži svoje si se uplela
[fx_riser – short noise riser pre “uplela”]
I nisi znala, nisi umela
[stereo_adlibs – šapat “nisi znala, nisi umela” wide L/R]
Bilo bi najbolje da shvatiš da bez tebe ću živeti savršeno ja
[octave_stack – low + high harmony on “savršeno ja”]
E pa da
[dry_drop – muzički break, samo vokal, bez reverba]

[Chorus]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[doubles – lagani drugi glas za puniji hook]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[delay_throw – 1/4 + 1/2 kombinacija na “zaboravi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[choir_stack – troglasni “u ljubavi” u pozadini]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[answer_chop – kratko “druga, druga” chop pred “boravi”]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[clap_lift – dodatni claps i crowd FX na prvi takt refrena]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[reverb_tail – duži hall tail na kraju linije]
U ljubavi nismo
[pad_lift – akordi jači, sidechain uz kick]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[adlib – tihi “ajde, zaboravi” u pozadini]

[Bridge]
Nema, nema, nema ljubavi
[call_resp – pozadinski šapat “nema, nema” u stereo slici]
Srce hoće da zaboravi
[heartbeat_fx – low thump synced to tempo]
Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio
[reverse_verb – lead povučen unazad u sledeći takt]
Svoj sreći sam presudio
[octave_harmony – visoki glas prati “presudio”]
Nema, nema, nema ljubavi
[chopped – „nema ljubavi, ljubavi“ isječeno kao ritmički loop]
Srce hoće da zaboravi
[tremolo_fx – blagi tremolo na pratećem vokalu]
Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio
[stereo_widen – širi panorama samo na ovoj frazi]
Svoj sreći sam presudio
[tape_stop – kratki usporeni efekt na “presudio” pred refren]

[Chorus]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[full_stack – glavni glas + 2 harmonije za final hook]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[big_hall – veći reverb, refren kao “arena”]
U ljubavi nismo
[choir_aaah – dugi “aaah” akord kroz liniju]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[answer_vox – pozadinski “druga… druga…” u ehu]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[doubles + whisper_layer – šapat “ne šalji” ispod lead-a]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[delay_throw – snažan 1/2 note na poslednji “-vi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[sidechain_pad – diše uz kick, otvara se na “nismo”]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[outro_fill – kratki vokalni riff pre odlaska u outro]

[Outro]
(Nema, nema, nema ljubavi)
[filtered_echo – low-pass echo koji se gasi kroz 2 takta]
(Srce hoće da zaboravi)
[choir_low – muški duboko “hoće da zaboravi”]
(Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio)
[reverse_chop – isečene slogove “lju-bi-o” u ritmu]
(Svoj sreći sam presudio)
[reverb_swim – dugačak tail, fade u sledeću liniju]
(Nema, nema, nema ljubavi)
[distant_bg – kao da dolazi iz druge sobe]
(Srce hoće da zaboravi)
[pingpong_delay – lagani stereo bounce]
(Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio)
[adlib – tihi “hej…” pre “ljubio”]
(Svoj sreći sam presudio)
[fader_fade – postepeno spuštanje lead-a, ostaje samo delay i pad]

[Mix / Master –expertly done ]

---

# hardcore_pop - Kkarat Zlata - Hardcore_Pop
[DESCRIPTION]
At 128 bpm pulsating club tech track , zurle, organ,80s midi synths, car siren,hypnotic, sultry reggaeton vibes, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Female]
A šta bi bilo milo moje
da se nisu ruke tvoje
zapetljale tuu uuu
([Sub swell] - rrrrr)
oko moga vrata?

[Male]
Ma ja sam za tebe - to si bebo takla
A u tim noćima ti vrednost nije-nije
([Night hum] - mmmmmm)
pa struja kroz mene ide kad me takva
poput pakla bije-sva me grije grije..
A šta bi bilo milo moje
da se nisu ruke tvoje
zapetljale tuu uuu
oko moga vrata?
malene što ispred stoje
rekla bi’ im gotovo je
pa ti gola izlazim,
sijam-sto karata zlata
leeeee)

[Male - Verse]
Uska haljina do koljena miriše mi na šanel
Da je voljena da je odana ja bio bih uvek njen
Baci pogledee - vidjela bih da sam sam
([Gaze hit] - ding)
ko te odvedee - nisam spreman to da znam
da se nisu ruke tvoje
zapetljale tuu uuu
oko moga vrata?
malene što ispred stoje
rekla bi’ im gotovo je
pa ti gola izlazim,
sijam-sto karata zlata
Ma ja sam za tebe - to si bebo takla
A u tim noćima ti vrednost nije-nije
poput pakla bije-sva me grije grije..
Da ja sam bad boy a ti nisi cura laka
Ma u struku tanka, mala tako slatka
Pali put do pakla a na putu magla
Na tu rutu stakla, si me ti spotakla
Na tu rutu

# hardcore_pop - Kko te tera_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
at 125bpm bouncy reggaetón  club tech Turkish zurne, cathederal organ, echo, oriental pop, car honks, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Intro]
Jesi ti,Pope, kadio matru???.....
([Laughter in background] - hahaha)
([Lighter flick] - chk)
([female adlib] - mmm-aaa)

Ne prilazi, bejbi, ne znaš ko sam ja
([breathy BV] - mmm-aaah)
Maska na licu, a vidim, goriš sva
([vocal chop] - ya-ya)
Noć je hladna, oči crvene k'o lava
([sub-bass rumble] - rrrrr)
U klubu senke, al' u meni cela drama
([crowd murmur] - mmmrum)


---

[Refren]
Ne prilazi (ne), nisam tvoj spas
([female echo] - „nisam tvoj spas…”)
Ja sam onaj od kog’ ti drhti glas
([BV airy] - aaah-aaah)
Noćas sam dim, sutra nestaću skroz
([delay] - „nestaaaću…”)
Ti me tražiš, al’ proš’o je voz
([FX] - tschuuu / train-whoosh)


---

[Verse 1]
Rolex na ruci, al’ vreme nije važno
([watch tick] - tik-tak)
Nisam tu, a osećaš se prazno
([low BV hum] - mmm)
Kol’ko još puta reći ćeš mi „ne“
([chopped BV] - „ne-ne-ne“)
Kad ćeš da se predaš i priznaš mi sve
([breathy BV] - haaah)

Ponoćni poziv, znamo šta to znači
([phone ring] - brr-brr)
U glasu ti trema, al’ telo kaže „go“
([BV whisper] - „go, go…“)
Na stolu je piće, al’ u glavi lom
([glass clink] - clink)
Sa tobom sam vatra, bez tebe siv je dom
([fire FX] - fssshh)

Ko te to tera da bežiš od mene,
([female adlib] - „bežiš… bežiš…“)
U snovima tvojim vodim se pod „ne smem“
([reverb] - „ne smem…“)
Ti bežiš od mene, a u sebi me kriješ
([BV close] - mmm-aaah)
U ogledalu tuđa lica — iza njih se kriješ
([echo tail] - „kriješ… kriješ…“)

# hardcore_pop - Kko te tera_Hardcore_Pop_3
[DESCRIPTION]
The song opens with instant spectacle: brass hits and band stabs over a solid mid-tempo club kick, like a stadium chant dropped into a Balkan club. Drums fuse trap-pop punch with live-room ambience, while the bass alternates between deep sub sustain and more melodic, tuba-like motion that locks to the horn lines. Verses sit on a stripped, beat-focused bed so the vocal can spit in front; pre-choruses slowly thicken with guitars, keys and backing vocals, building pressure. The chorus detonates into a wall of horns, crowd-style responses and cymbal lifts, evoking both parade energy and late-night highway flex. Small percussive ear-candy, reverses and mutes keep the three-minute structure evolving without losing its party focus.

[LYRICS]
[Intro]
Jesi ti,Pope, kadio matru???.....
([Laughter in background] - hahaha)
([Lighter flick] - chk)
([female adlib] - mmm-aaa)

Ne prilazi, bejbi, ne znaš ko sam ja
([breathy BV] - mmm-aaah)
Maska na licu, a vidim, goriš sva
([vocal chop] - ya-ya)
Noć je hladna, oči crvene k'o lava
([sub-bass rumble] - rrrrr)
U klubu senke, al' u meni cela drama
([crowd murmur] - mmmrum)


---

# hardcore_pop - Kko te tera_Hardcore_Pop_3
[DESCRIPTION]
This is a mid-tempo German street-rap anthem, sitting around 90–100 BPM with a dark, driving 4/4 bounce. The beat fuses trap drums (tight kick, cracking snare/clap, ticking hats) with a melancholic pop-reggae–influenced loop that gives it a bittersweet, hood-romantic feel. Bass is deep and controlled, gluing kick and sample into one massive low-end block. The vocal is a gritty mid–low male, half-melodic, half-barked, cutting through with aggressive consonants and long, emotional vowels. Verses ride a stripped, drum-and-bass-heavy pocket; hooks widen into stereo synths and the full sample, turning the main motif into a chantable street chorus. Mix is clean but hard, with the vocal sitting upfront like a sermon from the curb.

[LYRICS]
[Intro]
Jesi ti,Pope, kadio matru???.....
([Laughter in background] - hahaha)
([Lighter flick] - chk)
([female adlib] - mmm-aaa)

Ne prilazi, bejbi, ne znaš ko sam ja
([breathy BV] - mmm-aaah)
Maska na licu, a vidim, goriš sva
([vocal chop] - ya-ya)
Noć je hladna, oči crvene k'o lava
([sub-bass rumble] - rrrrr)
U klubu senke, al' u meni cela drama
([crowd murmur] - mmmrum)

[DESCRIPTION]
The song opens with instant spectacle: brass hits and band stabs over a solid mid-tempo club kick, like a stadium chant dropped into a Balkan club. Drums fuse trap-pop punch with live-room ambience, while the bass alternates between deep sub sustain and more melodic, tuba-like motion that locks to the horn lines. The chorus detonates into a wall of horns, crowd-style responses and cymbal lifts, evoking both parade energy and late-night highway flex. # hardcore_pop - Koshtala_me_bavlju_1
[DESCRIPTION]
A dynamic fusion of Balkan trap and Serbian drill powers the track, driven by rapid hi-hats, snappy snares, and subby, penetrating bass. Oud, ney flutes, and Egyptian darbuka interweave with electronic textures, while autotuned vocals ride over high-energy beat switches and atmospheric builds.

[LYRICS]
[Intro - Atmospheric Build]
da samo sam znala ne bih ti sve dala
nisam znala da si takav gad,
ti doveo si me do prosjačkog štapa.
sad ostade mi samo da tugujem i sa čašom drugujem.

[Chorus - High Energy Drop]
Koštala me, koštala ljubav tvoja ohola.
sve si mi uzeo i snove razbio si mi.
nema ničega više sada tu.
ostala sam saama tu, u ovom ludilu.

[Verse 1 - Balkan Trap Flow]
Ja te volela i srce svoje ti dala, i ne samo to.
uzeo si sve što jesam i nisam imala.
zbog tebe mi ostali samo dugovi.
više me ne vole čak ni drugovi.

[Chorus - High Energy Drop]
Koštala me, koštala ljubav tvoja ohola.
sve si mi uzeo i snove razbio si mi.
nema ničega više sada tu.
ostala sam saama tu, u ovom ludilu.

[Verse 2 - Serbian Drill Vibe]
Više nisam ni pola od onog što bila sam.
samo bih nešto jako popila sad,
da ublažim tugu i bol od gluposti svoje.
da zaboravim da bili smo dvoje.

[Chorus - High Energy Drop]
Koštala me, koštala ljubav tvoja ohola.
sve si mi uzeo i snove razbio si mi.
nema ničega više sada tu.
ostala sam saama tu, u ovom ludilu.

[Bridge - Atmospheric Build]
Nekako ću da se oporavim znam.
ali da lako zavolim nikad više neću to znam.
dosta je bilo jednom patnja i bankrot ovaj.
ne treba meni nikako život ovakav.

[Chorus - High Energy Drop]
Koštala me, koštala ljubav tvoja ohola.
sve si mi uzeo i snove razbio si mi.
nema ničega više sada tu.
ostala sam saama tu, u ovom ludilu.

[Chorus - Beat Switch]
Koštala me, koštala ljubav tvoja ohola.
sve si mi uzeo i snove razbio si mi.
nema ničega više sada tu.
ostala sam saama tu, u ovom ludilu.

[Outro - Fade Out]
Baš me koštala ljubav ova blesava. idem jer to mi ne treba!

---

# hardcore_pop - Koshtala_me_bavLju_6
[DESCRIPTION]
Pulsing, distorted Balkan-tech grooves intertwine with deep, dominating basslines, while syncopated percussion and traditional Eastern European elements weave in and out. Sultry, heavily autotuned female vocals add velvety layers, creating a hypnotic, dark, and luxurious dancefloor energy.

[LYRICS]
[Intstrumental - go crazy]

[Female 1 - Intro - Atmospheric Build]
da samo sam znala ne bih ti sve dala
nisam znala da si takav gad,
ti doveo si me do prosjačkog štapa.
sad ostade mi samo da tugujem i sa čašom drugujem.

[Female 2 - Chorus - High Energy Drop]
Koštala me, koštala ljubav tvoja o-ho-la.
sve si mi uzeo i snove razbio si mi.
nema ničega više sada tu.
ostala sam saama tu, u ovom lu-di-luuuu.

[Male 1 - Verse - Balkan Trap Flow]
Ja te voleo i srce svoje ti dao, i ne samo to.
uzela si sve što jesam i nisam i-ma-o.
zbog tebe mi ostali samo dugovi.
više me ne vole čak ni druuuugovi.

[Male 2 - Chorus - High Energy Drop]
Koštala me, koštala ljubav tvoja o-ho-la.
sve si mi uzela i snove razbla  si miiiiii.
nema ničega više sada tu.
ostao sam saam ovde, u ovom ludiluuuu.

[Female 1 - Verse]
Više nisam ni pola od onog što bila sam.
samo bih nešto jako popila saaaad,
da ublažim tugu i bol od gluposti svoje.
da zaboravim da bili smo dvoooooje.

[Female 2 - Chorus - High Energy Drop]
Koštala me, koštala ljubav tvoja o-ho-la.
sve si mi uzeo i snove razbio si miiiii.
nema ničega više sada tu.
ostala sam saama tu, u ovom ludiluuuuu.

[Male 1 - Bridge - Atmospheric Build]
Nekako ću da se oporavim znaaaaam.
ali da lako zavolim nikad više neću to znam.
dosta je bilo jednom patnja i bankrot ovaj.
ne treba meni nikako život ovakav.

[Male 2 - Chorus - High Energy Drop]
Koštala me, koštala ljubav tvoja o-ho-la.
sve si mi uzela i snove razbla  si miiiiii.
nema ničega više sada tu.
ostao sam saam ovde, u ovom ludiluuuu.

[Both - Outro - Beat Switch]
Koštala me, koštala ljubav tvoja o-ho-la.
sve si mi uzeo i snove razbio si mi.
nema ničega više sada tuuuuuu.
ostali smo sami ovde, u ovom ludiluuuuuu.

[Both - Outro - Fade Out]
Baš nas je koštala ljubav ova blesava. idemo jer to nam ne treba!

# hardcore_pop - Koshtala_mebavLju_10
[DESCRIPTION]
The track opens with pulsing, distorted Balkan-tech synths laid over deep, throbbing basslines. Syncopated percussion merges with swirling clarinets and zurna motifs, shifting between traditional melodies and electronic hooks. Sultry, heavily autotuned female vocals float atop, blending dark lushness with hypnotic, luxurious dance energy.

# hardcore_pop - Koshtala_mebavLju_17
[DESCRIPTION]
The track opens with deep 808s and rolling basslines, laying a gritty foundation. Hard-hitting drill hi-hats drive the rhythm, while hypnotic Tech House synths pulse and swirl overhead. Moody, autotuned vocals float above, dropping into sections with distorted, thunderous low-end bass hits, infusing late-night energy and chaotic intensity throughout.

# hardcore_pop - Koshtala_mebavLju_8 (Remastered)
[DESCRIPTION]
Pulsing, distorted Balkan-tech grooves intertwine with deep, dominating basslines, while syncopated percussion and traditional Eastern European elements weave in and out, Sultry, heavily autotuned female vocals add velvety layers, creating a hypnotic, dark, and luxurious dancefloor energy

[LYRICS]
[Intstrumental - go crazy]

[Female 1 - Intro]
da samo sam znala ne bih ti sve dala
nisam znala da si takav gad,
ti doveo si me do prosjačkog štapa.
sad ostade mi samo da tugujem i sa čašom drugujem.

[Female 2 - Chorus]
Koštala me, koštala ljubav tvoja o-ho-laaa.
sve si mi uzeo i snove razbio si mi.
nema ničega više sada tu.
ostala sam saama tu, u ovom lu-di-luuuu.

[Male 1 - Verse]
Ja te voleo i srce svoje ti dao, i ne samo to.
uzela si sve što jesam i nisam i-ma-o.
zbog tebe mi ostali samo dugovi.
više me ne vole čak ni druuuugovi.
Koštala me, koštala ljubav tvoja o-ho-laaa.
sve si mi uzela i snove razbila  si miiiiii.
nema ničega više sada tu.
ostao sam saam ovde, u ovom ludiluuuu.

[Female 1 - Verse]
Više nisam ni pola od onog što bila sam.
samo bih nešto jako popila saaaad,
da ublažim tugu i bol od gluposti svoje.
da zaboravim da bili smo dvoooooje.
Koštala me, koštala ljubav tvoja o-ho-laaa.
sve si mi uzeo i snove razbio si miiiii.
nema ničega više sada tu.
ostala sam saama tu, u ovom ludiluuuuu.

[Male 1 - Bridge]
Nekako ću da se oporavim znaaaaam.
ali da lako zavolim nikad više neću to znam.
dosta je bilo jednom patnja i bankrot ovaj.
ne treba meni nikako život ovakav.

[Both - Outro - Beat Switch]
Koštala me, koštala ljubav tvoja o-ho-laaa.
sve si mi uzeo i snove razbio si mi.
nema ničega više sada tuuuuuu.
ostali smo sami ovde, u ovom ludiluuuuuu.

[Both - Outro - Fade Out]
Baš nas je koštala ljubav ova blesava. idemo jer to nam ne treba!
ne trebaaa, o neee neee

---

# hardcore_pop - Koshtala_mebavLju_9
[DESCRIPTION]
A pulsing Balkan-tech groove forms the core, where distorted synth stabs and bold basslines drive relentless momentum. Syncopated percussion and Eastern European folk melodies surface between transitions. Sultry, autotuned female vocals float atop, thickening the hypnotic, dark dancefloor atmosphere.

[LYRICS]
[Intstrumental - go crazy]

[Female 1 - Intro]
da samo sam znala ne bih ti sve dala
nisam znala da si takav gad,
ti doveo si me do prosjačkog štapa.
sad ostade mi samo da tugujem i sa čašom drugujem.

[Female 2 - Chorus]
Koštala me, koštala ljubav tvoja o-ho-laaa.
sve si mi uzeo i snove razbio si mi.
nema ničega više sada tu.
ostala sam saama tu, u ovom lu-di-luuuu.

[Male 1 - Verse]
Ja te voleo i srce svoje ti dao, i ne samo to.
uzela si sve što jesam i nisam i-ma-o.
zbog tebe mi ostali samo dugovi.
više me ne vole čak ni druuuugovi.
Koštala me, koštala ljubav tvoja o-ho-laaa.
sve si mi uzela i snove razbila  si miiiiii.
nema ničega više sada tu.
ostao sam saam ovde, u ovom ludiluuuu.

[Female 1 - Verse]
Više nisam ni pola od onog što bila sam.
samo bih nešto jako popila saaaad,
da ublažim tugu i bol od gluposti svoje.
da zaboravim da bili smo dvoooooje.
Koštala me, koštala ljubav tvoja o-ho-laaa.
sve si mi uzeo i snove razbio si miiiii.
nema ničega više sada tu.
ostala sam saama tu, u ovom ludiluuuuu.

[Male 1 - Bridge]
Nekako ću da se oporavim znaaaaam.
ali da lako zavolim nikad više neću to znam.
dosta je bilo jednom patnja i bankrot ovaj.
ne treba meni nikako život ovakav.

[Female- Outro - Beat Switch]
Koštala me, koštala ljubav tvoja o-ho-laaa.
sve si mi uzeo i snove razbio si mi.
nema ničega više sada tuuuuuu.
ostali smo sami ovde, u ovom ludiluuuuuu.

[Both - Together -Outro - Fade Out]

# hardcore_pop - Kuc_Kuc_1
[DESCRIPTION]
At 155 BPM, the club track surges with a punishing low end, precisely carved kick and snare, and maximal harmonic saturation for system-crushing impact. Jagged acid synths cut through, unleashing resonant energy beside high-intensity Arabic violin lines with ornate microtonal slides. Vocals are sculpted with pronounced pitch effects, doubled layers, and atmospheric delays that swell with each riser and fill, maintaining relentless momentum and tension throughout.

[LYRICS]
Kuc kuc ko je
zove me šole
ove tvoje dole
Dole mole dijabole

a tu pun poen
ovo je boem
za lovu krojen
mala pijemo za troje

preko bluza njena guza ide sine gore dole
geto mandam ko jakuza kada zvone motorole
belo drama to infuza dama davala do zore
banda favela terore mala navela na fore

Ona blista čista
Mi ko dizel fidel kastro 
terorista ista
mi smo nato bliski istok
Ona poslala pismo
Da drugari više nismo

Da bi da me bari 
isto
i da bi da vari 
čisto
mala bi da skida stvari
hitro
mala mrda ko da pali
nitro
A ja mrdam ko da radi 
mi to
sa parama sam papi 
vitto
ta baraba da ferari i to

Portofino, sada fino madam uz vino casino
pada jooj
arivo mama sada na to vesto padam

sam pao sam se ubio
ganjo sam se van sa murijom
ona zna da sam se lupio
sam se lupio A kazne kupio


Shvatam da posebna si 
suza ti lice kvasi
A to što uzela si
pazi to trebala si

---

# hardcore_pop - Kuc_Kuc_2
[DESCRIPTION]
At 155 BPM the club track detonates with a punishing low end and a carved kick and snare—tight, immediate, relentless. Maximal harmonic saturation fattens the spectrum into system-crushing mass while jagged acid synths splice neon riffs, their resonant sweeps slicing the air. Arabic violin lines unfurl microtonal slides, injecting raw melodic torque. Vocals are sculpted with pitch effects, doubled layers, and delays that swell with each riser. Percussion drops to skeletal halftime then rips back into full energy as bass modulation nudges monitors toward clipping. Filter sweeps, razor edits, and parallel compression punctuate transitions while transient shaping keeps punch. Tightly panned delays and cavernous reverbs carve moving cavities for synths and strings, keeping tension taut. The bridge strips to glassy motifs before an explosive return—acid leads, violin crescendos, and stacked vocals collide into a merciless final drop that sustains momentum until the last shimmer dies.

[LYRICS]
Kuc kuc ko je
zove me šole
ove tvoje dole
Dole mole dijabole

a tu pun poen
ovo je boem
za lovu krojen
mala pijemo za troje

preko bluza njena guza ide sine gore dole
geto mandam ko jakuza kada zvone motorole
belo drama to infuza dama davala do zore
banda favela terore mala navela na fore

Ona blista čista
Mi ko dizel fidel kastro 
terorista ista
mi smo nato bliski istok
Ona poslala pismo
Da drugari više nismo

Da bi da me bari

i da bi da vari 
čisto

# hardcore_pop - Kuc_Kuc_2
[DESCRIPTION]

Maximal harmonic saturation fattens the spectrum into system-crushing mass while jagged acid synths splice neon riffs, their resonant sweeps slicing the air. Arabic violin lines unfurl microtonal slides, injecting raw melodic torque. Vocals are sculpted with pitch effects, doubled layers, and delays that swell with each riser. Percussion drops to skeletal halftime then rips back into full energy as bass modulation nudges monitors toward clipping. Filter sweeps, razor edits, and parallel compression punctuate transitions while transient shaping keeps punch. Tightly panned delays and cavernous reverbs carve moving cavities for synths and strings, keeping tension taut. The bridge strips to glassy motifs before an explosive return—acid leads, violin crescendos, and stacked vocals collide into a merciless final drop that sustains momentum until the last shimmer dies.

# hardcore_pop - Kuc_Kuc_2 (Extend)
[DESCRIPTION]
At 155 BPM the club track detonates with a punishing low end and carved kick-snare—tight, immediate, relentless—while harmonic saturation fattens the spectrum into system-crushing mass. Jagged acid synths splice neon riffs, resonant sweeps slice the air, and Arabic violin lines unfurl microtonal slides, injecting raw melodic torque. Vocals are sculpted with pitch effects, doubled layers, and delays swelling with each riser. Percussion drops to skeletal halftime then rips back full force as bass modulation nudges monitors toward clipping; filter sweeps, razor edits, and parallel compression punctuate transitions while transient shaping preserves punch. Tightly panned delays and cavernous reverbs carve moving cavities for synths and strings; the bridge strips to glassy motifs before an explosive return—acid leads, violin crescendos, and stacked vocals colliding into a merciless final drop sustaining momentum until the last shimmer fades. Mixing: main vocal double (low + bright/formant),

[LYRICS]
[Intro — sparse kick, saturated sub loop, jagged acid stabs, pitched vocal chops]
Kuc kuc ko je
zove me šole
ove tvoje dole
Dole mole dijabole

[Verse 1 — punchy delivery, tight doubles, keep transients sharp]
a tu pun poen
ovo je boem
za lovu krojen
mala pijemo za troje

[Pre-Chorus — rising filter + short risers, build energy]
preko bluza njena guza ide sine gore dole
geto mandam ko jakuza kada zvone motorole
belo drama to infuza dama davala do zore
banda favela terore mala navela na fore

[Chorus / Hook — wide, saturated, formant-shifted repeat; minimal ad-libs]
Da bi da me bari — isto (isto)
i da bi da vari — čisto
mala bi da skida stvari — hitro
mala mrda ko da pali — nitro

[Verse 2 — rhythmic, percussive phrasing, slight swing]
Ona blista čista
Mi ko dizel fidel kastro — terorista ista
mi smo nato bliski istok
Ona poslala pismo — Da drugari više nismo

[Drop Motif — aggressive re-quantized kicks, gated sub; use micro-pauses]
Da bi da me bari — isto
i da bi da vari — čisto

[Bridge — halftime, granular flares, reversed chops, spacious tails]
sam pao sam se ubio
ganjo sam se van sa murijom
ona zna da sam se lupio
sam se lupio A kazne kupio

[Build — steady automation climb, sweep into pre-drop]
Shvatam da posebna si
suza ti lice kvasi
A to što uzela si — pazi to trebala si

[Pre-Drop Stab — mantra-style one-shots, punchy pitch FX]
sa parama sam papi (japi)
vitto
ta baraba da ferari i to (skrrt)

[Final Drop / Climax — all motifs stacked, maximal saturation, keep low open for club]
Portofino, sada fino madam uz vino casino
pada jooj — arivo mama sada na to vesto padam

[Outro — fractured echoes, clipped reverb tails]
It fuses motifs into a kinetic climax
then fracture into metallic echoes that hint at what follows

---

# hardcore_pop - Kuc_Kuc_3
[DESCRIPTION]
At 155 BPM the club track detonates with a punishing low end and a carved kick and snare—tight, immediate, relentless. Maximal harmonic saturation fattens the spectrum into system-crushing mass while jagged acid synths splice neon riffs, their resonant sweeps slicing the air. Arabic violin lines unfurl microtonal slides, injecting raw melodic torque. Vocals are sculpted with pitch effects, doubled layers, and delays that swell with each riser. Percussion drops to skeletal halftime then rips back into full energy as bass modulation nudges monitors toward clipping. Filter sweeps, razor edits, and parallel compression punctuate transitions while transient shaping keeps punch. Tightly panned delays and cavernous reverbs carve moving cavities for synths and strings, keeping tension taut. The bridge strips to glassy motifs before an explosive return—acid leads, violin crescendos, and stacked vocals collide into a merciless final drop that sustains momentum until the last shimmer dies.

[LYRICS]
[Intro — sparse kick, saturated sub loop, jagged acid stabs, pitched vocal chops]
Kuc kuc ko je
zove me šole
ove tvoje dole
Dole mole dijabole

[Verse 1 — punchy delivery, tight doubles, keep transients sharp]
a tu pun poen
ovo je boem
za lovu krojen
mala pijemo za troje

[Pre-Chorus — rising filter + short risers, build energy]
preko bluza njena guza ide sine gore dole
geto mandam ko jakuza kada zvone motorole
belo drama to infuza dama davala do zore
banda favela terore mala navela na fore

[Chorus / Hook — wide, saturated, formant-shifted repeat; minimal ad-libs]
Da bi da me bari — isto (isto)
i da bi da vari — čisto
mala bi da skida stvari — hitro
mala mrda ko da pali — nitro

[Verse 2 — rhythmic, percussive phrasing, slight swing]
Ona blista čista
Mi ko dizel fidel kastro — terorista ista
mi smo nato bliski istok
Ona poslala pismo — Da drugari više nismo

[Drop Motif — aggressive re-quantized kicks, gated sub; use micro-pauses]
Da bi da me bari — isto
i da bi da vari — čisto

[Bridge — halftime, granular flares, reversed chops, spacious tails]
sam pao sam se ubio
ganj'o sam se van sa murijom
ona zna da sam se lupio,
sam se lupio, A kazne kupio

[Build — steady automation climb, sweep into pre-drop]
Shvatam da posebna si
suza ti lice kvasi
A to što uzela si — pazi to trebala si

[Pre-Drop Stab — mantra-style one-shots, punchy pitch FX]
sa parama sam papi (japi)
vitto
ta baraba da ferari i to (skrrt)

[Final Drop / Climax — all motifs stacked, maximal saturation, keep low open for club]
Portofino, sada fino madam uz vino casino
pada jooj — arivo mama sada na to vesto padam

[Outro — fractured echoes, clipped reverb tails]
It fuses motifs into a kinetic climax
then fracture into metallic echoes that hint at what follows

# hardcore_pop - Kuc_Kuc_4
[DESCRIPTION]
A 155 BPM slap house track throbs with filthy, saturated sub-bass and punchy syncopated drums. Dark acid synths drive gritty melodies, while violin lines interlace with Arabic modal flourishes. Hypnotic, autotuned deep vocals glide over razor-sharp hats, risers, and an irresistible club groove.

[LYRICS]
Kuc kuc ko je
zove me šole
ove tvoje dole
Dole mole dijabole

a tu pun poen
ovo je boem
za lovu krojen
mala pijemo za troje

preko bluza njena guza ide sine gore dole
geto mandam ko jakuza kada zvone motorole
belo drama to infuza dama davala do zore
banda favela terore mala navela na fore

Ona blista čista
Mi ko dizel fidel kastro 
terorista ista
mi smo nato bliski istok
Ona poslala pismo
Da drugari više nismo

isto
i da bi da vari 
čisto
mala bi da skida stvari
hitro
mala mrda ko da pali
nitro
A ja mrdam ko da radi 
mi to
sa parama sam papi 
vitto
ta baraba da ferari i to

Portofino, sada fino madam uz vino casino
pada jooj
arivo mama sada na to vesto padam

sam pao sam se ubio
ganjo sam se van sa murijom
ona zna da sam se lupio
sam se lupio A kazne kupio


Shvatam da posebna si 
suza ti lice kvasi
A to što uzela si
pazi to trebala si

---

# hardcore_pop - Kuc_Kuc_4 (Remastered)
[DESCRIPTION]
A 155 BPM slap house track throbs with filthy, saturated sub-bass and punchy syncopated drums. Dark acid synths drive gritty melodies, while violin lines interlace with Arabic modal flourishes. Hypnotic, autotuned deep vocals glide over razor-sharp hats, risers, and an irresistible club groove.

[LYRICS]
Kuc kuc ko je
zove me šole
ove tvoje dole
Dole mole dijabole

a tu pun poen
ovo je boem
za lovu krojen
mala pijemo za troje

preko bluza njena guza ide sine gore dole
geto mandam ko jakuza kada zvone motorole
belo drama to infuza dama davala do zore
banda favela terore mala navela na fore

Ona blista čista
Mi ko dizel fidel kastro 
terorista ista
mi smo nato bliski istok
Ona poslala pismo
Da drugari više nismo

Da bi da me bari 
isto
i da bi da vari 
čisto
mala bi da skida stvari
hitro
mala mrda ko da pali
nitro
A ja mrdam ko da radi 
mi to
sa parama sam papi 
vitto
ta baraba da ferari i to

Portofino, sada fino madam uz vino casino
pada jooj
arivo mama sada na to vesto padam

sam pao sam se ubio
ganjo sam se van sa murijom
ona zna da sam se lupio
sam se lupio A kazne kupio


Shvatam da posebna si 
suza ti lice kvasi
A to što uzela si
pazi to trebala si

---

# hardcore_pop - Kuc_Kuc_7
[DESCRIPTION]
Balkan brass melodies fire over a powerful 4-on-the-floor EDM beat, driving the tempo between 130-140 BPM. Punchy tuba basslines pulse with syncopated hand percussion. Breakdowns drop to swirling clarinet solos and build to wild, dancing accordion hooks. Relentless, urgent, festive energy prevails.

[LYRICS]
Kuc kuc ko je
zove me šole
ove tvoje dole
Dole mole dijabole

a tu pun poen
ovo je boem
za lovu krojen
mala pijemo za troje

preko bluza njena guza ide sine gore dole
geto mandam ko jakuza kada zvone motorole
belo drama to infuza dama davala do zore
banda favela terore mala navela na fore

Ona blista čista
Mi ko dizel fidel kastro 
terorista ista
mi smo nato bliski istok
Ona poslala pismo
Da drugari više nismo

Da bi da me bari 
isto
i da bi da vari 
čisto
mala bi da skida stvari
hitro
mala mrda ko da pali
nitro
A ja mrdam ko da radi 
mi to
sa parama sam papi 
vitto
ta baraba da ferari i to

Portofino, sada fino madam uz vino casino
pada jooj

# hardcore_pop - Kuc_Kuc_8
[DESCRIPTION]
A high-octane Balkan EDM track with dynamic zurle leads over a relentless 4-on-the-floor groove at 130-140 BPM. Punchy tuba basslines anchor syncopated hand percussion. Breakdowns dive into clarinet solos, surging back to explosive zurle hooks, maintaining intense, festive momentum.

[LYRICS]
Kuc kuc ko je
zove me šole
ove tvoje dole
Dole mole dijabole

a tu pun poen
ovo je boem
za lovu krojen
mala pijemo za troje

preko bluza njena guza ide sine gore dole
geto mandam ko jakuza kada zvone motorole
belo drama to infuza dama davala do zore
banda favela terore mala navela na fore

Ona blista čista
Mi ko dizel fidel kastro 
terorista ista
mi smo nato bliski istok
Ona poslala pismo
Da drugari više nismo

Da bi da me bari 
isto
i da bi da vari 
čisto
mala bi da skida stvari
hitro
mala mrda ko da pali
nitro
A ja mrdam ko da radi 
mi to
sa parama sam papi 
vitto
ta baraba da ferari i to

pada jooj
arivo mama sada na to vešto padam

# hardcore_pop - Kucca_Macca- Hardcore_Pop_3
[DESCRIPTION]
bouny undeground slap club tech Turkish oriental pop ,  car honks, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Intro]
C'est Hardcore Pop
([Laughter FX] - [hahaha, filtered, panned wide, low in mix, sets playful but dark tone])
([Lighter FX] - [chk, close-up stereo, on-beat right before first kick])
([Female Ad-lib] - [mmm-aaa, breathy, wide reverb tail leading into first line])
Ne prilazi, bejbi, ne znaš ko sam ja
([BV] - [breathy mmm-aaah, soft under lead, reverb tail overlaps next line])
Maska na licu, a vidim, goriš sva
([Vocal Chop FX] - [ya-ya, pitched, tucked behind snare, glues bar into next])
Noć je hladna, oči crvene k'o lava
([Sub-bass FX] - [rrrrr, low rumble under whole bar, smooth into next])
U klubu senke, al' u meni cela drama
([Crowd FX] - [mmmrumm, distant club murmur, loop quietly across next bar])
[Refren]
Ne prilazi (ne), nisam tvoj spas
([Female Echo] - [„nisam tvoj spas…” stereo echoes, decay over 1 bar])
Ja sam onaj od kog’ ti drhti glas
([Airy BV] - [aaah-aaah, stacked harmonies, pad-like under hook])
Noćas sam dim, sutra nestaću skroz
([Delay FX] - [„nestaaaću…” long delay, fading into next line])
Ti me tražiš, al’ proš’o je voz
([Train FX] - [tschuuu / train-whoosh, sweeping L→R, marks end of hook])
[Verse 1]
Rolex na ruci, al’ vreme nije važno
([Watch FX] - [tik-tak, locks with hi-hat rhythm, low in mix])
Nisam tu, a osećaš se prazno
([Low BV] - [mmm, mono, fills space between kicks])
Kol’ko još puta reći ćeš mi „ne“
([Chopped BV] - [„ne-ne-ne“ stutter, quantized to grid])
Kad ćeš da se predaš i priznaš mi sve
([Breathy BV] - [haaah, rising reverb tail into next bar])
Ponoćni poziv, znamo šta to znači
([Phone FX] - [brr-brr ring, filtered, stops on first word of line])
U glasu ti trema, al’ telo kaže „go“
([Whisper BV] - [„go, go…” panned, short delay gluing into next line])
Na stolu je piće, al’ u glavi lom
([Glass FX] - [clink, placed on snare, tiny echo])
Sa tobom sam vatra, bez tebe siv je dom
([Fire FX] - [fssshh, soft flame texture, under bar, fades slowly])
Ko te to tera da bežiš od mene,
([Female Ad-lib] - [„bežiš… bežiš…” distant, echoed])
U snovima tvojim vodim se pod „ne smem“
([Reverb FX] - [„ne smem…” long tail floating under next line])
Ti bežiš od mene, a u sebi me kriješ
([Close BV] - [mmm-aaah, intimate, centered, low])
U ogledalu tuđa lica — iza njih se kriješ
([Echo Tail] - [„kriješ… kriješ…” decays into tiny instrumental gap])
[Verse 2]
Kuca kuca neko kuca,
([Knock FX] - [kuc-kuc-kuc, tight on-beat, short reverb tail into next line])
Kažu meni rac puca,
([Gun FX] - [pa-pow, wide stereo, echo repeats quietly under next bar])
Para tuca, lažov muca
([Cash FX] - [šu-šu-šu, sidechained under 808, 1-bar loop])
ti si maca, Ja sam kuca,
([Ad-lib] - [mrrr left / vuf right, low volume, glues into next line])
Kinez gladan, oće luca,
([Slurp FX] - [srrrk, quick, slightly pitched, reverb tail overlaps])

> Nikola:
Ona mala, malo ljuta,
([Female BV] - [mmm-aaaa, tense pad, wide reverb, under whole bar])
Ja sam avan, čvrsto tucam,
([Impact FX] - [tok-tok, layered with kick, tight decay])
Sitnim mrvim, pravo krivim,
([Grind FX] - [krsh-krsh, rhythmic texture, fades just before next line])
Kršim širim,
([808 FX] - [booom, long sub tail, [mini-build] of energy into next 2 lines])
Da se smirim (ne mogu)
([Delay FX] - [„ne mogu… mogu…” ping-pong delay, under next bar])
Da se smorim (pobogu)
([Tape Stop FX] - [vjuuu half-speed on last word, beat snaps back full strength])
[Hook / Crew]
Brat Šole zube kiti topi zlatnu polugu
([Shine FX] - [tling, bright sparkle on „zlatnu“, long stereo tail])
Borba nula jedan pet svi su sad na okupu
([Crowd FX] - [ey-ooo block chant, loop quietly under 2 bars])
Dajde dela Plejta dodaj,
([Ad-lib] - [ajde-ajde, call-and-response, tucked behind lead])
ako fali ti, sam do s-n-o dodaj si,
([Chopped FX] - [„dodaj, dodaj“ stutter, syncopated, pulls into next section])
[Verse 3]
Dokaz tome novca priliv,
([Cash Counter FX] - [trtrtrtr, fast count, rhythmic with hats])
Spolja vidljiv, lako svidljiv,
([Sparkle FX] - [shiiiing, short st

---

[Verse 1]

([Watch FX] - [tik-tak, locks with hi-hat rhythm, low in mix])
Nisam tu, a osećaš se prazno
([Low BV] - [mmm, mono, fills space between kicks])
Kol’ko još puta reći ćeš mi „ne“
([Chopped BV] - [„ne-ne-ne“ stutter, quantized to grid])
Kad ćeš da se predaš i priznaš mi sve
([Breathy BV] - [haaah, rising reverb tail into next bar])

([Phone FX] - [brr-brr ring, filtered, stops on first word of line])

([Whisper BV] - [„go, go…” panned, short delay gluing into next line])

([Glass FX] - [clink, placed on snare, tiny echo])

([Fire FX] - [fssshh, soft flame texture, under bar, fades slowly])

([Female Ad-lib] - [„bežiš… bežiš…” distant, echoed])

([Reverb FX] - [„ne smem…” long tail floating under next line])
Ti bežiš od mene, a u sebi me kriješ
([Close BV] - [mmm-aaah, intimate, centered, low])
U ogledalu tuđa lica — iza njih se kriješ
([Echo Tail] - [„kriješ… kriješ…” decays into tiny instrumental gap])
[Verse 2]

([Knock FX] - [kuc-kuc-kuc, tight on-beat, short reverb tail into next line])

([Gun FX] - [pa-pow, wide stereo, echo repeats quietly under next bar])
Para tuca, lažov muca
([Cash FX] - [šu-šu-šu, sidechained under 808, 1-bar loop])
ti si maca, Ja sam kuca,
([Ad-lib] - [mrrr left / vuf right, low volume, glues into next line])
Kinez gladan, oće luca,
([Slurp FX] - [srrrk, quick, slightly pitched, reverb tail overlaps])

([Delay FX] - [„ne mogu… mogu…” ping-pong delay, under next bar])
Da se smorim (pobogu)
([Tape Stop FX] - [vjuuu half-speed on last word, beat snaps back full strength])
[Hook / Crew]
Brat Šole zube kiti topi zlatnu polugu
([Shine FX] - [tling, bright sparkle on „zlatnu“, long stereo tail])
Borba nula jedan pet svi su sad na okupu
([Crowd FX] - [ey-ooo block chant, loop quietly under 2 bars])
Dajde dela Plejta dodaj,
([Ad-lib] - [ajde-ajde, call-and-response, tucked behind lead])
ako fali ti, sam do s-n-o dodaj si,
([Chopped FX] - [„dodaj, dodaj“ stutter, syncopated, pulls into next section])
[Verse 3]
Dokaz tome novca priliv,
([Cash Counter FX] - [trtrtrtr, fast count, rhythmic with hats])
Spolja vidljiv, lako svidljiv,
([Sparkle FX] - [shiiiing, short st

# hardcore_pop - Kucca_Macca_ Hardcore_Pop_9
[DESCRIPTION]
bouncy undeground slap club tech Turkish oriental pop ,  car honks, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Intro]

[Intro] C'est Hardcore Pop
([Crowd FX] - [low-passed club murmur, humid underground tension])
([Car Honk FX] - [syncopated beeps, wide stereo, street chaos outside])
([Female Ad-lib] - [silky oriental „mmm-aaa“ glide, teasing into prvu liniju])

Ne prilazi, bejbi, ne znaš ko sam ja
([BV] - [mekan niski ženski hum na „ja“, kratka plate koja vuče dalje])

Maska na licu, a vidim, goriš sva
([Oriental Lead FX] - [kratak zurna/synth lick u ritmu, klinčan uz groove])

Noć je hladna, oči crvene k'o lava
([Sub Synth FX] - [topao sub swell na „lava“, stopljen s kickom])

U klubu senke, al' u meni cela drama
([Club Ambience FX] - [crowd swell+staklo, lagano sidechain, stalno kretanje])


---

[Refren]

Ne prilazi (ne), nisam tvoj spas
([Female Echo] - [„nisam tvoj spas“ vazdušast stereo echo, bar decay])

Ja sam onaj od kog’ ti drhti glas
([BV] - [oooh/aaah oriental pad ispod cele linije])

Noćas sam dim, sutra nestaću skroz
([Delay FX] - [čisti tempo delay na „nestaaaću“, postepeno bledi])

Ti me tražiš, al’ proš’o je voz
([Train FX] - [whoosh+filter sweep kao klupski riser])


---

[Verse 1]

Rolex na ruci, al’ vreme nije važno
([Perc FX] - [metalni tik-tak na hi-hatovima, clock-groove])

Nisam tu, a osećaš se prazno
([BV] - [duboki mono hum između kickova, jedva čujan])

Kol’ko još puta reći ćeš mi „ne“
([Vocal Chop FX] - [„ne-ne-ne“ nežni chop na off-beatu])

Kad ćeš da se predaš i priznaš mi sve
([Breathy BV] - [meki „haaah“ s kratkim oriental bendom u sledeći takt])

Ponoćni poziv, znamo šta to znači
([Phone FX] - [filtriran ringtone, sobni zid vibe, bar long])

U glasu ti trema, al’ telo kaže „go“
([Whisper BV] - [„go, go…“ šapat L/R, kratki delay za club blur])

Na stolu je piće, al’ u glavi lom
([Glass FX] - [oštra čaša na snare, mikro sparkle])

Sa tobom sam vatra, bez tebe siv je dom
([Fire FX] - [tiho pucketanje+topao noise, uronjen u reverb])

Ko te to tera da bežiš od mene,
([Female Ad-lib] - [„bežiš… bežiš…“ udaljen oriental run, duga repa])

U snovima tvojim vodim se pod „ne smem“
([Reverb FX] - [„ne smem…“ glatki echo tail, pluta ispod sledeće])

Ti bežiš od mene, a u sebi me kriješ
([Close BV] - [centralni mmm-aaah, vrlo blizak, nizak])

U ogledalu tuđa lica — iza njih se kriješ
([Echo Tail FX] - [„kriješ… kriješ…“ čist stereo delay u mini break])


---

[Verse 2 – club/drill fusion]

Kuca kuca neko kuca,
([Knock FX] - [zub na drvo u tempu, kratki club reverb])

Kažu meni rac puca,
([FX] - [snare slap+tihi škrip guma na downbeat])

Para tuca, lažov muca
([Cash FX] - [ritmični coin/jingle loop, sidechain ispod basa])

ti si maca, Ja sam kuca,
([Ad-lib] - [razigrani „mrrr“+meki „vau“, L/R panoramski])

Kinez gladan, oće luca,
([Slurp FX] - [stilizovan kratki srk, tempo locked])

Ona mala, malo ljuta,
([Female BV] - [oriental „aaa“ stab široko ispod fraze])

Ja sam avan, čvrsto tucam,
([Perc FX] - [darbuka hit+low tom, suv i udaran])

Sitnim mrvim, pravo krivim,
([Perc Loop FX] - [šejker+darbuka roll, jednabarski, seče pre sledeće])

Kršim širim,
([Bass FX] - [slap bass slide up, puni bar, vodi u sledeću])

Da se smirim (ne mogu)
([Delay FX] - [„ne mogu…“ čist ping-pong delay, ritmičan])

Da se smorim (pobogu)
([Car Brake FX] - [kratak škrip+soft brake hiss, prijatan tranzit])


---

[Hook / Crew – oriental club moment]

Brat Šole zube kiti topi zlatnu polugu
([Shine FX] - [svetlucavi chime na „zlatnu“, duga mekana repa])

Borba nula jedan pet svi su sad na okupu
([Crowd Chant FX] - [tihi „ey-ey“ grupni chant, 2-bar loop])

Dajde dela Plejta dodaj,
([Ad-lib] - [pozadinski „ajde-ajde“ s kratkim delay bounceom])

ako fali ti, sam do s-n-o dodaj si,
([Vocal Chop FX] - [„dodaj, dodaj“ ritmički chop sa synth stabovima])


---

[Verse 3]

Dokaz tome novca priliv,
([Cash Counter FX] - [POS „bip-bip-bip“ u tempu, prigušeno])

Spolja vidljiv, lako skidljiv
Mala ima pogled
([Sparkle FX] - [subtilan shimmer riser na „skidljiv“, stereo])

Uvek divlji, potez riblji, (plivaj)
([Bass Glide FX] - [glatki mono slide ispod „plivaj“])

Bajo plivaj, uvek gibaj,
([Ad-lib] - [tihi falset „gibaj-gibaj“ širok, nežno zatvara liniju])

Fore skidaj, vežbaj vežbaj vežbaj,
([Perc Roll FX] - [darbuka roll koji raste do zadnjeg „vežbaj“])

Počni kidaj,
([Vocal Chop FX] - [„kidaj, kidaj“ čist chop s echo vodi u outro])


---

[Outro – orijentalni film kraj]

Mala ta to je roba lomljiva,
([Glass FX] - [fina staklena zveckanja, duga reverberantna zavesa])

kao crevom prskam polivam
([Spray FX] - [stilizovan vodeni mist burst, ritmičan, mekan])

a uvijaj vrat tetoviraj
([Tattoo FX] - [tihi tattoo buzz duboko u pozadini, spojen s padom])

Budi zinbe što Popa loži baš,
([Ad-lib] - [udaljeni muški „aaaj“+ženski „yeeeh“ u sloju, duga sobna repa])

Kaže noću sanja da luta gola po poljima,
([Reverb Tail FX] - [„po poljimaaa“ duga čista oriental linija kao pad])

Pa te pozivam,
([Car Honk FX] - [jedan dugi urbani honk u tonalitetu, fade out s muzikom])

---

# hardcore_pop - Kucca_Macca_ Hardcore_Pop_9
[DESCRIPTION]
bouncy undeground slap club tech Turkish oriental pop ,  car honks, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Intro]

[Intro] C'est Hardcore Pop
([Crowd FX] - [low-passed club murmur, humid underground tension])
([Car Honk FX] - [syncopated beeps, wide stereo, street chaos outside])
([Female Ad-lib] - [silky oriental „mmm-aaa“ glide, teasing into prvu liniju])

Ne prilazi, bejbi, ne znaš ko sam ja
([BV] - [mekan niski ženski hum na „ja“, kratka plate koja vuče dalje])

Maska na licu, a vidim, goriš sva

Noć je hladna, oči crvene k'o lava
([Sub Synth FX] - [topao sub swell na „lava“, stopljen s kickom])

U klubu senke, al' u meni cela drama
([Club Ambience FX] - [crowd swell+staklo, lagano sidechain, stalno kretanje])

Noćas sam dim, sutra nestaću skroz
([Delay FX] - [čisti tempo delay na „nestaaaću“, postepeno bledi])

Ti me tražiš, al’ proš’o je voz
([Train FX] - [whoosh+filter sweep kao klupski riser])


---

([BV] - [duboki mono hum između kickova, jedva čujan])

([Vocal Chop FX] - [„ne-ne-ne“ nežni chop na off-beatu])

([Breathy BV] - [meki „haaah“ s kratkim oriental bendom u sledeći takt])

Ponoćni poziv, znamo šta to znači
([Phone FX] - [filtriran ringtone, sobni zid vibe, bar long])

Na stolu je piće, al’ u glavi lom
([Glass FX] - [oštra čaša na snare, mikro sparkle])

Sa tobom sam vatra, bez tebe siv je dom
([Fire FX] - [tiho pucketanje+topao noise, uronjen u reverb])

Ko te to tera da bežiš od mene,
([Female Ad-lib] - [„bežiš… bežiš…“ udaljen oriental run, duga repa])

U snovima tvojim vodim se pod „ne smem“
([Reverb FX] - [„ne smem…“ glatki echo tail, pluta ispod sledeće])

Ti bežiš od mene, a u sebi me kriješ
([Close BV] - [centralni mmm-aaah, vrlo blizak, nizak])

U ogledalu tuđa lica — iza njih se kriješ
([Echo Tail FX] - [„kriješ… kriješ…“ čist stereo delay u mini break])

([Knock FX] - [zub na drvo u tempu, kratki club reverb])

([FX] - [snare slap+tihi škrip guma na downbeat])

Para tuca, lažov muca

ti si maca, Ja sam kuca,

Da se smorim (pobogu)
([Car Brake FX] - [kratak škrip+soft brake hiss, prijatan tranzit])

([Perc Roll FX] - [darbuka roll koji raste do zadnjeg „vežbaj“])

Počni kidaj,
([Vocal Chop FX] - [„kidaj, kidaj“ čist chop s echo vodi u outro])

kao crevom prskam polivam
([Spray FX] - [stilizovan vodeni mist burst, ritmičan, mekan])

a uvijaj vrat tetoviraj
([Tattoo FX] - [tihi tattoo buzz duboko u pozadini, spojen s padom])

Budi zinbe što Popa loži baš,
([Ad-lib] - [udaljeni muški „aaaj“+ženski „yeeeh“ u sloju, duga sobna repa])

Kaže noću sanja da luta gola po poljima,
([Reverb Tail FX] - [„po poljimaaa“ duga čista oriental linija kao pad])

Pa te pozivam,
([Car Honk FX] - [jedan dugi urbani honk u tonalitetu, fade out s muzikom])

# hardcore_pop - Kucca_Macca_Hardcore_Pop (Remastered) (Edit) (Edit)
[DESCRIPTION]
A hypnotic tech house track at 134 BPM, anchored by a deep, dubbed-out bassline and minimal percussion—rimshots, tambourine, scattered cowbell—offset by warm analog pads for an immersive yet danceable mood. Organic hand drums, wooden blocks, bell trees, and beach party field recordings layer human and atmospheric texture. Detuned FM arpeggios propel fluid melodic motion. The breakdown showcases isolated bass and airy vocal loops, then builds with additional percussion. The drop unveils a punchy 909 kick and tight hi-hats, while occasional saturated, reverby chord stabs add character. Space, subtlety, and groove guide the arrangement for seamless DJ mixing.

[LYRICS]
[Intro]

[Intro] C'est Hardcore Pop
([Crowd FX] - [low-passed club murmur, humid underground tension])
([Car Honk FX] - [syncopated beeps, wide stereo, street chaos outside])
([Female Ad-lib] - [silky oriental „mmm-aaa“ glide, teasing into prvu liniju])

Ne prilazi, bejbi, ne znaš ko sam ja
([BV] - [mekan niski ženski hum na „ja“, kratka plate koja vuče dalje])

Maska na licu, a vidim, goriš sva
([Oriental Lead FX] - [kratak zurna/synth lick u ritmu, klinčan uz groove])

Noć je hladna, oči crvene k'o lava
([Sub Synth FX] - [topao sub swell na „lava“, stopljen s kickom])

U klubu senke, al' u meni cela drama
([Club Ambience FX] - [crowd swell+staklo, lagano sidechain, stalno kretanje])


---

[Refren]

Ne prilazi (ne), nisam tvoj spas
([Female Echo] - [„nisam tvoj spas“ vazdušast stereo echo, bar decay])

Ja sam onaj od kog’ ti drhti glas
([BV] - [oooh/aaah oriental pad ispod cele linije])

([Delay FX] - [čisti tempo delay na „nestaaaću“, postepeno bledi])

Ti me tražiš, al’ proš’o je voz
([Train FX] - [whoosh+filter sweep kao klupski riser])

# hardcore_pop - Kucca_Macca_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
Serbian drill, dark but bouncy, 136 BPM, heavy 808, smooth glued mix, no hard silences. Gritty adult male, light autotune, testosterone vocal. Subtle room tone & pad under whole track.

[LYRICS]
[Intro – filtered beat, distant knocks, rising tension]
Kuca kuca neko kuca,
([Intro FX] Knock loop, distant, filtered – kuc-kuc-kuc, reverb tail continues under next line)

Kažu meni rac puca,
([Gun FX] short, then low reverse whoosh into next bar – pa-pow → ffff)

Para tuca, lažov muca
([Cash FX] soft loop starts here – šu-šu-šu, continues quietly under first verse)

ti si maca, Ja sam kuca,
([Ad-lib call & response] mrrr / vuf, panned L/R, with long reverb tail gluing lines)

([Transition FX] short drum fill + reverse reverb swell, beat opens up into full verse)

[Verse 1 – full beat drops, groove locked in]
Kinez gladan, oće luca,
([Background FX] subtle slurp – srrrk, tucked low, main focus on vocal)

Ona mala, malo ljuta,
([Female BV] soft “mmm-aaaa” answering last word, sidechain to beat, tail overlaps next bar)

Ja sam avan, čvrsto tucam,
([Impact FX] muted knock – tok-tok layered with kick, no gap after line)

Sitnim mrvim, pravo krivim,
([Grind FX] krsh-krsh, filtered, rising slightly as mini-build)

Kršim širim,
([808 sub] booom on “Kršim”, marked as mini-drop, kick + 808 hit hard, reverb tail carries into next line)

Da se smirim (ne mogu)
([Delay] “ne mogu… mogu…” ping-pong, timed to tempo, fills space between bars)

Da se smorim (pobogu)
([Tape stop] vjuuu very short, then beat immediately recovers – no dead silence, just a quick FX dip)

([Transition FX] snare fill + riser, small build into next section)

[Hook / Refrain – wider mix, more crowd feel]
Brat Šole zube kiti topi zlatnu polugu
([Shine FX] tling on “zlatnu”, plus subtle crowd “ey” low in background, width increases)

Borba 015 svi su sad na okupu
([Crowd murmur] ey-ooo loop under whole hook, sidechained so it never drowns vocal)

Dajde dela Plejta dodaj,
([Ad-lib] ajde-ajde, call & response, one close, one distant with delay tail)

ako fali ti, sam do nso dodaj si,
([Chopped FX] “dodaj, dodaj” rhythmic chop synced to hi-hats, bleeds into next verse)

([Transition FX] brief drum fill + riser, hook energy gently steps down into verse but groove stays)

[Verse 2 – groove continuous, energy slowly rising]
Dokaz tome novca priliv,
([Cash counter] trtrtrtr low in background, starting here and fading over 2–4 bars)

Spolja vidljiv, lako svidljiv,
([Sparkle FX] shiiiing stereo, glued with reverb so it doesn’t feel like a hard one-shot)

Uvek divlji, potez riblji,
([Glide 808] wooo legato slide between notes, no gap between bars)

Bajo plivaj, uvek gibaj,
([Ad-lib] gibaj-gibaj, tucked behind lead, short delay to fill space)

Fore skidaj, vežbaj vežbaj vežbaj,
([Snare roll] trrrr as build over “vežbaj vežbaj vežbaj”, tension rising)

Počni kidaj,
([Vocal chop] “kidaj, kidaj” lands on small drop with extra 808 + open hat)

Mala ta to je roba lomljiva,
([Glass FX] clink-crack, layered with subtle shimmer pad, tail continues under next line)

Kaže noću sanja da luta gola po poljima,
([Reverb tail] “po poljimaaa” stretched with long reverb, slowly ducked by sidechain to keep beat moving)

Pa te pozivam,
([Phone dial FX] biiip-biiip filtered, plus quiet riser preparing final line)

Budi zinbe što Popa loži baš
([Ad-lib, distant] aaaj / yeeh, long reverb & delay, used as outro chant; beat starts to filter & fade)

[Outro – instrumental fade out, ad-libs echoing]
([Outro FX] beat low-pass filtered, 808 and hats fade over 4 bars, delays and reverb tails slowly disappear, smooth clean end – no click, no sudden stop)

---

# hardcore_pop - Kucca_Macca_Hardcore_Pop_3
[DESCRIPTION]
([Track] - [Serbian drill, 140 BPM, dark playful street vibe, gritty adult male vocal, light autotune, deep 808, tight punchy drums])
([Atmosphere] - [constant low pad + subtle vinyl crackle, very low volume, runs through whole track to glue sections])
([Space] - [short plate reverb on vocal, reverb tails bleed softly into next lines, no hard silence between bars])
([Transitions] - [tiny drum fills or FX swells every 2–4 lines, to avoid fragments and keep flow smooth])

[LYRICS]
[Intro – sparse beat, filtered]

Kuca kuca neko kuca,
([Knock FX] - [kuc-kuc-kuc, tight on-beat, short reverb tail bleeding under next bar])
([Drums] - [just low-passed kick + rim, sidechained lightly to vocal for bounce])

Kažu meni rac puca,
([Gun FX] - [pa-pow, wide stereo, echo repeats quietly behind next line])
([Riser] - [subtle noise riser, 1 bar, leads into beat drop on next line])


---

[Verse 1 – beat drops in, groove established]

Para tuca, lažov muca
([Beat] - [full drill beat drops here, 808 comes in, hi-hat triplets, glued to vocal])
([Cash FX] - [soft šu-šu-šu layered under 808, sidechained, very short tail])

ti si maca, Ja sam kuca,
([Ad-lib] - [mrrr panned left, vuf panned right, both low in mix, reverb tail overlaps next bar])
([Drum Fill] - [tiny snare + tom fill at end of bar to pull into next line])

Kinez gladan, oće luca,
([Slurp FX] - [srrrk, pitched slightly, tucked under vocal, quick delay into next line])
([Bass] - [808 slide up on last syllable to keep momentum])

Ona mala, malo ljuta,
([Female BV] - [mmm-aaaa, distant, drenched in reverb, holds under next bar like a pad])

Ja sam avan, čvrsto tucam,
([Impact FX] - [tok-tok, layered with kick on downbeat, tight, no dry gap after])

Sitnim mrvim, pravo krivim,
([Grind FX] - [krsh-krsh, rhythmic loop for 1 bar under vocal, faded just before next line])

Kršim širim,
([808 sub] - [booom, long sub tail, sidechained under kick, overlaps next bar])
([Build] - [hat roll + noise swell, 1 bar, energy rising into next two lines])

Da se smirim (ne mogu)
([Delay FX] - ["ne mogu… mogu…" ping-pong delay in stereo, tail fades but stays under next line])

Da se smorim (pobogu)
([Tape stop] - [vjuuu half-speed on last word, then drums snap back full speed immediately])
([Transition] - [short reverse reverb swoosh leading into next section])


---

[Hook / Pre-Chorus – wider, more anthemic]

Brat Šole zube kiti topi zlatnu polugu
([Shine FX] - [tling layered with subtle sparkle chime, stereo, long tail under bar])
([Backing Vocals] - [low gang shouts on "Šole", "polugu", wide, low in mix])

Borba nula jedan pet svi su sad na okupu
([Crowd FX] - [ey-ooo distant block crowd, loop quietly for 2 bars under hook])
([Drums] - [slightly busier hi-hats + extra snare ghost notes to lift energy])

Dajde dela Plejta dodaj,
([Ad-lib] - [ajde-ajde, call-and-response tucked behind main, light slapback delay])

ako fali ti, sam do s-n-o dodaj si,
([Chopped FX] - ["dodaj, dodaj" stuttered, synced to tempo, overlaps into next section])
([Fill] - [snare roll + 808 slide down at line end, smooth handoff into next verse])


---

[Verse 2 – groove, confident flow]

Dokaz tome novca priliv,
([Cash Counter FX] - [trtrtrtr, rhythmic with hats, low volume loop for this line only])

Spolja vidljiv, lako svidljiv,
([Sparkle FX] - [shiiiing on "vidljiv", soft, tail bleeds into next bar])

Uvek divlji, potez riblji,
([Glide 808] - [wooo, portamento slide between notes under "divlji" and "riblji"])

Bajo plivaj, uvek gibaj,
([Ad-lib] - [gibaj-gibaj, stereo whisper, heavy reverb, floats under next line])

Fore skidaj, vežbaj vežbaj vežbaj,
([Snare Roll] - [trrrr rising roll on last "vežbaj", builds tension])

Počni kidaj,
([Vocal Chop] - ["kidaj, kidaj" pitched and synced with beat, echoes into next section])
([Transition] - [short riser + kick fill to mark change into closing part])


---

[Outro – darker, then slowly fading]

Mala ta to je roba lomljiva,
([Glass FX] - [clink-crack, subtle under word "lomljiva", fragments echo softly])

a uvijaj i polivaj,
([FX] - [liquid pour + slow whoosh, combined, long tail blending to next bar])

Budi zinbe što Popa loži baš,
([Ad-lib] - [distant aaaj / yeeh, drenched in reverb, continues quietly under next two lines])
([Beat] - [drums start to simplify here, fewer hats, more space])

Kaže noću sanja da luta gola po poljima,
([Reverb Tail] - ["po poljimaaa" stretched, almost pad-like, holding under last line])

Pa te pozivam, moze biti prozivam,
([Phone FX] - [biiip-biiip dial tone tucked low, then filtered out])
([Outro] - [gradual fade-out of drums, leave pad + vinyl crackle + last ad-libs])
([End] - [reverb + ambience fade smoothly, no abrupt stop])

---

# hardcore_pop - Kucca_Macca_Hardcore_Pop_4
[DESCRIPTION]
[Track Instructions]
([Track] - [Modern Serbian drill x dark club pop, ~140 BPM, nocturnal neon vibe, deep 808, tight but smooth drums, glossy but moody production])
([Voice - Lead] - [Adult male, low baritone with slight rasp, confident but intimate tone, clear Serbian diction, half-rapped half-sung phrasing, sits solidly in the pocket])
([Voice - Female BV] - [Airy, sensual, soft high register, often in reverb-heavy echoes and ooh/aaa textures, used for responses, doubles and hooks])
([Vocal FX] - [Light melodic autotune for pitch glue, gentle saturation and compression for weight, short plate reverb, subtle slapback delay, occasional stereo doubles and whispers])
([Performance] - [Overall 7/10 intensity, never shouting, emotional control with flashes of vulnerability, playful emphasis on punchlines, seamless flow between spoken and melodic lines])

[LYRICS]
[Intro] C'est Hardcore Pop
([Laughter in background] - hahaha)
([Lighter flick] - chk)
([female adlib] - mmm-aaa)

Ne prilazi, bejbi, ne znaš ko sam ja
([breathy BV] - mmm-aaah)
Maska na licu, a vidim, goriš sva
([vocal chop] - ya-ya)
Noć je hladna, oči crvene k'o lava
([sub-bass rumble] - rrrrr)
U klubu senke, al' u meni cela drama
([crowd murmur] - mmmrum)


---

[Refren]
Ne prilazi (ne), nisam tvoj spas
([female echo] - „nisam tvoj spas…”)
Ja sam onaj od kog’ ti drhti glas
([BV airy] - aaah-aaah)
Noćas sam dim, sutra nestaću skroz
([delay] - „nestaaaću…”)
Ti me tražiš, al’ proš’o je voz
([FX] - tschuuu / train-whoosh)


---

[Verse 1]
Rolex na ruci, al’ vreme nije važno
([watch tick] - tik-tak)
Nisam tu, a osećaš se prazno
([low BV hum] - mmm)
Kol’ko još puta reći ćeš mi „ne“
([chopped BV] - „ne-ne-ne“)
Kad ćeš da se predaš i priznaš mi sve
([breathy BV] - haaah)

Ponoćni poziv, znamo šta to znači
([phone ring] - brr-brr)
U glasu ti trema, al’ telo kaže „go“
([BV whisper] - „go, go…“)
Na stolu je piće, al’ u glavi lom
([glass clink] - clink)
Sa tobom sam vatra, bez tebe siv je dom
([fire FX] - fssshh)

Ko te to tera da bežiš od mene,
([female adlib] - „bežiš… bežiš…“)
U snovima tvojim vodim se pod „ne smem“
([reverb] - „ne smem…“)
Ti bežiš od mene, a u sebi me kriješ
([BV close] - mmm-aaah)
U ogledalu tuđa lica — iza njih se kriješ
([echo tail] - „kriješ… kriješ…“)


---

---

# hardcore_pop - Kucca_Macca_Hardcore_Pop_6
[DESCRIPTION]
At 128 bpm pulsating club tech track , zurle, organ,80s midi synths, car siren,hypnotic, sultry reggaeton vibes, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Intro]
C'est Hardcore Pop
([Laughter FX] - [hahaha, filtered, panned wide, low in mix, sets playful but dark tone])
([Lighter FX] - [chk, close-up stereo, on-beat right before first kick])
([Female Ad-lib] - [mmm-aaa, breathy, wide reverb tail leading into first line])
Ne prilazi, bejbi, ne znaš ko sam ja
([BV] - [breathy mmm-aaah, soft under lead, reverb tail overlaps next line])
Maska na licu, a vidim, goriš sva
([Vocal Chop FX] - [ya-ya, pitched, tucked behind snare, glues bar into next])
Noć je hladna, oči crvene k'o lava
([Sub-bass FX] - [rrrrr, low rumble under whole bar, smooth into next])
U klubu senke, al' u meni cela drama
([Crowd FX] - [mmmrumm, distant club murmur, loop quietly across next bar])
[Refren]
Ne prilazi (ne), nisam tvoj spas
([Female Echo] - [„nisam tvoj spas…” stereo echoes, decay over 1 bar])
Ja sam onaj od kog’ ti drhti glas
([Airy BV] - [aaah-aaah, stacked harmonies, pad-like under hook])
Noćas sam dim, sutra nestaću skroz
([Delay FX] - [„nestaaaću…” long delay, fading into next line])
Ti me tražiš, al’ proš’o je voz
([Train FX] - [tschuuu / train-whoosh, sweeping L→R, marks end of hook])
[Verse 1]
Rolex na ruci, al’ vreme nije važno
([Watch FX] - [tik-tak, locks with hi-hat rhythm, low in mix])
Nisam tu, a osećaš se prazno
([Low BV] - [mmm, mono, fills space between kicks])
Kol’ko još puta reći ćeš mi „ne“
([Chopped BV] - [„ne-ne-ne“ stutter, quantized to grid])
Kad ćeš da se predaš i priznaš mi sve
([Breathy BV] - [haaah, rising reverb tail into next bar])
Ponoćni poziv, znamo šta to znači
([Phone FX] - [brr-brr ring, filtered, stops on first word of line])
U glasu ti trema, al’ telo kaže „go“
([Whisper BV] - [„go, go…” panned, short delay gluing into next line])
Na stolu je piće, al’ u glavi lom
([Glass FX] - [clink, placed on snare, tiny echo])
Sa tobom sam vatra, bez tebe siv je dom
([Fire FX] - [fssshh, soft flame texture, under bar, fades slowly])
Ko te to tera da bežiš od mene,
([Female Ad-lib] - [„bežiš… bežiš…” distant, echoed])
U snovima tvojim vodim se pod „ne smem“
([Reverb FX] - [„ne smem…” long tail floating under next line])
Ti bežiš od mene, a u sebi me kriješ
([Close BV] - [mmm-aaah, intimate, centered, low])
U ogledalu tuđa lica — iza njih se kriješ
([Echo Tail] - [„kriješ… kriješ…” decays into tiny instrumental gap])
[Verse 2]
Kuca kuca neko kuca,
([Knock FX] - [kuc-kuc-kuc, tight on-beat, short reverb tail into next line])
Kažu meni rac puca,
([Gun FX] - [pa-pow, wide stereo, echo repeats quietly under next bar])
Para tuca, lažov muca
([Cash FX] - [šu-šu-šu, sidechained under 808, 1-bar loop])
ti si maca, Ja sam kuca,
([Ad-lib] - [mrrr left / vuf right, low volume, glues into next line])
Kinez gladan, oće luca,
([Slurp FX] - [srrrk, quick, slightly pitched, reverb tail overlaps])

([Female BV] - [mmm-aaaa, tense pad, wide reverb, under whole bar])

C'est Hardcore Pop
([Laughter FX] - [hahaha, filtered, panned wide, low in mix, sets playful but dark tone])
([Lighter FX] - [chk, close-up stereo, on-beat right before first kick])
([Female Ad-lib] - [mmm-aaa, breathy, wide reverb tail leading into first line])

([BV] - [breathy mmm-aaah, soft under lead, reverb tail overlaps next line])

([Vocal Chop FX] - [ya-ya, pitched, tucked behind snare, glues bar into next])
Noć je hladna, oči crvene k'o lava

# hardcore_pop - Kucca_Macca_Hardcore_Pop_8
[DESCRIPTION]
bouny undeground slap club tech Turkish oriental pop ,  car honks, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Intro]

[Intro] C'est Hardcore Pop
([Crowd FX] - [low-passed club murmur, humid underground tension])
([Car Honk FX] - [syncopated beeps, wide stereo, street chaos outside])
([Female Ad-lib] - [silky oriental „mmm-aaa“ glide, teasing into prvu liniju])

Ne prilazi, bejbi, ne znaš ko sam ja
([BV] - [mekan niski ženski hum na „ja“, kratka plate koja vuče dalje])

Maska na licu, a vidim, goriš sva
([Oriental Lead FX] - [kratak zurna/synth lick u ritmu, klinčan uz groove])

Noć je hladna, oči crvene k'o lava
([Sub Synth FX] - [topao sub swell na „lava“, stopljen s kickom])

U klubu senke, al' u meni cela drama
([Club Ambience FX] - [crowd swell+staklo, lagano sidechain, stalno kretanje])

[Refren]

([BV] - [oooh/aaah oriental pad ispod cele linije])

([Delay FX] - [čisti tempo delay na „nestaaaću“, postepeno bledi])

Ti me tražiš, al’ proš’o je voz
([Train FX] - [whoosh+filter sweep kao klupski riser])


---

[Verse 1]

Rolex na ruci, al’ vreme nije važno
([Perc FX] - [metalni tik-tak na hi-hatovima, clock-groove])

Nisam tu, a osećaš se prazno
([BV] - [duboki mono hum između kickova, jedva čujan])

Kol’ko još puta reći ćeš mi „ne“
([Vocal Chop FX] - [„ne-ne-ne“ nežni chop na off-beatu])

Kad ćeš da se predaš i priznaš mi sve
([Breathy BV] - [meki „haaah“ s kratkim oriental bendom u sledeći takt])

Ponoćni poziv, znamo šta to znači
([Phone FX] - [filtriran ringtone, sobni zid vibe, bar long])

U glasu ti trema, al’ telo kaže „go“
([Whisper BV] - [„go, go…“ šapat L/R, kratki delay za club blur])

Na stolu je piće, al’ u glavi lom
([Glass FX] - [oštra čaša na snare, mikro sparkle])

Sa tobom sam vatra, bez tebe siv je dom
([Fire FX] - [tiho pucketanje+topao noise, uronjen u reverb])

Ko te to tera da bežiš od mene,
([Female Ad-lib] - [„bežiš… bežiš…“ udaljen oriental run, duga repa])

U snovima tvojim vodim se pod „ne smem“
([Reverb FX] - [„ne smem…“ glatki echo tail, pluta ispod sledeće])

Ti bežiš od mene, a u sebi me kriješ
([Close BV] - [centralni mmm-aaah, vrlo blizak, nizak])

U ogledalu tuđa lica — iza njih se kriješ
([Echo Tail FX] - [„kriješ… kriješ…“ čist stereo delay u mini break])

[Verse 2 – club/drill fusion]

Kuca kuca neko kuca,
([Knock FX] - [zub na drvo u tempu, kratki club reverb])

([FX] - [snare slap+tihi škrip guma na downbeat])

Para tuca, lažov muca
([Cash FX] - [ritmični coin/jingle loop, sidechain ispod basa])

ti si maca, Ja sam kuca,
([Ad-lib] - [razigrani „mrrr“+meki „vau“, L/R panoramski])

Kinez gladan, oće luca,
([Slurp FX] - [stilizovan kratki srk, tempo locked])

([Female BV] - [oriental „aaa“ stab široko ispod fraze])

Ja sam avan, čvrsto tucam,
([Perc FX] - [darbuka hit+low tom, suv i udaran])

Sitnim mrvim, pravo krivim,
([Perc Loop FX] - [šejker+darbuka roll, jednabarski, seče pre sledeće])

Kršim širim,
([Bass FX] - [slap bass slide up, puni bar, vodi u sledeću])

Da se smirim (ne mogu)
([Delay FX] - [„ne mogu…“ čist ping-pong delay, ritmičan])

Da se smorim (pobogu)
([Car Brake FX] - [kratak škrip+soft brake hiss, prijatan tranzit])

([Shine FX] - [svetlucavi chime na „zlatnu“, duga mekana repa])

([Vocal Chop FX] - [„dodaj, dodaj“ ritmički chop sa synth stabovima])

Spolja vidljiv, lako skidljiv
Mala ima pogled
([Sparkle FX] - [subtilan shimmer riser na „skidljiv“, stereo])

Uvek divlji, potez riblji, (plivaj)
([Bass Glide FX] - [glatki mono slide ispod „plivaj“])

Bajo plivaj, uvek gibaj,
([Ad-lib] - [tihi falset „gibaj-gibaj“ širok, nežno zatvara liniju])

([Perc Roll FX] - [darbuka roll koji raste do zadnjeg „vežbaj“])

Počni kidaj,
([Vocal Chop FX] - [„kidaj, kidaj“ čist chop s echo vodi u outro])

([Glass FX] - [fina staklena zveckanja, duga reverberantna zavesa])

kao crevom prskam polivam
([Spray FX] - [stilizovan vodeni mist burst, ritmičan, mekan])

a uvijaj vrat tetoviraj
([Tattoo FX] - [tihi tattoo buzz duboko u pozadini, spojen s padom])

Budi zinbe što Popa loži baš,
([Ad-lib] - [udaljeni muški „aaaj“+ženski „yeeeh“ u sloju, duga sobna repa])

Kaže noću sanja da luta gola po poljima,
([Reverb Tail FX] - [„po poljimaaa“ duga čista oriental linija kao pad])

Pa te pozivam,
([Car Honk FX] - [jedan dugi urbani honk u tonalitetu, fade out s muzikom])

# hardcore_pop - Laleli_remix_Hardcore_Pop
[DESCRIPTION]
A hypnotic tech house groove pulses with tight bass and crisp, driving percussion, while moody, underground club ambiences set the scene. Siren-style risers and chopped rave samples slice in atop bass that morphs subtly throughout. 80s-inspired midi synths layer melodic hooks, and sampled crowd cheers and chant vocals explode with raw, communal energy at each drop.

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - Intro (124 BPM) - tech house foundation: sub bass mono <60Hz, kick 50–80Hz +3dB, HPF @25Hz; BUS: drumbus glue 1.5:1 medium, subtle tube sat +0.8dB; ARR: 16-bar atmospheric intro, filtered vocal snippet bar 8, crowd ambience throughout.]
(Istanbul nights...)

[Verse 1 - intimate lead vocal; PROC: de-ess 6–9k, comp 3:1 atk 5ms rel 80ms, low-cut 100Hz, +1.5dB @2–4k; FX: short plate 15ms, doubles 3–5ms; MIX: leave -6dB lead headroom, sidechain bass to kick.*]
Istanbul, Laleli, oko mene top modeli
Kafa, Jack, kokteli, svaku noć drugi hoteli (ya)
Samo ti poželi, bebo, samo ti poželi
Jer ja ti nisam normalan otkako smo se sreli (ya)

[Pre-Chorus - 4-bar tension builder; PROC: HPF sweep 300→2k, transient +1.5dB, delay 1/8 lowpass 4k; MIX: duck pads -2dB, introduce subtle riser.*]
Ma gdje si, samo reci gdje si (ya)
Budiš nemir, mora da si nečija
Ali meni najbolja si verzija
A u tvome tijelu kreće turbulencija (kreće turbulencija)

[Chorus - full energy with crowd vocals; PROC: lead comp 3:1 atk 3ms rel 60ms, crowd sample +2dB @1–3k, exciter +1.5dB @8–10k; BUS: vocal-bus tube sat +0.8dB, mid dip 300–500Hz -1dB; MIX: monobass <60Hz, siren riser on beat 3.*]
Elegantna, popeglana od glave do pete je
Sva šarmantna, našminkana, nema konkurencije
(Ay-Ay) Sva predana, ona ko sa revije
(Ay-Ay-Ay) Odabrana za moje kolekcije
Ja sam željan tvog tijela, to je mila c'est la vie
Scene sobe hotela nikad da zaboravim
Na mene se popela, a okolo sve je dim
Ovako nisi gorela, niti bila s kim intim' (bila s kim intim')

[Interlude - percussive transition; PROC: conga loop +1dB, filtered vocal chop, snare roll +4dB over 4 bars; MIX: pull back lead vocal -4dB, increase bass presence +1.5dB.*]
(Nikad da zaboravim)

[Verse 2 - saturated vocal presence; PROC: comp 3.5:1 atk 4ms rel 70ms, +2dB 3–5k, micro-shift doubles -8 cents 15% wet; MIX: add subtle arpeggio, sidechain pads to kick.*]
Ma gdje si, samo reci gdje si (ya)
Budiš nemir, mora da si nečija
Ali meni najbolja si verzija
A u tvome tijelu kreće turbulencija (turbulencija)

[Pre-Chorus - intensified tension; PROC: HPF sweep 400→2.4k, add rhythmic gate, delay 1/8 with feedback; MIX: automate filter sweep on bass, increase reverb send +2dB.*]
Vidi sad-sad, jedan sat-sat iza ponoći igra
Nisi laka, tako slatka, sa mnom bi da se igra
Takav nisam ja, ti u mislima
Istina se negdje sakrila

[Build-up - 124→128 BPM gradual accel; STACK: octave risers, chopped rave samples, snare roll +8dB over 8 bars; PROC: automate vocal-bus sat +0.8→+2dB, synth LPF 500Hz→8k; MIX: riser stem -8dB for DJ use.*]
(A ti mene ne puštaj, to želja mi je pusta)

[Final Chorus - maximum energy; PROC: double lead + detune -12 cents, parallel comp 50% wet, excite +2dB @10k, tape tails +1dB; MIX: open 8–12k +2dB, glue mixbus 1.8:1, keep monobass <60Hz, crowd chants +3dB.*]
Elegantna, popeglana od glave do pete je
Sva šarmantna, našminkana, nema konkurencije
(Ay-Ay) Sva predana, ona ko sa revije
(Ay-Ay-Ay) Odabrana za moje kolekcije
Ja sam željan tvog tijela, to je mila c'est la vie
Scene sobe hotela nikad da zaboravim
Na mene se popela, a okolo sve je dim
Ovako nisi gorela, niti bila s kim intim' (bila s kim intim')

[Bridge - atmospheric breakdown; PROC: vocal comp 4:1 atk 8ms rel 100ms, +1dB @2–3k, reverb 30% wet, delay 1/4; MIX: pull back drums -4dB, increase pad presence +3dB, filter sweep on bass.*]
Da ta tvoja usta daju disanje (daju disanje)
A ti bebe pokušaj, to barem si mi dužna
Da mi nisi tužna, to ti ne pristaje (ne pristaje)

[Outro - deconstruct & DJ-tail; BPM ramp 128→120; PROC: remove percussion over 16 bars, plate 70% wet on last vocal, LP tail 6dB/oct start -8s, keep crackle -10dB; ARR: provide loopable 8-bar tail: monobass + filtered vocal chop + crowd ambience.*]
(Istanbul nights... Laleli...)

[Mastering Chain & Reference - target -8 LUFS integrated (club), True Peak -0.5dB; CHAIN: corrective EQ (dip 200–400Hz -1.5dB) → multiband comp (tighten 50–100Hz / glue mids) → subtle tube sat +0.8–1.5dB → stereo imager (mono <80Hz) → final limiter ceiling -0.5dB → dither 24→16 bit. NOTES: send master -3dB headroom pre-limit; verify on club PA and headphones.]

# hardcore_pop - Last CCall_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
a tech house weapon engineered for DJs: it opens with 32 bars of crisp, isolated kick and percussion for seamless multi-BPM layering. The bassline anchors relentlessly on the root, safeguarding harmonic stability. Syncopated vocal hooks float above the grid, lock with the groove, and flexibly double as transition tools or main features. At 2:14, a suspenseful breakdown strips back to atmosphere, inviting tension or genre shifts. Frequency separation is meticulous—leaving the 2-4kHz range pristine for clarity on club rigs. The arrangement rides a carefully modeled energy arc, peaking after the breakdown for reliable floor ignition.

# hardcore_pop - Latin Gregorian Chants
[DESCRIPTION]
Slow, evolving ambient tones form the backbone, layered with deep drones and ancient pipe organ. Authentic Gregorian chants echo in modal harmonies, woven with sparse chimes and subtle synthesized textures. The overall sound is brooding, reverent, and cosmic, invoking timeless cycles.

[LYRICS]
[Verse]
Sanctus
Sanctus
Sanctus
Dominus Deus Sabaoth
Pleni sunt caeli et terra
Gloria tua

[Pre-Chorus]
Gloria tua
Gloria tua

[Chorus]
Hosanna in excelsis
Hosanna in excelsis
Hosanna in excelsis
Sanctus
Sanctus

# hardcore_pop - Little Planet_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
A high-energy Balkan-flavored EDM/tech-house anthem at 130–140 BPM, built on a punchy four-on-the-floor kick and a tight, syncopated slap-house bass line. Zurle riffs weave through the arrangement as melodic accents, supported by rhythmic organ stabs, bright 80s MIDI synth plucks, cowbells, and cinematic harp glissandos. Car sirens, tire-screech uplifters, and swirling FX create a dynamic, constantly moving dance-floor texture. The vocals are silky, warm, and fully natural—no autotune—sitting forward and clean with subtle stereo widening in the choruses. Drops explode with wide supersaws and energetic bass movement, while verses stay more atmospheric with pads and plucks that lift into each build. The overall mood is euphoric, emotional, and futuristic, mixing cosmic escapism with relentless club energy and Balkan festival swagger.

[LYRICS]
[GlobalMix–High-energy Balkan-influenced EDM/tech-house ~130–140 BPM.Kick:hard punch,short tail,strong transient at 3–6 kHz.Bass:slap-house saw+FM hybrid,sidechain 6–8 dB,groovy syncopation,mono <120 Hz.Snares/claps bright with 80s snap(5–7 kHz).Hats:1/8 main + 1/16 energy bursts;HPF>350 Hz.Perc:zurle stabs,organized cowbell hits,car-siren uplifters,tire-screech risers.Organ stabs rhythmic;80s MIDI synths glide in pre-chorus;harp plucks on emotional lines.Synth leads supersaw-style,wide stereo.Vocals:silky-clear male,no autotune,air boost 8–12 kHz,very light compression,center-focused on verses,doubles widening only in choruses.Reverb short on verses,long throws on section transitions.Delays synced 1/4+dotted-8th.Master:-6.5 to -6 LUFS,club-loud,brickwall -0.9 dB.]

[Structure–Intro(8 bars filtered kick+zurle riff)->Verse1(minimal drums)->PreChorus(build with organ+pluck)->Chorus(drop:slap bass+zurle+80s synth)->Verse2->Chorus2(bigger)->Verse3->FinalChorus(max energy)->Outro(filtered).]

([Pad80s]-warm retro pad widening)

([PluckBright]-80s MIDI pluck accents)

([VoxEpic]-largest wide stack)

([BuildFull]-snare rolls+noise+rise pitch)
And that's a shame

[Outro]

([FilterLP]-lowpass whole mix)
([PluckHarp]-fade with echo)
([ZurleSolo]-soft distant motif)
([ReverbLong]-tail to silence)

# hardcore_pop - Little Planet_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
A high-energy Balkan-flavored EDM/tech-house anthem at 130–140 BPM, built on a punchy four-on-the-floor kick and a tight, syncopated slap-house bass line. Zurle riffs weave through the arrangement as melodic accents, supported by rhythmic organ stabs, bright 80s MIDI synth plucks, cowbells, and cinematic harp glissandos. Car sirens, tire-screech uplifters, and swirling FX create a dynamic, constantly moving dance-floor texture. The vocals are silky, warm, and fully natural—no autotune—sitting forward and clean with subtle stereo widening in the choruses. Drops explode with wide supersaws and energetic bass movement, while verses stay more atmospheric with pads and plucks that lift into each build. The overall mood is euphoric, emotional, and futuristic, mixing cosmic escapism with relentless club energy and Balkan festival swagger.

[LYRICS]
[GlobalMix–High-energy Balkan-influenced EDM/tech-house ~130–140 BPM.Kick:hard punch,short tail,strong transient at 3–6 kHz.Bass:slap-house saw+FM hybrid,sidechain 6–8 dB,groovy syncopation,mono <120 Hz.Snares/claps bright with 80s snap(5–7 kHz).Hats:1/8 main + 1/16 energy bursts;HPF>350 Hz.Perc:zurle stabs,organized cowbell hits,car-siren uplifters,tire-screech risers.Organ stabs rhythmic;80s MIDI synths glide in pre-chorus;harp plucks on emotional lines.Synth leads supersaw-style,wide stereo.Vocals:silky-clear male,no autotune,air boost 8–12 kHz,very light compression,center-focused on verses,doubles widening only in choruses.Reverb short on verses,long throws on section transitions.Delays synced 1/4+dotted-8th.Master:-6.5 to -6 LUFS,club-loud,brickwall -0.9 dB.]

# hardcore_pop - Ljubavicca_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
Morphing sub-bass merges West Coast Moog slides with jungle ritualistic depth at 130 BPM. Snappy syncopated percussion layers 808 rim shots over tribal drum programming. Ambient club noise blends hydraulic sounds and distant conversations. Siren risers combine with talk box vocoder phrases during buildup. 80s-inspired midi synths deliver whining funk leads with heavy vibrato. Rave samples punctuate transitions alongside Parliament-influenced flute whistles. Drops unleash crowd roars mixed with layered gang vocals and chopped fertility chant fragments. Punchy vocals processed through formant shifting create alien textures. Tighter groove emphasizes dembow-influenced syncopation within four-on-floor structure. Pulsing hypnotic energy maintained through portamento bassline glides and vintage synth triangle waves. Atmospheric depth includes lowrider references and ceremonial bell tones. Breakdown strips to bass and finger snaps before full arrangement returns. Production balances analog wa
