# hardcore_pop - Ljubavicca_Hardcore_Pop_2
[DESCRIPTION]
Sultry ritualistic energy meets classical majesty at 132 BPM through pipe organ fugue progressions. Morphing bassline combines Bach pedal tones with deep fertility ritual foundation. Snappy syncopated percussion maintains minimal approach—kick, clap, subtle hi-hats—allowing organ prominence. Ambient club noise suggests cathedral acoustics within pagan ceremony context. Siren risers transform into ascending baroque sequences with counterpoint complexity. 80s midi synths replaced by harpsichord flourishes and Toccata-inspired melodies. Rave samples punctuate alongside organ chord voicings. Drops unleash crowd roars mixed with solo organ improvisation and chopped Latin chant vocals. Punchy vocal fragments follow fugue subject patterns creating compositional integration. Tighter groove achieved through electronic bass reinforcement beneath classical instrument layers. Pulsing hypnotic energy sustained via repeating and inverting melodic themes. Atmospheric reverb balances sacred and profan

# hardcore_pop - Ljubavicca_Hardcore_Pop_3
[DESCRIPTION]
Morphing bassline combines acid modulation with tantric drone depth at 134 BPM. Snappy syncopated percussion merges tabla polyrhythms with house clap precision. Ambient club noise layers temple bells and finger cymbals. Siren risers blend with ascending raga scale sequences during hypnotic buildup. 80s midi synths transformed into sitar samples with pitch-bending and delay processing. Rave samples punctuate alongside Sanskrit mantra chops creating psychedelic vocal texture. Drops unleash crowd roars mixed with ceremonial chanting and fertility invocation fragments. Punchy chopped vocals processed through granular synthesis emphasize spiritual energy. Tighter groove locks through tanpura drones and resonant filter sweeps. Pulsing hypnotic energy sustained via Bhairav raga tonality and tribal percussion synchronization. Atmospheric depth suggests jungle ceremony meets conscious dancefloor. Breakdown features isolated mantras before rhythm reintroduction. Production balances organic India

# hardcore_pop - Ljubavicca_Hardcore_Pop_4
[DESCRIPTION]
A 135 bpm tech house track opens with syncopated percussion, crisp claps, and dynamic hand drum fills driving the groove, Gritty bass and clipped synth stabs intertwine as bold, panned tribal riffs slice through, The breakdown features modal trumpet over interlocked organ runs, then a drop erupts with jungle-influenced vocals, catchy chopped samples, cathedral chants, and swirling echoes, The zurle ebbs and flows, warping in the mix, as hypnotic, addictively rhythmic layers propel the relentless dancefloor finale

[LYRICS]
[Male and Female]

# hardcore_pop - Ljubavicca_Hardcore_Pop_5
[DESCRIPTION]
Relentless at 150 BPM, this EDM banger fuses Balkan soul and modern aggression. Opening with a wailing accordion sample, it’s immediately overtaken by crushing 4/4 kicks and seismic, sidechained bass. Weaponized synth melody and fiery, distorted Balkan brass stabs keep energy high, while pitched, glitched vocals drive a robotic mantra. No breakdowns—just ferocious percussive layers and filtered kicks that intensify, making every second a non-stop, chaotic dancefloor assault.

[LYRICS]
[Male and Female]
(Ne znam ko si)
Tvoje oči mi nešto šapuću, skrivaju tajnu da...
Neko si ko će:
(Da voli)
Ljubi
(Zagrli i odvede)
U noć bez povratka
(Tišina...)

Samo jednom.).. ne dam te nikom

# hardcore_pop - Ljubavicca_Hardcore_Pop_5
[DESCRIPTION]
A contemporary pop-electronic fusion at 135 bpm  built on a danceable, punchy low-end and percussive groove for vocal clarity. Analog-style synths and digital textures define the palette: plucky arpeggios drive verses, a detuned lead lifts the chorus. Transitional risers, chopped vocal stabs, and a sparse bridge ramp up tension. Sidechained pads and a full-spectrum synth bed create club power while keeping intimate vocals clear in the mix. Tight modal harmony, inventive chord inversions, and energetic backing harmonies maintain catchiness through a modern pop-EDM structure.

[LYRICS]
[Male and Female]
(Ne znam ko si)

# hardcore_pop - Llamelecca- Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
At 128 bpm pulsating club tech track , zurle, organ,80s midi synths, car siren,hypnotic, sultry reggaeton vibes, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Male]
Pomozi bože da je se ne setiiim
([Reverb prayer] - oooh)
Miris njene koožee, ko da me progoniii
([Perfume mist] - pssht) ([Sub drone] - rrrrr)
A nešto lošee uvek se dogodi
([Distant thunder] - grrrm)
Kad si u kavezu a pričaš o slobodi
([Metal bars rattle] - klang-klang)

[Male]
Olala ee
([Crowd murmur club] - mmmrum)
ja trošim dolare
([Cash flick] - frrrt)
ona to znala jee
([Tongue click] - tsk)
pa zato sama je
([Heel step] - tak-tak)
mala muvala me
([Whisper close] - ssst)
na precizne nišane
([Gun cock soft] - klik)
Lovom kupio jee
([Coin drop] - cling)
Bez nje ne bi prišla, nee
([Echo] - prišla…nee…)

Olala ee
([FX rise] - whooom)
ja trošim dolare
([Note count] - flip-flip)
ona to znala jee
([Breath laugh] - heh)
pa zato sama je
([Glass clink] - clink)
mala muvala me
([Vocal chop] - mm-yeah)
na precizne nišane
([Laser ping] - piu)
Lovom kupio jee
([Sub stab] - dum)
Bez nje ne bi prišla, nee
([Reverse tail] - whooosh)

[Female]
Ja sam gola, voda lije
([Shower stream] - shhhhh)
malo zgodna puno pijem
([Bottle pour] - glug-glug)
ko se od nas tu sad krije
([Room hum] - mmm)
zaveden si, žao mi je
([Breath whisper] - haaah)
sa njim sve je fatalnije
([Low pad] - ooo)
sa njim stalno dame dvije
([Heels duo] - tak-tak / tak-tak)
Vec je kasno, pola tri je
([Clock tick + distant bell] - tik-tik / ding)
U očima pao mi je
([Heartbeat drop] - thump…)

[Male]
neću te zvati shvati, ne posle
bromazepama
([Pill rattle] - rrr)
za sve hvala ti
([Door soft close] - thumm)
a ti pati sad si sasvim sama
([Night wind] - whoosh)
Ja još sam lud u čaši al’ fali mi crna dama
([Ice in glass] - klink)
kad svetlo odnela sii, prati me samo tamaa
([Switch click] - klak) ([Sub drone] - rrrrr)

[Female]
Soba naša postajee
([Air thick] - fffsh)
laganije vrelijaa
([Heat wave] - wooo)
Spremna sam i postajeeem
([Breath deeper] - haaah)
Polako opuštenija
([Cloth slide] - shff)

[Female]
Lako ludim gubim dah On mi nudi beli prah,
([Plate tap] - tik) ([Sniff FX] - ffff)
pa nam sad zastaje dah (pa zastaje dah)
([Beat choke] - stop / thumm)
Jako ljubim trazim trag stiglom gazim on je nag (naga sam i ja)
([Wall thump] - thud) ([Kiss reverb] - mwwah)

Verse muski
Fatalnijaa, Kad je smelija
([Sub swell] - wub-wub)
Mame me njene usne boje cherria
([Lip smack] - smack)
K’o dijamant, sija ovaj grad
([City lights shimmer] - tinkle)
gorelo je tlo koji si se šetala
([Fire crackle] - tsss)

Ovaj čivas ima leta isto k’o i ti
([Ice swirl] - krrr)
ko bi reko da je s’ klinkom ljubav dobro voditi?
([Laugh under breath] - heh)
kad baratam s’ tobom bebo k’o da držim dinamit,
([Fuse hiss] - fsssss)
koji me svake sekunde u delove može razneti
([Explosion low] - BOOMmm)

bridge musko
Pomozi bože da je se ne setiiim
([Reverb prayer] - oooh)
Miris njene koožee, ko da me progoniii
([Perfume mist] - pssht / [Echo] - progoniii…)
A nešto lošee uvek se dogodi
([Thunder distant] - grrrm)
Kad si u kavezu a pričaš o slobodi
([Chain rattle] - ching-ching)

Chorus musko
Olala ee
([Crowd “olala” layer] - ola-laa)
ja trošim dolare
([Cash flick] - frrrt)
ona to znala jee
([Tongue click] - tsk)
pa zato sama je
([Heel hit] - tak)
mala muvala me
([Whisper double] - mu-va)
na precizne nišane
([Laser ping] - piu)
Lovom kupio jee
([Coin roll] - rrrr-cling)
Bez nje ne bi prišla, nee
([Sub drop + echo] - BOOM / nee…nee…)

# hardcore_pop - Llamelecca- Hardcore_Pop_10
[DESCRIPTION]
at 129 bpm bouncy undeground slap club tech balkan zurne, cathederal organ, echo, oriental pop ,  car honks, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Male]
Pomozi bože da je se ne setiiim
Miris njene koožee,ko da me progoniii
A nešto lošee uvek se do-go-di
Kad si u kavezu a pričaš o slobodi

[Female]
Ja sam gola,voda lije
malo zgodna puno pijem
ko se od nas tu sad krije
zaveden si,žao mi je
sa njim sve je fa-ta-lnije
sa njim stalno dame dvije
Već je kasno,pola tri je
U očima pao mi je

[Male]

ja trošim dolare
ona to znala jee
pa zato sama je
mala muvala me
na precizne nišane
Lovom kupio jee
Bez nje ne bi prišla,nee

[Female]
Soba naša postajee
laganije vrelijaa
Spremna sam i postajeeem
Polako opuštenija


[Male]
neću te zvati shvati, ne posle
bromazepama
za sve hvala ti
a ti pati sad si sasvim sama
Ja još sam lud u čaši al’fali mi crna dama
kad svetlo odnela sii,prati me samo tamaa

[Female]
Lako ludim gubim dah 
On mi nudi beli prah,pa nam sad zastaje dah (pa zastaje dah)
Jako ljubim tražim trag štiklom gazim
on je nag ,  naga sam i ja

[Male]
Fatalnijaa,Kad je smelija
Mame me njene usne boje cherria
K’o dijamant,sija ovaj grad
gorelo je tlo kojim si se šetala

[Female vocal - Male backvocal]

ti trošiš dolare
(ona to znala jee)
pa zato sam si ej
tako mlada, muvao me
na precizne nišane
Lovom kupio bi me
Bez nje ne bi prišao,nee
([Echo fade] - prišao…nee…)

[Male]
Ovaj čivas ima leta isto k’o i ti
ko bi reko da je s’ klinkom ljubav dobro voditi?
kad baratam s’ tobom bebo k’o da držim dinamit,koji me svake sekunde u delove može razneti

A nešto lošee uvek se dogodi
Kad si u kavezu a pričaš o slobodi

malo zgodna puno pijem
ko se od nas tu sad krije
zaveden si,žao mi je
sa njim sve je fa-ta-lnije
sa njim stalno dame dvije
Već je kasno,pola tri je
U očima pao mi je

[Male]
Olala ee
ja trošim dolare
ona to znala jee
pa zato sama je
mala muvala me
na precizne nišane
Lovom kupio jee
Bez nje ne bi prišla,nee

[Female]
Soba naša postajee
laganije vrelijaa
Spremna sam i postajeeem
Polako opuštenija


[Male]
neću te zvati shvati, ne posle
bromazepama
za sve hvala ti
a ti pati sad si sasvim sama
Ja još sam lud u čaši al’fali mi crna dama
kad svetlo odnela sii,prati me samo tamaa

[Female]
Lako ludim gubim dah 
On mi nudi beli prah,pa nam sad zastaje dah (pa zastaje dah)
Jako ljubim tražim trag štiklom gazim
on je nag ,  naga sam i ja

[Male]
Fatalnijaa,Kad je smelija
Mame me njene usne boje cherria
K’o dijamant,sija ovaj grad
gorelo je tlo kojim si se šetala

[Female vocal - Male backvocal]
Olala ee
ti trošiš dolare
(ona to znala jee)
pa zato sam si ej
tako mlada, muvao me
na precizne nišane
Lovom kupio bi me
Bez nje ne bi prišao,nee
([Echo fade] - prišao…nee…)

[Male]
Ovaj čivas ima leta isto k’o i ti
ko bi reko da je s’ klinkom ljubav dobro voditi?
kad baratam s’ tobom bebo k’o da držim dinamit,koji me svake sekunde u delove može razneti
Pomozi bože da je se ne setiiim
Miris njene koožee,ko da me progoniii
A nešto lošee uvek se dogodi
Kad si u kavezu a pričaš o slobodi

---

# hardcore_pop - Llamelecca- Hardcore_Pop_12
[DESCRIPTION]
At 128 bpm pulsating club tech balkan bouncy track , zurle, organ,80s midi synths, car siren,hypnotic, sultry reggaeton vibes, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Male]
Pomozi bože da je se ne setiiim
([Breath heavy] - haaah)
Miris njene koožee,ko da me progoniii
([Ghostly pad] - ooooh)
A nešto lošee uvek se do-go-di
Kad si u kavezu a pričaš o slobodi
([Sub-bass rumble] - rrrrr)

[Female]
Ja sam gola,voda lije
([Shower stream] - shhhhhh)
malo zgodna puno pijem
ko se od nas tu sad krije
zaveden si,žao mi je
([Soft laugh] - heh)
sa njim sve je fa-ta-lnije
sa njim stalno dame dvije
Već je kasno,pola tri je
U očima pao mi je
([Heartbeat drop] - thump…THUMP)

[Male]
Olala ee
([Crowd murmur] - mmmrum)
ja trošim dolare
([Cash flick] - fffsh)
ona to znala jee
([Whisper] - znala je…)
pa zato sama je
([Heel step] - tak-tak)
mala muvala me
([Finger snap] - snap)
na precizne nišane
([Laser sight] - piiip)
Lovom kupio jee
([Coin drop] - cling)
Bez nje ne bi prišla,nee
([Echo] - prišla…nee)

[Female]
Soba naša postajee
([Air swell] - fffsh)
laganije vrelijaa
([Heat wave] - whooom)
Spremna sam i postajeeem
([Breath close] - haaah)
Polako opuštenija
([Cloth slide] - shff)


[Male]
neću te zvati shvati, ne posle
bromazepama
([Pill rattle] - chk-chk)
za sve hvala ti
([Door thud] - thud)
a ti pati sad si sasvim sama
([Room reverb] - mmm)
Ja još sam lud u čaši al’fali mi crna dama
([Ice in glass] - clink-clink)
kad svetlo odnela sii,prati me samo tamaa
([Switch click] - klik) ([Dark pad] - oooo)

[Female]
Lako ludim gubim dah 
On mi nudi beli prah,pa nam sad zastaje dah (pa zastaje dah)
([Heartbeat speed up] - thump-thump-thump → [Stop hit] - THUD)
Jako ljubim tražim trag štiklom gazim
on je nag ,  naga sam i ja
([Kiss fx] - smk) ([Sheet rustle] - fffsh))

[Male]
Fatalnijaa,Kad je smelija
([Sub growl] - rrrrr)
Mame me njene usne boje cherria
([Lip smack] - *pop*)
K’o dijamant,sija ovaj grad
([Shimmer] - tinkleee)
gorelo je tlo kojim si se šetala
([Fire crackle] - tsss) ([Heel echo] - tak…tak…)

[Female vocal - Male backvocal]
Olala ee
([Adlib distant] - olalaa)
ti trošiš dolare
(ona to znala jee)
([Whisper echo] - znala je…)
pa zato sam si ej
tako mlada, muvao me
([Snap] - snap)
na precizne nišane
([Laser ping] - pip)
Lovom kupio bi me
([Cash slap] - flap)
Bez nje ne bi prišao,nee
([Echo fade] - prišao…nee…)

[Male]
Ovaj čivas ima leta isto k’o i ti
([Liquid swirl] - shhh)
ko bi reko da je s’ klinkom ljubav dobro voditi?
([Laugh low] - heh)
kad baratam s’ tobom bebo k’o da držim dinamit,koji me svake sekunde u delove može razneti
([Fuse sizzle] - sssss) ([Mini explosion] - boom)
Pomozi bože da je se ne setiiim
([Breath strain] - haaah)
Miris njene koožee,ko da me progoniii
([Haunting pad] - ooooh)
A nešto lošee uvek se dogodi
([Low tom roll] - dum-dum-dum)
Kad si u kavezu a pričaš o slobodi

---

# hardcore_pop - Llamelecca- Hardcore_Pop_13
[DESCRIPTION]
at 125bpm bouncy undeground slap club tech Turkish zurne, cathederal organ, echo, oriental pop ,  car honks, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Male]
Pomozi bože da je se ne setiiim
([Breath heavy])
Miris njene koožee,ko da me progoniii
([Ghostly pad])
A nešto lošee uvek se dogodi
([Sub-bass rumble])
Kad si u kavezu a pričaš o slobodi
([Chain rattle])

[Female]
Ja sam gola,voda lije
([Shower stream] - shhhhhh)
malo zgodna puno pijem
ko se od nas tu sad krije
zaveden si,žao mi je
([Soft laugh] - heh)
sa njim sve je fa-talnije
sa njim stalno dame dvije
Već je kasno,pola tri je
U očima pao mi je
([Heartbeat drop] )

[Male]
Olala ee
([Crowd murmur] - mmmrum)
ja trošim dolare
([Cash flick] - fffsh)
ona to znala jee
([Whisper] - znala je…)
pa zato sama je
([Heel step] - tak-tak)
mala muvala me
([Finger snap] - snap)
na precizne nišane
([Laser sight] - piiip)
Lovom kupio jee
([Coin drop] - cling)
Bez nje ne bi prišla,nee
([Echo] - prišla…nee)

[Female]
Soba naša postajee
([Air swell] - fffsh)
laganije vrelijaa
([Heat wave] - whooom)
Spremna sam i postajeeem
([Breath close] - haaah)
Polako opuštenija
([Cloth slide] - shff)


[Male]
neću te zvati shvati, ne posle
bromazepama
([Pill rattle] - chk-chk)
za sve hvala ti
([Door thud])
a ti pati sad si sasvim sama
([Room reverb] - mmm)
Ja još sam lud u čaši al’fali mi crna dama
([Ice in glass])
kad svetlo odnela sii,prati me samo tamaa
([Switch click] - klik) ([Dark pad] - oooo)

[Female]
Lako ludim gubim dah 
On mi nudi beli prah,pa nam sad zastaje dah (pa zastaje dah)
([Heartbeat speed up] - thump-thump-thump → [Stop hit] - THUD)
Jako ljubim tražim trag štiklom gazim
on je nag ,  naga sam i ja
([Kiss fx] - smk) ([Sheet rustle] - fffsh))

[Male]
Fatalnijaa,Kad je smelija
([Sub growl])
Mame me njene usne boje cherria
([Lip smack])
K’o dijamant,sija ovaj grad
([Shimmer])
gorelo je tlo koji si se šetala
([Fire crackle] - tsss) ([Heel echo] - tak…tak…)

[Female vocal - Male backvocal]
Olala ee
([Adlib distant] - olalaa)
ti trošiš dolare
([Note flick] - shff)
(ona to znala jee)
([Whisper echo] - znala je…)
pa zato sam si ej
([Heel on tile] - tak)
tako mlada, muvao me
([Snap] - snap)
na precizne nišane
([Laser ping] - pip)

([Cash slap] - flap)

([Echo fade] - prišao…nee…)

[Male]
Ovaj čivas ima leta isto k’o i ti
([Liquid swirl] - shhh)
ko bi reko da je s’ klinkom ljubav dobro voditi?
([Laugh low] - heh)
kad baratam s’ tobom bebo k’o da držim dinamit,koji me svake sekunde u delove može razneti
([Fuse sizzle] - sssss) ([Mini explosion] - boom)

([Haunting pad] - ooooh)

([Metal bars] - klang-klang)

([Laser sight] - piiip)
Lovom kupio jee
([Coin drop] - cling)
Bez nje ne bi prišla,nee
([Echo] - prišla…nee)

[Female]
Soba naša postajee
([Air swell] - fffsh)
laganije vrelijaa
([Heat wave] - whooom)
Spremna sam i postajeeem
([Breath close] - haaah)
Polako opuštenija
([Cloth slide] - shff)


[Male]
neću te zvati shvati, ne posle
bromazepama
([Pill rattle] - chk-chk)
za sve hvala ti
([Door thud])
a ti pati sad si sasvim sama
([Room reverb] - mmm)
Ja još sam lud u čaši al’fali mi crna dama
([Ice in glass])
kad svetlo odnela sii,prati me samo tamaa
([Switch click] - klik) ([Dark pad] - oooo)

[Female]
Lako ludim gubim dah 
On mi nudi beli prah,pa nam sad zastaje dah (pa zastaje dah)
([Heartbeat speed up] - thump-thump-thump → [Stop hit] - THUD)
Jako ljubim tražim trag štiklom gazim
on je nag ,  naga sam i ja
([Kiss fx] - smk) ([Sheet rustle] - fffsh))

[Male]
Fatalnijaa,Kad je smelija
([Sub growl])
Mame me njene usne boje cherria
([Lip smack])
K’o dijamant,sija ovaj grad
([Shimmer])
gorelo je tlo koji si se šetala
([Fire crackle] - tsss) ([Heel echo] - tak…tak…)

[Female vocal - Male backvocal]
Olala ee
([Adlib distant] - olalaa)
ti trošiš dolare
([Note flick] - shff)
(ona to znala jee)
([Whisper echo] - znala je…)
pa zato sam si ej
([Heel on tile] - tak)
tako mlada, muvao me
([Snap] - snap)
na precizne nišane
([Laser ping] - pip)
Lovom kupio bi me
([Cash slap] - flap)
Bez nje ne bi prišao,nee
([Echo fade] - prišao…nee…)

[Male]
Ovaj čivas ima leta isto k’o i ti
([Liquid swirl] - shhh)
ko bi reko da je s’ klinkom ljubav dobro voditi?
([Laugh low] - heh)
kad baratam s’ tobom bebo k’o da držim dinamit,koji me svake sekunde u delove može razneti
([Fuse sizzle] - sssss) ([Mini explosion] - boom)
Pomozi bože da je se ne setiiim
([Breath strain] - haaah)
Miris njene koožee,ko da me progoniii
([Haunting pad] - ooooh)
A nešto lošee uvek se dogodi
([Low tom roll] - dum-dum-dum)
Kad si u kavezu a pričaš o slobodi
([Metal bars] - klang-klang)

---

# hardcore_pop - Llamelecca- Hardcore_Pop_4
[DESCRIPTION]
bouny undeground slap club tech Turkish oriental pop ,  car honks, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Male]
Pomozi bože da je se ne setiiim
([Breath heavy] - haaah)
Miris njene koožee,ko da me progoniii
([Ghostly pad] - ooooh)
A nešto lošee uvek se dogodi
([Sub-bass rumble] - rrrrr)
Kad si u kavezu a pričaš o slobodi
([Chain rattle] - klang-klang)

[Female]
Ja sam gola,voda lije
([Shower stream] - shhhhhh)
malo zgodna puno pijem
ko se od nas tu sad krije
zaveden si,žao mi je
([Soft laugh] - heh)
sa njim sve je fa-talnije
sa njim stalno dame dvije
Vec je kasno,pola tri je
U očima pao mi je
([Heartbeat drop] - thump…THUMP)

[Male]
Olala ee
([Crowd murmur] - mmmrum)
ja trošim dolare
([Cash flick] - fffsh)
ona to znala jee
([Whisper] - znala je…)
pa zato sama je
([Heel step] - tak-tak)
mala muvala me
([Finger snap] - snap)
na precizne nišane
([Laser sight] - piiip)
Lovom kupio jee
([Coin drop] - cling)
Bez nje ne bi prišla,nee
([Echo] - prišla…nee)

[Female]
Soba naša postajee
([Air swell] - fffsh)
laganije vrelijaa
([Heat wave] - whooom)
Spremna sam i postajeeem
([Breath close] - haaah)
Polako opuštenija
([Cloth slide] - shff)


[Male]
neću te zvati shvati, ne posle
bromazepama
([Pill rattle] - chk-chk)
za sve hvala ti
([Door thud] - thud)
a ti pati sad si sasvim sama
([Room reverb] - mmm)
Ja još sam lud u čaši al’fali mi crna dama
([Ice in glass] - clink-clink)
kad svetlo odnela sii,prati me samo tamaa
([Switch click] - klik) ([Dark pad] - oooo)

[Female]
Lako ludim gubim dah On mi nudi beli prah,pa nam sad zastaje dah (pa zastaje dah)
([Heartbeat speed up] - thump-thump-thump → [Stop hit] - THUD)
Jako ljubim trazim trag stiglom gazim on je nag (naga sam i ja
([Kiss fx] - smk) ([Sheet rustle] - fffsh))

[Male]
Fatalnijaa,Kad je smelija
([Sub growl] - rrrrr)
Mame me njene usne boje cherria
([Lip smack] - *pop*)
K’o dijamant,sija ovaj grad
([Shimmer] - tinkleee)
gorelo je tlo koji si se šetala
([Fire crackle] - tsss) ([Heel echo] - tak…tak…)

[Female vocal - Male backvocal]
Olala ee
([Adlib distant] - olalaa)
ti trošiš dolare
([Note flick] - shff)
(ona to znala jee)
([Whisper echo] - znala je…)
pa zato sam si ej
([Heel on tile] - tak)
tako mlada, muvao me
([Snap] - snap)
na precizne nišane
([Laser ping] - pip)
Lovom kupio bi me
([Cash slap] - flap)
Bez nje ne bi prišao,nee
([Echo fade] - prišao…nee…)

[Male]
Ovaj čivas ima leta isto k’o i ti
([Liquid swirl] - shhh)
ko bi reko da je s’ klinkom ljubav dobro voditi?
([Laugh low] - heh)
kad baratam s’ tobom bebo k’o da držim dinamit,koji me svake sekunde u delove može razneti
([Fuse sizzle] - sssss) ([Mini explosion] - boom)
Pomozi bože da je se ne setiiim
([Breath strain] - haaah)
Miris njene koožee,ko da me progoniii
([Haunting pad] - ooooh)
A nešto lošee uvek se dogodi
([Low tom roll] - dum-dum-dum)
Kad si u kavezu a pričaš o slobodi
([Metal bars] - klang-klang)

# hardcore_pop - Llamelecca- Hardcore_Pop_9
[DESCRIPTION]
at 125bpm bouncy undeground slap club tech Turkish zurne, cathederal organ, echo, oriental pop ,  car honks, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Male]
Pomozi bože da je se ne setiiim
Miris njene koožee,ko da me progoniii
A nešto lošee uvek se do-go-di
Kad si u kavezu a pričaš o slobodi

[Female]
Ja sam gola,voda lije
malo zgodna puno pijem
ko se od nas tu sad krije
zaveden si,žao mi je
sa njim sve je fa-ta-lnije
sa njim stalno dame dvije
Već je kasno,pola tri je
U očima pao mi je

[Male]
Olala ee
ja trošim dolare
ona to znala jee
pa zato sama je
mala muvala me
na precizne nišane
Lovom kupio jee
Bez nje ne bi prišla,nee

[Female]
Soba naša postajee
laganije vrelijaa
Spremna sam i postajeeem
Polako opuštenija


[Male]
neću te zvati shvati, ne posle
bromazepama
za sve hvala ti
a ti pati sad si sasvim sama
Ja još sam lud u čaši al’fali mi crna dama
kad svetlo odnela sii,prati me samo tamaa

[Female]
Lako ludim gubim dah 
On mi nudi beli prah,pa nam sad zastaje dah (pa zastaje dah)
Jako ljubim tražim trag štiklom gazim
on je nag ,  naga sam i ja

[Male]
Fatalnijaa,Kad je smelija
Mame me njene usne boje cherria
K’o dijamant,sija ovaj grad
gorelo je tlo kojim si se šetala

[Female vocal - Male backvocal]
Olala ee
ti trošiš dolare
(ona to znala jee)
pa zato sam si ej
tako mlada, muvao me
na precizne nišane
Lovom kupio bi me
Bez nje ne bi prišao,nee
([Echo fade] - prišao…nee…)

[Male]
Ovaj čivas ima leta isto k’o i ti
ko bi reko da je s’ klinkom ljubav dobro voditi?
kad baratam s’ tobom bebo k’o da držim dinamit,koji me svake sekunde u delove može razneti
Pomozi bože da je se ne setiiim
Miris njene koožee,ko da me progoniii
A nešto lošee uvek se dogodi
Kad si u kavezu a pričaš o slobodi

---

# hardcore_pop - Llamelecca_Hardcore_Pop_14
[DESCRIPTION]
at 125bpm bouncy reggaetón  club tech Turkish zurne, cathederal organ,  80s midi synthesizer, , echo, oriental pop, car honks, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Male]
Pomozi bože da je se ne setiiim
([Breath heavy])
Miris njene koožee,ko da me progoniii
([Ghostly pad])
A nešto lošee uvek se dogodi
([Sub-bass rumble])
Kad si u kavezu a pričaš o slobodi
([Chain rattle])

[Female]
Ja sam gola,voda lije
([Shower stream] - shhhhhh)
malo zgodna puno pijem
ko se od nas tu sad krije
zaveden si,žao mi je
([Soft laugh] - heh)
sa njim sve je fa-talnije
sa njim stalno dame dvije
Već je kasno,pola tri je
U očima pao mi je
([Heartbeat drop] )

[Male]
Olala ee
([Crowd murmur] - mmmrum)
ja trošim dolare
([Cash flick] - fffsh)
ona to znala jee
([Whisper] - znala je…)
pa zato sama je
([Heel step] - tak-tak)
mala muvala me
([Finger snap] - snap)
na precizne nišane
([Laser sight] - piiip)
Lovom kupio jee
([Coin drop] - cling)
Bez nje ne bi prišla,nee
([Echo] - prišla…nee)

[Female]
Soba naša postajee
([Air swell] - fffsh)
laganije vrelijaa
([Heat wave] - whooom)
Spremna sam i postajeeem
([Breath close] - haaah)
Polako opuštenija
([Cloth slide] - shff)


[Male]
neću te zvati shvati, ne posle
bromazepama
([Pill rattle] - chk-chk)
za sve hvala ti
([Door thud])
a ti pati sad si sasvim sama
([Room reverb] - mmm)
Ja još sam lud u čaši al’fali mi crna dama
([Ice in glass])
kad svetlo odnela sii,prati me samo tamaa
([Switch click] - klik) ([Dark pad] - oooo)

[Female]
Lako ludim gubim dah 
On mi nudi beli prah,pa nam sad zastaje dah (pa zastaje dah)
([Heartbeat speed up] - thump-thump-thump → [Stop hit] - THUD)
Jako ljubim tražim trag štiklom gazim
on je nag ,  naga sam i ja
([Kiss fx] - smk) ([Sheet rustle] - fffsh))

[Male]
Fatalnijaa,Kad je smelija
([Sub growl])
Mame me njene usne boje cherria
([Lip smack])
K’o dijamant,sija ovaj grad
([Shimmer])
gorelo je tlo koji si se šetala
([Fire crackle] - tsss) ([Heel echo] - tak…tak…)

[Female vocal - Male backvocal]
Olala ee
([Adlib distant] - olalaa)
ti trošiš dolare
([Note flick] - shff)
(ona to znala jee)
([Whisper echo] - znala je…)
pa zato sam si ej
([Heel on tile] - tak)
tako mlada, muvao me
([Snap] - snap)
na precizne nišane
([Laser ping] - pip)
Lovom kupio bi me
([Cash slap] - flap)
Bez nje ne bi prišao,nee
([Echo fade] - prišao…nee…)

[Male]
Ovaj čivas ima leta isto k’o i ti
([Liquid swirl] - shhh)
ko bi reko da je s’ klinkom ljubav dobro voditi?
([Laugh low] - heh)
kad baratam s’ tobom bebo k’o da držim dinamit,koji me svake sekunde u delove može razneti
([Fuse sizzle] - sssss) ([Mini explosion] - boom)
Pomozi bože da je se ne setiiim
([Breath strain] - haaah)
Miris njene koožee,ko da me progoniii
([Haunting pad] - ooooh)
A nešto lošee uvek se dogodi
([Low tom roll] - dum-dum-dum)
Kad si u kavezu a pričaš o slobodi
([Metal bars] - klang-klang)

---

# hardcore_pop - Lovacc_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
A reggaeton-house hybrid at 128 BPM, anchored by dembow kick-kick-snare syncopation and rolling timbale, cowbell, and partido-inspired percussion. Sub-bass mirrors reggae’s halftime roots vibe, locking with house kicks. Detuned saw synths and street atmospheres build, peaking with filtered dembow and shouts before a drop packing layered house claps and perreo offbeat bass. Minor-key Latin changes and Spanish vocal hooks intensify the groove; breakdown pares back to dembow and vox, then explodes back in with punchy, clear low end and club crossover energy.

[LYRICS]
**[Female - Verse 1]**
A kad ti mene loviš
Moraš bolje
Znam da znaš šta treba
Ajde
Bolje
Ajde
Reci šta hoćeš
Nemoj da te vučem za jezik
Ne znaš šta propuštaš
Al' saznaćeš
 
**[Male & Female - Chorus]**
Pecam te
Lovi me
Tvoja sam!
Možda i ne...
A ne ne
Čekaš me
Moja si
Loviš me
 
**[Female - Verse 2]**
Ti bi da ti dođem
A ja ne bih
Al' kad me gledaš tako
Možda dođem
Mada
Gledaj da požuriš
Jer ja sam tip danas tu
sutra sama me juriš
Možda ćeš me stići
Al' požuri
 
**[Male & Female - Chorus]**
Pecam te
Lovi me
Tvoja sam!
Možda i ne...
A ne ne
Čekaš me
Moja si
Loviš me

**[Female - Bridge, Male backing vocals]**
Znaš da mi je zabranjeno
Da želim tebe sada
al srce kad je slomljeno
(svačemu se ono nada)

**[Male - Vocal, Female answers]**
Ti želiš mene
(Ne pravi se da ne želiš)
Da
Ti želiš mene (O da da)

**[Female - Pre-Chorus]**
Uvek prvi pišeš "Hej"
Voliš moju igru
Znam
To što gledaš me u oči
Znači da bi ti me sad
 
**[Male & Female - Build-up]**
Tvoja želja sam
Znam

Znam

# hardcore_pop - Lovacc_Hardcore_Pop_10
[DESCRIPTION]
At 135 bpm, this tech house track opens with processed vocal textures and evolving white noise shaping tension before crisp claps and dynamic hand drum fills ignite the groove. Gritty bass joins with warped FM synth lines, while bold, panned tribal riffs add depth. In the breakdown, a modal trumpet jams atop interlocked organ runs; after, the drop hits with jungle-style vocals, addictive chopped samples, soaring cathedral chants, and wide swirling echoes. The zurle glides in and out, shape-shifting in the mix, while hypnotic rhythmic layers, percussion, and deep bass drive a relentless, textured dancefloor peak.

[LYRICS]

# hardcore_pop - Lovacc_Hardcore_Pop_11
[DESCRIPTION]
High-energy rap-slap house fusion characterized by pulsating basslines and infectious 4/4 rhythms, Hyper-processed vocal delivery blends streetwise rap flows with sultry autotuned hooks, creating a shadowy yet sensual vibe, The track penetrates with deep, rubbery bass drops and electronic percussion, while maintaining an underground club authenticity, Captivating dancefloor anthem with bouncy grooves and hypnotic synth layers, perfect for late-night sessions and party-ready vibes, Mastering Chain & Reference - target -8 LUFS integrated (club), True Peak -0, 3dB; CHAIN: corrective EQ (dip 250–500Hz -1, 5–2, 5dB) → multiband comp (tighten 60–200Hz / glue mids) → subtle tape sat +1, 2–2dB → stereo imager (mono <200Hz) → final limiter ceiling -0, 3dB → dither 24→16 bit, NOTES: send master -2 to -3dB headroom pre-limit; verify on club PA and earbuds, *]

# hardcore_pop - Lovacc_Hardcore_Pop_6
[DESCRIPTION]
At 135 bpm, a tech house beat ignites with syncopated Balkan percussion, crisp claps, and agile hand drum fills. A growling bass anchors raw, staccato synths and swirling, gypsy-inflected trumpets panned for dynamic motion. The breakdown showcases modal, sultry melodies before an explosive, driving drop.

[LYRICS]

# hardcore_pop - Lovacc_Hardcore_Pop_7
[DESCRIPTION]
A 135 bpm tech house groove launches with syncopated Balkan percussion, crisp claps, and intricate hand drum fills. A gritty bass locks with sharp staccato synth stabs, while swirling, panned American trumpets fuel motion. The breakdown unveils modal, sultry melodies and weaving organ lines, then bursts into a propulsive drop with jungle-inspired chopped vocal textures and layered organic sounds for maximum dancefloor energy.

# hardcore_pop - Lovacc_Hardcore_Pop_9
[DESCRIPTION]
A 135 bpm tech house track opens with syncopated percussion, crisp claps, and dynamic hand drum fills driving the groove. Gritty bass and clipped synth stabs intertwine as bold, panned tribal riffs slice through. The breakdown features modal trumpet over interlocked organ runs, then a drop erupts with jungle-influenced vocals, catchy chopped samples, cathedral chants, and swirling echoes. The zurle ebbs and flows, warping in the mix, as hypnotic, addictively rhythmic layers propel the relentless dancefloor finale.

# hardcore_pop - Lovacc_Hardcore_Pop_X
[DESCRIPTION]
This 150 BPM Balkan-EDM hybrid ignites the dancefloor from first note. Zurne wails cut through pounding 4/4 kicks and sidechained subs. The original melancholic melody is twisted into a glitched, robotic synth lead, soaring over seismic bass. Fiery distorted brass stabs and processed vocal chops create a relentless, non-stop percussive assault. Momentary filtered-kick breaths allow short relief, but the energy never drops. Granular vocal manipulation, pitch shifts, and stereo FX give depth and chaos. The track blends traditional Balkan soul with modern EDM fury, designed as a continuous, unrelenting floor-dominating weapon with maximum DJ mixability and instant crowd impact.

[LYRICS]
**[Female - Verse 1]**

# hardcore_pop - Lovacc_Hardcore_Pop_XIII
[DESCRIPTION]
Slap house(155BPM):Saturated 808 sub@45Hz+harm excite.Syncopated kick layers+sidechain 4:1/20ms attack.TB-303 acid saw+res sweep 30-85%+LFO 1/16sync.Hypnotic vox"padam boj nespokoj"autotune+tape delay 1/8dot.Triplet hats 16%swing+relentless groove.White noise risers+rev cymbals.Build(150→155BPM/16b):Acid chromatic rise+tube sat.Percussion fills+offbeat claps.BG vox"ona kush mi sushi"±12st+chorus.Drop(155BPM/32b):24-layer spectrum.FM perc 2:1+3.5:1 alt L/R.Acid mirror+octave displacement.Call-response"gle sata gle kola"spatial movement.Tape A800 saturation+opto comp 3:1.Break(145BPM/16b):Notch 80-200Hz+stereo narrow 40%.Rev piano maj7+cathedral verb.Sparse claps.Choir chops granular.Outro(155→140BPM/32b):Sequential dropout.Acid→sine sub mono<80Hz.Final vox"pala sve moje testove"granular 150ms+LP fade 2k→200Hz exp.

[LYRICS]

Ajde

# hardcore_pop - Love Language_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
summer fast edm slap house club banger, melodic chorus, each verse brings a change of atmosphere and vibe, harmony with backvocals, put accent on duplex,

[LYRICS]
[Verse]
Say you're down
Got me lifted
Feel like I'm missin' something
Won't be the one that you missin' now
We locked in
That's where it all begins
The stories of your eyes
The ones we never write
So if you wanna make me cry
Do it on your time
Keep it on the inside
And if you wanna break my heart
Just keep it in the dark
I don't wanna hear you

[Chorus]
Don't talk
Don't talk
Just move
And we don't stop
All night
Don't talk
Don't talk
Just move
And we don't stop
All night

[Verse 2]
Makin' me work for it
Take me to church for it
I'm the one you sin for
Never seen you beg for it
It ain't a secret
You don't keep it
I've never been the same
Since you called my name
And if you wanna make me cry
Do it on your time
Keep it on the inside
And if you wanna break my heart
Just keep it in the dark
I don't wanna hear you

And we don't stop

# hardcore_pop - Love Language_Hardcore_Pop_2
[DESCRIPTION]
An 140 bpm uk organ bassline charva hypnotic underground house track , zurna, organ,80s synth, cowbells, ancient harp, car siren, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals, powerful beat,minor keys (Cm/Gm), Male A2–C4 baritone; Female G3–A5 alto/mezzo, Tight, rhythmic delivery; subtle tuning, Comp 3–6 dB GR; cut 200–350 Hz; add 3–5 kHz presence, 10–12 kHz air, Short plate, tempo-synced delays; natural, deep, clubby vibe

[LYRICS]
[Verse]
Say you're down
([Breath inhale close] - haaah)
Got me lifted
([Sub rise] - rrrrrr)
Feel like I'm missin' something
([Vinyl crackle] - pftcrackle)
Won't be the one that you missin' now
([Finger snap] - snap)
We locked in
([Door latch] - klik)
That's where it all begins
([Kick soft] - boom)
The stories of your eyes
([Heartbeat] - thumpthump)
The ones we never write
([Pen scratch distant] - skrit-skrit)
So if you wanna make me cry
([Tear drop] - plip)
Do it on your time
([Clock tick] - tik-tik)
Keep it on the inside
([Muffled pad] - ooo)
And if you wanna break my heart
([Glass hairline crack] - krik)
Just keep it in the dark
([Light switch] - clk)
I don't wanna hear you
([Reverse tail] - whooom)

[Chorus]
Don't talk
([Finger to lips] - shhh)
Don't talk
([Snap] - snap)
Just move
([Foot slide] - shff)
And we don't stop
([Kick + clap] - boom-clap)
All night
([Night hum] - mmmmmm)

([Hi-hat tick] - tss)
Don't talk
([Breath exhale] - haaah)
Just move
([Body roll / cloth] - fffsh)
And we don't stop

([Echo] - night…night)

[Verse 2]

# hardcore_pop - Love Language_Hardcore_Pop_3
[DESCRIPTION]
underground house track ,dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals, powerful beat,minor keys (Cm/Gm), Male A2–C4 baritone; Female G3–A5 alto/mezzo, Tight, rhythmic delivery; subtle tuning, Comp 3–6 dB GR; cut 200–350 Hz; add 3–5 kHz presence, 10–12 kHz air, Short plate, tempo-synced delays; natural, clubby vibe

# hardcore_pop - Luccifer_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
A dark, atmospheric tech-house/bass-house track built around a steady 124–126 BPM pulse and a deep, sidechained sub that breathes under a sharp, punchy kick. The groove stays hypnotic and minimal, driven by crisp 1/8 hats, tight clap/snare hybrids, and metallic percussive accents that evoke infernal tension. Sinister synth stabs, FM bass swells, and filtered plucks create a haunted dance-floor atmosphere, while low cathedral-like pads add a religious–ritualistic darkness. The vocal is a close, intimate baritone delivered in a whispered, confessional tone—mostly dry, with selective slap delays and long reverb throws that bloom on key emotional words. The drops widen into full bass-house energy with rhythmic stabs and heavy low-end movement, contrasting the verses’ sparse tension. The overall mood is seductive, supernatural, and pulsing, blending club energy with a cinematic sense of damnation and salvation.

[LYRICS]
[GlobalMix–Dark tech-house/bass-house ~124–126 BPM.Deep sub(40–60 Hz) in mono,sidechained 4–6 dB to a sharp punchy kick.Kick:short transient,solid 55–70 Hz thump.Snare/clap hybrid:2–3 layers,body at 180–220 Hz,crack 4–6 kHz.Hats:1/8 main pulse,1/16 rolls only for tension;HPF>300 Hz.Perks metallic,low rumble FX,rattles,devilish breath glitches.Bass:distorted but controlled,saw+FM hybrid,tight envelope for groove.Synths:dark techno stabs,repeating minor hook,filtered plucks,heavy lowpass automation.Pads:low eerie choirs,cathedral-like reverb tails.Vocal:male baritone,whisper-dark,intimate,slightly raspy,close-mic.Dry with slap delay;reverb only on throws.Ad-libs ghostly,quiet,harmonies minimal.Master:-7 to -6.5 LUFS,brickwall -0.9 dB,wide stereo mids,mono sub.]

[Structure–Intro(8 bars groove+filtered stabs)->Verse1->PreChorus(riser+pad lift)->Chorus(drop with full drums+bass)->Verse2->Chorus->Verse3->Final Chorus->Outro(filter down).]

[Verse 1]

She told me she was a saint
([VoxClose]-dry intimate baritone)
The night before was hell
([FXEmber]-crackling fire texture)
My baby ain't no angel
([HarmonyLow]-dark whisper under “angel”)
She got wings but they are red
([PadChoirLow]-cathedral pad swell)
And the devil's horned head
([StabSynth]-short techno stab L/R)
So won't you come and save her
([SubDrop]-low hit to transition)

[Chorus]

The lord knows
([VoxWide]-stereo double + long reverb throw)
I tried so
([Delay1/4]-medium feedback)
Help me save my soul
([PadLift]-chorus bloom;sidechain pad;full drums enter)

[Verse 2]

I swore I knew her well
([VoxClose]-tight proximity)
'Til the horns started to show
([FXHorns]-metallic resonance)
And her wings turned blood red
([ReverseReverb]-swell into “red”)
Now I'm lost and I don't know
([BassPulse]-short FM pulses)
So I went to Lucifer
([FXLowGrowl]-sub vibration)
And I begged him for my baby back
([ChordStab]-syncopated tech stab)

[Chorus]

The lord knows
([VoxWider]-slightly broader stereo)
I tried so
([DelayDotted]-haunting tail)
Help me save my soul
([BassFull]-full bass-house groove drops)

[Verse 3]

There's fire all around
([FXFlames]-wide panned crackle)
And I'm stuck here with her
([VoxDoubleLight]-soft whisper double)
While I'm listening to that sound
([PercRattle]-shaker+rattle FX)
As she sings me her sweet song
([HarmonyAir]-high ghost pad)
But my mind tells me I'm wrong
([ReverseTail]-dark sweep)
And I'm staring at the ground
([SubSlideDown]-falling sub note)

[Chorus – Final]

The lord knows
([VoxEpic]-wider;stronger pad support)
I tried so
([Delay1/4]-centered lift)
Help me save my soul
([BassHit]-strongest drop;open hats;full groove)

[Outro]

([FilterLP]-drums+stabs fade)
([PadGhost]-choir pad swelling then dissolving)
([SubFade]-low end slowly disappears)
([TapeEnd]-soft tape-stop last beat)

---

# hardcore_pop - Matiscnjacc_1
[DESCRIPTION]
The track fuses tech-house and UK drill, driven by deep 808s and rapid, stuttering hi-hats atop rumbling, distorted rolling basslines. Eerie cyborg synths float throughout, underlining verses with pitch-shifted robotic autotune vocals. Explosive drops unleash waves of low-end bass punch, maintaining relentless club intensity.

[LYRICS]
Intro, Haunting synths, slow drum build-up]
[Whispered vocals
[Main vocal]:
"Pruga duga, šine hladne,
Vuk i Gorila, nozdrve im gladne."

[Verse 1, Gorila's Perspective]
Zvoni telefon, Gorila zna već ko je,
Miriše na kurijaka, nepoznati broj je.
Smeje se Gorila, uze kesicu da pakuje,
Džabe ovo merim njemu pet komada malo je

Prodao je kola, brzo neće moći doći,
Vuk zavija na mesec, pita ko će mu pomoći.
Al' Gorila ne čeka, nego krenu odmah peške,
Korak prati korak, kroz kilometre teške

[Chorus]
GORILA STARA NOSI KESICE KA GRADU
VUK JE POVUKO, AL NE GUBI NADU
SREĆA STIŽE, NOZDRVE SPREMI
KORAČAMO PRUGOM KA POSLEDNJOJ ŠEMI

[Verse 2, Vuk's Perspective]
Kurijak prosečan, na vreme je stao,
Ali za ovog kurijaka 5 grama je malo,
NIkad nije bio isti al je uvek bio borac,
Njegove su nozdrve spreman maratonac,

"GO-RI-LI-ZACIJA na putu pruge,
STiŽu siluete da rešavaju se tuge,
Vreme da se šine sada u duetu
Astralna projekcija mi je ušla u petu


[Chorus]
GORILA STARA NOSI KESICE KA GRADU
VUK JE POVUKO, AL NE GUBI NADU
SREĆA STIŽE, NOZDRVE SPREMI
KORAČAMO PRUGOM KA POSLEDNJOJ ŠEMI

[Bridge, Atmospheric sounds, low bass hits]
Vuk i Gorila, kombinacija iz snova,
Noćnu školu prolaze do masterskih diploma.
Grad i šumu spajaju, šine stare pruge,
Brzina u venama i zimske noći duge.

[Verse 3, Gorila's Reflection]
Korak po korak, šmrčem debeo i gorak,
Kesice u džepu, misli lete mi u oblak,
Korak po korak, vadim ruke iz džepa,
Kurijak na putu sa osmehom ko gepard

Stara fabrika šapuće i ponekad viče,
Beton je zašumio, al’ još se čuju priče.
Gorila se smeši, lepu količinu nosi,
Pozdravlja se s vukom, koji sprema se da kosi

[Chorus]
Gorila i pruga, dobro se znajuu,
Šine vode priče, ka vukovom kraju.
Kesice u rukama, misli kroz tamu,
Brzina nas vodi, u trećem danu.

[Verse 4, Vuk’s Determination]
Vuk na prozoru, oči traže senku,
Gorila šalje poruku: "Stižem, nosim ti zdenku."
"Mokro je k’o more, moraš malo posušiti,
Nemoj sve povući, k’o džukela ćeš se ušiti."

Zvuci koraka iz mraka, prestaje tišina,
Gorila stiže, s njim dolazi brzina.
"Noć tek je krenula, sad je pravi čas,"
Vuk i Gorila, šire nozdrve za nas.

Gorila i pruga, dobro se znajuu,
Šine vode priče, ka vukovom kraju.
Kesice u rukama, misli kroz tamu,
Brzina nas vodi, u trećem danu.

[Outro, Fading beat, ambient noises of city and jungle]
Šine stare priče, svetla grada blede,
Vuk i Gorila, vuku linije ko grede.
Noć se spušta, naša priča još traje,
Pruga nas spaja, bratstvo nam ne staje.
[Whispered vocals

---

# hardcore_pop - Matiscnjacc_1
[DESCRIPTION]
Deep 808s, hard-hitting UK drill hi-hats, distorted rolling basslines, relentless hypnotic tech-house fusion, eerie cyborg synths, pitch-shifted robotic autotune vocals, explosive drops, low-end bass punch

[LYRICS]
Intro, Haunting synths, slow drum build-up]
[Whispered vocals
[Main vocal]:
"Pruga duga, šine hladne,
Vuk i Gorila, nozdrve im gladne."

[Verse 1, Gorila's Perspective]
Zvoni telefon, Gorila zna već ko je,
Miriše na kurijaka, nepoznati broj je.
Smeje se Gorila, uze kesicu da pakuje,
Džabe ovo merim njemu pet komada malo je

Prodao je kola, brzo neće moći doći,
Vuk zavija na mesec, pita ko će mu pomoći.
Al' Gorila ne čeka, nego krenu odmah peške,
Korak prati korak, kroz kilometre teške

[Chorus]
GORILA STARA NOSI KESICE KA GRADU
VUK JE POVUKO, AL NE GUBI NADU
SREĆA STIŽE, NOZDRVE SPREMI
KORAČAMO PRUGOM KA POSLEDNJOJ ŠEMI

[Verse 2, Vuk's Perspective]
Kurijak prosečan, na vreme je stao,
Ali za ovog kurijaka 5 grama je malo,
NIkad nije bio isti al je uvek bio borac,
Njegove su nozdrve spreman maratonac,

"GO-RI-LI-ZACIJA na putu pruge,
STiŽu siluete da rešavaju se tuge,
Vreme da se šine sada u duetu
Astralna projekcija mi je ušla u petu


[Chorus]
GORILA STARA NOSI KESICE KA GRADU
VUK JE POVUKO, AL NE GUBI NADU
SREĆA STIŽE, NOZDRVE SPREMI
KORAČAMO PRUGOM KA POSLEDNJOJ ŠEMI

[Bridge, Atmospheric sounds, low bass hits]
Vuk i Gorila, kombinacija iz snova,
Noćnu školu prolaze do masterskih diploma.
Grad i šumu spajaju, šine stare pruge,
Brzina u venama i zimske noći duge.

[Verse 3, Gorila's Reflection]
Korak po korak, šmrčem debeo i gorak,
Kesice u džepu, misli lete mi u oblak,
Korak po korak, vadim ruke iz džepa,
Kurijak na putu sa osmehom ko gepard

Stara fabrika šapuće i ponekad viče,
Beton je zašumio, al’ još se čuju priče.
Gorila se smeši, lepu količinu nosi,
Pozdravlja se s vukom, koji sprema se da kosi

[Chorus]
Gorila i pruga, dobro se znajuu,
Šine vode priče, ka vukovom kraju.
Kesice u rukama, misli kroz tamu,
Brzina nas vodi, u trećem danu.

[Verse 4, Vuk’s Determination]
Vuk na prozoru, oči traže senku,
Gorila šalje poruku: "Stižem, nosim ti zdenku."
"Mokro je k’o more, moraš malo posušiti,
Nemoj sve povući, k’o džukela ćeš se ušiti."

Zvuci koraka iz mraka, prestaje tišina,
Gorila stiže, s njim dolazi brzina.
"Noć tek je krenula, sad je pravi čas,"
Vuk i Gorila, šire nozdrve za nas.

Gorila i pruga, dobro se znajuu,
Šine vode priče, ka vukovom kraju.
Kesice u rukama, misli kroz tamu,
Brzina nas vodi, u trećem danu.

[Outro, Fading beat, ambient noises of city and jungle]
Šine stare priče, svetla grada blede,
Vuk i Gorila, vuku linije ko grede.
Noć se spušta, naša priča još traje,
Pruga nas spaja, bratstvo nam ne staje.
[Whispered vocals

# hardcore_pop - Matiscnjacc_1 (Remastered)
[DESCRIPTION]
The track fuses tech-house and UK drill, driven by deep 808s and rapid, stuttering hi-hats atop rumbling, distorted rolling basslines. Eerie cyborg synths float throughout, underlining verses with pitch-shifted robotic autotune vocals. Explosive drops unleash waves of low-end bass punch, maintaining relentless club intensity.

[LYRICS]
Intro, Haunting synths, slow drum build-up]
[Whispered vocals
[Main vocal]:
"Pruga duga, šine hladne,
Vuk i Gorila, nozdrve im gladne."

[Verse 1, Gorila's Perspective]
Zvoni telefon, Gorila zna već ko je,
Miriše na kurijaka, nepoznati broj je.
Smeje se Gorila, uze kesicu da pakuje,
Džabe ovo merim njemu pet komada malo je

Prodao je kola, brzo neće moći doći,
Vuk zavija na mesec, pita ko će mu pomoći.
Al' Gorila ne čeka, nego krenu odmah peške,
Korak prati korak, kroz kilometre teške

[Chorus]
GORILA STARA NOSI KESICE KA GRADU
VUK JE POVUKO, AL NE GUBI NADU
SREĆA STIŽE, NOZDRVE SPREMI
KORAČAMO PRUGOM KA POSLEDNJOJ ŠEMI

[Verse 2, Vuk's Perspective]
Kurijak prosečan, na vreme je stao,
Ali za ovog kurijaka 5 grama je malo,
NIkad nije bio isti al je uvek bio borac,
Njegove su nozdrve spreman maratonac,

"GO-RI-LI-ZACIJA na putu pruge,
STiŽu siluete da rešavaju se tuge,
Vreme da se šine sada u duetu
Astralna projekcija mi je ušla u petu


[Chorus]
GORILA STARA NOSI KESICE KA GRADU
VUK JE POVUKO, AL NE GUBI NADU
SREĆA STIŽE, NOZDRVE SPREMI
KORAČAMO PRUGOM KA POSLEDNJOJ ŠEMI

[Bridge, Atmospheric sounds, low bass hits]
Vuk i Gorila, kombinacija iz snova,
Noćnu školu prolaze do masterskih diploma.
Grad i šumu spajaju, šine stare pruge,
Brzina u venama i zimske noći duge.

[Verse 3, Gorila's Reflection]
Korak po korak, šmrčem debeo i gorak,
Kesice u džepu, misli lete mi u oblak,
Korak po korak, vadim ruke iz džepa,
Kurijak na putu sa osmehom ko gepard

Stara fabrika šapuće i ponekad viče,
Beton je zašumio, al’ još se čuju priče.
Gorila se smeši, lepu količinu nosi,
Pozdravlja se s vukom, koji sprema se da kosi

[Chorus]
Gorila i pruga, dobro se znajuu,
Šine vode priče, ka vukovom kraju.
Kesice u rukama, misli kroz tamu,
Brzina nas vodi, u trećem danu.

[Verse 4, Vuk’s Determination]
Vuk na prozoru, oči traže senku,
Gorila šalje poruku: "Stižem, nosim ti zdenku."
"Mokro je k’o more, moraš malo posušiti,
Nemoj sve povući, k’o džukela ćeš se ušiti."

Gorila stiže, s njim dolazi brzina.

Vuk i Gorila, šire nozdrve za nas.

Šine vode priče, ka vukovom kraju.

# hardcore_pop - Matiscnjacc_11
[DESCRIPTION]
([Track] - [Deep 808s, distorted rolling basslines, hard-hitting UK drill hi-hats fused with relentless tech-house 4-on-the-floor groove])
([Drums] - [tight punchy kick, sharp snare, UK drill hat patterns, explosive snare/hat builds before drops])
([Bass] - [rolling, slightly distorted 808 lines with heavy low-end punch, glide accents on key words])
([Synths] - [eerie cyborg pads and leads, metallic textures, occasional 90s-club stabs])
([Vocals] - [pitch-shifted robotic autotune leads, processed whispers, occasional crew chants, aggressive but clear delivery])
([Drops] - [big transitions into choruses/late verses with full bass and drum impact, then strip back for verses])

[LYRICS]
[Intro, Haunting synths, slow drum build-up]
([Beat] - [slow 4-on-the-floor, muted kick, distant snare, sparse hats])
([Synths] - [eerie cyborg pad, slowly opening filter])
([FX] - [rail ambience + subtle vinyl noise])

[Whispered vocals]
([Whisper FX] - [L/R, heavy processing, long robotic reverb])
[Main vocal]:
"Pruga duga, šine hladne,
Vuk i Gorila, nozdrve im gladne."
([Reverse sweep] - [whoosh into first verse, bass swell])

[Verse 1, Gorila's Perspective]
([Beat] - [deep 808, soft UK drill hats, distant clap/snare])
Zvoni telefon, Gorila zna već ko je,
([Phone FX] - [glitchy ring, filtered under kick])
Miriše na kurijaka, nepoznati broj je.
([Bass] - [short distorted roll under „broj je“])
Smeje se Gorila, uze kesicu da pakuje,
([Vox FX] - [low robotic chuckle])
Džabe ovo merim njemu pet komada malo je
([808] - [long glide on „malo je“, tail in next bar])

Prodao je kola, brzo neće moći doći,
([Hats] - [extra closed hats, light swing])
Vuk zavija na mesec, pita ko će mu pomoći.
([FX] - [processed wolf howl + short cyborg stab])
Al' Gorila ne čeka, nego krenu odmah peške,
([Perc] - [rim/clicks like footsteps])
Korak prati korak, kroz kilometre teške
([FX] - [rail rumble + low whoosh])

[Chorus]
([Build] - [snare/hat roll + riser, then drop])
GORILA STARA NOSI KESICE KA GRADU
([Drop] - [full drums, rolling distorted bass on „GRADU“])
VUK JE POVUK'O, AL NE GUBI NADU
([Crew chant] - [pitched „VUK JE POVUK’O“ behind lead])
SREĆA STIŽE, NOZDRVE SPREMI
([808] - [heavy glide on „STIŽE“])
HODAMO PRUGOM KA POSLEDNJOJ ŠEMI
([Synth hook] - [sharp cyborg lead doubling ritam])

[Verse 2, Vuk's Perspective]
([Beat] - [kick jači, drill hats gušći, bass rola])
Kurijak prosečan, na vreme je stao,
([Vox FX] - [autotune naglasak na „prosečan“])
Ali za ovog kurijaka 5 grama je malo,
([808] - [kratak glide na „malo“])
NIkad nije bio isti al je uvek bio borac,
([Crew ad-lib] - [„borac“ pitched low])
Njegove su nozdrve spreman maratonac,
([Delay] - [jedan metallic echo na „maratonac“])

"GO-RI-LI-ZACIJA na putu pruge,
([Chant FX] - [chopped „GO-RI-LI“ stabs])
STiŽu siluete da rešavaju se tuge,
([Synth] - [cyborg stab akcenti off-beat])
Vreme da se šine sada u duetu
([FX] - [rail squeal + kratki sweep])
Astralna projekcija mi je ušla u petu
([Vox FX] - [pitch-shift tail na „petu“])

[Chorus]
([Drop] - [tvrđi drums, stuttering hats])
GORILA STARA NOSI KESICE KA GRADU
([Bass] - [distorted rolling 808 ispod linije])
VUK JE POVUKO, AL NE GUBI NADU
([Crew] - [call/response „VUK JE POVUKO“])
SREĆA STIŽE, NOZDRVE SPREMI
([Synth] - [kratak cyborg hook])
HODAMO PRUGOM KA POSLEDNJOJ ŠEMI
([FX] - [riser + muted impact, kratka pauza ka bridgeu])

[Bridge, Atmospheric sounds, low bass hits]
([Beat] - [samo low 808 booms + retke hats])
([Synths] - [haunting pads + udaljen cyborg lead])
Vuk i Gorila, kombinacija iz snova,
Noćnu školu prolaze do masterskih diploma.
Grad i šumu spajaju, šine stare pruge,
Brzina u venama i zimske noći duge.
([FX] - [grad L, džungla R, širok stereo])

[Verse 3, Gorila's Reflection]
([Beat] - [full, tech-house/drill fusion, konstantan groove])
Korak po korak, šmrčem debeo i gorak,
([808] - [kratak glide na „gorak“])
Kesice u džepu, misli lete mi u oblak,
([Synth] - [blagi cyborg arpeggio])
Korak po korak, vadim ruke iz džepa,
Kurijak na putu sa osmehom ko gepard
([Vox FX] - [pitch-shift „gepard“ ad-lib])

([FX] - [industrial clangs sa reverbom])
Beton je zašumio, al’ još se čuju priče.
([Perc] - [niski tom akcenti])
Gorila se smeši, lepu količinu nosi,
Pozdravlja se s vukom, koji sprema se da kosi
([Synth hook] - [kratki motiv između linija])

([Crew chant] - [„Gorila i pruga“ robotic unison])

([FX] - [approaching footsteps stereo])

([808] - [veliki sliding hit ulazak])

Šine vode priče, ka vukovom kraju.

([Ambience] - [noćni grad + džungla wide])

# hardcore_pop - Matiscnjacc_5
[DESCRIPTION]
The tech house track opens with filtered monastic chants drifting over a pulsing, minimal kick and intricate hi-hats, Sparse synth stabs add tension as deep rolling bass enters, locking the groove, Swelling reverb and delay on the chants create an evolving, hypnotic texture for club energy,

[LYRICS]
[Intro, Haunting synths, slow drum build-up]
[Whispered vocals
[Main vocal]:
"Pruga duga, šine hladne,
Vuk i Gorila, nozdrve im gladne."

[Verse 1, Gorila's Perspective]
Zvoni telefon, Gorila zna već ko je,
Miriše na kurijaka, nepoznati broj je.
Smeje se Gorila, uze kesicu da pakuje,
Džabe ovo merim njemu pet komada malo je

Prodao je kola, brzo neće moći doći,
Vuk zavija na mesec, pita ko će mu pomoći.
Al' Gorila ne čeka, nego krenu odmah peške,
Korak prati korak, kroz kilometre teške

[Chorus]
GORILA STARA NOSI KESICE KA GRADU
VUK JE POVUKO, AL NE GUBI NADU
SREĆA STIŽE, NOZDRVE SPREMI
KORAČAMO PRUGOM KA POSLEDNJOJ ŠEMI

[Verse 2, Vuk's Perspective]
Kurijak prosečan, na vreme je stao,
Ali za ovog kurijaka 5 grama je malo,
NIkad nije bio isti al je uvek bio borac,
Njegove su nozdrve spreman maratonac,

"GO-RI-LI-ZACIJA na putu pruge,
STiŽu siluete da rešavaju se tuge,
Vreme da se šine sada u duetu
Astralna projekcija mi je ušla u petu


[Chorus]
GORILA STARA NOSI KESICE KA GRADU
VUK JE POVUKO, AL NE GUBI NADU
SREĆA STIŽE, NOZDRVE SPREMI
KORAČAMO PRUGOM KA POSLEDNJOJ ŠEMI

[Bridge, Atmospheric sounds, low bass hits]
Vuk i Gorila, kombinacija iz snova,
Noćnu školu prolaze do masterskih diploma.
Grad i šumu spajaju, šine stare pruge,
Brzina u venama i zimske noći duge.

[Verse 3, Gorila's Reflection]
Korak po korak, šmrčem debeo i gorak,
Kesice u džepu, misli lete mi u oblak,
Korak po korak, vadim ruke iz džepa,
Kurijak na putu sa osmehom ko gepard

Stara fabrika šapuće i ponekad viče,
Beton je zašumio, al’ još se čuju priče.
Gorila se smeši, lepu količinu nosi,
Pozdravlja se s vukom, koji sprema se da kosi

[Chorus]
Gorila i pruga, dobro se znajuu,
Šine vode priče, ka vukovom kraju.
Kesice u rukama, misli kroz tamu,
Brzina nas vodi, u trećem danu.

[Verse 4, Vuk’s Determination]
Vuk na prozoru, oči traže senku,
Gorila šalje poruku: "Stižem, nosim ti zdenku."
"Mokro je k’o more, moraš malo posušiti,
Nemoj sve povući, k’o džukela ćeš se ušiti."

Zvuci koraka iz mraka, prestaje tišina,
Gorila stiže, s njim dolazi brzina.
"Noć tek je krenula, sad je pravi čas,"
Vuk i Gorila, šire nozdrve za nas.

Gorila i pruga, dobro se znajuu,
Šine vode priče, ka vukovom kraju.
Kesice u rukama, misli kroz tamu,
Brzina nas vodi, u trećem danu.

[Outro, Fading beat, ambient noises of city and jungle]
Šine stare priče, svetla grada blede,
Vuk i Gorila, vuku linije ko grede.
Noć se spušta, naša priča još traje,
Pruga nas spaja, bratstvo nam ne staje.
[Whispered vocals]

---

# hardcore_pop - Matiscnjacc_5
[DESCRIPTION]
The tech house track opens with filtered monastic chants drifting over a pulsing, minimal kick and intricate hi-hats, Sparse synth stabs add tension as deep rolling bass enters, locking the groove, Swelling reverb and delay on the chants create an evolving, hypnotic texture for club energy,

[LYRICS]
[Intro, Haunting synths, slow drum build-up]
[Whispered vocals
[Main vocal]:
"Pruga duga, šine hladne,
Vuk i Gorila, nozdrve im gladne."

[Verse 1, Gorila's Perspective]
Zvoni telefon, Gorila zna već ko je,
Miriše na kurijaka, nepoznati broj je.
Smeje se Gorila, uze kesicu da pakuje,
Džabe ovo merim njemu pet komada malo je

Prodao je kola, brzo neće moći doći,
Vuk zavija na mesec, pita ko će mu pomoći.
Al' Gorila ne čeka, nego krenu odmah peške,
Korak prati korak, kroz kilometre teške

[Chorus]
GORILA STARA NOSI KESICE KA GRADU
VUK JE POVUKO, AL NE GUBI NADU
SREĆA STIŽE, NOZDRVE SPREMI
KORAČAMO PRUGOM KA POSLEDNJOJ ŠEMI

[Verse 2, Vuk's Perspective]
Kurijak prosečan, na vreme je stao,
Ali za ovog kurijaka 5 grama je malo,
NIkad nije bio isti al je uvek bio borac,
Njegove su nozdrve spreman maratonac,

"GO-RI-LI-ZACIJA na putu pruge,
STiŽu siluete da rešavaju se tuge,
Vreme da se šine sada u duetu
Astralna projekcija mi je ušla u petu


[Chorus]
GORILA STARA NOSI KESICE KA GRADU
VUK JE POVUKO, AL NE GUBI NADU
SREĆA STIŽE, NOZDRVE SPREMI
KORAČAMO PRUGOM KA POSLEDNJOJ ŠEMI

[Bridge, Atmospheric sounds, low bass hits]
Vuk i Gorila, kombinacija iz snova,
Noćnu školu prolaze do masterskih diploma.
Grad i šumu spajaju, šine stare pruge,
Brzina u venama i zimske noći duge.

[Verse 3, Gorila's Reflection]
Korak po korak, šmrčem debeo i gorak,
Kesice u džepu, misli lete mi u oblak,
Korak po korak, vadim ruke iz džepa,
Kurijak na putu sa osmehom ko gepard

Stara fabrika šapuće i ponekad viče,
Beton je zašumio, al’ još se čuju priče.
Gorila se smeši, lepu količinu nosi,
Pozdravlja se s vukom, koji sprema se da kosi

[Chorus]
Gorila i pruga, dobro se znajuu,
Šine vode priče, ka vukovom kraju.
Kesice u rukama, misli kroz tamu,
Brzina nas vodi, u trećem danu.

[Verse 4, Vuk’s Determination]
Vuk na prozoru, oči traže senku,
Gorila šalje poruku: "Stižem, nosim ti zdenku."
"Mokro je k’o more, moraš malo posušiti,
Nemoj sve povući, k’o džukela ćeš se ušiti."

Zvuci koraka iz mraka, prestaje tišina,
Gorila stiže, s njim dolazi brzina.
"Noć tek je krenula, sad je pravi čas,"
Vuk i Gorila, šire nozdrve za nas.

Gorila i pruga, dobro se znajuu,
Šine vode priče, ka vukovom kraju.
Kesice u rukama, misli kroz tamu,
Brzina nas vodi, u trećem danu.

[Outro, Fading beat, ambient noises of city and jungle]
Šine stare priče, svetla grada blede,
Vuk i Gorila, vuku linije ko grede.
Noć se spušta, naša priča još traje,
Pruga nas spaja, bratstvo nam ne staje.
[Whispered vocals]

---

# hardcore_pop - Matiscnjacc_6
[DESCRIPTION]
Deep 808s, hard-hitting UK drill hi-hats, distorted rolling basslines, relentless hypnotic tech-house fusion, eerie cyborg synths, pitch-shifted robotic autotune vocals, explosive drops, low-end bass punch

[LYRICS]
[Intro, Haunting synths, slow drum build-up]
[Whispered vocals
[Main vocal]:
"Pruga duga, šine hladne,
Vuk i Gorila, nozdrve im gladne."

[Verse 1, Gorila's Perspective]
Zvoni telefon, Gorila zna već ko je,
Miriše na kurijaka, nepoznati broj je.
Smeje se Gorila, uze kesicu da pakuje,
Džabe ovo merim njemu pet komada malo je

Prodao je kola, brzo neće moći doći,
Vuk zavija na mesec, pita ko će mu pomoći.
Al' Gorila ne čeka, nego krenu odmah peške,
Korak prati korak, kroz kilometre teške

[Chorus]
GORILA STARA NOSI KESICE KA GRADU
VUK JE POVUKO, AL NE GUBI NADU
SREĆA STIŽE, NOZDRVE SPREMI
KORAČAMO PRUGOM KA POSLEDNJOJ ŠEMI

[Verse 2, Vuk's Perspective]
Kurijak prosečan, na vreme je stao,
Ali za ovog kurijaka 5 grama je malo,
NIkad nije bio isti al je uvek bio borac,
Njegove su nozdrve spreman maratonac,

"GO-RI-LI-ZACIJA na putu pruge,
STiŽu siluete da rešavaju se tuge,
Vreme da se šine sada u duetu
Astralna projekcija mi je ušla u petu


[Chorus]
GORILA STARA NOSI KESICE KA GRADU
VUK JE POVUKO, AL NE GUBI NADU
SREĆA STIŽE, NOZDRVE SPREMI
KORAČAMO PRUGOM KA POSLEDNJOJ ŠEMI

[Bridge, Atmospheric sounds, low bass hits]
Vuk i Gorila, kombinacija iz snova,
Noćnu školu prolaze do masterskih diploma.
Grad i šumu spajaju, šine stare pruge,
Brzina u venama i zimske noći duge.

[Verse 3, Gorila's Reflection]
Korak po korak, šmrčem debeo i gorak,
Kesice u džepu, misli lete mi u oblak,
Korak po korak, vadim ruke iz džepa,
Kurijak na putu sa osmehom ko gepard

Stara fabrika šapuće i ponekad viče,
Beton je zašumio, al’ još se čuju priče.
Gorila se smeši, lepu količinu nosi,
Pozdravlja se s vukom, koji sprema se da kosi

[Chorus]
Gorila i pruga, dobro se znajuu,
Šine vode priče, ka vukovom kraju.
Kesice u rukama, misli kroz tamu,
Brzina nas vodi, u trećem danu.

[Verse 4, Vuk’s Determination]
Vuk na prozoru, oči traže senku,
Gorila šalje poruku: "Stižem, nosim ti zdenku."
"Mokro je k’o more, moraš malo posušiti,
Nemoj sve povući, k’o džukela ćeš se ušiti."

Zvuci koraka iz mraka, prestaje tišina,
Gorila stiže, s njim dolazi brzina.
"Noć tek je krenula, sad je pravi čas,"
Vuk i Gorila, šire nozdrve za nas.

Gorila i pruga, dobro se znajuu,
Šine vode priče, ka vukovom kraju.
Kesice u rukama, misli kroz tamu,
Brzina nas vodi, u trećem danu.

[Outro, Fading beat, ambient noises of city and jungle]
Šine stare priče, svetla grada blede,
Vuk i Gorila, vuku linije ko grede.
Noć se spušta, naša priča još traje,
Pruga nas spaja, bratstvo nam ne staje.
[Whispered vocals]

# hardcore_pop - Matiscnjacc_7
[DESCRIPTION]
Deep 808s, hard-hitting UK drill hi-hats, distorted rolling basslines, relentless hypnotic tech-house fusion, eerie cyborg synths, pitch-shifted robotic autotune vocals, explosive drops, low-end bass punch

[LYRICS]
[Intro, Haunting synths, slow drum build-up]
[Whispered vocals
[Main vocal]:
"Pruga duga, šine hladne,
Vuk i Gorila, nozdrve im gladne."

[Verse 1, Gorila's Perspective]
Zvoni telefon, Gorila zna već ko je,
Miriše na kurijaka, nepoznati broj je.
Smeje se Gorila, uze kesicu da pakuje,
Džabe ovo merim njemu pet komada malo je

Prodao je kola, brzo neće moći doći,
Vuk zavija na mesec, pita ko će mu pomoći.
Al' Gorila ne čeka, nego krenu odmah peške,
Korak prati korak, kroz kilometre teške

[Chorus]
GORILA STARA NOSI KESICE KA GRADU
VUK JE POVUK'O, AL NE GUBI NADU
SREĆA STIŽE, NOZDRVE SPREMI
HODAMO PRUGOM KA POSLEDNJOJ ŠEMI

[Verse 2, Vuk's Perspective]
Kurijak prosečan, na vreme je stao,
Ali za ovog kurijaka 5 grama je malo,
NIkad nije bio isti al je uvek bio borac,
Njegove su nozdrve spreman maratonac,

"GO-RI-LI-ZACIJA na putu pruge,
STiŽu siluete da rešavaju se tuge,
Vreme da se šine sada u duetu
Astralna projekcija mi je ušla u petu


[Chorus]
GORILA STARA NOSI KESICE KA GRADU
VUK JE POVUKO, AL NE GUBI NADU
SREĆA STIŽE, NOZDRVE SPREMI
HODAMO PRUGOM KA POSLEDNJOJ ŠEMI

[Bridge, Atmospheric sounds, low bass hits]
Vuk i Gorila, kombinacija iz snova,
Noćnu školu prolaze do masterskih diploma.
Grad i šumu spajaju, šine stare pruge,
Brzina u venama i zimske noći duge.

[Verse 3, Gorila's Reflection]
Korak po korak, šmrčem debeo i gorak,

Kurijak na putu sa osmehom ko gepard

Stara fabrika šapuće i ponekad viče,
Beton je zašumio, al’ još se čuju priče.
Gorila se smeši, lepu količinu nosi,
Pozdravlja se s vukom, koji sprema se da kosi

[Chorus]
Gorila i pruga, dobro se znajuu,
Šine vode priče, ka vukovom kraju.
Kesice u rukama, misli kroz tamu,
Brzina nas vodi, u trećem danu.

[Verse 4, Vuk’s Determination]
Vuk na prozoru, oči traže senku,
Gorila šalje poruku: "Stižem, nosim ti zdenku."
"Mokro je k’o more, moraš malo posušiti,
Nemoj sve povući, k’o džukela ćeš se ušiti."

Zvuci koraka iz mraka, prestaje tišina,
Gorila stiže, s njim dolazi brzina.
"Noć tek je krenula, sad je pravi čas,"
Vuk i Gorila, šire nozdrve za nas.

Gorila i pruga, dobro se znajuu,
Šine vode priče, ka vukovom kraju.
Kesice u rukama, misli kroz tamu,
Brzina nas vodi, u trećem danu.

[Outro, Fading beat, ambient noises of city and jungle]
Šine stare priče, svetla grada blede,
Vuk i Gorila, vuku linije ko grede.
Noć se spušta, naša priča još traje,
Pruga nas spaja, bratstvo nam ne staje.
[Whispered vocals]

# hardcore_pop - Matiscnjacc_9
[DESCRIPTION]
Deep 808s, hard-hitting UK drill hi-hats, distorted rolling basslines, relentless hypnotic tech-house fusion, eerie cyborg synths, pitch-shifted robotic autotune vocals, explosive drops, low-end bass punch

[Whispered vocals

Šine vode priče, ka vukovom kraju.

Brzina nas vodi, u trećem danu.

# hardcore_pop - Matiscnjacc_9
[DESCRIPTION]
Deep 808s, hard-hitting UK drill hi-hats, distorted rolling basslines, relentless hypnotic tech-house fusion, eerie cyborg synths, pitch-shifted robotic autotune vocals, explosive drops, low-end bass punch

[LYRICS]
[Intro, Haunting synths, slow drum build-up]
[Whispered vocals
[Main vocal]:
"Pruga duga, šine hladne,
Vuk i Gorila, nozdrve im gladne."

[Verse 1, Gorila's Perspective]
Zvoni telefon, Gorila zna već ko je,
Miriše na kurijaka, nepoznati broj je.
Smeje se Gorila, uze kesicu da pakuje,
Džabe ovo merim njemu pet komada malo je

Prodao je kola, brzo neće moći doći,
Vuk zavija na mesec, pita ko će mu pomoći.
Al' Gorila ne čeka, nego krenu odmah peške,
Korak prati korak, kroz kilometre teške

[Chorus]
GORILA STARA NOSI KESICE KA GRADU
VUK JE POVUK'O, AL NE GUBI NADU
SREĆA STIŽE, NOZDRVE SPREMI
HODAMO PRUGOM KA POSLEDNJOJ ŠEMI

[Verse 2, Vuk's Perspective]
Kurijak prosečan, na vreme je stao,
Ali za ovog kurijaka 5 grama je malo,
NIkad nije bio isti al je uvek bio borac,
Njegove su nozdrve spreman maratonac,

"GO-RI-LI-ZACIJA na putu pruge,
STiŽu siluete da rešavaju se tuge,
Vreme da se šine sada u duetu
Astralna projekcija mi je ušla u petu


[Chorus]
GORILA STARA NOSI KESICE KA GRADU
VUK JE POVUKO, AL NE GUBI NADU
SREĆA STIŽE, NOZDRVE SPREMI
HODAMO PRUGOM KA POSLEDNJOJ ŠEMI

[Bridge, Atmospheric sounds, low bass hits]
Vuk i Gorila, kombinacija iz snova,
Noćnu školu prolaze do masterskih diploma.
Grad i šumu spajaju, šine stare pruge,
Brzina u venama i zimske noći duge.

[Verse 3, Gorila's Reflection]
Korak po korak, šmrčem debeo i gorak,
Kesice u džepu, misli lete mi u oblak,
Korak po korak, vadim ruke iz džepa,
Kurijak na putu sa osmehom ko gepard

Stara fabrika šapuće i ponekad viče,
Beton je zašumio, al’ još se čuju priče.
Gorila se smeši, lepu količinu nosi,
Pozdravlja se s vukom, koji sprema se da kosi

[Chorus]
Gorila i pruga, dobro se znajuu,
Šine vode priče, ka vukovom kraju.
Kesice u rukama, misli kroz tamu,
Brzina nas vodi, u trećem danu.

[Verse 4, Vuk’s Determination]
Vuk na prozoru, oči traže senku,
Gorila šalje poruku: "Stižem, nosim ti zdenku."
"Mokro je k’o more, moraš malo posušiti,
Nemoj sve povući, k’o džukela ćeš se ušiti."

Zvuci koraka iz mraka, prestaje tišina,
Gorila stiže, s njim dolazi brzina.
"Noć tek je krenula, sad je pravi čas,"
Vuk i Gorila, šire nozdrve za nas.

Gorila i pruga, dobro se znajuu,
Šine vode priče, ka vukovom kraju.
Kesice u rukama, misli kroz tamu,
Brzina nas vodi, u trećem danu.

[Outro, Fading beat, ambient noises of city and jungle]
Šine stare priče, svetla grada blede,
Vuk i Gorila, vuku linije ko grede.
Noć se spušta, naša priča još traje,
Pruga nas spaja, bratstvo nam ne staje.
[Whispered vocals]

---

# hardcore_pop - Matiscnjacc_9 (Remastered)
[DESCRIPTION]
Deep 808s, hard-hitting UK drill hi-hats, distorted rolling basslines, relentless hypnotic tech-house fusion, eerie cyborg synths, pitch-shifted robotic autotune vocals, explosive drops, low-end bass punch

[DESCRIPTION]
An 135 bpm uk organ bassline charva underground slap tech house track , zurna, organ,80s synth, cowbell, car siren, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

([Zurle tail] - ZUR—) ([Organ pad fade] - ooooo) ([Reverse delay] - oooh)

# hardcore_pop - Me_Mom's_House_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
An 135 bpm uk organ bassline charva underground slap tech house track , zurna, organ,80s synth, cowbell, car siren, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Female -Chorus]
Don't wanna be a sweetheart
([Finger snap] - snap)
Don't wanna be a sweetheart
([Kick hit / boom] - boom)
Don't wanna be a sweetheart
([Zurle motif stab] - ZUR-le)
Don't wanna be a sweetheart
([Organ stab short] - org-stab)

[Female & Male - call &  answer]
Don't wanna be a sweetheart (you could?)
([Breath exhale] - haaah)
Don't wanna be a sweetheart (oh, why though?)
([Crowd murmur short] - mmmrum)
Don't wanna be a sweetheart (for real?)
([Vinyl pop] - pft)
Don't wanna be a sweetheart (damn girl!...)
([Finger snap] - snap)

[Male]
Yeah man she's rang us
([Phone buzz] - bzzzt)
Now me phone's got ten percent
([Battery chirp] - beep)
Said I was on me way back
([Footstep street] - tapptap)
That was an hour ago
([Clock tick] - tik-tik)
Said I'll only have a couple
([Glass clink] - clink)
Me mates bought another round
([Coin drop] - cling)
Said I'd have to leave early
([Door hinge] - creak)
'Cause I'm stopping at me mam's house
([Engine idle] - rrrrrr)

[Female - Verse]
Don't wanna be a sweetheart
([Breath inhale close] - haaah)

([Whispered echo] - ssst)

([Finger snap] - snap)

([Snare tick] - tchk)

([Sub pulse] - thumm)

([Tire scuff] - skiiid)

([Metal scrape soft] - shrrrk)

([Vinyl crackle] - pftcrackle)

([Crowd hush] - shhh)
Yeah
([Breath exhale] - haaah)

([Organ stab] - org-stab)

([Zurle reply] - ZUR-le)

[Prechorus]

([Reverse sweep] - whooom)

[Female - Chorus]

# hardcore_pop - Me_Mom's_House_Hardcore_Pop_3
[DESCRIPTION]
An 133 bpm uk organ bassline charva underground slap tech house track , zurna, organ,80s synth, cowbell, car siren, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals, powerful beat

[LYRICS]
Drop]
([Car siren micro-stab] - neenaw) ([Tire screech 1/16] - skreech) ([Bass wobble] - wubwub)
([Backvox - Hype ad-libs] - let’s go / hey)

[Male]
Yeah man she's rang us
([Phone buzz] - bzzzt)
([Backvox - Male “yeah”] - yeah)
Now me phone's got ten percent
([Battery chirp] - beep)
([Backvox - Female pad] - ooo)
Said I was on me way back
([Footstep street] - tapptap)

# hardcore_pop - Me_Mom's_House_Hardcore_Pop_4
[DESCRIPTION]
An 138 bpm uk organ bassline charva hypnotic tech house track , zurna, organ,80s synth, cowbell, car siren, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals, powerful beat

# hardcore_pop - Medaljonicca_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
At 138 bpm underground slap tech house track , zurle, organ,80s midi synths, car siren, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Verse]
Da li znaš da gledaš me baš onako kako volim
([Breath inhale] - haaah)
Ma da li znaš da si moj ti čim te poželim
([Footsteps soft] - tapptap)
Imaš osmeh za medalju
([Vinyl crackle / static] - pftcrackle)
Gledaš me u oči, znaš mi želju zadnju
([Heartbeat / thump] - thumpthump)

[Verse 2]
Znam da hoćeš da vidiš da l' sam bolji od ostalih
([Crowd murmur / ambient] - mmmmmmrum)
Znam da voliš kada dečko igra se kao što sam ja
([Sub-bass rumble] - rrrrrr)
Znaš da uvek idem dalje
([Snare tick] - tchk)
U meni je đavo
([Metal scrape / tension] - shrrrk)
Zaustavi me
([Brake / tire skreech short] - skreeech)

[Chorus]
Ne
([Breath exhale] - haaah)
Ti ne znaš
([Whispered echo] - shh-echo)
Ti ne znaš šta želiš
([Vinyl pop / micro] - pft)
Ja znam šta želim
([Heartbeat / resolute] - thumpthump)
Znam šta želim
([Sub pulse] - thumm)
Ti ne znaš
([Finger snap] - snap)
Ti ne znaš šta želiš
([Two-way murmur] - bzzztch)
Ja znam šta želim
([Glass clink soft] - clink)
Znam šta želim
([Vinyl crackle / warmth] - pftcrackle)

[Verse 3]
Ne
([Breath inhale shaky] - haaah)
Ne znam šta želim
([Radio static] - bzzztch)
Ovaj svet
([Traffic hum / distant city] - mmmmmmrum)
Ovi ljudi su ludi
([Shout / callout distant] - ayyyo)
Ni oni ne znaju šta žele
([Crowd sigh] - ssshh)
Svi bi sve
([Cash rustle faint] - shhhff)
Svi bi sve
([Footstep echo] - tapptap)
Al' ne znaju da uživaju
([Glass clink / laugh] - clink)
Svi bi sve
([Vinyl crackle] - pftcrackle)
Svi bi sve
([Breath exhale] - haaah)
Al' ne znaju da uživaju
([Sub-bass warm] - rrrrrr)

[Verse 4]
Moj svet je ljubav
([Soft reverb hit] - whooom)
Zato svi misle da sam sanjar
([Whisper laugh] - huhh)
Srce tvoje k'o žar, snovima dar ,
([Fire crackle] - tsss)
Madam, na te padam, ko Sadam,
([Vinyl pop] - pft)
A ako saznam da si mazna,
([Breath inhale close] - haaah)
Telo ti kao kazna
([Glass crack / tension] - krack)

[Chorus]

Al' ne znaju da uživaju
([Glass clink / laugh] - clink)
Svi bi sve
([Vinyl crackle] - pftcrackle)
Svi bi sve
([Breath exhale] - haaah)
Al' ne znaju da uživaju
([Sub-bass warm] - rrrrrr)

[Male-Verse 4]
Moj svet je ljubav
([Soft reverb hit] - whooom)
Zato svi misle da sam sanjar
([Whisper laugh] - huhh)

Ti ne znaš šta želiš
([Vinyl pop / micro] - pft)

# hardcore_pop - Midnight Picnicc_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
An 130-140 bpm uk organ bassline charva tech house track, zurna, organ, 80s synth, cowbells, ancient harp, car siren, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals, powerful beat,

[LYRICS]
[Verse]
[Male] Met her at the bus stop [Female - (bus stop)]
[Male] Then she said [Female - (she said)]
[Female] "You're not my type" [Male - (not your type?)]
[Male] Told her I'm not the guy [Female - (not the guy)]
[Male] Who you should judge by sight [Female - (by sight)]
[Male] Told her to give me a try [Female - (give you a try)]
[Male] Give me one chance tonight [Female - (one chance tonight)]
[Male] We can do it right [Female - (do it right)]
[Male] Take a trip to the other side [Female - (other side)]

[Verse 2]
[Male] We had a midnight picnic [Female - (midnight picnic)]
[Male] On the floor in Piccadilly [Female - (Piccadilly)]
[Male] Looking like Sid and Nancy [Female - (Sid and Nancy)]
[Male] Lips red like strawberries [Female - (like strawberries)]
[Male] She brought the cheese [Female - (brought the cheese)]
[Male] I brought the wine [Female - (brought the wine)]
[Male] How 'bout we take this inside? [Female - (take it inside?)]
[Male] Looking like it's do or die [Female - (do or die)]
[Male] All the fun we can have inside [Female - (have inside)]

[Verse 3]
[Female] She said that I'm being foolish [Male - (being foolish)]
[Male] But I'm feeling so foolish [Female - (so foolish)]
[Male] Think we should do this [Female - (do this)]
[Male] Think we should do this [Female - (do this)]
[Female] She said that I'm being foolish [Male - (being foolish)]
[Male] But I'm feeling so foolish [Female - (so foolish)]
