# hardcore_pop - Midnight Rides_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
A high-energy underground tech-bass banger built on a rubbery FM bassline, swung club drums, and a hypnotic late-night pulse. 80s MIDI synth bells, analog pads, and organ stabs layer nostalgia into the groove, while distorted zurna licks and ancient-percussion textures sharpen the attitude. The vocals stay clean and close in the verses but become chopped, stuttered, and looped into rhythmic hooks during the drops (“riding around,” “middle of the night,” “got you”). The low end drives hard with syncopated bass stabs and ritual-style tapan rolls, exploding into festival-level energy. Breakdowns feature chorused pads, reversed zurna breaths, and airy 80s ambience before slamming back into a gritty bass-house bounce. Designed for dark rooms, neon rides, and dancefloors that never stop — a fast, sweaty, addictive night-ride anthem.

[LYRICS]
[GlobalMix–80s/Ancient Tech Bass House ~126 BPM. Kick tight/punchy 60–85 Hz. Bass: rubbery FM tech-bass wobble, glide, sidechain 6–8 dB. Synths: 80s MIDI bells, analog pads, organ stabs. Ancient elements: distorted zurna, tapan thumps, darbuka ticks. Hats 1/8 + swung 1/16. Vox clean/dry in verses, chopped in drops. FX: reverse zurna, whoosh risers, snare ramps, pitch-downs. Master: -6.5 LUFS, wide stereo.]

[Structure–DJIntro(16 bars chops)->GrooveLoopA->VerseDrop->Build1->Drop1->Break->GrooveLoopB->Drop2->Outro.]

⭐ DJ INTRO — Vocal Loop Hook

([VoxChop1/8] – “riding… riding…”)
([VoxStutter] – “night… night… night…”)
([BassFilterLPF] – low wobble tease])
([TickPerc] – darbuka ticks])
([ZurnaSweep] – filtered upward])
([SynthBell80s] – 1/8 arp whisper])

⭐ GROOVE LOOP A — Underground Tech-Bass Bounce

([VoxLoop08] – “middle of the night… middle… middle…”])
([BassOpen] – FM bass opening over 16 bars])
([OrganStabsLow])
([CowbellSwing])
([VoxDelayShort] – “you…” echo])

⭐ VERSE 1 — Clean, Upfront, Bouncy

I bought a new motorcycle today
 ([VoxCloseDry])

Cuz my old one got stolen yesterday
 ([HatGhost1/16])

And now I'm just waiting for the sun to go down
 ([PadChorus80s])

So I can ride my new bike around town
 ([BassHintLPF])

The one with the cool shiny green gas tank
 ([OrganStabMute])

The one with the extra powerful crank
 ([PercClickWide])

The one that matches my bright blue backpack
 ([SynthBell80s])

The one I bought to replace my old bike
 ([ReverseZurnaFX])

⭐ BUILD 1 — Rising Synth + Ancient Heat

([SnareRoll] – 1/4→1/8→1/16, retro verb])
([VoxChopRise] – “ride… ride… RIDE…”)
([NoiseUp–80sWhoosh])
([BassHPF] – tight pumping])
([ZurnaFiltRise])

Break whisper:
([VoxWhisper] – “middle of the night…”])

⭐ DROP 1 — Main Tech-Bass Ride Drop

([BassFull] – rubbery FM growl wobble])
([ClapWide])
([OpenHat])
([TapanThumpSync])

([VoxChopHook] – “riding around… riding around… night… night….”])
([ZurnaLead] – short aggressive stab])

Drop stab phrase:
“Ride it… ride it…”
→ ([VoxStab1/4] – “ride… ride… riiide…”])

⭐ BREAK — Floating Neon Night-Air

([VoxSpokenLow] – “feels like we’re flying…”)
([PadAir80s])
([StabSynth])
([ZurnaReverseBreath])
([VoxPitchDown] – “riding…”])

⭐ GROOVE LOOP B — New Chop Pattern

([VoxChopHi] – “favorite thing… favorite thing…”])
([VoxChopLow] – “got you… got you…”])

([BassSyncPulse])
([OrganStabsBright])
([DarbukaGhostRolls])

⭐ VERSE 2 — Faster, Airier, More Club

My new bike's got a headlight on the front
 ([VoxCloseDry])

Which is perfect cuz we're riding at night
 ([HatGhost1/16])

I also put one on my blue backpack
 ([SynthBell80s])

So you can see me coming from the back
 ([BassHintLow])

It feels like we're flying when we're going fast
 ([PadChorusWide])

With the wind blowing through our helmets' masks
 ([PercSnap])

And I feel like we're gonna fly away
 ([OrganStabLow])

If I just keep on giving it more gas
 ([ReverseFX + MiniRise])

⭐ DROP 2 — Extended Peak Club Drop

([BassGrowlBright–FM])
([ClapThicker])
([HatRide80s])
([ZurnaLeadFull])
([TapanRollFast])

([VoxMegaChop] – “riding… night… got you… fly away… ride… ride… ride….”])
([BassStabAnswer])

([ReverbThrow] – “night…” into space])

⭐ VERSE 3 — Playful, Driving, Still Club

Let's take it to a road that's not too far
 ([VoxWarmMono])

Where I can show you how I drive my car
 ([PercClickWide])

It's one of the best roads to drive a car
 ([PadThin])

Or a motorcycle like my new bike
 ([BassPulseMid])

And then let's go get a burger or two
 ([OrganStab])

Because I've got a secret place for food
 ([HatGhost1/16])

But first I need to go to my secret spot
 ([ZurnaSoftFilter])

Where I can show you how my new bike rocks
 ([MiniRise80s])

⭐ DROP 3 — Optional Final Smash

([BassFullFM + Distortion])
([ZurnaLeadWide])
([OrganStabsHuge])
([VoxChopFinal] – “riding… riding… riding…”])

⭐ OUTRO — DJ Friendly

([Kick+BassOnly])
([FilterLP])
([VoxChopFade] – “middle of the night…”])

---

# hardcore_pop - Midnight Rides_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
A high-energy underground tech-bass banger built on a rubbery FM bassline, swung club drums, and a hypnotic late-night pulse. 80s MIDI synth bells, analog pads, and organ stabs layer nostalgia into the groove, while distorted zurna licks and ancient-percussion textures sharpen the attitude. The vocals stay clean and close in the verses but become chopped, stuttered, and looped into rhythmic hooks during the drops (“riding around,” “middle of the night,” “got you”). The low end drives hard with syncopated bass stabs and ritual-style tapan rolls, exploding into festival-level energy. Breakdowns feature chorused pads, reversed zurna breaths, and airy 80s ambience before slamming back into a gritty bass-house bounce. Designed for dark rooms, neon rides, and dancefloors that never stop — a fast, sweaty, addictive night-ride anthem.

[LYRICS]
[GlobalMix–80s/Ancient Tech Bass House ~126 BPM. Kick tight/punchy 60–85 Hz. Bass: rubbery FM tech-bass wobble, glide, sidechain 6–8 dB. Synths: 80s MIDI bells, analog pads, organ stabs. Ancient elements: distorted zurna, tapan thumps, darbuka ticks. Hats 1/8 + swung 1/16. Vox clean/dry in verses, chopped in drops. FX: reverse zurna, whoosh risers, snare ramps, pitch-downs. Master: -6.5 LUFS, wide stereo.]

[Structure–DJIntro(16 bars chops)->GrooveLoopA->VerseDrop->Build1->Drop1->Break->GrooveLoopB->Drop2->Outro.]

⭐ DJ INTRO — Vocal Loop Hook

([VoxChop1/8] – “riding… riding…”)
([VoxStutter] – “night… night… night…”)
([BassFilterLPF] – low wobble tease])
([TickPerc] – darbuka ticks])
([ZurnaSweep] – filtered upward])
([SynthBell80s] – 1/8 arp whisper])

⭐ GROOVE LOOP A — Underground Tech-Bass Bounce

([VoxLoop08] – “middle of the night… middle… middle…”])
([BassOpen] – FM bass opening over 16 bars])
([OrganStabsLow])
([CowbellSwing])
([VoxDelayShort] – “you…” echo])

⭐ VERSE 1 — Clean, Upfront, Bouncy

I bought a new motorcycle today
 ([VoxCloseDry])

Cuz my old one got stolen yesterday
 ([HatGhost1/16])

And now I'm just waiting for the sun to go down
 ([PadChorus80s])

So I can ride my new bike around town
 ([BassHintLPF])

The one with the cool shiny green gas tank
 ([OrganStabMute])

The one with the extra powerful crank
 ([PercClickWide])

The one that matches my bright blue backpack
 ([SynthBell80s])

The one I bought to replace my old bike
 ([ReverseZurnaFX])

⭐ BUILD 1 — Rising Synth + Ancient Heat

([SnareRoll] – 1/4→1/8→1/16, retro verb])
([VoxChopRise] – “ride… ride… RIDE…”)
([NoiseUp–80sWhoosh])
([BassHPF] – tight pumping])
([ZurnaFiltRise])

Break whisper:
([VoxWhisper] – “middle of the night…”])

⭐ DROP 1 — Main Tech-Bass Ride Drop

([BassFull] – rubbery FM growl wobble])
([ClapWide])
([OpenHat])
([TapanThumpSync])

([VoxChopHook] – “riding around… riding around… night… night….”])
([ZurnaLead] – short aggressive stab])

Drop stab phrase:
“Ride it… ride it…”
→ ([VoxStab1/4] – “ride… ride… riiide…”])

⭐ BREAK — Floating Neon Night-Air

([VoxSpokenLow] – “feels like we’re flying…”)
([PadAir80s])
([StabSynth])
([ZurnaReverseBreath])
([VoxPitchDown] – “riding…”])

⭐ GROOVE LOOP B — New Chop Pattern

([VoxChopHi] – “favorite thing… favorite thing…”])
([VoxChopLow] – “got you… got you…”])

([BassSyncPulse])
([OrganStabsBright])
([DarbukaGhostRolls])

⭐ VERSE 2 — Faster, Airier, More Club

My new bike's got a headlight on the front
 ([VoxCloseDry])

Which is perfect cuz we're riding at night
 ([HatGhost1/16])

I also put one on my blue backpack
 ([SynthBell80s])

So you can see me coming from the back
 ([BassHintLow])

It feels like we're flying when we're going fast
 ([PadChorusWide])

With the wind blowing through our helmets' masks
 ([PercSnap])

And I feel like we're gonna fly away
 ([OrganStabLow])

If I just keep on giving it more gas
 ([ReverseFX + MiniRise])

⭐ DROP 2 — Extended Peak Club Drop

([BassGrowlBright–FM])
([ClapThicker])
([HatRide80s])
([ZurnaLeadFull])
([TapanRollFast])

([VoxMegaChop] – “riding… night… got you… fly away… ride… ride… ride….”])
([BassStabAnswer])

([ReverbThrow] – “night…” into space])

⭐ VERSE 3 — Playful, Driving, Still Club

Let's take it to a road that's not too far
 ([VoxWarmMono])

Where I can show you how I drive my car
 ([PercClickWide])

It's one of the best roads to drive a car
 ([PadThin])

Or a motorcycle like my new bike
 ([BassPulseMid])

And then let's go get a burger or two
 ([OrganStab])

Because I've got a secret place for food
 ([HatGhost1/16])

But first I need to go to my secret spot
 ([ZurnaSoftFilter])

Where I can show you how my new bike rocks
 ([MiniRise80s])

⭐ DROP 3 — Optional Final Smash

([BassFullFM + Distortion])
([ZurnaLeadWide])
([OrganStabsHuge])
([VoxChopFinal] – “riding… riding… riding…”])

⭐ OUTRO — DJ Friendly

([Kick+BassOnly])
([FilterLP])
([VoxChopFade] – “middle of the night…”])

---

# hardcore_pop - Midnight_Ride_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
A dark, swagger-heavy West Coast G-House remix at 124–126 BPM, blending hip-hop attitude with rolling bass-house energy, The track centers on a gritty analog bassline, distorted mid-bass growls, tight LA-club percussion, and minimalist FM synth stabs, Vocals are delivered in a seductive, low-spoken Serbian female tone—dry, intimate, rhythmic—paired with pitched-down vocal chops that form the main hook, The drops hit with heavy G-house wobble bass, open hats, and short siren FX, while verses stay stripped and moody with tight kick patterns and whispered lines, The “Ne želim te / Trebam te” refrain becomes a hypnotic club mantra, looped and chopped into the groove, The entire arrangement is built for DJs: long intros, powerful drops, and infectious vocal fragments that lock perfectly into the bassline, Sleek, dirty, confident — a pure  club grinder,

[LYRICS]
I bought a new motorcycle today Cuz my old one got stolen yesterday And now I'm just waiting for the sun to go down So I can ride my new bike around town The one with the cool shiny green gas tank The one with the extra powerful crank The one that matches my bright blue backpack The one I bought to replace my old bike [Chorus] Riding around in the middle of the night Is my favorite thing to do Riding around in the middle of the night But only if I got you [Verse 2] My new bike's got a headlight on the front Which is perfect cuz we're riding at night I also put one on my blue backpack So you can see me coming from the back It feels like we're flying when we're going fast With the wind blowing through our helmets' masks And I feel like we're gonna fly away If I just keep on giving it more gas [Chorus] Riding around in the middle of the night Is my favorite thing to do Riding around in the middle of the night But only if I got you [Verse 3] Let's take it to a road that's not too far Where I can show you how I drive my car It's one of the best roads to drive a car Or a motorcycle like my new bike And then let's go get a burger or two Because I've got a secret place for food But first I need to go to my secret spot Where I can show you how my new bike rocks [Chorus] Riding around in the middle of the night Is my favorite thing to do Riding around in the middle of the night But only if I got you

---

# hardcore_pop - Midnight_Ride_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
A dark, swagger-heavy West Coast G-House remix at 124–126 BPM, blending hip-hop attitude with rolling bass-house energy, The track centers on a gritty analog bassline, distorted mid-bass growls, tight LA-club percussion, and minimalist FM synth stabs, Vocals are delivered in a seductive, low-spoken Serbian female tone—dry, intimate, rhythmic—paired with pitched-down vocal chops that form the main hook, The drops hit with heavy G-house wobble bass, open hats, and short siren FX, while verses stay stripped and moody with tight kick patterns and whispered lines, The “Ne želim te / Trebam te” refrain becomes a hypnotic club mantra, looped and chopped into the groove, The entire arrangement is built for DJs: long intros, powerful drops, and infectious vocal fragments that lock perfectly into the bassline, Sleek, dirty, confident — a pure  club grinder,

[LYRICS]
I bought a new motorcycle today Cuz my old one got stolen yesterday And now I'm just waiting for the sun to go down So I can ride my new bike around town The one with the cool shiny green gas tank The one with the extra powerful crank The one that matches my bright blue backpack The one I bought to replace my old bike [Chorus] Riding around in the middle of the night Is my favorite thing to do Riding around in the middle of the night But only if I got you [Verse 2] My new bike's got a headlight on the front Which is perfect cuz we're riding at night I also put one on my blue backpack So you can see me coming from the back It feels like we're flying when we're going fast With the wind blowing through our helmets' masks And I feel like we're gonna fly away If I just keep on giving it more gas [Chorus] Riding around in the middle of the night Is my favorite thing to do Riding around in the middle of the night But only if I got you [Verse 3] Let's take it to a road that's not too far Where I can show you how I drive my car It's one of the best roads to drive a car Or a motorcycle like my new bike And then let's go get a burger or two Because I've got a secret place for food But first I need to go to my secret spot Where I can show you how my new bike rocks [Chorus] Riding around in the middle of the night Is my favorite thing to do Riding around in the middle of the night But only if I got you

# hardcore_pop - Mikonosicca_2
[DESCRIPTION]
At 155 BPM, the club track surges with a punishing low end, precisely carved kick and snare, and maximal harmonic saturation for system-crushing impact. Jagged acid synths cut through, unleashing resonant energy beside high-intensity Arabic violin lines with ornate microtonal slides. Vocals are sculpted with pronounced pitch effects, doubled layers, and atmospheric delays that swell with each riser and fill, maintaining relentless momentum and tension throughout.

[LYRICS]
[Verse 1]
Open pivo zubom- lav
ovo džungla, ja sam kralj
Mala high je kao zmaj
na sto stavi brda lajni
Sa postotkom punim kiblu
sto posto sa stokom  - sinus
vodkom šotom po to vinu
Šinu bankinu krivinu
Da su znali (uu-uu)
da su banuli žandari
zvali bi mi Natali (zvali bi mi natali)
Da su pala (uu-uu)
U biznisu ilegali
u vatru bi skakali (u vatru bi skakali)

[Chorus]
olala ee ja trošim dolare
ona to znala jee
pa zato sama je
mala muvala mee
na precizne nišane (ciljala)
lovom kupio jee
pa zato prišla je

[Verse 2]
Pijemo ko rusi turiraju brabusi
Volimo što tu si, lud si- voziš a-em-ge
varimo ko turci duvan,
 od lošeg sada je čuvam
Ali to je samo noćas
Za nju sutra briga mee
Iz mikonosa mala svoje telo mi je dala
Grčka boginja meni robinjaa
Pa me bez signala zvala
vidi nije ovo šala
oslobodilaa se svojih godinaa
Ti ko natti nataša
Kad leti, peta flaša
Neko ti preti baš sad
Tu sam za minut ili dva
tvoje vene nikotin
Žele mene niko tim,
kao ti i ja, ma ko ti je taj
Noći bele kokain
žene vrele- dopamin
opija me opija
ovo belo, a ona zmija (uvija)
njeno telo je ko milian
Živim levo, lepo vidi stan
roba bebo, je one milion
A sve je tu sada pijanoo,
ludo, nasnifanoo
Ja znam - ti znaš
- vraga si probudila
A sve je tu sada pijano
gola sa zijanom
ona gola
telo ti natti natasha

[Chorus]

ona to znala jee
pa zato sama jeee
mala muvala mee
na precizne nišane

# hardcore_pop - Mikonosicca_2
[DESCRIPTION]
Pulsing at 155 BPM, this underground slap house track centers on filthy, saturated sub-bass and punchy, syncopated drums. Dark acid synths carve gritty melodies, while violin layers weave Arabic modal phrases. Hypnotic, autotuned deep vocals float above razor-sharp hats, risers, and a relentless club groove.

# hardcore_pop - Mikonosicca_4
[DESCRIPTION]
An energetic tech groove at 145 bpm, anchored by a punchy kick, rolling bass, and hypnotic offbeat hats. Goa influences enter via undulating acid synths and spiraling arps. Sultry, breathy vocal textures weave through deep pads and stuttering FX, creating a mysterious late-night atmosphere.

# hardcore_pop - Mikonosicca_5
[DESCRIPTION]
At 155 BPM, the club track surges with a punishing low end, precisely carved kick and snare, and maximal harmonic saturation for system-crushing impact. Jagged acid synths cut through, unleashing resonant energy beside high-intensity Arabic violin lines with ornate microtonal slides. Vocals are sculpted with pronounced pitch effects, doubled layers, and atmospheric delays that swell with each riser and fill, maintaining relentless momentum and tension throughout.

[LYRICS]
[Verse 1]
Open pivo zubom- lav
ovo džungla, ja sam kralj
Mala high je kao zmaj (aha)
na sto stavi brda lajni
Sa postotkom punim kiblu 
sto posto sa stokom  - sinus
vodkom šotom po to vinu
Šinu bankinu krivinu
Da su znali (uu-uu)
da su banuli žandari
zvali bi mi Natali (zvali bi mi natali)
Da su pala (uu-uu)
U biznisu ilegali
u vatru bi skakali (u vatru bi skakali)

[Chorus]
olala ee ja trošim dolare
ona to znala jee (eeeee)
pa zato sama je
mala muvala mee (e-eee-e)
na precizne nišane (ciljala)
lovom kupio jee
pa zato prišla je

[Verse 2]
Pijemo ko rusi turiraju brabusi
Volimo što tu si, lud si- voziš a-em-ge
varimo ko turci duvan,
 od lošeg sada je čuvam
Ali to je samo noćas
Za nju sutra briga mee
Iz mikonosa mala, svoje telo mi je dala
Grčka boginja -meni robinjaa
Pa me bez signala zvala -
"vidi nije ovo šala ..."
oslobodilaa se svojih godinaa (aa aa)
Ti tako - natti, Nataša
Kad leti, peta flaša
Neko ti preti, baš sad?
Tu sam za minut ili dva
tvoje vene - nikotin
Žele mene - a niko tim,
kao ti i ja, ma ko ti je taj?
Noći bele - kokain
žene vrele- dopamin
opija me ,opija
ovo belo, a ona zmija (uvija)
njeno telo je ko milian
Živim levo, lepo vidi stan
roba bebo, je one milion
A sve je tu sada pijanoo, (ooo)
ludo, nasnifanoo
Ja znam - ti znaš
- vraga si probudila (ilaa illa)
A sve je tu sada pijano
gola sa zijanom 
ona gola (a la la)
telo ti natti - Natasha

[Chorus]
olala ee ja trošim dolare,
ona to znala jee
,pa zato sama jeee
,mala muvala mee,
na precizne nišane (ciljala)
lovom kupio jee,
pa zato prišla je (eeee)

# hardcore_pop - Mikonosicca_X_2
[DESCRIPTION]
This 150 BPM Balkan-EDM hybrid ignites the dancefloor from first note. Zurne wails cut through pounding 4/4 kicks and sidechained subs. The original melancholic melody is twisted into a glitched, robotic synth lead, soaring over seismic bass. Fiery distorted brass stabs and processed vocal chops create a relentless, non-stop percussive assault. Momentary filtered-kick breaths allow short relief, but the energy never drops. Granular vocal manipulation, pitch shifts, and stereo FX give depth and chaos. The track blends traditional Balkan soul with modern EDM fury, designed as a continuous, unrelenting floor-dominating weapon with maximum DJ mixability and instant crowd impact.

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - Intro (150 BPM)-accordion wail leads, 4/4 pounding kick, sidechained sub, Balkan brass hits distorted.*]

[Verse 1 - Male Vocal - pitched/glitched, defiant robotic tone, airy reverb tail.*]
Open pivo zubom- lav
ovo džungla, ja sam kralj
Mala high je kao zmaj (aha)
na sto stavi brda lajni
Sa postotkom punim kiblu
sto posto sa stokom  - sinus
vodkom šotom po to vinu
Šinu bankinu krivinu
Da su znali (uu-uu)
da su banuli žandari
zvali bi mi Natali (zvali bi mi natali)
Da su pali (uu-uu)
U biznisu ilegali
u vatru bi skakali (u vatru bi skakali)

[Instrumental - Bridge/Transition (150 BPM)-minimal momentary kick filter, airy sidechain, subtle glitch FX.*]

[Chorus - Male/Female Hybrid - vocoder layered, wide stereo, brass stabs, FM distortion.*]
olala ee ja trošim dolare
ona to znala jee (eeeee)
pa zato sama je
mala muvala mee (e-eee-e)
na precizne nišane (ciljala)
lovom kupio jee
pa zato prišla je

[Instrumental - Drop (150 BPM)-nonstop percussive assault, sidechained kick, twisted synth lead, full stereo brass, accordion motifs filtered/reversed, no silence.*]

[Verse 2 - Male Vocal - granular, pitch-modulated, glitch delay.*]
Pijemo ko rusi turiraju brabusi
Volimo što tu si, lud si- voziš a-em-ge
varimo ko turci duvan,
od lošeg sada je čuvam
Ali to je samo noćas
Za nju sutra briga mee

# hardcore_pop - Mikonosicca_XIX_2
[DESCRIPTION]
This tech house track surges at 133bpm, launching with a morphing deep bassline, syncopated percussion, and filtered club noise. Siren risers and rave stabs heighten tension as 80s MIDI synth hooks drive the buildup. Jungle ambience, organic drums, zurne, and cathedral organ textures layer in. The drop explodes with crowd roars, chopped chant samples, and intricate polyrhythms, keeping relentless, communal dancefloor energy at its peak.

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - Intro (150 BPM)-accordion wail leads, 4/4 pounding kick, sidechained sub, Balkan brass hits distorted.*]

[Verse 1 - Male Vocal - pitched/glitched, defiant robotic tone, airy reverb tail.*]

# hardcore_pop - Mikonosicca_XV_2
[DESCRIPTION]
This EDM banger erupts at 150 BPM,igniting the floor with a relentless fusion of Balkan soul and modern fury. It opens with the iconic,wailing cry of a traditional accordion sample,immediately hijacked by a pounding,4/4 kick drum that feels like a heartbeat on steroids. The original melancholic melody is twisted into a weaponized synth lead,soaring over a seismic,sidechained bassline that never relents. Fiery Balkan brass stabs,processed through distortion and delay,punch through the mix like gunshots,while the original vocal—pitched and glitched—becomes a defiant,robotic mantra commanding you to move. There are no breakdowns,only momentary breathers where the kick filters back in with more punishing force. This is a non-stop,percussive assault designed for pure,unadulterated chaos; a track that doesn't build to a drop,but rather IS the drop from start to finish. It's a timeless melody supercharged into a futuristic,unrelenting beast that grabs you by the soul and refuses to let go u

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - Intro (150 BPM)-accordion wail leads, 4/4 pounding kick, sidechained sub, Balkan brass hits distorted.*]

[Verse 1 - Male Vocal - pitched/glitched, defiant robotic tone, airy reverb tail.*]
Open pivo zubom- lav
ovo džungla, ja sam kralj
Mala high je kao zmaj (aha)
na sto stavi brda lajni
Sa postotkom punim kiblu
sto posto sa stokom  - sinus
vodkom šotom po to vinu
Šinu bankinu krivinu

da su banuli žandari
zvali bi mi Natali (zvali bi mi natali)
Da su pali (uu-uu)
U biznisu ilegali
u vatru bi skakali (u vatru bi skakali)

[Instrumental - Bridge/Transition (150 BPM)-minimal momentary kick filter, airy sidechain, subtle glitch FX.*]

# hardcore_pop - Mikonosicca_XVII_2
[DESCRIPTION]
"Extasy" merges raw gangsta/street rap aesthetics with bounce-inspired elements, creating a distinctive sonic hybrid. The track combines dark trap beats and aggressive flows with an unconventional foundation built around the iconic "Who Let the Dogs Out?" sample. Deep 808 sub-bass frequencies provide the pulsating low-end that encourages the rhythmic knee-bending motion central to bounce dance technique. The production incorporates call-and-response elements in its hook structure, while the fast tempo and driving four-on-the-floor kick pattern create an irresistible groove that bridges New Orleans bounce influences with German street rap. This fusion maintains the genre's crew-based dynamics and unfiltered authenticity while optimizing the instrumental for maximum physical response, exemplifying how bounce's dance-oriented principles can elevate gangsta rap's underground credibility to achieve mainstream appeal through its body-moving production.

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - Intro (150 BPM)-accordion wail leads, 4/4 pounding kick, sidechained sub, Balkan brass hits distorted.*]

[Verse 1 - Male Vocal - pitched/glitched, defiant robotic tone, airy reverb tail.*]
Open pivo zubom- lav
ovo džungla, ja sam kralj
Mala high je kao zmaj (aha)
na sto stavi brda lajni
Sa postotkom punim kiblu
sto posto sa stokom  - sinus
vodkom šotom po to vinu
Šinu bankinu krivinu
Da su znali (uu-uu)
da su banuli žandari
zvali bi mi Natali (zvali bi mi natali)
Da su pali (uu-uu)

# hardcore_pop - Mikonosicca_XVII_2
[DESCRIPTION]
"Extasy" merges raw gangsta/street rap aesthetics with bounce-inspired elements, creating a distinctive sonic hybrid. The track combines dark trap beats and aggressive flows with an unconventional foundation built around the iconic "Who Let the Dogs Out?" sample. Deep 808 sub-bass frequencies provide the pulsating low-end that encourages the rhythmic knee-bending motion central to bounce dance technique. The production incorporates call-and-response elements in its hook structure, while the fast tempo and driving four-on-the-floor kick pattern create an irresistible groove that bridges New Orleans bounce influences with German street rap. This fusion maintains the genre's crew-based dynamics and unfiltered authenticity while optimizing the instrumental for maximum physical response, exemplifying how bounce's dance-oriented principles can elevate gangsta rap's underground credibility to achieve mainstream appeal through its body-moving production.

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - Intro (150 BPM)-accordion wail leads, 4/4 pounding kick, sidechained sub, Balkan brass hits distorted.*]

[Verse 1 - Male Vocal - pitched/glitched, defiant robotic tone, airy reverb tail.*]
Open pivo zubom- lav
ovo džungla, ja sam kralj
Mala high je kao zmaj (aha)
na sto stavi brda lajni
Sa postotkom punim kiblu
sto posto sa stokom  - sinus
vodkom šotom po to vinu
Šinu bankinu krivinu

da su banuli žandari
zvali bi mi Natali (zvali bi mi natali)

# hardcore_pop - Mikonosicca_XX_2
[DESCRIPTION]
This house track fuses hypnotic tabla programming and a driving kick for a polyrhythmic groove. Chopped Sanskrit mantras form lush, processed vocal layers over pitch-bent, filtered sitar leads, all atop an acid bassline with resonant sweeps. Drones from granulated tanpura, Indian percussion, and claps unite in the build, ascending with raga scales and complex tabla, leading to a drop packed with distorted kicks. Synth arps echo Bhairav raga at 134 BPM. The breakdown strips to chanting and drone before rebuilding the groove, expertly balancing dancefloor energy with spiritual textures.

[LYRICS]

# hardcore_pop - Mikonosicca_XXI_2
[DESCRIPTION]
A 135 bpm tech house track opens with syncopated percussion, crisp claps, and dynamic hand drum fills driving the groove. Gritty bass and clipped synth stabs intertwine as bold, panned tribal riffs slice through. The breakdown features modal trumpet over interlocked organ runs, then a drop erupts with jungle-influenced vocals, catchy chopped samples, cathedral chants, and swirling echoes. The zurle ebbs and flows, warping in the mix, as hypnotic, addictively rhythmic layers propel the relentless dancefloor finale.

# hardcore_pop - Mikonosicca_XXII_2
[DESCRIPTION]
A hypnotic tech house groove pulses with tight bass and crisp, driving percussion, while moody, underground club ambiences set the scene. Siren-style risers and chopped rave samples slice in atop bass that morphs subtly throughout. 80s-inspired midi synths layer melodic hooks, and sampled crowd cheers and chant vocals explode with raw, communal energy at each drop.

[DESCRIPTION]
The tech house groove starts with punchy dynamic 808s laying a deep, rolling foundation. Layered atop is a zurle weaving in an entrancing, repetitive motif. Crisp hi-hats and minimalist claps drive the energy, while shifting percussive textures keep the arrangement hypnotic and fluid.

# hardcore_pop - Mikonosicca_XXVI_2
[DESCRIPTION]
This tech house track surges at 133bpm, launching with a morphing deep bassline, syncopated percussion, and filtered club noise. Siren risers and rave stabs heighten tension as 80s MIDI synth hooks drive the buildup. Jungle ambience, organic drums, zurne, and cathedral organ textures layer in. The drop explodes with crowd roars, chopped chant samples, and intricate polyrhythms, keeping relentless, communal dancefloor energy at its peak.

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - Intro (150 BPM)-accordion wail leads, 4/4 pounding kick, sidechained sub, Balkan brass hits distorted.*]
([Engine idle rumble (sub)] - rrrrrr)
([Traffic hum / distant city] - mmmmmmrum)
([Vinyl crackle / static] - pftcrackle)
([Police siren distant] - teenooneenoo)

[Verse 1 - Male Vocal - pitched/glitched, defiant robotic tone, airy reverb tail.*]
Open pivo zubom- lav
([Bottle pop] - pop)
ovo džungla, ja sam kralj
([Tiger growl FX] - grrrr)
Mala high je kao zmaj (aha)
([Exhale / smoke] - haaah)
na sto stavi brda lajni
([Line cut FX] - snip snip)
Sa postotkom punim kiblu
sto posto sa stokom  - sinus
([Sub rumble rise] - rrrrrr)
vodkom šotom po to vinu
([Shot glass hit] - clink)
Šinu bankinu krivinu
([Tire screech] - skreeeech)
Da su znali (uu-uu)
([Police siren approach] - neenawnaw)
da su banuli žandari
([Radio static] - bzzztch)
zvali bi mi Natali (zvali bi mi natali)
Da su pali (uu-uu)
([Handcuff click] - klik)
U biznisu ilegali
u vatru bi skakali (u vatru bi skakali)
([Fire crackle] - crackcrack)

[Instrumental - Bridge/Transition (150 BPM)-minimal momentary kick filter, airy sidechain, subtle glitch FX.*]
([Windshield wiper] - swishswish)
([Rain on windshield] - patterpatter)
([Tire skid distant] - skiiid)
([Door slam] - slam)

[Chorus - Male/Female Hybrid - vocoder layered, wide stereo, brass stabs, FM distortion.*]
olala ee ja trošim dolare
([Cash rustle] - shhhff)
ona to znala jee (eeeee)
([Camera flash] - chkchk)
pa zato sama je
([Horn short honk] - honk)
mala muvala mee (e-eee-e)
([Whisper laugh] - huhh)
na precizne nišane (ciljala)
([Gun cock FX] - klik-klak)
lovom kupio jee
([Coin drop] - cling)
pa zato prišla je
([Police siren near] - teenooneenoo)

[Instrumental - Drop (150 BPM)-nonstop percussive assault, sidechained kick, twisted synth lead, full stereo brass, accordion motifs filtered/reversed, no silence.*]
([Car alarm] - weeoowee)
([Tire screech] - skreeeech)
([Engine rev] - vrrrroom)
([Glass crack] - krack)
([Metal scrape] - shrrrk)
([Explosion hit] - BOOM)

[Verse 2 - Male Vocal - granular, pitch-modulated, glitch delay.*]
Pijemo ko rusi turiraju brabusi
([Engine rev sync] - vrrrroom-vrrrroom)
Volimo što tu si, lud si- voziš a-em-ge
([Tire on gravel] - rrrrsh)
varimo ko turci duvan,
([Inhale FX] - hhhhhh)
od lošeg sada je čuvam
Ali to je samo noćas
([Rain tap] - patterpatter)
Za nju sutra briga mee
([Vinyl hiss] - pftcrackle)
Iz mikonosa mala, svoje telo mi je dala
([Wave crash FX] - swooosh)
Grčka boginja -meni robinjaa
([Whisper echo FX] - goddess)
Pa me bez signala zvala -
([Phone buzz] - bzzzt)
"vidi nije ovo šala ..."
([Click] - klik)
oslobodilaa se svojih godinaa (aa aa)
([Siren distant echo] - wooowooo)
Ti tako - natti, Nataša
([Breath short] - haaah)
Kad leti, peta flaša
([Bottle clink] - klink)
Neko ti preti, baš sad?
Tu sam za minut ili dva
([Door slam] - slam)
tvoje vene - nikotin
Žele mene - a niko tim,
kao ti i ja, ma ko ti je taj?
([Heartbeat FX] - thumpthump)
Noći bele - kokain
([Sniff FX] - snff)
žene vrele- dopamin
([Breath exhale] - haaah)
opija me ,opija
ovo belo, a ona zmija (uvija)
([Snake hiss] - sssss)
njeno telo je ko milian
([Camera flash] - chkchk)
Živim levo, lepo vidi stan
([Footstep echo] - tapptap)
roba bebo, je one milion
([Money rustle] - shhhfff)
A sve je tu sada pijanoo, (ooo)
([Glass clink] - tkk)
ludo, nasnifanoo
([Police siren distant] - neenawnaw)
Ja znam - ti znaš

[Female Vocal - Bridge/Hook - vocoder + reverb bloom, layered robotic adlibs.*]
vraga si probudila (ilaa illa)
([Low wind FX] - whooosh)
A sve je tu sada pijano
([Bottle roll FX] - rrrll)
gola sa zijanom
([Footstep soft] - tap-tap)
ona gola (a la la)
([Breath exhale] - haaah)
telo ti natti - Natasha
([Heartbeat slow] - thumpthump)

[Chorus - Male/Female Hybrid - punchy sidechain, brass stabs, glitch arpeggio, stereo width maxed.*]
olala ee ja trošim dolare,
([Cash rustle] - shhhfff)
ona to znala jee
([Police siren approach] - neenawneenaw)
,pa zato sama jeee
,mala muvala mee,
([Car rev distant] - vrrroom)
na precizne nišane (ciljala)
([Gun cock FX] - klik-klak)
lovom kupio jee,
([Coin drop] - cling)
pa zato prišla je (eeee)
([Siren fadeout] - wooowoo)

[Instrumental - Outro/Blend (150 BPM)-kick dominates, brass filtered, accordion loops twisted, glitch FX tails, ready for DJ mix-in.*]
([Tire hop / gravel throw] - chikchik)
([Engine idle rumble] - rrrrrr)
([Door slam distant] - slam)
([Rain fade] - patterpatter)
([Vinyl crackle slow] - pftcrackle)

[Instrumental - Fade to Silence - lowpass, sidechain tail, sub maintained for seamless blend.*]
([Windshield wiper slow] - swishswish)
([Traffic hum distant] - mmmmmmrum)
([Breath fade] - haaah)

---

# hardcore_pop - Mikonosicca_XXVI_2
[DESCRIPTION]
This tech house track surges at 133bpm, launching with a morphing deep bassline, syncopated percussion, and filtered club noise. Siren risers and rave stabs heighten tension as 80s MIDI synth hooks drive the buildup. Jungle ambience, organic drums, zurne, and cathedral organ textures layer in. The drop explodes with crowd roars, chopped chant samples, and intricate polyrhythms, keeping relentless, communal dancefloor energy at its peak.

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - Intro (150 BPM)-accordion wail leads, 4/4 pounding kick, sidechained sub, Balkan brass hits distorted.*]
([Engine idle rumble (sub)] - rrrrrr)
([Traffic hum / distant city] - mmmmmmrum)
([Vinyl crackle / static] - pftcrackle)
([Police siren distant] - teenooneenoo)

[Verse 1 - Male Vocal - pitched/glitched, defiant robotic tone, airy reverb tail.*]
Open pivo zubom- lav
([Bottle pop] - pop)
ovo džungla, ja sam kralj
([Tiger growl FX] - grrrr)
Mala high je kao zmaj (aha)
([Exhale / smoke] - haaah)
na sto stavi brda lajni
([Line cut FX] - snip snip)
Sa postotkom punim kiblu
sto posto sa stokom  - sinus
([Sub rumble rise] - rrrrrr)
vodkom šotom po to vinu
([Shot glass hit] - clink)
Šinu bankinu krivinu
([Tire screech] - skreeeech)
Da su znali (uu-uu)
([Police siren approach] - neenawnaw)
da su banuli žandari
([Radio static] - bzzztch)
zvali bi mi Natali (zvali bi mi natali)
Da su pali (uu-uu)
([Handcuff click] - klik)
U biznisu ilegali
u vatru bi skakali (u vatru bi skakali)
([Fire crackle] - crackcrack)

[Instrumental - Bridge/Transition (150 BPM)-minimal momentary kick filter, airy sidechain, subtle glitch FX.*]
([Windshield wiper] - swishswish)
([Rain on windshield] - patterpatter)
([Tire skid distant] - skiiid)
([Door slam] - slam)

[Chorus - Male/Female Hybrid - vocoder layered, wide stereo, brass stabs, FM distortion.*]
olala ee ja trošim dolare
([Cash rustle] - shhhff)
ona to znala jee (eeeee)
([Camera flash] - chkchk)
pa zato sama je
([Horn short honk] - honk)
mala muvala mee (e-eee-e)
([Whisper laugh] - huhh)
na precizne nišane (ciljala)
([Gun cock FX] - klik-klak)
lovom kupio jee
([Coin drop] - cling)
pa zato prišla je
([Police siren near] - teenooneenoo)

[Instrumental - Drop (150 BPM)-nonstop percussive assault, sidechained kick, twisted synth lead, full stereo brass, accordion motifs filtered/reversed, no silence.*]
([Car alarm] - weeoowee)
([Tire screech] - skreeeech)
([Engine rev] - vrrrroom)
([Glass crack] - krack)
([Metal scrape] - shrrrk)
([Explosion hit] - BOOM)

[Verse 2 - Male Vocal - granular, pitch-modulated, glitch delay.*]
Pijemo ko rusi turiraju brabusi
([Engine rev sync] - vrrrroom-vrrrroom)
Volimo što tu si, lud si- voziš a-em-ge
([Tire on gravel] - rrrrsh)
varimo ko turci duvan,
([Inhale FX] - hhhhhh)
od lošeg sada je čuvam
Ali to je samo noćas
([Rain tap] - patterpatter)
Za nju sutra briga mee
([Vinyl hiss] - pftcrackle)
Iz mikonosa mala, svoje telo mi je dala
([Wave crash FX] - swooosh)
Grčka boginja -meni robinjaa
([Whisper echo FX] - goddess)
Pa me bez signala zvala -
([Phone buzz] - bzzzt)
"vidi nije ovo šala ..."
([Click] - klik)
oslobodilaa se svojih godinaa (aa aa)
([Siren distant echo] - wooowooo)
Ti tako - natti, Nataša
([Breath short] - haaah)
Kad leti, peta flaša
([Bottle clink] - klink)
Neko ti preti, baš sad?
Tu sam za minut ili dva
([Door slam] - slam)
tvoje vene - nikotin
Žele mene - a niko tim,
kao ti i ja, ma ko ti je taj?
([Heartbeat FX] - thumpthump)
Noći bele - kokain
([Sniff FX] - snff)
žene vrele- dopamin
([Breath exhale] - haaah)
opija me ,opija
ovo belo, a ona zmija (uvija)
([Snake hiss] - sssss)
njeno telo je ko milian
([Camera flash] - chkchk)
Živim levo, lepo vidi stan
([Footstep echo] - tapptap)
roba bebo, je one milion
([Money rustle] - shhhfff)

([Glass clink] - tkk)
ludo, nasnifanoo
([Police siren distant] - neenawnaw)
Ja znam - ti znaš

[Female Vocal - Bridge/Hook - vocoder + reverb bloom, layered robotic adlibs.*]
vraga si probudila (ilaa illa)
([Low wind FX] - whooosh)

([Bottle roll FX] - rrrll)
gola sa zijanom
([Footstep soft] - tap-tap)
ona gola (a la la)
([Breath exhale] - haaah)
telo ti natti - Natasha
([Heartbeat slow] - thumpthump)

[Chorus - Male/Female Hybrid - punchy sidechain, brass stabs, glitch arpeggio, stereo width maxed.*]
olala ee ja trošim dolare,
([Cash rustle] - shhhfff)
ona to znala jee
([Police siren approach] - neenawneenaw)
,pa zato sama jeee
,mala muvala mee,
([Car rev distant] - vrrroom)
na precizne nišane (ciljala)
([Gun cock FX] - klik-klak)
lovom kupio jee,
([Coin drop] - cling)
pa zato prišla je (eeee)
([Siren fadeout] - wooowoo)

[Instrumental - Outro/Blend (150 BPM)-kick dominates, brass filtered, accordion loops twisted, glitch FX tails, ready for DJ mix-in.*]
([Tire hop / gravel throw] - chikchik)
([Engine idle rumble] - rrrrrr)
([Door slam distant] - slam)
([Rain fade] - patterpatter)
([Vinyl crackle slow] - pftcrackle)

[Instrumental - Fade to Silence - lowpass, sidechain tail, sub maintained for seamless blend.*]
([Windshield wiper slow] - swishswish)
([Traffic hum distant] - mmmmmmrum)
([Breath fade] - haaah)

# hardcore_pop - Mikonosicca_XXVI_2
[DESCRIPTION]
This tech house track surges at 133bpm, launching with a morphing deep bassline, syncopated percussion, and filtered club noise. Siren risers and rave stabs heighten tension as 80s MIDI synth hooks drive the buildup. Jungle ambience, organic drums, zurne, and cathedral organ textures layer in. The drop explodes with crowd roars, chopped chant samples, and intricate polyrhythms, keeping relentless, communal dancefloor energy at its peak.

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - Intro (150 BPM)-accordion wail leads, 4/4 pounding kick, sidechained sub, Balkan brass hits distorted.*]
([Engine idle rumble (sub)] - rrrrrr)
([Traffic hum / distant city] - mmmmmmrum)
([Vinyl crackle / static] - pftcrackle)
([Police siren distant] - teenooneenoo)

[Verse 1 - Male Vocal - pitched/glitched, defiant robotic tone, airy reverb tail.*]

# hardcore_pop - MiXaLL x GINAILLU x ARPINO SACHI x GAZZZ_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
At 128 bpm pulsating club tech track , zurle, organ,80s midi synths, car siren,hypnotic, sultry reggaeton vibes, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Intro]
([Sub-bass swell] - vwoooom)
([Vinyl crackle] - pftcrackle)
([Distant club crowd] - mmmrum)
([Reverse sweep into beat] - whoooosh)

[Verse 1]
Daj bejbe daj, da te provozam kroz kraj
([Ad-lib, chopped] - "daj, daj, daj")
Pa to zgas, dok smo high
([Hi-hat roll] - tktktk) ([808 hit] - boooom)
Malo sniff, malo blajv, bejbe
([Sniff FX] - snff) ([Air sweep] - fshhhh)
Daj spusti gard, digni suknju, skini klajn
([Vocal chop] - "spusti, digni, skini")
Hajde klekni da ti dam, danas je tvoj srećan dan
([Kick+snare] - boom-tchk) ([Female FX, soft] - mmm)

[Chorus]
Da da daj bejbe todaj gas
([Chant layer] - "daj, daj, daj")
Digni suknju, skini klajn
([Tape stop] - skrrr)
Daj mi parče guze da na njemu gram nacrtam
([Scratch FX] - chk-chk-chk)
Da budem lud i nasnifa po celu noć i ceo dan
([Delay vox] - "ceo dan… noć i dan…")
Ne dam pare sve na ler
([Engine rev] - vrrrroom) ([808 glide] - woooob)

[Verse 2]
Upecela novi ge, pa na dozi me vozi mala
([Bounce ad-lib] - "ey, ey")
Ometala logike da nestaju iz tog signala
([Phone glitch] - bzzzt)
Al' ta mala štetna kada getom šeta
([Steps on gravel] - tptptp)
Pada svima meta, delikventna joj
([Gun cock SFX, distant] - *chk*)
Ona je smerala da nestanem ja iz tog stana
([Reverb throw] - "nestanem, nestanem")
Sve vreme me gledala, vrebala ko iguana
([Snake hiss] - ssshhh)
Sebe je spremala, a vrebala bi igru grama
([Vocal chop] - "igram, gram, gram")
Sve je po šemama, tu nema tebi, samo nama
([Choir pad wide] - aaaaah)

[Instrumental]
([808 & kick pattern solo] - boom… boom-boom… boom)
([Acid lead riff] - nyooo-nyooo)
([Hi-hat triplets] - tktktk-tktktk)
([Risers & impacts] - whooosh / DOOM)

[Vocal chops]
([Chopped vox] - "daj… bejbe… gas… gas…")
([Stutter FX] - "noć… noć… noć svaku…")
([Formant-shifted vox] - "ler… ler… ler")
([Delay ping-pong] - "mala, mala, mala")

[Chorus]
Noć svaku dodaje gas,
šije, pije, bez kočnice
([Tire screech] - skreeee)
Glumi da gubi glas,
Dok skidam joj šljokice
([Glitter shake FX] - shhhh)
Noć svaku dodaje gas,
šije, pij, bez kočnice
([Engine rev layered] - vrrr-vrrr-vrrr)
Glumi da gubi glas,
Dok skidam joj šljokice
([Breath FX, close] - haaah) ([Vocal chop] - "gas, gas")

[Outro]
([Low-pass filter sweep on beat] - fwooom)
([Crowd fade-out] - mmmrum… )
([Vinyl stop] - skrrrt)
([Last 808 tail] - boooooom)

---

# hardcore_pop - MiXaLL x GINAILLU x ARPINO SACHI x GAZZZ_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
At 128 bpm pulsating club tech track , zurle, organ,80s midi synths, car siren,hypnotic, sultry reggaeton vibes, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Intro]
([Sub-bass swell] - vwoooom)
([Vinyl crackle] - pftcrackle)
([Distant club crowd] - mmmrum)
([Reverse sweep into beat] - whoooosh)

[Verse 1]
Daj bejbe daj, da te provozam kroz kraj
([Ad-lib, chopped] - "daj, daj, daj")
Pa to zgas, dok smo high
([Hi-hat roll] - tktktk) ([808 hit] - boooom)
Malo sniff, malo blajv, bejbe
([Sniff FX] - snff) ([Air sweep] - fshhhh)
Daj spusti gard, digni suknju, skini klajn
([Vocal chop] - "spusti, digni, skini")
Hajde klekni da ti dam, danas je tvoj srećan dan
([Kick+snare] - boom-tchk) ([Female FX, soft] - mmm)

[Chorus]
Da da daj bejbe todaj gas
([Chant layer] - "daj, daj, daj")
Digni suknju, skini klajn
([Tape stop] - skrrr)
Daj mi parče guze da na njemu gram nacrtam
([Scratch FX] - chk-chk-chk)
Da budem lud i nasnifa po celu noć i ceo dan
([Delay vox] - "ceo dan… noć i dan…")
Ne dam pare sve na ler
([Engine rev] - vrrrroom) ([808 glide] - woooob)

[Verse 2]
Upecela novi ge, pa na dozi me vozi mala
([Bounce ad-lib] - "ey, ey")
Ometala logike da nestaju iz tog signala
([Phone glitch] - bzzzt)
Al' ta mala štetna kada getom šeta
([Steps on gravel] - tptptp)
Pada svima meta, delikventna joj
([Gun cock SFX, distant] - *chk*)
Ona je smerala da nestanem ja iz tog stana
([Reverb throw] - "nestanem, nestanem")
Sve vreme me gledala, vrebala ko iguana
([Snake hiss] - ssshhh)
Sebe je spremala, a vrebala bi igru grama
([Vocal chop] - "igram, gram, gram")
Sve je po šemama, tu nema tebi, samo nama
([Choir pad wide] - aaaaah)

[Instrumental]
([808 & kick pattern solo] - boom… boom-boom… boom)
([Acid lead riff] - nyooo-nyooo)
([Hi-hat triplets] - tktktk-tktktk)
([Risers & impacts] - whooosh / DOOM)

[Vocal chops]
([Chopped vox] - "daj… bejbe… gas… gas…")
([Stutter FX] - "noć… noć… noć svaku…")
([Formant-shifted vox] - "ler… ler… ler")
([Delay ping-pong] - "mala, mala, mala")

[Chorus]
Noć svaku dodaje gas,
šije, pije, bez kočnice
([Tire screech] - skreeee)
Glumi da gubi glas,
Dok skidam joj šljokice
([Glitter shake FX] - shhhh)
Noć svaku dodaje gas,
šije, pij, bez kočnice
([Engine rev layered] - vrrr-vrrr-vrrr)
Glumi da gubi glas,
Dok skidam joj šljokice
([Breath FX, close] - haaah) ([Vocal chop] - "gas, gas")

[Outro]
([Low-pass filter sweep on beat] - fwooom)
([Crowd fade-out] - mmmrum… )
([Vinyl stop] - skrrrt)
([Last 808 tail] - boooooom)

# hardcore_pop - MiXaLL x POGLEDOM TE UBIJAM_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
bouncy undeground slap club tech Turkish oriental pop ,  car honks, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Intro]
Pogledom me ubijaš
Vidim sve bi da mi daš
Sve je jasno kao dan
Osmehom ti uzvraćam
I da ispunim ti san
Pogledom te ubijam
Vidiš sve bi da ti dam
Bejbe danas je tvoj dan

[Verse 1]
U klubu noć je vrela svi su tu
Oko mene brdo riba treba ko da sam u snu
Prepuštam se momentu i samo neka vozi, vozi
Nisam podložan nervozi
U dubokoj hipnozi ko da sam na duploj dozi
Blicaju mi strobo vi, ludimo u gromovi
U dubokoj hipnozi ko da sam na duploj dozi
Blicaju mi strobo vi, ludimo u gromovi

[Chorus]
Pogledom me ubijaš
Vidim sve bi da mi daš
Sve je jasno kao dan
Osmehom ti uzvraćam
Pogledom te ubijam
Vidiš sve bi da ti dam
Osmehom mi uzvraćaš
Želiš sve bi da mi daš

[Verse 2]
Hoćeš da se sutra hoću da se zabavim
Kad iz dima eto ti ispred mene stala si
Ko da misli čitaš mi, pokretima zavodiš
Kako da ti odolim, kada tako dobra si
Za tren oka prišla si, miris tvoj me zanosi
Neznam kako podnosim, vreli ti gore obrazi
Topiš me ko viski led, mala slatka si ko med
Hajde kući vodim te, celu noć da volim te

[Bridge]
Radiću ti baš sve što ti pada na pamet
Želim da mi šapućeš kako to radim najbolje
Dok sa sebe skidaš sve polako mi se predaješ
Onako kako ti znaš, počneš i ne prestaješ
Ko da sam na vrhu sveta kad te gledam dok me gledaš
Pomeramo granice, okrećemo stranice
Vodiću te tamo, gde još nisi bila
Hajde reci moja mila, zašto do sad si se krila
Biću tvoj princ iz bajke, a ti budi moja vila
Znam da pričaš drugarici da nisi zažalila

[Chorus]
Radiću ti baš sve što ti pada na pamet
Želim da mi šapućeš kako to radim najbolje
Pogledom me ubijaš
Vidim sve bi da mi daš
Sve je jasno kao dan
Osmehom ti uzvraćam
I da ispunim ti san
Pogledom te ubijam
Vidiš sve bi da ti dam
Bejbe danas je tvoj dan

[Outro]
(Na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na

# hardcore_pop - MiXaLL x POGLEDOM TE UBIJAM_Hardcore_Pop_2
[DESCRIPTION]
Bouncy underground slap-club tech Turkish oriental pop,~124BPM.Solid 4-on-the-floor kick with slap-house feel,round sub+rubbery mid-bass,crisp 1/8 hats,claps with short room verb.Turkish-style oriental leads(zurna/saz-like synth),warm organs and soft plucks.Car honks and short tire-screech FX as rhythmic stabs+risers.Dynamic,dance non-stop groove.Silk-smooth male lead vocal,no autotune,just clean compression,EQ and light plate reverb.Backvocals smooth,call-and-response,never shouted.]

[LYRICS]
[Intro–Filtered slap-club groove,LPF kick+slap bass,muted hats,soft organ chords,very quiet oriental hook in background.Distant city ambience,occasional soft car honk,subtle tire-screech reverse into first line.Vocal dry-ish,close,light plate 5–7%,no delay.]

Pogledom me ubijaš
Vidim sve bi da mi daš
Sve je jasno kao dan
Osmehom ti uzvraćam
I da ispunim ti san
Pogledom te ubijam
Vidiš sve bi da ti dam
Bejbe danas je tvoj dan ([BV]-bejbе,danas je tvoj dan)

[Verse 1–Full groove drops in:short punchy kick,slap-club bass,1/8 hats+occasional 1/16 rolls,clap on 2/4.Organ+pluck stabs on offbeats,oriental lead doing short answers.Car honks on syncopations,tire-screech FX short riser every 4–8 bars.Vocal smooth,confident,compressed 3–4:1,clear Serbian diction,subtle plate 8–10%,no delay.]

U klubu noć je vrela svi su tu
Oko mene brdo riba tebra ko da sam u snu
Prepuštam se momentu i samo neka vozi, vozi ([BV]-vozi,vozi)
Nisam podložan nervozi
U dubokoj hipnozi ko da sam na duploj dozi
Blicaju mi strobo vi, ludimo u gromovi
U dubokoj hipnozi ko da sam na duploj dozi ([BV]-hipnozi,dupla doza)
Blicaju mi strobo vi, u dimu gromovi

[Chorus–Bass+drums slightly louder(+1dB),hats a bit brighter,oriental lead plays main hook doubled with airy synth.Car honks become part of groove(like percussive stabs),short tire-screech riser into first line.Backvocals soft,wide,call-and-response with lead,light reverb+short 1/8 delay only on BVs.Leading vocal always center,most forward element.]

Pogledom me ubijaš ([BV]-ubijaš,ubijaš)
Vidim sve bi da mi daš ([BV]-sve bi da mi daš)
Sve je jasno kao dan
Osmehom ti uzvraćam ([BV]-osmехom)
Pogledom te ubijam ([BV]-te ubijam)
Vidiš sve bi da ti dam ([BV]-sve bi da ti dam)
Osmehom mi uzvraćaš
Želiš sve bi da mi daš ([BV]-želiš,sve bi da mi daš)

[Verse 2–Groove stays full,add gentle extra perc(looped shaker),more active bass fills between phrases.Oriental lead simpler,leaving space for vocal.Organ plays warmer sustained chords in pre-lines.Vocal slightly more intimate,maybe 0.5dB louder,same tone,smooth delivery.]

Hoćeš da se sutra hoću da se zabavim
Kad iz dima eto ti ispred mene stala si
Ko da misli čitaš mi, pokretima zavodiš ([BV]-čitaš mi,zavodiš)
Kako da ti odolim, kada tako dobra si
Za tren oka prišla si, miris tvoj me zanosi
Neznam kako podnosim, vreli ti gore obrazi
Topiš me ko viski led, mala slatka si ko med
Hajde kući vodim te, celu noć da volim te ([BV]-volim te,volim te)

[Bridge–Energy drop but groove still moving.Kick+bass slightly filtered,clap softer,hats swapped for soft shaker and light tambourine.Car honks rare,one or two in distance.Tire-screech reversed into key lines.Oriental lead more emotional,legato phrases.Overall more reverb 10–15% on instruments for dreamy “late-night club” feel.Vocal:breathier,more reverb,longer tail,still clear,no delay on lead,only on BVs.]

Radiću ti baš sve što ti pada na pamet ([BV]-baš sve,što ti pada na pamet)
Želim da mi šapućeš kako to radim najbolje ([BV]-šapućeš,najbolje)
Dok sa sebe skidaš sve polako mi se predaješ
Onako kako ti znaš, počneš i ne prestaješ
Ko da sam na vrhu sveta kad te gledam dok me gledaš
Pomeramo granice, okrećemo stranice
Vodiću te tamo, gde još nisi bila
Hajde reci moja mila, zašto do sad si se krila ([BV]-moja mila,što si se krila)
Biću tvoj princ iz bajke, a ti budi moja vila
Znam da pričaš drugarici da nisi zažalila ([BV]-nisi,nisі zažalila)

[Chorus–Final big lift:drums+bass at max,extra clap layer with tiny room verb,oriental lead + high airy synth stacking hook.Car honks more rhythmic(tied to snare offbeats),short tire-screech riser into first line,noise uplifter.Vocal lead thickened with subtle double;BVs fuller choir-like,ooh/aaah underneath key lines.]

Radiću ti baš sve što ti pada na pamet ([BV]-baš sve,baš sve)
Želim da mi šapućeš kako to radim najbolje
Pogledom me ubijaš ([BV]-ubijaš,ubijaš)
Vidim sve bi da mi daš
Sve je jasno kao dan
Osmehom ti uzvraćam ([BV]-osmехom)
I da ispunim ti san
Pogledom te ubijam ([BV]-te ubijam)
Vidiš sve bi da ti dam
Bejbe danas je tvoj dan ([BV]-bejbе,danas je tvoj dan)

[Outro–Beat slowly thins:remove extra perc,then clap,then bass,last few bars just soft kick,shaker,quiet organ+oriental lead humming main motif.Car honk one last time as soft distant accent,no tire screech.Final “na-na” hook wide stereo,stacked vocals,light reverb,long tail;instruments fade right after.]

(Na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na) ([BV]-harmonized “na-na” thirds+octaves,wide stereo)

---

# hardcore_pop - Mondicci_5
[DESCRIPTION]
This slap house track pulses at 155 BPM with filthy, saturated sub-bass, punchy syncopated drums, and relentless, infectious grooves. Dark acid synths weave gritty melodies, punctuated by hypnotic, autotuned deep vocals layered over sharp hats and risers for an erotic, high-intensity club feel.

[LYRICS]
[Male - Verse - Spanish]
El cuerpo arde, y para ti todo el honor
Toma lo que es mío esta noche
No hay palabras, solo jugamos en trance, (trance)
Que comience la ruptura, haré caos

[Female - Verse - Italian]
Bassi sporchi, giochi malvagi
Accendi il mio corpo senza freni
Non fermarti, non pensare (pensare)
Spingimi fino all'orlo

[Male - Hook - Spanish]
Más fuerte, más rápido, pierde la razón
Deja la conciencia atrás
Sudor y pecado en la pista (pista)
Dame lo que vine a buscar

[Female - Hook - Italian]
Più profondo, più crudo, fammi urlare
Niente è ciò che sembra
Desiderio puro, controllo assoluto
Vieni a prenderti la mia anima

[Male - Verse - German]
Schalte das Licht aus, spür die Hitze
Bewege deinen Körper im Takt dieses Beats
Keine Spiele, nur rohe Begierde
Diese verdammte Tanzfläche in Brand setzen

[Female - Pre-Chorus - Swedish]
Baslinjen klättrar upp längs din ryggrad
I kväll kommer du helt att bli min

[Male - Verse - Japanese]
San ga kangei no subete o yakitsukusu
Ureru kono yoidore o tsukande

[Female - Hook - Italian]
Stringimi forte, fammi male
Dentro questo ritmo animale
Paura e piacere si confondono
Nel buio insieme ci nascondono

[Instrumental - Bridge]

[Bridge - Both - German]
Schlag auf Schlag, die Nacht zerbricht
Wir sind das Feuer, das alles vernicht'
Kein Morgen, keine Pflicht
Nur Begierde im Gesicht

[Instrumental]
[Male - Verse - Swedish]
Din röst är eld, den smälter mig
Varje puls sårar mig
I mörkret försvinner vi
Och lusten bränner mig

[Female - Pre-Chorus - German]
Im Mondlicht tanzen wir
Ohne Regeln, nur jetzt brennen wir
Körper und Seele, ein Ritual
In dieser Nacht bist du tödlich

[Call & Response - Japanese]
Male: "Anata wa nani ga hoshii? Itte."
Female: "Subete to motto."
Male: "Dō ugoku ka misete."
Female: "Yogoreta onna no yō ni."

[Breakdown - Both - Swedish]
Djupare... djupare... tappa kontrollen
Hårdare... hårdare... sälj din själ
Snabbare... snabbare... känn rusets dunk
Inget kvar än kött och lust

[Instrumental]

[Final Hook - Both - German]
Wenn die Sonne aufgeht, gehen wir
Aber heute Nacht sind wir aus dem Nichts stark
Der Bass, der Schweiß und die Haut kollidieren
So erwachen wir zum Leben

[Outro - Italian]
Il basso taglia in profondità, i cuori accelerano
Fai durare questo momento sporco

[Instrumental]

[Male - Verse - Spanish]
La noche nos consume, sin dirección
Tu piel contra la mía, tentación
El ritmo nos controla, sin escapar
En este infierno, quiero quedar

[Female - Pre-Chorus - German]
Die Flamme brennt, wir verlieren uns
Keine Grenzen, nur Euphorie und Fluss
Jeder Berührung, ein neuer Rausch
Bis zum Morgen, nur dein Laut

[Instrumental]

[Male - Hook - Italian]
Più alto, più folle, fino all'alba
Niente domani, solo ora ci accende
Ombre e corpi che si confondono
In questa danza che non finisce
....

[Female - Verse - Swedish]
Mörkret omsluter oss, vi andas som ett
Hjärtan slår i takt, inget mer finns kvar
Varje rörelse ett löfte om extas
I detta ögonblick, vi är evigheten

[Male - Pre-Chorus - Japanese]
Yoru ga akete mo, watashi wa zutto ni
Kimi no te no naka de, kono yume o tsuzukeru
Kokoro no oku no, honō no yō ni
Mou modorenai, kono netsu o

[Female - Hook - Spanish]
Más oscuro, más intenso, sin control
Cada latido una nueva explosión
No hay mañana, solo este instante
Dame todo, no quedes nada
....
[Bridge - Both - Italian]
Battito dopo battito, il mondo scompare
Solo noi due, nell'aria elettrica
Niente regole, niente vergogna
Solo questo desiderio che ci brucia

[Outro - German]
Der Beat wird langsamer, aber die Hitze bleibt
Unsere Schatten verschmelzen in der Nacht
Keine Worte nötig, wir verstehen uns
Bis zum nächsten Mal, wenn der Bass uns ruft

[Instrumental - go crazy]

# hardcore_pop - Mondicci_5
[DESCRIPTION]
This slap house track pulses at 155 BPM with filthy, saturated sub-bass, punchy syncopated drums, and relentless, infectious grooves. Dark acid synths weave gritty melodies, punctuated by hypnotic, autotuned deep vocals layered over sharp hats and risers for an erotic, high-intensity club feel.

[LYRICS]
[Male - Verse - Spanish]

Toma lo que es mío esta noche
No hay palabras, solo jugamos en trance, (trance)
Que comience la ruptura, haré caos

[Female - Verse - Italian]
Bassi sporchi, giochi malvagi
Accendi il mio corpo senza freni
Non fermarti, non pensare (pensare)
Spingimi fino all'orlo

Im Mondlicht tanzen wir
Ohne Regeln, nur jetzt brennen wir
Körper und Seele, ein Ritual
In dieser Nacht bist du tödlich

Female: "Subete to motto."
Male: "Dō ugoku ka misete."
Female: "Yogoreta onna no yō ni."

Hårdare... hårdare... sälj din själ
Snabbare... snabbare... känn rusets dunk
Inget kvar än kött och lust

[Instrumental]

[Final Hook - Both - German]
Wenn die Sonne aufgeht, gehen wir
Aber heute Nacht sind wir aus dem Nichts stark
Der Bass, der Schweiß und die Haut kollidieren
So erwachen wir zum Leben

[Outro - Italian]
Il basso taglia in profondità, i cuori accelerano
Fai durare questo momento sporco

[Instrumental]

[Male - Verse - Spanish]
La noche nos consume, sin dirección
Tu piel contra la mía, tentación
El ritmo nos controla, sin escapar
En este infierno, quiero quedar

[Female - Pre-Chorus - German]
Die Flamme brennt, wir verlieren uns
Keine Grenzen, nur Euphorie und Fluss
Jeder Berührung, ein neuer Rausch
Bis zum Morgen, nur dein Laut

[Instrumental]

[Male - Hook - Italian]
Più alto, più folle, fino all'alba
Niente domani, solo ora ci accende
Ombre e corpi che si confondono
In questa danza che non finisce
....

[Female - Verse - Swedish]
Mörkret omsluter oss, vi andas som ett
Hjärtan slår i takt, inget mer finns kvar
Varje rörelse ett löfte om extas
I detta ögonblick, vi är evigheten

[Male - Pre-Chorus - Japanese]
Yoru ga akete mo, watashi wa zutto ni
Kimi no te no naka de, kono yume o tsuzukeru
Kokoro no oku no, honō no yō ni
Mou modorenai, kono netsu o

[Female - Hook - Spanish]
Más oscuro, más intenso, sin control
Cada latido una nueva explosión
No hay mañana, solo este instante
Dame todo, no quedes nada
....
[Bridge - Both - Italian]
Battito dopo battito, il mondo scompare
Solo noi due, nell'aria elettrica
Niente regole, niente vergogna
Solo questo desiderio che ci brucia

[Outro - German]
Der Beat wird langsamer, aber die Hitze bleibt
Unsere Schatten verschmelzen in der Nacht
Keine Worte nötig, wir verstehen uns
Bis zum nächsten Mal, wenn der Bass uns ruft

[Instrumental - go crazy]

# hardcore_pop - Mondicci_8
[DESCRIPTION]
A high-energy slap house track begins with tire screeches and sirens, launching into hard-hitting punchy kicks. Aggressive jungle screams punctuate explosive percussion, while gritty chants and multi-layered chopped vocals cut through intricate drum fills. Tension mounts with evolving synth textures and relentless bass grooves, maintaining urban grit and raw dancefloor propulsion from start to finish.

[LYRICS]
[Male - Verse - Spanish]
El cuerpo arde, y para ti todo el honor
Toma lo que es mío esta noche
No hay palabras, solo jugamos en trance, (trance)
Que comience la ruptura, haré caos

[Female - Verse - Italian]
Bassi sporchi, giochi malvagi
Accendi il mio corpo senza freni
Non fermarti, non pensare (pensare)
Spingimi fino all'orlo

[Male - Hook - Spanish]
Más fuerte, más rápido, pierde la razón
Deja la conciencia atrás
Sudor y pecado en la pista (pista)
Dame lo que vine a buscar

[Female - Hook - Italian]
Più profondo, più crudo, fammi urlare
Niente è ciò che sembra
Desiderio puro, controllo assoluto
Vieni a prenderti la mia anima

[Male - Verse - German]
Schalte das Licht aus, spür die Hitze
Bewege deinen Körper im Takt dieses Beats
Keine Spiele, nur rohe Begierde
Diese verdammte Tanzfläche in Brand setzen

# hardcore_pop - Mozzda_Hardcore_Pop
[DESCRIPTION]
A merciless 150 BPM EDM banger opens with a zurle wail grafted to a relentless 4/4 kick and a razor-sidechained bass. Distorted Balkan stabs cut the midrange; a glitched, pitch-shifted vocal becomes a robotic mantra repeating as the central hook. No breakdowns — only filtered kick micro-drops that cut and slam back harder. ARR: tight 16/8 phrasing, DJ-ready 8/16-bar chant loops, clear intro/outro and tempo-map for harmonic mixing. PROC: transient shaping on kick (fast attack, release ~140ms), multiband distortion on stabs, LFO-warped wavetable on bass, tempo-synced gated reverb on vocal chops. MIX: mono sub <120Hz, aggressive sidechain (6:1), stereo widen 4–10k, glue bus 1.4:1, notch 200–380Hz to clear mud. FX: reverse zurle pre-hits, white-noise punches and short crowd risers. EXPORT: 24-bit/48k WAV stems labeled with BPM/key, -6 LUFS club master and -9 LUFS promo, an 90s promo edit and a dry vocal stem for layering. QC: phase-check, mono-sum test and reference on club PA and earbuds.

[LYRICS]
[Verse]
Išao je na more
(Gde nikad nije bio pre)
Išao je na more
(Ne, ne zna da li vraća se...)

[Prechorus]
Možda
A možda i ne

[Chorus]

U tamnom kutu svoje svesti skriva  
Pitanja bez odgovora lebde  
Dok čežnja tik nad horizontom pliva  
Gde umorni dani šapatom grebu...

Možda  
Možda  
Možda  
Možda  
A možda i ne  

[Verse 2]
Neće da mi kaže
Znam da neće da mi kaže
Neće da mi kaže
A možda nije ni važno

[Prechorus]
Možda
A možda i ne

[Chorus]
Možda mu se svidela ona
Možda su izašli jednom
Ili možda nisu nikad
Možda
Možda
Možda
Možda
A možda i ne

---

# hardcore_pop - Mozzda_Hardcore_Pop_10
[DESCRIPTION]
At 138 bpm, the tech house track opens with crisp, driving four-on-the-floor drums, syncopated hi-hats, and deep sub bass. Analog marimba riffs offer melodic hooks, while swirling Gregorian chant textures color the build. The drop fuses sharp FM synth stabs, jazzy upright bass fills, and precise metallic percussion, sustaining a hypnotic, groove-laden energy. At 132 bpm, a counterpart launches with tight drums, organic bass, and detuned MIDI zurle leads channeling 80s Balkan melodies. Layers of jungle percussion, wild animal calls, and dynamic panned synth stabs create continual movement in a vibrant, club-ready soundscape.

# hardcore_pop - Mozzda_Hardcore_Pop_13
[DESCRIPTION]
This EDM banger erupts at 150 BPM,igniting the floor with a relentless fusion of Balkan soul and modern fury. It opens with the iconic,wailing cry of a traditional accordion sample,immediately hijacked by a pounding,4/4 kick drum that feels like a heartbeat on steroids. The original melancholic melody is twisted into a weaponized synth lead,soaring over a seismic,sidechained bassline that never relents. Fiery Balkan brass stabs,processed through distortion and delay,punch through the mix like gunshots,while the original vocal—pitched and glitched—becomes a defiant,robotic mantra commanding you to move. There are no breakdowns,only momentary breathers where the kick filters back in with more punishing force. This is a non-stop,percussive assault designed for pure,unadulterated chaos; a track that doesn't build to a drop,but rather IS the drop from start to finish. It's a timeless melody supercharged into a futuristic,unrelenting beast that grabs you by the soul and refuses to let go u

[LYRICS]
[Verse]
Išao je na more
(Gde nikad nije bio pre)
Išao je na more
(Ne, ne zna da li vraća se...)

[Prechorus]
Možda
A možda i ne

[Chorus]

U tamnom kutu svoje svesti skriva  
Pitanja bez odgovora lebde  
Dok čežnja tik nad horizontom pliva  
Gde umorni dani šapatom grebu...

Možda  
Možda  
Možda  
Možda  
A možda i ne  

[Verse 2]

Znam da neće da mi kaže
Neće da mi kaže
A možda nije ni važno

[Prechorus]
Možda
A možda i ne

[Chorus]

Možda su izašli jednom

# hardcore_pop - Mozzda_Hardcore_Pop_3
[DESCRIPTION]
The tech house track starts at 128 bpm with a morphing deep bassline and snappy, syncopated percussion, over ambient club noise. Siren risers and rave samples energize the buildup, while 80s-styled midi synths deliver catchy hooks. Drops add crowd roars, punchy chopped chant vocals, and heightened groove, locking in a driving, club-focused atmosphere.

# hardcore_pop - Mozzda_Hardcore_Pop_5
[DESCRIPTION]
Relentless industrial groove at 137 BPM, driven by wavefolded, harmonically rich distorted bass. Tribal toms and ethnic drums, smashed by heavy compression, intensify the pulse. Chilled FM bells and metallic lead tones hook amid football crowd chants sliced into jagged accents. Controlled feedback, radio static, and dense city ambience enrich the spectral texture. Breakdown filters and twists the full mix, dropping into ferocious, stuttered, multi-layered kicks. Detuned, overdriven rave stabs erupt for final climactic energy. Modular synth arpeggios canvas the peak in frenetic patterns. Aggressive sidechain compression locks all elements to a four-on-floor beat, built for annihilating peak-time club floors.

[LYRICS]
[Verse]
Išao je na more
(Gde nikad nije bio pre)
Išao je na more
(Ne, ne zna da li vraća se...)

# hardcore_pop - Mozzda_Hardcore_Pop_6
[DESCRIPTION]
Piano house track built around infectious, sampled '90s vocal stabs; polished four-on-floor kick, filtered disco strings, and tight funk guitar licks drive the groove. Catchy sawtooth lead topline with unison detuning soars above radio-friendly, doubled and auto-tuned vocal hooks. Clap-snare and tambourine rolls accentuate transitions, while builds use white noise risers and dynamic fills into a huge, pumping drop with heavily sidechained root-note bass. Crowd cheers and glass clinks infuse bottle service energy. Breakdown isolates vocals and piano before the full, punchy mix returns, all tightly structured in 32-bar phrases at 128 BPM for DJ-ready flow.

[Verse]

(Gde nikad nije bio pre)

(Ne, ne zna da li vraća se...)

# hardcore_pop - Mozzda_Hardcore_Pop_7
[DESCRIPTION]
A 130 BPM G-funk and tech house fusion: whining Moog bassline glides with portamento over minor seventh funk changes, vintage triangle-wave synths vibrato-rich, and talk box vocoder hooks atop four-on-floor kick. 808 rim shots, crisp house claps, ghosted two-four snares create shuffle. Flute and whistles float with hydraulic/ siren atmospherics. Breakdown strips to bass and snaps, then builds—drop layers gang vocals and synth stabs. Sidechain compression adds a bouncy pocket, analog warmth from tape, and vintage compression saturates every element.

# hardcore_pop - Mozzda_Hardcore_Pop_9
[DESCRIPTION]
This house track fuses hypnotic tabla programming and a driving kick for a polyrhythmic groove. Chopped Sanskrit mantras form lush, processed vocal layers over pitch-bent, filtered sitar leads, all atop an acid bassline with resonant sweeps. Drones from granulated tanpura, Indian percussion, and claps unite in the build, ascending with raga scales and complex tabla, leading to a drop packed with distorted kicks. Synth arps echo Bhairav raga at 134 BPM. The breakdown strips to chanting and drone before rebuilding the groove, expertly balancing dancefloor energy with spiritual textures.

[LYRICS]

(Gde nikad nije bio pre)

# hardcore_pop - Mozzda_Hardcore_Pop_9
[DESCRIPTION]
The tech house track kicks off at 132 bpm, merging punchy four-on-the-floor drums with 80s Balkan-style zurle melodies, sequenced in expressive, slightly detuned MIDI fashion. Organic bass underpins the groove, while jungle-inspired percussive hits, animal calls, and scattered synth stabs pan dynamically to create a vibrant, immersive soundscape throughout.

# hardcore_pop - NE SALJI MI PISMO (Cover)_dr_Khans_2
[DESCRIPTION]
This is a mid-tempo German street-rap track with a dark, emotional minor-key harmony and a clean, modern trap-pop drum kit. Kicks are fat but controlled, snares crack with a dry slap, and tight hi-hats drive a steady head-nod bounce. Sub-bass moves in long, sustaining notes, glued to the kick. Over it sits a bittersweet melodic loop (keys/synths with a pop sheen) that shapes the hook. The vocal is a gritty low-to-mid male, half-barked, half-melodic, riding the pocket with precise accents. Verses stay relatively sparse; choruses open into wide stereo pads and reinforced drums, turning the hook into a sing-along street anthem.

[LYRICS]
[Intro]
(Sve, sve ove godine sa tobom ja)
[room_verb – wide, distant, filtered, low in mix]
(Ja sam u svađi sam sa sobom sve)
[tape_delay – 1/4 note throw on “sobom sve”]
(Ove godine sa tobom ali danas je sa nama gotovo)
[doubled_low – whispered layer underneath “gotovo”]

[Verse 1]
Laž, laži sam mogao da podnesem ti
[slap_delay – short 1/8 echo on “podnesem ti”]
Proleće pretvaraš u jesen i sve
[pads_bg – warm minor pad swelling under “proleće / jesen”]
Sve sam mogao da izdržim ali prevare meni se ne vare
[bg_chant – low octave hum on “mene se ne vare”, sidechained to kick]

[Chorus]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[stereo_doubles – soft gang-style on word “pismo”]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[delay_throw – long 1/2 note echo on “zaboravi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[bg_choir – ooh/aaah sustained behind “ljubavi”]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[octave_up – thin high harmony on “druga boravi”]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[call_resp – chopped “ne šalji, ne šalji” tucked behind main]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[pingpong_delay – subtle stereo bounces on “zaboravi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[swell – reverse reverb into downbeat “U ljubavi”]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[adlib_bg – distant “hej, hej” between phrases]

[Verse 2]
Sve obično stane sve u reči dve
[mono_lp – first bar slightly filtered like telefonski glas]
Što ću ti reći znam da boleće
[backing_voices – quiet unison under “znam da boleće”]
Bilo bi najbolje da shvatiš da od danas je sa nama završeno
[chopped – rhythm chop “završeno, završeno” prije sledeće linije]
Laž, u laži svoje si se uplela
[fx_riser – short noise riser pre “uplela”]
I nisi znala, nisi umela
[stereo_adlibs – šapat “nisi znala, nisi umela” wide L/R]
Bilo bi najbolje da shvatiš da bez tebe ću živeti savršeno ja
[octave_stack – low + high harmony on “savršeno ja”]
E pa da
[dry_drop – muzički break, samo vokal, bez reverba]

[Chorus]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[doubles – lagani drugi glas za puniji hook]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[delay_throw – 1/4 + 1/2 kombinacija na “zaboravi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[choir_stack – troglasni “u ljubavi” u pozadini]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[answer_chop – kratko “druga, druga” chop pred “boravi”]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[clap_lift – dodatni claps i crowd FX na prvi takt refrena]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[reverb_tail – duži hall tail na kraju linije]
U ljubavi nismo
[pad_lift – akordi jači, sidechain uz kick]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[adlib – tihi “ajde, zaboravi” u pozadini]

[Bridge]
Nema, nema, nema ljubavi
[call_resp – pozadinski šapat “nema, nema” u stereo slici]
Srce hoće da zaboravi
[heartbeat_fx – low thump synced to tempo]
Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio
[reverse_verb – lead povučen unazad u sledeći takt]
Svoj sreći sam presudio
[octave_harmony – visoki glas prati “presudio”]
Nema, nema, nema ljubavi
[chopped – „nema ljubavi, ljubavi“ isječeno kao ritmički loop]
Srce hoće da zaboravi
[tremolo_fx – blagi tremolo na pratećem vokalu]
Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio
[stereo_widen – širi panorama samo na ovoj frazi]
Svoj sreći sam presudio
[tape_stop – kratki usporeni efekt na “presudio” pred refren]

[Chorus]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[full_stack – glavni glas + 2 harmonije za final hook]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[big_hall – veći reverb, refren kao “arena”]
U ljubavi nismo
[choir_aaah – dugi “aaah” akord kroz liniju]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[answer_vox – pozadinski “druga… druga…” u ehu]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[doubles + whisper_layer – šapat “ne šalji” ispod lead-a]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[delay_throw – snažan 1/2 note na poslednji “-vi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[sidechain_pad – diše uz kick, otvara se na “nismo”]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[outro_fill – kratki vokalni riff pre odlaska u outro]

[Outro]
(Nema, nema, nema ljubavi)
[filtered_echo – low-pass echo koji se gasi kroz 2 takta]
(Srce hoće da zaboravi)
[choir_low – muški duboko “hoće da zaboravi”]
(Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio)
[reverse_chop – isečene slogove “lju-bi-o” u ritmu]
(Svoj sreći sam presudio)
[reverb_swim – dugačak tail, fade u sledeću liniju]
(Nema, nema, nema ljubavi)
[distant_bg – kao da dolazi iz druge sobe]
(Srce hoće da zaboravi)
[pingpong_delay – lagani stereo bounce]
(Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio)
[adlib – tihi “hej…” pre “ljubio”]
(Svoj sreći sam presudio)
[fader_fade – postepeno spuštanje lead-a, ostaje samo delay i pad]

[Mix / Master –expertly done ]

---

# hardcore_pop - NE SALJI MI PISMO (Cover)_dr_Khans_2
[DESCRIPTION]
This is a mid-tempo German street-rap track in a dark minor key with a modern trap-pop backbone and a very masculine vocal presence. Drums are tight and heavy: thick, focused kick, dry cracking snare, nervous hi-hat patterns. Sub-bass sits like a solid slab under everything. A melancholic synth/keys loop carries the hook. The lead is a low baritone male voice, chesty, gritty and hyper-compressed, more bark than sing, with long, aggressive vowels that cut through the mix. Verses ride a sparse, beat-and-bass pocket; in the hook the harmony widens with pads and stacked backing vocals, turning the refrain into a hard, chant-ready street anthem.

[LYRICS]
[Intro]
(Sve, sve ove godine sa tobom ja)
[room_verb – wide, distant, filtered, low in mix]
(Ja sam u svađi sam sa sobom sve)
[tape_delay – 1/4 note throw on “sobom sve”]
(Ove godine sa tobom ali danas je sa nama gotovo)
[doubled_low – whispered layer underneath “gotovo”]

[Verse 1]

[slap_delay – short 1/8 echo on “podnesem ti”]

[pads_bg – warm minor pad swelling under “proleće / jesen”]

[choir_stack – troglasni “u ljubavi” u pozadini]

# hardcore_pop - NE SALJI MI PISMO (Cover)_dr_Khans_2
[DESCRIPTION]
Mid-tempo German street-rap track in a dark minor key with a modern trap-pop drum kit. Kicks are thick and controlled, snares crack dry and close, and busy hi-hats drive a steady head-nod bounce. Sub-bass sustains under everything, locked tightly to the kick. A melancholic melodic loop (keys/synths with a faint pop-reggae feel) shapes the emotional core of the beat. The male vocal is a testosterone-heavy baritone/low tenor, projected from the chest: clean and natural, slightly gritty when pushed, with clear diction and audible breaths. Verses sit in a sparse pocket; in the hook, wider pads and the full loop come in, turning the vocal into a chant-like street anthem with zero robotic or synthetic feel.

[LYRICS]
[Intro]
(Sve, sve ove godine sa tobom ja)
[room_verb – wide, distant, filtered, low in mix]
(Ja sam u svađi sam sa sobom sve)
[tape_delay – 1/4 note throw on “sobom sve”]
(Ove godine sa tobom ali danas je sa nama gotovo)
[doubled_low – whispered layer underneath “gotovo”]

[Verse 1]
