# hardcore_pop - NE SALJI MI PISMO (Cover)_dr_Khans_2
[DESCRIPTION]
The track feels like cruising through a grey city evening with neon sirens flickering on the windshield. A smoky, familiar hook loops in the background – that 90s Ace_ of Base melody flipped darker – floating over a relaxed but heavy drum groove. The kick is warm and steady, the snare cracks like knuckles on concrete, while a deep, velvety sub-bass hums underneath, making the whole beat sway instead of slam. On top, raps with this calm, controlled aggression: lines land like checkpoints in the rhythm, never rushed, never lazy. Small drops, mutes and FX swells reset your attention before the hook comes back and wraps the whole picture in bittersweet city nostalgia: rough blocks, blue lights, a little love, a lot of smoke.

[LYRICS]
[Intro]
(Sve, sve ove godine sa tobom ja)
[room_verb – wide, distant, filtered, low in mix]
(Ja sam u svađi sam sa sobom sve)
[tape_delay – 1/4 note throw on “sobom sve”]
(Ove godine sa tobom ali danas je sa nama gotovo)
[doubled_low – whispered layer underneath “gotovo”]

[Verse 1]
Laž, laži sam mogao da podnesem ti
[slap_delay – short 1/8 echo on “podnesem ti”]
Proleće pretvaraš u jesen i sve
[pads_bg – warm minor pad swelling under “proleće / jesen”]
Sve sam mogao da izdržim ali prevare meni se ne vare
[bg_chant – low octave hum on “mene se ne vare”, sidechained to kick]

[Chorus]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[stereo_doubles – soft gang-style on word “pismo”]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[delay_throw – long 1/2 note echo on “zaboravi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[bg_choir – ooh/aaah sustained behind “ljubavi”]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[octave_up – thin high harmony on “druga boravi”]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[call_resp – chopped “ne šalji, ne šalji” tucked behind main]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[pingpong_delay – subtle stereo bounces on “zaboravi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[swell – reverse reverb into downbeat “U ljubavi”]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[adlib_bg – distant “hej, hej” between phrases]

[Verse 2]
Sve obično stane sve u reči dve
[mono_lp – first bar slightly filtered like telefonski glas]
Što ću ti reći znam da boleće
[backing_voices – quiet unison under “znam da boleće”]
Bilo bi najbolje da shvatiš da od danas je sa nama završeno
[chopped – rhythm chop “završeno, završeno” prije sledeće linije]
Laž, u laži svoje si se uplela
[fx_riser – short noise riser pre “uplela”]
I nisi znala, nisi umela
[stereo_adlibs – šapat “nisi znala, nisi umela” wide L/R]
Bilo bi najbolje da shvatiš da bez tebe ću živeti savršeno ja
[octave_stack – low + high harmony on “savršeno ja”]
E pa da
[dry_drop – muzički break, samo vokal, bez reverba]

[Chorus]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[doubles – lagani drugi glas za puniji hook]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[delay_throw – 1/4 + 1/2 kombinacija na “zaboravi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[choir_stack – troglasni “u ljubavi” u pozadini]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[answer_chop – kratko “druga, druga” chop pred “boravi”]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[clap_lift – dodatni claps i crowd FX na prvi takt refrena]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[reverb_tail – duži hall tail na kraju linije]
U ljubavi nismo
[pad_lift – akordi jači, sidechain uz kick]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[adlib – tihi “ajde, zaboravi” u pozadini]

[Bridge]
Nema, nema, nema ljubavi
[call_resp – pozadinski šapat “nema, nema” u stereo slici]
Srce hoće da zaboravi
[heartbeat_fx – low thump synced to tempo]
Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio
[reverse_verb – lead povučen unazad u sledeći takt]
Svoj sreći sam presudio
[octave_harmony – visoki glas prati “presudio”]
Nema, nema, nema ljubavi
[chopped – „nema ljubavi, ljubavi“ isječeno kao ritmički loop]
Srce hoće da zaboravi
[tremolo_fx – blagi tremolo na pratećem vokalu]
Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio
[stereo_widen – širi panorama samo na ovoj frazi]
Svoj sreći sam presudio
[tape_stop – kratki usporeni efekt na “presudio” pred refren]

[Chorus]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[full_stack – glavni glas + 2 harmonije za final hook]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[big_hall – veći reverb, refren kao “arena”]
U ljubavi nismo
[choir_aaah – dugi “aaah” akord kroz liniju]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[answer_vox – pozadinski “druga… druga…” u ehu]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[doubles + whisper_layer – šapat “ne šalji” ispod lead-a]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[delay_throw – snažan 1/2 note na poslednji “-vi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[sidechain_pad – diše uz kick, otvara se na “nismo”]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[outro_fill – kratki vokalni riff pre odlaska u outro]

[Outro]
(Nema, nema, nema ljubavi)
[filtered_echo – low-pass echo koji se gasi kroz 2 takta]
(Srce hoće da zaboravi)
[choir_low – muški duboko “hoće da zaboravi”]
(Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio)
[reverse_chop – isečene slogove “lju-bi-o” u ritmu]
(Svoj sreći sam presudio)
[reverb_swim – dugačak tail, fade u sledeću liniju]
(Nema, nema, nema ljubavi)
[distant_bg – kao da dolazi iz druge sobe]
(Srce hoće da zaboravi)
[pingpong_delay – lagani stereo bounce]
(Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio)
[adlib – tihi “hej…” pre “ljubio”]
(Svoj sreći sam presudio)
[fader_fade – postepeno spuštanje lead-a, ostaje samo delay i pad]

[Mix / Master –expertly done ]

---

# hardcore_pop - NE SALJI MI PISMO (Cover)_dr_Khans_2
[DESCRIPTION]
This is a mid-tempo German street-rap track in a dark minor key with a modern trap-pop backbone and a very masculine vocal presence. Drums are tight and heavy: thick, focused kick, dry cracking snare, nervous hi-hat patterns. Sub-bass sits like a solid slab under everything. A melancholic synth/keys loop carries the hook. The lead is a low baritone male voice, chesty, gritty and hyper-compressed, more bark than sing, with long, aggressive vowels that cut through the mix. Verses ride a sparse, beat-and-bass pocket; in the hook the harmony widens with pads and stacked backing vocals, turning the refrain into a hard, chant-ready street anthem.

[LYRICS]
[Intro]
(Sve, sve ove godine sa tobom ja)
[room_verb – wide, distant, filtered, low in mix]
(Ja sam u svađi sam sa sobom sve)
[tape_delay – 1/4 note throw on “sobom sve”]
(Ove godine sa tobom ali danas je sa nama gotovo)
[doubled_low – whispered layer underneath “gotovo”]

[Verse 1]
Laž, laži sam mogao da podnesem ti
[slap_delay – short 1/8 echo on “podnesem ti”]
Proleće pretvaraš u jesen i sve
[pads_bg – warm minor pad swelling under “proleće / jesen”]
Sve sam mogao da izdržim ali prevare meni se ne vare
[bg_chant – low octave hum on “mene se ne vare”, sidechained to kick]

[Chorus]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[stereo_doubles – soft gang-style on word “pismo”]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[delay_throw – long 1/2 note echo on “zaboravi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[bg_choir – ooh/aaah sustained behind “ljubavi”]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[octave_up – thin high harmony on “druga boravi”]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[call_resp – chopped “ne šalji, ne šalji” tucked behind main]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[pingpong_delay – subtle stereo bounces on “zaboravi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[swell – reverse reverb into downbeat “U ljubavi”]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[adlib_bg – distant “hej, hej” between phrases]

[Verse 2]
Sve obično stane sve u reči dve
[mono_lp – first bar slightly filtered like telefonski glas]
Što ću ti reći znam da boleće
[backing_voices – quiet unison under “znam da boleće”]
Bilo bi najbolje da shvatiš da od danas je sa nama završeno
[chopped – rhythm chop “završeno, završeno” prije sledeće linije]
Laž, u laži svoje si se uplela
[fx_riser – short noise riser pre “uplela”]
I nisi znala, nisi umela
[stereo_adlibs – šapat “nisi znala, nisi umela” wide L/R]
Bilo bi najbolje da shvatiš da bez tebe ću živeti savršeno ja
[octave_stack – low + high harmony on “savršeno ja”]
E pa da
[dry_drop – muzički break, samo vokal, bez reverba]

[Chorus]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[doubles – lagani drugi glas za puniji hook]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[delay_throw – 1/4 + 1/2 kombinacija na “zaboravi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[choir_stack – troglasni “u ljubavi” u pozadini]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[answer_chop – kratko “druga, druga” chop pred “boravi”]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[clap_lift – dodatni claps i crowd FX na prvi takt refrena]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[reverb_tail – duži hall tail na kraju linije]
U ljubavi nismo
[pad_lift – akordi jači, sidechain uz kick]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[adlib – tihi “ajde, zaboravi” u pozadini]

[Bridge]
Nema, nema, nema ljubavi
[call_resp – pozadinski šapat “nema, nema” u stereo slici]
Srce hoće da zaboravi
[heartbeat_fx – low thump synced to tempo]
Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio
[reverse_verb – lead povučen unazad u sledeći takt]
Svoj sreći sam presudio
[octave_harmony – visoki glas prati “presudio”]
Nema, nema, nema ljubavi
[chopped – „nema ljubavi, ljubavi“ isječeno kao ritmički loop]
Srce hoće da zaboravi
[tremolo_fx – blagi tremolo na pratećem vokalu]
Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio
[stereo_widen – širi panorama samo na ovoj frazi]
Svoj sreći sam presudio
[tape_stop – kratki usporeni efekt na “presudio” pred refren]

[Chorus]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[full_stack – glavni glas + 2 harmonije za final hook]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[big_hall – veći reverb, refren kao “arena”]
U ljubavi nismo
[choir_aaah – dugi “aaah” akord kroz liniju]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[answer_vox – pozadinski “druga… druga…” u ehu]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[doubles + whisper_layer – šapat “ne šalji” ispod lead-a]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[delay_throw – snažan 1/2 note na poslednji “-vi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[sidechain_pad – diše uz kick, otvara se na “nismo”]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[outro_fill – kratki vokalni riff pre odlaska u outro]

[Outro]
(Nema, nema, nema ljubavi)
[filtered_echo – low-pass echo koji se gasi kroz 2 takta]
(Srce hoće da zaboravi)
[choir_low – muški duboko “hoće da zaboravi”]
(Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio)
[reverse_chop – isečene slogove “lju-bi-o” u ritmu]
(Svoj sreći sam presudio)
[reverb_swim – dugačak tail, fade u sledeću liniju]
(Nema, nema, nema ljubavi)
[distant_bg – kao da dolazi iz druge sobe]
(Srce hoće da zaboravi)
[pingpong_delay – lagani stereo bounce]
(Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio)
[adlib – tihi “hej…” pre “ljubio”]
(Svoj sreći sam presudio)
[fader_fade – postepeno spuštanje lead-a, ostaje samo delay i pad]

[Mix / Master –expertly done ]

---

# hardcore_pop - NE SALJI MI PISMO (Cover)_dr_Khans_2
[DESCRIPTION]
The track feels like cruising through a grey city evening with neon sirens flickering on the windshield. A smoky, familiar hook loops in the background – that 90s Ace_ of Base melody flipped darker – floating over a relaxed but heavy drum groove. The kick is warm and steady, the snare cracks like knuckles on concrete, while a deep, velvety sub-bass hums underneath, making the whole beat sway instead of slam. On top, raps with this calm, controlled aggression: lines land like checkpoints in the rhythm, never rushed, never lazy. Small drops, mutes and FX swells reset your attention before the hook comes back and wraps the whole picture in bittersweet city nostalgia: rough blocks, blue lights, a little love, a lot of smoke.

[LYRICS]
[Intro]
(Sve, sve ove godine sa tobom ja)
[room_verb – wide, distant, filtered, low in mix]
(Ja sam u svađi sam sa sobom sve)
[tape_delay – 1/4 note throw on “sobom sve”]
(Ove godine sa tobom ali danas je sa nama gotovo)
[doubled_low – whispered layer underneath “gotovo”]

[Verse 1]
Laž, laži sam mogao da podnesem ti
[slap_delay – short 1/8 echo on “podnesem ti”]
Proleće pretvaraš u jesen i sve
[pads_bg – warm minor pad swelling under “proleće / jesen”]
Sve sam mogao da izdržim ali prevare meni se ne vare
[bg_chant – low octave hum on “mene se ne vare”, sidechained to kick]

[Chorus]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[stereo_doubles – soft gang-style on word “pismo”]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[delay_throw – long 1/2 note echo on “zaboravi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[bg_choir – ooh/aaah sustained behind “ljubavi”]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[octave_up – thin high harmony on “druga boravi”]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[call_resp – chopped “ne šalji, ne šalji” tucked behind main]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[pingpong_delay – subtle stereo bounces on “zaboravi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[swell – reverse reverb into downbeat “U ljubavi”]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[adlib_bg – distant “hej, hej” between phrases]

[Verse 2]
Sve obično stane sve u reči dve
[mono_lp – first bar slightly filtered like telefonski glas]
Što ću ti reći znam da boleće
[backing_voices – quiet unison under “znam da boleće”]
Bilo bi najbolje da shvatiš da od danas je sa nama završeno
[chopped – rhythm chop “završeno, završeno” prije sledeće linije]
Laž, u laži svoje si se uplela
[fx_riser – short noise riser pre “uplela”]
I nisi znala, nisi umela
[stereo_adlibs – šapat “nisi znala, nisi umela” wide L/R]
Bilo bi najbolje da shvatiš da bez tebe ću živeti savršeno ja
[octave_stack – low + high harmony on “savršeno ja”]
E pa da
[dry_drop – muzički break, samo vokal, bez reverba]

[Chorus]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[doubles – lagani drugi glas za puniji hook]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[delay_throw – 1/4 + 1/2 kombinacija na “zaboravi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[choir_stack – troglasni “u ljubavi” u pozadini]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[answer_chop – kratko “druga, druga” chop pred “boravi”]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[clap_lift – dodatni claps i crowd FX na prvi takt refrena]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[reverb_tail – duži hall tail na kraju linije]
U ljubavi nismo
[pad_lift – akordi jači, sidechain uz kick]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[adlib – tihi “ajde, zaboravi” u pozadini]

[Bridge]
Nema, nema, nema ljubavi
[call_resp – pozadinski šapat “nema, nema” u stereo slici]
Srce hoće da zaboravi
[heartbeat_fx – low thump synced to tempo]
Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio
[reverse_verb – lead povučen unazad u sledeći takt]
Svoj sreći sam presudio
[octave_harmony – visoki glas prati “presudio”]
Nema, nema, nema ljubavi
[chopped – „nema ljubavi, ljubavi“ isječeno kao ritmički loop]
Srce hoće da zaboravi
[tremolo_fx – blagi tremolo na pratećem vokalu]
Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio
[stereo_widen – širi panorama samo na ovoj frazi]
Svoj sreći sam presudio
[tape_stop – kratki usporeni efekt na “presudio” pred refren]

[Chorus]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[full_stack – glavni glas + 2 harmonije za final hook]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[big_hall – veći reverb, refren kao “arena”]
U ljubavi nismo
[choir_aaah – dugi “aaah” akord kroz liniju]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[answer_vox – pozadinski “druga… druga…” u ehu]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[doubles + whisper_layer – šapat “ne šalji” ispod lead-a]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[delay_throw – snažan 1/2 note na poslednji “-vi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[sidechain_pad – diše uz kick, otvara se na “nismo”]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[outro_fill – kratki vokalni riff pre odlaska u outro]

[Outro]
(Nema, nema, nema ljubavi)
[filtered_echo – low-pass echo koji se gasi kroz 2 takta]
(Srce hoće da zaboravi)
[choir_low – muški duboko “hoće da zaboravi”]
(Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio)
[reverse_chop – isečene slogove “lju-bi-o” u ritmu]
(Svoj sreći sam presudio)
[reverb_swim – dugačak tail, fade u sledeću liniju]
(Nema, nema, nema ljubavi)
[distant_bg – kao da dolazi iz druge sobe]
(Srce hoće da zaboravi)
[pingpong_delay – lagani stereo bounce]
(Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio)
[adlib – tihi “hej…” pre “ljubio”]
(Svoj sreći sam presudio)
[fader_fade – postepeno spuštanje lead-a, ostaje samo delay i pad]

[Mix / Master –expertly done ]

---

# hardcore_pop - NE SALJI MI PISMO (Cover)_dr_Khans_2
[DESCRIPTION]
Mid-tempo German street-rap track in a dark minor key with a modern trap-pop drum kit. Kicks are thick and controlled, snares crack dry and close, and busy hi-hats drive a steady head-nod bounce. Sub-bass sustains under everything, locked tightly to the kick. A melancholic melodic loop (keys/synths with a faint pop-reggae feel) shapes the emotional core of the beat. The male vocal is a testosterone-heavy baritone/low tenor, projected from the chest: clean and natural, slightly gritty when pushed, with clear diction and audible breaths. Verses sit in a sparse pocket; in the hook, wider pads and the full loop come in, turning the vocal into a chant-like street anthem with zero robotic or synthetic feel.

[LYRICS]
[Intro]
(Sve, sve ove godine sa tobom ja)
[room_verb – wide, distant, filtered, low in mix]
(Ja sam u svađi sam sa sobom sve)
[tape_delay – 1/4 note throw on “sobom sve”]
(Ove godine sa tobom ali danas je sa nama gotovo)
[doubled_low – whispered layer underneath “gotovo”]

[Verse 1]
Laž, laži sam mogao da podnesem ti
[slap_delay – short 1/8 echo on “podnesem ti”]
Proleće pretvaraš u jesen i sve
[pads_bg – warm minor pad swelling under “proleće / jesen”]
Sve sam mogao da izdržim ali prevare meni se ne vare
[bg_chant – low octave hum on “mene se ne vare”, sidechained to kick]

[Chorus]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[stereo_doubles – soft gang-style on word “pismo”]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[delay_throw – long 1/2 note echo on “zaboravi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[bg_choir – ooh/aaah sustained behind “ljubavi”]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[octave_up – thin high harmony on “druga boravi”]

[mono_lp – first bar slightly filtered like telefonski glas]

Bilo bi najbolje da shvatiš da od danas je sa nama završeno
[chopped – rhythm chop “završeno, završeno” prije sledeće linije]
Laž, u laži svoje si se uplela
[fx_riser – short noise riser pre “uplela”]
I nisi znala, nisi umela
[stereo_adlibs – šapat “nisi znala, nisi umela” wide L/R]
Bilo bi najbolje da shvatiš da bez tebe ću živeti savršeno ja
[octave_stack – low + high harmony on “savršeno ja”]
E pa da
[dry_drop – muzički break, samo vokal, bez reverba]

[Chorus]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[doubles – lagani drugi glas za puniji hook]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[delay_throw – 1/4 + 1/2 kombinacija na “zaboravi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[choir_stack – troglasni “u ljubavi” u pozadini]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[answer_chop – kratko “druga, druga” chop pred “boravi”]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[clap_lift – dodatni claps i crowd FX na prvi takt refrena]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[reverb_tail – duži hall tail na kraju linije]
U ljubavi nismo
[pad_lift – akordi jači, sidechain uz kick]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[adlib – tihi “ajde, zaboravi” u pozadini]

[Bridge]
Nema, nema, nema ljubavi
[call_resp – pozadinski šapat “nema, nema” u stereo slici]
Srce hoće da zaboravi
[heartbeat_fx – low thump synced to tempo]
Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio
[reverse_verb – lead povučen unazad u sledeći takt]
Svoj sreći sam presudio
[octave_harmony – visoki glas prati “presudio”]
Nema, nema, nema ljubavi
[chopped – „nema ljubavi, ljubavi“ isječeno kao ritmički loop]
Srce hoće da zaboravi
[tremolo_fx – blagi tremolo na pratećem vokalu]
Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio
[stereo_widen – širi panorama samo na ovoj frazi]
Svoj sreći sam presudio
[tape_stop – kratki usporeni efekt na “presudio” pred refren]

[Chorus]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[full_stack – glavni glas + 2 harmonije za final hook]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[big_hall – veći reverb, refren kao “arena”]
U ljubavi nismo
[choir_aaah – dugi “aaah” akord kroz liniju]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[answer_vox – pozadinski “druga… druga…” u ehu]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[doubles + whisper_layer – šapat “ne šalji” ispod lead-a]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[delay_throw – snažan 1/2 note na poslednji “-vi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[sidechain_pad – diše uz kick, otvara se na “nismo”]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[outro_fill – kratki vokalni riff pre odlaska u outro]

[Outro]
(Nema, nema, nema ljubavi)
[filtered_echo – low-pass echo koji se gasi kroz 2 takta]
(Srce hoće da zaboravi)
[choir_low – muški duboko “hoće da zaboravi”]
(Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio)
[reverse_chop – isečene slogove “lju-bi-o” u ritmu]
(Svoj sreći sam presudio)
[reverb_swim – dugačak tail, fade u sledeću liniju]
(Nema, nema, nema ljubavi)
[distant_bg – kao da dolazi iz druge sobe]
(Srce hoće da zaboravi)
[pingpong_delay – lagani stereo bounce]
(Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio)
[adlib – tihi “hej…” pre “ljubio”]
(Svoj sreći sam presudio)
[fader_fade – postepeno spuštanje lead-a, ostaje samo delay i pad]

[Mix / Master –expertly done ]

---

# hardcore_pop - NE SALJI MI PISMO (Cover)_dr_Khans_3
[DESCRIPTION]
Mid-tempo German street-pop/rap track (around 96 BPM in 4/4, dark C♯ minor) built on a recontextualized 90s Euro-pop/reggae hook that becomes a looping, melancholic motif. Drums are modern trap-pop: thick, controlled kick, bright dry clap/snare, busy crisp hi-hats with occasional doubles, all glued by a clean, sustained 808/sub locked to the kick. Verses ride a sparse bed of bass, minimal keys and a thinned-out sample, leaving space for dense, rhythmically precise rap phrasing. The male vocal is a testosterone-heavy baritone/low tenor, chest-driven, clean and natural with slight grit when pushed, clear diction and audible breaths—zero robotic feel. In the hook, the sample blooms into a wide stereo lead with pads and supporting synths, turning the topline into a chant-like, instantly recognizable street chorus. The arrangement follows a classic pop-rap arc (intro – verse – pre – hook – verse – hook – bridge – final hook) with filter sweeps, risers and drop-outs to keep it both DJ-friend

[LYRICS]
[Intro]
(Sve, sve ove godine sa tobom ja)
[room_verb – wide, distant, filtered, low in mix]
(Ja sam u svađi sam sa sobom sve)
[tape_delay – 1/4 note throw on “sobom sve”]
(Ove godine sa tobom ali danas je sa nama gotovo)
[doubled_low – whispered layer underneath “gotovo”]

[Verse 1]
Laž, laži sam mogao da podnesem ti
[slap_delay – short 1/8 echo on “podnesem ti”]
Proleće pretvaraš u jesen i sve
[pads_bg – warm minor pad swelling under “proleće / jesen”]
Sve sam mogao da izdržim ali prevare meni se ne vare
[bg_chant – low octave hum on “mene se ne vare”, sidechained to kick]

[Chorus]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[stereo_doubles – soft gang-style on word “pismo”]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[delay_throw – long 1/2 note echo on “zaboravi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[bg_choir – ooh/aaah sustained behind “ljubavi”]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[octave_up – thin high harmony on “druga boravi”]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[call_resp – chopped “ne šalji, ne šalji” tucked behind main]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[pingpong_delay – subtle stereo bounces on “zaboravi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[swell – reverse reverb into downbeat “U ljubavi”]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[adlib_bg – distant “hej, hej” between phrases]

[Verse 2]
Sve obično stane sve u reči dve
[mono_lp – first bar slightly filtered like telefonski glas]
Što ću ti reći znam da boleće
[backing_voices – quiet unison under “znam da boleće”]
Bilo bi najbolje da shvatiš da od danas je sa nama završeno
[chopped – rhythm chop “završeno, završeno” prije sledeće linije]
Laž, u laži svoje si se uplela
[fx_riser – short noise riser pre “uplela”]
I nisi znala, nisi umela
[stereo_adlibs – šapat “nisi znala, nisi umela” wide L/R]
Bilo bi najbolje da shvatiš da bez tebe ću živeti savršeno ja
[octave_stack – low + high harmony on “savršeno ja”]
E pa da
[dry_drop – muzički break, samo vokal, bez reverba]

[Chorus]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[doubles – lagani drugi glas za puniji hook]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[delay_throw – 1/4 + 1/2 kombinacija na “zaboravi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[choir_stack – troglasni “u ljubavi” u pozadini]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[answer_chop – kratko “druga, druga” chop pred “boravi”]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[clap_lift – dodatni claps i crowd FX na prvi takt refrena]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[reverb_tail – duži hall tail na kraju linije]
U ljubavi nismo
[pad_lift – akordi jači, sidechain uz kick]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[adlib – tihi “ajde, zaboravi” u pozadini]

[Bridge]
Nema, nema, nema ljubavi
[call_resp – pozadinski šapat “nema, nema” u stereo slici]
Srce hoće da zaboravi
[heartbeat_fx – low thump synced to tempo]
Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio
[reverse_verb – lead povučen unazad u sledeći takt]
Svoj sreći sam presudio
[octave_harmony – visoki glas prati “presudio”]
Nema, nema, nema ljubavi
[chopped – „nema ljubavi, ljubavi“ isječeno kao ritmički loop]
Srce hoće da zaboravi
[tremolo_fx – blagi tremolo na pratećem vokalu]
Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio
[stereo_widen – širi panorama samo na ovoj frazi]
Svoj sreći sam presudio
[tape_stop – kratki usporeni efekt na “presudio” pred refren]

[Chorus]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[full_stack – glavni glas + 2 harmonije za final hook]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[big_hall – veći reverb, refren kao “arena”]
U ljubavi nismo
[choir_aaah – dugi “aaah” akord kroz liniju]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[answer_vox – pozadinski “druga… druga…” u ehu]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[doubles + whisper_layer – šapat “ne šalji” ispod lead-a]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[delay_throw – snažan 1/2 note na poslednji “-vi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[sidechain_pad – diše uz kick, otvara se na “nismo”]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[outro_fill – kratki vokalni riff pre odlaska u outro]

[Outro]
(Nema, nema, nema ljubavi)
[filtered_echo – low-pass echo koji se gasi kroz 2 takta]
(Srce hoće da zaboravi)
[choir_low – muški duboko “hoće da zaboravi”]
(Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio)
[reverse_chop – isečene slogove “lju-bi-o” u ritmu]
(Svoj sreći sam presudio)
[reverb_swim – dugačak tail, fade u sledeću liniju]
(Nema, nema, nema ljubavi)
[distant_bg – kao da dolazi iz druge sobe]
(Srce hoće da zaboravi)
[pingpong_delay – lagani stereo bounce]
(Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio)
[adlib – tihi “hej…” pre “ljubio”]
(Svoj sreći sam presudio)
[fader_fade – postepeno spuštanje lead-a, ostaje samo delay i pad]

[Mix / Master –expertly done ]

---

# hardcore_pop - NE SALJI MI PISMO_dr_Khans
[DESCRIPTION]
A fast, high-energy Balkan pop banger; four-on-the-floor kicks, sharp claps, trap hi-hat rolls keep the floor moving. Sidechained synth bass anchors, sometimes joined by live bass licks. Brass and wild zurna swap hooks; dramatic gusle motifs emerge in breakdowns, later chopped in the drop. 80s MIDI synths bring creamy pads, sharp stabs, and a catchy arp, while spacy house organs play off-beat in choruses. Vocals: raspy baritone with double-tracking, harmonies, subtle vocoder. Filtered pre-chorus (gusle, organs) builds tension, climaxing in an explosive brass/zurna/synth drop. Bold, euphoric Balkan club fusion.

[LYRICS]
[Intro]
(Sve, sve ove godine sa tobom ja)
[room_verb – wide, distant, filtered, low in mix]
(Ja sam u svađi sam sa sobom sve)
[tape_delay – 1/4 note throw on “sobom sve”]
(Ove godine sa tobom ali danas je sa nama gotovo)
[doubled_low – whispered layer underneath “gotovo”]

[Verse 1]
Laž, laži sam mogao da podnesem ti
[slap_delay – short 1/8 echo on “podnesem ti”]
Proleće pretvaraš u jesen i sve
[pads_bg – warm minor pad swelling under “proleće / jesen”]
Sve sam mogao da izdržim ali prevare meni se ne vare
[bg_chant – low octave hum on “mene se ne vare”, sidechained to kick]

[Chorus]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[stereo_doubles – soft gang-style on word “pismo”]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[delay_throw – long 1/2 note echo on “zaboravi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[bg_choir – ooh/aaah sustained behind “ljubavi”]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[octave_up – thin high harmony on “druga boravi”]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[call_resp – chopped “ne šalji, ne šalji” tucked behind main]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[pingpong_delay – subtle stereo bounces on “zaboravi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[swell – reverse reverb into downbeat “U ljubavi”]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[adlib_bg – distant “hej, hej” between phrases]

[Verse 2]
Sve obično stane sve u reči dve
[mono_lp – first bar slightly filtered like telefonski glas]
Što ću ti reći znam da boleće
[backing_voices – quiet unison under “znam da boleće”]
Bilo bi najbolje da shvatiš da od danas je sa nama završeno
[chopped – rhythm chop “završeno, završeno” prije sledeće linije]
Laž, u laži svoje si se uplela
[fx_riser – short noise riser pre “uplela”]
I nisi znala, nisi umela
[stereo_adlibs – šapat “nisi znala, nisi umela” wide L/R]
Bilo bi najbolje da shvatiš da bez tebe ću živeti savršeno ja
[octave_stack – low + high harmony on “savršeno ja”]
E pa da
[dry_drop – muzički break, samo vokal, bez reverba]

[Chorus]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[doubles – lagani drugi glas za puniji hook]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[delay_throw – 1/4 + 1/2 kombinacija na “zaboravi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[choir_stack – troglasni “u ljubavi” u pozadini]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[answer_chop – kratko “druga, druga” chop pred “boravi”]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[clap_lift – dodatni claps i crowd FX na prvi takt refrena]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[reverb_tail – duži hall tail na kraju linije]
U ljubavi nismo
[pad_lift – akordi jači, sidechain uz kick]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[adlib – tihi “ajde, zaboravi” u pozadini]

[Bridge]
Nema, nema, nema ljubavi
[call_resp – pozadinski šapat “nema, nema” u stereo slici]
Srce hoće da zaboravi
[heartbeat_fx – low thump synced to tempo]
Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio
[reverse_verb – lead povučen unazad u sledeći takt]
Svoj sreći sam presudio
[octave_harmony – visoki glas prati “presudio”]
Nema, nema, nema ljubavi
[chopped – „nema ljubavi, ljubavi“ isječeno kao ritmički loop]
Srce hoće da zaboravi
[tremolo_fx – blagi tremolo na pratećem vokalu]
Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio
[stereo_widen – širi panorama samo na ovoj frazi]
Svoj sreći sam presudio
[tape_stop – kratki usporeni efekt na “presudio” pred refren]

[Chorus]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[full_stack – glavni glas + 2 harmonije za final hook]

[big_hall – veći reverb, refren kao “arena”]

[delay_throw – snažan 1/2 note na poslednji “-vi”]

[sidechain_pad – diše uz kick, otvara se na “nismo”]

[Outro]

[reverb_swim – dugačak tail, fade u sledeću liniju]
(Nema, nema, nema ljubavi)
[distant_bg – kao da dolazi iz druge sobe]
(Srce hoće da zaboravi)
[pingpong_delay – lagani stereo bounce]
(Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio)
[adlib – tihi “hej…” pre “ljubio”]
(Svoj sreći sam presudio)
[fader_fade – postepeno spuštanje lead-a, ostaje samo delay i pad]

[Mix / Master –expertly done ]

[DESCRIPTION]

Vocals: raspy baritone with double-tracking, harmonies, subtle vocoder. Filtered pre-chorus (gusle, organs) builds tension, climaxing in an explosive brass/zurna/synth drop. # hardcore_pop - NE SALJI MI PISMO_dr_Khans
[DESCRIPTION]
High-energy modern Balkan pop banger in a bright major key with fast tempo and club-ready production. A punchy four-on-the-floor kick, tight claps and occasional trap-style hi-hat rolls drive the groove. A side-chained synth bass anchors the low end, sometimes doubled by live bass fills.

Brass now trades call-and-response hooks with a wild **zurna**, while **gusle** appears in breakdowns with a raw motif that later returns as a chopped rhythmic hook in the drop. **80s-style MIDI synths** add warm pads, bright stabs and a simple arpeggio, while house-style **organs** hit on off-beats under the chorus for a euphoric lift.

The male vocal stays a clear, slightly raspy baritone, stacked with doubles, harmonies and subtle vocoder ad-libs. Verses lead into a filtered pre-chorus (gusle + organs for tension), then an explosive drop where brass, zurna and 80s synths slam together. Overall vibe: Balkan wedding energy meets modern EDM/pop club.

[LYRICS]
[Intro]
(Sve, sve ove godine sa tobom ja)
[room_verb – wide, distant, filtered, low in mix]
(Ja sam u svađi sam sa sobom sve)
[tape_delay – 1/4 note throw on “sobom sve”]
(Ove godine sa tobom ali danas je sa nama gotovo)
[doubled_low – whispered layer underneath “gotovo”]

[Verse 1]
Laž, laži sam mogao da podnesem ti
[slap_delay – short 1/8 echo on “podnesem ti”]
Proleće pretvaraš u jesen i sve
[pads_bg – warm minor pad swelling under “proleće / jesen”]
Sve sam mogao da izdržim ali prevare meni se ne vare
[bg_chant – low octave hum on “mene se ne vare”, sidechained to kick]

[Chorus]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[stereo_doubles – soft gang-style on word “pismo”]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[delay_throw – long 1/2 note echo on “zaboravi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[bg_choir – ooh/aaah sustained behind “ljubavi”]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[octave_up – thin high harmony on “druga boravi”]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[call_resp – chopped “ne šalji, ne šalji” tucked behind main]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[pingpong_delay – subtle stereo bounces on “zaboravi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[swell – reverse reverb into downbeat “U ljubavi”]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[adlib_bg – distant “hej, hej” between phrases]

[Verse 2]
Sve obično stane sve u reči dve
[mono_lp – first bar slightly filtered like telefonski glas]
Što ću ti reći znam da boleće
[backing_voices – quiet unison under “znam da boleće”]
Bilo bi najbolje da shvatiš da od danas je sa nama završeno
[chopped – rhythm chop “završeno, završeno” prije sledeće linije]
Laž, u laži svoje si se uplela
[fx_riser – short noise riser pre “uplela”]
I nisi znala, nisi umela
[stereo_adlibs – šapat “nisi znala, nisi umela” wide L/R]
Bilo bi najbolje da shvatiš da bez tebe ću živeti savršeno ja
[octave_stack – low + high harmony on “savršeno ja”]
E pa da
[dry_drop – muzički break, samo vokal, bez reverba]

[Chorus]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[doubles – lagani drugi glas za puniji hook]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[delay_throw – 1/4 + 1/2 kombinacija na “zaboravi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[choir_stack – troglasni “u ljubavi” u pozadini]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[answer_chop – kratko “druga, druga” chop pred “boravi”]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[clap_lift – dodatni claps i crowd FX na prvi takt refrena]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[reverb_tail – duži hall tail na kraju linije]
U ljubavi nismo
[pad_lift – akordi jači, sidechain uz kick]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[adlib – tihi “ajde, zaboravi” u pozadini]

[Bridge]
Nema, nema, nema ljubavi
[call_resp – pozadinski šapat “nema, nema” u stereo slici]
Srce hoće da zaboravi
[heartbeat_fx – low thump synced to tempo]
Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio
[reverse_verb – lead povučen unazad u sledeći takt]
Svoj sreći sam presudio
[octave_harmony – visoki glas prati “presudio”]
Nema, nema, nema ljubavi
[chopped – „nema ljubavi, ljubavi“ isječeno kao ritmički loop]
Srce hoće da zaboravi
[tremolo_fx – blagi tremolo na pratećem vokalu]
Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio
[stereo_widen – širi panorama samo na ovoj frazi]
Svoj sreći sam presudio
[tape_stop – kratki usporeni efekt na “presudio” pred refren]

[Chorus]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[full_stack – glavni glas + 2 harmonije za final hook]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[big_hall – veći reverb, refren kao “arena”]
U ljubavi nismo
[choir_aaah – dugi “aaah” akord kroz liniju]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[answer_vox – pozadinski “druga… druga…” u ehu]
Ne šalji mi pismo
[doubles + whisper_layer – šapat “ne šalji” ispod lead-a]
Moje ime skroz zaboravi
[delay_throw – snažan 1/2 note na poslednji “-vi”]
U ljubavi nismo
[sidechain_pad – diše uz kick, otvara se na “nismo”]
U mom srcu druga boravi
[outro_fill – kratki vokalni riff pre odlaska u outro]

[Outro]
(Nema, nema, nema ljubavi)
[filtered_echo – low-pass echo koji se gasi kroz 2 takta]
(Srce hoće da zaboravi)
[choir_low – muški duboko “hoće da zaboravi”]
(Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio)
[reverse_chop – isečene slogove “lju-bi-o” u ritmu]
(Svoj sreći sam presudio)
[reverb_swim – dugačak tail, fade u sledeću liniju]
(Nema, nema, nema ljubavi)
[distant_bg – kao da dolazi iz druge sobe]
(Srce hoće da zaboravi)
[pingpong_delay – lagani stereo bounce]
(Kad sam tvoje usne ljubio)
[adlib – tihi “hej…” pre “ljubio”]
(Svoj sreći sam presudio)
[fader_fade – postepeno spuštanje lead-a, ostaje samo delay i pad]

[Mix / Master –expertly done ]

---

# hardcore_pop - Nisi_Svesnecca_4_Hardcore_Pop
[DESCRIPTION]
A hypnotic tech house track at 134 BPM, anchored by a deep, dubbed-out bassline and minimal percussion—rimshots, tambourine, scattered cowbell—offset by warm analog pads for an immersive yet danceable mood. Organic hand drums, wooden blocks, bell trees, and beach party field recordings layer human and atmospheric texture. Detuned FM arpeggios propel fluid melodic motion. The breakdown showcases isolated bass and airy vocal loops, then builds with additional percussion. The drop unveils a punchy 909 kick and tight hi-hats, while occasional saturated, reverby chord stabs add character. Space, subtlety, and groove guide the arrangement for seamless DJ mixing.

[LYRICS]
[GLOBAL:tempo 134 BPM;key Em;dub-delay+spring verb;909 kick tight;analog pad warm;FM-arp detuned 3 cents;organic perc layered;field FX:beach+crowd;mix-space-driven;target -8 LUFS]

[Intro — 0:00–0:24 — texture ignition ARR:soft pad fade L→R;rimshot 2 bars;tambourine ghost;FM-arp emerges;hand drums low;field rec L crickets,R waves;bass sweep 100→500 Hz PROC:pad chorus +1.5 dB;HPF drums < 90 Hz;delay 1/8 pingpong;sub comp 2:1 slow atk;stereo widen 10 % MIX:space>energy;subtight]
[Male - Verse]
Nisi svesna
Kako bih te mazio
Pitam se
Da li bih se pazio ([BACK:whisper-LRpan20 %,shortdelay] ah, yeah)
Misliš da si cool
Znaj dečko sam odvažan
S tobom sam zbog tela
A karakter je dodatan

[Female - Chorus — 0:24–0:56 — main groove settles ARR:deep bass dub;909 kick mid;hi-hat tight;pad pulse sidechained;FM-arp midbright;FX reverse bell bar 9 PROC:vocal de-ess 6 k;-1 dB 300 Hz cut;gentle sat +1.5 dB;parallel wet 20 % MIX:warm-pad>vox]
Oseti kako te greje ovaj plamen
Mogla bih da se ne skinem s tebe satima
Misliš da si kul
Al' karakter ti je odvratan
S tobom sam zbog seksа
Sve ostalo bonus dodatan ([BACK:vocoder-stack,stereo-delay1/8] fire, mmm, oh)

[Male - Verse — 0:56–1:28 — groove returns softer ARR:pull kick -1 dB;rim fill 4 bars;FM-arp short decay;bass LP 600 Hz;pad depth widen PROC:vox tube +2 dB;transient soft hats;LP drums mid]
Nisi svesna kako bih te mazio
Nisi svesna koliko bih te pazio
Misliš da si cool
Ali dečko ti je odvratan
S tobom sam zbog tela
A karakter je dodatan ([BACK:filtered-reverse-breath] hah, yeah, uh)

[Pre-Chorus — 1:28–1:56 — tension build ARR:remove kick;808 tom pulses;pad res rise;short vox chops pitched;woodblock sync;HPF bass 400→1.2 k mute 2 bars PROC:vocal delay 1/8 dot;bit tail 20 %;bandpass auto widen MIX:warmpads duck-vox]
Tvoja koža se sija
Na suncu ceo dan prava zmija
Zovi me "Daddy"
Ili zovi me "Baby"
Ponekad sam oboje
Al ću kol te mejbi
S tobom bih se smirio,
ti i ja skupa teritoriju da širimo
A vetar piri, duva,
Stiže novo vreme,
Dajem ti sve
(A ti mi daj sebe) ([BACK:glitch-chops,bandpass 2–4 k] baby, daddy, mmm)

[Chorus — 1:56–2:28 — main lift ARR:909 kick full;hi-hat tight;sub rich;FM-arp drive +10 %;dub-stab 1/4;pad wide;bell beat 1 PROC:bus comp 2:1;low cut 30 Hz;vocal plate 30 %;bass dist 20 % AUTOM:vocal feedback rise]
Oseti kako te greje ovaj plamen
Mogla bih da se ne skinem s tebe satima
Misliš da si kul
Al' karakter ti je odvratan
S tobom sam zbog seksа
Sve ostalo je dodatan ([BACK:chorus-stack,reverbplate 50 %] fire, oh, burn, yeah)

[Verse — 2:28–2:52 — post-drop groove ARR:bass solo LP 100–300 Hz;pad solo verb 70 %;hand drum ghost;FM-arp ping;vocal loop "mazio" repeat PROC:long verb;EQ notch 400 Hz;auto duck FX MIX:air>weight]
Nisi svesna kako bih te mazio
Nisi svesna koliko bih te pazio
Misliš da si cool
(Znam dečko si odvažan)
S tobom sam zbog tela
A karakter je dodatan ([BACK:echo-padblend] ooo, sss, ahh)

[Bridge — 2:52–3:12 — minimal reprize ARR:mute bass 4 bars;hand drum solo;FM-arp low;pad mid;whisper vox alt pan;woodblock echo ¼ L;reintro bass bar 7 PROC:reverb 4 s;cut 600 Hz;parallel room 15 % AUTOM:pad width expand]
Tvoja koža se sija
Na suncu ceo dan prava zmija ([BACK:soft-whisper,pan L] ah, baby)

[Outro — 3:12–3:40 — fadeout vibe ARR:bass fade;pad filter down;hand drum ghost;FM-arp random;bell final;field rec waves;vocal “dodatan” echo PROC:master HP 200→100;limiter -0.4 dB;verb tail auto fade 10 s MIX:end airy-pad groove]
S tobom sam zbog seksа
Sve ostalo je bonus dodatan ([BACK:echo-tail-loop] dodatan, yeah, mmm)

[MASTERING NOTES:EQ notch 250–400 Hz -1.2 dB;multi-band low 2:1, mid 1.4:1, high 1.6:1;soft tape sat +1.5 dB;transient +1 dB kick;mono < 120 Hz;ceiling -0.3 dB;target -8 LUFS;reference playback club/HD25/headphones cross-check.]

[PRODUCTION & MIX TIPS:keep 32-bar phrasing;automate pad filter LFO;vocal delay < 25 %;maintain rim-L/woodblock-R stereo contrast;sub LP @ 30 Hz;analog bus warmth;use resonant filters for build transitions.]

---

# hardcore_pop - Nisi_Svesnecca_Hardcore_Pop
[DESCRIPTION]
Deep, dubbed-out bassline rolls beneath minimal percussion framework—rimshots, tambourines, scattered cowbell hits. Warm analog pad textures establish meditative atmosphere while maintaining dance floor functionality. Organic percussion samples—hand drums, wooden blocks, bell trees—inject human element. Atmospheric field recordings capture beach party ambience: waves, distant laughter, bonfire crackles. Melodic progression uses detuned FM synth arpeggios, creating liquid, flowing movement. Breakdown strips to isolated bass and ethereal vocal loops before gradual build through added percussion layers. Drop introduces punchy 909 kick and driving closed hi-hat patterns while maintaining deep, hypnotic vibe. Chord stabs appear sparingly, processed through spring reverb and tape saturation. Sustained groove emphasizes space and restraint over aggressive energy, perfect for extended mixing.

[LYRICS]
[Male - Verse]
Nisi svesna
Kako bih te mazio
Pitam se
Da li bih se pazio
Misliš da si cool
Znaj dečko sam odvažan
S tobom sam zbog tela
A karakter je dodatan

[Female- Chorus]
Oseti kako te greje ovaj plamen
Mogla bih da se ne skinem s tebe satima
Misliš da si kul
Al' karakter ti je odvratan
S tobom sam zbog seksa
Sve ostalo bonus dodatan

[Male -Verse]
Nisi svesna kako bih te mazio
Nisi svesna koliko bih te pazio
Misliš da si cool
Ali dečko ti je odvratan
S tobom sam zbog tela
A karakter je dodatan

[Pre-Chorus]
Tvoja koža se sija
Na suncu ceo dan prava zmija
Zovi me "Daddy"
Ili zovi me "Baby"
Ponekad sam oboje
Al ću kol te mejbi
S tobom bih se smirio,
ti i ja skupa teritoriju da širimo
A vetar piri, duva,
Stiže novo vreme,
Dajem ti sve
(A ti mi daj sebe)

[Chorus]
Oseti kako te greje ovaj plamen
Mogla bih da se ne skinem s tebe satima
Misliš da si kul

# hardcore_pop - Nisi_Svesnecca_Hardcore_Pop
[DESCRIPTION]
At 128 bpm, this tech house track drives with aggressive sawtooth bass stabs synced to a four-on-the-floor kick, delivering percussive punch. Glitchy, granular-processed percussion fills interplay with 90s rave stabs and hoover sounds, sharply produced for modern clarity. Environmental club samples fuse into the groove. Detuned, heavily bitcrushed square leads form distorted melodies, while rapid, chopped vocal rhythms follow the kick. Breakdowns use abrupt silence, then rush back with layered bassline variations and dense, harmonically-spaced peaks—ensuring relentless, club-focused energy throughout.

[LYRICS]
[Male - Verse]

# hardcore_pop - No Looking Back Tonight
[DESCRIPTION]
At 138 bpm underground slap tech house track , zurle, organ,80s midi synths, car siren, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Verse]
I measure the minutes I give you no more
I measure the pressure that turned into yours
I measure the length of my list of chores
Unpaving the future I dreamed before

[Chorus]
No looking back tonight
No looking back tonight

[Verse 2]
You showed me you loved me more than I knew
You showed me what leaving your skin can do
You showed me you never could tell the truth
I'm healing I'm peeling my love from you

[Chorus]
No looking back tonight
No looking back tonight

[Bridge]
It only gets better from here
I'm standing on top of my fears
I measured the pressure I felt last year
And it cannot compare to what brought me here

[Chorus]
No looking back tonight
No looking back tonight
No looking back tonight
No looking back tonight

[Verse]
I lose his phone number
I take a long shower
I find all the stuff I thought he gave me but I bought for myself
I eat alone
I wear headphones
I listen to the same three songs until they just don't feel the same

[Chorus]
No looking back tonight
No looking back tonight

[Verse 2]
I reread our texts
I talk about my ex
I cancel the dates 'cause I don't think that I'm ready for one yet
I cry 'til the morning
My friends say
"Ignore him"
The tears are still pouring
But I'm not worried
We gon' find somebody else

[Chorus]
No looking back tonight
No looking back tonight

[Bridge]
(She won't)
No looking back tonight
(She won't)
No looking back tonight
(She won't)
No looking back tonight
No looking back tonight
No looking back tonight

# hardcore_pop - Now with clear elements of here_ Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
bouny undeground slap club tech Turkish oriental pop ,organs, zurna, gusle, 80s midi synths retro,  car honks, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

# hardcore_pop - Offer_Ffame_20
[DESCRIPTION]
The tech house track opens with ethereal,filtered monastic chants drifting over a pulsing,minimal kick and intricate hi-hats,creating immediate tension. Sparse synth stabs pierce through as deep rolling bass enters,locking the groove into hypnotic submission. Swelling reverb and delay on the chants evolve throughout,weaving a spiritual counterpoint to raw,nihilistic lyrics about fame,criminality and excess. The track builds with calculated precision,each element adding layers: gritty vocal deliveries describing "cirku-si" and "krimosi" contrast against sacred chants,while "fon blek beri" and "revolveri" imagery reinforces the dark underworld narrative. The drops hit with maximum impact,where "ekstaza" becomes both spiritual and chemical. The production balances minimalism with complexity,creating an evolving,seductive texture that drives club energy through carefully crafted tension and release. The final section deconstructs completely,leaving only granulated chants,fragmented bass

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - Intro]
*Filtered chants, minimal kick, intricate hats.*

[Male - Verse]

i dalje samo biznisi
pa nikada minusi
noge šire ko virusi
grkinje i girosi

# hardcore_pop - Offer_Ffame_24
[DESCRIPTION]
This EDM banger erupts at 150 BPM,igniting the floor with a relentless fusion of Balkan soul and modern fury. It opens with the iconic,wailing cry of a traditional accordion sample,immediately hijacked by a pounding,4/4 kick drum that feels like a heartbeat on steroids. The original melancholic melody is twisted into a weaponized synth lead,soaring over a seismic,sidechained bassline that never relents. Fiery Balkan brass stabs,processed through distortion and delay,punch through the mix like gunshots,while the original vocal—pitched and glitched—becomes a defiant,robotic mantra commanding you to move. There are no breakdowns,only momentary breathers where the kick filters back in with more punishing force. This is a non-stop,percussive assault designed for pure,unadulterated chaos; a track that doesn't build to a drop,but rather IS the drop from start to finish. It's a timeless melody supercharged into a futuristic,unrelenting beast that grabs you by the soul and refuses to let go u

[Instrumental - Intro- absolutely banging, adrenaline]

Captivating dancefloor anthem with bouncy grooves and hypnotic synth layers, perfect for late-night sessions and party-ready vibes.

# hardcore_pop - Old Habits Die Hard _Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
A hybrid tech-house / G-house / minimal club weapon blending  rolling basslines, gritty West Coast swagger, stripped groovy stabs, and subtle Balkan percussive accents. Pumping at 124–128 BPM, the track locks into a hypnotic bassline with LFO wobble growls, punchy kicks, crisp claps, and tight shaker rhythms. The vocal remains clean, intimate, and forward—no autotune—while chopped fragments of “old habits die hard” form an addictive mantra that anchors each drop. Build-ups use snare ramps, reverse breaths, and siren FX before slamming into heavy, driving low-end sections. Minimal FM stabs, tapan fills, and cowbell accents give the track a unique hybrid character that’s both underground and high-energy. A DJ-friendly structure and rhythmic vocal loops make this remix perfect for peak-time sets, dark rooms, and bass-driven festival floors.

[LYRICS]
[GlobalMix–Hybrid Tech House/G-House/Balkan Minimal ~124–128 BPM.Kick:deep punchy(55–80 Hz),short tail.Bass:rolling tech-house LFO wobble blended with G-house distorted mid-bass,mono<120 Hz,sidechain 6–9 dB.Snares/claps:crispy 4–7 kHz,minimal,short room.Hats:1/8 tech pulse+1/16 shuffle.Cowbells+tapan percussion lightly tucked for Balkan spice.Synths:minimal FM stabs,west-coast chord shots,Cloonee-style plucks.Biscits-style vocal chops integrated as rhythmic hits.Vocals:clean male lead,light grit,no autotune,forward,slap delay on ends;whisper layers for groove.FX:sirens,reverse swells,sub drops,filter tension.Master:-6.5/-6 LUFS,club-ready,wide mids,mono low-end.]

[Structure–DJIntro(16 bars chops+bass tease)->Verse1(minimal groove)->Verse2(bass enters)->Build1(snare+reverse vocals)->Drop1(tech-house wobble)->ChorusHook(drop extension)->Verse3(minimal variation)->Verse4(build)->MegaDrop(hybrid groove)->Outro(DJ friendly).]

⭐ DJ INTRO – Vocal Chop Groove

([VoxChop1/8]-“old habits… die hard…” rhythmic loop)
([BassFilter]-lowpassed wobble)
([CowbellSoft])
([ClapDry])
([ReverseBreath])

⭐ [Verse 1]

I can't live on love and kisses
([VoxDryClose])
I can't live on hope and wishes
([PercClick])
I can't hold the northern star
([PluckMinimal])
Old habits die hard
([VoxChopLow]-“die hard” looped quietly)

# hardcore_pop - Old Habits Die Hard _Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
A hybrid tech-house / G-house / minimal club weapon blending  rolling basslines, gritty West Coast swagger, stripped groovy stabs, and subtle Balkan percussive accents. Pumping at 124–128 BPM, the track locks into a hypnotic bassline with LFO wobble growls, punchy kicks, crisp claps, and tight shaker rhythms. The vocal remains clean, intimate, and forward—no autotune—while chopped fragments of “old habits die hard” form an addictive mantra that anchors each drop. Build-ups use snare ramps, reverse breaths, and siren FX before slamming into heavy, driving low-end sections. Minimal FM stabs, tapan fills, and cowbell accents give the track a unique hybrid character that’s both underground and high-energy. A DJ-friendly structure and rhythmic vocal loops make this remix perfect for peak-time sets, dark rooms, and bass-driven festival floors.

[LYRICS]
[GlobalMix–Hybrid Tech House/G-House/Balkan Minimal ~124–128 BPM.Kick:deep punchy(55–80 Hz),short tail.Bass:rolling tech-house LFO wobble blended with G-house distorted mid-bass,mono<120 Hz,sidechain 6–9 dB.Snares/claps:crispy 4–7 kHz,minimal,short room.Hats:1/8 tech pulse+1/16 shuffle.Cowbells+tapan percussion lightly tucked for Balkan spice.Synths:minimal FM stabs,west-coast chord shots,Cloonee-style plucks.Biscits-style vocal chops integrated as rhythmic hits.Vocals:clean male lead,light grit,no autotune,forward,slap delay on ends;whisper layers for groove.FX:sirens,reverse swells,sub drops,filter tension.Master:-6.5/-6 LUFS,club-ready,wide mids,mono low-end.]

[Structure–DJIntro(16 bars chops+bass tease)->Verse1(minimal groove)->Verse2(bass enters)->Build1(snare+reverse vocals)->Drop1(tech-house wobble)->ChorusHook(drop extension)->Verse3(minimal variation)->Verse4(build)->MegaDrop(hybrid groove)->Outro(DJ friendly).]

⭐ DJ INTRO – Vocal Chop Groove

([VoxChop1/8]-“old habits… die hard…” rhythmic loop)
([BassFilter]-lowpassed wobble)
([CowbellSoft])
([ClapDry])
([ReverseBreath])

⭐ [Verse 1]

([PercClick])

([PluckMinimal])

([BassHint])

([PadDarkLow])

# hardcore_pop - Old Habits Die Hard _Hardcore_Pop_2
[DESCRIPTION]
A dark, rolling UK tech-house heater at 126 BPM built on a wobbling mid-bass with tight compression, fast LFO modulation, and punchy low-end presence. Drums stay crisp and dry: tight clap at 4–7 kHz, 1/8 hats with 1/16 ghost ticks, woodblocks and filtered noise driving a cheeky club bounce. Serbian female vocal is transformed into rhythmic chops—“trčim tebi,” “bežim,” “ne želim te,” “trebam te”—forming hypnotic hooks that weave tightly around the bass. Verses stay intimate and dry with minimal percussion, creating tension before explosive drops filled with rolling bass, vocal stabs, and wide claps. Snare lifts, noise risers, pitch-downs, and filtered organ shots animate builds and breaks. The whole remix feels playful, sexy, underground, and perfectly tailored for peak-time DJ sets or dark festival tents.

[LYRICS]
[GlobalMix–Hybrid Tech House/G-House/Balkan Minimal ~124–128 BPM.Kick:deep punchy(55–80 Hz),short tail.Bass:rolling tech-house LFO wobble blended with G-house distorted mid-bass,mono<120 Hz,sidechain 6–9 dB.Snares/claps:crispy 4–7 kHz,minimal,short room.Hats:1/8 tech pulse+1/16 shuffle.Cowbells+tapan percussion lightly tucked for Balkan spice.Synths:minimal FM stabs,west-coast chord shots,Cloonee-style plucks.Biscits-style vocal chops integrated as rhythmic hits.Vocals:clean male lead,light grit,no autotune,forward,slap delay on ends;whisper layers for groove.FX:sirens,reverse swells,sub drops,filter tension.Master:-6.5/-6 LUFS,club-ready,wide mids,mono low-end.]

[Structure–DJIntro(16 bars chops+bass tease)->Verse1(minimal groove)->Verse2(bass enters)->Build1(snare+reverse vocals)->Drop1(tech-house wobble)->ChorusHook(drop extension)->Verse3(minimal variation)->Verse4(build)->MegaDrop(hybrid groove)->Outro(DJ friendly).]

⭐ DJ INTRO – Vocal Chop Groove

([VoxChop1/8]-“old habits… die hard…” rhythmic loop)
([BassFilter]-lowpassed wobble)
([CowbellSoft])
([ClapDry])
([ReverseBreath])

# hardcore_pop - Old Habits Die Hard _Hardcore_Pop_2
[DESCRIPTION]
A dark, rolling UK tech-house heater at 126 BPM built on a wobbling mid-bass with tight compression, fast LFO modulation, and punchy low-end presence. Drums stay crisp and dry: tight clap at 4–7 kHz, 1/8 hats with 1/16 ghost ticks, woodblocks and filtered noise driving a cheeky club bounce. Serbian female vocal is transformed into rhythmic chops—“trčim tebi,” “bežim,” “ne želim te,” “trebam te”—forming hypnotic hooks that weave tightly around the bass. Verses stay intimate and dry with minimal percussion, creating tension before explosive drops filled with rolling bass, vocal stabs, and wide claps. Snare lifts, noise risers, pitch-downs, and filtered organ shots animate builds and breaks. The whole remix feels playful, sexy, underground, and perfectly tailored for peak-time DJ sets or dark festival tents.

[LYRICS]
[GlobalMix–Hybrid Tech House/G-House/Balkan Minimal ~124–128 BPM.Kick:deep punchy(55–80 Hz),short tail.Bass:rolling tech-house LFO wobble blended with G-house distorted mid-bass,mono<120 Hz,sidechain 6–9 dB.Snares/claps:crispy 4–7 kHz,minimal,short room.Hats:1/8 tech pulse+1/16 shuffle.Cowbells+tapan percussion lightly tucked for Balkan spice.Synths:minimal FM stabs,west-coast chord shots,Cloonee-style plucks.Biscits-style vocal chops integrated as rhythmic hits.Vocals:clean male lead,light grit,no autotune,forward,slap delay on ends;whisper layers for groove.FX:sirens,reverse swells,sub drops,filter tension.Master:-6.5/-6 LUFS,club-ready,wide mids,mono low-end.]

[Structure–DJIntro(16 bars chops+bass tease)->Verse1(minimal groove)->Verse2(bass enters)->Build1(snare+reverse vocals)->Drop1(tech-house wobble)->ChorusHook(drop extension)->Verse3(minimal variation)->Verse4(build)->MegaDrop(hybrid groove)->Outro(DJ friendly).]

# hardcore_pop - Old Habits Die Hard _Hardcore_Pop_2
[DESCRIPTION]
A dark, rolling UK tech-house heater at 126 BPM built on a wobbling mid-bass with tight compression, fast LFO modulation, and punchy low-end presence. Drums stay crisp and dry: tight clap at 4–7 kHz, 1/8 hats with 1/16 ghost ticks, woodblocks and filtered noise driving a cheeky club bounce. Serbian female vocal is transformed into rhythmic chops—“trčim tebi,” “bežim,” “ne želim te,” “trebam te”—forming hypnotic hooks that weave tightly around the bass. Verses stay intimate and dry with minimal percussion, creating tension before explosive drops filled with rolling bass, vocal stabs, and wide claps. Snare lifts, noise risers, pitch-downs, and filtered organ shots animate builds and breaks. The whole remix feels playful, sexy, underground, and perfectly tailored for peak-time DJ sets or dark festival tents.

[LYRICS]
[GlobalMix–Hybrid Tech House/G-House/Balkan Minimal ~124–128 BPM.Kick:deep punchy(55–80 Hz),short tail.Bass:rolling tech-house LFO wobble blended with G-house distorted mid-bass,mono<120 Hz,sidechain 6–9 dB.Snares/claps:crispy 4–7 kHz,minimal,short room.Hats:1/8 tech pulse+1/16 shuffle.Cowbells+tapan percussion lightly tucked for Balkan spice.Synths:minimal FM stabs,west-coast chord shots,Cloonee-style plucks.Biscits-style vocal chops integrated as rhythmic hits.Vocals:clean male lead,light grit,no autotune,forward,slap delay on ends;whisper layers for groove.FX:sirens,reverse swells,sub drops,filter tension.Master:-6.5/-6 LUFS,club-ready,wide mids,mono low-end.]

[Structure–DJIntro(16 bars chops+bass tease)->Verse1(minimal groove)->Verse2(bass enters)->Build1(snare+reverse vocals)->Drop1(tech-house wobble)->ChorusHook(drop extension)->Verse3(minimal variation)->Verse4(build)->MegaDrop(hybrid groove)->Outro(DJ friendly).]

# hardcore_pop - Old Habits Die Hard _Hardcore_Pop_2
[DESCRIPTION]

Drums stay crisp and dry: tight clap at 4–7 kHz, 1/8 hats with 1/16 ghost ticks, woodblocks and filtered noise driving a cheeky club bounce. Verses stay intimate and dry with minimal percussion, creating tension before explosive drops filled with rolling bass, vocal stabs, and wide claps. Snare lifts, noise risers, pitch-downs, and filtered organ shots animate builds and breaks. The whole remix feels playful, sexy, underground, and perfectly tailored for peak-time DJ sets or dark festival tents.

[GlobalMix–Hybrid Tech House/G-House/Balkan Minimal ~124–128 BPM.Kick:deep punchy(55–80 Hz),short tail.Bass:rolling tech-house LFO wobble blended with G-house distorted mid-bass,mono<120 Hz,sidechain 6–9 dB.Snares/claps:crispy 4–7 kHz,minimal,short room.Hats:1/8 tech pulse+1/16 shuffle.Cowbells+tapan percussion lightly tucked for Balkan spice.Synths:minimal FM stabs,west-coast chord shots,Cloonee-style plucks.Biscits-style vocal chops integrated as rhythmic hits.Vocals:clean male lead,light grit,no autotune,forward,slap delay on ends;whisper layers for groove.FX:sirens,reverse swells,sub drops,filter tension.Master:-6.5/-6 LUFS,club-ready,wide mids,mono low-end.]

# hardcore_pop - On Your Mind_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
That fucking final song with world ending, you give it all and create a bouncy undeground slap club tech Turkish oriental pop ,organs, zurna, gusle, 80s midi synths retro,  car honks, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]

"Let's go" (go)
You keep giving me a vibe (vibe)
But you're playing
Girl

When you're screaming out my name (name)
And I think that you should know (know)
I'm in love with you for sure

# hardcore_pop - On Your Mind_Hardcore_Pop_2
[DESCRIPTION]
Explosive underground slap club tech blends with Turkish oriental pop using swirling organs, punchy zurna, metallic gusle, and bright 80s retro midi synths. Car honks and tire screeches punctuate the relentless groove. The dynamic, non-stop dance rhythm backs smooth, unprocessed silk-clear vocals.

[LYRICS]
[Verse]
I don't wanna take it slow (slow)

But you're playing
Girl

And I think that you should know (know)
I'm in love with you for sure

Girl
I'm the only thing that's on your mind
Ooh
You wanna make it right (make it right)
Girl
I'm the only thing that's on your mind
No
I don't wanna say goodbye (say goodbye)
Girl
I'm the only thing that's on your mind

[Bridge]

On your mind

# hardcore_pop - On Your Mind_Hardcore_Pop_3
[DESCRIPTION]
Driving club tech beats propel the track, underpinned by a heavy, percussive slap groove. Swirling organs and bold 80s synths interweave with zurna riffs and metallic gusle, while car honks and tire screeches accent off-beats. Silk-clear vocals soar above this high-energy, constantly evolving dance arrangement.

[LYRICS]
[Verse]
I don't wanna take it slow (slow)
I can hear you when you say
"Let's go" (go)

# hardcore_pop - Ona dolazi
[DESCRIPTION]
At 138 bpm underground slap tech house track , zurle, organ,80s midi synths, car siren, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

Možda sam bio blizu
Ali nisam mogao da te uhvatim
Ovo se dešava iznova i iznova
Možda je vreme da odustanem od pokušaja
Ali ona dolazi
Ona dolazi

# hardcore_pop - One Last Drop_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
at 137 bpm underground house track ,dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals, powerful beat,minor keys (Cm/Gm), Male A2–C4 baritone; Female G3–A5 alto/mezzo, Tight, rhythmic delivery; subtle tuning, Comp 3–6 dB GR; cut 200–350 Hz; add 3–5 kHz presence, 10–12 kHz air, Short plate, tempo-synced delays; natural, clubby vibe

[LYRICS]
[Verse]
It's one AM
([Clock tick] - tik-tik)
I should be leaving (yeah)
([Chair scrape] - skrrp)
The devil on my shoulder's grinning (uh)
([Whispered chuckle] - heh-heh)
She wants me to get on the rum (oh)
([Bottle clink] - clink) ([Pour] - glug-glug)
Oh no
([Record wobble] - wub)

([Crowd murmur low] - mmmrum)

# hardcore_pop - One Last Drop_Hardcore_Pop_2
[DESCRIPTION]
an edm tech house track at 132 bpm dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals, powerful beat,minor keys (Cm/Gm), Male A2–C4 baritone; Female G3–A5 alto/mezzo, Tight, rhythmic delivery; subtle tuning, Comp 3–6 dB GR; cut 200–350 Hz; add 3–5 kHz presence, 10–12 kHz air, Short plate, tempo-synced delays; natural, clubby vibe

# hardcore_pop - Overthinkk_Hardcore_Pop_2
[DESCRIPTION]
The tech house track opens with analog drum machine grooves and a surgically tuned kick that anchors a perfectly weighted, sub-heavy bassline. Crisp hats and shuffled percussion add movement as digital effects slice through the mix. Arrangement leverages long filter sweeps and precisely timed breakdowns, deploying classic jackin' stabs. Drops hit with engineered punch, syncing old-school attitude with pristine, contemporary sound, balancing underground nuance and peak-hour power.

[LYRICS]
[Verse]
Ooh
([Breath inhale close] - haaah)
It was all goin' right
([Kick soft] - boom)
I was havin' the time of my life
([Crowd murmur] - mmmrum)
But I
([Echo] - I…I)
But I
([Snap] - snap)
But I
([Sub pulse] - thumm)

([Vinyl pop] - pft)

Now I
([Sub bump] - thum)
Now I
([Reverse tail] - whooom)

([Reverb wall] - whooom)

# hardcore_pop - Overthinkk_Hardcore_Pop_3
[DESCRIPTION]
Meticulously engineered tech house built on robust, frequency-layered basslines and tightly tuned kick drums, pulsing with vintage drum machine textures enhanced by digital processing, Arrangements highlight drop-breakdown/drop structures, using subtle filter automation and clever sequencing for controlled tension and impactful releases, expertly balancing underground groove with mainstage lift, always club-focused and clean,

# hardcore_pop - Paparazzi_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
An 130-140 bpm  house track , zurna, organ ,80s synth, cowbells, ancient harp, car siren, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals., minor keys (F# m, Gm, Am). Male A2–G4, percussive, slight backbeat; Female G3–A5, breathy verses, brighter hooks. Tuning fast; comp 3–6 dB. HPF 80–120 Hz; cut 200–350 Hz; add 3–5 kHz, 10–12 kHz; de-ess 6–8 kHz. Short plate, ping-pong delays; doubles & call-response.

[LYRICS]
[Verse]
[Male] Cocker spaniel paparazzi [Female - (paparazzi)]
[Male] I walked my dog and they shot me [Female - (they shot you)]
[Male] Said the sun will make it sloppy [Female - (make it sloppy)]
[Male] Your tongue won't make it stop [Female - (won’t stop)]
[Male] Please [Female - (please)]
[Male] We do not care [Female - (don’t care)]
[Male] Your vision's not clear [Female - (not clear)]
[Male] She kissed me right here [Female - (right here)]
[Male] Take it slow [Female - (take it slow)]
[Male] Dear [Female - (dear)]
[Male] So don't go anywhere [Female - (don’t go)]
[Male] Now you're already here [Female - (already here)]
[Male] And now she said [Female - (she said…)]

[Verse 2]
[Male] She was cryin' [Female - (cryin’)]
[Male] Sayin' [Female - (sayin’)]
[Female] "Why
Man?" [Male - (why, man?)]
[Male] All the time [Female - (all the time)]
[Male] Man [Female - (man)]
[Male] She a shy fan [Female - (shy fan)]
[Male] Wrote her sign in with my right hand [Female - (right hand)]
[Male] Now she's smilin' [Female - (smilin’)]
[Female] "You the right man" [Male - (right man)]
[Male] She said [Female - (she said)]
[Female] "You so cute" while I'm petting my dog [Male - (so cute)]
[Male] I'm gettin' right hot [Female - (right hot)]
[Male] Just take it right off [Female - (right off)]
[Male] I said [Female - (you said)]
[Male] "What's that smell?" She said [Female - ("That’s Chanel")]
[Male] "That's Chanel" [Female - (Chanel)]
[Male] I said [Female - (you said)]
[Male] "That's Chanel" [Female - (Chanel)]
[Male] she said [Female - (she said)]
[Female] "Boy
Go to hell" [Male - (go to hell?)]
[Male] Then she said [Female - (then she said…)]

[Verse 3]
[Male] Said my dog is lookin' dangerous [Female - (dangerous)]
[Male] He a stray [Female - (he a stray)]
[Male] So he's stayin' with us [Female - (stayin’ with us)]
[Male] Come my way [Female - (come my way)]

# hardcore_pop - Paparazzi_Hardcore_Pop_2
[DESCRIPTION]
An 130-140 bpm  house track , zurna, organ ,80s synth, cowbells, ancient harp, car siren, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals., minor keys (F# m, Gm, Am). Male A2–G4, percussive, slight backbeat; Female G3–A5, breathy verses, brighter hooks. Tuning fast; comp 3–6 dB. HPF 80–120 Hz; cut 200–350 Hz; add 3–5 kHz, 10–12 kHz; de-ess 6–8 kHz. Short plate, ping-pong delays; doubles & call-response.

# hardcore_pop - Picnic On The Penthouse Roof_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
An 142 bpm  house track , zurna, organ,80s synth, cowbells, ancient harp, car siren, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals.Tight, rhythmic delivery; subtle , tempo-synced delays; natural, deep, clubby vibe.

[LYRICS]
[Verse 1]
Not long ago I used to eat noodles in the street
([Street hum] - mmmrum) ([Slurp] - slrp)
Fast food every week
([Fryer sizzle] - tsss) ([Cash register] - ka-ching)
End of the month I would cheat
([Coin jingle] - ching) ([Receipt tear] - rrrip)
Now I'm here
([Sub swell] - rrrrrr)
I just want a taste of something new
([Knife tap on plate] - tik)
A three-star meal and some Dom Perignon too
([Cork pop] - pop!) ([Champagne pour] - shhhhh) ([Glass clink] - clink)

[Verse 2]
Get your food on
([Handclap tight] - clap)
Let me show you a good time
([Organ stab short] - org-stab)
It'll taste so fine
([Satisfied hum] - mmm)
But you've gotta pay online
([Phone tap] - tik-tik) ([Pay beep] - bip)
If you don't
([Record stop] - skrrt)
I guess you'll have to leave
([Door latch] - klik)
It's nothing personal
([Breath exhale] - haaah)
It's just what I believe
([Soft choir pad] - ooo)

[Verse 3]
Get your plate
([Plate set] - tok)
Grab a knife and a fork
([Cutlery clink] - clink-clink)
We're eatin' everything from pasta to pork
([Pan sizzle] - tssss)
Sippin' cocktails while we're watching the sky
([Shaker] - chk-chk) ([Ice swirl] - clrrrk)
It's beautiful to be here
([Crowd murmur warm] - mmmrum)
And it's beautiful to fly
([Wind lift] - whooosh)

[Bridge]
The first-class living's got me thinking
([Airline chime] - ding) ([Cabin whoosh] - fffsh)
Sitting in my penthouse drinking
([Bottle glug] - glug-glug) ([City night] - mmmm)
Well
([Vinyl pop] - pft)
That's what I told my friends
([Typing] - tik-tik-tik) ([Send whoosh] - whoop)
And I was thinking 'bout it then
([Echo tail] - whooom)
I thought I'd just invite you all
([Doorbell] - ding-dong)
Come up for drinks and we could eat as well
([Elevator ding] - ding) ([Lift glide] - vmmm)
That's when my boyfriend had a plan
([Lightbulb ping] - ping)
He thought of something different
([Record wobble] - wub) ([Riser] - shhaaa)

[Chorus]
He said
"We're gonna have a picnic on the penthouse roof
([Rooftop wind] - fffsh)
Just bring a little blanket
([Fabric rustle] - fffshh)
I've got wine for you
([Cork pop] - pop!) ([Pour] - shhhh)
Gonna have a picnic on the penthouse roof
([City distant] - mmmmmm)
He said
"We're gonna have a picnic on the penthouse roof
([Kick + clap] - boom-clap)
Just bring a little blanket
([Bag zip] - zzzip)
I've got wine for you
([Glass clink] - clink)
Gonna have a picnic on the penthouse roof"
([Reverse sweep to sparkle] - whooom ✨)

# hardcore_pop - Prayer to Thoth_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
Serbian drill, dark but bouncy, 136 BPM, heavy 808, smooth glued mix, no hard silences. Gritty adult male, light autotune, testosterone vocal. Subtle room tone & pad under whole track.

[LYRICS]
[Verse 1]
Djehouty-khenty Neheh
Maaty khenty maat
Djehouty maa maat khent maat
Imene-chehent-yenti
Per-chat-ychenti maa maat
Nehechenti ak-khaa Ba-en-maatf
Achat-em-hout-m-f-uuru-nec-maat
Haat em een Aa wias neheh Djehouty maat
Ab-Tche-tcha-nacht-Tchien-ra staar-tcha

[Verse 2]
Djehouty-khenty Neheh
Maaty khenty maat
Djehouty maa maat khent maat
Naha em saa neteru neb Sotha khef
Saha-booty maat-Tchechems uchet maat
Khat maat em Neb-ankh maa maat he-pes naafi
Khat-ettchennu maa maat Ra sa saa-fu

[Verse 3]
Maaty maat chenti maat
Khat-Tchehemu estyy em Neb pech-tcha khenty maat
Pesir kheft Sotha pechartcha chat
Nehechentya Djehou-tyu estyy em Neb-netreekh
Khat maat Neb-uchet- Nechem khenty maat
Djehou-tyu estyy em Neb-nefer khenty maat

He who begat himself
Who made his own name. the august khaty

Great of love. mysterious of manifestation

Fabulous in heart and loved for his sweetness. who does everything that one loves
When he appears it is life
None can conceive anything from behind him
He who shines in dawn that smites the enemy to the limits of the sky
Stretcher of the measuring-cord in the place he loves
Father of the gods
Beloved of maat
Protector of life
The overseer of peace within the harpoon-girt homestead
Inhabitant of el-farama
The hereditary prince of u.tjt (and) ruler of heracleopolis

The father of the fathers

# hardcore_pop - Prayer to Thoth_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
Serbian drill, dark but bouncy, 136 BPM, heavy 808, smooth glued mix, no hard silences. Gritty adult male, light autotune, testosterone vocal. Subtle room tone & pad under whole track.

[LYRICS]
[Verse]
Homage to thee Osiris
Lord of eternity
King of the gods whose names are manifold
Whose forms are holy
Thou being of hidden form in the temples
Whose Ka is holy
Thou art the governor of Tattu
And also the mighty one in Sekhem
Thou art the lord to whom praises are ascribed in the nome of Athi
Thou art the chief of the divine food in Annu
Thou art the lord who is commemorated in Maati
The hidden soul
The Lord of Qerret

[Prechorus]
The holy one in the city of Nart
The soul of Ra
His own body
Thou Ba whose forms are manifold
Thou creator of the beings of Qereret
And the company of the gods is with thee

[Chorus]
Thou art the governor of Amentet
The lord of Abydos
Thy seat extendeth into the land of holiness
Thy name is firmly established in the mouth of mankind
Thou art the substance of two lands
Thou art Tem
The man of the two lands
Thou art the beneficent spirit in the mountain of Maati
The great one in the mountain of Hesert

[Verse 2]
Thou art the lord of the great house in Khemennu
The mighty one of victories in Shas-hetep
The lord of eternity
The governor of Aabu
The beneficent one
The beloved one of the gods
The mighty one of hand in Annu
The beneficent one in Amentet
The lord of the territory of the two lands
The mighty one in Sekhem
The lord of the shrine which is in Maa
The mighty one in Shas-hetep
The beneficent one of hearts in Restau
The lord of the form of the company of the gods
The beautiful one in the house of Ka

[Chorus]
Thou art the governor of Amentet
The lord of Abydos
Thy seat extendeth into the land of holiness
Thy name is firmly established in the mouth of mankind
Thou art the substance of two lands
Thou art Tem
The man of the two lands
Thou art the beneficent spirit in the mountain of Maati
The great one in the mountain of Hesert

# hardcore_pop - Prayer to Thoth_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
Serbian drill, dark but bouncy, 136 BPM, heavy 808, smooth glued mix, no hard silences. Gritty adult male, light autotune, testosterone vocal. Subtle room tone & pad under whole track.

[LYRICS]
[Verse 1]
Djehouty-khenty Neheh
Maaty khenty maat
Djehouty maa maat khent maat
Imene-chehent-yenti
Per-chat-ychenti maa maat
Nehechenti ak-khaa Ba-en-maatf
Achat-em-hout-m-f-uuru-nec-maat
Haat em een Aa wias neheh Djehouty maat
Ab-Tche-tcha-nacht-Tchien-ra staar-tcha

[Verse 2]
Djehouty-khenty Neheh
Maaty khenty maat
Djehouty maa maat khent maat
Naha em saa neteru neb Sotha khef
Saha-booty maat-Tchechems uchet maat
Khat maat em Neb-ankh maa maat he-pes naafi
Khat-ettchennu maa maat Ra sa saa-fu

[Verse 3]
Maaty maat chenti maat
Khat-Tchehemu estyy em Neb pech-tcha khenty maat
Pesir kheft Sotha pechartcha chat
Nehechentya Djehou-tyu estyy em Neb-netreekh
Khat maat Neb-uchet- Nechem khenty maat
Djehou-tyu estyy em Neb-nefer khenty maat


[Verse]

NTr DHw-THw
DHw-ti
DHw-ti

JDm nb
Dri
DJmi nttj

He who begat himself

When he appears it is life
None can conceive anything from behind him
He who shines in dawn that smites the enemy to the limits of the sky
Stretcher of the measuring-cord in the place he loves
Father of the gods

# hardcore_pop - Prayer to Thoth_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
At 130 bpm , dynamic tech track , zurle, organ,80s midi synths, car siren,elements of goa, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Verse 1]

# hardcore_pop - Project_1 crna kosa mix
[DESCRIPTION]
at 127 bpm bouncy reggaetón  club tech Turkish zurna , cathederal organ, echo,  80s midi synthesizer,oriental pop, car honks, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Intro]
(Jesi ti Pope kadio matru???.....)
([Laughter in background] - hahaha)
([Lighter flick] - chk)

[Chorus]
Bezobrazna i opasna u svakoj pozi
([Bass hit] - BOOM)
Mala vozi me, vozi, diže me visoko loži
([Engine rev] - vrrroom)
Tsrta mi sebe po koži, podeli me pa me množi
([Marker on skin] - shrrrp)
Rastavi me pa me složi
([Glass break / rebuild FX] - krsh-whooom)

[Verse 1]
Prava noćna ptica, svi lože se na nju
([Night city hum] - mmmmmm)
Mršava i seksi, lako ulazi pod kožu
([Hi-hat tight] - tss-tss)
Zavede te i ne kapiraš, korak nogu pred nogu
([Heels on floor] - tak-tak-tak)
Nežna je i opasna, glumi babarogu
([Whispered laugh] - heh-heh)
Lako pada sve pred njom, začas poljulja ti tlo
([Sub drop] - bwooom)
Kao da je NLO sa vrha baca te na dno
([Whoosh overhead] - fiiiuw)
Moment pre nego zaspiš, kad su sitni sati
([Clock tick] - tik-tik)
Koracima nečujnim mi na postelju svrati
([Soft step] - shff-shff)

[Chorus]
Bezobrazna i opasna u svakoj pozi
([Crowd murmur] - mmmrum)
Mala vozi me, vozi, diže me visoko loži
([Sidechain pump] - wub-wub)
Crta mi sebe po koži, podeli me pa me množi
([Pen scratch] - skrt-skrt)
Rastavi me pa me složi
([Reverse sweep] - whooom)

[Verse 2]
Video sam oči te, oči pune greha
([Eye glint] - ting)
tsela si u ritmu, usne, satkana od smeha
([Giggle soft] - heh-heh)
Koža, ko da gori, zabrana ispred celog sveta
([Heat wave] - fffsh)
A ma ništa mi ne smeta
([Shoulder shrug FX] - mm-hmm)
Kada prišao sam joj blizu sve je počelo da seva
([Flash] - tsshh)
Tvoja desna noga postala je moja ruka leva
([Slide touch] - shff)
Tada tiho si mi šapnula da si mokra sva
([Whisper close] - ssst)
Da želiš me u sebi, da te palim ja
([Sub growl] - rrrrr)

Ne mogu da čekam, uzeo bi te pred svima
([Record wobble] - wooo)
Prava konkubina, nije frka da se snima
([Camera click] - klik)
Drska i fina, kao balerina
([Spin step] - swish)

[Chorus]
Bezobrazna i opasna u svakoj pozi
([Kick + clap] - boom-clap)
Mala vozi me, vozi, diže me visoko loži
([Engine swell] - vrrroom)
Crta mi sebe po koži, podeli me pa me množi
([Ink drag] - scrrr)
Rastavi me pa me složi
([Impact + reverb] - THUMP…whooom)

Bezobrazna i opasna u svakoj pozi
([Crowd “ey!”] - ey-oo)
Mala vozi me, vozi, diže me visoko loži
([Hi synth riser] - wiii-aaa)
Crta mi sebe po koži, rastavi me pa me složi
([Broken glass FX] - krsh)
(Bezobrazna i opasna u svakoj pozi)
([Echo tail] - ozi…ozi…)

---

# hardcore_pop - Project_1 crna kosa mix
[DESCRIPTION]
at 125bpm bouncy reggaetón  club tech Turkish zurne, cathederal organ, echo, oriental pop, car honks, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Chorus]
Crna kosa svilen sjaj, pleše vodite u raj
Meni sreću trebaš ti, noć mi ne sluti na kraj
Zato daj, daj, daj, bićeš moja dobro znaj
Samo daj, daj, daj, daj

[Verse 1]
Tvoje oči noć mi kradu
Tvoje usne moje znaju
Kada prođeš pored mene
Ko da s pravog puta skrenem
Još ako mi daš
Pogled preko ramena
Pa kao postane raj
Ja noći nemaju kraj

[Pre-Chorus]
Hoću s tobom da se topim
Da se topim ove noći
Hoću s tobom da se topim
Ko da zora neće doći

[Chorus]
Crna kosa svilen sjaj, pleše vodite u raj
Meni sreću trebaš ti, noć mi ne sluti na kraj
Zato daj, daj, daj, bićeš moja dobro znaj
Samo daj, daj, daj, daj

[Verse 2]
Dodir noći tvoje telo
Hoću blizu, hoću celo
Igraj sa mnom sve ti praštam
Dugo već o tebi maštam
Dodir noći vrela struja
Ti si dama, ja oluja
Tvoj me osmeh slatko mami
S tobom nestajem u tami

[Pre-Chorus]
Varnice u tvojim očima
Ja budan spavam noćima
Šta se to dešava
Kako si me zavela
Kad na tebe mislim
Sa tim danima
Zašto se pretvaraš da ništa ne znaš

[Chorus]
