([Crowd murmur] - mmmrum)
Mala vozi me, vozi, diže me visoko loži
([Sidechain pump] - wub-wub)
Crta mi sebe po koži, podeli me pa me množi
([Pen scratch] - skrt-skrt)
Rastavi me pa me složi
([Reverse sweep] - whooom)

[Verse 2]
Video sam oči te, oči pune greha
([Eye glint] - ting)
tsela si u ritmu, usne, satkana od smeha
([Giggle soft] - heh-heh)
Koža, ko da gori, zabrana ispred celog sveta
([Heat wave] - fffsh)
A ma ništa mi ne smeta
([Shoulder shrug FX] - mm-hmm)
Kada prišao sam joj blizu sve je počelo da seva
([Flash] - tsshh)
Tvoja desna noga postala je moja ruka leva
([Slide touch] - shff)
Tada tiho si mi šapnula da si mokra sva
([Whisper close] - ssst)
Da želiš me u sebi, da te palim ja
([Sub growl] - rrrrr)

Ne mogu da čekam, uzeo bi te pred svima
([Record wobble] - wooo)
Prava konkubina, nije frka da se snima
([Camera click] - klik)
Drska i fina, kao balerina
([Spin step] - swish)

[Chorus]
Bezobrazna i opasna u svakoj pozi
([Kick + clap] - boom-clap)
Mala vozi me, vozi, diže me visoko loži
([Engine swell] - vrrroom)
Crta mi sebe po koži, podeli me pa me množi
([Ink drag] - scrrr)
Rastavi me pa me složi
([Impact + reverb] - THUMP…whooom)

Bezobrazna i opasna u svakoj pozi
([Crowd “ey!”] - ey-oo)
Mala vozi me, vozi, diže me visoko loži
([Hi synth riser] - wiii-aaa)
Crta mi sebe po koži, rastavi me pa me složi
([Broken glass FX] - krsh)
(Bezobrazna i opasna u svakoj pozi)
([Echo tail] - ozi…ozi…)

---

# hardcore_pop - Project_1 crna kosa mix
[DESCRIPTION]
at 127 bpm bouncy reggaetón  club tech Turkish zurna , cathederal organ, echo,  80s midi synthesizer,oriental pop, car honks, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Intro]
(Jesi ti Pope kadio matru???.....)
([Laughter in background] - hahaha)
([Lighter flick] - chk)

[Chorus]
Bezobrazna i opasna u svakoj pozi
([Bass hit] - BOOM)
Mala vozi me, vozi, diže me visoko loži
([Engine rev] - vrrroom)
Tsrta mi sebe po koži, podeli me pa me množi
([Marker on skin] - shrrrp)
Rastavi me pa me složi
([Glass break / rebuild FX] - krsh-whooom)

[Verse 1]
Prava noćna ptica, svi lože se na nju
([Night city hum] - mmmmmm)
Mršava i seksi, lako ulazi pod kožu
([Hi-hat tight] - tss-tss)
Zavede te i ne kapiraš, korak nogu pred nogu
([Heels on floor] - tak-tak-tak)
Nežna je i opasna, glumi babarogu
([Whispered laugh] - heh-heh)
Lako pada sve pred njom, začas poljulja ti tlo
([Sub drop] - bwooom)
Kao da je NLO sa vrha baca te na dno
([Whoosh overhead] - fiiiuw)
Moment pre nego zaspiš, kad su sitni sati
([Clock tick] - tik-tik)
Koracima nečujnim mi na postelju svrati
([Soft step] - shff-shff)

[Chorus]
Bezobrazna i opasna u svakoj pozi
([Crowd murmur] - mmmrum)
Mala vozi me, vozi, diže me visoko loži
([Sidechain pump] - wub-wub)
Crta mi sebe po koži, podeli me pa me množi
([Pen scratch] - skrt-skrt)
Rastavi me pa me složi
([Reverse sweep] - whooom)

[Verse 2]
Video sam oči te, oči pune greha
([Eye glint] - ting)
tsela si u ritmu, usne, satkana od smeha
([Giggle soft] - heh-heh)
Koža, ko da gori, zabrana ispred celog sveta
([Heat wave] - fffsh)
A ma ništa mi ne smeta
([Shoulder shrug FX] - mm-hmm)
Kada prišao sam joj blizu sve je počelo da seva
([Flash] - tsshh)
Tvoja desna noga postala je moja ruka leva
([Slide touch] - shff)
Tada tiho si mi šapnula da si mokra sva
([Whisper close] - ssst)
Da želiš me u sebi, da te palim ja
([Sub growl] - rrrrr)

Ne mogu da čekam, uzeo bi te pred svima
([Record wobble] - wooo)
Prava konkubina, nije frka da se snima
([Camera click] - klik)
Drska i fina, kao balerina
([Spin step] - swish)

[Chorus]
Bezobrazna i opasna u svakoj pozi
([Kick + clap] - boom-clap)
Mala vozi me, vozi, diže me visoko loži
([Engine swell] - vrrroom)
Crta mi sebe po koži, podeli me pa me množi
([Ink drag] - scrrr)
Rastavi me pa me složi
([Impact + reverb] - THUMP…whooom)

Bezobrazna i opasna u svakoj pozi
([Crowd “ey!”] - ey-oo)
Mala vozi me, vozi, diže me visoko loži
([Hi synth riser] - wiii-aaa)
Crta mi sebe po koži, rastavi me pa me složi
([Broken glass FX] - krsh)
(Bezobrazna i opasna u svakoj pozi)
([Echo tail] - ozi…ozi…)

# hardcore_pop - Project_1 crna kosa mix
[DESCRIPTION]
at 125bpm bouncy reggaetón  club tech Turkish zurne, cathederal organ, echo, oriental pop, car honks, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Chorus]
Crna kosa svilen sjaj, pleše vodite u raj
Meni sreću trebaš ti, noć mi ne sluti na kraj
Zato daj, daj, daj, bićeš moja dobro znaj
Samo daj, daj, daj, daj

[Verse 1]
Tvoje oči noć mi kradu
Tvoje usne moje znaju
Kada prođeš pored mene
Ko da s pravog puta skrenem
Još ako mi daš
Pogled preko ramena
Pa kao postane raj
Ja noći nemaju kraj

[Pre-Chorus]
Hoću s tobom da se topim
Da se topim ove noći
Hoću s tobom da se topim
Ko da zora neće doći

[Chorus]
Crna kosa svilen sjaj, pleše vodite u raj
Meni sreću trebaš ti, noć mi ne sluti na kraj
Zato daj, daj, daj, bićeš moja dobro znaj
Samo daj, daj, daj, daj

[Verse 2]
Dodir noći tvoje telo
Hoću blizu, hoću celo
Igraj sa mnom sve ti praštam
Dugo već o tebi maštam
Dodir noći vrela struja
Ti si dama, ja oluja
Tvoj me osmeh slatko mami
S tobom nestajem u tami

[Pre-Chorus]
Varnice u tvojim očima
Ja budan spavam noćima
Šta se to dešava
Kako si me zavela
Kad na tebe mislim
Sa tim danima
Zašto se pretvaraš da ništa ne znaš

[Chorus]
Crna kosa svilen sjaj, pleše vodite u raj
Meni sreću trebaš ti, noć mi ne sluti na kraj
Zato daj, daj, daj, bićeš moja dobro znaj
Samo daj, daj, daj, daj

[Chorus]
Crna kosa svilen sjaj, pleše vodite u raj
Meni sreću trebaš ti, noć mi ne sluti na kraj
Zato daj, daj, daj, bićeš moja dobro znaj
Samo daj, daj, daj, daj

[Chorus]
Crna kosa svilen sjaj, pleše vodite u raj
Meni sreću trebaš ti, noć mi ne sluti na kraj
Zato daj, daj, daj, bićeš moja dobro znaj
Samo daj, daj, daj, daj

[Outro]
(Daj)
(Samo daj)
(Daj)
(Samo daj)
(Daj)
(Samo daj)
(Daj)
(Samo daj)
(Daj)
(Samo daj)
(Daj)
(Samo daj)
(Daj)
(Samo daj)
(Daj)
(Samo daj)
(Daj)
(Samo daj)
(Daj)
(Samo daj)
(Daj)
(Samo daj)
(Daj)
(Samo daj)
(Daj)
(Samo daj)

(Samo daj)

# hardcore_pop - Project_1 crna kosa mix
[DESCRIPTION]
at 127 bpm bouncy reggaetón  club tech Turkish zurna , cathederal organ, echo,  80s midi synthesizer,oriental pop, car honks, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Intro]
(Jesi ti Pope kadio matru???.....)
([Laughter in background] - hahaha)
([Lighter flick] - chk)

[Chorus]
Bezobrazna i opasna u svakoj pozi
([Bass hit] - BOOM)
Mala vozi me, vozi, diže me visoko loži
([Engine rev] - vrrroom)
Tsrta mi sebe po koži, podeli me pa me množi
([Marker on skin] - shrrrp)
Rastavi me pa me složi
([Glass break / rebuild FX] - krsh-whooom)

[Verse 1]
Prava noćna ptica, svi lože se na nju
([Night city hum] - mmmmmm)
Mršava i seksi, lako ulazi pod kožu
([Hi-hat tight] - tss-tss)
Zavede te i ne kapiraš, korak nogu pred nogu
([Heels on floor] - tak-tak-tak)
Nežna je i opasna, glumi babarogu
([Whispered laugh] - heh-heh)
Lako pada sve pred njom, začas poljulja ti tlo
([Sub drop] - bwooom)
Kao da je NLO sa vrha baca te na dno
([Whoosh overhead] - fiiiuw)
Moment pre nego zaspiš, kad su sitni sati
([Clock tick] - tik-tik)
Koracima nečujnim mi na postelju svrati
([Soft step] - shff-shff)

[Chorus]
Bezobrazna i opasna u svakoj pozi
([Crowd murmur] - mmmrum)
Mala vozi me, vozi, diže me visoko loži
([Sidechain pump] - wub-wub)
Crta mi sebe po koži, podeli me pa me množi
([Pen scratch] - skrt-skrt)
Rastavi me pa me složi
([Reverse sweep] - whooom)

[Verse 2]
Video sam oči te, oči pune greha
([Eye glint] - ting)
tsela si u ritmu, usne, satkana od smeha
([Giggle soft] - heh-heh)
Koža, ko da gori, zabrana ispred celog sveta
([Heat wave] - fffsh)
A ma ništa mi ne smeta
([Shoulder shrug FX] - mm-hmm)
Kada prišao sam joj blizu sve je počelo da seva
([Flash] - tsshh)
Tvoja desna noga postala je moja ruka leva
([Slide touch] - shff)
Tada tiho si mi šapnula da si mokra sva
([Whisper close] - ssst)
Da želiš me u sebi, da te palim ja
([Sub growl] - rrrrr)

Ne mogu da čekam, uzeo bi te pred svima
([Record wobble] - wooo)
Prava konkubina, nije frka da se snima
([Camera click] - klik)
Drska i fina, kao balerina
([Spin step] - swish)

[Chorus]
Bezobrazna i opasna u svakoj pozi
([Kick + clap] - boom-clap)
Mala vozi me, vozi, diže me visoko loži
([Engine swell] - vrrroom)
Crta mi sebe po koži, podeli me pa me množi
([Ink drag] - scrrr)
Rastavi me pa me složi
([Impact + reverb] - THUMP…whooom)

Bezobrazna i opasna u svakoj pozi
([Crowd “ey!”] - ey-oo)
Mala vozi me, vozi, diže me visoko loži
([Hi synth riser] - wiii-aaa)
Crta mi sebe po koži, rastavi me pa me složi
([Broken glass FX] - krsh)
(Bezobrazna i opasna u svakoj pozi)
([Echo tail] - ozi…ozi…)

# hardcore_pop - Project_1 crna kosa mix
[DESCRIPTION]
at 120-125 bpm bouncy reggaetón sultry club tech Balkan zurna , cathedral organ, echo,  80s midi synthesizer, oriental pop, car honks, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Chorus]
Crna kosa svilen sjaj, pleše vodite u raj
([Female BV] - "mmm, crna kosa")
Meni sreću trebaš ti, noć mi ne sluti na kraj
([Female BV] - "aaah, trebaš mi")
Zato daj, daj, daj, bićeš moja dobro znaj
([Female BV] - "daj, daj, daj")
Samo daj, daj, daj, daj
([Female BV] - "mmm, samo daj")

[Verse 1]
Tvoje oči noć mi kradu
([Female BV] - "mmm, te oči")
Tvoje usne moje znaju
([Female BV] - "aaah, te usne")
Kada prođeš pored mene
([Female BV] - "mmm, lagano")
Ko da s pravog puta skrenem
([Female BV] - "uh, skrenem")
Još ako mi daš
([Female BV] - "daj mi taj pogled")
Pogled preko ramena
([Female BV] - "mmm, preko ramena")
Pa kao postane raj
([Female BV] - "aaah, kao raj")
Ja noći nemaju kraj
([Female BV] - "mmm, nemaju kraj")

[Pre-Chorus]
Hoću s tobom da se topim
([Female BV] - "aaah, da se topim")
Da se topim ove noći
([Female BV] - "mmm, ove noći")
Hoću s tobom da se topim
([Female BV] - "aaah, samo s tobom")
Ko da zora neće doći
([Female BV] - "mmm, nek ne svane")

[Chorus]
Crna kosa svilen sjaj, pleše vodite u raj
([Female BV] - "mmm, vodi me")
Meni sreću trebaš ti, noć mi ne sluti na kraj
([Female BV] - "aaah, trebaš mi")
Zato daj, daj, daj, bićeš moja dobro znaj
([Female BV] - "daj, daj, daj")
Samo daj, daj, daj, daj
([Female BV] - "mmm, samo daj")

[Verse 2]
Dodir noći tvoje telo
([Female BV] - "aaah, tvoje telo")
Hoću blizu, hoću celo
([Female BV] - "mmm, sve tvoje")
Igraj sa mnom sve ti praštam
([Female BV] - "aaah, igraj sa mnom")
Dugo već o tebi maštam
([Female BV] - "mmm, dugo maštam")
Dodir noći vrela struja
([Female BV] - "aaah, vrela struja")
Ti si dama, ja oluja
([Female BV] - "mmm, ti i ja")
Tvoj me osmeh slatko mami
([Female BV] - "aaah, taj osmeh")
S tobom nestajem u tami
([Female BV] - "mmm, u tami")

[Pre-Chorus]
Varnice u tvojim očima
([Female BV] - "mmm, varnice")
Ja budan spavam noćima
([Female BV] - "aaah, noćima")
Šta se to dešava
([Female BV] - "mmm, šta mi radiš")
Kako si me zavela
([Female BV] - "aaah, zavela")
Kad na tebe mislim
Sa tim danima
([Female BV] - "mmm, mislim na tebe")
Zašto se pretvaraš da ništa ne znaš
([Female BV] - "aaah, dobro znaš")

[Chorus]
Crna kosa svilen sjaj, pleše vodite u raj
([Female BV] - "mmm, crna kosa")
Meni sreću trebaš ti, noć mi ne sluti na kraj
([Female BV] - "aaah, trebaš mi")
Zato daj, daj, daj, bićeš moja dobro znaj
([Female BV] - "daj, daj, daj")
Samo daj, daj, daj, daj
([Female BV] - "mmm, samo daj")

[Chorus]
Crna kosa svilen sjaj, pleše vodite u raj
([Female BV] - "mmm, vodi me")

# hardcore_pop - Project_1 crna kosa mix
[DESCRIPTION]
at 127 bpm bouncy reggaetón  club tech Turkish zurna , cathederal organ, echo,  80s midi synthesizer,oriental pop, car honks, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Chorus]
Crna kosa svilen sjaj, pleše vodite u raj
([Female BV] - "mmm, crna kosa")
Meni sreću trebaš ti, noć mi ne sluti na kraj
([Female BV] - "aaah, trebaš mi")
Zato daj, daj, daj, bićeš moja dobro znaj
([Female BV] - "daj, daj, daj")
Samo daj, daj, daj, daj
([Female BV] - "mmm, samo daj")

[Verse 1]
Tvoje oči noć mi kradu
([Female BV] - "mmm, te oči")
Tvoje usne moje znaju
([Female BV] - "aaah, te usne")
Kada prođeš pored mene
([Female BV] - "mmm, lagano")
Ko da s pravog puta skrenem
([Female BV] - "uh, skrenem")
Još ako mi daš
([Female BV] - "daj mi taj pogled")
Pogled preko ramena
([Female BV] - "mmm, preko ramena")
Pa kao postane raj
([Female BV] - "aaah, kao raj")
Ja noći nemaju kraj
([Female BV] - "mmm, nemaju kraj")

[Pre-Chorus]
Hoću s tobom da se topim
([Female BV] - "aaah, da se topim")
Da se topim ove noći
([Female BV] - "mmm, ove noći")
Hoću s tobom da se topim
([Female BV] - "aaah, samo s tobom")
Ko da zora neće doći
([Female BV] - "mmm, nek ne svane")

[Chorus]
Crna kosa svilen sjaj, pleše vodite u raj
([Female BV] - "mmm, vodi me")
Meni sreću trebaš ti, noć mi ne sluti na kraj
([Female BV] - "aaah, trebaš mi")
Zato daj, daj, daj, bićeš moja dobro znaj
([Female BV] - "daj, daj, daj")
Samo daj, daj, daj, daj
([Female BV] - "mmm, samo daj")

[Verse 2]
Dodir noći tvoje telo
([Female BV] - "aaah, tvoje telo")
Hoću blizu, hoću celo
([Female BV] - "mmm, sve tvoje")
Igraj sa mnom sve ti praštam
([Female BV] - "aaah, igraj sa mnom")
Dugo već o tebi maštam
([Female BV] - "mmm, dugo maštam")
Dodir noći vrela struja
([Female BV] - "aaah, vrela struja")
Ti si dama, ja oluja
([Female BV] - "mmm, ti i ja")
Tvoj me osmeh slatko mami
([Female BV] - "aaah, taj osmeh")
S tobom nestajem u tami
([Female BV] - "mmm, u tami")

[Pre-Chorus]
Varnice u tvojim očima
([Female BV] - "mmm, varnice")
Ja budan spavam noćima
([Female BV] - "aaah, noćima")
Šta se to dešava
([Female BV] - "mmm, šta mi radiš")
Kako si me zavela
([Female BV] - "aaah, zavela")
Kad na tebe mislim
Sa tim danima
([Female BV] - "mmm, mislim na tebe")
Zašto se pretvaraš da ništa ne znaš
([Female BV] - "aaah, dobro znaš")

[Chorus]
Crna kosa svilen sjaj, pleše vodite u raj
([Female BV] - "mmm, crna kosa")
Meni sreću trebaš ti, noć mi ne sluti na kraj
([Female BV] - "aaah, trebaš mi")
Zato daj, daj, daj, bićeš moja dobro znaj
([Female BV] - "daj, daj, daj")
Samo daj, daj, daj, daj
([Female BV] - "mmm, samo daj")

[Chorus]
Crna kosa svilen sjaj, pleše vodite u raj
([Female BV] - "mmm, vodi me")
Meni sreću trebaš ti, noć mi ne sluti na kraj
([Female BV] - "aaah, ne sluti na kraj")
Zato daj, daj, daj, bićeš moja dobro znaj
([Female BV] - "daj, daj, daj")
Samo daj, daj, daj, daj
([Female BV] - "mmm, daj mi sve")

[Chorus]
Crna kosa svilen sjaj, pleše vodite u raj
([Female BV] - "mmm, crna kosa")
Meni sreću trebaš ti, noć mi ne sluti na kraj
([Female BV] - "aaah, trebaš mi")

# hardcore_pop - Project_1 crna kosa mix
[DESCRIPTION]
at 115 bpm bouncy reggaetón  club tech zurna , cathedral organ, echo,  80s midi synthesizer, oriental pop, car honks, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals, church choir

[LYRICS]
[Chorus]
Crna kosa svilen sjaj, pleše vodite u raj
([Female BV] - "mmm, crna kosa")
Meni sreću trebaš ti, noć mi ne sluti na kraj
([Female BV] - "aaah, trebaš mi")

# hardcore_pop - Project_1 crna kosa mix
[DESCRIPTION]
at 127 bpm bouncy reggaetón  club tech Turkish zurna , cathederal organ, echo,  80s midi synthesizer,oriental pop, car honks, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Intro]
(This is the Hardcore Pop..)
([Laughter in background] - hahaha)
([Lighter flick] - chk)

[Chorus]
Bezobrazna i opasna u svakoj pozi
([Bass hit] - BOOM)
Mala vozi me, vozi, diže me visoko loži
([Engine rev] - vrrroom)
Tsrta mi sebe po koži, podeli me pa me množi
([Marker on skin] - shrrrp)
Rastavi me pa me složi
([Glass break / rebuild FX] - krsh-whooom)

[Verse 1]
Prava noćna ptica, svi lože se na nju
([Night city hum] - mmmmmm)
Mršava i seksi, lako ulazi pod kožu
([Hi-hat tight] - tss-tss)
Zavede te i ne kapiraš, korak nogu pred nogu
([Heels on floor] - tak-tak-tak)
Nežna je i opasna, glumi babarogu
([Whispered laugh] - heh-heh)
Lako pada sve pred njom, začas poljulja ti tlo
([Sub drop] - bwooom)
Kao da je NLO sa vrha baca te na dno
([Whoosh overhead] - fiiiuw)
Moment pre nego zaspiš, kad su sitni sati
([Clock tick] - tik-tik)
Koracima nečujnim mi na postelju svrati
([Soft step] - shff-shff)

[Chorus]
Bezobrazna i opasna u svakoj pozi
([Crowd murmur] - mmmrum)
Mala vozi me, vozi, diže me visoko loži
([Sidechain pump] - wub-wub)
Crta mi sebe po koži, podeli me pa me množi
([Pen scratch] - skrt-skrt)
Rastavi me pa me složi
([Reverse sweep] - whooom)

[Verse 2]
Video sam oči te, oči pune greha
([Eye glint] - ting)
tsela si u ritmu, usne, satkana od smeha
([Giggle soft] - heh-heh)
Koža, ko da gori, zabrana ispred celog sveta
([Heat wave] - fffsh)
A ma ništa mi ne smeta
([Shoulder shrug FX] - mm-hmm)
Kada prišao sam joj blizu sve je počelo da seva
([Flash] - tsshh)
Tvoja desna noga postala je moja ruka leva
([Slide touch] - shff)
Tada tiho si mi šapnula da si mokra sva
([Whisper close] - ssst)
Da želiš me u sebi, da te palim ja
([Sub growl] - rrrrr)

Ne mogu da čekam, uzeo bi te pred svima
([Record wobble] - wooo)
Prava konkubina, nije frka da se snima
([Camera click] - klik)
Drska i fina, kao balerina
([Spin step] - swish)

[Chorus]
Bezobrazna i opasna u svakoj pozi
([Kick + clap] - boom-clap)
Mala vozi me, vozi, diže me visoko loži
([Engine swell] - vrrroom)
Crta mi sebe po koži, podeli me pa me množi
([Ink drag] - scrrr)
Rastavi me pa me složi
([Impact + reverb] - THUMP…whooom)

Bezobrazna i opasna u svakoj pozi
([Crowd “ey!”] - ey-oo)
Mala vozi me, vozi, diže me visoko loži
([Hi synth riser] - wiii-aaa)
Crta mi sebe po koži, rastavi me pa me složi
([Broken glass FX] - krsh)
(Bezobrazna i opasna u svakoj pozi)
([Echo tail] - ozi…ozi…)

# hardcore_pop - Project_1 sintisajzer (Remastered x2)
[DESCRIPTION]
At 128 bpm pulsating club tech track, zurle, organ, 80s midi synths, car siren, hypnotic, sultry reggaeton vibes, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Male 1]
Otvori se sezame
([Heavy vault rumble] - DOOM)
Napuni nam džepove
([Coin spill] - cling-cling)
Svega više dosta je
([Exhale] - haaah)
Neću da vučem repove
([Chain drag] - shrrrk)
Da naduvan šetam se
([Slow step on asfalt] - tap…tap)
Sa torbicom po gradu ej
([Zipper slide] - vrrt)
Da rizikujem prodajem
([Cash slap] - flap)
Da bih platio dugove
([Pen on paper] - skrit-skrit)
Poznajem ove, poznajem i one
([Crowd murmur] - mmmrum)
Neki me vole a neki me se klone
([Step back] - skrr)
K'o mali skontao fazone
([Lightbulb] - ting)
Brzo shvatio kako doći do love
([Register] - kching)
.moraš da se cimaš kad ulica te zove
([Distant siren] - weee-ooo)
Ti spavaš ja Živim te snove
([Sub-bass pulse] - thumm-thumm)

[Male 2]
Bes,karting,hitno spas
([Engine rev] - vrrroom)
da ne volimo tu moć - ne voli ni ona nas
([Low growl] - rrrr)
Sad,vez,party,ziplock gas
([Ziplock flick] - fffp)
ako plavi će tu doć - neće naći nikog pas
([Radio squawk] - krrt)
A u tome momentu je
([Heartbeat rise] - thumpthump)
Meni nekako meko bejb
([Breath] - haaah)
Da sve štekove čekove nekome preko bre
([Paper shuffle] - fffsh)

* preprodam za letove
  ([Plane whoosh] - fffshhhh)
  Termin se čeka na vekove
  ([Clock tick] - tik-tik)
  Pala mi robe za testove
  ([Bag drop] - thud)
  Ako zagalamim,pa te odalamim
  ([Fist swing] - WHUP)
  Bolje vi spremite lijesove
  ([Wood creak] - krrk)
  preko bluza njena guza
  ([Fabric slide] - shff)
  ide sine gore dole
  ([Bounce] - dum-dum)
  ghetto mandam ko yakuza
  ([Blade flick] - shink)
  kada zvone motorole
  ([Phone ring] - trrr-trrr)
  belo drama,to infuza
  ([Note snif] - sssnk)
  dama davala do zore
  ([Night hum] - mmmmmm)
  banda favela teore
  ([Alley echo] - hey-hey)
  mala navela na fore
  ([Giggle] - heh)
  Bafer sajz, sinti sajzer
  ([Synth stab] - wyaa)
  noć za dan,ekvalajezer
  ([Filter sweep] - fffsh)
  pola vas puca fajzer
  ([Pop] - pft)
  vakcina pa štuca frajer
  ([Hiccup] - hkk)
  Olala,bider majer bodibilder ide krajem
  ([Heavy step] - THUD-thud)
  bodi miller mi je diler
  ([Ski whoosh] - shhh)
  bacim triler pa u cayenne
  ([Door slam] - BAM)
  Mrakom šetam bulla kera
  ([Dog chain] - klink-klink)
  ime mu je lari lari
  ([Dog bark] - woof)
  Vodka peta bulla reda
  ([Bottle clink] - clink)
  trojka seda isto Kari
  ([Chair scrape] - skrr)
  Karirani stoljnak i momak tvoj gleda-gleda
  ([Stare hit] - ding)
  gasi fon ako zove te on nema meda-nema
  ([Phone lock] - klik)

[Male 1]
Telefon mi zvoni zvoni
([Phone vibrate] - bzzzt-bzzzt)
Opet glava boli boli
([Head throb] - dum…dum)
Živim tvrdo tako volim
([Sub hit] - BOOM)
Samo Boga ja se bojim
([Church bell distant] - dong)
I ove ga noći molim
([Whispered prayer] - ssst-ssst)
Zdrav na nogama da stojim
([Foot plant] - thump)
Cilj za ciljem da osvojim
([Coin stack] - cling)
Svoju kintu ja da brojim
([Bill flick] - fffp-fffp)
I tako dan za danom
([Clock sweep] - shhhp)
Proces traje uživam
([Exhale smoke] - ffff)
Gledam klince kako žure
([Sneaker steps] - tap-tap-tap)
Mahnem svirnem turiram
([Engine rev] - vrrroom)
Kada dobru guzu vidim
([Record stop] - skrrt)
broj na keca uzimam
([Phone tap] - tik)

[Male 2]
Ovi Drip je krvi ide kapa kapa
([Drip FX] - drip…drip)
Ova rana curi ide rafal rafal
([Gun burst] - ratatat)
Dobra Trava smrdi a ti smatras da sam
([Zip bag] - fffp)
u toj igri prvi moja kuja rasna
([Chain jingle] - klink)
Pa vam na infernu napravim (šta)
([Crowd “šta?”] - sh-ta)
Sick ace
([Impact] - BAM)
Razbe pretnje dobijan na četu preko fejs,
([Keyboard] - tik-tik-tik)
X5 nas 6, motor bruji dzip dzip
([Engine low] - vrrr-vrrr)
Saint Laurent jacket,a na nama drip drip.
([Water drip on cloth] - drip-drip)
Ko bi reko mila da ces postati hot
([Sizzle] - tssss)
Bolje od otih krivina nema gori ceo sprat
([Stair echo] - tok-tok-tok)
Gola tada si mi bila i bila bi mi dok god
([Sheet rustle] - fffsh)
moje pare moje ime gledala k’o preporod
([Echo] - preporod…rod)
ide kidnap,latina butina k’o planina
([Bass slide] - bwooom)
bulju dobru ima ona mota ja je snimam
([Camera shutter] - klik)
Pa skidam da kidam ko’ gotivan kandidat
([Zipper] - vrrt)
Sva se topi pošto njoj bi pussy k’o kanibal
([Growl low] - grrr)
Bacim lick,šaci freak maci u šaci bi dick
([Tongue click] - tsk)
Kontrol frek loud si,kirk baš si sva si fantasik
([FX glitch] - krk-krk)
fantastika Nema slika nema lika nema ništa
([Shutter off] - klak)
Ona opet sama samo sama mi je prišla
([Heel approach] - tak-tak-tak)

[music stops]
([Record stop] - SKRRRT)
([Room tone] - mmm…)

[Radio call Narrator]
Time is money cunt. Understand? Get of your ass and do some woooork! You fucking skunk cunt junky dogs
([Radio static] - krrrrtsh)

([Heavy vault rumble] - DOOM)
Napuni nam džepove
([Coin spill] - cling-cling)
Svega više dosta je
([Exhale] - haaah)
Neću da vučem repove
([Chain drag] - shrrrk)
Da naduvan šetam se
([Slow step on asfalt] - tap…tap)
Sa torbicom po gradu ej
([Zipper slide] - vrrt)
Da rizikujem prodajem
([Cash slap] - flap)
Da bih platio dugove
([Pen on paper] - skrit-skrit)
Poznajem ove, poznajem i one
([Crowd murmur] - mmmrum)
Neki me vole a neki me se klone
([Step back] - skrr)
K'o mali skontao fazone
([Lightbulb] - ting)
Brzo shvatio kako doći do love
([Register] - kching)
.moraš da se cimaš kad ulica te zove
([Distant siren] - weee-ooo)
Ti spavaš ja Živim te snove
([Sub-bass pulse] - thumm-thumm)

[Male 2]
Bes,karting,hitno spas
([Engine rev] - vrrroom)
da ne volimo tu moć - ne voli ni ona nas
([Low growl] - rrrr)
Sad,vez,party,ziplock gas
([Ziplock flick] - fffp)
ako plavi će tu doć - neće naći nikog pas
([Radio squawk] - krrt)
A u tome momentu je
([Heartbeat rise] - thumpthump)
Meni nekako meko bejb
([Breath] - haaah)
Da sve štekove čekove nekome preko bre
([Paper shuffle] - fffsh)

* preprodam za letove
  ([Plane whoosh] - fffshhhh)
  Termin se čeka na vekove
  ([Clock tick] - tik-tik)
  Pala mi robe za testove
  ([Bag drop] - thud)
  Ako zagalamim,pa te odalamim
  ([Fist swing] - WHUP)
  Bolje vi spremite lijesove
  ([Wood creak] - krrk)
  preko bluza njena guza
  ([Fabric slide] - shff)
  ide sine gore dole
  ([Bounce] - dum-dum)
  ghetto mandam ko yakuza
  ([Blade flick] - shink)
  kada zvone motorole
  ([Phone ring] - trrr-trrr)
  belo drama,to infuza
  ([Note snif] - sssnk)
  dama davala do zore
  ([Night hum] - mmmmmm)
  banda favela teore
  ([Alley echo] - hey-hey)
  mala navela na fore
  ([Giggle] - heh)
  Bafer sajz, sinti sajzer
  ([Synth stab] - wyaa)
  noć za dan,ekvalajezer
  ([Filter sweep] - fffsh)
  pola vas puca fajzer
  ([Pop] - pft)
  vakcina pa štuca frajer
  ([Hiccup] - hkk)
  Olala,bider majer bodibilder ide krajem
  ([Heavy step] - THUD-thud)
  bodi miller mi je diler
  ([Ski whoosh] - shhh)
  bacim triler pa u cayenne
  ([Door slam] - BAM)
  Mrakom šetam bulla kera
  ([Dog chain] - klink-klink)
  ime mu je lari lari
  ([Dog bark] - woof)
  Vodka peta bulla reda
  ([Bottle clink] - clink)
  trojka seda isto Kari
  ([Chair scrape] - skrr)
  Karirani stoljnak i momak tvoj gleda-gleda
  ([Stare hit] - ding)
  gasi fon ako zove te on nema meda-nema
  ([Phone lock] - klik)

[Male 1]
Telefon mi zvoni zvoni
([Phone vibrate] - bzzzt-bzzzt)
Opet glava boli boli
([Head throb] - dum…dum)
Živim tvrdo tako volim
([Sub hit] - BOOM)
Samo Boga ja se bojim
([Church bell distant] - dong)
I ove ga noći molim
([Whispered prayer] - ssst-ssst)
Zdrav na nogama da stojim
([Foot plant] - thump)
Cilj za ciljem da osvojim
([Coin stack] - cling)
Svoju kintu ja da brojim
([Bill flick] - fffp-fffp)
I tako dan za danom
([Clock sweep] - shhhp)
Proces traje uživam
([Exhale smoke] - ffff)
Gledam klince kako žure
([Sneaker steps] - tap-tap-tap)
Mahnem svirnem turiram
([Engine rev] - vrrroom)
Kada dobru guzu vidim
([Record stop] - skrrt)
broj na keca uzimam
([Phone tap] - tik)

[Male 2]
Ovi Drip je krvi ide kapa kapa
([Drip FX] - drip…drip)
Ova rana curi ide rafal rafal
([Gun burst] - ratatat)
Dobra Trava smrdi a ti smatras da sam
([Zip bag] - fffp)
u toj igri prvi moja kuja rasna
([Chain jingle] - klink)
Pa vam na infernu napravim (šta)
([Crowd “šta?”] - sh-ta)
Sick ace
([Impact] - BAM)
Razbe pretnje dobijan na četu preko fejs,
([Keyboard] - tik-tik-tik)
X5 nas 6, motor bruji dzip dzip
([Engine low] - vrrr-vrrr)
Saint Laurent jacket,a na nama drip drip.
([Water drip on cloth] - drip-drip)
Ko bi reko mila da ces postati hot
([Sizzle] - tssss)
Bolje od otih krivina nema gori ceo sprat
([Stair echo] - tok-tok-tok)
Gola tada si mi bila i bila bi mi dok god
([Sheet rustle] - fffsh)
moje pare moje ime gledala k’o preporod
([Echo] - preporod…rod)
ide kidnap,latina butina k’o planina
([Bass slide] - bwooom)
bulju dobru ima ona mota ja je snimam
([Camera shutter] - klik)

([Zipper] - vrrt)

([Tongue click] - tsk)

fantastika Nema slika nema lika nema ništa
([Shutter off] - klak)

([Heel approach] - tak-tak-tak)

# hardcore_pop - Project_1 sintisajzer (Remastered)
[DESCRIPTION]
An 130-140 bpm  house track, zurna, organ, 80s synth, cowbells, ancient harp, car siren, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals, minor keys (F# m, Gm, Am), Male A2–G4, percussive, slight backbeat;

# hardcore_pop - Project_1 sintisajzer (Remastered)
[DESCRIPTION]
At 120 bpm hard german steet trap, a bit darker , track dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals, minor keys (F# m, Gm, Am),

[LYRICS]
[Male 1]
Otvori se sezame
([Heavy vault rumble] - DOOM)
Napuni nam džepove
([Coin spill] - cling-cling)
Svega više dosta je
([Exhale] - haaah)
Neću da vučem repove
([Chain drag] - shrrrk)
Da naduvan šetam se
([Slow step on asfalt] - tap…tap)
Sa torbicom po gradu ej
([Zipper slide] - vrrt)
Da rizikujem prodajem
([Cash slap] - flap)
Da bih platio dugove
([Pen on paper] - skrit-skrit)
Poznajem ove, poznajem i one
([Crowd murmur] - mmmrum)
Neki me vole a neki me se klone
([Step back] - skrr)
K'o mali skontao fazone
([Lightbulb] - ting)
Brzo shvatio kako doći do love
([Register] - kching)
.moraš da se cimaš kad ulica te zove
([Distant siren] - weee-ooo)
Ti spavaš ja Živim te snove
([Sub-bass pulse] - thumm-thumm)

[Male 2]
Bes,karting,hitno spas
([Engine rev] - vrrroom)
da ne volimo tu moć - ne voli ni ona nas
([Low growl] - rrrr)
Sad,vez,party,ziplock gas
([Ziplock flick] - fffp)
ako plavi će tu doć - neće naći nikog pas
([Radio squawk] - krrt)
A u tome momentu je
([Heartbeat rise] - thumpthump)
Meni nekako meko bejb
([Breath] - haaah)
Da sve štekove čekove nekome preko bre
([Paper shuffle] - fffsh)

* preprodam za letove
  ([Plane whoosh] - fffshhhh)
  Termin se čeka na vekove
  ([Clock tick] - tik-tik)
  Pala mi robe za testove
  ([Bag drop] - thud)
  Ako zagalamim,pa te odalamim
  ([Fist swing] - WHUP)
  Bolje vi spremite lijesove
  ([Wood creak] - krrk)
  preko bluza njena guza
  ([Fabric slide] - shff)
  ide sine gore dole
  ([Bounce] - dum-dum)
  ghetto mandam ko yakuza
  ([Blade flick] - shink)
  kada zvone motorole
  ([Phone ring] - trrr-trrr)
  belo drama,to infuza
  ([Note snif] - sssnk)
  dama davala do zore
  ([Night hum] - mmmmmm)
  banda favela teore
  ([Alley echo] - hey-hey)
  mala navela na fore
  ([Giggle] - heh)
  Bafer sajz, sinti sajzer
  ([Synth stab] - wyaa)
  noć za dan,ekvalajezer
  ([Filter sweep] - fffsh)
  pola vas puca fajzer
  ([Pop] - pft)
  vakcina pa štuca frajer
  ([Hiccup] - hkk)
  Olala,bider majer bodibilder ide krajem
  ([Heavy step] - THUD-thud)
  bodi miller mi je diler
  ([Ski whoosh] - shhh)
  bacim triler pa u cayenne
  ([Door slam] - BAM)
  Mrakom šetam bulla kera
  ([Dog chain] - klink-klink)
  ime mu je lari lari
  ([Dog bark] - woof)
  Vodka peta bulla reda
  ([Bottle clink] - clink)
  trojka seda isto Kari
  ([Chair scrape] - skrr)
  Karirani stoljnak i momak tvoj gleda-gleda
  ([Stare hit] - ding)
  gasi fon ako zove te on nema meda-nema
  ([Phone lock] - klik)

[Male 1]
Telefon mi zvoni zvoni
([Phone vibrate] - bzzzt-bzzzt)
Opet glava boli boli
([Head throb] - dum…dum)
Živim tvrdo tako volim
([Sub hit] - BOOM)
Samo Boga ja se bojim
([Church bell distant] - dong)
I ove ga noći molim
([Whispered prayer] - ssst-ssst)
Zdrav na nogama da stojim
([Foot plant] - thump)
Cilj za ciljem da osvojim
([Coin stack] - cling)
Svoju kintu ja da brojim
([Bill flick] - fffp-fffp)
I tako dan za danom
([Clock sweep] - shhhp)
Proces traje uživam
([Exhale smoke] - ffff)
Gledam klince kako žure
([Sneaker steps] - tap-tap-tap)
Mahnem svirnem turiram
([Engine rev] - vrrroom)
Kada dobru guzu vidim
([Record stop] - skrrt)
broj na keca uzimam
([Phone tap] - tik)

[Male 2]
Ovi Drip je krvi ide kapa kapa
([Drip FX] - drip…drip)
Ova rana curi ide rafal rafal
([Gun burst] - ratatat)
Dobra Trava smrdi a ti smatras da sam
([Zip bag] - fffp)
u toj igri prvi moja kuja rasna
([Chain jingle] - klink)
Pa vam na infernu napravim (šta)
([Crowd “šta?”] - sh-ta)
Sick ace
([Impact] - BAM)
Razbe pretnje dobijan na četu preko fejs,
([Keyboard] - tik-tik-tik)
X5 nas 6, motor bruji dzip dzip
([Engine low] - vrrr-vrrr)
Saint Laurent jacket,a na nama drip drip.
([Water drip on cloth] - drip-drip)
Ko bi reko mila da ces postati hot
([Sizzle] - tssss)
Bolje od otih krivina nema gori ceo sprat
([Stair echo] - tok-tok-tok)
Gola tada si mi bila i bila bi mi dok god
([Sheet rustle] - fffsh)
moje pare moje ime gledala k’o preporod
([Echo] - preporod…rod)
ide kidnap,latina butina k’o planina
([Bass slide] - bwooom)
bulju dobru ima ona mota ja je snimam
([Camera shutter] - klik)
Pa skidam da kidam ko’ gotivan kandidat
([Zipper] - vrrt)
Sva se topi pošto njoj bi pussy k’o kanibal
([Growl low] - grrr)
Bacim lick,šaci freak maci u šaci bi dick
([Tongue click] - tsk)
Kontrol frek loud si,kirk baš si sva si fantasik
([FX glitch] - krk-krk)
fantastika Nema slika nema lika nema ništa
([Shutter off] - klak)
Ona opet sama samo sama mi je prišla
([Heel approach] - tak-tak-tak)

[music stops]
([Record stop] - SKRRRT)
([Room tone] - mmm…)

[Radio call Narrator]

([Radio static] - krrrrtsh)

# hardcore_pop - Project_1 sintisajzer (Remastered)
[DESCRIPTION]
At 139 bpm pulsating club tech track, zurle, organ, 80s midi synths, car siren, hypnotic, sultry reggaeton vibes, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Male 1]
Otvori se sezame
([Heavy vault rumble] - DOOM)
Napuni nam džepove
([Coin spill] - cling-cling)
Svega više dosta je
([Exhale] - haaah)
Neću da vučem repove
([Chain drag] - shrrrk)
Da naduvan šetam se
([Slow step on asfalt] - tap…tap)
Sa torbicom po gradu ej
([Zipper slide] - vrrt)
Da rizikujem prodajem
([Cash slap] - flap)
Da bih platio dugove
([Pen on paper] - skrit-skrit)
Poznajem ove, poznajem i one
([Crowd murmur] - mmmrum)
Neki me vole a neki me se klone
([Step back] - skrr)
K'o mali skontao fazone
([Lightbulb] - ting)
Brzo shvatio kako doći do love
([Register] - kching)
.moraš da se cimaš kad ulica te zove
([Distant siren] - weee-ooo)
Ti spavaš ja Živim te snove
([Sub-bass pulse] - thumm-thumm)

[Male 2]
Bes,karting,hitno spas
([Engine rev] - vrrroom)
da ne volimo tu moć - ne voli ni ona nas
([Low growl] - rrrr)
Sad,vez,party,ziplock gas
([Ziplock flick] - fffp)
ako plavi će tu doć - neće naći nikog pas
([Radio squawk] - krrt)
A u tome momentu je
([Heartbeat rise] - thumpthump)
Meni nekako meko bejb
([Breath] - haaah)
Da sve štekove čekove nekome preko bre
([Paper shuffle] - fffsh)

* preprodam za letove

  Termin se čeka na vekove
  ([Clock tick] - tik-tik)

  bodi miller mi je diler
  ([Ski whoosh] - shhh)
  bacim triler pa u cayenne
  ([Door slam] - BAM)

# hardcore_pop - Project_1 sintisajzer (Remastered)
[DESCRIPTION]
At  120 bpm hard danchall, track dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals, minor keys (F# m, Gm, Am), Male A2–G4, percussive, slight backbeat;

[LYRICS]
[Male 1]
Otvori se sezame
([Heavy vault rumble] - DOOM)
Napuni nam džepove
([Coin spill] - cling-cling)
Svega više dosta je
([Exhale] - haaah)

Cilj za ciljem da osvojim
([Coin stack] - cling)
Svoju kintu ja da brojim
([Bill flick] - fffp-fffp)
I tako dan za danom
([Clock sweep] - shhhp)
Proces traje uživam
([Exhale smoke] - ffff)
Gledam klince kako žure
([Sneaker steps] - tap-tap-tap)
Mahnem svirnem turiram
([Engine rev] - vrrroom)
Kada dobru guzu vidim
([Record stop] - skrrt)
broj na keca uzimam
([Phone tap] - tik)

[Male 2]
Ovi Drip je krvi ide kapa kapa
([Drip FX] - drip…drip)
Ova rana curi ide rafal rafal
([Gun burst] - ratatat)
Dobra Trava smrdi a ti smatras da sam
([Zip bag] - fffp)
u toj igri prvi moja kuja rasna
([Chain jingle] - klink)
Pa vam na infernu napravim (šta)
([Crowd “šta?”] - sh-ta)

([Impact] - BAM)

([Keyboard] - tik-tik-tik)
X5 nas 6, motor bruji dzip dzip
([Engine low] - vrrr-vrrr)

([Sizzle] - tssss)

# hardcore_pop - Project_1 sintisajzer (Remastered)
[DESCRIPTION]
Serbian Drill Banger (130-140 BPM)
Fast-paced variant emphasizing drill elements, Features aggressive 808 slides, rapid-fire hi-hats, and distorted bass, melodies are fragmented and used sparingly as hooks, Vocals are heavily processed with aggressive flows and crew chants creating high energy

[LYRICS]
[Male 1]
Otvori se sezame
([Heavy vault rumble] - DOOM)
Napuni nam džepove
([Coin spill] - cling-cling)
Svega više dosta je
([Exhale] - haaah)
Neću da vučem repove
([Chain drag] - shrrrk)
Da naduvan šetam se
([Slow step on asfalt] - tap…tap)
Sa torbicom po gradu ej
([Zipper slide] - vrrt)

([Register] - kching)

([Distant siren] - weee-ooo)

([Sub-bass pulse] - thumm-thumm)

[Male 2]

([Engine rev] - vrrroom)

([Low growl] - rrrr)

([Ziplock flick] - fffp)

([Radio squawk] - krrt)

([Heartbeat rise] - thumpthump)

# hardcore_pop - Project_1 sintisajzer V2 (Cover)_Origigi
[DESCRIPTION]
The track is a hip-hop song with a dark, aggressive tone. It features a male vocalist rapping in Serbian. The instrumentation includes a prominent synth bass line, a driving drum beat with a strong kick and snare, and atmospheric synth pads. There are also occasional synth arpeggios and melodic synth lines that add to the dark atmosphere. The tempo is moderate, and the key appears to be minor, contributing to the overall somber mood. The production is clean with a focus on the low-end frequencies, giving the track a heavy, impactful feel. The vocals are delivered with a confident and somewhat menacing tone, often using a double-tracked effect for added presence. There are also spoken word elements and ad-libs throughout the track. The song structure follows a typical verse-chorus format, with instrumental breaks and vocal interjections.

[LYRICS]
[Male 1]
Otvori se sezame 
Napuni nam džepove
Svega više dosta je 
Neću da vučem repove
Da naduvan šetam se 
Sa torbicom po gradu ej
Da rizikujem prodajem
Da bih platio dugove
Poznajem ove, poznajem i one
Neki me vole a neki me se klone
K'o mali skontao fazone
Brzo shvatio kako doći do love
.moraš da se cimaš kad ulica te zove

# hardcore_pop - Project_1 sintisajzer V2 (Cover)_Origigi
[DESCRIPTION]
The track is a hip-hop song with a dark, aggressive tone. It features a male vocalist rapping in Serbian. The instrumentation includes a prominent synth bass line, a driving drum beat with a strong kick and snare, and atmospheric synth pads. There are also occasional synth arpeggios and melodic synth lines that add to the dark atmosphere. The tempo is moderate, and the key appears to be minor, contributing to the overall somber mood. The production is clean with a focus on the low-end frequencies, giving the track a heavy, impactful feel. The vocals are delivered with a confident and somewhat menacing tone, often using a double-tracked effect for added presence. There are also spoken word elements and ad-libs throughout the track. The song structure follows a typical verse-chorus format, with instrumental breaks and vocal interjections.

[LYRICS]
[Male 1]

Napuni nam džepove

Da naduvan šetam se

# hardcore_pop - Project_1 sintisajzer V2 (Cover)_Origigi_2
[DESCRIPTION]
The instrumental is a modern reggae/dancehall anthem built like a stadium chant. The groove sits in a mid-tempo pocket: a four-beat pulse with a punchy kick, snappy snare and layered claps that feel like a crowd in unison. Shakers and light percussion keep the rhythm moving. A thick, warm bassline is the backbone: simple but melodic, playing syncopated phrases that lock with the kick and push the track forward. Off-beat guitar or keyboard skanks hit on the upbeats, adding the classic reggae sway while soft organs or pads fill the midrange so the beat never sounds empty. Short horn or synth stabs and small riffs drop between vocal lines, acting as a second hook and widening the stereo field with delay and reverb. The arrangement shifts between stripped-back drums-and-bass passages and fuller sections with extra percussion and harmonies, so the instrumental feels like a constant build toward a big, celebratory moment.

[LYRICS]
[Male 1]
Otvori se sezame
([Heavy vault rumble] - DOOM)
Napuni nam džepove
([Coin spill] - cling-cling)
Svega više dosta je
([Exhale] - haaah)
Neću da vučem repove
([Chain drag] - shrrrk)
Da naduvan šetam se
([Slow sneaker step] - tap…tap)
Sa torbicom po gradu ej
([Zipper slide] - vrrt)
Da rizikujem prodajem
([Cash slap] - flap)
Da bih platio dugove
([Pen on paper] - skrit-skrit)
Poznajem ove, poznajem i one
([Crowd murmur] - mmmrum)
Neki me vole a neki me se klone
([Step back] - skrr)
K'o mali skontao fazone
([Lightbulb ping] - ting)

([Register] - kching)
.moraš da se cimaš kad ulica te zove
([Distant siren] - weee-ooo)

([Sub-bass pulse] - thumm-thumm)

# hardcore_pop - Project_1 sintisajzer V2 (Cover)_Origigi_2
[DESCRIPTION]
The instrumental is a modern reggae/dancehall anthem built like a stadium chant. The groove sits in a mid-tempo pocket: a four-beat pulse with a punchy kick, snappy snare and layered claps that feel like a crowd in unison. Shakers and light percussion keep the rhythm moving. A thick, warm bassline is the backbone: simple but melodic, playing syncopated phrases that lock with the kick and push the track forward. Off-beat guitar or keyboard skanks hit on the upbeats, adding the classic reggae sway while soft organs or pads fill the midrange so the beat never sounds empty. Short horn or synth stabs and small riffs drop between vocal lines, acting as a second hook and widening the stereo field with delay and reverb. The arrangement shifts between stripped-back drums-and-bass passages and fuller sections with extra percussion and harmonies, so the instrumental feels like a constant build toward a big, celebratory moment.

# hardcore_pop - Project_1 sintisajzer V2 (Cover)_Origigi_2
[DESCRIPTION]
The track is a hip-hop song with a dark, aggressive tone. It features a male vocalist rapping in Serbian. The instrumentation includes a prominent synth bass line, a driving drum beat with a strong kick and snare, and atmospheric synth pads. There are also occasional synth arpeggios and melodic synth lines that add to the dark atmosphere. The tempo is moderate, and the key appears to be minor, contributing to the overall somber mood. The production is clean with a focus on the low-end frequencies, giving the track a heavy, impactful feel. The vocals are delivered with a confident and somewhat menacing tone, often using a double-tracked effect for added presence. There are also spoken word elements and ad-libs throughout the track. The song structure follows a typical verse-chorus format, with instrumental breaks and vocal interjections.

# hardcore_pop - Psalmi iz Biblije_Techilim_Tech_1
[DESCRIPTION]
A high-energy Serbian drill banger at 135 BPM with aggressive, sliding 808s and relentless, stuttering hi-hats anchoring the rhythm. Clipped, distorted bass and hard-edged, punchy percussion drive the track. Sparse, fragmented hooks accent sharp melodies, while intensely processed, rapid crew vocals trade off for a menacing, brutal texture.

Hodite, zapevajmo Gospodu, uskliknimo Bogu, gradu spa-se-nja svo-je-ga! Izađimo pred lice njegovo s hvalom, u pesmama uskliknimo mu!
(Pevajte Gospodu!)

Gospode, kako je mnogo neprijatelja mojih! Mnogi ustaju na me. Mnogi govore za dušu moju: Nema mu pomoći od Boga. Ali ti si, Gospode, štit koji me zaklanja, slava moja; ti podižeš glavu moju.
(Štit koji me zaklanja.)

Put je Božji vjeran, riječ Gospodnja čista. On je štit svjema koji se u nj uzdaju.
(Riječ Gospodnja čista.)

Smiluj se na me, Gospode, jer čovjek hoće da me proguta, neprijatelj me svaki dan pritišnjuje. Kad me je strah, jer se u tebe uzdam. Bogom se hvalim za riječ njegovu; u Boga se uzdam, ne bojim se; šta će mi učiniti tijelo? 
(U Boga se uzdam.)
(Pojte caru našemu)
(U Boga se uzdam.)

---

# hardcore_pop - Pure Gold _Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
This tech-bass house anthem fuses 80s MIDI synth nostalgia—warm pads, DX bells, analog keys—with a modern, punchy, sidechained bassline and swung EDM percussion. Ancient instruments like the zurna and low drums, treated with delay, bit-crushing, and sync-slicing, add hypnotic, ritualistic layers. Breaks emphasize airy nostalgia using chorused synths and reversed zurna, before slamming into club-driven, energetic drops. Every ancient-world sound is processed as a synth, merging cultures into an innovative, emotional EDM experience.

[LYRICS]
[GlobalMix–80s/Ancient Hybrid Tech Bass ~126 BPM. Kick tight/punchy 60–85 Hz. Bass: rubbery FM-style tech bass, glide + LFO wobble, sidechain 6–8 dB. Drums: tapan-inspired low thumps, darbuka ticks, swung hats. Synths: 80s MIDI bells, organ stabs, chorus pads, analog keys. Ancient elements: distorted zurna lead, granular ocarina, reversed ritual drums. Vox: clean/soft in verses; chopped, stretched in drops. FX: reverse zurna, retro whooshes, snare ramps, pitch-downs. Master: -6.5 LUFS, wide stereo.]

[Structure–DJIntro(16 bars)->GrooveLoopA->VerseDrop(minimal)->Build1->Drop1->Break->GrooveLoopB->Drop2->Outro.]

⭐ DJ INTRO — Vocal Loop Hook

Primary chopped hook (from rewritten lyrics):

([VoxChop1/8] – “call… call me through…”)
([VoxStutter] – “run to you… run to you…”)
([BassFilterLPF] – FM wobble lowpassed])
([TickPerc] – darbuka ticks + retro click])
([ZurnaSwellFilter] – airy, distorted sweep])

⭐ GROOVE LOOP A — 80s/Ancient Tech Bass Pattern

Repeating fragment:

“Meet me where the sky turns blue… turns blue…”
 ([VoxLoop08] – warm, chorused, chopped])

“Call me through… call me through…”
 ([VoxDelayShort] – 80s slapback])

Bass opens gradually:
 ([BassFilterOpen] – FM wobble increasing brightness])

Add:
 ([OrganStabLow])
 ([SynthBell80s] – arp accent])
 ([DarbukaGhost16] – subtle fills])

⭐ VERSE — Clean, Mystical, Dreamy

(Your newly written lyrics)

I wake when the night wind
Calls your name
([VoxCloseDry])

Hear echoes of ages
Saying I'm the same
([PadChorus80s])

You move like a memory
Across the dunes
([OrganSoftLow])

And every step pulls me
Closer to you
([BassHintLPF])

I learned from the old ones
How to breathe
([ReverseZurnaTexture])

And learned from the new world
How to leave
([PadWarmAnalog])

Meet me where the sky turns
Ancient blue
([HatTiny + SynthBell])

Call my heart
And I’ll run to you
([MiniRise80s])

⭐ BUILD 1 — Rising 80s/Ancient Tension

([SnareRoll] – 1/4 → 1/8 → 1/16, with retro verb])
([VoxChopRise] – “run… run… RUN…”)
([NoiseUp] – 80s-style whoosh])
([BassHPF] – pumping resonance])
([ZurnaSweepUp] – distorted, filtered])

Break bar whisper:

([VoxWhisper] – “Call me through…”])

⭐ DROP 1 — MAIN HYBRID TECH BASS DROP

([BassFull] – FM rubbery wobble + glide])
([ClapWide])
([OpenHat])
([TapanThump] – subtle, syncopated])
([OrganStabTransient])

([VoxChopHook] – “run to you… run to you… blue… blue…”])
([ZurnaLead] – filtered melodic stab])

Your rewritten hook becomes a rhythmic stab:
“Ancient blue is calling you”
→ ([VoxStab1/4] – “calling… calling… call-ing…”])

⭐ BREAK — Ancient Echoes Section

Lines to speak:

“Across the dunes… through ancient rooms…”
 ([VoxSpokenLow] – dry, center])

“Your voice cuts through the night…”
 ([FXVerbShort])

([StabSynth80s])
([VoxPitchDown] – “call… call…” as bass fill])
([OcarinaReverse] – mystical texture])

⭐ GROOVE LOOP B — New Vocal Chop Pattern

([VoxChopHi] – “great blue… ancient blue…”)
([VoxChopLow] – “call me… call me…”])

Bass becomes more syncopated:
([BassSyncPulse] – FM wubs with glide])

Add:
([ZurnaFilterChop])
([OrganStabsLouder])

⭐ DROP 2 — EXTENDED PEAK DROP

([BassGrowl] – more distortion, hollow FM tone])
([HatRide80s])
([VoxLayered] – “run to you… run to you…” looped])

Hook powering this drop:
“Ancient blue is calling you”
→ ([StabSync] – cut, syncopated stabs])

([ReverbThrow] – last “you…” into void])

Add:
([ZurnaLeadFull] – main riff returned, wider])
([TapanRollFast] – short burst before final hit])

⭐ OUTRO — DJ FRIENDLY

([Kick+BassOnly])
([FilterLP] – everything slowly closing])
([VoxChopFade] – “blue… blue… blue…” fading])
([ZurnaLowFilter] – ancient hum to silence])

# hardcore_pop - Pure Gold _Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
This G-funk / bass-house hybrid opens with a rubbery low-rider bassline and swung percussion—funk guitar plucks, rimshots, snappy claps, thick sub bass. Glossy talkbox synth leads and whistle accents ride atop. Chopped vocal loops pulse with the rhythm. Verses keep clean, upfront saturation, while drops unleash wobbly G-funk bass riffs, syncopated drum patterns, tight house compression, and vintage funk keys. The overall groove is playful, bold, and bass-heavy, engineered for maximum impact on club and festival systems.

[LYRICS]
[GlobalMix–G-Funk Bass House ~124–128 BPM. Kick: rounded punch 60–85 Hz, short tail. Bass: G-funk-inspired rubbery glide, talkbox formants, LFO wobble, sidechain 6–8 dB. Drums: swung 1/8 hats, rimshot snares, funk claps, shaker rolls. Perc: west-coast whistle accents, funk-guitar plucks, vinyl noise. Synths: talkbox leads, sine-chord stabs, glassy pads. Vox: clean and close in verses; chopped, pitched, widened in drops. FX: turntable stops, reverse breaths, whooshes, sub sweeps. Master: -6.5 to -7 LUFS, wide stereo funk presence.]

⭐ DJ INTRO — Funky Chop Hook (16 bars)

([VoxChop1/8] – “show the world… world… world…”)
([BassFilterLPF] – rubbery wobble tease])
([RimshotPerc] – swung 1/8])
([WhistleAccentLo])
([TalkboxTease] – filtered downstroke])

⭐ GROOVE LOOP A — G-Funk Bounce

([VoxLoop] – “you’ll see… you’ll see…"])
([BassOpen] – filter opening slowly])
([FunkGuitarStabs])
([HatSwing] – push-and-pull bounce])
([VoxDelayShort] – “gold…” accents])

⭐ VERSE 1 — Clean, Confident, Story-Forward

My parents told me
"Never get too clever
Keep your brain cells clean as possible forever"
 ([VoxCloseDry] + vinyl noise low)

They said
"Just focus on whatever you do
But there's no way to focus
Knowing I'm in love with you"
 ([PadSoft])

I told them
"Someday I'll be famous
You'll see"
 ([TalkboxHarmonyQuiet])

They told me
"It ain't gonna happen
Kid
Just be happy"
 ([RimshotSoft])

Then I showed them I was worthy of gold
 ([BassPulseRise])

That's when they finally shut their mouths and listened to me
 ([ReverseFX] → [DropTease])

⭐ BUILD 1 — Funk Pressure Lift

([SnareRollSwing] – swung 1/8 → 1/16])
([TalkboxRise])
([BassHPF])
([VoxChopRise] – “show the world… show the world… SHOW THE—”)

Break Bar
([VoxDryMono] – “LISTEN TO ME…”])

⭐ DROP 1 — G-FUNK BASS-HOUSE RIOT

([BassFullGfunk] – rubbery glide + wobble])
([ClapWideFunk])
([HatOpenSwing])
([GuitarPluckStabs])
([WhistleLeadShort])

Viral Hook:
([VoxChopHook] – “what I could do… what I could do… DO—DO—DO”])
([PitchDownLayer] – “gold…”])
([GateSync] – rhythmic gating])

⭐ CHORUS — Riding the Drop Groove

All I ever wanted was to show the world what I could do
 ([VoxFrontWide])

All I ever wanted was to prove them wrong and make it true
 ([SlapDelayShort])

All I ever wanted was to make a name for me and you
 ([FunkGuitarStab])

All I ever wanted was to show the world what I could do
 ([BassStabResponse])

⭐ BREAK — Funky Atmosphere + Vinyl Space

([BassLPF])
([PadAirWide])
([TalkboxEcho] – “you’ll see…”])
([HatDropOut])
([VoxReverseChop] – “gold… gold… gold…”])

⭐ VERSE 2 — Confident Comeback Energy

They used to say
"You'll never be worth a dime
The best you're gonna get is workin' overtime"
 ([VoxCloseDry])

Then I showed them I was worth so much more
 ([FunkGuitarSlide])

That's when they finally shut their mouths and listened to me
 ([BassPulseMid])

I told them
"Someday I'll be famous
You'll see"
 ([TalkboxHarmonyThin])

They told me
"It ain't gonna happen
Kid
Just be happy"
 ([RimshotSoft])

Then I showed them I was worthy of gold
 ([BassRisePitch])

That's when they finally shut their mouths and listened to me
 ([BuildPerc1/4])

⭐ DROP 2 — Funk x Bass Hybrid Peak

([BassGrowlBrightFunk])
([ClapThicker])
([HatOpenHigherSwing])
([WhistleLeadAdd])
([GuitarSnapStabs])

([VoxMegaChop] – “show the world… prove them wrong… gold… YOU’LL SEE…”])
([BassStabAnswer])

([ReverbThrow] – “gold” lifting into space])

⭐ VERSE 3 — Future Fame Monologue

I'm gonna be so famous
You'll see
 ([VoxFront + TalkboxUnder])

The whole wide world will know my name and sing along with me
 ([PadWide])

And they'll be wishin' they had listened to me
 ([FunkGuitar])

They'll be knockin' down my door and beggin' on their knees
 ([PercBounce])

And they'll be cryin' when I tell them I'm taken
 ([BassPulseLow])

They'll be sorry that they ever told me I wouldn't make it
 ([ReverseFX])

But now I know I'm worth more than gold
 ([TalkboxChord])

And now that they know it
Too
I'm tellin' everyone I see
 ([MiniBuild])

⭐ FINAL DROP — G-FUNK MAXIMUM SWAGGER

([BassFullGfunkGrind])
([WhistleLeadFull])
([ClapHuge])
([HatFrenzySwing])

([VoxChopFinal] – “SHOW THE WORLD—SHOW THE WORLD—DO—DO—DO—”)
([PitchUpFill] – hype fill])
([TurntableStopFX → BassReentry])

⭐ OUTRO — Classic G-Funk Fade

([Kick+BassOnly])
([GuitarPluckFade])
([VinylNoiseDown])
([VoxChopFade] – “you’ll see… you’ll see…”])

# hardcore_pop - Real_Love_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
An 140 bpm uk organ bassline charva hypnotic underground house track , zurna, organ,80s synth, cowbells, ancient harp, car siren, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals, powerful beat

[Female]

([Breath inhale close] - haaah)

([Finger snap] - snap)
I want to be your real
([Organ stab short] - org-stab)

([Zurle motif stab] - ZUR-le)

# hardcore_pop - Resist_yet_Advance_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
An 134 bpm dynamic tech house track , car siren, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Verse]
Wait
([Breath inhale close] - haaah)
I can move like that
([Footstep soft / groove] - tapptap)
I can do like that
([Vinyl pop / click] - pft)
I can groove like that
([Sub-bass rumble] - rrrrrr)
I can prove like that
([Kick hit / boom] - boom)

[Verse]
So move it right back
([Reverse sweep] - whooom)
Do it like that
([Snare tick] - tchk)
Do it like that
([Finger snap] - snap)
Do it like that
([Vinyl crackle / static] - pftcrackle)

[Female]
Wait...
([Whispered echo] - ssst)
I can shift gear like that
([Engine rev short] - vrrrroom)
I can lift in fact
([Cloth rustle / lift] - ffffsh)
I can twist, intact
([Metal scrape subtle] - shrrrk)
I can resist, yet make impact
([Glass clink / impact] - clink)

[Verse]
So step to the sound
([Crowd murmur low] - mmmmmmrum)
Turn the beat around
([Kick roll] - boom-boom)
Find what's profound
([Echo tail] - whoooh)
As your feet touch the ground
([Footstep stereo] - tap-tap)

[Verse]
Wait
([Breath inhale rhythmic] - haaah-haaah)
I can sway to the track
([Sidechain whoosh] - shhaaa)
I can play it back
([Vinyl scratch] - chk-chk)
I can dance till I crack
([Tire hop / gravel throw] - chikchik)
I can advance - it's a bass attack
([Bass wobble / wubwub] - wubwub)

[Verse]
So catch the vibe in time
([Sub pulse / thumm] - thumm)
Let the rhythm climb
([Riser sweep] - shhaaaa)
Feel the pulse align
([Heartbeat sync] - thumpthump)
As your heart beats in rhyme
([Breath exhale long] - haaah)

[Male]
So move it right back
([Reverse crash] - whoooosh)
Do it like that
([Vinyl pop] - pft)
Do it so fine
([Finger snap] - snap)
In your own design
([Soft reverb hit] - whooom)

[Female]
Wait...
([Whispered harmony] - ooo)

I can shift my stance
([Footstep soft / left-right] - tap-tap)
I can lift to enhance
([Cloth rustle] - ffffsh)
I can twist with chance
([Snare tick roll] - tchk-tchk)
I can resist, yet still advance
([Sub-bass flourish] - rrrrrr)

# hardcore_pop - Revenant_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
A high-energy EDM/slap-house banger built around a tight 124–128 BPM groove with a punchy, modern club kick and a signature slap-house saw-bass pumping aggressively through heavy sidechain. Bright plucks and filtered stabs carry the melodic hook, widening into massive supersaws during each chorus drop. Verses stay minimal with close, clean vocals, subtle delays, and filtered atmospheres that create tension before explosive bass drops. Hats run sharp 1/8 pulses with 1/16 accents driving momentum, while white-noise risers and snare-roll builds launch each chorus. The vocals sit crisp and forward, lightly tuned with wide doubles on key phrases, giving the track a polished dance-pop feel. The overall mood is emotional but euphoric, mixing lyrical nostalgia with high-octane club energy designed for festival stages, peak-time DJ sets, and intense dance-floor moments.

[LYRICS]
[GlobalMix–EDM/slap-house/club-banger ~124–128 BPM.Super-tight punchy kick(55–80 Hz),thick transient,short tail.Bass:signature slap-house saw+FM hybrid,distorted slightly,sidechained 6–8 dB to kick,groovy syncopation.Sub mono <120 Hz.Snares/claps crisp,body 180–250 Hz,snap 5–7 kHz.Hats bright 1/8 pulse,1/16 bursts on transitions;HPF>350 Hz.Perc:airy shakers,wide claps,metallic EDM fills.Synths:bright stabs,aggressive saw leads,wide supersaws,filtered plucks.Pads:light atmospheric risers only.Vocals:clean modern pop–EDM male,fresh airy tone,bright top end,presence 4–7 kHz.Autotune light,EDM-tight timing.Doubles wide on chorus.Ad-libs energetic,stereo movement.Reverb short on verses,long on chorus throws.Delays synced 1/4 and dotted-8th.Master:-6.5 to -6 LUFS,club-loud,brickwall -0.9 dB,wide stereo mids.]

[Structure–Intro(8 bars filtered kick+pluck riff)->Verse1(minimal drums)->Verse2(build + riser)->Chorus(drop with full slap bass)->Verse3(groove re-entry)->Chorus2(stronger drop)->Verse4(short build)->FinalChorus(max energy)->Outro(fade + filter).]

[Verse 1]

Now here you come
([ReverseReverb]-EDM swell into beat)
Like I remember
([VoxAir]-bright close-mic tone)
Yeah
([SubTight]-small pre-drop thump)
Some things change
([PluckBright]-EDM pluck riff L/R)
But you still temper
([VoxDoubleLight]-wide stereo sparkle)
Like we never had that forever
([Delay1/4]-clean dotted tail)
They had you down in the dirt
([FXDustEDM]-granular noise sweep)
Right?
([AdlibTight]-short panned “right”)
They had you long gone and lost
([FXReverse]-quick back-suck riser)
Right?
([AdlibWide]-stereo whisper)
But like that—you're back—it's like old times
([BuildRiser]-4-beat rising sweep into Verse 2)

[Verse 2]

And when you're back
([ReverseTail]-EDM reverse sweep)
You're not yourself
([VoxBright]-slightly tuned)
Right?
([AdlibEcho]-tiny slap)
You're just a ghost
([HarmonyHigh]-airy octave pad)
But I don't mind
([DelayDotted]-soft rhythmic echo)
The best things die to come back to life
([PluckLayer]-extra layer for lift)
You're something strange in the daylight
([SynthGlow]-warm stabs under line)
Your blood runs cold when the sun shines
([FXShimmer]-EDM sparkle FX)
But like that—you're back—it's like old times
([PreDropBuild]-snare roll + white noise)

[Chorus – DROP]

Your hair like silk
([VoxWide]-EDM stereo double)
Your skin like milk
([HarmonyAir]-super-high pad harmony)
And I can't tell you all that I want to
([SupersawLift]-chorus saws rise)
And I don't want to if you don't want to
([DROP]-slap-house bass hits,full drums)

[Verse 3 – Groove Re-entry]

You had me low
([BassStab]-short slap bass stab)
Had me down
([VoxDoubleLow]-wide octave layer)
Right?
([AdlibDry]-tight club whisper)
Had me on the ropes
([FXTension]-filtered noise downlift)
Out of bounds
([KickTight]-4/4 pulse re-enters)
Right?
([AdlibWide]-stereo)
But like that—you're back—it's like old times
([MiniBuild]-snare 1-bar roll)
When I was gone
([VoxFiltered]-HPF telephone tone)
I was gone for good
([Silence1/4]-EDM dramatic gap)
Right?
([AdlibDry]-close)
Now you're back
([PluckReEntry]-pluck riff returns)
Like I knew you would
([VoxDoubleClean]-wider tone)
Right?
([AdlibBright]-stereo ping)
You bring me back to the neighborhood
([BassSlope]-short sub glide up)
Right?
([AdlibTight]-“right”)

[Chorus – DROP 2, Bigger]

Your hair like silk
([VoxAnthem]-triple-wide stack)
Your skin like milk
([HarmonyHighWide]-choral pad)
And I can't tell you all that I want to
([SupersawWide]-bigger saws)
And I don't want to if you don't want to
([DROP2]-heaviest slap bass + open hats)

[Verse 4 – Short Build]

Now here you come
([ReverseReverb]-EDM swell)
Like I remember
([BreathFX]-tight inhale)
Yeah
([SubPulse]-pre-drop heartbeat)
Some things change
([PluckBright]-pluck riff returns)
But you still temper
([VoxDoubleLight]-wide sparkle layer)
Like we never had that forever
([Delay1/4]-clean EDM echo)
They had you down in the dirt
([FXSweepDown]-EDM downlifter)
Right?
([AdlibWide]-L/R)
They had you long gone and lost
([FXReverse]-quick swell)
Right?
([AdlibBright]-stereo)
But like that—you're back—it's like old times
([FinalBuild]-snare rolls + noise + pitch riser)

[Final Chorus – MAX DROP]

([DROP3]-largest slap bass,open hats,superwide synths,full energy,club peak)

Your hair like silk
([VoxAnthemWide]-full-stack EDM lead)
Your skin like milk
([HarmonyEpic]-bright high pad)
And I can't tell you all that I want to
([SupersawFinal]-max width)
And I don't want to if you don't want to
([BassPunch]-tight sidechained saw bass)

[Outro]

([FilterLP]-lowpass entire mix)
([PluckSolo]-pluck riff fading)
([ReverbTailLong]-EDM cathedral tail)
([TapeFade]-soft warm fade-out)

# hardcore_pop - Revenant_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
A high-energy EDM/slap-house banger built around a tight 124–128 BPM groove with a punchy, modern club kick and a signature slap-house saw-bass pumping aggressively through heavy sidechain. Bright plucks and filtered stabs carry the melodic hook, widening into massive supersaws during each chorus drop. Verses stay minimal with close, clean vocals, subtle delays, and filtered atmospheres that create tension before explosive bass drops. Hats run sharp 1/8 pulses with 1/16 accents driving momentum, while white-noise risers and snare-roll builds launch each chorus. The vocals sit crisp and forward, lightly tuned with wide doubles on key phrases, giving the track a polished dance-pop feel. The overall mood is emotional but euphoric, mixing lyrical nostalgia with high-octane club energy designed for festival stages, peak-time DJ sets, and intense dance-floor moments.

[LYRICS]
[GlobalMix–EDM/slap-house/club-banger ~124–128 BPM.Super-tight punchy kick(55–80 Hz),thick transient,short tail.Bass:signature slap-house saw+FM hybrid,distorted slightly,sidechained 6–8 dB to kick,groovy syncopation.Sub mono <120 Hz.Snares/claps crisp,body 180–250 Hz,snap 5–7 kHz.Hats bright 1/8 pulse,1/16 bursts on transitions;HPF>350 Hz.Perc:airy shakers,wide claps,metallic EDM fills.Synths:bright stabs,aggressive saw leads,wide supersaws,filtered plucks.Pads:light atmospheric risers only.Vocals:clean modern pop–EDM male,fresh airy tone,bright top end,presence 4–7 kHz.Autotune light,EDM-tight timing.Doubles wide on chorus.Ad-libs energetic,stereo movement.Reverb short on verses,long on chorus throws.Delays synced 1/4 and dotted-8th.Master:-6.5 to -6 LUFS,club-loud,brickwall -0.9 dB,wide stereo mids.]

# hardcore_pop - Salvage (My Love)
[DESCRIPTION]
The 138 bpm tech house track opens with a sharp kick, syncopated hi-hats, and weighty sub bass, over which analog marimbas carve melodic hooks. Gregorian chants and evolving ambient tones underpin the build, while the drop fuses FM stabs, upright bass fills, and crisp metallic hits. Deep drones, pipe organ, and sparse chimes interlace, crafting a brooding, cosmic, groove-driven atmosphere with layered modal harmonies.

[LYRICS]
[Verse]
Sanctus
Sanctus
Sanctus
Dominus Deus Sabaoth
Pleni sunt caeli et terra
Gloria tua

[Pre-Chorus]
Gloria tua
Gloria tua

[Chorus]
Hosanna in excelsis
Hosanna in excelsis
Hosanna in excelsis
Sanctus
Sanctus

[Verse]
Ad te clamavi exaudisti
Peccavi ut me dimittis
Venias solvere vinculis
Benedicta es
Tantus est dolor tuus

[Prechorus]
Damnatus a Deo

[Chorus]
Quid ego miser tunc dicturus
Quem patronum rogaturus
Cum vix justus sit securus
Damnatus a Deo
Damnatus a Deo

[Verse]
In visione videbar
Super aquas marinas
In umbra steterunt
Amplius erant
Aquam tenuias
In venas inlata est

[Prechorus]
Vita
Ah

[Chorus]
Vitam salvabis
Amore meo
Vitam salvabis
Amore meo

---

# hardcore_pop - Salvage (My Love)
[DESCRIPTION]
This piece opens at 140 BPM with vast ambient textures, deep drones, ancient pipe organ, and authentic Gregorian-style modal chant, echoing through cathedral acoustics. Epic orchestral strings swell, then Drill hi-hats sharply contrast with cinematic strings as melodic, sliding 808s and modern basslines drive the groove. Monastic, multi-tracked choir harmonizes lushly with strings, punctuated by brass stabs and timpani hits for epic flair. Clear, purposeful rap verses unfold with a dynamic, cinematic narrative. A breakdown spotlights a dramatic solo strings section, escalating tension, before the full percussion and 808s surge back in, propelling passionate, dynamically shifting vocals.

[LYRICS]
[Verse]
Sanctus
Sanctus
Sanctus
Dominus Deus Sabaoth
Pleni sunt caeli et terra
Gloria tua

[Pre-Chorus]
Gloria tua
Gloria tua

# hardcore_pop - Salvage (My Love)
[DESCRIPTION]
The 138 bpm tech house track opens with a sharp kick, syncopated hi-hats, and weighty sub bass, over which analog marimbas carve melodic hooks. Gregorian chants and evolving ambient tones underpin the build, while the drop fuses FM stabs, upright bass fills, and crisp metallic hits. Deep drones, pipe organ, and sparse chimes interlace, crafting a brooding, cosmic, groove-driven atmosphere with layered modal harmonies.

Slow, evolving ambient tones form the backbone, layered with deep drones and ancient pipe organ. Authentic Gregorian chants echo in modal harmonies, woven with sparse chimes and subtle synthesized textures. The overall sound is brooding, reverent, and cosmic, invoking timeless cycles.

# hardcore_pop - Seti_mme_se_Khans_1
[DESCRIPTION]
An emotional Balkan trap/gospel ballad at ~90 BPM in a dark minor key, built around intimate felt piano, wide analog pads and a deep, sustained 808 sub sidechained to a tight, modern trap kit. The drums are punchy but restrained: short 808 kick, snappy snare/clap stack, metallic 1/8 hi-hats with tasteful 1/16 rolls and soft percussive shakers for motion. Cinematic strings and distant choirs slowly rise in intensity from verse to verse, turning a quiet confessional into a full, soaring hook. The vocal is a gritty, adult male lead with heavy compression, minimal reverb and subtle slapback delay, always forward in the mix and carved out in the mids so every word cuts through. The arrangement follows a Kontra-K–style emotional arc: sparse opening, gradual build, powerful double choruses, a stripped, string-heavy bridge and a spacious outro where the prayer-like message hangs in a long reverb tail.

[LYRICS]
[Track–Emotional Balkan trap/gospel ballad, ~90 BPM, minor key, felt piano+pad core, deep 808, modern trap drums, cinematic strings, Kontra-K–style emotional arc]
[Mix–Vocal-forward, carved mids in instrumental, tight low-end, limited but loud master, subtle stereo width, effects mostly on instruments not lead]

[Intro/Verse 1–Only felt piano (low velocity, LPF ~9–10 kHz) and quiet warm pad; no drums; sub barely audible on long notes; intimate, close-mic vocal with heavy compression, light plate reverb 5–7%, no delay]
Kad bih imao krila goluba
Daleko da odletim
Da nađem neko mesto
Gde bih mogo da se odmorim
Oči da zatvorim
U senku da se sklonim

[Pre-build–Add subtle low sub tone, distant filtered choir pad, very soft ambient noise; introduce ghost kick every 2 bars (low-pass, almost inaudible); add light slapback delay on phrase ends, +2–3 dB presence at 3–4 kHz for vocal clarity]
Pokaži mi put, dragi Bože
Tebi da se poklonim
Jer istina si ti
Sve ostalo je lažno
Jer sve to što oni vrednuju
Meni nije važno – novac i moć
To je sada prestiž
A ja dižem ruke prema tebi
I molim da me se setiš...

[Hook entry–Full drums and 808 enter; kick short and punchy, tuned to root; snare/clap stack with short room reverb; hats 1/8 with sparse 1/16 rolls; sidechained 808 with light saturation for harmonics; pad and soft strings open up in stereo]
[Hook vocal–Lead double-tracked, center; low-level hard-panned doubles; slightly longer plate reverb 10–12%; tempo-synced 1/8 or 1/4 delay only on last words; overall +1–1.5 dB louder than verses]
Ref.
Molim te, seti me se
Kada dođe vreme moje
Molim te, seti me se
Seti se desnice svoje

[Verse 2–Drums 10–15% lower than hook for contrast; same kit; introduce light swing; hats add occasional triplet rolls; 808 more present with occasional glide into stressed words; piano adds mid-register accents; strings low and warm under key phrases]
[Vocal–Slight tube saturation 5–7%, firm compression 4:1–6:1, fast attack; subtle stereo widener on long notes; minimal reverb to keep diction sharp]
Uzmi onaj kamen
Napravi me ponovo
Sve tvoje rane bole
Teške srcu kao olovo
I osećam da jedu me
Od kad si me okovo
Reči nisam pustio
Ni kad najteže sam bolovo

[Verse 2 build–Add rimshot ghost notes, soft shaker, low tom fills before section turns; automate pad filter slowly opening; emphasize words “držim”, “kružim”, “tužim” with slightly longer delays and darker reverb tails]
[Vocal–Short stereo doubles on last syllables, +0.5–1 dB level lift through this half of verse]
Jer zaveta se držim
Ne idem putevima lakšim i bržim
Bolje i gladan po gradu da kružim
Čekam te, sedim u mraku i tužim
Daj mi snage da izdržim
Da ispuni se sve
Da ispuni se sve
Sve što za mene pisano je

[Hook 2–Return to full-intensity chorus; add higher string line and louder choir pad; hats slightly more open; subtle noise riser into first line; parallel drum bus compression for extra punch]
[Hook 2 vocal–Thicker stack (4–6 layers), more pronounced doubles, gentle high-shelf at 8–10 kHz for “air”; keep consonants clear, reverb and delay same or slightly more than Hook 1]
Uzmi onaj kamen
Napravi me ponovo
Sve tvoje rane bole
Teške srcu kao olovo
I osećam da jedu me
Od kad si me okovo
Reči nisam pustio
Ni kad najteže sam bolovo
Jer zaveta se držim
Ne idem putevima lakšim i bržim
Bolje i gladan po gradu da kružim
Čekam te, sedim u mraku i tužim
Daj mi snage da izdržim
Da ispuni se sve
Da ispuni se sve
Sve što za mene pisano je

[Bridge–Strip drums to soft kick+rim every bar or two; mute hats; 808 very low; push cinematic strings and high-register piano arpeggios; filter pads to emphasize midrange emotion; global reverb send +10–15% for more space]
[Vocal–Slightly breathier tone, more reverb (15–18%), gentle 1/8 dotted delay on line ends, small stereo spread]
Kažu da ovde je kraj
Ne želim da im verujem
Tako se ubija zvezda sjaj
Ne znam, možda preterujem
Kad pomislim da sreća tu je
Ona uvek mi izmice
I šta je danas sigurno
Osim odakle potičeš

[Bridge repeat–Rebuild energy; reintroduce soft hats, more active strings, subtle choir “aaah” pads; slow noise riser into last lines; automate master bus +0.5 dB for perceived lift]
[Vocal–Push intensity, slightly more saturation, stronger doubles on key phrases like “zvezda sjaj”, “sigurno”; keep lead centered and dominant]
Kažu da ovde je kraj
Ne želim da im verujem
Tako se ubija zvezda sjaj
Ne znam, možda preterujem
Kad pomislim da sreća tu je
Ona uvek mi izmice
I šta je danas sigurno
Osim odakle potičeš

[Outro–Gradual drum fade: first hats, then snare, last kick; 808 decays away; leave piano, pads, soft choir; long reverb tail (6–8 s) on final chord; automate global low-pass very slowly to close the scene]

---

# hardcore_pop - Seti_mme_se_Khans_1
[DESCRIPTION]
A hard-hitting emotional trap/rap track in a dark minor key, built around a tight 808-driven rhythm section and a somber looping chord progression. The foundation is a short, punchy kick and deep sustained sub, shaped with sidechain compression so the low end stays clean. Snappy snares and metallic hi-hats in rapid 1/16 patterns, rolls, and small pitch moves create a forward groove.

The melodic bed blends muted keys, atmospheric pads, and subtle counter-lines that leave space for the vocal. FX are tasteful—reversed cymbals, short risers, and ambient tails to glue transitions. Verses pull drums and harmonics back for intimacy; hooks widen with fuller drums, thicker pads, and occasional strings.

Vocals are mixed dry and upfront: heavy compression, focused EQ to carve them a lane, minimal reverb, short delays, and light doubling on key phrases. Centered drums and vocal anchor the mix while hats and pads add width. The master is loud and modern, with strong sub weight and clear midrange.

[LYRICS]
[Track–Emotional Balkan trap/gospel ballad, ~90 BPM, minor key, felt piano+pad core, deep 808, modern trap drums, cinematic strings, Kontra-K–style emotional arc]
[Mix–Vocal-forward, carved mids in instrumental, tight low-end, limited but loud master, subtle stereo width, effects mostly on instruments not lead]

[Intro/Verse 1–Only felt piano (low velocity, LPF ~9–10 kHz) and quiet warm pad; no drums; sub barely audible on long notes; intimate, close-mic vocal with heavy compression, light plate reverb 5–7%, no delay]
