# hardcore_pop - SVE JE MOGUCE 15.07
[DESCRIPTION]
A 100 BPM minor-key hip-hop piece with a dynamic, story-driven arrangement. Verses ride a steady kick-snare groove, while choruses expand with layered pads, strings, and lead synths. The bass (808 or synth) anchors the B-minor tonality, adding deep sub energy and melodic movement. Track features multiple energy arcs: full sections, breakdowns around the midpoints where drums drop out, then dramatic re-entries. Vocals are intense, clearly enunciated, tightly compressed and EQ-carved to dominate the center, with atmospheric effects during quieter passages. Stereo imaging widens during builds, narrows during drops. Mood is cinematic, brooding, evolving from reflective to powerful.

[LYRICS]
[Verse 1]
([Intro beat] - [filtered drums + sub, hats minimal, pad slowly opening])
Svako jutro budim se sa osmehom na licu dok kroz prozor gledam sunce kako obasjava ulicu i mislim
([Pad FX] - [warm but eerie pad swell, tail under line])

gde li mi je pamet bila kada trošio sam vreme i izigravao debila
([808 FX] - [deep sustained hit on „debila“, light distortion tail])

Koliko sam puta zbog nemanja para policija me jurila a imao sam dara
([Hats] - [extra closed hats enter, rolling drill pattern])

Za apsolutno sve, od igle do lokomotive, uvek bio iskren nisam imao skrivene motive
([Synth] - [subtle arpeggiated cyborg plucks behind bar])

Jurio sam pare jer naučen sam tako često ujutru se kajem što sam izabrao ovako
([808 Glide] - [short glide on „pare“ i „ovako“])

Al' to je pravi put sve dok mi je ovaj beton, da nikad ništa tuđe nisam smatrao metom
([Bassline] - [rolling pattern opens up, tech-house flavor under words „pravi put“])

Ne igram se ruletom niti volim da se kockam, meni ne treba  puno samo sebe da skockam
([FX] - [short glitchy stab on „ruletom“, then clean on beat])

Dobro došao je svako ko me nije bilo lako, koji posrnuo nije nikad želeo tuđe jako
([Build] - [hat/snare mini-roll at end of line, pushes into chorus])

---

[Chorus]
([Drop] - [full drums + bass slam in, brighter chords, wider stereo])
Sve je moguće kad iskreno veruješ ti znaš da možeš sve što poželiš kad iskreno veruješ
([Hook FX] - [layered robotic doubles on „Sve je moguće“, light echo])

Sve je moguće kad iskreno veruješ ti znaš da možeš sve što poželiš kad iskreno veruješ
([Synth lead] - [catchy pluck melody doubling vocal rhythm])

---

[Verse 2]
([Beat] - [slight strip-back: kick + 808 + hats, pads darker again])
Probudi se iz sna, 3, 2, 1, 9, 2, prva zora, novo jutro puna čaša 
([FX] - [reverse sweep into bar, robotic count „3, 2, 1“ quietly under line])

Osećam se dobro, zaista i jeste tako, koliko postalo je slatko, od sad živim samo jako više nema naopako
([808 FX] - [pulsing pattern following phrase „živim samo jako“])

Biće kako biti mora neka slavi Srbija, neka slavi Crna Gora, poteraćemo dušmane odavde preko mora
([Choir pad] - [low male choir texture on „neka slavi…“])

I kad grmi i kad seva i kad zemlja se zatrese, niko živ me neće maknuti sa ove adrese
([FX] - [distant thunder + sub boom synced to „zatrese“])

Na nogama stojim, ne dam da me ponese, zato miči mi se s puta da te vetar ne odnese
([Synth] - [rising cyborg chord swell on „vetar ne odnese“])

Jer svima su nam data ista 24 sata svoje dugove plaćam vama kasni drugara rata
([Hats] - [busier drill hats under „24 sata“ da podvuku groove])

Kad se uzima glavnica kamata se preračuna, a ko uopšte kome šalje pare sa računa
([FX] - [short glitchy „calc“ blip on „preračuna“])

Da li ti znaš odakle sam ja, ko sam i šta radim kako prolazi mi dan, da li znaš šta mogu za šta sam sposoban
([Vox FX] - [pitch-shifted double quietly under „znaš odakle sam ja“])

Birao sam teži put da bi bio slobodan, reci mi da l' znaš odakle sam ja, ko sam i šta radim kako prolazi mi dan, da li znaš šta mogu za šta sam sposoban
([Build] - [snare + hat roll building across line, noise riser into refren])

Birao sam teži put
([808 Glide] - [long glide on „put“, sets up chorus drop])

---

[Chorus]
([Big drop] - [full low-end, brightest synths, widest stereo])
Sve je moguće kad iskreno veruješ ti znaš da možeš sve što poželiš kad iskreno veruješ
([Hook] - [extra vocal layers on „Sve je moguće“, robotic harmonies])

Sve je moguće kad iskreno veruješ ti znaš da možeš sve što poželiš kad iskreno veruješ
([Delay] - [tail repeats „veruješ… veruješ…“ in tempo])

Sve je moguće kad iskreno veruješ ti znaš da možeš sve što poželiš kad iskreno veruješ
([Synth riff] - [repeating melodic motif under this whole line])

Sve je moguće kad iskreno veruješ ti znaš da možeš sve što poželiš kad iskreno veruješ
(čuješ)
([FX] - [robotic whisper „čuješ…“ left/right])

Sve je moguće
([Outro hit] - [final sub + clap punch, instruments start to fade])

---

# hardcore_pop - SVE JE MOGUCE 15.07
[DESCRIPTION]
A mid-tempo 96 BPM hip-hop track in a melancholic minor key with a steady kick-snare backbone and clean 8th-hat patterns. Harmonic bed features emotional piano or guitar riffs supported by warm pads and a deep, controlled low-end. Bass sits around the root, providing weight without clutter. Vocals are upfront, dynamic, slightly melodic, heavily compressed for presence, with subtle reverb/delay and layered doubles in the hook. Structure runs intro → verse → chorus → verse → chorus, with smooth transitions and added textures during refrains. Mix is polished, wide, cinematic, and mastered loud. Mood is serious, motivational, and darkly uplifting.

[LYRICS]
[Verse 1]
([Intro beat] - [filtered drums + sub, hats minimal, pad slowly opening])
Svako jutro budim se sa osmehom na licu dok kroz prozor gledam sunce kako obasjava ulicu i mislim
([Pad FX] - [warm but eerie pad swell, tail under line])

gde li mi je pamet bila kada trošio sam vreme i izigravao debila
([808 FX] - [deep sustained hit on „debila“, light distortion tail])

([Hats] - [extra closed hats enter, rolling drill pattern])

([Synth] - [subtle arpeggiated cyborg plucks behind bar])

([Build] - [hat/snare mini-roll at end of line, pushes into chorus])

([Synth lead] - [catchy pluck melody doubling vocal rhythm])

# hardcore_pop - Svi smo u crnom ovde ko pirati (Remix) (Remastered x2)
[DESCRIPTION]
Serbian Drill Banger (130-140 BPM)
Fast-paced variant emphasizing drill elements, Features aggressive 808 slides, rapid-fire hi-hats, and distorted bass,  melodies are fragmented and used sparingly as hooks, Vocals are heavily processed with aggressive flows and crew chants creating high energy

[LYRICS]
Svi smo u crnom ovde ko pirati
Bolje se nemoj sa nama igrati
U mutnim vodama teško je plivati (aha)
Sve dok sam živ ja ću se cimati (igrati)
Ovde ne možeš nikom mafijati
Napraviš delo moraš se skrivati
Ako me zoveš zovi na privatni (tiću)
Svi su na belom svi vole šibati

Spržimo peticu padaš u nesvest
Gica na stolu dok se pune kese
Kao Mbappe samo tresem mreže
Ovde kod nas sve ti je sveže

Štekovi padaju ortaci stradaju
Jedni obijaju drugi ti spavaju
Neki na vreme dokaze sklanjaju
Žele me zlotvori mnogi se nadaju
Plavih je svuda stalno nas ganjaju
Zbog jednog džoka vole da smaraju
Momci sa duplih ovde ti vladaju
Moji ti ćute i kada padaju

Svi smo u crnom ovde ko pirati
Bolje se nemoj sa nama igrati
U mutnim vodama teško je plivati
Sve dok sam živ ja ću se cimati
Ovde ne možeš nikom mafijati
Napraviš delo moraš se skrivati
Ako me zoveš zovi na privatni
Svi su na belom svi vole šibati

U ringu sam zver kao McGregor
Dušmani oprez sprema se teror
Kuje me cimaju traže mi belo
Jebem vam mater, a stvarno nisam hteo
Ovde i poštenom nakače delo
Drukari svakom sledi opelo
Ta vaša koka mnogo je šelo
Radiš što moraš ne što si hteo
Konekcija preko fona, zonfa ceo
Na ulici pazi se beton je vreo
Čim stigne roba štekaj na selo
Zavide mnogi svako bi pevo
Realno tebra, sve strane sjebo
I dalje radim što nisam trebo
Metak u vuglu letiš na nebo
Sjebo se svaki koji je krenuo

Svi smo u crnom ovde ko pirati
Bolje se nemoj sa nama igrati
U mutnim vodama teško je plivati
Sve dok sam živ ja ću se cimati
Ovde ne možeš nikom mafijati
Napraviš delo moraš se skrivati
Ako me zoveš zovi na privatni
Svi su na belom svi vole šibati

---

# hardcore_pop - Svi smo u crnom ovde ko pirati_3
[DESCRIPTION]
Serbian Drill Banger (130-140 BPM)
Fast-paced variant emphasizing drill elements, Features aggressive 808 slides, rapid-fire hi-hats, and distorted bass,  melodies are fragmented and used sparingly as hooks, Vocals are heavily processed with aggressive flows and crew chants creating high energy

[LYRICS]
Svi smo u crnom ovde - pirati
Bolje se nemoj snama igrati
U mutnim vodama teško  plivati (aha)
Sve dok sam živ ja ću se cimati (igrati)
Ovde ne možeš nikom mafijati
Napraviš delo moraš se skrivati
Ako me zoveš - zovi na privatni (tiću)
Svi su na belom -svi vole šibati

Spržimo peticu padaš u nesvest
Gica na stolu dok se pune kese
Kao Mbappe samo tresem mreže
Ovde kod nas sve ti je sveže

Štekovi padaju ortaci stradaju
Jedni obijaju drugi ti spavaju

Zbog jednog džoka vole da smaraju
Momci sa duplih ovde ti vladaju
Moji ti ćute i kada padaju

Svi smo u crnom ovde ko pirati
Bolje se nemoj sa nama igrati
U mutnim vodama teško je plivati
Sve dok sam živ ja ću se cimati
Ovde ne možeš nikom mafijati
Napraviš delo moraš se skrivati
Ako me zoveš zovi na privatni
Svi su na belom svi vole šibati

U ringu sam zver kao McGregor
Dušmani oprez sprema se teror
Kuje me cimaju traže mi belo
Jebem vam mater, a stvarno nisam hteo
Ovde i poštenom nakače delo
Drukari svakom sledi opelo
Ta vaša koka mnogo je šelo
Radiš što moraš ne što si hteo
Konekcija preko fona, zonfa ceo
Na ulici pazi se beton je vreo
Čim stigne roba štekaj na selo
Zavide mnogi svako bi pevo
Realno tebra, sve strane sjebo
I dalje radim što nisam trebo
Metak u vuglu letiš na nebo
Sjebo se svaki koji je krenuo

Svi smo u crnom ovde ko pirati
Bolje se nemoj sa nama igrati
U mutnim vodama teško je plivati
Sve dok sam živ ja ću se cimati
Ovde ne možeš nikom mafijati
Napraviš delo moraš se skrivati
Ako me zoveš zovi na privatni
Svi su na belom svi vole šibati

---

# hardcore_pop - Takking the next plane_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
at 127 bpm bouncy reggaetón  club tech Turkish zurna , cathederal organ, echo,  80s midi synthesizer,oriental pop, car honks, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Verse]
It's been a while since I called you
([dial tone] - tuu-tu-tuu)
I'm dialing in now
([keypad beeps] - bip-bip-bip)
Been a while since you heard my voice
([phone line hiss] - shhhh)
But you can hear me now
([soft reverb] - „hear me now…“)
It's been a while since I touched down
([landing gear thump] - thud)
But I'm touching down now
([airport ambience] - mmmrum)

[Chorus]
I just want to see you
([echo] - „see you, see you…“)
I just want to see you
([BG vox] - ooo-ooo)
I just want to see you
([delay] - „see you, see you…“)
I just want to see you
([soft sigh] - haaah)

[Verse 2]
It's been a while since I called you
([ringback tone] - triiim-triiim)
I'm dialing in now
([key click] - tik-tik-tik)
Been a while since you heard my voice
([mic breath] - ffff)
But you can hear me now
([stereo whisper] - „can you hear me?“)
It's been a while since I touched down
([wheel rumble] - rrrrmm)
But I'm touching down now
([PA chime] - ding-dong)

[Chorus]
I just want to see you
([BG harmonies] - ahh-ahh)
I just want to see you
([echo] - „see you…“)
I just want to see you
([clap reverb] - clap…clap)
I just want to see you
([sub swell] - whooom)

[Bridge]
I just want to see you
([chopped vox] - „see- see- see you“)
I just want to see you
([delay ping-pong] - „you… you…“)
I just want to see you
([BG oooh] - ooo-oo)
I just want to see you
([heartbeat] - thump-thump)
I just want to see you
([riser] - wooooosh)
I just want to see you
([stereo whisper] - „just you…“)
I just want to see you
([filtered vox] - „see you“)
I just want to see you
([pad swell] - aaaaah)

[Verse]
I still remember the first time
([vinyl soft] - pft)
Our timezones aligned
([clock tick] - tik-tak)
And your voice came through the line
([phone crackle] - krrrsh)
And I know that I always say
([BG hum] - mmm)
That I wish you weren't so far away
([distant echo] - „far away…“)
But we both know I could solve that in a day
([whoosh] - shhaaa)

[Pre-Chorus]
And what good is talking
([filter sweep] - ffff)
When I could just
([snare build] - tchk-tchk-tchk)
Take the next flight?
([jet roar] - vrrrROOOM)

[Chorus]
I'm getting on that plane tonight
([gang BG] - „tonight, tonight…“)

[Verse 2]
One day soon you'll be so close
([close whisper] - „so close…“)
And the only thing separating us will be clothes
([cheeky BG] - heh)
Maybe I'm crazy but I know
([reverb] - „I know…“)
That I don't know much
([sub drop] - boom)
But what I know
([snap] - snap)
Is I met you once and now I can't let you go
([BG adlib] - „can’t let you go…“)
And we both know how this story goes
([reverse swell] - whoooosh)

[Chorus]
I'm getting on that plane tonight
([BG chant] - „plane tonight…“)
I'm getting on that plane tonight
([echo] - „tonight, night, night…“)

---

# hardcore_pop - Taktichke_Patichke_4
[DESCRIPTION]
Intro(150 BPM):punchy slap kick,sculpted filtered sub;autotuned vocals through tape delay,monastic chants simmer as texture.Build1(150→155,16 bars):polyrhythmic percussion,clipped hats,rising arpeggiated acid;female backing vocals swell to support tension.Drop1(155):saturated sub-bass,punchy slap drums;acid line sidechained to gated arp;vocal stacks doubled,detuned over subterranean monastic 'aaaaaa'.Breakdown(152):notch bass,reversed piano,sparse claps,distant choir chops;harmonies decay and blur.Build2(152→155):filter automation on arps,analog risers,pitched fills;brass stabs and gating;hi-hat triplets and chant crescendos.Drop2(155):dense FM percussion,mirrored acid variations,call-and-response vocals;tape-saturated lead;harmonic exciter fattens the low end.Outro(155→150):percussion thins,acid collapses into sub-oscillation;final vocal washes through granular delay,lowpass fade.Mastered:multiband compression,stereo imaging,tape warmth,harmonic saturation,limit -0.1dBFS.

[LYRICS]
[Male - Intro]
Pa pa panika kad se slika 
i bez trika skida to 
Ka kalinka ruska pička 
pada šminka istu noć
E moj prika još se šika 
Nikad crto likovno
al znam da crtam bro
i to baš predobro

[Male - Verse 1]
Gle sata gle kola gle skanka što rolam
De manjka kontrola tu sanka se gola
gle brata mentola pa start ga patrola
i want samo lova sve ganc samo novac

[Male - Pre-Chorus]
one vole belo to
a ja kažem drolji ne
svega baci na stoooo
pa dovodim ih dve
lud sam sto posto
Na umu mi samo keš

[Male - Chorus]
Sve je sada prelako
moja banda Marakesh
ja sam željan tvog tela
sva ti goriš kao vatra

[Male - Verse 2]
Obuo sam  patike
pa izuo te taktike 
Isto sve, šablon klasike
A ribe vam od plastike
Dupe bez gimnastike
Lepše su mi kasirke

[Male - Bridge]
U treši mi šuška 
belo pa đuskam 
ona je uska
u gepeku puška 
u pretincu njuška 
rakija kruška

[Male - Build-Up]
Petica vutra 
pare ne sutra 
već sve sada 
i luda i mlada 
upoznala gada 
dama iz grada
i šmele iz kraja

[Male - Drop]
a ja geto favele
mi linije bele 
biljke mi zrele 
pa berba je blizu

[Male - Verse 3]
Prošlo peto leto
ti si tu sa dečkom
Ja sad krug
rolam krajem sa korvetom
Dok tu sam 
s tetkom
i sa beretom

[Male - Outro]
Peta u nizu 
Da ne treba vizu
pa ne trebam rizlu
i  ne  trebam kintu
ja ne trebam pičku
pa ne lažem priču
da polomim kičmu 
tom tvom banditu
dam ruku vaspitnu

---

# hardcore_pop - Taktichke_Patichke_6
[DESCRIPTION]
A 155 BPM slap house track powered by thick, dirty sub-bass and crisp syncopated percussion. Harsh acid synths deliver gritty, looping hooks while haunting violin lines weave Arabic modal runs. Autotuned deep vocals drift atop biting hi-hats, tension-lifting risers, and relentless club momentum.

[LYRICS]

# hardcore_pop - Taktichke_Patichke_7 (Remastered x2)
[DESCRIPTION]
A 155 BPM slap house track powered by thick, dirty sub-bass and crisp syncopated percussion. Harsh acid synths deliver gritty, looping hooks while haunting zurna lines weave monastic chants in the distance. Autotuned deep vocals drift atop biting hi-hats, tension-lifting risers, and relentless club momentum.

[LYRICS]
[Short Instrumental - Zurne approaching]

[Male - Intro]
Pa pa panika kad se slika 
i bez trika skida to 
Ka kalinka ruska pička 
pada šminka istu noć
E moj prika još se šika 
Nikad crto likovno
al znam da crtam bro
i to baš predobro

[Male - Verse 1]
Gle sata gle kola gle skanka što rolam
De manjka kontrola tu sanka se gola
gle brata mentola pa start ga patrola
aj want samo lova sve ganc samo novac

svega baci na stoooo

lud sam sto posto
Na umu mi samo keš

sva ti goriš kao vatra

pa izuo te taktike 
Isto sve, šablon klasike
A ribe vam od plastike
Dupe bez gimnastike
Lepše su mi kasirke

[Male - Bridge]
U treši mi šuška 
belo pa đuskam 
ona je uska
u gepeku puška 
u pretincu njuška 
rakija kruška

[Male - Build-Up]
Petica vutra 
pare ne sutra 
već sve sada 
i luda i mlada 
upoznala gada 
dama iz grada
i šmele iz kraja

[Male - Drop]
a ja geto favele
mi linije bele 
biljke mi zrele 
pa berba je blizu

[Male - Drop]

mi linije bele 
biljke mi zrele

# hardcore_pop - Taktichke_Patichke_8
[DESCRIPTION]
A hypnotic tech house groove pulses with tight bass and crisp, driving percussion, while moody, underground club ambiences set the scene. Siren-style risers and chopped rave samples slice in atop bass that morphs subtly throughout. 80s-inspired midi synths layer melodic hooks, and sampled crowd cheers and chant vocals explode with raw, communal energy at each drop.

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - Intro]


[Drop - impactful]
u stalaži je ekstaza (ek-sta-za)
ekstazi je tu sa nama


[Bridge]
Imam fon blek beri
sef baš po meri
gas revolveri spas
lajn atletika
Full genetika (ge-ne-ti-ka)
skup estetika
put do Pekinga
vuko beli gram

[Instrumental]

[Chorus]
a tu uvek se popije (po-pi-je-je-je)
vučem kose vučem skije
bebi lako se pobijem
kada rade me linije
meni niko se ne smije (smi-je-je-je)
svakako niko ne smije
jer bi najebao lako
zaklo bih bez čakije


[Instrumental]

[Chorus]
a tu uvek se popije (po-pi-je-je-je)
vučem kose vučem skije
bebi lako se pobijem
kada rade me linije
meni niko se ne smije (smi-je-je-je)
svakako niko ne smije
jer bi najebao lako
zaklo bih bez čakije

[Outro]
Sve nam je offer fame (faaaame)
to je kao over game (o-ver ge- ejm)
Ali mi smo over hejt
Poen dam pa over paid (o-ver pe-jd)

[Instrumental - Go crazy]

---

# hardcore_pop - Taktichke_Patichke_8
[DESCRIPTION]
A blast of pounding 909 kick drums leads the charge, cut with frantic hi-hats and sharp claps. The Intro primes with distorted synth stabs and rising effects. Main sections drive hard at 180+ BPM, adding chopped rave samples, wailing sirens, punchy bass, and sudden breaks for tension.

[LYRICS]
[Male - Intro]
Pa pa panika kad se slika 
i bez trika skida to 
Ka kalinka ruska pička 
pada šminka istu noć
E moj prika još se šika 
Nikad crto likovno
al znam da crtam bro
i to baš predobro

[Male - Verse 1]

De manjka kontrola tu sanka se gola
gle brata mentola pa start ga patrola
aj want samo lova sve ganc samo novac

[Male - Pre-Chorus]
one vole belo to
a ja kažem drolji ne
svega baci na stoooo
pa dovodim ih dve
lud sam sto posto
Na umu mi samo keš

[Male - Chorus]
Sve je sada prelako
moja banda Marakesh
ja sam željan tvog tela
sva ti goriš kao vatra

[Male - Verse 2]
Obuo sam patike
pa izuo te taktike 
Isto sve, šablon klasike
A ribe vam od plastike
Dupe bez gimnastike
Lepše su mi kasirke

[Male - Bridge]
U treši mi šuška

# hardcore_pop - Taktichke_Patichke_8
[DESCRIPTION]
A driving 140-150BPM slap house groove powers the track, featuring punchy kicks, tight hats, and syncopated, intricately woven drums. Raw jungle screams, tire screeches, sirens, and explosive hits break through, while dynamic, layered chants accentuate key moments. Rapid, morphing FX and evolving chops give relentless motion; swirling switches in audio texture add energy and complexity, heightening a dense, tense urban club vibe.

# hardcore_pop - Taktichke_Patichke_8
[DESCRIPTION]
A hypnotic tech house groove pulses with tight bass and crisp, driving percussion, while moody, underground club ambiences set the scene. Siren-style risers and chopped rave samples slice in atop bass that morphs subtly throughout. 80s-inspired midi synths layer melodic hooks, and sampled crowd cheers and chant vocals explode with raw, communal energy at each drop.

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - Intro]


[Drop - impactful]
u stalaži je ekstaza (ek-sta-za)
ekstazi je tu sa nama


[Bridge]
Imam fon blek beri
sef baš po meri
gas revolveri spas
lajn atletika
Full genetika (ge-ne-ti-ka)
skup estetika
put do Pekinga
vuko beli gram

[Instrumental]

[Chorus]
a tu uvek se popije (po-pi-je-je-je)
vučem kose vučem skije
bebi lako se pobijem
kada rade me linije
meni niko se ne smije (smi-je-je-je)
svakako niko ne smije
jer bi najebao lako
zaklo bih bez čakije


[Instrumental]

[Chorus]

[Instrumental - Go crazy]

# hardcore_pop - Taktichke_Patichke_8
[DESCRIPTION]
High-energy slap house track featuring aggressive jungle screams, tire screeches, sirens, explosive hits, and rhythmic chants. Dynamic sound design with constantly evolving chops, punchy kicks, and intricate drum patterns that weave around the core beat. Multiple audio elements switch throughout, creating intense textural layers that complement the main groove and vocal elements. Built for maximum dancefloor impact with relentless energy and gritty urban atmosphere.

# hardcore_pop - Techilim Tech-Psalmi_vol#1
[DESCRIPTION]
At 140 BPM, epic opening-orchestral strings swell, cinematic scope, Drill hi-hats enter-cutting through strings, modern contrast, Heavy 808s-tuned, melodic, playing bassline role, Sliding bass-musical, following chord progression, harmonic foundation, Monastic chants-choir-sized, multi-tracked, cathedral acoustics emphasized, Rap verses-storytelling focus, clear, purposeful, cinematic narrative, Additional orchestration-brass stabs, timpani hits, epic moments, Chants harmonize-with strings, creating lush, emotional backdrop, Mid-section breakdown-strings solo, building drama, film-score quality, 808s return-with intensity, joined by full percussion, Vocal delivery passionate-dynamic range, quiet-loud shifts, expressive, Bass slides dramatic-scoring scene changes, emotional punctuation, Hi-hats maintain edge-keeping street credibility, preventing over-polish, Choir chants peak-powerful moment, all voices unite, goosebumps, Additional layer-synth pad, warm, filling space, supporting harm

[LYRICS]
Hodite, zapevajmo Gospodu, uskliknimo Bogu, gradu spa-se-nja svo-je-ga! Izađimo pred lice njegovo s hvalom, u pesmama uskliknimo mu!
(Pevajte Gospodu!)

Gospode, kako je mnogo neprijatelja mojih! Mnogi ustaju na me. Mnogi govore za dušu moju: Nema mu pomoći od Boga. Ali ti si, Gospode, štit koji me zaklanja, slava moja; ti podižeš glavu moju.
(Štit koji me zaklanja.)

Put je Božji vjeran, riječ Gospodnja čista. On je štit svjema koji se u nj uzdaju.
(Riječ Gospodnja čista.)

Smiluj se na me, Gospode, jer čovjek hoće da me proguta, neprijatelj me svaki dan pritišnjuje. Kad me je strah, jer se u tebe uzdam. Bogom se hvalim za riječ njegovu; u Boga se uzdam, ne bojim se; šta će mi učiniti tijelo? 
(U Boga se uzdam.)
(Pojte caru našemu)
(U Boga se uzdam.)

S tobom razbijam vojsku, i s Bogom svojim skačem preko zida. Tjeram neprijatelje svoje i stižem ih, i ne vraćam se dok ih ne istrijebim.

Ustani, Gospode, u gnjevu svojem; digni se na žestinu neprijatelja mojih; probudi se meni na pomoć, i otvori sud. Od Gospoda je spasenje; neka bude na narodu tvom blagoslov tvoj! 
(Ustani, Gospode — Od Gospoda je spasenje.)

Vratiće se u pakao bezbožnici; jer neće svagda biti zaboravljen ubogi, i nada nevoljnicima neće nigda poginuti. Gospod je car svagda, dovijeka.
 (Neka ne bude više bezbožnika — Gospod je car.)

Vratiće se u pakao bezbožnici; jer neće svagda biti zaboravljen ubogi, i nada nevoljnicima neće nigda poginuti. Gospod je car svagda, dovijeka.
 (Neka ne bude više bezbožnika — Gospod je Car.)
 (Neka ne bude više bezbožnika — Gospod je Car.)


Hodite...Hodite, zapevajmo Gospodu; pojte Gospodu, pojte, pojte Caru našem.

Hodite, zapevajmo Gospodu; pojte Gospodu, pojte, pojte Caru našem.

# hardcore_pop - Techilim Tech-Psalmi_vol#2
[DESCRIPTION]
At 140 BPM, this cinematic Drill track begins with an epic swell of orchestral strings, joined by cathedral-sized, multi-tracked monastic choir chants. Modern trap hi-hats slice through, creating tension with lush strings. Heavy, melodic 808s—pitch-bending and sliding—anchor the harmonic progression. Brass stabs and timpani hits add power at climaxes, while a mid-song strings solo elevates film-score drama. Rap verses are sharply narrated, vocals range from hushed to powerful, and the choir’s harmonies peak alongside bold synth pads and stirring percussion, ending with unified, impactful energy.

[LYRICS]
Hodite, zapevajmo Gospodu, uskliknimo Bogu, gradu spa-se-nja svo-je-ga! Izađimo pred lice njegovo s hvalom, u pesmama uskliknimo mu!
(Pevajte Gospodu!)

Gospode, kako je mnogo neprijatelja mojih! Mnogi ustaju na me. Mnogi govore za dušu moju: Nema mu pomoći od Boga. Ali ti si, Gospode, štit koji me zaklanja, slava moja; ti podižeš glavu moju.
(Štit koji me zaklanja.)

Put je Božji vjeran, riječ Gospodnja čista. On je štit svjema koji se u nj uzdaju.
(Riječ Gospodnja čista.)

Smiluj se na me, Gospode, jer čovjek hoće da me proguta, neprijatelj me svaki dan pritišnjuje. Kad me je strah, jer se u tebe uzdam. Bogom se hvalim za riječ njegovu; u Boga se uzdam, ne bojim se; šta će mi učiniti tijelo? 
(U Boga se uzdam.)
(Pojte caru našemu)
(U Boga se uzdam.)

S tobom razbijam vojsku, i s Bogom svojim skačem preko zida. Tjeram neprijatelje svoje i stižem ih, i ne vraćam se dok ih ne istrijebim.

Ustani, Gospode, u gnjevu svojem; digni se na žestinu neprijatelja mojih; probudi se meni na pomoć, i otvori sud. Od Gospoda je spasenje; neka bude na narodu tvom blagoslov tvoj! 

Vratiće se u pakao bezbožnici; jer neće svagda biti zaboravljen ubogi, i nada nevoljnicima neće nigda poginuti. Gospod je car svagda, dovijeka.
 (Neka ne bude više bezbožnika — Gospod je car.)

Vratiće se u pakao bezbožnici; jer neće svagda biti zaboravljen ubogi, i nada nevoljnicima neće nigda poginuti. Gospod je car svagda, dovijeka.

# hardcore_pop - Techilim_Tech_1
[DESCRIPTION]
At 128 BPM,track opens-deep subliminal drones,muffled crowd chatter,and a tight 909 kick driving four-on-the-floor.A crisp 16th-note closed hi-hat & triplet variations,conga-like percussion add hypnotic shuffle.A sub-heavy square-wave bassline emerges,filter opening/closing with sidechained ducking.A bright Jupiter-8-style sawtooth lead-a memorable 4-bar motif with chorus modulation.Siren risers swell as glitched samples stutter. The drop hits:claps on 2 & 4,rolling morphing bassline,80s synth lead cutting through,filtered crowd chants-build energy.The breakdown strips -atmospheric drones,warm analog pad chords,sparse muted bass. Build-up intensifies:frantic hi-hats,screaming sirens,fast synth arpeggio,chopped rave samples escalating.The final drop climax-gritty overdriven bass,added shaker,massive reverb-drenched crowd chants—all elements unite-explosive dancefloor energy. Outro deconstructs:arpeggio fades,chants muffle,bass simplifies to kick,hi-hat,drone.Final synth stab echoes-fade

[LYRICS]
[Chorus - Drop 1]
הַלְלוּהוּ בִּתְקוֹעַ שׁוֹפָר, נֶפֶשׁ תִּפְעֹל

# hardcore_pop - Techilim_Tech_1
[DESCRIPTION]
At 128 BPM,track opens-deep subliminal drones,muffled crowd chatter,and a tight 909 kick driving four-on-the-floor.A crisp 16th-note closed hi-hat & triplet variations,conga-like percussion add hypnotic shuffle.A sub-heavy square-wave bassline emerges,filter opening/closing with sidechained ducking.A bright Jupiter-8-style sawtooth lead-a memorable 4-bar motif with chorus modulation.Siren risers swell as glitched samples stutter. The drop hits:claps on 2 & 4,rolling morphing bassline,80s synth lead cutting through,filtered crowd chants-build energy.The breakdown strips -atmospheric drones,warm analog pad chords,sparse muted bass. Build-up intensifies:frantic hi-hats,screaming sirens,fast synth arpeggio,chopped rave samples escalating.The final drop climax-gritty overdriven bass,added shaker,massive reverb-drenched crowd chants—all elements unite-explosive dancefloor energy. Outro deconstructs:arpeggio fades,chants muffle,bass simplifies to kick,hi-hat,drone.Final synth stab echoes-fade

[LYRICS]
[Chorus - Drop 1]
הַלְלוּהוּ בִּתְקוֹעַ שׁוֹפָר, נֶפֶשׁ תִּפְעֹל
גְּבוּרָה וְעֹז, בְּמַעֲרָבֹות יָם
כִּי לְעוֹלָם חַסְדּוֹ, רוּחַ קָדְשׁוֹ
מְשׁוֹבֵב נִשְׁבָּע, קוֹל רַנָּן
אֶשָּׂא אֶת-כּוֹס יְשׁוּעֹות (וְאֶקְרָא...)
זוֹכַר חַסְדּוֹ לְעוֹלָם (אָדוֹן עֶזְרָנִי...)

אֱלֹהִים נִטְשׁוּהוּ

הַלְלוּהוּ בִּתְקוֹעַ שׁוֹפָר, נֶפֶשׁ תִּפְעֹל

# hardcore_pop - Techilim_Tech_10_Psalmi
[DESCRIPTION]
At 128 BPM, the track ignites with a pulsating tech house foundation, crisp 909 kick hammering four-on-the-floor. Intricate 16th-note hi-hat patterns intertwine with shaker rhythms creating infectious bounce. A deep, filtered bassline emerges with rhythmic sidechain compression. Hypnotic vocal snippets loop and transform through effects processing. Atmospheric white noise builds as exotic percussion elements weave through the mix. The main section unleashes sharp claps on beats 2 & 4, driving bassline locked perfectly with the kick. Pitched vocal samples punctuate the rhythm - "rise up", "feel the beat". Layered synth stabs add harmonic depth. The breakdown reduces to essential kick and bass elements, while ethereal pads swell with anticipation. The build section accelerates with frantic hi-hat rolls, dramatic riser effects, and cascading tom patterns. Vocal fragments stutter in increasing intensity. The climax delivers a distorted bass assault, additional percussive layers, and expans

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - Intro/Groove]
(Sound: A rolling tech house groove begins. A tight 909 kick drives a four-on-the-floor beat. Crisp 16th-note closed hi-hats and shaker layers add bounce. A groovy, filtered bass stab pattern emerges with a sidechain pump.)

[Vocal Chop Hook]
(Sound: A catchy vocal chop hook repeats, pitched and chopped for maximum energy. White noise risers build as tribal percussion fills intensify.)

Мир... У-у-мир... Мир

[Chorus - Drop 1]
(Sound: The drop hits. Claps on 2 & 4, a bouncing bassline locked tight. Filtered synth stabs add texture.)

Ја мирно лијежим и спавам; јер ти, Господе, сам дајеш ми те сам без страха.

[Instrumental - Breakdown]
(Sound: The track strips back to just kick and bass. An atmospheric pad swells, building tension.)

[Verse - Breakdown]
(Sound: A single, clear vocal enters over the minimal beat and swelling pad.)

У тебе се, Господе, уздам; нека се не осрамоте они који се у те уздају.

[Instrumental - Build-up]
(Sound: The build-up intensifies with rapid hi-hats, screaming risers, and rolling toms.)

[Vocal Chop - Build-up]
(Sound: Vocal chops stutter faster, riding the risers to the peak.)

Уздај се... Уздај се у Господа...

[Chorus - Drop 2]
(Sound: The final drop explodes with a distorted bass wobble, extra percussion layers, and massive vocal chants echoing wide.)

Lead Vocal:
А смјерни ће наслиједити земљу, и наслађиваће се множином мира.

Background Chants (wide reverb, delayed):
Мира... Мира... Samo daj nam мира...

[Instrumental - Outro]
(Sound: The track deconstructs. The massive chants fade, the bass simplifies, and percussion strips back to just kick and hi-hat.)

[Vocal Fade - Outro]
(Sound: A single, fading vocal word repeats over the minimal beat.)

Милост... Милост... Милост...

[Final Hit]
(Sound: A final bass stab cuts to absolute silence.)

---

# hardcore_pop - Techilim_Tech_10_Psalmi
[DESCRIPTION]
At 128 BPM, the track ignites with a pulsating tech house foundation, crisp 909 kick hammering four-on-the-floor. Intricate 16th-note hi-hat patterns intertwine with shaker rhythms creating infectious bounce. A deep, filtered bassline emerges with rhythmic sidechain compression. The climax delivers a distorted bass assault, additional percussive layers, and expans

Ја мирно лијежим и спавам; јер ти, Господе, сам дајеш ми те сам без страха.

[Instrumental - Breakdown]
(Sound: The track strips back to just kick and bass. An atmospheric pad swells, building tension.)

[Verse - Breakdown]
(Sound: A single, clear vocal enters over the minimal beat and swelling pad.)

У тебе се, Господе, уздам; нека се не осрамоте они који се у те уздају.

[Instrumental - Build-up]
(Sound: The build-up intensifies with rapid hi-hats, screaming risers, and rolling toms.)

[Vocal Chop - Build-up]

Уздај се... Уздај се у Господа...

Милост... Милост... Милост...

[Final Hit]
(Sound: A final bass stab cuts to absolute silence.)

# hardcore_pop - Techilim_Tech_18_Psalmi
[DESCRIPTION]
At 140 BPM, epic opening-orchestral strings swell, cinematic scope, Drill hi-hats enter-cutting through strings, modern contrast, Heavy 808s-tuned, melodic, playing bassline role, Sliding bass-musical, following chord progression, harmonic foundation, Monastic chants-choir-sized, multi-tracked, cathedral acoustics emphasized, Rap verses-storytelling focus, clear, purposeful, cinematic narrative, Additional orchestration-brass stabs, timpani hits, epic moments, Chants harmonize-with strings, creating lush, emotional backdrop, Mid-section breakdown-strings solo, building drama, film-score quality, 808s return-with intensity, joined by full percussion, Vocal delivery passionate-dynamic range, quiet-loud shifts, expressive, Bass slides dramatic-scoring scene changes, emotional punctuation, Hi-hats maintain edge-keeping street credibility, preventing over-polish, Choir chants peak-powerful moment, all voices unite, goosebumps, Additional layer-synth pad, warm, filling space, supporting harm

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - Intro (140 BPM) — epic opening: orchestral strings swell (full section), choir monastic pads, timpani hits on every 2 bars; Drill hi-hats will cut through strings after 8 bars; ARR: long 16-bar cinematic intro, siren lead at bar 12; BUS: strings -> tape sat +2dB, choir -> cathedral reverb 60% wet; PROC: orchestral lowcut @40Hz, stereo widen strings after 8 bars; MIX: keep vocals dry bus ready for upfront placement.]
Hodite, zapjevajmo Gospodu, pokliknimo Bogu, gradu spasenja svojega! Izađimo pred lice njegovo s hvalom, u pjesmama pokliknimo mu! 

 (backvocals: Pjevajte Gospodu!)

[Verse 1 - Rap / storytelling; PROC: lead vocal clean chain, de-ess 5–8k, comp 4:1 atk 3–5ms rel 80ms, mild plate reverb 20% send; FX: occasional orchestral stabs (brass) punctuating lines; MIX: 808 lowpass @120Hz for verse, strings lowered -3dB under voice; BUS: vocal -> parallel saturation bus +20% for grit.]
Gospode, kako je mnogo neprijatelja mojih! Mnogi ustaju na me. Mnogi govore za dušu moju: Nema mu pomoći od Boga. Ali ti si, Gospode, štit koji me zaklanja, slava moja; ti podižeš glavu moju. 

 (backvocals: Štit koji me zaklanja.)

[Pre-Chorus - Choir / harmonic lift; PROC: choir multi-tracked (8–12 layers), cathedral convolution reverb 70% wet, strings swell +3dB, HPF sweep 200→1.2k; MIX: duck 808 & hats -6dB under choir; ARR: 4-bar lift into chorus.]
Put je Božji vjeran, riječ Gospodnja čista. On je štit svjema koji se u nj uzdaju. 


 (backvocals: Riječ Gospodnja čista.)

[Chorus - full choir + doubled lead chant; PROC: choir + monastic chant layered with detuned doubles (-10 cents) for width; FX: brass stabs & timpani hits on downbeats; MIX: open 6–12k +2dB, glue bus 1.3:1, keep monosub <120Hz; BUS: choir -> cathedral reverb send 65%]
Gospod je car svagda, dovijeka, nestaće neznabožaca sa zemlje njegove. 

 (backvocals: Gospod je car dovijeka.)

[Verse 2 - storytelling focus; PROC: intimate vocal for first half (low reverb), then wide aggressive chain for second half; FX: low synth pad under second half, pizzicato strings accenting consonants; MIX: keep intelligibility for narrative lines; BUS: vocal -> subtle harmonic exciter @3k.]
Smiluj se na me, Gospode, jer čovjek hoće da me proguta, neprijatelj me svaki dan pritišnjuje. Kad me je strah, jer se u tebe uzdam. Bogom se hvalim za riječ njegovu; u Boga se uzdam, ne bojim se; šta će mi učiniti tijelo? 

 (backvocals: U Boga se uzdam.)

[Bridge — mid-section strings solo (4–8 bars) then choir returns; PROC: strings lead solo with solo violin and warm synth pad; FX: long plate on violin, reverse swell before choir drop; MIX: remove hi-hats, widen strings; ARR: dramatic pause 1 bar then choir crash.]
S tobom razbijam vojsku, i s Bogom svojim skačem preko zida. Tjeram neprijatelje svoje i stižem ih, i ne vraćam se dok ih ne istrijebim. 



 (backvocals: S Bogom svojim.)

[Build-up — 140→142 BPM micro-accel; STACK: choir crescendos, timpani roll, snare build; PROC: automate vocal-bus sat +1→+3dB, strings LPF open 800→10k; MIX: hats re-introduced with trap pattern, 808 slides return, brass stabs align with timpani.]
Ustani, Gospode, u gnjevu svojem; digni se na žestinu neprijatelja mojih; probudi se meni na pomoć, i otvori sud. Od Gospoda je spasenje; neka bude na narodu tvom blagoslov tvoj! 

 (backvocals: Ustani, Gospode — Od Gospoda je spasenje.)

[Final Chorus — choir & strings at full power; PROC: choir multi-tracked 16+ layers, parallel comp 70% blend, tape tails +1.5dB, double lead detune -12 cents; FX: big cinematic riser into final chord; MIX: target -7 LUFS integrated (club) but maintain dynamic peaks for emotion; BUS: master -> subtle stereo width, mono <120Hz.]
Vratiće se u pakao bezbožnici; jer neće svagda biti zaboravljen ubogi, i nada nevoljnicima neće nigda poginuti. Gospod je car svagda, dovijeka.
 (backvocals: Neka ne bude više bezbožnika — Gospod je car.)

[Outro - deconstruct & DJ-tail; BPM ramp 142→130 over 16 bars; PROC: remove hats/top over 12 bars, choir decays with cathedral reverb, strings filtered to 6dB/oct leaving low subs; ARR: provide loopable 8-bar tail (strings pad + monosub slide + dry chant loop); MIX: give DJ a clean 8-bar loop on stems.]
Hodite, zapjevajmo Gospodu; pojte Gospodu, pojte, pojte caru našem. (loopable) 


 (backvocals: Pojte caru našemu)

[Mastering Chain & Reference — target -7 LUFS integrated (club cinematic), True Peak -0.3dB; CHAIN: corrective EQ (gentle dip 200–400Hz -1.5dB to clear choir mid-mud) → multiband comp (tighten 60–120Hz / glue mids) → subtle tape sat +1.2dB → stereo imager (mono <120Hz) → final limiter ceiling -0.3dB → dither 24→16 bit. NOTES: verify on large PA & reference headphones; export stems: strings, choir, 808/sub, hats, lead vocal, FX.]

Put je Božji veran, reč Go-spo-dnja čista. On je štit svima koji se u nj uzdaju.
(backvocals: Reč Go-spo-dnja čista.)

Gospod je Tsar svagda, doveka, nestaće zlo-ga  sa zemlje Njegove. 

 (backvocals: Gospod je Tsar doveka.)

[Verse 2 - storytelling focus; PROC: intimate vocal for first half (low reverb), then wide aggressive chain for second half; FX: low synth pad under second half, pizzicato strings accenting consonants; MIX: keep intelligibility for narrative lines; BUS: vocal -> subtle harmonic exciter @3k.]
Smiluj se na me, Gospode, jer čovek hoće da me 'ad proguta, ne-pri-ja-telj me svaki dan pri-ti-ska. Kad me je strah, setim se u srcu svom - bojati se čega nemam, jer u Tebe  se uzdam. Bogom se hvalim Rečju Nje-go-vom; u Boga se uzdam, ne bojim se; šta mi može čovek te-le-sni? 
(backvocals: U Boga se uzdam.)
(backvocals: Pojte Tsaru našemu)
(backvocals: U Boga se uzdam.)

 (backvocals: U Boga se uzdam.)

[Bridge — mid-section strings solo (4–8 bars) then choir returns; PROC: strings lead solo with solo violin and warm synth pad; FX: long plate on violin, reverse swell before choir drop; MIX: remove hi-hats, widen strings; ARR: dramatic pause 1 bar then choir crash.]
S tobom ra-zbi-jam vojsku (Živ je Gospod!) i da je bla-go-slo-ven (Branič moj!) Ustaše na me (u dan nevolje moje), ali mi Gospod bi potpora. Jer se držah puteva Go-spo-dnjih, Dade mi Gospod po pravdi mojoj


 (backvocals: Puteva Go-spo-dnjih.)

[Build-up — 140→142 BPM micro-accel; STACK: choir crescendos, timpani roll, snare build; PROC: automate vocal-bus sat +1→+3dB, strings LPF open 800→10k; MIX: hats re-introduced with trap pattern, 808 slides return, brass stabs align with timpani.]
Ustani, Gospode, u gnevu svojem; digni se, na že-sti-nu ne-pri-ja-te-lja mojih uz-vra-ti; probudi se meni na pomoć, i otvori sud. Od Go-spo-da je spas; neka bude na narodu Tvom- blagoslov Tvoj! 

 (backvocals: Ustani, Gospode — Od Gospoda je spas.)

[Final Chorus — choir & strings at full power; PROC: choir multi-tracked 16+ layers, parallel comp 70% blend, tape tails +1.5dB, double lead detune -12 cents; FX: big cinematic riser into final chord; MIX: target -7 LUFS integrated (club) but maintain dynamic peaks for emotion; BUS: master -> subtle stereo width, mono <120Hz.]
Vratiće se u pakao zli; jer neće sva-gda biti zaboravljen ubogi, i nada ne-vo-ljni-ci-ma neće nikad nestati! Gospod je Tsar svagda, doveka.
 (backvocals: Neka ne bude više zloga— Gospod je Tsar.)

[Outro - deconstruct & DJ-tail; BPM ramp 142→130 over 16 bars; PROC: remove hats/top over 12 bars, choir decays with cathedral reverb, strings filtered to 6dB/oct leaving low subs; ARR: provide loopable 8-bar tail (strings pad + monosub slide + dry chant loop); MIX: give DJ a clean 8-bar loop on stems.]
Hodite, za-pe-va-jmo Gospodu; pojte Gospodu, pojte, pojte Tsaru našem.

 (backvocals: Pojte Tsaru našemu)

[Mastering Chain & Reference — target -7 LUFS integrated (club cinematic), True Peak -0.3dB; CHAIN: corrective EQ (gentle dip 200–400Hz -1.5dB to clear choir mid-mud) → multiband comp (tighten 60–120Hz / glue mids) → subtle tape sat +1.2dB → stereo imager (mono <120Hz) → final limiter ceiling -0.3dB → dither 24→16 bit. NOTES: verify on large PA & reference headphones; export stems: strings, choir, 808/sub, hats, lead vocal, FX.]

[DESCRIPTION]
At 140 BPM, epic opening-orchestral strings swell, cinematic scope, Drill hi-hats enter-cutting through strings, modern contrast, Heavy 808s-tuned, melodic, playing bassline role, Sliding bass-musical, following chord progression, harmonic foundation, Monastic chants-choir-sized, multi-tracked, cathedral acoustics emphasized, Rap verses-storytelling focus, clear, purposeful, cinematic narrative, Additional orchestration-brass stabs, timpani hits, epic moments, Chants harmonize-with strings, creating lush, emotional backdrop, Mid-section breakdown-strings solo, building drama, film-score quality, 808s return-with intensity, joined by full percussion, Vocal delivery passionate-dynamic range, quiet-loud shifts, expressive, Bass slides dramatic-scoring scene changes, emotional punctuation, Hi-hats maintain edge-keeping street credibility, preventing over-polish, Choir chants peak-powerful moment, all voices unite, goosebumps, Additional layer-synth pad, warm, filling space, supporting harm

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - Intro (140 BPM) — epic opening: orchestral strings swell (full section), choir monastic pads, timpani hits on every 2 bars; Drill hi-hats will cut through strings after 8 bars; ARR: long 16-bar cinematic intro, siren lead at bar 12; BUS: strings -> tape sat +2dB, choir -> cathedral reverb 60% wet; PROC: orchestral lowcut @40Hz, stereo widen strings after 8 bars; MIX: keep vocals dry bus ready for upfront placement.]
Hodite, zapevajmo Gospodu, uskliknimo Bogu, gradu spa-se-nja svo-je-ga! Izađimo pred lice njegovo s hvalom, u pesmama uskliknimo mu!
(backvocals: Pevajte Gospodu!)

[Verse 1 - Rap / storytelling; PROC: lead vocal clean chain, de-ess 5–8k, comp 4:1 atk 3–5ms rel 80ms, mild plate reverb 20% send; FX: occasional orchestral stabs (brass) punctuating lines; MIX: 808 lowpass @120Hz for verse, strings lowered -3dB under voice; BUS: vocal -> parallel saturation bus +20% for grit.]
Gospode, kako je mnogo neprijatelja mojih! Mnogi ustaju na me. Mnogi govore za dušu moju: Nema mu pomoći od Boga. Ali ti si, Gospode, štit koji me zaklanja, slava moja; ti podižeš glavu moju.
(backvocals: Štit koji me zaklanja.)

[Pre-Chorus - Choir / harmonic lift; PROC: choir multi-tracked (8–12 layers), cathedral convolution reverb 70% wet, strings swell +3dB, HPF sweep 200→1.2k; MIX: duck 808 & hats -6dB under choir; ARR: 4-bar lift into chorus.]
Put je Božji veran, reč Go-spo-dnja čista. On je štit svima koji se u nj uzdaju.
(backvocals: Reč Go-spo-dnja čista.)

[Chorus - full choir + doubled lead chant; PROC: choir + monastic chant layered with detuned doubles (-10 cents) for width; FX: brass stabs & timpani hits on downbeats; MIX: open 6–12k +2dB, glue bus 1.3:1, keep monosub <120Hz; BUS: choir -> cathedral reverb send 65%]
Gospod je Tsar svagda, doveka, nestaće zlo-ga  sa zemlje Njegove. 

 (backvocals: Gospod je Tsar doveka.)

[Verse 2 - storytelling focus; PROC: intimate vocal for first half (low reverb), then wide aggressive chain for second half; FX: low synth pad under second half, pizzicato strings accenting consonants; MIX: keep intelligibility for narrative lines; BUS: vocal -> subtle harmonic exciter @3k.]
Smiluj se na me, Gospode, jer čovek hoće da me 'ad proguta, ne-prijatelj me svaki dan pritiska. Kad me je strah, setim se u srcu svom - bojati se čega nemam, jer u Tebe  se uzdam. Bogom se hvalim Rečju Njegovom; u Boga se uzdam, ne bojim se; šta mi može čovek telesni? 
(backvocals: U Boga se uzdam.)
(backvocals: Pojte Tsaru našemu)
(backvocals: U Boga se uzdam.)

 (backvocals: U Boga se uzdam.)

[Bridge — mid-section strings solo (4–8 bars) then choir returns; PROC: strings lead solo with solo violin and warm synth pad; FX: long plate on violin, reverse swell before choir drop; MIX: remove hi-hats, widen strings; ARR: dramatic pause 1 bar then choir crash.]
S tobom razbijam vojsku (Živ je Gospod!) i da je bla-go-slo-ven Branič moj. Ustaše na me u dan nevolje moje, ali mi Gospod bi potpora. Jer se držah puteva Go-spo-dnjih, Dade mi Gospod po pravdi mojoj


 (backvocals: Puteva Go-spo-dnjih.)

[Build-up — 140→142 BPM micro-accel; STACK: choir crescendos, timpani roll, snare build; PROC: automate vocal-bus sat +1→+3dB, strings LPF open 800→10k; MIX: hats re-introduced with trap pattern, 808 slides return, brass stabs align with timpani.]
Ustani, Gospode, u gnjevu svojem; digni se, na žestinu neprijatelja mojih uz-vra-ti; probudi se meni na pomoć, i otvori sud. Od Gospoda je spasenje; neka bude na narodu Tvom- blagoslov Tvoj! 

 (backvocals: Ustani, Gospode — Od Gospoda je spas.)

[Final Chorus — choir & strings at full power; PROC: choir multi-tracked 16+ layers, parallel comp 70% blend, tape tails +1.5dB, double lead detune -12 cents; FX: big cinematic riser into final chord; MIX: target -7 LUFS integrated (club) but maintain dynamic peaks for emotion; BUS: master -> subtle stereo width, mono <120Hz.]
Vratiće se u pakao bezbožnici; jer neće svagda biti zaboravljen ubogi, i nada nevoljnicima neće nikad nestati! Gospod je Tsar svagda, doveka.
 (backvocals: Neka ne bude više zloga— Gospod je Tsar.)

[Outro - deconstruct & DJ-tail; BPM ramp 142→130 over 16 bars; PROC: remove hats/top over 12 bars, choir decays with cathedral reverb, strings filtered to 6dB/oct leaving low subs; ARR: provide loopable 8-bar tail (strings pad + monosub slide + dry chant loop); MIX: give DJ a clean 8-bar loop on stems.]
Hodite, zapevajmo Gospodu; pojte Gospodu, pojte, pojte Tsaru našem.

 (backvocals: Pojte Tsaru našemu)

[Mastering Chain & Reference — target -7 LUFS integrated (club cinematic), True Peak -0.3dB; CHAIN: corrective EQ (gentle dip 200–400Hz -1.5dB to clear choir mid-mud) → multiband comp (tighten 60–120Hz / glue mids) → subtle tape sat +1.2dB → stereo imager (mono <120Hz) → final limiter ceiling -0.3dB → dither 24→16 bit. NOTES: verify on large PA & reference headphones; export stems: strings, choir, 808/sub, hats, lead vocal, FX.]

---

# hardcore_pop - Techilim_Tech_20_Psalmi
[DESCRIPTION]
At 140 BPM, epic opening-orchestral strings swell, cinematic scope, Drill hi-hats enter-cutting through strings, modern contrast, Heavy 808s-tuned, melodic, playing bassline role, Sliding bass-musical, following chord progression, harmonic foundation, Monastic chants-choir-sized, multi-tracked, cathedral acoustics emphasized, Rap verses-storytelling focus, clear, purposeful, cinematic narrative, Additional orchestration-brass stabs, timpani hits, epic moments, Chants harmonize-with strings, creating lush, emotional backdrop, Mid-section breakdown-strings solo, building drama, film-score quality, 808s return-with intensity, joined by full percussion, Vocal delivery passionate-dynamic range, quiet-loud shifts, expressive, Bass slides dramatic-scoring scene changes, emotional punctuation, Hi-hats maintain edge-keeping street credibility, preventing over-polish, Choir chants peak-powerful moment, all voices unite, goosebumps, Additional layer-synth pad, warm, filling space, supporting harm

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - Intro (140 BPM) — epic opening: orchestral strings swell (full section), choir monastic pads, timpani hits on every 2 bars; Drill hi-hats will cut through strings after 8 bars; ARR: long 16-bar cinematic intro, siren lead at bar 12; BUS: strings -> tape sat +2dB, choir -> cathedral reverb 60% wet; PROC: orchestral lowcut @40Hz, stereo widen strings after 8 bars; MIX: keep vocals dry bus ready for upfront placement.]
Hodite, za-pe-vaj-mo Gospodu, u-skli-kni-mo Bogu, gradu spasa svo-ga! Izađimo pred lice Njegovo s hvalom, u pesmama u-skli-kni-mo mu!
(backvocals: Pevajte Gospodu!)

[Verse 1 - Rap / storytelling; PROC: lead vocal clean chain, de-ess 5–8k, comp 4:1 atk 3–5ms rel 80ms, mild plate reverb 20% send; FX: occasional orchestral stabs (brass) punctuating lines; MIX: 808 lowpass @120Hz for verse, strings lowered -3dB under voice; BUS: vocal -> parallel saturation bus +20% for grit.]
Gospode, kako je mnogo ne-pri-ja-te-lja mojih! Mnogi ustaju na me. Mnogi go-vo-re za dušu moju: Nema mu pomoći od Boga. Ali Ti si, Gospode, štit koji me za-kla-nja, Slava moja; ti po-di-žeš glavu moju.
(backvocals: Štit koji me za-kla-nja.)

[Pre-Chorus - Choir / harmonic lift; PROC: choir multi-tracked (8–12 layers), cathedral convolution reverb 70% wet, strings swell +3dB, HPF sweep 200→1.2k; MIX: duck 808 & hats -6dB under choir; ARR: 4-bar lift into chorus.]
Put je Božji veran, reč Go-spo-dnja čista. On je štit svima koji se u nj uzdaju.
(backvocals: Reč Go-spo-dnja čista.)

[Chorus - full choir + doubled lead chant; PROC: choir + monastic chant layered with detuned doubles (-10 cents) for width; FX: brass stabs & timpani hits on downbeats; MIX: open 6–12k +2dB, glue bus 1.3:1, keep monosub <120Hz; BUS: choir -> cathedral reverb send 65%]
Gospod je Tsar svagda, doveka, nestaće zlo-ga  sa zemlje Njegove. 

 (backvocals: Gospod je Tsar doveka.)

[Verse 2 - storytelling focus; PROC: intimate vocal for first half (low reverb), then wide aggressive chain for second half; FX: low synth pad under second half, pizzicato strings accenting consonants; MIX: keep intelligibility for narrative lines; BUS: vocal -> subtle harmonic exciter @3k.]
Smiluj se na me, Gospode, jer čovek hoće da me 'ad proguta, ne-pri-ja-telj me svaki dan pri-ti-ska. Kad me je strah, setim se u srcu svom - bojati se čega nemam, jer u Tebe  se uzdam. Bogom se hvalim Rečju Nje-go-vom; u Boga se uzdam, ne bojim se; šta mi može čovek te-le-sni? 
(backvocals: U Boga se uzdam.)
(backvocals: Pojte Tsaru našemu)
(backvocals: U Boga se uzdam.)

 (backvocals: U Boga se uzdam.)

[Bridge — mid-section strings solo (4–8 bars) then choir returns; PROC: strings lead solo with solo violin and warm synth pad; FX: long plate on violin, reverse swell before choir drop; MIX: remove hi-hats, widen strings; ARR: dramatic pause 1 bar then choir crash.]
S tobom ra-zbi-jam vojsku (Živ je Gospod!) i da je bla-go-slo-ven (Branič moj!) Ustaše na me (u dan nevolje moje), ali mi Gospod bi potpora. Jer se držah puteva Go-spo-dnjih, Dade mi Gospod po pravdi mojoj


 (backvocals: Puteva Go-spo-dnjih.)

[Build-up — 140→142 BPM micro-accel; STACK: choir crescendos, timpani roll, snare build; PROC: automate vocal-bus sat +1→+3dB, strings LPF open 800→10k; MIX: hats re-introduced with trap pattern, 808 slides return, brass stabs align with timpani.]
Ustani, Gospode, u gnevu svojem; digni se, na že-sti-nu ne-pri-ja-te-lja mojih uz-vra-ti; probudi se meni na pomoć, i otvori sud. Od Go-spo-da je spas; neka bude na narodu Tvom- blagoslov Tvoj! 

 (backvocals: Ustani, Gospode — Od Gospoda je spas.)

[Final Chorus — choir & strings at full power; PROC: choir multi-tracked 16+ layers, parallel comp 70% blend, tape tails +1.5dB, double lead detune -12 cents; FX: big cinematic riser into final chord; MIX: target -7 LUFS integrated (club) but maintain dynamic peaks for emotion; BUS: master -> subtle stereo width, mono <120Hz.]
Vratiće se u pakao zli; jer neće sva-gda biti zaboravljen ubogi, i nada ne-vo-ljni-ci-ma neće nikad nestati! Gospod je Tsar svagda, doveka.
 (backvocals: Neka ne bude više zloga— Gospod je Tsar.)

[Outro - deconstruct & DJ-tail; BPM ramp 142→130 over 16 bars; PROC: remove hats/top over 12 bars, choir decays with cathedral reverb, strings filtered to 6dB/oct leaving low subs; ARR: provide loopable 8-bar tail (strings pad + monosub slide + dry chant loop); MIX: give DJ a clean 8-bar loop on stems.]
Hodite, za-pe-va-jmo Gospodu; pojte Gospodu, pojte, pojte Tsaru našem.

 (backvocals: Pojte Tsaru našemu)

[Mastering Chain & Reference — target -7 LUFS integrated (club cinematic), True Peak -0.3dB; CHAIN: corrective EQ (gentle dip 200–400Hz -1.5dB to clear choir mid-mud) → multiband comp (tighten 60–120Hz / glue mids) → subtle tape sat +1.2dB → stereo imager (mono <120Hz) → final limiter ceiling -0.3dB → dither 24→16 bit. NOTES: verify on large PA & reference headphones; export stems: strings, choir, 808/sub, hats, lead vocal, FX.]

 (backvocals: Pojte Tsaru našemu)

Hodite, za-pe-va-jmo Gospodu; pojte Gospodu, pojte, pojte Tsaru našem.

 (backvocals: Pojte Tsaru našemu)

[Mastering Chain & Reference — target -7 LUFS integrated (club cinematic), True Peak -0.3dB; CHAIN: corrective EQ (gentle dip 200–400Hz -1.5dB to clear choir mid-mud) → multiband comp (tighten 60–120Hz / glue mids) → subtle tape sat +1.2dB → stereo imager (mono <120Hz) → final limiter ceiling -0.3dB → dither 24→16 bit. NOTES: verify on large PA & reference headphones; export stems: strings, choir, 808/sub, hats, lead vocal, FX.]

---

# hardcore_pop - Techilim_Tech_3
[DESCRIPTION]
At 128 BPM,track opens-rolling tech house groove,tight 909 kick driving four-on-the-floor.Crisp 16th-note closed hi-hat & shaker layers add bounce.A groovy,filtered bass stab pattern emerges with sidechain pump.A catchy vocal chop hook repeats-pitched & chopped for maximum energy.White noise risers build as tribal percussion fills intensify.
The drop hits:claps on 2 & 4,bouncing bassline locked tight,vocal samples firing-"let's go","hands up".Filtered synth stabs add texture.The breakdown strips-just kick & bass,atmospheric pad swells,building tension.
Build-up intensifies:rapid hi-hats,screaming risers,rolling toms,vocal chops stutter faster.The final drop explodes-distorted bass wobble,extra percussion layers,massive vocal chants echoing wide—pure peak-time energy.
Outro deconstructs:vocal chops fade,bass simplifies,percussion strips to kick & hi-hat.Final bass stab cuts-silence.

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental]
[Female Vocal - Autotuned Tease]
אוֹר... בַּחֹשֶׁךְ...
(back vocal: glitched, robotic echo)

[Instrumental - Main Groove]
[Female - Verse 1]
תַּשִׁיתֵנִי בַבּוֹר תַּחְתִּיּוֹת
בִּשְׁאוֹל תַּחְתִּיּוֹת

חֹשֶׁךְ עָלַי הוּא
צְלָלִים יְכַסּוּנִי

[Female - Verse 2]
שְׁלַח אוֹרְךָ וַאֲמִתֶּךָ
הֵמָה יַדְחֻנִי

יָבִיאוּנִי אֶל-הַר קָדְשְׁךָ
וְאֶל-מִשְׁכ��ּנֹתֶיךָ

[Instrumental - Breather 1]
[Chorus - Drop 1]
יְהוָה מָעוֹזּ חַיַּי
מִי-תִירָא לִי
כִּי-תָאִיר נֵרִי
יְהוָה יִגְאַל-בְּאֵשׁ אֱלֹהַי (עִמָּדִי...)
זְרוֹעַ עֻזּוֹ תִּתְיַצֵּב לִי (דֶּרֶךְ...)
יָסַעַתָּ לִפְנַי וַתַּחְתְּרֵנִי (רָחָק...)

[Instrumental - Breathe 2]
[Female - Verse 3]
יֹשֵׁב בְּסֵתֶר עֶלְיוֹן
בְּצֵל שַׁדַּי יִתְלוֹנָן

אֹמַר לַיהוָה מַחְסִי וּמְצוּדָתִי
אֱלֹהַי אֶבְטַח-בּוֹ

[Vocal Chop]
אָנָה... אָנָה (תִּשְׁכָּחֵנִי...)
(back vocal: heavily distorted, chopped)
אָנָה... אָנָה (תִּשְׁכָּחֵנִי...)

[Instrumental - Build 3]
[Female - Hook - Build Intensity]
בָּרוּךְ יְהוָה צוּרִי
הַמְּלַמֵּד יָדַי לַקְרָב

וְאֶצְבְּעֹתַי לַמִּלְחָמָה
חֶסֶד וֶאֱמֶת יִפְגְּעוּנִי

[Instrumental - Drop 2]
[Chorus - Drop 2]
יְהוָה מָעוֹזּ חַיַּי
מִי-תִירָא לִי
כִּי-תָאִיר נֵרִי
יְהוָה יִגְאַל-בְּאֵשׁ אֱלֹהַי (עִמָּדִי...)
זְרוֹעַ עֻזּוֹ תִּתְיַצֵּב לִי (דֶּרֶךְ...)
יָסַעַתָּ לִפְנַי וַתַּחְתְּרֵנִי (רָחָק...)

[Call & Response Vocals]
יְהוָה נֵרִי וְיִשְׁעִי (אוֹר)
צוּרִי וּמְפַלְטִי (אוֹר)
מָגִנִּי וְקֶרֶן יִשְׁעִי (אוֹר)
מְעוֹזִּי וּמָנוֹסִי (אוֹר)
(: אוֹר חָדָשׁ)
(: אוֹר עוֹלָם)

[Instrumental - Outro]
[Female - Outro]
גַּם כִּי-אֵלֵךְ בְּגֵיא צַלְמָוֶת
לֹא-אִירָא רָע
(back vocal: cut off mid-word)

# hardcore_pop - Techilim_Tech_3
[DESCRIPTION]
At 128 BPM,track opens-rolling tech house groove,tight 909 kick driving four-on-the-floor.Crisp 16th-note closed hi-hat & shaker layers add bounce.A groovy,filtered bass stab pattern emerges with sidechain pump.A catchy vocal chop hook repeats-pitched & chopped for maximum energy.White noise risers build as tribal percussion fills intensify.
The drop hits:claps on 2 & 4,bouncing bassline locked tight,vocal samples firing-"let's go","hands up".Filtered synth stabs add texture.The breakdown strips-just kick & bass,atmospheric pad swells,building tension.
Build-up intensifies:rapid hi-hats,screaming risers,rolling toms,vocal chops stutter faster.The final drop explodes-distorted bass wobble,extra percussion layers,massive vocal chants echoing wide—pure peak-time energy.
Outro deconstructs:vocal chops fade,bass simplifies,percussion strips to kick & hi-hat.Final bass stab cuts-silence.

[LYRICS]

# hardcore_pop - Techilim_Tech_3
[DESCRIPTION]
At 128 BPM,track opens-rolling tech house groove,tight 909 kick driving four-on-the-floor.Crisp 16th-note closed hi-hat & shaker layers add bounce.A groovy,filtered bass stab pattern emerges with sidechain pump.A catchy vocal chop hook repeats-pitched & chopped for maximum energy.White noise risers build as tribal percussion fills intensify.
The drop hits:claps on 2 & 4,bouncing bassline locked tight,vocal samples firing-"let's go","hands up".Filtered synth stabs add texture.The breakdown strips-just kick & bass,atmospheric pad swells,building tension.
Build-up intensifies:rapid hi-hats,screaming risers,rolling toms,vocal chops stutter faster.The final drop explodes-distorted bass wobble,extra percussion layers,massive vocal chants echoing wide—pure peak-time energy.
Outro deconstructs:vocal chops fade,bass simplifies,percussion strips to kick & hi-hat.Final bass stab cuts-silence.

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental]
[Female Vocal - Autotuned Tease]

(back vocal: glitched, robotic echo)

# hardcore_pop - Techilim_Tech_4
[DESCRIPTION]
At 128 BPM,track opens-rolling tech house groove,tight 909 kick driving four-on-the-floor.Crisp 16th-note closed hi-hat & shaker layers add bounce.A groovy,filtered bass stab pattern emerges with sidechain pump.A catchy vocal chop hook repeats-pitched & chopped for maximum energy.White noise risers build as tribal percussion fills intensify.
The drop hits:claps on 2 & 4,bouncing bassline locked tight,vocal samples firing-"let's go","hands up".Filtered synth stabs add texture.The breakdown strips-just kick & bass,atmospheric pad swells,building tension.
Build-up intensifies:rapid hi-hats,screaming risers,rolling toms,vocal chops stutter faster.The final drop explodes-distorted bass wobble,extra percussion layers,massive vocal chants echoing wide—pure peak-time energy.
Outro deconstructs:vocal chops fade,bass simplifies,percussion strips to kick & hi-hat.Final bass stab cuts-silence.

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - Intro/Groove]
(Sound: A rolling tech house groove begins. A tight 909 kick drives a four-on-the-floor beat. Crisp 16th-note closed hi-hats and shaker layers add bounce. A groovy, filtered bass stab pattern emerges with a sidechain pump.)

[Vocal Chop Hook]
(Sound: A catchy vocal chop hook repeats, pitched and chopped for maximum energy. White noise risers build as tribal percussion fills intensify.)

קוּמָה... קוּ-קוּמָה... קוּמָה

[Chorus - Drop 1]
(Sound: The drop hits. Claps on 2 & 4, a bouncing bassline locked tight. Filtered synth stabs add texture.)

יְהוָה יִשְׁמְעֶךָ בְּיוֹם צָרָה
יְשַׁעְךָ יְצַפְּצֵף לָךְ
יַעַן תִּשְׁבַּע בְּשֵׁם יְהוָה
(קוּמָה!)
(רוּמוּ!)

[Instrumental - Breakdown]
(Sound: The track strips back to just kick and bass. An atmospheric pad swells, building tension.)

[Verse - Breakdown]
(Sound: A single, clear vocal enters over the minimal beat and swelling pad.)

צָמְאָה נַפְשִׁי לֵאלֹהִים
לְאֵל חָי
אָמַרְתִּי לְאֱלֹהַי, צוּרִי
לָמָה שְׁכַחְתָּנִי

[Instrumental - Build-up]
(Sound: The build-up intensifies with rapid hi-hats, screaming risers, and rolling toms.)

[Vocal Chop - Build-up]
(Sound: Vocal chops stutter faster, riding the risers to the peak.)

אֲדֹנָי... הוֹשִׁיעָה... הוֹ-הוֹשִׁיעָה... הוֹשִׁיעָה

[Chorus - Drop 2]
(Sound: The final drop explodes with a distorted bass wobble, extra percussion layers, and massive vocal chants echoing wide.)

עָזִּי וְזִמְרָת יָהּ
וַיְהִי-לִי לִישׁוּעָה
(הוֹשִׁיעָה! הוֹשִׁיעָה!)
(יְהוָה! יְהוָה!)

[Instrumental - Outro]
(Sound: The track deconstructs. The massive chants fade, the bass simplifies, and percussion strips back to just kick and hi-hat.)

[Vocal Fade - Outro]
(Sound: A single, fading vocal word repeats over the minimal beat.)

חֶסֶד... חֶסֶד... חֶסֶד...

[Final Hit]
(Sound: A final bass stab cuts to absolute silence.)

---

# hardcore_pop - Techilim_Tech_4
[DESCRIPTION]
At 128 BPM,track opens-rolling tech house groove,tight 909 kick driving four-on-the-floor.Crisp 16th-note closed hi-hat & shaker layers add bounce.A groovy,filtered bass stab pattern emerges with sidechain pump.A catchy vocal chop hook repeats-pitched & chopped for maximum energy.White noise risers build as tribal percussion fills intensify.
The drop hits:claps on 2 & 4,bouncing bassline locked tight,vocal samples firing-"let's go","hands up".Filtered synth stabs add texture.The breakdown strips-just kick & bass,atmospheric pad swells,building tension.
Build-up intensifies:rapid hi-hats,screaming risers,rolling toms,vocal chops stutter faster.The final drop explodes-distorted bass wobble,extra percussion layers,massive vocal chants echoing wide—pure peak-time energy.
Outro deconstructs:vocal chops fade,bass simplifies,percussion strips to kick & hi-hat.Final bass stab cuts-silence.

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - Intro/Groove]
(Sound: A rolling tech house groove begins. A tight 909 kick drives a four-on-the-floor beat. Crisp 16th-note closed hi-hats and shaker layers add bounce. A groovy, filtered bass stab pattern emerges with a sidechain pump.)

אָמַרְתִּי לְאֱלֹהַי, צוּרִי
לָמָה שְׁכַחְתָּנִי

[Instrumental - Build-up]
(Sound: The build-up intensifies with rapid hi-hats, screaming risers, and rolling toms.)

[Vocal Chop - Build-up]
(Sound: Vocal chops stutter faster, riding the risers to the peak.)

אֲדֹנָי... הוֹשִׁיעָה... הוֹ-הוֹשִׁיעָה... הוֹשִׁיעָה

[Chorus - Drop 2]
(Sound: The final drop explodes with a distorted bass wobble, extra percussion layers, and massive vocal chants echoing wide.)

עָזִּי וְזִמְרָת יָהּ
וַיְהִי-לִי לִישׁוּעָה
(הוֹשִׁיעָה! הוֹשִׁיעָה!)
(יְהוָה! יְהוָה!)

[Instrumental - Outro]
(Sound: The track deconstructs. The massive chants fade, the bass simplifies, and percussion strips back to just kick and hi-hat.)

[Vocal Fade - Outro]
(Sound: A single, fading vocal word repeats over the minimal beat.)

חֶסֶד... חֶסֶד... חֶסֶד...

[Final Hit]
(Sound: A final bass stab cuts to absolute silence.)

# hardcore_pop - Techilim_Tech_6_Psalmi
[DESCRIPTION]
At 128 BPM, the track opens with a driving tech house groove, tight 909 kick propelling the four-on-the-floor beat. Crisp 16th-note hi-hats and shaker layers create rhythmic bounce. A groovy, filtered bass pattern emerges with sidechain pumping. An infectious vocal chop hook repeats, processed with pitch and time manipulation for maximum energy. White noise risers build as tribal percussion elements intensify. The drop delivers claps on beats 2 & 4, a bouncing bassline locked tight, and vocal samples - "move with me", "raise your hands". Filtered synth stabs add harmonic texture. The breakdown reduces to kick and bass foundation, atmospheric pads swelling to build anticipation. The build-up intensifies with accelerating hi-hats, dramatic risers, and rolling tom patterns. Vocal chops stutter faster, riding the energy to the peak. The final drop explodes with distorted bass wobble, additional percussion layers, and massive vocal chants echoing across the stereo field. The outro systemati

Ра-ду-јем се и ве-се-лим се о теби, пјевам имену твојему, Вишњи! (Псалам 9:2)

# hardcore_pop - Techilim_Tech_7_Psalmi
[DESCRIPTION]
The track commences at 128 BPM with a rolling tech house groove, punchy 909 kick driving the four-on-the-floor foundation. Intricate 16th-note closed hi-hats and shaker textures create rhythmic bounce. A groovy, filtered bass sequence enters with pumping sidechain compression. A catchy vocal chop hook repeats, pitched and chopped for maximum impact. White noise risers build as tribal percussion fills intensify. The drop hits with claps on 2 & 4, a bouncing bassline locked tight, and vocal samples firing - "jump up", "feel the flow". Filtered synth stabs add textural depth. The breakdown strips back to just kick and bass, atmospheric pads swelling to build tension. The build-up accelerates with rapid hi-hats, screaming risers, and rolling toms. Vocal chops stutter faster, building anticipation. The final drop explodes with distorted bass wobble, extra percussion layers, and massive vocal chants with wide spatial effects. The outro gradually deconstructs: vocal chops fade, bass simplifie

# hardcore_pop - Techilim_Tech_Srpski_Drill_Psalmi
[DESCRIPTION]
A high-energy Serbian drill banger at 135 BPM with aggressive, sliding 808s and relentless, stuttering hi-hats anchoring the rhythm. Clipped, distorted bass and hard-edged, punchy percussion drive the track. Sparse, fragmented hooks accent sharp melodies, while intensely processed, rapid crew vocals trade off for a menacing, brutal texture.

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - Intro (135 BPM) - drill foundation: 808 mono <120Hz, kick 40–80Hz +2dB, HPF @30Hz; BUS: drumbus glue 2:1 fast, tape sat +1.2dB; ARR: 8-bar DJ-friendly intro, siren bar 7.]
(Neprijatelji okolo mene)

[Verse 1 - dry-aggressive lead; PROC: de-ess 5–8k, comp 4:1 atk 4ms rel 70ms, low-cut 80Hz, +2dB @3.5–4k; FX: short room 10ms, doubles 2–4ms; MIX: leave -4dB lead headroom, sidechain sub to kick.*]
Gospode, kako je mnogo neprijatelja mojih! (mnogo)
Mnogi ustaju na me (na me)
Mnogi govore za dušu moju: Nema mu pomoći od Boga (nema pomoći)
Ali ti si, Gospode, štit koji me zaklanja (štit)
Slava moja; ti podižeš glavu moju (podižeš)
Ne bojim se mnogo tisuća naroda što sa svijeh strana navaljuje na me (ne bojim se)

[Pre-Chorus - 2-bar riser lead-in; PROC: HPF sweep 400→2.4k, transient +2dB, delay 1/16 lowpass 3.5k; MIX: duck pad -3dB.*]
Jer Gospod zna put pravednički (zna put)
A put bezbožnički propašće (propašće)
On će suditi vasionome svijetu po pravdi (po pravdi)
Usudiće narodima pravo (pravo)

[Chorus - group chant + lead doubled; PROC: vocal comp 3.5–4:1 atk 5ms rel 100ms, parallel comp 35% blend, exciter +2dB @8–12k, detune layer -12 cents; BUS: vocal-bus tape +1dB, low-mid dip 200–350Hz -1.5dB; MIX: monosub <120Hz.*]
Nijesu takvi bezbožnici (nije)
Nego su kao prah koji rasipa vjetar (kao prah)
Zato se neće bezbožnici održati na sudu (neće održati)
Jer Gospod je car svagda, dovijeka (dovijeka)
Nestaće neznabožaca sa zemlje njegove (nestaće)

[Verse 2 - saturated consonants; PROC: comp 4:1 atk 3–5ms rel 60–80ms, +1.5dB 2.5–5k, micro-shift doubles -6 cents 12% wet; MIX: pull sub -2–3dB under vocal breaks.*]
Ustani, Gospode, pomozi mi, Bože moj (pomozi mi)
Jer ti udaraš po obrazu sve neprijatelje moje (udaraš)
Razbijaš zube bezbožnicima (razbijaš)
Od Gospoda je spasenje (spasenje)
Neka bude na narodu tvom blagoslov tvoj (blagoslov)
Jer ti pomažeš ljudima nevoljnim (pomažeš)
A oči ponosite ponižavaš (ponižavaš)

[Pre-Chorus - 2-bar riser lead-in; PROC: HPF sweep 400→2.4k, transient +2dB, delay 1/16 lowpass 3.5k; MIX: duck pad -3dB.*]
Jer Gospod zna put pravednički (zna put)
A put bezbožnički propašće (propašće)
On će suditi vasionome svijetu po pravdi (po pravdi)
Usudiće narodima pravo (pravo)

[Chorus - group chant + lead doubled; PROC: vocal comp 3.5–4:1 atk 5ms rel 100ms, parallel comp 35% blend, exciter +2dB @8–12k, detune layer -12 cents; BUS: vocal-bus tape +1dB, low-mid dip 200–350Hz -1.5dB; MIX: monosub <120Hz.*]
Nijesu takvi bezbožnici (nije)
Nego su kao prah koji rasipa vjetar (kao prah)
Zato se neće bezbožnici održati na sudu (neće održati)
Jer Gospod je car svagda, dovijeka (dovijeka)
Nestaće neznabožaca sa zemlje njegove (nestaće)

[Bridge - atmospheric transition; PROC: vocal comp 3:1 atk 10ms rel 120ms, +1.5dB @2–4k, reverb 25% wet, delay 1/8; MIX: pull back drums -3dB, increase pad presence +2dB.*]
Gospod je krjepost života mojega (krjepost)
Koga da se strašim? (koga?)
Ako protiv mene vojska u oko stane (vojska)
Neće se uplašiti srce moje (neće)
Jer ti si Bog koji neće bezakonja (neće)
U tebe nema mjesta ko je zao (nema)

[Build-up - 135→140 BPM micro-accel; STACK: octave risers, gated arp, snare roll +6dB over 8–16 bars; PROC: automate vocal-bus sat +1→+2.2dB, synth LPF 1→8k; MIX: riser stem -6dB for DJ use.*]
Ustani, Gospode, u gnjevu svojem (ustani)
Digni se na žestinu neprijatelja mojih (digni se)
Probudi se meni na pomoć (na pomoć)
I otvori sud (otvori sud)

[Final Chorus - full-spectrum; PROC: double lead + detune -10–15 cents, parallel comp 60% wet, excite +2.5dB @10k, tape tails +1.2dB; MIX: open 6–12k +1.5dB, glue mixbus 1.5:1, keep monosub <120Hz, target -7 LUFS integrated on master for club.*]
Nijesu takvi bezbožnici (nije)
Nego su kao prah koji rasipa vjetar (kao prah)
Zato se neće bezbožnici održati na sudu (neće održati)
Jer Gospod je car svagda, dovijeka (dovijeka)
Nestaće neznabožaca sa zemlje njegove (nestaće)

[Outro - deconstruct & DJ-tail; BPM ramp 140→125; PROC: remove hats/top over 12 bars, plate 60–70% wet on last vocal, LP tail 6dB/oct start -6s, keep crackle -12dB; ARR: provide loopable 8-bar tail: monosub + riser + dry vocal.*]
Jer Gospod je car svagda (car svagda)
Dovijeka (dovijeka)
Nestaće neznabožaca sa zemlje njegove (nestaće)
Jer Gospod je car svagda (car svagda)
Dovijeka (dovijeka)

[Mastering Chain & Reference - target -7 LUFS integrated (club), True Peak -0.3dB; CHAIN: corrective EQ (dip 200–400Hz -1–2dB) → multiband comp (tighten 60–120Hz / glue mids) → subtle tape sat +1–1.8dB → stereo imager (mono <120Hz) → final limiter ceiling -0.3dB → dither 24→16 bit. NOTES: send master -2 to -3dB headroom pre-limit; verify on club PA and earbuds.*]

# hardcore_pop - Tehilim_Tech_11_Psalmi
[DESCRIPTION]
t 150 BPM,track opens-dark warehouse vibe,deep rumbling sub-bass,tight kick pattern.Stripped accordion motif loops-heavily filtered,unrecognizable.Minimal percussion-just kick,rimshot,shaker creating hypnotic groove.Processed vocal snippet repeats-robotic,detuned,buried in reverb.No build-ups,just evolving layers.Distorted brass stabs appear sporadically-surgical,precise.Sidechain pumps relentlessly against droning bassline.Mid-section introduces glitchy hi-hat patterns,stuttering effects.Original melody appears briefly-warped beyond recognition through bitcrusher.Track maintains constant intensity-no drops,just sustained pressure.Filtered white noise sweeps add texture.Percussion shifts slightly-adding claps,removing shaker,keeping momentum.Vocal chops become more fractured-time-stretched,reversed.Bass modulates subtly-filter sweeps,slight pitch bends.Final section strips to core elements-kick,bass,accordion ghost.Abrupt ending-no fade,just stops.Pure underground techno ruthlessness.

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - Intro/Groove]
(Sound: A rolling tech house groove begins. A tight 909 kick drives a four-on-the-floor beat. Crisp 16th-note closed hi-hats and shaker layers add bounce. A groovy, filtered bass stab pattern emerges with a sidechain pump.)

[Vocal Chop Hook]
(Sound: A catchy vocal chop hook repeats, pitched and chopped for maximum energy. White noise risers build as tribal percussion fills intensify.)

Где си?... Гд-где си?... Где си?

[Chorus - Drop 1]
(Sound: The drop hits. Claps on 2 & 4, a bouncing bassline locked tight. Filtered synth stabs add texture.)

Змија рече жени: Нећете ви умрети.
Бог зна да ће вам се отворити очи.

[Instrumental - Breakdown]
(Sound: The track strips back to just kick and bass. An atmospheric pad swells, building tension.)

[Verse - Breakdown]
(Sound: A single, clear vocal enters over the minimal beat and swelling pad.)

Тада им се отворише очи, и видеше да су голи.

[Instrumental - Build-up]
(Sound: The build-up intensifies with rapid hi-hats, screaming risers, and rolling toms.)

[Vocal Chop - Build-up]
(Sound: Vocal chops stutter faster, riding the risers to the peak.)

Проклет... Проклета је земља...

[Chorus - Drop 2]
(Sound: The final drop explodes with a distorted bass wobble, extra percussion layers, and massive vocal chants echoing wide.)

Lead Vocal:
У зноју лица свог јешћеш хлеб, докле се не вратиш у земљу.

Background Chants (wide reverb, delayed):
Прах си... и у прах ћеш се вратити...

[Instrumental - Outro]
(Sound: The track deconstructs. The massive chants fade, the bass simplifies, and percussion strips back to just kick and hi-hat.)

[Vocal Fade - Outro]
(Sound: A single, fading vocal word repeats over the minimal beat.)

Изгнао... Изгнао... Изгнао...

[Final Hit]
(Sound: A final bass stab cuts to absolute silence.)

# hardcore_pop - Tehilim_Tech_12_Psalmi
[DESCRIPTION]
t 150 BPM,track opens-dark warehouse vibe,deep rumbling sub-bass,tight kick pattern.Stripped accordion motif loops-heavily filtered,unrecognizable.Minimal percussion-just kick,rimshot,shaker creating hypnotic groove.Processed vocal snippet repeats-robotic,detuned,buried in reverb.No build-ups,just evolving layers.Distorted brass stabs appear sporadically-surgical,precise.Sidechain pumps relentlessly against droning bassline.Mid-section introduces glitchy hi-hat patterns,stuttering effects.Original melody appears briefly-warped beyond recognition through bitcrusher.Track maintains constant intensity-no drops,just sustained pressure.Filtered white noise sweeps add texture.Percussion shifts slightly-adding claps,removing shaker,keeping momentum.Vocal chops become more fractured-time-stretched,reversed.Bass modulates subtly-filter sweeps,slight pitch bends.Final section strips to core elements-kick,bass,accordion ghost.Abrupt ending-no fade,just stops.Pure underground techno ruthlessness.

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - Intro/Groove]
(Sound: Dark warehouse vibe, deep rumbling sub-bass, tight kick pattern. Stripped accordion motif loops, heavily filtered. Minimal percussion - kick, rimshot, shaker creating a hypnotic groove.)

[Vocal Chop Hook]
(Sound: Processed vocal snippet repeats - robotic, detuned, buried in reverb.)

Тама... Та-та-ма... Тама...

[Vocal Layer 1]
(Sound: Distorted brass stabs appear sporadically - surgical, precise. Sidechain pumps relentlessly.)

Земља беше без обличја и пуста, и беше тама над безданом.

[Vocal Layer 2]
(Sound: Glitchy hi-hat patterns and stuttering effects are introduced. Vocal chops become more fractured.)

Боже, Боже мој, зашто си ме оставио удаљивши се од спасења мојега?

[Mid-Section Vocal]
(Sound: Original melody appears briefly - warped beyond recognition through a bitcrusher.)

Чух глас Твој у врту, па се поплаших, јер сам го, те се сакрих.

[Final Vocal Section]
(Sound: Track strips to core elements - kick, bass, accordion ghost. Vocal chops are time-stretched, reversed.)

Избави... ду... шу мо... ју...

[Final Hit]
(Sound: Abrupt ending - no fade, just stops.)

Telo uz telo gorimo ko u plamenu
Osećam tvoju kosu tu na mome ramenu
Želim da skinem tvoju usku suknju lanenu
Tako hoću da te volim

Pogled mi klizi niz njene obline
Ko dvoranj u prizmi diže me na visine
Sve je bliže i bliže ko da uragan stiže

([reverb] - senke, senke)
Dodir ko plamen usne crvene ko vino
([chopped] - plamen-vino)
Ja bih je popio al samo je gledam mirno
([delay] - gledam te, gledam te)
Pogled mi klizi niz njene obline
([echo] - niz obline)
Ko dvoranj u prizmi diže me na visine
([octave_up] - visine, visine)
Sve je bliže i bliže ko da uragan stiže
([flanger] - stiže, stiže)
Mala od čokolade
([echo] - čokolade, čokolade)

[Chorus]
Telo uz telo gorimo ko u plamenu
([echo] - telo uz telo)
Osećam tvoju kosu tu na mome ramenu
([reverb] - mmm, na ramenu)
Želim da skinem tvoju usku suknju lanenu
([chopped] - suknju-lanenu)
Tako hoću da te volim prljavu i vatrenu
([flanger] - prljavu-vatrenu)
Telo uz telo gorimo ko u plamenu
([echo] - gorimo, gorimo)
Osećam tvoju kosu tu na mome ramenu
([whisper] - bliže, bliže)
Želim da skinem tvoju usku suknju lanenu
([reverb] - aaah)
Tako hoću da te volim prljavu i vatrenu
([chopped] - volim-volim-te)

[Instrumental]
([vox_fx] - aaah… mmm… telo uz telo…)

[Verse 2]
Letnje noći su najbolje kad se vozimo kroz grad noćni
([echo] - noćni, noćni)
Ja bez krova samo mesec iznad nas
([reverb] - iznad nas)
Ona sve zna ona dobro zna da se folira
([chopped] - zna, zna)
Ego stvorila ledena kraljica
([flanger] - kraljica)
U mraku sami samo ti i ja
([whisper] - ti i ja)
Baš si spremna da mi ukradeš miran rad
([echo] - ukradeš, ukradeš)
Dok se lagano njišeš usne k'o kavijar
([reverb] - mmm)
Tako me se gledaš to me fascinira
([chopped] - fascinira-ra-ra)

[Instrumental]
([vox_fx] - aaah… mmm… ramenu… prljavu i vatrenu…)
