# hardcore_pop - Ten outta Ten_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
An 133 bpm underground dynamic raw slap tech house track , zurle, organ,car siren, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals, cowbell

[LYRICS]
[Verse]
Who's that body
([Zurle motif stab — ZUR-le])
Lookin' like a ten out of ten
([Vinyl pop — pft])
Heaven sent
([Breath exhale — haaah])
You can bet
([Organ stab on downbeat — org-stab])
That body count
([Sidechained sub nudge — rrrrrr])
It got no end
([Traffic hum bed — mmmmmmrum])
God
([Whispered echo — ssst])
How'd you get a body like that?
([Tire screech short fill — skreech])
With the body like that
([Finger snap — snap])
It's a wrap
([Car siren micro-stab — neenaw])
Make the world go round and back
([Kick groove + zurle reply — boom + ZUR-le])
'Round and back
([Reverse sweep tail — whooom])

[Verse]
We ain't gotta rush
([Breath inhale — haaah])
There's no need to play pretend
([Vinyl crackle bed — pftcrackle])
You ain't gotta be scared
([Whispered backing — ooo])
Just go and tell your friends
([Crowd murmur short — mmmrum])
Ain't nobody else like me
([Sub wobble — wubwub])
No
([Snap center — snap])
I can do it better than before
([Zurle flourish — zur-flourish])
Can't nobody do it like me
([Vocal chop echo — koo-koo])
No
([Breath laugh — heh])
I can do it better than before
([Organ stab + kick — org-stab + boom])

[Verse]
What you doin' with a body like that?
([Whispered echo — ssst])
When the beat go boom
([Kick slam — boom])
You react
([Snare tick — tchk])
Got a room full of doom
([Crowd swell low — mmmrum])
But you stay with the pack
([Footstep groove — tapptap])
Stay with the pack
([Finger snap double — snap-snap])
It's a wrap
([Car siren brief — teenoonee])

[Verse]
And your body so bad
([Glass clink soft — clink])
Can't help it when I act
([Breath exhale close — haaah])
Body count
([Sidechained sub nudge — rrrrrr])
Runnin' up the stat
([Coin drop accent — cling])
Got you caught in a trance
([Vocal reverb swell — whooom])
In a trance
([Zurle long tail — ZUR-le-oo])

# hardcore_pop - To The End_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
A dark, rolling UK tech-house rework at 126 BPM with a wobbling, elastic mid-bass that pumps against a tight, punchy kick for a relentless underground bounce. Crisp claps, short percs, woodblock ticks, and 1/8 hats push a steady forward groove, while the vocal—raw, emotional, slightly broken—gets chopped into hypnotic stutters like “feelin’ down,” “stone in my shoe,” and “get out of this town” that lock rhythmically to the bassline. Verses stay stripped-back, dry, and intimate, letting the sadness of the original lyrics contrast heavily with the playful, club-ready drops. Builds rise through snare ramps, vocal risers, filtered bass movement, and silence before explosive wobble-driven drops hit. The remix blends melancholy storytelling with cheeky dance-floor energy, creating a tension between despair and motion—perfect for late-night dark rooms and big festival tents.

[LYRICS]
[GlobalMix–UK Dark Tech House ~126 BPM. Kick: tight/punchy 60–90 Hz, short tail. Bass: rolling UK wobble, LFO-driven, sidechained 6–8 dB, mid growl 200–800 Hz. Hats: 1/8 + 1/16 ghosts, HPF>350 Hz. Claps bright 4–7 kHz. Perc: clicks, woodblocks, filtered noise. Vox: emotional male, close/forward, dry in verses; slap delay on line ends; chops used in intro/drops. FX: reverse breaths, snare ramps, noise risers, pitch-down fills. Master: -6.5 LUFS, wide stereo.]

⭐ DJ INTRO — Vocal Chop Loop

([VoxChop1/8] – “feelin’… feelin’…” stretched)
([VoxStutter] – “down… down…”)
([BassFilter] – lowpassed wobble)
([TickPerc] – tight woodblock ticks)

⭐ GROOVE LOOP A — Biscits Bounce

([VoxLoop08] – from “stone in my shoe…”)
([VoxDelayShort] – micro slap on “down”)
([BassOpen] – progressive filter opening)

⭐ VERSE 1 — Dry, Intimate, Minimal

I woke up this morning with the pain in my head
 ([VoxCloseDry])

And I'm feelin' down
 ([KickSoft] + [SlapDelayShort])

I fell asleep in the shower on the bathroom floor
 ([PluckLowMuted])

And I'm feelin' down
 ([HatGhost1/16])

I wanna throw this beer can at the man I love
 ([BassHintLPF])

But I'm feelin' down
 ([ReverseBreathFX])

There's a stone in my shoe
 ([PadWarmLow])

There's a stone in my bed
 ([PercClick])

And I can't sit down
 ([MiniRise])

I gotta get out of this town
 ([VoxDryMono])

And I'm feeling
 ([PreDropChop] – “feelin’…”)

I gotta get out of this town
 ([SnareLift1/8])

And I'm feeling
 ([VoxStutterRise])

I gotta get out of this town
 ([Silence1beat])

And I'm feeling down
 ([DropTeaseBass])

⭐ BUILD 1 — Rising Tension

([SnareRoll] – 1/4 → 1/8 → 1/16)
([VoxChopRise] – “down… down… down…”)
([NoiseUp])
([BassHPF] – tighten pump)

Break bar:
([VoxWhisper] – “get out… get out…”)

⭐ DROP 1 — Main Wobble Drop

([BassFull] – growly wobble, wide)
([ClapWide])
([OpenHat])

([VoxChopHook] – “feelin’ down… feelin’ down…”)

Lyric converted to rhythmic stab:
“I can't sit down”
→ ([VoxStab1/4] – “sit… down… sit-down”)

⭐ VERSE 2 — Deeper, Moodier

I know my time is coming
 ([VoxCloseDry])

But it isn't right now
 ([KickSoft])

And I'm feeling down
 ([SlapDelayShort])

I see the future right in front of me
 ([PluckLowMuted])

But I'm stuck in the past
 ([BassHintLPF])

And I'm feeling down
 ([HatGhost])

I see my children in the clouds
 ([PadWideLow])

And they're calling me home
 ([ReverseBreathFX])

But I'm feeling down
 ([PercClick])

There's a stone in my shoe
 ([PadWarm])

There's a stone in my bed
 ([PercTick])

And I can't sit down
 ([MiniRise])

I gotta get out of this town
 ([VoxDryMono])

And I'm feeling
 ([PreDropChop])

I gotta get out of this town
 ([SnareLift])

And I'm feeling
 ([VoxStutterRise])

I gotta get out of this town
 ([SilenceCue])

And I'm feeling down
 ([DropTeaseBass])

⭐ BREAK — Spoken Fragment

([VoxSpokenLow] – “I’m feeling down… I’m stuck here…”)
([FXVerbShort])
([VoxPitchDown] – “down… down…”)

⭐ GROOVE LOOP B — New Chop Pattern

([VoxChopHi] – “stone in my shoe… stone…”)
([VoxChopLow] – “get out… get out…”)
([BassSync] – syncopated wobble)

⭐ DROP 2 — Extended Peak Drop

([BassGrowl] – more distortion)
([HatRide])
([VoxLayered] – stacked chops: “feelin’ down… get out…”)
([StabSync])
([ReverbThrow] – last “down”)

⭐ OUTRO — DJ Friendly

([Kick+BassOnly])
([FilterLP])
([VoxChopFade])

---

# hardcore_pop - Toi_Moi_Hardcore_Pop_2a

# hardcore_pop - Try Aggain_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
Bouncy underground slap-club Balkan oriental pop at ~124 BPM, built on a tight, punchy kick and rubbery slap bass driving a constant dance-floor pulse. Drums are crisp and dynamic, with 1/8 hats, occasional 1/16 rolls, and snappy claps sitting over wide pads, organ stabs, and subtle oriental plucks/gusle-style leads that answer the vocal. Car honks and short tire-screech sweeps act as rhythmic fills and risers, always tucked around the vocal. The lead voice is silk-smooth, intimate and emotional, completely natural with no autotune, treated with tasteful compression, light saturation, a short plate, and tempo-synced delays on key phrases. Choruses hit louder and wider with stacked “try again” chants and subtle background harmonies, turning the mantra into a cathartic club hook while the groove stays non-stop, energetic, and ready for the dance floor from start to finish.

[LYRICS]
[Verse]
[Beat–Bouncy underground slap-club groove ~122–126 BPM, tight punchy kick+slap house bass, snappy clap/snare with small room verb, 1/8 hats with subtle 1/16 fills. Low oriental pluck/gusle-style synth answering some phrases. Car honks and tire-screech sweeps used as short FX between lines, never over vocals.]
[Vocal–Silk-smooth, close and natural, no autotune. Gentle compression, light tube saturation, clear top end, short plate reverb and tight slap delay only on selected words.]
We start to kiss
(soft bg: whispered “kiss, kiss” panned L/R, very low)
Then I feel you back away (Back away)
[Delay–1/8 note echo just on “back away” fading in stereo]
Now I missed (Missed)
(short stereo double on “missed”)
And my target is delayed (Delayed)
(throw delay on “delayed”, 1/4 note, filtered highs)
Time to switch (Switch)
[FX–Quick car-honk stab on beat right after “switch”]
I need more cards to play
(subtle rising pad swell under this bar)
I need a little more play
(kick+bass slightly accent this bar; tiny tire-screech riser into next section)
I

[Chorus]
[Beat–Drums + bass + oriental synth energy up +1–2 dB vs verse; hats more open, extra clap layer. Pads wider in stereo. Maintain non-stop dance groove.]
[Vocal–Hook stacked: lead center, 2 light doubles L/R on some “again”, no autotune, just smooth consistent tone. Slightly longer reverb tail on hook phrases; tempo-synced 1/8 delay tucked under last “again” of each group.]
Try again
Again
Try again
Again
Try again
Again
Try again
Again
[BG–low chant “try again, try again” underneath every second line, compressed and wide]
Try again
Again
Try again
Again
Try again
Again
Try again
Again

[Verse]
[Beat–Drop energy just a notch from chorus: same groove, slightly less bright hats, more space for storytelling. Add subtle oriental lead fragments between every 2 bars. Keep car/tire FX minimal here.]
[Vocal–Very intimate and dynamic: fast but gentle compression to control peaks, less delay than chorus, same reverb. No pitch FX.]
I tried to fly
(Fell to the ground)
[FX–Short falling whoosh + tiny “impact” thump layered with kick on “ground”]
I tried to run
(Tripped on the clouds)
[FX–Tire-screech swipe into small stutter on “tripped”]
I tried to float
(pads open slightly, airy high synth supporting)
I tried to sink
(kick+bass momentarily filter darker on this line)
I tried to think
And let it go
[Delay–Subtle 1/4 delay only on “let it go”, filtered, low in mix]
I tried to soar
(Tried to ascend)
(rising oriental lead motif under “ascend”)
I tried some more
(Went 'round the bend)
(slapped bass fill + car horn stab on bar turn after “bend”)
I tried to swim
I tried to breathe
(kick pattern simplified here, hats drop to create tension)
I tried to sleep
And live again
[FX–Warm wide pad swell + short choir “aaah” on “live again”, then groove snaps fully back in]

[Chorus]
[Beat–Return to full-energy hook; add small extra shaker/tambourine layer; occasional tire-screech FX tucked into pre-bar risers.]
[Vocal–Thicker hook: 3–4 layers on key “I try again” lines, background hums or “oh-oh”s tucked low. Lead remains very clear in center, no autotune, bright but not harsh.]
I try again
And again
And again
I try again
And again
And again
I try again
[Final “again”–let delay and reverb tail breathe, small master bus automation +0.5 dB for last bar, then release into outro or loop.]

---

[DESCRIPTION]
Bouncy underground slap-club Balkan oriental pop at ~124 BPM, built on a tight, punchy kick and rubbery slap bass driving a constant dance-floor pulse. # hardcore_pop - Turn My Head_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
At 139 bpm pulsating club tech track, zurle, organ, 80s midi synths, car siren, s, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Verse]

# hardcore_pop - Turn My Head_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
At 139 bpm pulsating club tech track, zurle, organ, 80s midi synths, car siren, hypnotic, sultry reggaeton vibes, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

# hardcore_pop - Uber to the Corner Shop_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
An 130-140 bpm  house track , zurna, organ ,80s synth, cowbells, ancient harp, car siren, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals. Underground slap house: vocals edgier. Male: punchy yet laid-back, rhythmic, catchy, adds emphasis without oversinging. Female: sultry, intimate, lightly breathy, hypnotic—fits darker club vibe. Both ride the groove, enhance the track’s underground, percussive energy.

[LYRICS]
[Verse]
[Male] I’m sorry if I let you down [Female - (sorry if I let you down)]
[Male] I swear I’m a lovely guy when no one’s around [Female - (lovely guy, when no one’s around)]
[Male] So what? You wanna fuck around? [Female - (fuck around?)]
[Male] I swear I’m a lovely guy when no one’s around [Female - (lovely guy, when no one’s around)]
[Male] Come and see the castle that I built in my head [Female - (in your head)]
[Male] Come and see the visions that I’ve left on the bed [Female - (on the bed)]
[Male] I don’t know what you said [Female - (what you said)]
[Male] It’s that voice in your head [Female - (in your head)]

[Prechorus]
[Male] You should be my only one [Female - (only one)]
[Male] You should be my only one [Female - (only one)]
[Male] I should be your only one [Female - (your only one)]
[Male] It’s only fair [Female - (only fair)]
[Male] I’m not your only one [Female - (not your only one)]

[Chorus]
[Male] But we should Uber to the corner shop [Female - (corner shop)]
[Male] Cuddle at the bus stop [Female - (bus stop)]
[Male] Hitch a ride in a moped [Female - (on a moped)]
[Male] Can we go to your bed? [Female - (to your bed?)]
[Male] But we should Uber to the corner shop [Female - (corner shop)]
[Male] Cuddle at the bus stop [Female - (bus stop)]
[Male] Hitch a ride in a moped [Female - (on a moped)]
[Male] Can we go to your bed? [Female - (to your bed?)]

[Verse 2]
[Male] I’m sorry if I let you down [Female - (sorry if I let you down)]
[Male] I swear I’m a lovely guy when no one’s around [Female - (lovely guy, when no one’s around)]
[Male] So what? You wanna fuck around? [Female - (fuck around?)]
[Male] I swear I’m a lovely guy when no one’s around [Female - (lovely guy, when no one’s around)]
[Male] Come and see the castle that I built in my head [Female - (in your head)]
[Male] Come and see the visions that I’ve left on the bed [Female - (on the bed)]
[Male] I don’t know what you said [Female - (what you said)]
[Male] It’s that voice in your head [Female - (in your head)]

[Prechorus]
[Male] You should be my only one [Female - (only one)]
[Male] You should be my only one [Female - (only one)]
[Male] I should be your only one [Female - (your only one)]
[Male] It’s only fair [Female - (only fair)]
[Male] I’m not your only one [Female - (not your only one)]

[Chorus]
[Male] But we should Uber to the corner shop [Female - (corner shop)]
[Male] Cuddle at the bus stop [Female - (bus stop)]
[Male] Hitch a ride in a moped [Female - (on a moped)]
[Male] Can we go to your bed? [Female - (to your bed?)]
[Male] But we should Uber to the corner shop [Female - (corner shop)]
[Male] Cuddle at the bus stop [Female - (bus stop)]
[Male] Hitch a ride in a moped [Female - (on a moped)]
[Male] Can we go to your bed? [Female - (to your bed?)]

# hardcore_pop - Uber to the Corner Shop_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
An 130-140 bpm  house track , zurna, organ ,80s synth, cowbells, ancient harp, car siren, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals. Underground slap house: vocals edgier. Male: punchy yet laid-back, rhythmic, catchy, adds emphasis without oversinging. Female: sultry, intimate, lightly breathy, hypnotic—fits darker club vibe. Both ride the groove, enhance the track’s underground, percussive energy.

[LYRICS]
[Verse]
[Male] I’m sorry if I let you down [Female - (sorry if I let you down)]

[Male] It’s that voice in your head [Female - (in your head)]

# hardcore_pop - Uber to the Corner Shop_Hardcore_Pop_2
[DESCRIPTION]
An 130-140 bpm  house track , zurna, organ ,80s synth, cowbells, ancient harp, car siren, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals., minor keys (F# m, Gm, Am). Male A2–G4, percussive, slight backbeat; Female G3–A5, breathy verses, brighter hooks. Tuning fast; comp 3–6 dB. HPF 80–120 Hz; cut 200–350 Hz; add 3–5 kHz, 10–12 kHz; de-ess 6–8 kHz. Short plate, ping-pong delays; doubles & call-response.

[LYRICS]
[Verse]
[Male] She like [Female - (mm-hmm)]
[Male] "Can you be the one to make my world stop?" [Female - (make it stop)]
[Male] Like a Rubik's cube [Female - (twist it)]
[Male] You twist me in a tight knot [Female - (tight knot)]
[Male] I said [Female - (you said)]
[Male] "Darlin' [Female - (darlin’)]
[Male] You ain't ready for what I got" [Female - (what you got?)]
[Male] You're askin' me to take you all the way [Female - (all the way)]
[Male] But you want to Uber to the corner shop [Female - (corner shop)]

[Verse 2]
[Male] I told you once and I'll say it again [Female - (say it again)]
[Male] I'm a work of art [Female - (work of art)]
[Male] I'm a masterpiece [Female - (masterpiece)]
[Male] Ten out of ten [Female - (ten out of ten)]
[Male] You think I'm some kind of ordinary man [Female - (ordinary?)]
[Male] My ego is bigger than it should be [Female - (too big)]
[Male] I think I might need a lift from the fam [Female - (call the fam)]

[Bridge]
[Male] We're out and about and we're runnin' the town [Female - (runnin’ the town)]
[Male] Don't take much for you to figure it out [Female - (figure it out)]
[Male] We're back to back in our Ubers [Female - (back to back)]
[Male] We're out and about and we're runnin' the town [Female - (runnin’ the town)]
[Male] Don't take much for you to figure it out [Female - (figure it out)]
[Male] We're back to back in our Ubers [Female - (back to back)]
[Male] 'Cause we just can't get enough [Female - (can’t get enough)]
[Male] We just can't get enough [Female - (no, no)]
[Male] Oh [Female - (oh)]
[Male] We just can't get enough [Female - (can’t get enough)]
[Male] We just can't get enough [Female - (no, no)]

[Verse 3]
[Male] Look [Female - (look)]
[Male] You need to calm down [Female - (calm down)]
[Male] Baby [Female - (baby)]
[Male] All this energy that you bring [Female - (energy you bring)]
[Male] It kinda drives me crazy [Female - (drives you crazy)]
[Male] Ain't nothin' wrong with just takin' it easy [Female - (take it easy)]
[Male] I know you're used to bein' out and about [Female - (out and about)]
[Male] And Uberin' to every destination [Female - (every destination)]
[Male] Baby [Female - (baby)]

[Chorus]
[Male] You like to Uber to the corner shop [Female - (corner shop)]
[Male] Like to Uber to the corner shop [Female - (corner shop)]
[Male] You like to Uber to the corner shop [Female - (corner shop)]
[Male] Like to Uber to the corner shop [Female - (corner shop)]
[Male] You like to Uber to the corner shop [Female - (corner shop)]
[Male] Like to Uber to the corner shop [Female - (corner shop)]
[Male] You like to Uber to the corner shop [Female - (corner shop)]
[Male] Like to Uber to the corner shop [Female - (corner shop)]

[Bridge]
[Male] We're out and about and we're runnin' the town [Female - (runnin’ the town)]
[Male] Don't take much for you to figure it out [Female - (figure it out)]
[Male] We're back to back in our Ubers [Female - (back to back)]
[Male] We're out and about and we're runnin' the town [Female - (runnin’ the town)]
[Male] Don't take much for you to figure it out [Female - (figure it out)]
[Male] We're back to back in our Ubers [Female - (back to back)]
[Male] 'Cause we just can't get enough [Female - (can’t get enough)]
[Male] We just can't get enough [Female - (no, no)]
[Male] Oh [Female - (oh)]
[Male] We just can't get enough [Female - (can’t get enough)]
[Male] We just can't get enough [Female - (no, no)]

# hardcore_pop - Uber to the Corner Shop_Hardcore_Pop_2
[DESCRIPTION]

Male A2–G4, percussive, slight backbeat; Female G3–A5, breathy verses, brighter hooks. Tuning fast; comp 3–6 dB. HPF 80–120 Hz; cut 200–350 Hz; add 3–5 kHz, 10–12 kHz; de-ess 6–8 kHz. [Male] We're back to back in our Ubers [Female - (back to back)]
[Male] 'Cause we just can't get enough [Female - (can’t get enough)]
[Male] We just can't get enough [Female - (no, no)]
[Male] Oh [Female - (oh)]
[Male] We just can't get enough [Female - (can’t get enough)]
[Male] We just can't get enough [Female - (no, no)]

# hardcore_pop - Ulichna_kiša_2
[DESCRIPTION]
-goa tech house rai track
Robototik
Rapper, hip hop, ambient, house

[LYRICS]
Ulična zima,
kiša pada,
noć je duga,

Svetla blede,
on nije tu ( da me) zavede (,sprovede)..povede

Vožnja bez cilja, ne vidim,
sve se gubi,ja sam
Beli dim sve je isto, ja sam sve, ali uvek samo dim
Beli dim... Dim dim dim DRIM Tim

Eheeej trip tvoj vozi,vozi me ,zovi me
Vozi zovi zovi meee

Bez nade, te ljubavi,
Svi smo još jedna iluzija,
 DA aha aha

Zaboravila ko je bila,
 a sad se gubi luta satima,
a ti tuuuu.

Da
Da

Kroz grad ide low,
klik-klak, koraci, etikete blede slow 

Misli jos skaču ko beat, 
haj speed
glava joj loop, glitch,
spin flow speed
Život joj  blinka 
semafor, u krizi 
duša tone u dim DIM DIM DRIM TIM
Nema mira samo dim dim drim tim.

Krv na stolu,u čaši otrov,
Linije gorke putevi kroz ponor
Sećanja trzaju u prvi pad (bez glasa)
Tad sam znao nema više (spasa)

Zrak mi je brat,  tuga je dan
u grudima ta vatra(da ja sam)
ledena crna rupa sto sranje lupa
Lažem sad pogledom, ( daaa) sve je okej,a srce lupa i lupa 
al’ duša mi 
k’o snimak bez zvuka,
Pištolj bez metka 
san budiš, a ti samo trubiš

 U dimu u dnu 
U svemiru bez eha 
Samo tu!

---

# hardcore_pop - Ulicna_zima_3
[DESCRIPTION]
This sultry underground tech house track opens with a hypnotic four-on-the-floor kick, deep sub bass, and sparse percussive accents. Whispery vocal chops and a pulsing synth stab create heat on each drop. Rolling hi-hats and filtered atmospheres maintain an entrancing late-night vibe.

[LYRICS]
Ulična zima,
kiša pada,
noć je duga,

Svetla blede,
on nije tu ( da me) zavede,sprovede..povede

Vožnja bez cilja, ne vidim,
sve se gubi,ja sam
Beli dim sve je isto, ja sam sve, ali uvek samo dim
Beli dim... Dim dim dim DRIM Tim

Eheeej trip tvoj vozi,vozi me ,zovi me
Vozi zovi zovi meee

Bez nade, te ljubavi,
Svi smo još jedna iluzija,
 DA aha aha

Zaboravila ko je bila,
 a sad se gubi luta satima,
a ti tuuuu.

Da
Da

Kroz grad ide low,
klik-klak, koraci, etikete blede slow 

Misli jos skacu ko beat, 
haj speed
glava joj loop, glitch,
spin flow speed
Život joj  blinka 
semafor, u krizi 
duša tone u dim DIM DIM DRIM TIM
Nema mira samo dim dim drim tim.

Krv na stolu,u casi otrov,
Linije gorke putevi kroz ponor
Secanja trzaju u prvi pad (bez glasa)
Tad sam znao nema vise (spasa)

Zrak mi je brat,  tuga je dan
u grudima ta vatra(da ja sam)
ledena crna rupa sto sranje lupa
Lazem sad pogledom, ( daaa) sve je okej,a srce lupa i lupa 
al’ duša mi 
k’o snimak bez zvuka,
Pistolj bez metka 
san budiš, a ti samo trubis

 U dimu u dnu 
U svemuru bez eha 
Samo tu!

# hardcore_pop - Ulicna_zima_4
[DESCRIPTION]
This slap 145-150 bpm dynamic sultry underground tech house cut rides a hypnotic four-on-the-floor kick at 140-150 bpm, anchored by deep sub bass and minimal percussive hits. Whispery vocal chops and pulsing synth stabs ignite each drop, while rolling hi-hats and filtered, evolving atmospherics keep a tense, entrancing energy throughout.

[LYRICS]
Ulična zima,
kiša pada,

# hardcore_pop - Ulicna_zima_5
[DESCRIPTION]
A 155 BPM slap house track surges with saturated, filthy sub-bass and punchy, syncopated drums driving relentless grooves. Gritty acid synths craft dark, spiraling melodies; sharp hats, risers, and hypnotic autotuned deep vocals build an erotic, high-intensity club energy.

# hardcore_pop - Uskka haljina_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
at 118-130bpm bouncy reggaetón  club tech Serbian zurna , cathedral distinctive organ, echo,  80s midi synthesizer, oriental pop, car honks, tire screeching, church choir dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals. Male vocals and female back vocals!

[LYRICS]
[Intro]
Jesi ti,Pope, kadio matru???.....
([Laughter in background] - hahaha)
([Lighter flick] - chk)


[Chorus]
Telo uz telo gorimo ko u plamenu
([echo] - "gorimo, gorimo")
Osećam tvoju kosu tu na mome ramenu
([reverb] - "mmm, na ramenu")
Želim da skinem tvoju usku suknju lanenu
([chopped] - "skin-em, skin-em")
Tako hoću da te volim
([flanger] - "aaah, da te volim")

[Verse 1]
Dok se vrti oko mene očima joj sija mesec
([echo] - "sija, sija")
Na nebu samo zvezde po pesku lete senke
([reverb] - "mmm, senke")
Dodir ko plamen usne tsrvene ko vino
([chopped] - "plamen, vino")
Ja bih je popio al samo je gledam mirno
([whisper] - "gledam te")
Pogled mi klizi niz njene obline
([delay] - "niz obline")
Ko Toranj u Pizi diže me na visine 
([octave up] - "a kriv si, heh")
Sve je bliže i bliže ko da uragan stiže
([reverb] - "aaaah")
Mala od čokolade
([echo] - "čokolade, čokolade")

[Chorus]
Telo uz telo gorimo ko u plamenu
([echo] - "telo uz telo")
Osećam tvoju kosu tu na mome ramenu
([reverb] - "mmm, na ramenu")
Želim da skinem tvoju usku suknju lanenu
([chopped] - "suk-nju, suknju")
Tako hoću da te volim prljavu i vatrenu
([flanger] - "prljavu, vatrenu")
Telo uz telo gorimo ko u plamenu
([echo] - "gorimo, gorimo")
Osećam tvoju kosu tu na mome ramenu
([whisper] - "bliže, bliže")
Želim da skinem tvoju usku suknju lanenu
([reverb] - "aaah")
Tako hoću da te volim prljavu i vatrenu
([chopped] - "volim, volim te")

[Instrumental]
([filter vox adlibs] - "aaah… mmm…")

[Verse 2]
Letnje noći su najbolje kad se vozimo kroz grad noćni
([echo] - "noćni, noćni")
Ja bez krova samo mesec iznad nas
([reverb] - "mmm, iznad nas")
Ona sve zna ona dobro zna da se folira
([chopped] - "zna, zna")
Ego stvorila ledena kraljica
([flanger] - "kraljica")
U mraku sami samo ti i ja
([whisper] - "ti i ja")
Baš si spremna da mi ukradeš miran rad
([echo] - "ukradeš, ukradeš")
Dok se lagano njišeš usne k'o kavijar
([reverb] - "mmm")
Tako me se gledaš to me fascinira
([chopped] - "fascinira, ra-ra")

[Instrumental]
([vox FX] - "aaah… mmm… telo uz telo…")

---

([echo] - "noćni, noćni")
Ja bez krova samo mesec iznad nas
([reverb] - "mmm, iznad nas")
Ona sve zna ona dobro zna da se folira
([chopped] - "zna, zna")
Ego stvorila ledena kraljica
([flanger] - "kraljica")
U mraku sami samo ti i ja
([whisper] - "ti i ja")
Baš si spremna da mi ukradeš miran rad
([echo] - "ukradeš, ukradeš")
Dok se lagano njišeš usne k'o kavijar
([reverb] - "mmm")
Tako me se gledaš to me fascinira
([chopped] - "fascinira, ra-ra")

[Instrumental]
([vox FX] - "aaah… mmm… telo uz telo…")

# hardcore_pop - Uskka haljina_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
at 118-130bpm bouncy reggaetón  club tech Serbian zurna , cathedral distinctive organ, echo,  80s midi synthesizer, oriental pop, car honks, tire screeching, church choir dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals. ([whisper] - "gledam te")

([delay] - "niz obline")

# hardcore_pop - Wasted Words_Hardcore_Pop
[DESCRIPTION]
A 155 BPM slap house track throbs with filthy, saturated sub-bass and punchy syncopated drums. Dark acid synths drive gritty melodies, while violin lines interlace with Arabic modal flourishes. Hypnotic, autotuned deep vocals glide over razor-sharp hats, risers, and an irresistible club groove.

[LYRICS]
[Verse]
This song's for my homies
My homies on the way to the club
My homies at the pregame
Sippin' on that red cup
This song's for the people
People in the VIP
Or the people who can only get in
Because they know the guy workin' at the bar
Or the guy workin' at the door

[Pre-Chorus]
This is the song
For people who are already wasted
People who are already wasted
People who are already wasted

[Chorus]
This song is for the wasted
People who are already wasted
People who are already wasted
People who are already wasted
Wasted
Wasted
Wasted
Wasted
People who are already wasted
Wasted
Wasted
Wasted
Wasted
People who are already wasted

[Verse]
When I drink
I just start ranting
Ranting about dumb things
Like why my last boyfriend cheated on me
Or how the feds control the weather
And they listen to us through the wires
Or how my phone's always dying
And the line to the bathroom's too long
Why's it always so long?

[Pre-Chorus]
This is the song
For people who are already wasted
People who are already wasted
People who are already wasted

[Chorus]
This song is for the wasted
People who are already wasted
People who are already wasted
People who are already wasted
Wasted

People who are already wasted
Wasted
Wasted
Wasted
Wasted
People who are already wasted

# hardcore_pop - Wasted Words_Hardcore_Pop_2
[DESCRIPTION]
A 155 BPM slap house track powered by thick, dirty sub-bass and crisp syncopated percussion. Harsh acid synths deliver gritty, looping hooks while haunting violin lines weave Arabic modal runs. Autotuned deep vocals drift atop biting hi-hats, tension-lifting risers, and relentless club momentum.

# hardcore_pop - Wasted Words_Hardcore_Pop_3
[DESCRIPTION]
An underground slap tech house track , zurle, organ,car siren, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals


---

# hardcore_pop - Wasted Words_Hardcore_Pop_3
[DESCRIPTION]
An underground slap tech house track , zurle, organ,car siren, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Male - Verse]
This song's for my homies
([Traffic hum / distant city] - mmmmmmrum)
My homies on the way to the club
([Engine rev] - vrrrroom)
My homies at the pregame
([Vinyl crackle / static] - pftcrackle)
Sippin' on that red cup
([Glass clink] - clink)
This song's for the people
([Crowd murmur / two-way radio] - bzzztch)
People in the VIP
([Door click / lock] - tick)
Or the people who can only get in
([Shout / callout] - ayyyo)
Because they know the guy workin' at the bar
([Cash rustle] - shhhff)
Or the guy workin' at the door
([Horn short honk] - honk)

[Pre-Chorus]
This is the song
([Vinyl crackle / static] - pftcrackle)
For people who are already wasted
([Breath inhale] - haaah)
People who are already wasted
([Heavy footstep (thump)] - thud)
People who are already wasted
([Shout / callout] - ayyyo)

[Male and Female -Chorus]
This song is for the wasted
([Tire screech] - skreeeech)
People who are already wasted
([Engine idle rumble (sub)] - rrrrrr)
People who are already wasted
([Car alarm] - weeoowee)
People who are already wasted
([Horn short honk] - honk)
Wasted
([Sniff / laugh FX] - snff)
Wasted
([Breath exhale] - haaah)
Wasted
([Crowd cheer short] - ayyyo)
Wasted
([Vinyl crackle / static] - pftcrackle)
People who are already wasted
([Tire hop / gravel throw] - chikchik)
Wasted
([Glass clink] - clink)
Wasted
([Engine rev short] - vrrrroom)
Wasted
([Shout / callout] - ayyyo)
Wasted
([Traffic hum / distant city] - mmmmmmrum)
People who are already wasted
([Vinyl crackle / static] - pftcrackle)

[Female - Verse]
When I drink
([Glass clink] - clink)
I just start ranting
([Breath inhale] - haaah)
Ranting about dumb things
([Two-way radio / murmur] - bzzztch)
Like why my last boyfriend cheated on me
([Shout / callout] - ayyyo)
Or how the feds control the weather
([Vinyl crackle / static] - pftcrackle)
And they listen to us through the wires
([Radio static] - bzzztch)
Or how my phone's always dying
([Phone buzz] - bzzzt)
And the line to the bathroom's too long
([Footsteps (pavement)] - tapptap)
Why's it always so long?
([Door slam] - slam)

[Male - Pre-Chorus]
This is the song
([Vinyl crackle / static] - pftcrackle)
For people who are already wasted
([Breath inhale] - haaah)
People who are already wasted
([Heavy footstep (thump)] - thud)
People who are already wasted
([Shout / callout] - ayyyo)

[Female - Chorus]
This song is for the wasted
([Tire screech] - skreeeech)
People who are already wasted
([Engine idle rumble (sub)] - rrrrrr)
People who are already wasted
([Car alarm] - weeoowee)
People who are already wasted
([Horn short honk] - honk)
Wasted
([Sniff / laugh FX] - snff)
Wasted
([Breath exhale] - haaah)
Wasted
([Crowd cheer short] - ayyyo)
Wasted
([Vinyl crackle / static] - pftcrackle)
People who are already wasted
([Tire hop / gravel throw] - chikchik)

([Glass clink] - clink)

# hardcore_pop - We still choose this- Hardcore_Pop_2
[DESCRIPTION]
This song fuses Balkan oriental pop and club tech grooves with a bouncy, underground pulse driven by slap bass and layered percussive hits. Car honks and tire screeches punctuate the dance rhythm. Silk-smooth, unprocessed vocals ride atop gentle drums, warm pads, accordion, lush strings, and subtle 1980s-inspired synths. Traditional folk instruments echo melancholic melodies, supported by rich harmonies. The arrangement balances dynamic movement and emotional depth, keeping the floor moving while evoking a wistful mood.

# hardcore_pop - We still choose this- Hardcore_Pop_2
[DESCRIPTION]
This song fuses Balkan oriental pop and club tech grooves with a bouncy, underground pulse driven by slap bass and layered percussive hits. Car honks and tire screeches punctuate the dance rhythm. Silk-smooth, unprocessed vocals ride atop gentle drums, warm pads, accordion, lush strings, and subtle 1980s-inspired synths. Traditional folk instruments echo melancholic melodies, supported by rich harmonies. The arrangement balances dynamic movement and emotional depth, keeping the floor moving while evoking a wistful mood.

# hardcore_pop - We still choose this- Hardcore_Pop_3
[DESCRIPTION]
At 132bpm, the song fuses Balkan oriental pop with club tech, opening with slap bass, club percussion, and syncopated car sounds. Silk vocals glide atop gentle drums, warm pads, lush strings, accordion, and vintage synths, while folk instruments add wistful, harmonized melodies, blending dance energy and nostalgia.

# hardcore_pop - We still choose this- Hardcore_Pop_3
[DESCRIPTION]
[Track – Driving, hypnotic club-tech banger at ~125 BPM in a moody minor key, built on a tight 4/4 kick, crisp claps, and an 80s synth-bass arpeggio locking to a sidechained zurna drone. The topline rides bouncy zurna hooks and short, screaming tire-screech fills that punctuate each “failure” moment, while wide pads and subtle crowd noise keep an underground, late-night energy. Verses use sparse, rhythmic zurna answers and FX to illustrate each attempt (fly, run, sink, breathe), and the chorus explodes into stacked vocals repeating “I try again” like a mantra over a harder-hitting drum bus and brighter hats. The mix stays club-focused and punchy, with vocal front and clear, and the arrangement constantly cycles through tension, collapse, and restart to mirror the obsessive persistence in the lyrics.]

[LYRICS]
[Intro/Beat – Driving club tech groove, ~125 BPM, minor key, straight 4/4. Tight punchy kick, dry snappy clap, 80s synth bass arpeggio locked to sidechained zurna drone. Tire-screech FX as short reverse risers into first verse. Pads low and wide, vinyl-style noise very quiet. No lead vox yet, only distant chopped “try again” whispers with short delay.]

[Verse]
We start to kiss
([FX] - [beat slightly filtered, zurna muted first bar])
Then I feel you back away (Back away)
([Back vox] - [stereo doubles on “back away”, light reverb])
Now I missed (Missed)
([FX] - [tiny tire screech + 1/8 delay on “missed”])
And my target is delayed (Delayed)
([Synth] - [80s bass does small fill under “delayed”])
Time to switch (Switch)
([FX] - [quick filter sweep up, hats open slightly])
I need more cards to play
([Zurna] - [short hook answering last word, panned L])
I need a little more play
([Zurna] - [second hook answer, panned R, call-and-response])
I

[Chorus – Drums and bass +1 dB, zurna hook full, hats busier, claps layered. Vocal front, doubled on “try again”, ping-pong delays at phrase ends to feel obsessive repetition.]
[Chorus]
Try again
([Back vox] - [low octave “try again” centered, short plate])
Again
([Delay] - [1/8 dotted echo “again” L/R])
Try again
([FX] - [sub drop into this line, subtle])
Again
([Zurna] - [mini riff echoing melody])
Try again
Again
Try again
Again
Try again
Again
Try again
Again
Try again
Again
Try again
Again

[Verse – Second verse more kinetic: add offbeat rides, 16th hat rolls, occasional tire screech fills. 80s bass moves more melodically; zurna plays shorter stabs, leaving space for narrative “attempts”.]
[Verse]
I tried to fly
(Fell to the ground)
([FX] - [tire screech + short impact hit under “ground”])
I tried to run
(Tripped on the clouds)
([Back vox] - [whispered “tripped” with 1/4 delay])
I tried to float
([Synth] - [chorused 80s pad chord swell])
I tried to sink
([808] - [descending bass slide one bar])
I tried to think
And let it go
([FX] - [wide noise sweep down, momentary reverb bloom])
I tried to soar
(Tried to ascend)
([Zurna] - [rising 2-note lick mirroring “ascend”])
I tried some more
(Went 'round the bend)
([Drums] - [snare fill, tom hits panned wide])
I tried to swim
I tried to breathe
I tried to sleep
And live again
([FX] - [short heartbeat kick pattern + low zurna drone])

[Chorus – Final chorus: all elements at peak. Extra zurna harmony, more open hats, subtle crowd loop in background. Vocals stacked (3–4 layers) on key “I try again” phrases, delays slightly longer for anthemic feel.]
[Chorus]
I try again
And again
And again
([Delay] - [“again, again” 1/4 ping-pong fading])
I try again
And again
And again
I try again
([FX] - [last “again” emphasized with riser + sub impact into outro or instrumental tag])

# hardcore_pop - Zenitecca_Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
An 129 bpm dynamic tech house track , zurna, organ,80s midi synths, talk box, car siren, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Male]
Gde si ti mala
([Footsteps soft] - tapptap)
Šta se praviš fina
([Breath exhale close] - haaah)
Tvoj pogled vrišti
([Vinyl crackle / static] - pftcrackle)
Igraš bez stida
([Sub-bass rumble] - rrrrrr)

[Female]
A gde si ti
([Whispered echo] - ssst)
Momak
([Finger snap] - snap)
Šta si stao
([Vinyl pop soft] - pft)
Taj tvoj ritam
([Kick groove] - boom-boom)
Loše si ga dao
([Snare tick] - tchk)

[Male and Female -Chorus]
Noćas pratimo beat
([Traffic hum / distant city] - mmmmmmrum)
Naš je svet
([Crowd murmur] - mmmrum)
Mi smo u piku -ze-nit
([Engine rev short] - vrrrroom)
Noćas naš je beat
([Tire hop / gravel throw] - chikchik)
Naš je svet
([Vinyl crackle warm] - pftcrackle)
A ti i ja
([Heartbeat / thump] - thumpthump)
Haos
([Metal scrape tension] - shrrrk)
sutra opet sve ripit
([Reverse sweep] - whooom)

([Glass clink soft] - clink)
Al' igraš sporo
([Brake / subtle skid] - skiiid)
Ja vodim ples
([Footstep lead] - tap-tap)
Ti budi solo
([Breath inhale playful] - haaah)

[Female]

([Crowd chuckle faint] - huhh)
Tišina
([Silent room hum] - mmmrum)
Pogled moj je plamen
([Fire crackle] - tsss)
Prava divljina
([Growl sub] - grrrr)

([Kick hit / boom] - boom)
Naš je svet
([Vinyl warmth] - pftcrackle)
Mi smo u piku -ze-nit
([Engine idle rumble] - rrrrrr)
Noćas naš je beat
([Tire screech] - skreeeech)
Naš je svet
([Crowd cheer short] - ayyyo)

([Heartbeat / close] - thumpthump)

([Crash fx] - krashh)
sutra opet sve ripit
([Echo out] - whooosh)

Podiži ruke
([Hand clap sync] - clap)
Spuštaj taj ego
([Breath exhale low] - haaah)
U ritmu tela
([Sidechain whoosh] - shhaaa)
(maserati me baš stego....)
([Engine rev long] - vrrrroom)

# hardcore_pop - Zenitecca_Hardcore_Pop_2
[DESCRIPTION]
An 135 bpm underground dynamic raw slap tech house track , zurle, organ,car siren, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals, cowbell

[LYRICS]
[Male]
Gde si ti mala
([Footstep soft groove — tapptap L/R, stereo stagger, 1/16 feel])
Šta se praviš fina
([Breath exhale close] - haaah)
Tvoj pogled vrišti
([Vinyl crackle / static] - pftcrackle)
Igraš bez stida
([Sub-bass rumble] - rrrrrr)

[Female]
A gde si ti
([Whispered echo] - ssst)
Momak
([Finger snap] - snap)
Šta si stao
([Vinyl pop soft] - pft)
Taj tvoj ritam
([Kick groove] - boom-boom)
Loše si ga dao
([Snare tick] - tchk)

[Male and Female -Chorus]
Noćas pratimo beat
([Traffic hum / distant city] - mmmmmmrum)
Naš je svet
([Crowd murmur] - mmmrum)
Mi smo u piku -ze-nit
([Engine rev short] - vrrrroom)
Noćas naš je beat
([Tire hop / gravel throw] - chikchik)
Naš je svet
([Vinyl crackle warm] - pftcrackle)
A ti i ja
([Heartbeat / thump] - thumpthump)
Haos
([Metal scrape tension] - shrrrk)
sutra opet sve ripit
([Reverse sweep] - whooom)

[Male]
Smešiš se opet
([Glass clink soft] - clink)
Al' igraš sporo
([Brake / subtle skid] - skiiid)
Ja vodim ples
([Footstep lead] - tap-tap)
Ti budi solo

# hardcore_pop - Zivot_Poklonski_dr_Khans_3
[DESCRIPTION]
A dark, introspective Serbian hip-hop track at a moderate tempo (~90 BPM), driven by a deep, resonant synth bass and a tight drum-machine groove with a heavy kick, cracking snare, and precise hi-hats. Melancholic pads and a subtle high-pitched synth lead carve out a moody, cinematic space, while the vocal sits brutally upfront: a gritty, low baritone with a raspy, bark-like delivery, natural distortion, and metallic edge around 2–3 kHz. The voice is almost dry and very compressed, treated with parallel compression, light saturation, and dynamic EQ to control harshness, with only a tight slapback or short delay on key words. No autotune, no polish—just raw street energy over a clean but powerful mix. Verses hit like confessions yelled from the chest, while the chorus opens slightly wider, keeping the low end hard and the message in your face.

[LYRICS]
[Global mix/master – Dark, introspective hip-hop ~88–92 BPM. Target loudness -9 to -8 LUFS. Kick+bass own 40–90 Hz, light dip 200–300 Hz to avoid mud. Snare: 180–220 Hz body, 3–6 kHz crack. Vocal dominates 1–4 kHz, but with harshness controlled 4–7 kHz via dynamic EQ. Pads/high lead mostly 3–10 kHz, sidechained 1–2 dB to vocal. Stereo: drums/bass mostly mono-center, pads/leads wide. Mix bus: gentle glue comp (1.5–2:1, 1–2 dB GR), soft clipper, transparent limiter.]

([Voice] – Adult male, gritty low-baritone, heavily raspy texture, high glottal pressure, bark-like projection, short phrases, street energy.)
([VocalTone] – Natural distortion, boosted chest, metallic edge around 2–3 kHz, slight honk tamed with EQ, breath noise left in for grit.)
([Delivery] – Short, punchy bars, explosive consonants, slightly behind-the-beat swing, loud—but always intelligible and locked to groove.)
([FX] – Strong parallel compression for density, light analog saturation, dynamic EQ taming 4–7 kHz when he barks, almost no reverb, tight slapback (80–120 ms) only on emphasis words. Vocal very dry and forward.)

[Drums – Thick 808-ish kick, short controlled tail. Snare with tiny plate (0.3–0.5 s), no long tail. Hats tight, HPF > 400 Hz, small 7–9 kHz boost for air, not hiss.
Bass – Deep mono synth bass, light drive/saturation for harmonics, sidechain to kick 2–3 dB with fast release.
Vocal – HPF 80–90 Hz, small cut 250–350 Hz if boxy, surgical dynamic cut 2.5–4 kHz on harsh peaks, presence 4–5 kHz if needed, minimal air. Serial comp: fast peak catcher (limiter-ish) → slower 3–4:1 leveller → parallel comp bus.]

[Intro – 2–4 bars, low drum level, bass LPF ~150 Hz, pads wide, high lead faint. Vocal tag bone-dry, center, slightly distorted/saturated.]
[Intro]
(dr Khans on the beat)

[Verse 1 – Full drums, full bass, pads medium. Vocal almost completely dry: reverb 3–5% max, no constant delay (only one-shot throws). Barky, close, aggressive.]
[Verse 1]
Hajde iskreno mi reci šta osetiš
[kick+bass locked, vocal +1–2 dB above beat, strong parallel comp bus]
Kada me na ulici sretneš
I u vreme kada je cveće zlo
[pad swell low; high lead only hits short notes between lines]
Gledaj me u oči dok mi pričaš
Nemoj pogled da mi skrećeš
Želim da čujem to
Želim da naučim da grešim
Da ispravim i shvatim
Daj mi neki primer ja bih rado da ga pratim
Neka je i duži put
Ne treba mi kraći
Ovde sam da ispunim a ne vreme da traćim
Da ne daj bože zalutam
Pa ne umem da se vratim
Puteve da skratim ko đavola na kafi
[short reverse pad into “đavola”, sidechained to vocal so bark stays clear]
On me čeka obećao sam da ću da svratim
Želim da čujem istinu da znam zašto patim
Šta sam dužan i koliko treba da mu platim
Da pusti me da idem da pronađem svoj mir
Jer ako prvo ne umreš nećeš biti živ
[delay throw only on “živ” – tight slapback + 1/4 ping-pong blend, heavily filtered, low level]

[Chorus – Bus boost +0.5–1 dB. Drum bus parallel comp 3–5 dB GR mixed ~30%. Pads wider, lead synth more present. Vocal doubled very subtly (slightly detuned or formant-shifted) for thickness, still dry and up-front.]
[Chorus]
Život je poklon koji se ne propušta
[low growl double under “poklon”, very low in mix]
Svaki dan je nova priča sreća u malim stvarima
[pads rise, high lead mimics rhythmic pattern, ducked under vocal]
Otvori srce raduj se novim danima
Ogrejaće i tebe sunce svojim zracima
[short stereo slapback only on “zracima”, 80–100 ms, low feedback]

[Verse 2 – Same groove, maybe slightly darker hats (tiny 10–12 kHz cut). Vocal even more intense; more send to parallel comp, slight extra saturation. Instrumental stays supportive, leaving space for harsh midrange voice.]
[Verse 2]
Masu puta u životu odozgo pa na dole
To je inače put kojim mnogo više vole
Od početka čini se da je na njemu mnogo bolje
Jeste tako
Raskoš laganica pare
Sve ide glatko ali kako kažu stariji
Sve ono što je slatko jako kratko traje
A ti navik'o da uzimaš kad ti se sve daje
Ne znaš kako je kad je teško
Niti znaš da se kaješ
Tvoje reči nemaju težinu jako glasno laješ
[band-saturation 2–4 kHz on “laješ”, + dynamic EQ so it bites but doesn’t pierce]
Podižeš se iznad drugih samog sebe lažeš
Govoriš o dobru a zlo ti je draže
Nema veze dragi brate
To su tvoje staze
Putevi su tvoji nek se tvoje duše paze
Nek se tvoje duše paze
[last “paze” – +0.5 dB vocal automation, tiny 1/8 slapback, hats drop for half a bar]

[Chorus – Final/last hook, same as first but with a bit more width: subtle stereo widener on music (M/S +1–1.5 dB on S), vocal remains mostly mono-center. Slight upward tilt 80–120 Hz on bass for weight.]
[Chorus]
Život je poklon koji se ne propušta
Svaki dan je nova priča sreća u malim stvarima
Otvori srce raduj se novim danima
Ogrejaće i tebe sunce svojim zracima

[Outro – Gradually pull down parallel drum bus, hats -2–3 dB, pads LPF from 12 kHz→4 kHz, bass fades last. Final hit is dry, aggressive: kick + bass + pad stab + one last barked ad-lib if wanted, long pad tail, no big vocal reverb.]
[Outr

# hardcore_pop - Zivot_Poklonski_dr_Khans_3
[DESCRIPTION]
A dark, aggressive Serbian street hip-hop track at ~90 BPM, driven by a heavy 808-based kick, thick saturated bass, and a tight drum-machine groove with crisp hats and a cracking snare. Melancholic pads and a sparse high synth line create a cold, urban atmosphere around the voice. The lead vocal is a raw, gritty bark-baritone in the style – loud, raspy, and in-your-face, with strong plosives and constant edge. There is no autotune: the voice is shaped with heavy serial and parallel compression, tape-style saturation, focused EQ, strong de-essing, and only a short, tight plate plus a few slapback or 1/4-note delay throws on key words. The mix is dense but controlled, with drums and bass locked in the center and wide atmospheric elements, turning the introspective lyrics into a brutal, dominant street confessional.

[LYRICS]
[Global mix/master – Dark, aggressive street hip-hop ~88–92 BPM. Target loudness -8 to -7 LUFS, dense and forward. Kick + 808/synth bass dominate lows, low-mids controlled. Snare: solid body, sharp crack. Vocal: strong 1–5 kHz edge, harshness tamed by de-esser/dynamic EQ. Pads/high leads sidechained to vocal and kick. Stereo: drums/bass mono-center, ambience/FX/pads wide. Mix bus: glue comp, clipper, limiter.]

([Voice] – [Raw gritty baritone, heavy natural rasp, “barking” consonants, clear Balkan street diction])
([VocalTone] – [Thick low-end proximity, strong mid bite, harsh band controlled, tape-style saturation, almost distorted but intelligible])
([Delivery] – [Aggressive, explosive phrases, strong plosives, 8–9/10 intensity, slightly behind/on the beat, always on edge])
([FX] – [Heavy parallel compression, extra saturation bus, minimal reverb (short plate), mostly mono-centered; ad-libs/doubles wide; occasional slapback on emphasis words])

[Drums – Thick 808 kick with short/medium tail, transient shaped for punch. Snare: snappy, short plate + slight distortion. Hats: crisp 1/8 with 1/16 rolls. Extra perc hits on transitions.]
[Bass – Deep mono synth/808, saturated, sidechained 2–4 dB na kick; dodatni multi-band sidechain u low band pod gustim vokalom.]
[Vokal – Bez autotjuna. HPF ~90 Hz, low-mid cleanup po potrebi, presence lift 3–5 kHz, malo “air” samo ako ne peče. Serijska kompresija: brzi FET peak catcher + sporiji comp za gustinu. Parallel “crush” bus 10–25%. Jak de-esser.]

[Intro – 2–4 bara. Drums filtrirani i ~3 dB niži nego u strofi, bass LPF ~150 Hz, pads široki ali tihi, high lead vrlo blag. Tag suv, centar, malo više saturisan.]
[Intro]
(dr Khans on the beat)

[Verse 1 – Full drums i bass, pads srednje, high lead samo u rupama. Vokal skoro suv: kratki plate, bez stalnog delay-a, samo povremeni throw. Glas jako napred, 1–2 dB iznad instrumentala.]
[Verse 1]
Hajde iskreno mi reci šta osetiš
[kick + bass zaključani, bez fillova; crush bus lagano blendovan]
Kada me na ulici sretneš
[pads nisko, hats jednostavan 1/8 pattern]
I u vreme kada je cveće zlo
[pad swell + niski lead ton pod “cveće zlo”, sidechain na vokal]
Gledaj me u oči dok mi pričaš
Nemoj pogled da mi skrećeš
Želim da čujem to
Želim da naučim da grešim
Da ispravim i shvatim
Daj mi neki primer ja bih rado da ga pratim
[mali hat roll ili perc fill na kraju takta]
Neka je i duži put
Ne treba mi kraći
Ovde sam da ispunim a ne vreme da traćim
Da ne daj bože zalutam
Pa ne umem da se vratim
Puteve da skratim ko đavola na kafi
[kratak reverse pad + filtrirani noise swell u “đavola”, podvučeno ispod glasa]
On me čeka obećao sam da ću da svratim
Želim da čujem istinu da znam zašto patim
Šta sam dužan i koliko treba da mu platim
Da pusti me da idem da pronađem svoj mir
Jer ako prvo ne umreš nećeš biti živ
[delay throw samo na “živ” – 1/4 ping-pong, band-pass, tiho ispod glasa]

[Chorus – Mix bus +0.5–1 dB, drum bus više parallel comp, snare malo svetliji i širi. Pads i high lead širi; može dodatna octave/unison linija. Vokal dupliran: tight double ispod glavnog, povremeni povici ad-libs levo/desno.]
[Chorus]
Život je poklon koji se ne propušta
[tihi low-octave double; malo veći plate send]
Svaki dan je nova priča sreća u malim stvarima
[pads otvaraju, high lead prati ritam, sidechain na vokal i kick]
Otvori srce raduj se novim danima
Ogrejaće i tebe sunce svojim zracima
[slapback + 1/8 stereo delay samo na “zracima”, de-essed, nisko u miksu]

[Verse 2 – Isti beat, hats nijansu tamniji, pattern mrvu aktivniji. Pads niže radi teksta. Vokal još agresivniji: više crush send, može +1 dB glasniji.]
[Verse 2]
Masu puta u životu odozgo pa na dole
To je inače put kojim mnogo više vole
Od početka čini se da je na njemu mnogo bolje
Jeste tako
Raskoš laganica pare
Sve ide glatko ali kako kažu stariji
Sve ono što je slatko jako kratko traje
A ti navik'o da uzimaš kad ti se sve daje
Ne znaš kako je kad je teško
Niti znaš da se kaješ
Tvoje reči nemaju težinu jako glasno laješ
[mali band-distortion / saturation send oko 2–4 kHz na “laješ”, za ugriz]
Podižeš se iznad drugih samog sebe lažeš
Govoriš o dobru a zlo ti je draže
Nema veze dragi brate
To su tvoje staze
Putevi su tvoji nek se tvoje duše paze
Nek se tvoje duše paze
[poslednje “paze” – vokal +0.5–1 dB, kratki 1/4 delay tail; hats mute pola takta]

[Chorus – Završni ili ponovljen. Dodaj tihi low male choir pad ili unison slog ispod refrena, posiri S kanal malo, kick/bass/vokal ostaju u centru. Limiter ceiling oko -0.8 dB, u clipper malo jače radi sirovosti.]
[Chorus]
Život je poklon koji se ne propušta
Svaki dan je nova priča sreća u malim stvarima
Otvori srce raduj se novim danima
Ogrejaće i tebe sunce svojim zracima

[Outro – Postepeno spuštaj crush i reverb sendove, hats dole, LPF pads 12 kHz→4 kHz. Zadnja 2 takta skoro samo kick, bass i kratki ad-lib/tag. Finalni udar: kick + bass + pad stab, kratak ali jak tail u master reverb, release na limiteru da ne pumpa.]
[Outro]

# hardcore_pop - Zvezde Padaju- Hardcore_Pop_3
[DESCRIPTION]
bouncy undeground slap club tech Turkish oriental pop ,  organ, zurna, west-coast, car honks, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - mysterious, sexy]
([Sub-bass pulse] - thumm-thumm)
([Closed hi-hat] - tss-tss-tss)
([Acid synth low] - gyaa-gyaa)

[Male - Verse 1]
Noćima već sanjam,
(kako me doziva aaa aaa)
([Distant reverb] - whooom)
Dok šapuće mi ime
sa tim sjajem u očima
([Breath close] - haaah)
I ne znam dal je ona stvarna
( aaaa)
([Sub rise] - rrrrr)
Il živi mi u snovima,
ne znam al dobro znam da...
([Heartbeat] - thumpthump)

[Instrumental - Buildup Acid synth melody intensifies with violin Arabic riffs]
([Clap build] - clap-clap-clap)
([Acid lead] - wyaa-wyaa)
([Tom roll] - dum-dum-dum)

[Female - Chorus]
Svaki put kad on tu je,
zvezde padaju (paadajuuu)
([Sparkle / shimmer] - tinkleee)
U tebi tad se vojske bude,
da svetom vladaju
([Drum march] - dum-dum-dum-dum)
I kad mi pruža svoje ruke
(Ruuuke)
([Air rush] - fffsh)
Misli se nadaju,
da ostaće mi tu zauvek
gde se srca raduju
([Crowd “ohhh” pad] - ooooh)

[Male - Verse 2]
A ona samo zna da igra
(uuuu aaaa)
([Heels on floor] - tak-tak)
Ništa ne govori
(Šššš)
([Finger to lips] - shhh)
Dok pleše oko mene
čekam kad ću
([Bass bump] - thumm)
Da izgorim
(plamen)
([Flame lick] - fffsshh)

[Instrumental - Breakdown Violin melody takes lead with sub-bass pulsing underneath]
([Violin lick tight] - yiiii)
([Sub-bass] - wub-wub)
([Perc loop muted] - tuk-tuk-tss)

[Female - Chorus]
Da spojimo se
ko dva dima među zvezdama
([Smoke swirl] - whooosh)
Da zagrli me čvrsto
i nikad ne pušta...
([Squeeze hit] - thumm)

[Male - Bridge]
(Srce kuca... kuca...
kuca samo za nju)
([Heartbeat deep] - THUMP…thump…thump)
(Oči gledam... gledam...
gledam samo nju)
([Eye glint] - ting-ting)

[Instrumental - Buildup]
([Riser] - shhhhaaa)
([Clap stack] - clap-clap-clap)
([Kick ramp] - boom…BOOM)

[Female - Chorus]
Svaki put kad on tu je,
zvezde padaju (paadajuuu)
([Top shimmer] - tinkleee)
U tebi tad se vojske bude,
da svetom vladaju
([Low toms] - dum-dum-dum)
I kad mi pruža svoje ruke
(Ruuuke)
([Air sweep] - whooosh)
Misli se nadaju,
da ostaće mi tu zauvek
gde se srca raduju
([Wide pad] - ooo-aaa)

[Male -Outro]
Da spojimo se
ko dva dima među zvezdama
(među zvezdamaaa)
([Reverb trail] - whooom)
Da zagrlim je čvrsto
i nikad ne puštam
(nikad ne puštam)
([Final hit] - BOOM) ([Delay] - tum…tum…)

[Instrumental - Fade Out Acid synth melody fades with sub-bass pulsing]
([Acid line fade] - wyaa-wyaa…ya…)
([Sub-bass slow] - wub…wub…)
([Hi-hat ghost] - tss…tss…)

# hardcore_pop - Zvezde Padaju- Hardcore_Pop_3
[DESCRIPTION]
bouncy undeground slap club tech Turkish oriental pop ,  organ, zurna, west-coast, car honks, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - mysterious, sexy]
([Sub-bass pulse] - thumm-thumm)

([Acid synth low] - gyaa-gyaa)

# hardcore_pop - Zvezde padaju_Hardcore_Pop
[DESCRIPTION]
This 155 BPM slap house track pulses with forceful, saturated sub-bass and syncopated, punchy drums. Gritty acid synths lead the hook, cut by sharp violins weaving Arabic modal riffs. Autotuned deep vocals, crisp hi-hats, and sweeping risers amplify the relentless, pounding club energy.

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - mysterious, sexy]

[Male - Verse 1]
Noćima već sanjam, (kako me doziva aaa aaa)
Dok šapuće mi ime sa tim sjajem u očima
I ne znam dal je ona stvarna ( aaaa)
Il živi mi u snovima, ne znam al dobro znam da...

[Instrumental - Buildup Acid synth melody intensifies with violin Arabic riffs]

[Female - Chorus]
Svaki put kad on tu je, zvezde padaju (paadajuuu)
U tebi tad se vojske bude, da svetom vladaju
I kad mi pruža svoje ruke (Ruuuke)
Misli se nadaju, da ostaće mi tu zauvek gde se srca raduju

[Male - Verse 2]
A ona samo zna da igra (uuuu aaaa)
Ništa ne govori (Šššš)
Dok pleše oko mene čekam kad ću 
Da izgorim (plamen)

[Instrumental - Breakdown Violin melody takes lead with sub-bass pulsing underneath]

[Female - Chorus]
Da spojimo se ko dva dima među zvezdama
Da zagrli me čvrsto i nikad ne pušta...

[Male - Bridge]
(Srce kuca... kuca... kuca samo za nju)
(Oči gledam... gledam... gledam samo nju)

[Instrumental - Buildup]

[Female - Chorus]
Svaki put kad on tu je, zvezde padaju (paadajuuu)
U tebi tad se vojske bude, da svetom vladaju
I kad mi pruža svoje ruke (Ruuuke)
Misli se nadaju, da ostaće mi tu zauvek gde se srca raduju

[Male -Outro]
Da spojimo se ko dva dima među zvezdama (među zvezdamaaa)
Da zagrlim je čvrsto i nikad ne puštam (nikad ne puštam)

[Instrumental - Fade Out Acid synth melody fades with sub-bass pulsing]

# hardcore_pop - Zvezde_Padajedu_Sa_S_Neba - Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
bouny undeground slap club tech Turkish oriental pop, car honks, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals,

[LYRICS]

# hardcore_pop - Zvezde_Padajedu_Sa_S_Neba - Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
bouny undeground slap club tech Turkish oriental pop, car honks, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals,

[LYRICS]
**1) Lyrics with updated production instructions (≤5000 chars)**

[Intro – Filtered slap-club groove ~122–126 BPM. Kick+slap bass low-passed, just pulse; wide synth pads and soft organ stabs, faint Turkish-style oriental hook (zurna/saz-like synth, not Arabic) answering future melody. Short car honks and distant city noise panned wide, light vinyl crackle. No main vocal yet, only distant ad-libs/FX. Energetic, not weak or sentimental.]

[Male - Verse 1]
Noćima već sanjam,
(kako me doziva aaa aaa) [Female distant ad-lib – airy but solid tone, wide, long plate reverb tail, very low in mix]
Dok šapuće mi ime
sa tim sjajem u očima
[Breath close – short, intimate inhale right before “Dok šapuće…”, mono, center]
I ne znam dal je ona stvarna
[Pad swell – Turkish-flavored oriental synth pad opens slightly on “stvarna”, no violins, no overly dreamy FX]
Il živi mi u snovima,
[808 soft bump – clean sub note on downbeat, tight tail]
ne znam al dobro znam da...
[Delay throw – “znam da...” with 1/4 note ping-pong delay, filtered highs, low level]

Svaki put kad on tu je,
zvezde padaju (paadajuuu)
[FX – bright sparkle/shimmer layered with tiny hat roll, energetic not ethereal]
U tebi tad se vojske bude,
da svetom vladaju
[Choir pad – low male “aaah” + synth strings, wide; avoid violin timbre, keep powerful not melodramatic]
I kad mi pruža svoje ruke
Misli se nadaju,
[Sub lift – 808 rises one step into “nadaju”, sidechained to kick]
da ostaće mi tu zauvek
gde se srca raduju
[Clap reverb – slightly longer plate just in this bar for lift, still punchy and club-focused]

A ona samo zna da igra
(uuuu aaaa) [Female vox – silky Turkish-oriental melisma, L/R panned, short delay; performance confident, not overacted]
Ništa ne govori
Dok pleše oko mene
čekam kad ću
[Bass bump – short 808 accent, tiny glide, synced to kick]
Da izgorim
[Flame lick FX – low “fwoosh” + subtle riser into next section, no cinematic whooshes]

[Male - Outro A – Hats slightly softer, pads more present, oriental lead quietly echoing main melody; more reverb on snare/clap for floaty club feel, groove still strong and driving.]
Da spojimo se
ko dva dima među zvezdama
[Wide pad – lush “ooo-aaa” synth pad, stereo, modulating gently, not too dreamy]
Da zagrli me čvrsto
i nikad ne pušta...
(Srce kuca... kuca...
kuca samo za nju)
[Heart FX – tight low tom/808 heartbeat pattern 1–2 bars, locked to tempo, no cinematic booms]
ne pušta...
(Srce kuca... kuca...
kuca samo za nju)
[Delay vox – “samo za nju” with 1/4 ping-pong delay, filtered highs, clear diction]

Svaki put kad on tu je,
zvezde padaju (paadajuuu)
[FX – same falling-star shimmer + short reversed crash into next line, controlled not melodramatic]
U tebi tad se vojske bude,
da svetom vladaju
[Choir pad – slightly louder, more high synth-strings (no violin), gives power not sentimentality]
I kad mi pruža svoje ruke
Misli se nadaju,
[808 pattern – add extra ghost note under “Misli se nadaju” for groove]
da ostaće mi tu zauvek
gde se srca raduju
[Wide pad – “ooo-aaa” pad widening stereo image on “srca raduju”]

[Male - Outro B – Final lift then fade: drums stay but hats slightly open, a few quick fills before phrases, Turkish-style hook answers last lines softly. Reverb tails +10–15%, club still moving, energy up, not mellow.]
Da spojimo se
ko dva dima među zvezdama
[FX – soft reverse swell into “dva dima”, like smoke rising, short and tasteful]
Da zagrlim je čvrsto
i nikad ne puštam
[Last hit – final bar: kick+808 accent on last word, then rapid decay to pads+heartbeat FX for outro, no long cinematic fade]

---

# hardcore_pop - Zvezde_Padajedu_Sa_S_Neba - Hardcore_Pop_2
[DESCRIPTION]
A bouncy underground slap club tech beat drives the track, layered with Turkish oriental pop melodies on saz and zurna. Car honks and tire screeches add playful city energy. Syncopated bass and sharp percussion fuel the non-stop groove, topped by silk-smooth, unprocessed vocals.

[LYRICS]
[Instrumental - mysterious, sexy]
([Sub-bass pulse] - thumm-thumm)
([Closed hi-hat] - tss-tss-tss)
([Acid synth low] - gyaa-gyaa)

[Male - Verse 1]
Noćima već sanjam,
(kako me doziva aaa aaa)

sa tim sjajem u očima

( aaaa)

ne znam al dobro znam da...
([Heartbeat] - thumpthump)

([Clap build] - clap-clap-clap)
([Acid lead] - wyaa-wyaa)
([Tom roll] - dum-dum-dum)

zvezde padaju (paadajuuu)
([Top shimmer] - tinkleee)
U tebi tad se vojske bude,
da svetom vladaju
([Low toms] - dum-dum-dum)
I kad mi pruža svoje ruke
(Ruuuke)
([Air sweep] - whooosh)
Misli se nadaju,
da ostaće mi tu zauvek
gde se srca raduju
([Wide pad] - ooo-aaa)

[Male -Outro]
Da spojimo se
ko dva dima među zvezdama
(među zvezdamaaa)
([Reverb trail] - whooom)
Da zagrlim je čvrsto
i nikad ne puštam
(nikad ne puštam)
([Final hit] - BOOM) ([Delay] - tum…tum…)

[Instrumental - Fade Out Acid synth melody fades with sub-bass pulsing]
([Acid line fade] - wyaa-wyaa…ya…)
([Sub-bass slow] - wub…wub…)
([Hi-hat ghost] - tss…tss…)

# hardcore_pop - Zzijan - Hardcore_Pop_1
[DESCRIPTION]
bouncy undeground slap club tech Turkish oriental pop ,  car honks, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Verse 1]
Znaš da smo upali u klub
Ako vani čuješ boom
A da nismo hteli tu
Ali upali u loop
A da nama nije trip
Nego outfit je skup
Težim, neću krit
Misli li bi da sam
[Chorus]
Niko gotov ziyan, ja sam pijan, ona sijaa
Utro ja uzimam sexy look, this is me, a
Uvija, osija, osija, o mamma mia
Amnezija od ovih lija, svaka fantazija
[Post-Chorus]
O mene nije, ne ne ne nije
Ne ne ne nije, ne ne ne ne ne
Ne ne ne nije, ne ne ne nije
Ne ne ne nije, ne ne ne ne ne
[Bridge]
Pa di na mene, pa di na mene
Pa di na mene, vozi na mene, cini mene
Pa di na mene, pa di na mene
Pa di na mene, vozi na mene, cini mene, yo
[Verse 2]
Da li bi da zbog tebe nema mene, ne ne ne ne ne
Da la bi se da ta dilema iz tebe nestane
A ova mala pola sveta ume da okrene
Onda kada gradom šeta te noge otmene
[Chorus]
Niko gotov ziyan, ja sam pijan, ona sijaa
Utro ja uzimam letal nazi kao zmija
Uvija, osija, osija, o mamma mia
Amnezija od ovih lija, svaka fantazija
[Post-Chorus]
O mene nije, ne ne ne nije
Ne ne ne nije, ne ne ne ne ne
Ne ne ne nije, ne ne ne nije
Ne ne ne nije, ne ne ne ne ne
[Outro]
Pa di na mene, pa di na mene
Pa di na mene, vozi na mene, cini mene
Pa di na mene, pa di na mene
Pa di na mene, vozi na mene, cini mene, yo

# hardcore_pop - Zzvezde Padaju- Hardcore_Pop_4
[DESCRIPTION]
bouny undeground slap club tech Turkish oriental pop ,  car honks, tire screeching, dynamic, dance non-stop groove paired with silk smooth voices, no autotune, just clear vocals

[LYRICS]
[Intro – Filtered version of slap-club groove at ~122 BPM. Kick+slap bass low-passed, just pulse; wide pads and soft organ, faint oriental hook (zurna/gusle-like synth) answering future melody. Distant car honks and city noise panned wide, light vinyl crackle under everything. No lead yet, only distant ad-libs and FX, dreamy but still clubby.]

[Male - Verse 1]
Noćima već sanjam,
(kako me doziva aaa aaa) ([Female distant ad-lib] - [air-y, wide, long reverb tail, tucked behind])
Dok šapuće mi ime
sa tim sjajem u očima
([Breath close] - [haaah, intimate inhale right before “Dok šapuće…”])
I ne znam dal je ona stvarna
([Pad swell] - [ooo-aaa, soft oriental pad opening on “stvarna”])
Il živi mi u snovima,
([808 soft bump] - [sub note, short tail on downbeat])
ne znam al dobro znam da...
([Delay throw] - ["znam da..." 1/4 note echo, fading in stereo])

Svaki put kad on tu je,
zvezde padaju (paadajuuu)
([FX] - [sparkle/zvezda fall shimmer layered with tiny hat roll])
U tebi tad se vojske bude,
da svetom vladaju
([Choir pad] - [low male “aaah” + soft strings, wide, 1–2 bars])
I kad mi pruža svoje ruke
Misli se nadaju,
([Sub lift] - [808 up one step into “nadaju”])
da ostaće mi tu zauvek
gde se srca raduju
([Clap reverb] - [slightly longer plate on snare/clap in this bar for uplift])

A ona samo zna da igra
(uuuu aaaa) ([Female vox] - [silky oriental melisma, panned L/R, light delay])
Ništa ne govori
Dok pleše oko mene
čekam kad ću
([Bass bump]) ([808 accent] - [short glide up, sidechained to kick])
Da izgorim
([Flame lick FX] - [low “fwoosh” + subtle riser into next section])

([Male -Outro] – Drop some elements: hats slightly softer, pads more present, oriental lead faintly echoing main melody; more reverb on snare/clap for floaty feel, still clear kick+slap bass holding groove.]
Da spojimo se
ko dva dima među zvezdama
([Wide pad] - [lush “ooo-aaa” stereo pad, slowly modulating])
Da zagrli me čvrsto
i nikad ne pušta...
(Srce kuca... kuca...
kuca samo za nju)
([Heart FX] - [low tom/808 heartbeat pattern for 1–2 bars])
ne pušta...
(Srce kuca... kuca...
kuca samo za nju)
([Delay vox] - ["samo za nju" 1/4 ping-pong delay, filtered highs])

Svaki put kad on tu je,
zvezde padaju (paadajuuu)
([FX] - [same falling-star shimmer + short crash reversed into next line])
U tebi tad se vojske bude,
da svetom vladaju
([Choir pad] - [slightly louder, more high strings here])
I kad mi pruža svoje ruke
Misli se nadaju,
([808 pattern] - [extra ghost note under “Misli se nadaju”])
da ostaće mi tu zauvek
gde se srca raduju
([Wide pad] - [ooo-aaa, widening stereo image on “srca raduju”])

([Male -Outro] – Final lift then fade: drums stay but hats slightly open, extra small fills before phrases, oriental hook answers last lines softly. Reverb tails lengthen 10–15%, club still moving but feeling more dreamy.)
Da spojimo se
ko dva dima među zvezdama
([FX] - [soft reverse swell into “dva dima”, like smoke rising])
Da zagrlim je čvrsto
i nikad ne puštam
([Last hit] - [final bar: kick+808 accent, then quick decay to pads/heart FX for outro])

# hardcore_pop - जय जय रुद्र महाकाल
[DESCRIPTION]
psychodelic goa trance full on  underground track

[LYRICS]
जय जय रुद्र महाकाल  
ताण्डव नर्तनं करोति।  
अग्निज्वालं दीपयन्तं,  
सर्वं संहारकारणं॥  

शिव शिव महायोगिन्,  
सर्वदुःखं हारय॥  
ॐ नमः शिवाय ॐ रुद्राय॥

---

# hardcore_pop - जय जय रुद्र महाकाल
[DESCRIPTION]
Psychedelic goa trance full on underground track opens with swirling acid synths, layered over a deep, hypnotic kick and resonant sub-bass. Rapid, evolving arpeggios and squelching leads pulse through spacious, effects-laden breaks. Metallic percussion accents and intricate modulated FX push intensity, while subtle drones and spacious reverb ramps up tension before explosive climaxes, keeping energy relentless and immersive throughout.

[LYRICS]
जय जय रुद्र महाकाल  
ताण्डव नर्तनं करोति।  
अग्निज्वालं दीपयन्तं,  
सर्वं संहारकारणं॥  

शिव शिव महायोगिन्,  
सर्वदुःखं हारय॥  
ॐ नमः शिवाय ॐ रुद्राय॥

---

# hardcore_pop - जय जय रुद्र महाकाल
[DESCRIPTION]
psychodelic goa trance

[LYRICS]
जय जय रुद्र महाकाल  
ताण्डव नर्तनं करोति।  
अग्निज्वालं दीपयन्तं,  
सर्वं संहारकारणं॥  
भीषणं व्याप्य लोकं,  
सर्वत्र अवस्थितं शिवम्।  

शिव योगेश्वर भवानीपतिं,  
सुखकर्ता शिवनायकं।  
ॐॐ त्र्यम्बकं यजामहे 
सुगन्धिं पुष्टिवर्धनम्।
 उर्वारुकमिव 
बन्धनान्मृत्योर्मुक्षीय
 मामृतात्। नमः शिवाय।  
हे रुद्र, शान्त स्वरूपं 
शरणागतं प्रपालय।

---
